1b1(rgyud): rgyu gar skad du/ many+dzu shI dz+nyA na sata sa/ 
1b2(rgyud): / rgyu gar skad du/ 
1b3(rgyud): ye shes sems dpa'adin dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par
2a1(rgyud): / brjod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal
2a2(rgyud): lo// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // gdul dka' 'dul ba rnams
2a3(rgyud): kyi mchog/ dpa' be 'jig rten gsum las rgya la// rdo rje dbang phyug
2a4(rgyud): gsang ba'i rgyal// rnam rgyas pad+ma dkar po'i sprin// pad+ma rab tu rgyas pa'i
2b1(rgyud): zhal 'ang gi lagag rdo mchog yang dang yang du gsor byed pa// khro gnyer ldan pa'i rlabs la sogs/ lag na rdo
2b2(rgyud): mnga' yas pa/ dpa' bo gdul dka' 'dul ba / dpo'i bo 'jigs ru gzugs can dang / rdo rje rje mo rab
2b3(rgyud): pa rang gi lag gis gsor// byed pa/ shes rang thabs dang snying rjerje// 'gro don byed pa rnams
2b4(rgyud): mchog/ dga' mgur rangs pa'i bsams pa can/ khro bo'i lus kyi gzugs ldan pa/ sangs rgyas drin las byed
2b5(rgyud): pa'i mgon// lus btud rnams kyis lhan cig tu// mgon po bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs/ rdzogs sangs rgyas la
3a1(rgyud): phyag 'tshal te// thal mo sbyar ba byas gyur nas// spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad gsol// khyab bdag
3a2(rgyud): bdag la sman pa dang // bdag don bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir// sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i// byang chub ji ltar/ 
3a3(rgyud): bdag thob bgyi// nyon mongs pas da ni sems bkrugs shing // mi shes 'dam nga du bying ba yi// sems can kun
3a4(rgyud): la sman pa dang // bla med 'bras bu thob pa'i phyir// bcom ldan ston pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'gro ba'i bla mas
3a5(rgyud): bshad du gsol// dam tshig chen po de nyid mkhyen// dbang po bsam pa rig pa mchog/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes sku// 
3a6(rgyud): gtsug gtor chen po tshig gi bdag/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' yi// ye shes sku ste rang byung ba// don zab don ni rgya
3b1(rgyud): zhing // don chen mtshungs med rab zhi pa// thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba// mtshan yang dag par brjod pa mchog/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis// 
3b2(rgyud): gsungs// ma 'ongs rnams kyang gsung 'gyur la// da ltar byung ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas// gang yang yang yang gsung ba gang // rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba
3b3(rgyud): 'dir// rdo rje 'chang chen gsang sngags 'chang // dpag med rnams kyis dgegos pa yi// gang yang yang dag rab gsungs pa// bdag kyang 'di ni gzung bar
3b4(rgyud): bgyi// bsam pa brtan pos nges 'byung bar// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas kun gyi// gsang 'a// dzin ji ltar bdag 'gyur bgyi// nyon mongs
3b5(rgyud): ma lus bsal ba dang // mi shes ma lus spang ba'i phyir// sems can rnams kyis bsam pa yi// khyad par ji bzhin rab bshad 'tshal// gsang
3b6(rgyud): dbang lag na rdo rje yis// de bzhin gshegs la de skad du// gsol btab thal mo sbyar byas te// lus btud nas ni spyan sngar 'dug/ de nas bcom ldan shAkya
3b7(rgyud): thub// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/ nyid kyi zhal nas ljags bzang dag/ ring zhing yangs pa brkyang mdzad de// 'jig rten gsum po snang byed
4a1(rgyud): / cing / bdud bzhi'i ngag rnams 'dul byed pa// 'jig rten rnams kyi ngan song gsum// sbyong bar byed pa'i 'dzum bstan nas// 
4a2(rgyud): tshangs pa'i gsung ni snyan pa yis// 'jig rten gsum po kun bkang ste// lag na rdo rje stobs po che// gsang dbang la ni slar gsungs pa/ 
4a3(rgyud): legs so dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // lag na rdo rje khyod legs so// 'gro la phan pa'i don du khyod// snying rje che dang ldan gyur te/ 
4a4(rgyud): 'jam dpal ye shes sku yi mtshan// yang // dag brjod pa don che ba// dag par byed cing sdigasel ba// nga las nyan par brtson pa ni// 
4a5(rgyud): gsang ba'i bdag po khyod legs so// de phyir 'di ni ngas bshad bya// khyod ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// bcom ldan de ni legs zhes gsol/ 
4a6(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan shAkya thub// gsang sngags mtha' dag rigs chen po// gsang sngags rig pa 'chang ba'i rigs// rigs gsum la
4a7(rgyud): ni rnam par gzigs// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i rigs// 'jig rten snang byed rigs chen dang // phyag rgya chen po'i rigs mchog
4b1(rgyud): dang gtsug tor chen po rigs chen no// gsang sngags rgyal po drug ldan zhing // gnyis su med par 'byung ba dang // sdeb med pa'i chos can 'di// tshig gi bang/ 
4b2(rgyud): bos tshigs bcad gsungs// a A/ i I/ u u/ e e/ oM oM/ oM aHskr-i ti hr-id/ dz+nyAn mAd+hir ha bud+d+ho bud+d+hA nA~M/ t+yAd+hU badzin oM badz+ra tiSh+Thadu/ khatshod// prad+d+hA dz+nyAn drAH
4b3(rgyud): ye/ dz+nyA na kA ya/ wA gI sha ra/ a ra be tsa na ya te na maH// 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas a yig byung // a yig yig
4b4(rgyud): 'bru kun gyi mchog/ don chen 'gyur med dam pa yin// srog chen po ste skye ba med// tshig tu brjod pas dngas pa ste// brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog/ tshig
4b5(rgyud): kun rab tu gsal bar byed// mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che// sems can thams cad dga' bar byed// mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che// nyon mongs
4b6(rgyud): kun gyi dgra che ba// mchod pa chen po gti mug che// gti mug blo ste gti mug sel// mchod pa chen po khro ba che// khro ba chen po dgra che ba// mchod pa chen po chags pa che
4b7(rgyud): chags pa thams cad sel bar byed// 'dod pa chen po bde ba che// dga' ba chen po dgu pa che// gzugs che lus kyang che ba ste// kha dog che zhing lus bong che// ming yang
4b8(rgyud): che zhing rgya che ba// dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa yin// shes rab chen po mtshon 'chang ba// nyon mongs lcags kyu che ba'i mchog/ grags chen snyan grags chen po ste// snang
5a1(rgyud): 'a chen po gsal ba che// mkhas pa sgyu 'phrul chen po 'chang // sgyu 'phrul chen po don sgrub pa// sgyu 'phrul chen po dga' bas dga'// sgyu 'phrul chen po mig
5a2(rgyud): 'phrul can// sbyin bdag chen po gtso bo ste// tshul khrims chen po 'chang ba'i mchog/ bzong chen 'chang ba brtan pa ste// brtson 'grus chen po pha rol gnon// bsam gtan
5a3(rgyud): chen po ting 'dzin gnas// shes rab chen po lus 'chang ba// stobs po che la thabs che ba// smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho ste// byams chen rang bzhin dpag tu med// snying rje chen
5a4(rgyud): po blo yi mchog/ shes rab chen po blo chen ldan// thabs chen byed pa chen po ste// rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs dang / da ldan// shugs chen mgyogs pa chen po ste// rdzu
5a5(rgyud): 'phrul chen po cher grags pa// stobs chen pha rol gan na pa po// srid pa'i ri bo chen po 'joms// mkhre gas shing rdo rje chen po 'chang // drag po chen po drag shug
5a6(rgyud): che// 'jigs chen 'jigs par byed pa po// mgon po rigs mchog chen po ste// bla ma gsang sngags che ba mchog/ theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas// theg pa chen po'i
5a7(rgyud): tshul gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che// thub pa chen po thub chen ldan// gsang sngags tshul chen las byung ba// gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can// pha rol
5a8(rgyud): phyin bcu thob pa ste// pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas// pha rol phyin bcu dag pa ste// pha rol phyin pa bcu yi tshul// sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po ste// sa bcu la ni rab tu gnas/ 
5b1(rgyud): shes bcu rnam dag bdag nyid can// shes bcu rnam dag 'chang ba po// rnam pa bcu po don bcu'i don// thub dbang stobs bcu khyab pa'i bdag/ kun gyi don ni ma lus byed// rnam bcu
5b2(rgyud): dbang ldan che ba po// thog ma med pa spos med bdag/ de bzhin nyid dag dag pa'i bdag/ yang dag smra zhing tshig gzhan med// ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed// gnyis su med pa gnyis med smra// / 
5b3(rgyud): yang dag mtha' la rnam par gnas// bdag med seng ge'i sgra dang ldan// mu stegs ri dgas ngan 'jigs byed// kun tu 'gro ba don yod bgrod// de bzhin gshegs pa yid ltar mgyogs
5b4(rgyud): rgyal ba dgra rgyal rnam par rgyal// 'khor los bsgyur ba stobs po che// tshogs kyi slob dpon tshogs kyi gtso// tshogs rdorje tshogs bdag dbang dang ldan// mthu chen gces pa 'dzin
5b5(rgyud): pa ste// tshul chen gzhan gyi 'dren pa min// tshig rje tshig bad ga smra mkhas pa// tshig la dbang ba tshig mtha' yas// / tshig bden bden par smra ba dang // bden pa bzhi ni ston pa
5b6(rgyud): po// phyir mi ldog pa phyir mi 'ong // bse ru so sor 'dren pa ste// nges 'byung sna tshogs nges 'byung ba// 'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig pa// dge slong dgra bcom zag pa zad// 'dod chags bral
5b7(rgyud): ba dbang po thul// bde ba rnyed pa 'jigs med thob// bsil bar gyur pa gos pa med// rig pa dang ni rkang par ldan// bder gshegs 'jig rten rig pa mchog/ bdag gir mi 'dzin da
5b8(rgyud): mi 'dzin// bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas// 'khor ba'i pha rol mthar gnas pa// bya ba byas pa skam sar gnas// ye shes 'ba' zhig nges 'byung ba// shes rab mtshon chas rnam 'joms
6a1(rgyud): pa// dam chos chos rgyal gsal bar ldan// 'jig rten snang bar byed pa mchog/ chos kyi dbang phyug chos kyi rgyal// legs pa'i lam ni ston pa po// don grub grub
6a2(rgyud): pa'i kun rtog ni// kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs// rnam par mi rtog dbyings mi zad// chos dbyings dam pa zad mi shes// bsod nams ldan pa bsod nams tshogs// ye shes ye shes
6a3(rgyud): 'byung gnas che// ye shes ldan pa yod med shes// tshogs gnyis tshogs dang yang dag ldan// rtag pa kun rgyal rnal 'byor can// bsam gtan bsam byas blo yi bdag/ so so rang rig mi g.yo ba// 
6a4(rgyud): mchog gi dang po sku gsum 'chang // sangs rgyas sku ji bdag nyi dad can// khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi bdag/ sangs rgyas lnga bdag cod pan can// spyan lnga chags pa med pa 'chang / 
6a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad skyes pa po// sangs rgyas sras po dam pa mchog/ shes rab srid 'byung skye gnas te// chos kyi skye gnas srid mthar byed// gcig pu sra mkhregs rdo rje'i
6a6(rgyud): bdag/ 'phral du bskyed pa 'gro ba'i bdag/ nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba// shes rab ye shes me bo che// 'od chen rnam par snang bar byed// ye shes snang ba lam me ba// 'gro ba'i mar me ye shes
6a7(rgyud): sgron// gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba// rig pa'i rgyal mchog sngags dbang po// gsang sngags rgyal po don chen byed// gtsug tor chen po rmad byung gtsug/ na mkha'i bdag po sna tshogs ston// 
6a8(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun bdag dngos po mchog/ 'gro ba dga' ba'i mig dang ldan// sna tshogs gzugs can skyed pa po// mchod 'os rjed 'os drang srong che// rigs gsum 'chang ba gsang sngags ldan// dam tshi/ 
6b1(rgyud): chen po gsang sngags 'dzin// gtso bo dkon mchog gsum 'dzin pa// theg pa mchog gsum ston pa po// don yod zhags pa rnam par rgyal// 'dzin pa chen po rdo rje zhags// rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa
6b2(rgyud): che// rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed// khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug 'jigs// mig drug lag drug stobs dang ldan// keng rus mche ba gtsigs pa po// ha la ha la gdong brgya pa// gshin rje
6b3(rgyud): mthar byed bgegs kyi rgyal// rdo rje shugs can 'jigs byed pa// rdo rje grags pa rdo rje snying // sgyu 'phrul rdo rje gsus po che// rdo rje skye gnas rdo rje'i dbang // rdo rje snying po mkha' 'dra ba// mi g.yo
6b4(rgyud): ral pa gcig bgyings pa// glang chen lpags pa rlon pa 'chang // drag chen hA hA zhes sgrog pa// hi hi zhes sgrogs 'jigs par byed// gang mo chen po gang rgyangs can// rdo rje gad mo cher
6b5(rgyud): sgrogs pa// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che// rdo rje gtum po dga' ba che// rdo rje hUM mdzad hUM gi gzugs// rdo rje mda' yi mtshon 'chang ba// rdo rje/ 
6b6(rgyud): ral gris gcod mdzad pa// rdo rje kun 'chang rdo rje can// rdo rje gcig pu g.yul sel ba// rdo rje 'bar ba gtsigs pa'i mig/ me go skyes rdo rje 'bar ba ste// rdo rje 'bebs pa 'bebs pa che/ 
6b7(rgyud): mig brgya pa ste rdo rje'i mig/ rdo rje'i spu ni myu gu lus// rdo rje'i spu ni lus gcig pu// rdo rje rtse mo sen mos brtsams// rdo rje snying po lpags pa mkhregs// rdo rje phreng thogs dpal dang ldan// rdo rje
6b8(rgyud): rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste// gang rgyangs hA hA nges par sgrogs// yi ge drug pa rdo rje'i sgra// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni sgra che ba// 'jig rten gsum gcig sgra chen po// namakha'i khams kyi mthar thugs sgra/ 
7a1(rgyud): sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog/ yang dag med de de bzhin nyid// yang dag mtha' ste yi ge med// stong zhing smra ba'i khyu mchog ste// zab cing rgya che'i sgra sgrogs pa// chos kyi dung
7a2(rgyud): ste sgra chen po// chos kyi gaN+DI sgra bo che// rab tu mi gnas mya ngan 'das// phyogs bcu chos kyi rnga bo che// gzugs med gzugs ldan dam pa ste// sna tshogs gzugs can yid rang bzhin// gzugs
7a3(rgyud): rnams thams cad snang ba'i dpal// gzugs brnyan ma lus 'chang ba po// snang ba med cing che bar grags// khams gsum dbang phyug chen po ste// 'phags lam shin tu mtho la gnas// chos kyi tog
7a4(rgyud): ni cher 'byung ba// 'jig rten gsum po cig gzhol lus// gnas dbartan rgan po skye dgu'i bdag gsum cu rtsa gnyis mtsha dan 'chang ba// sdugu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes// slob dpon
7a5(rgyud): 'jig rten yon tan shes// 'jig rten slob dpon 'jigs pa med// mgon skyob 'jig rten gsum khyab pa// skyabs dang skyob pa bla na med// na mkha' khyab pa longs spyod pa// thams
7a6(rgyud): cad mkhyen pa ye shes mtsho// ma rig sgo nga'i sngags 'byed pa// srid pa'i dra ba 'joms pa po// nyon mongs ma lus zhi byed pa// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho pha rol son// ye shes dbang bskur cod pan can// 
7a7(rgyud): yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan// sdug bsngal gsum gyi sdug bsngal zhi// gsum mtha' mtha' yas grol gsum pa// sgrib pa thams cad nges par grol// nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid la gnas/ 
7a8(rgyud): nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das// dus gsum dus med rtog par gnas// sems can kun gyi klu chen po// yon tan thod can rnams kyi thod// lhag ma kun las rnam grol ba// na mkha'i lam la rab gan
7b1(rgyud): pa// yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang // khyab bdag rin chen kun gyi mchog/ dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa ste// bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog/ byed pa sems can kun don byed// phan thogs sems can/ 
7b2(rgyud): gnyis gshin pa// bzang ngan shes pa dus shes pa// khyab bdag dam shes dam tshig ldan// dus shes sems can dbang po shes// rnam grol gsum la mkhas pa po// yon tan ldan zhing yon tan
7b3(rgyud): shes// chos shes rab ni bkra shis 'byung // bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa// grags pa dpal mo snyan pa dge/ dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston che// dga' ba chen po rol pa che// bkur sti rim phra/ 
7b4(rgyud): phun sum tshogs// rab tu dga' ba grags bdag dpal// mchog da ldan mchog sbyin gtso bo ste// skyabs kyi dam pa skyabs su 'os// rab mchog 'jigs pa chen po'i dgra/ 'jigs pa
7b5(rgyud): ma lus sel ba po// gtsug pud phung bu ral pa can// ral pa maH/ rigacod pan ldan// gdong lnga gtsug pud lnga dang ldan / zur bud lnga dang ldan pa'i thod// mgo zlum brtul zhugs
7b6(rgyud): chen po 'chang // tshangs par spyod pa brtul zhugs mchog/ dka' thub mthar byin dka' thub che// khrus ldan go rung ma mchog/ bram ze tshangs pa tshangs pa rig/ tshangs pa mya ngan 'das pa thog/ 
7b7(rgyud): grol ba thar pa rnam grol lus// rnam grol ni bzhi pa nyid// mya ngan 'das ni mya ngan 'das// legs par nges 'byung mthar byed pa// bde ba sdug bsngal mthar byed gnas// 'dod chags bral ba brtags pa
7b8(rgyud): dang // thub pa med pa dang med pa// gas sa min ma snang gas pa med// ma med kun 'gro khyab papo// thams sa bon pag pa med// rdul med rdul bral dri ma med // nyes pa spangs pa skyon med ga/ shis
8a1(rgyud): rab sad rnams sad bdag/ thams cad ye shes kun rig mchog/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid 'das// ye shes gnyis med tshul 'chang ba// rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub/ 
8a2(rgyud): dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed pa// sangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med// dang po'i sangs rgyas rigs med pa// ye shes mi gcig dri ma med// ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs// tshig gi dbang phyug
8a3(rgyud): smra ba che// smra ba'i skyes mchog smra ba'i rgyal// smra ba'i dam pa mchog gi gnas// smra ba'i seng ge thub pa med// kun tu lta ba mchog tu dga'// gzi brjid phreng ldan lta na sdug/ 'od bzang 'bar ba
8a4(rgyud): dpal gyi be'u// snang ba gsal bar byed pa'i 'od// sman pa/ che mchog gtso bo ste// zug rngu 'byin pa bla na med// sman rnam sra ma lus ljon pa'i shing // nyon mongs nad kyi dgra che ba// sdug
8a5(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog/ dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'a khor can// phyogs bcu na mkha'i mthar thug pa// chos kyi// rgyal mtshan chen po sgreng // 'gro ba'i gdugs gcig yangs
8a6(rgyud): pa ste// byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can// dpal ldan pad+ma gar dbang phyug/ khyab bdag chen po rin chen gdugs// sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal po che// sangs rgyas kun bdag dngos po 'dzin// 
8a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che// sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig/ rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal// rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste// 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag/ rdorje
8a8(rgyud): kun 'chang mnga' bdag ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ga// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi mtsho dang ldan// rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che/ 
8b1(rgyud): rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od// chags bral dang po chags pa che// kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od// rdo rje dkyil krungs rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas brjod pa'i chos 'dzin pa// dpal ldan sangs
8b2(rgyud): rgyas pad+ma skyes// kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa// rgyal po sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang // che ba sangs rgyas rig pa 'chang // rdo rje rnon po ral gri che// rnam par dag pa 'gyur med mchog/ theg
8b3(rgyud): pa chen po sdug bsngal gcod// mtshon cha chen po rdo rje chos// rdo rje zab mo dzin dzika/ rdo rje blo gros don bzhin rig/ pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa// sa rnams thams cad rnam par rgyan// rnam par
8b4(rgyud): dag pa bdag med chos// yang dag ye shes zla snying 'od/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba rnal 'byor che// rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po mtsho dag/ ma lus rdo rje dkyil dkrungs te// ye shes sku rnams ma
8b5(rgyud): lus 'chang // kun tu bzang po blo gros bzang // sa yi snying po 'gro ba 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che// sna tshogs sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'chang // dngos po kun gyi rang
8b6(rgyud): bzhin mchog/ dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin// skye med chos te sna tshogs don// chos kun ngo bo nyid 'chang ba// skad cig gcig la shes rab che// chos kun khong du chud pa 'chang // chos kun
8b7(rgyud): mngon par rtogs pa ste// thub pa blo mchog yang dag mtha'// mi g.yo rab tu dang ba'i bdag/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub 'chang // sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon gsum pa// ye shes me lce/ 
8b8(rgyud): 'odo bags pa// 'dod pa 'din srub dam pa ste// ngan song thams cad rnam skyong ba// mgon po sems can kun gyi mchog/ sems can thams cad bgrol byed// nyon mongs gsul du cig dpa ga/ 
9a1(rgyud): mi shes dgra yi dregs pa 'joms// blo ni sgeg 'chang dpal dang ldan// dpa' bo mi sdug gzugs 'chang ba// lag pa'i dbyu baN+Da bskyod cing // rkang pa bskyod pas gar byed pa/ 
9a2(rgyud): dpal ldan lag pa brgyas gang la// na mkha' khyab par gar byed pa// rkang pa gcig gis mthil gnon pa// sa yi snying po mthil la gnas// tshangs pa'i sgo nga'i rtse mo gnon// rkang 'theb sen mo la
9a3(rgyud): gnas pa// don gcig gnyis med chos kyi don// dam pa'i don te 'jigs pa med// rnam rig sna tshogs rang bzhin don// sems dang rnam shes rgyud dang ldan// dngos po ma lus don dga' ba/ 
9a4(rgyud): stong pa nyid dga' mchog gi blo// srid pa'i 'dod chags laso dgas 'das// srid pa gsum po dga' ba che// dag pa spyi ngan dkar bzhin du dkar// 'od bzang ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od/ 
9a5(rgyud): nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes// 'dod chags chen po/ sen mo'i 'od// zur phud bzang po mthon kha mchog/ skra/ mchog mthon ka chen po 'chang // nor bu chen po 'od chag
9a6(rgyud): dpal// sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan// 'jig rten kham brgya kun bskyod pa// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa stobs chen ldan// de nyid dran pa chen po 'chang // dran pa bzhi po ting 'dzin rgyal// byang / 
9a7(rgyud): chub yan lag me tog dga'// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtsho// lam gyi yan lag brgyad tshul rig/ yang dag sangs rgyas lam rig pa// sems can kun la shas cher chags// 
9a8(rgyud): na mkha' lta bur chags pa med// sems can kun gyi yid las skyes// sems can kun gyi yid ltar mgyogs// sems can kun gyi dbang don shes// sems can kun gyi yid 'phrog pa// phung po// 
9b1(rgyud): lnga don don de nyid shes// rnam dag phung po lnga 'chang ba// thams cad nges 'byung mtha' la gnas// thams cad nges par 'byung ba mkhas// thams cad nges 'byung lam la gnas// thams cad nges 'byung
9b2(rgyud): ston pa po// yan lag bcu gnyis srid rtsa bton// dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis 'chang // bden bzhi tshul gyi rnam pa can// shes pa brgyad po rtogs pa 'chang // bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis ldan// de nyid
9b3(rgyud): rnam pa bcu drug rig/ rnam pa nyi shus byang chub pa// rnam par sangs rgyas kun rig mchog/ dpag med sangs rgyas sprul pa yi// sku yi mtha' ni rnam sgom pa// skad cig thams cad mngon par
9b4(rgyud): rtogs// sems kyi skad cig don kun rig/ theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyi// 'gro ba'i don gyi rnam dbye can// theg pa ga/ sum gyi nges 'byung ni// theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas/ 
9b5(rgyud): nyon mongs khams rnams rnam dag bdag/ las kyi khams rna mas zad byed pa// chu bo rgya mtsho kun las rgal// sbyor ba'i dgon pa las byung ba// nyon mongs nye nyon kun nyon mongs
9b6(rgyud): bag chags bcas pa rab spangs pa// snying rje chen po shes rab thabs// don yod 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// 'du shes thams cad rab spangs don// rnam shes don ni 'gog pa 'chang // sems can
9b7(rgyud): kun gyi yid kyi yul// sems can kun gyi yid gnas pa// sems can kun gyi yid nang gnas// de dag sems dang mnyam nyid son// sems can kun yid tshim par byed// sems can kun gyi yid
9b8(rgyud): dga' ba// grub mtha' 'khrul pa ldan pa min// 'khrul pa thams cad rnam par spangs// don gsum the tshom med pa'i blo// kun don yon tan gsum gyi bdag/ dus gsum phung po lnga yi don// 
10a1(rgyud): skad cig thams cad rnam sgom pa// skad cig cig mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'chang // lus med sku te sku yi mchog/ sku ni bye ba
10a2(rgyud): rnam par 'gyed// gzugs rnams ma lus kun tu ston// nor bu chen po rin chen tog/ sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs bya ba// sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med// gsang sngags skye gnas yi ge med/ 
10a3(rgyud): gsang sngags chen po rigs gsum pa// gsang sngags don kun skyed pa po// thig le chen po yi ge med// stong pa chen po yi ge lnga// thig le stong pa yi ge drug/ rnam pa thams cad rnam pa med/ 
10a4(rgyud): bcu drug phyed phyed thig le can// cha med cha ldan las 'das pa// / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i rtse mo 'chang // bsam ga/ tan yan lag kun shes shing // ting 'dzin rig dang rgyud rig
10a5(rgyud): pa// ting 'dzin sku ste sku yi mchog/ longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi rgyal// sprul pa'i sku ste sku yi mchog/ sang / sa rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba// phyogs bcur sprul pa sna
10a6(rgyud): tshogs 'gyed// ji bzhin 'gro ba'i don byed pa// lha yi dbang po lha yi lha// lha min dbang po sbyin byed bdag/ lha yi bla ma 'chi med dbang // rab 'joms rab 'joms dbang phyug po// srid
10a7(rgyud): pa'i dgon pa las rgal ba// ston pa gcig pu 'gro ba'i bla// 'jig rten phyogs bcur rab grags pa// chos kyi sbyin bdag che ba po// byams pa'i go cha chas pa ste// snying rje yi ni ya lang 'gro/ 
10a8(rgyud): shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs// nyon mongs mi shes g.yul ngos la// dpa' bo bdud dgra bdud 'dul ba// bdud bzhi'i 'jigs pa mthar byed pa// bdud dpung thams cad pham par byed// rdzogs pa
10b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'dren// mchod 'os bstod 'os phyag gi gnas// rtag tu rim gro bya ba'i 'os// bkur 'os rjed par bya'i mchog/ phyag byar 'os pa bla ma'i mchog/ 'jig rten gsum po gom gcig
10b2(rgyud): bgrod// na mkha' mtha' med rnam par gnon// gsum rig gtsang ma dag pa ste// mngon shes drug ldan rjes dran drug/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rdzu 'phrul chen po 'jig rten 'das// shes
10b3(rgyud): rab pha rol phyin pa'i mtha'// shes rab kyi ni de nyid thob// bdag rig gzhan rig thams cad pa// kun la phan pa gang zag mchog/ 'jig rten dpe las 'das pa ste// shes dang shes bya'i bdag po
10b4(rgyud): mchog/ gtso bo chos kyi sbyin pa'i bdag/ phyag rgya bzhi po'i don sto na pa// 'gro ba'i bsnyen bkur gnas kyi mchog/ nges 'a byung gsum po bgrod rnams kyi// don gyi dam pa rnam dag dpal// 
10b5(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum gyi bskal bzang che// dpal ldan 'byor pa// na byed pa// 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchogamachog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud// yang dag mthar gyur khyod la
10b6(rgyud): 'dud// stong nyid snying po khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas 'dod la phyag 'tshal 'dud// sangs rgyas dgos pa khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas
10b7(rgyud): rol la phyag 'tshal 'dud// sangs rgyas 'dzum pa khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas snang la phyag 'tshal 'dud// sangs rgyas gsung ba khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud// dngos med las/ 
10b8(rgyud): byung khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas 'byung khyod la 'dud// na mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud// ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud// sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas gar mdzad khyod la 'dud// thams
11a1(rgyud): thams cad khyod la 'dud// ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud do// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes kyi sku dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku dang 'jam
11a2(rgyud): dpal ye shes sems dpa'i ma 'dres pa yongs su dag pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'o// khyod kyi bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang rab tu dang ba dang mgu ba chen po yang dag par bskyed pa'i don dang sku dang gsung
11a3(rgyud): dang thugs kyi gsang ba yongs su dag pa'i phyir dang yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongasu ma dag pa'i sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yong su rdzogs pa dang yongs su dag pa'i phyir dang
11a4(rgyud): bla na med pa'i don lhag par ma rtogs pa lhag par rtogs pa'i phyir dang ma thob pa thob pa'i phyir dang ji srid de bzhin gshegs pa tha thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yang dag par bzung ba'i don tu
11a5(rgyud): yang bdag gis bstan pa dang yang dag pa rab tu bshad pa dang / rnam par bkrol ba dang rnam par phye ba dang rab tu gsal ba/ ra byas par dang byin gyis brlabs pa'o// lag na rdo rje rdo rje
11a6(rgyud): 'chang 'di ni ngas khyod kyi rgyud la sngags kyi chos nyid thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o// 'di ni 'khor lo dang po'i rje su bsngags pa'o// gzhan yang lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang
11a7(rgyud): mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni shin tu yongs su dag pa yongasu byang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang bar gyur pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
11a8(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi byang chub pa'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mngon par rtogs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'o// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi
11b1(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa'o// rgyal ba rnams kyi bdud kyi stobs thams cad pham par byed pa'o// stobs bcu dang ldan pa thams cad kyi stobs bcu'i stobasu gyur pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
11b2(rgyud): rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'o// chos thams cad kyi lung ngo // sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par kun chub pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi dri ma med pa shin tu yongs su
11b3(rgyud): dag pa bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rab tu skye ba'o// lha dang mi thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa'i zhing ngo // theg
11b4(rgyud): pa chen po'i rab tu gnas pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spro/ da pa'i 'byung khung ngo // 'phags pa'i lam yang dag pa'i mthar thug pa'o// rnam par grol ba rnams kyi brtag pa'o// 
11b5(rgyud): nges par 'byung ba'i lam gyi skyed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung gi rgyun mi 'chad pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rigs dang rgyud rab tu 'phel ba'o// phas
11b6(rgyud): kyi rgol ba thams cad kyi tshar gcod pa'o// mu stegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'joms pa'o// bdud bzhi'i stobs dang dpung dang sde rnams kyi pham par byed pa'o// sems can thams
11b7(rgyud): cad kyi yang dag par sdud pa'o// nges par 'byung bas bgrod pa thams cad kyi 'phags pa'i lam yongs su smin pa'o// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la gnas pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin no// 
11b8(rgyud): sems rtse gcig pa rnams kyi bsam gtan no// lus dang ngag dang yid mngon par sbyor ba rnams kyi rnal 'byor ro// yang dag par sbyor ba thams cad kun tu sbyor ba dang bral ba'o// nyon mongs
12a1(rgyud): pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi spong ba'o// sgrib pa thams cad kyi nye bar zhi ba'o// 'ching ba thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba'o// lhag ma thams cad
12a2(rgyud): kyi thar pa'o// sems nye bar 'gro ba thams cad kyi zhi ba'o// 'byor pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas so// rgud pa thams cad kyi rab tu 'joms pa'o// ngan song gi sgo thams cad kyi 'geg/ 
12a3(rgyud): pa'o// rnam par grol ba'i grong khyer gyi lam dam pa'o// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo'i rab tu mi 'jug pa'o// chos kyi 'khor lo'i rab tu bskor ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
12a4(rgyud): bstan pa'i gdugs dang rgyan mtshan dang ba dan rab tu sgreng ba'o// / dam pa'i chos ston pa'i lhag par gnas pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sngags kyi sgo'i spyod pa rnams kyi myur du
12a5(rgyud): grub pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la mngon pa/ ra sbyor ba rnams kyi sgom par lhag par rtogs pa'o// gnyis su med pa so sor rtog par sgom pa mngon par sbyor ba
12a6(rgyud): rnams kyi stong pa nyid so sor rtogs pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa dang tshogs thams cad kyi bskyed pa'o// yongs su dag pa'i sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi yongs su rdzogs pa'o// 
12a7(rgyud): yang dag pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po rnams kyi chos thams cad gcig pa'i sems so sor rtogs pa'o// mtshan yang dag par
12a8(rgyud): brjod pa 'di ni ji srid sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyi yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar ro// 'di ni 'khor lo gnyis pa'i rjes su bsngags pa lnga bcu rtsa gnyis so// gzhan yang lag na rdo rje rdo rje/ 
12b1(rgyud): 'chang mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kun tu spyad pa'i sdig pa ma lus pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi ngan song thams cad rnam par
12b2(rgyud): sbyong ba'o// ngan 'gro thams cad bzlog pa'o// las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yang dag par gcod pa'o// me khom pa brgyad du skye bar 'gyur ba thams cad mi skye bar byed pa'o// 'jigs pa chen po brgyad
12b3(rgyud): nye bar zhi bar byed pa'o// rmi lam ngan pa thams cad nges par sel ba'o// mtshan ma ngan pa thams cad rnam par sel bar byed pa'o// lta ba ngan pa dang bgegs thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed pa'o// bdud
12b4(rgyud): kyi dgra'i las thams cad thag ring du byed pa'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ba bsod nams thams cad nye bar 'phel bar byed pa'o// tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa thams cad mi skye bar byed pa
12b5(rgyud): brgyags pa dang nga rgyal dang dregs pa dang ngar 'dzin pa thams cad nges/ par 'joms par byed pa'o// sdug bsngal dang / yid mi bde ba thams cad mi skye bar byed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs
12b6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang bar gyur pa'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen du gyur pa'o// phyag rgya dang sngags thams
12b7(rgyud): cad du gyur pa'o// chos thams cad brjod du med par smra ba rnams kyi dran pa dang shes bzhin yang dag par bskyed pa'o// bla na med pa'i shes rab dang yid gzhungs par byed pa'o// nad med pa dang stobs
12b8(rgyud): dang dbang phyug phun sum tshogs par byed pa'o// dpal dang dge ba dang zhi ba legs pa rab tu 'phel bar byed pa'o// grags pa dang snyan pa dang tshigs su bcad pa dang bstod pa rab tu gsal bar
13a1(rgyud): byed pa'o// na dang 'jigs pa chen po thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed pa'o// shin tu dag pa rnams kyi shin tu dag pa'o// shin tu gtsang ba rnams kyi shin tu gtsang / 
13a2(rgyud): ba'o// shin tu 'byor ldan rnams kyi shin tu 'byor ldan no// shin tu bkra shis pa rnams kyi shin tu bkra shis pa'o// skyabs 'dod pa rnams kyi skyabs so// gnas 'dod pa rnams kyi gnas// skyob
13a3(rgyud): pa 'dod pa rnams kyi skyob pa'o// dpung gnyen med pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen no// gling 'dod pa rnams kyi gling du gyur pa'o// rten 'dod pa rnams kyi bla na med pa'i rten du gyur pa'o// srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol
13a4(rgyud): tu 'gro ba rnams kyi grur gyur pa'o// nad thams cad nges par 'a 'joms pa'i phyir sman pa'i rgyal po chen por gyur pa'o// blang ba rwa bya ba dang dor bar bya ba'i dngos po rnam par dbye ba'i phyir shes rab
13a5(rgyud): tu gyur pa'o// lta ba ngan pa'i mun pa'i smag rum thams cadabasal ba'i phyir ye shes kyi snang bar gyur pa'o// sems// can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang 'dod pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs
13a6(rgyud): su rdzogs pa'i phyir yid bzhin gyi nor bur gyur pa'o// 'jam dpal gyi ye shes kyi sku rab tu thob pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su gyur pa'o// spyan lnga rab tu thob pa'i phyir yong su dag pa'i
13a7(rgyud): ye shes gzigs par gyur pa'o// zang zing dang mi 'jigs pa dang chos kyi sbyin pa rab tu gtong ba nyid kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs par gyur pa'o// bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang / 
13a8(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin ni yongs su rdzogs pa nyid kyis sa bcu rab tu thob par gyur pa'o// gnyis kyi chos dang bral ba'i phyir gnyi su med pa'i chos nyid do// lhag par sgro 'dogs pa dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir de bzhin nyid
13b1(rgyud): kyi rang bzhin dang gzhan ma yin pa'i chos nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku yong su dag pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis yang dag pa'i rang bzhin nyid do// lta ba ngan pa'i chang chings
13b2(rgyud): lus pa nges par sel ba nyid kyis rnam pa thams cad chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin nyid do// mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni/ 'di ltar gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid kyi don dang ming
13b3(rgyud): yang dag par 'dzin pa rab tu gsal bar byed pa nyid kyis chos thams cad brjod du med par gyur pa'o// 'di ni 'khor lo gsu pa rjesu bsngags pa lnga bcu rtsa gnyis so// gzhan yang lag na rdo rje rdo rje
13b4(rgyud): 'chang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la sngags dkyi sgo'i spyod pa spyod pas/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes so/ mas dpa'i ye shes kyi sku/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
13b5(rgyud): cad kyi ye shes kyi sku gnyi su med pa don dam pa'i mtshan yang da/ ga par brjod pa gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba 'di mtha' dgayongasu rdzogs pa ma tshang ba med pa dum bu ma yin pa/ tshigs
13b6(rgyud): su bcad pa dang tshig dang yi ge 'di rnams nyid kyis/ nyi ma so sor dus gsum du 'dzin par byed pa dang brjod par byed pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang gzhan rnams la yang / 
13b7(rgyud): dus ji lta bar rgyas par ji lta ba bzhin rab tu gsal bar byed pa dang mtshan gyi don gzhan dang gzhan re re zhing yang 'jam dpal ye shes kyi sku mngon du byas te yid rtse gcig pas sgom par byed pa dang lhag par
13b8(rgyud): mos pa dang de kho na yid la byed pa dag gis kun nas sgo'i gnas pas gnas pa dang chos thams cad so sor rtogs pa dang mchog tu gyur pa dang rnyog pa med pa dang shes rab kyis rjes su 'bigs pa dang / 
14a1(rgyud): dad pas yang dag par bgrod pa de la ni dus gsum du dus med par sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par 'dus te yang dag par gshegs
14a2(rgyud): shing yang dag par byon nas chos thams cad kyi sgo rnams nye bar ston par 'gyur ro// bdag nyid sgom pa nye bar ston par byed do// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs
14a3(rgyud): kyis kyang lus dang ngag dang yid kyi rgyud la yang dag par byin gyis rlob par byed do// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rje su 'dzin pas kyang 'dzin par byed do// chos thams cad la mi
14a4(rgyud): 'jigs pa'i spobs pa yang nye bar sgrub par byed do// dgra bcodam pa dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'phag ngas pa'i chos la sdug pa'i bsam pa nyid kyis bdag gi dngos po
14a5(rgyud): yang nye bar ston par byed do// gdul dka' ba 'dul ba po rnam sa kyang khro bo'i rgyal po chen po dang rdo rje 'chang chen po la sog/ sa pa 'gro ba yongasu skyob par gyur pa gzugs sna tshogs pa'i
14a6(rgyud): sprul pa'i sku rnams kyis mdangs dang stobs dang gzi brjid zil gyis mi gnon pa nyid dang sngags dang phyag rgya dang mngon par rdzogs pa dang dkyil 'khor rnams nye bar ston par byed do// sngags dang rigs pa
14a7(rgyud): rgyal po ma lus pa dang bgegs dang logs 'dren dang bdud dang dgra phyir rgol ba dang gzhan gyi mi thub pa chen po thams cad kyang mtshan mo dang nyin mor bcas par skad cig so sor spyod pa thams cad dang lam
14a8(rgyud): rnams su yang srung ba dang skyob pa dang sbed par byed do// tshangs pa dang dbang po dang nye dbang dang drag po dang sred med kyi bu dang kun 'gyed gzhon nu dang dbang phyug chen po dang smon drug gi bu dang nag po chen
14b1(rgyud): po dang dga' byed dbang phyug dang gshin rje dang chu lha dang lus ngan dang 'phrog ma dang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten skyong ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang rtag par rgyun tu mtshan mo dang nyin mor
14b2(rgyud): bcas pa 'gro ba dang gnas pa dang nyal ba dang 'dug pa dang gnyid log pa dang gnyid sad pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa dang mnyam pa ma gzhag pa dang gcig pur gnas pa dang skye bo mang po'i
14b3(rgyud): nang du song ba dang ji srid grong dang grong khyor dang grong rdal dang ljongs dang yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang na gnas pa dang dbang po'i phur pa dang sgo khang dang lam srang dang bzhi mdo dang sum mdo dang grong kye
14b4(rgyud): gyi bar dang tshong khang gi nang du gnas pa dang ji srid khang stongad dang ri dang dgon pa dang chu klung dang dur khrod dang nags tshad tshang du nye bar son pa dang 'bags pa dang ma 'bags pa dang
14b5(rgyud): myos pa dang rab tu myos pa na rtag tu thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad du mchog tu srung ba dang bskyab pa dang / sbed pa byed par 'gyur ro// nyin mo dang mtshan mo
14b6(rgyud): mchog tu bde legs su byed par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gang lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang na mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams
14b7(rgyud): dang gzhan yang gang dag gza' dang rgyu skar dang ma mo dang tshogs kyi bdag po rnams dang gang yang ma mo bdun po rnams dang gang yang gnod sbyin mo dang srin mo dang sha za mo rnams te de rnams thams
14b8(rgyud): cad lhan cig 'thun par sde dang bcas pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis spyod lam dang lam rnams su yang mchog tu srung ba dang bskyab pa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang de'i
15a1(rgyud): lus la mdangs dang stobs rab tu 'jug par byed do// nad med pa dang stobs dang tshe 'phel ba yang nye bar sgrub par byed do// 'di ni 'khor lo bzhi
15a2(rgyud): pa'i rjes su bsngags pa bcu dgu pa'o// / gzhan yang lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang mtshan yang dag par brjod pa gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba 'di nyi ma so sor ma nyams/ 
15a3(rgyud): ba yang dag par blangs te mgrin par gnas pa lan gsum du kha ton du byed pa dang glegs bam du chud pa klog par byed pa dang rab tu 'don par byed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal
15a4(rgyud): ye shes sems dpa'i gzugs la dmigs te de'i gzugs kyis rje su sems par byed pa dang / yang de'i ga zugs kyi rje su bsam gtan byed pa de nyid sprul pa'i sku yis yun mi
15a5(rgyud): ring ba nyid las gdul bya'i dbang nye bar gzung nas mthong bar/ 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sem/ sa dpa' thams cad sna tshogs pa'i sprul pa'i gzugs kyi sku dang
15a6(rgyud): lhan cig gnas pa nam mkha'i mthil na bzhugs pa rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// sems dpa' chen po de'i skye ba ji ltar gyur kyang ngan 'gro dang ngan song du ltung ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung
15a7(rgyud): bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs ngan du skye bar mi 'gyur ro// yul mtha' 'khob kyi skye bor skye bar mi 'gyur ro// dbang po dman par mi 'gyur ro// dbang po ma tshang bar mi
15a8(rgyud): 'gyur ro// log par lta ba'i rigs su skye bar mi 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye bar mi 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang des bstan pa'i chos spong
15b1(rgyud): ba dang lkog tu gyur par mi 'gyur ro// lha tshe ring po rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro// mu ge dang nad dang mtshon gyi bskal pa rnams la skye bar mi 'gyur ro// snyigs ma lnga'i dus rnams la skye bar mi 'gyur ro// 
15b2(rgyud): rgyal po dang chom rkun dang dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rgud pa dang dbul ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// mi bsngags pa dang skur pa 'debs pa dang smod pa dang mi snyan pa dang grags
15b3(rgyud): pa ngan pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// skye ba bzang po dang rigs dang rus phun sum tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// kun nas mdzes par gyur pa dang gzugs dang kha dog yang dag par ldan par
15b4(rgyud): 'gyuraro// 'jig rten pa rnams kyi sdug pa dang yid la 'bab pa dang / 'grogs na mchog tu bde ba dang mthong na dga' bar 'gyuraro// / 'jig rten pa rnams kyi mdzes pa dang skal ba bzang po dang ldan pa
15b5(rgyud): dang tshig gzung bar bya bar 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du skye bar/ 'gyur ba de dang der skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// longs spyod che ba dang 'khor mang ba dang longs spyod mi zad pa dang 'khor mi
15b6(rgyud): zad par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa'i smon lam dang ye shes dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyuraro// rang bzhin gyis kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi yon tan dang yang dag par
15b7(rgyud): ldan par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la gnas par 'gyur ro// dran pa dang shes bzhin dang thabs dang stobs dang smon lam dang ye shes dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro// bstan bcos
15b8(rgyud): thams cad la 'jigs pa med pa dang smra mkhas par yang 'gyuraro// tshig gsal ba dang blun po ma yin pa dang blo gsal bar 'gyur ro// mkhas pa dang le lo med pa dang chog shes pa dang don che ba dang
16a1(rgyud): sred pa med par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu yid brtan par bya ba dang slob dpon dang bla ma bkur bar bya bar 'gyur ro// de'i sngon ma thos pa'i bzo
16a2(rgyud): dang rtsis dang shes pa dang bstan bcos thams cad kyang don dang gzhung las rab tu gsal ba yang dag par rtogs par 'gyur ro// shin tu yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims dang 'tshe ba dang kun
16a3(rgyud): tu spyod pa spyod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// legs par rab tu 'byung ba dang legs par bsnyen par rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid byang chub kyi sems rab tu brjed pa med par
16a4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// nyan thos dang dgra bcom pa dang rang sangs rgyas dkyi nges pa dang bgrod pa la gnas par nam yang mi 'gyur ro// 'di ni 'khor lo lnga pa'i rjes su bsngags pa
16a5(rgyud): lnga bcu rtsa gcig go// lag na rdo 'chang de ltar yon tan dpag tu med pa dang yang dag/ bar ldan par 'gyur ro// rnam pa de lta bu'i yon tan dpa/ 
16a6(rgyud): tu med pa gzhan rnams dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di yang dag par 'dzin pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni ring po ma
16a7(rgyud): thogs par bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs legs par bsags te shin tu myur bar sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams yang dag par bsgrubs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
16a8(rgyud): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// bskal pa mang por yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i chos kyis sems can thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i chos ston pa po
16b1(rgyud): dang phyogs bcur chos kyi rnga bo che lhag par gnas pa'i chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro// 'di ni 'khor lo drug pa'i bsngags pa dpag tu med pa'o// // oM sarba d+harmA b+hA ba swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha badz+ra/ 
16b2(rgyud): tsak+ShaHa AHaM AHpa kr-i ti/ pa ri shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHya du ta/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ dz+nyA na kA ya/ many+dzu shrI/ pa ri shud+d+hi tA/ mu pa dA ye ti/ a A/ sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM hriHb+ha ga ban/ 
16b3(rgyud): dz+nyA na murti/ wA gI shwa ra/ ma hA bA tsa/ sarba d+harmA ga ga nA ma la suM pa ri shud+d+ha/ d+har+m+ma d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha a~M/ de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // dga' zhing mgu nas thal mo sbyar// mgon
16b4(rgyud): po bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas// rnam mang mgon po gzhan rnams dang // gsang dbang lag na rdo rje de// khro bo'i rgyal po
16b5(rgyud): bcas rnams kyis// gsang bstod nas ni tshig 'di ga so// la// mgon po bdag cag rjes yi rang // legs so// legs so lags par gsungs// bdag cag yang dag
16b6(rgyud): rdzogs pa yi// byang chub thob pa'i don chen mdzad// 'gro ba me gon med rnams dang ni// rnam grol 'bras bu 'tshal ba yi// rnam dag legs pa'i lam 'di ni// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshul
16b7(rgyud): bstan pa// zab cing yangs la rgya che ba// don chen 'gro ba'i don byed pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul 'di ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad// rnal 'byor chen po'i
16b8(rgyud): rgyud sgyu 'phrul dra ba stong phrag bcu drug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dra ba'i le'u las byung ba/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhi
17a1(rgyud): gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gsungs pa rdzogs so// thun mongs dang thun mongs ma yin pa'i gsung rab thams cad la dbang 'byor pa'i bdag nyid chen po bla
17a2(rgyud): mngam pa chos kyi rgyal po'i bka' drin gyis nye bar bsnyungs pa sgra bsgyur gyi lo ts+tsha ba blo gros brtan pas/ bsam gtan gling gi dben gnas su bsgyur zhing dag par byas pa'o// sngon gyis
17a3(rgyud): bsgyur chen po de dag gis// rgyud 'di bsgyur zhing kun la grags lags mod// 'on kyang sgra don gtsug lag ji bzhin du// rgyud 'di blo brtan gnyis pas legs par bsgyur/ 
17a4(rgyud): / rgya gar skad du/ mA yA dz+wa la hA tan+t+ra rA dzA nA ma/ bod skad du/ rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos
17a5(rgyud): pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das gnas gtsang ma'i steng na/ khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che'i gzhal med khang chen po ba kod pa/ rdo rje'i ka bas rgyan pa/ shin tu mdzes pa'i rin po che
17a6(rgyud): bkod pas rnam par bkra ba/ rdo rje dril bu 'khrol ba// yid las byung ba'i mchod pa'i khyad par chen pos rgyan pa/ rdo rje'i 'khor los spras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i cha byad sna tshogs 'chang ba
17a7(rgyud): rnams kyi don gyi bya ba byas pa/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po las yang dag par 'byung ba'i spyod pa bskyod nas/ zhal bzhi'i go'i go skabs nas byung ba sna tshogs dang / rdo rje dang / rin po che chen po dang / 'od dpag
17a8(rgyud): med dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs dang / rigs sngags kyi lha mo rnams kyis rgyan pa/ khro bo'i rgyal po dang / bran dang / bran mo dang / pho nya dang / pho nya mo dang / phyag brnyan dang / phyag
17b1(rgyud): brnyan mo du ma'i 'khor gyis skor cing 'dun gyi bsdus pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi bde ba de'i bdag nyid dang / dmigs pa dang bral ba/ thugs rje chen pos mnyes gshin pa/ sems can thams cad
17b2(rgyud): bsgral ba la brtson par mdzad pa/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pa mang pos rgyan pa/ 
17b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs so// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi khyams kyi dbus na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo
17b4(rgyud): rje 'dug pa la gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'dzum pa mdzad ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag/ na rdo rje bla gos phrag pa cig tu gzar nas 'gying bag can du
17b5(rgyud): bltas nas rdo rje gsor te/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la ba/ tsugs te thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dgos
17b6(rgyud): pa ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa gang gi slad du gzigs pa dang 'dzum pa mdzad/ de des na bdag dang 'khor rnams ngo mtshar du gyur pa lags na/ de'i slad du bcom
17b7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis seng ge chen po'i sgra dbyangs kyis bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de skad du gsol ba btab ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud kyi
17b8(rgyud): rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba ye shes rnam par bsgyings pa rgyud thams cad kyi chos kyi thabs bde ba rdo rje'i ye shes sgrub pa rol pas mnyes par bya ba'i thabs de kho na nyid thams cad kyi 'byung gnas stang
18a1(rgyud): stabs kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i thabs dang shes rab bde ba chen po'i rdo rjes sgrol pha rol pas bzhad cing bsgyings pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 
18a2(rgyud): sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud kyi dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor dang / ri mo'i gzugs dang / sgom pa dang / bzlas brjod dang / stang stabs dang / sbyor ba dgod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / dbab pa dang / bskrad pa dang / 
18a3(rgyud): dbrog pa dang / dgug pa dang / bcing ba dang / brdeg pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / nyam thag par bya ba dang / bcad pa dang / sreg pa dang / bskang ba dang / bskrun pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / sbyin pa dang / slob dpon
18a4(rgyud): dang / slob ma bzung ba dang / gsang sngags mang po'i 'jo tshul rnams ngas bshad par bya'o// de'i phyir khyod kyis kyang ting nge 'dzin mchog la snyoms par zhugs la nyon cig/ de nas de bzhin
18a5(rgyud): gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'// thams cad dang / gzhan yang gang dag 'khor du 'dus pa de/ dag thams cad kyis chos kyi 'phel ba'i gtam mnyan par// 
18a6(rgyud): brtsams so// de la re shig dang po dngos grub ni slob dpon chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin pas/ slob dpon med par gyur na ni/ dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur bas// slob dpon mtshan nyid bshad par bya
18a7(rgyud): ye shes snying po khyod nyon cig/ brtan zhing dul la blo gros ldan// bzod ldan drang zhing g.yo sgyu med// gsang sngags rgyud kyi sbyor shes pas// dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las bya'o// de nyid bcu ni yongs shes shing
18a8(rgyud): sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin// theg pa chen la rtag dga' ba// de ni slob dpon yin par gsungs// phyi rol bstan bcos yongs shes shing // nyan thos rnams kyi lam 'gro dang // gsang ba de nyid bsdu
18b1(rgyud): ba dang / theg pa chen po mi shes pa// snying rje yod pa ma yin dang // dad med brtson 'grus mi ldan la// rtag tu ngan pa'i tshul spyod dang / bstan bcos rnams la smod pa min// gong du bstan pa'i mtshan nyid dang / 
18b2(rgyud): ldan na slob dpon yin par gzung // de yis dkyil 'khor bri ba dang / de nyid kyis ni rgyud rnams brtan// de yis bstan pa'i gsang sngags dag/ 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// dge dang sdom la dag
18b3(rgyud): ba dang / rtag tu bla ma la gus dang // rgyun tu lha rnams mchod byed pa'i// yon tan ldan na slob ma yin// slob dpon ci 'dra blta zhes na// bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// de nyid rtag tu rdo rje 'chang // de bzhin
18b4(rgyud): gshegs pa rin chen rtog/ de ni ye shes rgya mtsho che// yid pa bzhin nor bu rin chen bzhin// slob dpon gyi ni yon tan gzung // skyon rnams nams kyang ma yin no// yon tan bzung bas dngos
18b5(rgyud): grub cing // skyon rnams kyis ni dngos grub nyams// de yi grib ma'ang mi 'gom ste// mchod rten pa shig dang 'dra bar gsu ngas// rgyu dang mi rgyu gsang ba yi// dam pa gang yin spangs par
18b6(rgyud): 'gyur// slob dpon smod par byed pa dag/ rmi lam du yang mthong mi bya// slob dpon smod pa gang yin te// bgegs dang log 'dren rnams kyis bzung // ngan pa btum po las byed pa// mkhas pas rtag
18b7(rgyud): tu spang bar bya// mnar med shin tu skyi g.ya' ba'i// dmyal ba bstan pa gang yin pa// der ni slob dpon smod byed pa// gnas par 'gyur zhes rab tu gsungs// de phyir kun gyis rab bsgrims te// 
18b8(rgyud): bsam yas 'bras bu smin byed pa'i// sang+yas 'bras bu 'dod byed pa'i// sems can dad pa ldan pas mchod// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las// 'di ni 'jug pa rim par phye ba'i le'u
19a1(rgyud): skye par/ denas ma ldan 'as rnam par sna mad chen pa yang bzhin gshegs pas thams ca dang ldan pa'i 'a' kya kyil 'kho la gachags nas/ 
19a2(rgyud): sgyu 'phrul dang chen po ye shes bsgyings pa gsang ba'i byin rlabs kyi mchog rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs nas kyang rdo rje 'chang la bka' stsal pa/ phywaH
19a3(rgyud): ni rdo rje rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi phyi ma'i yang phyi ma ye shes chen po'i snying po 'bar ba rdo rje snying kur byed pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil
19a4(rgyud): 'khor 'di dbang bskur na dkyil 'khor thams cad du dbang bskur bar 'gyur bas phyag na rdo rje sems can gang la las tshon rtsi mthong ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
19a5(rgyud): la phyag byas pa dang mchod pa byas par 'gyur ba la yang dang / pir zhugs pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangasas kyi ning du sangs rgyas nyid kyi grangs su 'gro bar 'gyur ba de
19a6(rgyud): nyon cig/ dang po kho nas yongs su bzung ba byas te/ slob dpon gyis lha nyid kyi stang stabs su 'dug la/ lag pa g.yas bsgrims te rdo rje gsor zhing / lag pa g.yon pas ni ba gsil nas rdo rje
19a7(rgyud): 'gros kyis yongs su bskor bar bya'o// rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa khro bo'i nga rgyal gyis hUM zhes brjod cing dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi brjid pa gang gis bskor nas kyang khro bo'i skur
19a8(rgyud): bsgoms nas sdang ba'i lha dang / lha ma yin dang / gsang ba pa rnams la tshig 'di rab tu brjod par bya'o// slob dpon ming 'di zhes bya bas slob ma che ge mo zhig rdzogs pa'i byang chub rdzogs par
19b1(rgyud): bya ba dang / sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sa phyogs 'dir dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po ming 'di zhes bya ba bri yis/ lha dang lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang srin po dang / 
19b2(rgyud): yi dgas dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / 'byung po dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / gnon po dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / rig sngags grub pa dang / rgan po'am/ rgam mo g.yog dang / 'khor du
19b3(rgyud): bcas pa gang dag 'khod pa rnams dengs shig/ 'di ltar rdo rje 'chang gi bka' thos nas myur ba nyid du dengs shig/ gang dag mi 'gro ba de dag ni phyag na rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba rab tu khros pa'i bzhin 'bar ba tsam
19b4(rgyud): gyi ye shes kyi rdo rje 'bar ba kun tu 'bar bas mgo tshal pa brgya dar 'gas par 'gyur ro// zhes lan gsum brjod nas/ sta dang stabs la gnas bzhin du sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis
19b5(rgyud): brlab par bya'o// g.yas brkyang ba dang / g.yon brkyang ba dang / sa ga'i 'dug stangs dang / zlum po'i 'dug stangs dang / 'thun pa'i rkang stabs dang / rus sbal gyi rkang stabs dang / rdo rje
19b6(rgyud): gdeg pa dang / rdo rje 'jo tshul dang / rkang pa ya cig gi stangs dang / seng ge stabs dang / seng ge skal pa dang / bum pa'i 'phur ba'i stabs dang / rdo rje sgrog dang / rdo rje gsor ba dang / rdo rje'i stang stabs dang / 
19b7(rgyud): rdo rje dgug pa dang / rdo rje gar dang / rdo rje 'jigs su rung ba dang / rdo rje ro langs ma dang / rdo rje tho ba dang / rdo rje'i byin rlabs dang / rdo rje'i gdu bu dang / bud med kyi sgyu 'phrul stang stabs dang / rdo rje'i dra ba dang / stobs
19b8(rgyud): po che'i 'degs pa dang / rdo rje mche ba dang / rdo rje gad mo dang / rdo rje sgra dang / ral gri thabs dang / rdo rje'i thabs dang / 'khor lo'i thabs dang / btun shing gi thibs dang / bdan gyi thabs dang / zhags pa'i
20a1(rgyud): thabs dang / pad+ma'i tshul dang / be con gyi thabs dang / mi 'jigs pa'i tshul dang / lcags kyu'i thabs dang / 'bras bu'i tshul dang / mdung thung gi thabs dang / gzhu'i thabs dang / 
20a2(rgyud): mda' bzung ba'i thabs dang / mda' 'phangs pa'i thabs dang / thag mdung bskor ba'i thabs dang / mchog sbyin pa'i tshul dang / mdung gi thabs dang / mtshon rtse cig pa'i thabs dang / phyag 'tshal ba'i tshu
20a3(rgyud): dang / rdo rje 'dug stangs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi 'dug stangs dang / rdo rje skyil mo krung dang / pad+ma'i 'dug stangs dang / sems dpa'i skyil mo krung dang / dpa' mo'i 'dug stangs dang / bzang po'i 'dug stangs dang / 
20a4(rgyud): tsocog pu'i 'dug stangs dang / rtse ba'i 'dug stangs dang / mdun du dgu pa dang / phyir dgye ba dang / mtha' yas dang / rnam par rgyal ba dang / sprin sgra dang / gsus po che dang / rgyal ba'i phur bus gnas
20a5(rgyud): pa'i bcing ba dang / phur bu brdung ba dang / dra ba dang ra bas mtsham/ sa bcad pa dang / phyogs bcing ba de lta bus sa gzhi rdo rje/ 'i rang bzhin 'od 'bar bas 'khrigs par bsgoms te gtan
20a6(rgyud): la dbab par bya'o// rang gi ming nas smos te/ hUM zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyi sgra brjod na 'khor lo thams cad kyi bla na med par 'gyur ro// de nas sa'i lha mo sta gon du gnas par bya ba ni/ skyob pa sangs
20a7(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par dang // sa dang pha rol phyin pa la// lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur// dngos grub thams cad thob bya'i phyir// bdag gis dkyil 'khor bri bar bya zhes lan gsum
20a8(rgyud): brjod do// de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sta gon du gnas par bya ste thugs brtser gnas pa'i dgongs pa can// sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol// sras dang lhan cig gshegs
20b1(rgyud): nas kyang // sa gzhi yongs su gzung bar mdzod// de nas 'khor lo'i dbus su chos kyi dkyil 'khor byas la// mtha' kun tu yang mtshan nas smos te thig ler bya'o// de ltar spyan drangs te mchod pas mnyes par/ 
20b2(rgyud): byas nas phyir byung ste phyogs kyi gtor ma sbyin no// de nas sems can sa gon tu gnas par bya ste spos chus spyi bor bsang gtor byas nas/ lag pa snying kar bkram nas su// rtse mo lnga pa rgya gram bya// g.yas
20b3(rgyud): bsrung spyad bcings nas su// lag mthil so shing kung ba sbyin// de nas 'dug ste gsum la skyabs su btang ba dang / sdig pa kun tu bshags pa dang / bsod nams kyis rjes su se rang ba dang / bdag nyi
20b4(rgyud): dbul pa dang / byang chub tu ni sems bskyed par bya'o// de la'ang ni skyabs su 'gro ba yin te// dkon mchog gsum la sgrub ngas su mchi// sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi// 'gro/ 
20b5(rgyud): ba'i dgel yi rang ste// sangs rgyas byang chub yod kyis gzung // zhes lan gsum brjod do// de nas ci nus kyis ci 'dzi pa'i chos bshad par bya'o// de nas sngar bshad pa bzhin du
20b6(rgyud): mnyes par 'gyur ba'i mchod pa'i cho ga bzang po bya ste/ slar yang gshegs su gsol bar bya'o// de nas nang dkrugs la dkyil 'khor gyis gzhir glo g.yas pas nyal te/ rmi lam pa rang ngan bak+Sha sa
20b7(rgyud): nas phyid shi nga kyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// tshon dang rdeg la sangs rgyas lnga'i// de bdagakyang stsal ba dag// 'don chos dbyings dag pa ste// sems can rnams na rnam grol mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa
20b8(rgyud): gyi gnas/ rnam par snang mdzad rgyal bdag ste// nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs pa'i// tshon rtsi dkyo ba brtsam par bya// dang por slob dpon nyid kyis gyi// de nas kun tu slob mas bya// dang pos gzhi / 
21a1(rgyud): gdung ba/ gnyis pasta gon gnas paste// nub gsum pa ni 'jug pa yin// tshon sna lnga pa'i srang bu zhes// khru stong pa'am lnga brgya bar// dkyil 'khor dam pa thig gdab go// yang ma thu3
21a2(rgyud): dopa'am// khru gang ba yi bar du bya'o// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni rgyan pa yi// dbus su 'khor lo legs par bri// dkyil du rnam par snang mdzad bzhag/ shar phyog su ni mi 'khrugs pa// 
21a3(rgyud): lho phyogasu ni rin chen 'byung // nub phyogs su ni 'od dpag med// byang phyogasu ni don grub rnams// 'khor lo grar ni lha mo bzhi// dngos grub sbyin par mdzad par bri// dbang bdag gi phyogasu ni spyan no// me'i
21a4(rgyud): phyogs su ni mA ma ki'o// bden bral phyogasu ni gos dkar can no// rlung gi phyogasu ni lha mo sgrol ma'o// rdo rje shugs kyis phyir byung nas rim pa gnyis pa la shar phyogs su ni rdo rje sems ma
21a5(rgyud): lhor rdo rje rin chen ma/ nub tu rdo rje chos ma/ byang du rdo rje las ma rnam sa bri'o// grwa rnams su skul byed ma dang / rin chen sgrol ma dang khro gnyer can dang / rdo rje lugu rgyud rnam so// de nas yang 'gying
21a6(rgyud): bag tu langs te/ rdo rje shugs kyis phyir phyung nas rim pa gsum pa la/ shar phyogasu byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / 'jam dpal dang / spos kyi glang po dang / ye shes tog rnams bri'o// lho
21a7(rgyud): phyogasu bzang skyong dang / blo gros rgya mtsho dang / blo gros mi zad pa dang / spobs pa brtsegs pa rnams bri'o// nub phyogs ni mthu chen thob dang / ngan song thams cad spong ba dang / mya ngan gyi mun pa thams
21a8(rgyud): cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros dang / dra ba can gyi 'od rnams bri'o// byang phyogs su zla 'od dang / 'od dpag med dang / na mkha' mdzod dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba rnams bri'o// 
21b1(rgyud): shar sgor ni gshin rje mthar byed do// ma ma ga la las mye du ba rnam mas sa byang sgor ni bgegs kyi gshed mthar byed do// grwa rnams su ni mi g.yo ba dang / 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang / be con sngon po dang / stobs/ 
21b2(rgyud): bo che'o// zur rnamasu ni rdo rje bri'o// sgo'i nang logs su yang rdo rje bri'o// 'khor lo na tshon rtsi dkar pos dri'o// gnyis pa ni tshon rtsi dkar po dang / ser po dang / sngon po gsum gyis bri'o// gsum
21b3(rgyud): pa ni sna lngas bri bar bya ste/ de lta bu ni dkyil 'khor chen po yin no// de nas dbang bskur ba'i don du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa/ sgo bzhi dang ldan pa rim pa gnyis par bya'o// dbus su ni pad+ma brgyad pa
21b4(rgyud): snying po dang bcas pa bri'o// snam bu gnyis pa la shar phyogs su ni rdo rje'o// lho phyogasu ni rin po che/ nub phyogs su ni pad+ma/ byang phyogasu ni ral gri ste/ de lta bur dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// 
21b5(rgyud): de nas slob dpon gyi lus legs par bkrus te/ spos kyis bsku sa nas legs par brgyus pa'i me tog gi phreng ba mgo la/ bcings nas mgul pa dar gyis bcings pa la// ldum bu yis
21b6(rgyud): ni kha bkab pa// rin chen sman 'byung sna lnga dang // spos chu yis ni bkang ba dang // bum pa mngon par bsngags par bya// rnam rgyal bum pa dkyil 'khor gyi// bdag po lha mo rnams kyi bzhi// lha
21b7(rgyud): rnams kun gyi bum pa bzhi// las kun byed pas bzlas brjod do// sems can kun gyis bsang gtor bya// yang na ku sha'i chun pos bya// de nas bum pa mngon par bsngags te lha ba shos dang gtor ma
21b8(rgyud): phul nas me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang phreng ba dang / mchod yon dang / zhabs bkru ba la sogs pa dbul lo// de rnams phul nas bum pa rnams glar bzhag par bya'o// rnam par rgyal ba'i bum
22a1(rgyud): pa ni dbus su spyan drangs par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams spyan drangs nas gsal bar bya ste/ gzhug pa dang / bsdams pa dang / 
22a2(rgyud): dbang du bya ste/ phur bu dang / ra ba dang / dra bas phyogs bcing ba dang / mtshams bcad pa byas la/ mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil dang / gdan dang / me tog dang / bdug pa la sogs pa yang bsngos te/ 
22a3(rgyud): phul nas phyag rgya'i tshogs rang rang la bstan par bya'o// bstod pa dang / rdo rje'i klu dang / dril bu bsil ba'i sgra dang / sil snyan dang / gling bu dang / rgyud kyi sgra'i khyad par yang dbul lo// rol mo'i khyad par
22a4(rgyud): gzhan rnams kyis kyang bstod par bya'o// bstod nas bzod par gsol te dngos grub thams cad kyi phyir gsol ba gdab bo// de nas slob dpon bdag nyid zhugs te/ de'i 'og tu slob ma
22a5(rgyud): bzhu'o// de nas sems can thams cad snying po 'di dang phyag rgyas pa/ nas lngar srung zhing gnas lngar cho ga bya'o// hUM oM dzin dzi/ oM A ro li ka/ hU badz+ra d+h+r-i// sA rat+na d+h+r-ika/ hA pradz+nyA d+h+r-i// de nas
22a6(rgyud): tshig su bcad pa 'dis gzhug par bya ste/ rdo rje ye shes thob byed pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// pho brang dkyil 'khor snying po 'dir// bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bya// rdo rje sems mas
22a7(rgyud): tog gtor bar bgyi ste/ pra tIts+tsha badz+ra ho/ tshigs su bcad pa 'dis gdong g.yogs 'grel lo// di ring dad pa'i shugs kyis ni// dkyil 'khor deng 'dir blta bar gyis// sangs rgyas gdung gi rigs su
22a8(rgyud): 'khrungs// sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs// dngos grub thams cad phun sum tshogs// dam tshig mchog tu grub par byed// rdo rje pad+ma rol pa'i mchog/ sngags kyi bdag nyid shes par bya/ 
22b1(rgyud): de yi snying po 'di yin te/ pa sh+ya badz+ra/ gang la me tog bab pa de de'i lha yin no// de nas dbang bskur sbyin bya ste// dri dang me tog phreng bas rgyan// gos dang rgyan gyis legs par brgyan// steng du bla re bre bar bya// gdug/ 
22b2(rgyud): dang rgyal mtshal ba dan dang // lha dang tshangs pa'i skud pa dang // gdu bu dag dang ska rags dang // bkra shis yo byad rnams kyis klubs// slob ma sdig dang bral ba la// slob dpon gyis ni dbang bskur ro// dang por
22b3(rgyud): rnam rgyal bum pa yis// de nas lha mo bzhi rnams dang // lha rnams kun gyi bzhi po yis// bkra shis tshigs bcad klu sgra dang // rdo rje dril bu gsil ba yis// skyob pa kun gyis mngon sum du// til gyi gang bu/ 
22b4(rgyud): bzhin gang ba'i// rgyal ba bum pa bzung nas ni// de nyid la ni dbang bskur bya// dkyil 'khor de nyid rig par bsam// de lta bur da ni bsams nas kyang // chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya// thur
22b5(rgyud): ma me long 'khor lo dang // dung dang rdo rje glegs bam dang // gser ngag dang ni dngul rnams kyis// mi shes rab rib la sogs pa// ci nus par ni bsal bar bya// thur ma la sogs med na yang
22b6(rgyud): phyag rgya'i gzugs rnams bstan par bya// de nas dam tshig bstan par bya// de ring phyin chad bu khyod kyis// srog dang lus la bab gyur kyang // dam pa'i chos dang byang chub sems// slob dpon la ni brnyas mi bya/ 
22b7(rgyud): rdo rje spun rnams bkur sti zhing // sdang la byams shing chags bral ba// nams kyang bya ba ma yin no// de ltar byas na sangs rgyas kyis// khyod ni dmyal ba'i nang du 'dor// de nas bla mas yon blangs te// sa dang yid
22b8(rgyud): 'ong chung ma dang // rin chen gser dang nor bu 'bar// mu tig byi ru la sogs dang // lus kyang dbul du bzhug par bya// bla ma la ni gus pa yi// slob mas de bzhin kho nar bya// bla ma de ni mgu bar bya// bla ma mgu
23a1(rgyud): pa dngos grub kyi// gzhan du min zhes thub pa gsung // de nas slob ma bslang ste// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyan sngar mchod pa bya ste sbyin bsreg gi las bya'o// de nas cho ga mthong bas/ 
23a2(rgyud): las byas nas// sbyin sreg bzlas brjod mchod pa dang // de bzhin sgom pa'i rim pa'i tshul// zhi dang rgyas pa'i rim pa yis// las rnams thams cad tshim par bya// de nas dus gsum gshegs pa yi// 
23a3(rgyud): rgyal ba thams cad gshegs su gsol// bsgrims te tshon rtsi rnams bsdus nas// chu klung chen por bskur nas kyang // ba yi lci bas byug par bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni yo byad kun// slob dpon nyid
23a4(rgyud): kyis bskur bar bya// slob mas cung zad mi bskur te// de ni dam/ tshig nyams par 'gyur// slob dpon gyis kyang ci rigs dpar// bdag nyid 'dod pa spyad par bya// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu
23a5(rgyud): 'phrul dra ba las 'di ni dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba'i le'u ste ga/ nyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam bar snang mdzad rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas yang gsang sngags
23a6(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo la 'jug pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs nas phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje gsang sngags kyi snying po'i yi ge rnams nyon cig
23a7(rgyud): phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol/ oM las rnam par snang mdzad do// oM
23a8(rgyud): hU~M mi 'khrugs pa'i'o// oM tA rin chen 'byung gnas so// oM hrI/ 'od dpag med do// oM kha don yod grub pa'i'o// oM ga gan lo tsa ne hUM/ spyan gyi'o// oM kai ri ki ri/ mA ma ki hU mA ma ka'i'o// oM ka Te bi ka
23b1(rgyud): ka Ta ka Ta ka roT bIr+ya swA hA/ gos dkar mo'a'o// oM tIre tut+te tu re swA hA/ sgrol ma'i'o// oM satwa badz+ri hU~M/ rdo rje sems ma'i'o// oM rat+na badz+rid+ha/ rdo rje rin ma'i'o// oM d+harma badz+ri hUM/ rdo rje chos ma'i 'o// oM
23b2(rgyud): badz+ri hUM/ rdo rje las ma'i'o// oM tsa le tsu le tsun de swA hA/ skul byed ma'i'o// oM rat+na lo ki rat+na dz+wa li na~M swA hA/ rin chen sgrol ma'i'o// oM b+h+r-i ku TaM b+h+rUM/ khro gnyer ma'o// oM badz+ra shriM kha le hUM phaT swA hA/ rdo rje
23b3(rgyud): lu gu rgyud ma'i'o// oM maM/ byams pa'i'o// oM mu/ 'jam dpal gyi'o// oM sa man+ta b+ha dra hUM/ kun tu bzang po'i'o// oM gan+d+ha \u0f7fsti ni hUM/ spos kyi glang po'i 'o// oM dz+nyA na ke tu da hUM/ ye shes tog go// oM b+ha dra
23b4(rgyud): ba ti b+ha dra pA le hUM/ bzang skyong ngo // oM sA ga re ma hA sA ga re hUM/ zlo gros rgya mtsho'o// oM ak+Sha ya hUM hUM/ ak+Sha yak+Sha a karma A byA ra Na pa ri sho d+ha na sA hA/ blo gros mi zad pa'o// oM pra ti b+hA ne pra ti b+hA
23b5(rgyud): na ku Te hUM/ spobs pa brtsegs pa'o// oM s+thA me ma hA s+thA mu ba ti/ swA hA/ mthu chen thob pa'o// oM sarba a pA ya dza te sarba pA/ paM sho d+ha hUM/ ngan song thams cad spong ba'o// oM sarba sho ka ta mo nan+tha
23b6(rgyud): ma ti hUM/ mya ngan thams cad kyi mun pa nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros so// oM dz+wa li ni ma hA dz+wa la ni hUM/ dra ba can gyi 'od ngo // oM su d+ha na shre ye hUM/ nor bzangs so// oM tsan dre tsan+de tsan+d+ra bya ba lo ki te swA hA/ zla 'od // 
23b7(rgyud): / oM a mr-i ta pra b+he a mr-i te hUM/ 'od dpag med do// oM ga ga ne ga ga na bar lo tsa na hUM/ na mkha' mdzod do// oM sarba ni ba ra Na biSh+paM b+hi ne hUM/ sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'o// oM ya mAn+ta kr-ita/ gshin rje bshed do// oM
23b8(rgyud): pradz+nyAn+ta krita/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o// oM pad mAn+ta krita/ rta mgrin no// oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da la~M big+h+nAn+ta krita/ bdud rtsi thab sbyor ro// oM a tsa la hUM haM/ mi g.yo ba'o// oM Tak+ki hUM/ 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i// oM nI la daH
24a1(rgyud): ma hA ShA dz+dza/ be can sngon po'o// oM kro d+ha hUM dzaH/ stobs po che'i dkyil 'khor du dgod pa'i gsang sngags kyi yi ge de dag go// 'di dag la brten nas ting 'dzin gyi khyad par las nges par 'byung / 
24a2(rgyud): ba'i gsang sngags bye ba phrag du ma gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa thams cad ni lcags kyus spyan drang ngo // byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rdo rje'i phyag rgyas so// rigs pa'i lha mo
24a3(rgyud): rnams kyi ni rigs kyi yum rnams kyis so// khro bo rnams kyi ni zhal gyi phyag rgyas so// bran rnams ni zhags pa'i phyag rgyas so// pho nya rnams ni lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas so// de dag la sogs pa ni spyan
24a4(rgyud): drang ba'i sbyor ba'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'di ni gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par mdzad chen po rdo rje'i
24a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes chen po'i stobs kyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhu/ gas nas phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka'i stsal to// phyag na
24a6(rgyud): rdo rje ras sam cig pa la sogs pa la gzugs brnyan sgrub pa dmigs pa gang gis gsang sngags 'chang rnams kyis ye shes rdzogs par 'gyur zhing ye shes rdzogs pas sangs rgyas nyid bde blag tu
24a7(rgyud): thob par 'gyur na dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshogs thams cad kyi ting 'dzin gsang chen bla na med pa bshad par bya yis nyon cig/ oM gyi ye shes kyis bsgrubs pa// rgyal
24a8(rgyud): chen rnam par snang mdzad ni// shes rab ye shes rab rgyas pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi mchog gis mchod// zhi ba thor tshugs cod pan 'chang // zhal gsum gyis ni rnam par brgyan// gser gyi mdog can
24b1(rgyud): phyag drug pa// dang po bsam gtan phyag rgya can// bgrang phreng ldan zhing mda' yis rgyan// g.yon gyis lha mo'i nu ma 'dzin// 'khor lo dang ni gzhu thogs shing // lha rnams bred cing khams rnams
24b2(rgyud): 'dzag/ 'bar ba'i 'od dkyil rgyan pa la// sangs rgyas kun gyi sprin 'phro ba// rab tu byung zhing legs 'khyud pa// de nyid spyod yul can bsgoms te/ gsang sngags nang gis bzlas brjod bya// ting nge
24b3(rgyud): 'dzin thams cad kyi stobs rdzogs par byed pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// oM zhes bya ba'i tshigs gi lam// 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od chen bsam// thor tshugs cod pan 'chang ba'i lha/ 
24b4(rgyud): dbu rgyan thams cad mkhyen pas brgyan// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste// gtso bo zla ba'i gzugs dang 'dra// zha wa gsum spyan gsum 'bar ba la// phyag drug 'dug stangs
24b5(rgyud): bzhi pa can// phyag gnyis pad+ma'i 'jo tshul can// g.yas na/ bgrang phreng rdo rje 'chang // g.yon pas nu ma 'dzin pa la// ril ba spyi blugs gsum pa na// gzugs rnams thams
24b6(rgyud): cad 'phro mdzad cing // kun nas 'od zer phreng ba can// lag nas mtshon shor 'jigs 'khrugs pa'i// bgegs 'gyel ba la lta byed pa'i// de 'dra'i tshig gis lam bsgoms na// ring po mi thogs
24b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'thob// rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog yangs pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// zla ba'i gzugs la hUM zhes bya// sems kyi rdo rje bsgoms par bya// mthing shing
24b8(rgyud): bzang po lta bu'i mdog/ rgyan rnams kun gyis rab klubs pa// cod pan la ni mi 'khrugs bzhugs// rin chen rnams kyis yongs su rgyan// zhal ras gsum ldan spyan gsum pa// cung zad bzhad cing 'jo sgeg
25a1(rgyud): can// phyag brgyad kyis ni brgyan pa la// rdo rje dang por gsor ba dang // gnyis pa na ni ral gri gdengs// lcags kyu bzang po gsum pa na// bzhi pa yis ni mda' yang gsor// de bzhin
25a2(rgyud): g.yon na dril bu bsnams// de bzhin gnyis pas nu ma 'khyud// gsum pa ni ni zhags pa ste// bzhi pa lha rdzas gzhu yang 'dzin// rol pa'i stabasu legs par bzhugs// de bzhin sangs rgyas sprin gyis
25a3(rgyud): 'bar// 'di 'dra gang zhig rtag sgom pa// de yi rdo rje sems bstan zhing // ring por mi thogs byang chub thob// rga shi rnams kyi pha rol 'gro/ sems can gyi stobs mtha' yas pa rdzogs par byed pa'i ting nge
25a4(rgyud): 'dzin gyi rgyal po rdo rje shugs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// trAM gi ya/ shes las bsgrubs pa// rin po 'byung ba'i bdag nyid de// zhal ras gsum ldan spyan gsum pa// thor tshugs cod pan
25a5(rgyud): rnams kyis rgyan// bde ba chen po kha dog dmar// ting 'dzin bya/ ga rgya rnam par bzhugs// sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas kha ste// phyag g.yas na ni rdo rje dang // g.yon pa rin chen yongs su
25a6(rgyud): 'dzin// 'od zer ser po 'phro ba las// rin chen 'byung ba'i sprin chen nam// byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams kyis// rin chen char gyi rgyas par byas// rin chen mngon par tho ba'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba
25a7(rgyud): ting 'dzin to// khaM gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// don yod rdo rje bsam par bya// ting 'dzin phyag rgya legs bzhugs pa// margad ta yi 'od ltar 'bar// g.yas pa'i phyag na ral gri dang // g.yon pa yis ni
25a8(rgyud): lcags kyu nyid// sangs rgyas kyi ni sprin 'phro zhing // legs par grub phyir slar yang sdud// 'od zer chen pos rab gsal zhing // ye shes rgya mtsho'i 'od dang mtshungs// 'di 'dra rtag tu sems byed pa/ 
25b1(rgyud): namapa' snying po thub pa che// 'du byed thams cad spangs pa yi// mkha' dang mnyam par de 'gyur ro// nam pa'i snang bar byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// la yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ 
25b2(rgyud): rgyal ba thams cad kyis kyang rgyan lha mo spyan gsum phyag brgyad pa// zhal gsum gser gyi mdog dang mtshungs// sgeg pa'i cha lugs legs 'chang ba// cung zad bzhad pas 'dod chags ma// dang po'i phyag
25b3(rgyud): ni mchog sbyin mdzad// de bzhin gnyis pa mi 'jigs sbyin// phyag gsum pa ni rdo rje ste// bzhi pa na ni mda' yang gsor// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can// rin chen snye ma gnyis pa na// gsum pa
25b4(rgyud): na ni bgrang phreng ste bzhi pa gzhu yis legs par rgyan// 'od dmar 'od zer phreng ba can// lha rnams 'jigs pas sems myos te// lag pa thal mo sbyor bas byed// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprin
25b5(rgyud): 'phro bar// ye shes rdo rje spyan ma bsam// byang chub yan lag 'a/ bras rgyan pa'i// lha mo 'di 'dra bsgom par bya// ye shes spyan gyis snang bar byed pa'i rdo rje 'jo tshul zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
25b6(rgyud): to// ma yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// rdo rje rigs can mA ma kI/ lha mo zhal gsum phyag drug ma// dgod cing zhal ras khro dang bcas// u dpal sngon po'i mdog 'dra ba// 'od dmar shin tu 'bar ba can// dang
25b7(rgyud): mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i phyag/ gnyis pa legs par rdo rje bsdams// gsum pa yis ni mnga' yang gsor// g.yon pa bsdigs pa'i mdzub mo ste// gnyis pa zhags pa legs par bsnams// gsum pa yis
25b8(rgyud): ni gzhu yang 'dzin// rdo rje can ma sku gsum 'chang // dngos med ngo bo mtshan nyid can// sangs rgyas kyi ni sprin 'phro ba// 'di 'dra sgom pas bsgom par bya'o// sgyu 'phrul 'byung ba'i stobs kyi ye shes zab mo
26a1(rgyud): / zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// pa yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// zla ba'i mdog dang ldan pa'i yum// ming ni gos dkar can zhes bya// spyan gsum dag gis rnam par rgyan// zhal
26a2(rgyud): ras gsum pa dga' mdzad ma// phyag drug mi 'jigs sbyin mdzad ma// gnyis pa na ni rdo rje ste// gsum pa mda' yis rnam par rgyan// g.yon pa pad+ma bsnams par bya// gnyis pa na ni bgrang nor phreng / 
26a3(rgyud): gsum pa na ni gzhu bsnams shing // rol pa'i stabs su legs par bzhugs// sangs rgyas gzugs ni 'phro bar mdzad// pad+ma'i sprin gyis rgyas par sgom// gal te byang chub mchog 'dod na// rin chen
26a4(rgyud): skur ni bsgom par bya// pad+ma'i gzugs kyis 'jo tshul sangs rgyas dkyi rgyal ba 'dren pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// / ta yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// lha mo sgrol ma rdzu 'phrul che/ 
26a5(rgyud): 'jo sgeg cha lugs la gnas pa// zhal ras gsum pa spyan ga/ sum pa// phyag drug sems dpa'i skyil mo krung // bzhad pa margad 'od dang ldan// dang po mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i phyag
26a6(rgyud): gnyis pa na ni rdo rje bsnams// gsum pa na ni mda' yang gsor// g.yon pa bsdigs pa'i mdzum mo ste// gnyis pa na ni ut+pal nyid// gsum pa na ni gzhu yang 'dzin// 'od zer dmar po 'bar ba can/ 
26a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'phro bas rgyas mdzad pa// dga' mdzad sems can kun gyi ma// rtag par rgyun tu bsgom par bya// sems can thams cad dbang du 'gro zhing dga' bar byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
26a8(rgyud): to// skyes mchog rgyal bas gsungs pa yi// sems ma bzhi ni brjod pa'i ming // sems ma dang ni rig chen ma// chos ma rdo rje las ma ste// rol pas rjes su mnyes mdzad ma// de dag ji ltar rigs pa
26b1(rgyud): sgom// de dag kyang ni bsgoms pa yis// ring por mi thogs byang chub thob// sems can rab tu dga' byed pa'i// 'phags ma bzhi yi ting 'dzin to// cung gi yi ge las bsgrubs pa// ming ni bskul byed ces/ 
26b2(rgyud): ma'i gzugs// sku gsum rgyal ba bye ba phrag/ bdun gyis gsang sngags klu yis bstod// yi ge dgu pa thabs dgu can// lha dgu rnams kyi gnas kyang yin// zhal gsum ston ka'i 'dam bu mdog/ rgyan
26b3(rgyud): rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste// na chung skal ldan dar la bab// rigs sngags thams cad sgrol mdzad ma// dang po'i zhal ni cung zad tsam// bzhad cing spyan gsum ldan pa ste// g.yas kyi zhal ni rnam gdangs pa
26b4(rgyud): ud pal sngon po 'dab ma'i 'od// mche ba zla ba tshes pa bzhin/ 8/ lce ni glog bzhin ldib par mdzad// g.yon pa kha dog dam dar po ste// tshems kyis sgros ni rnam par mnan// rol pa'i stabs
26b5(rgyud): su legs par bzhugs// gdu bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// rgyu na pa'i phyag nyi shu rtsa drug la phyag gnyis rtsa ba'i phyag rgyas snying ka'i gnas rnam par rgyan pa'o// g.yas pa gnyis pa ni
26b6(rgyud): mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'o// gsum pa na ral gri'o// bzhi pa ni rin po che sbyin pa'o// lnga pa na shing tog bai dza pu ra'o// drug pa na mda' gsor ba'o// bdun pa na dgra sta'o// brgyad pa na dbyug to'o// dgu pa na
26b7(rgyud): tho ba'o// bcu pa na lcags kyu'o// bcu gcig pa na rdo rje'o// bcu gnyis pa nas gol rtogs pa'o// bcu gsum pa na bgrang phreng ngo // g.yon pa gnyis pa na yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan no// gsum pa na pad+ma
26b8(rgyud): bzhi pa na ril ba spyi blugs te'o// lnga pa na nags pa'o// drug pa na gzhu'o// bdun pa na mdung thung ngo // brgyad pan 'khor lo'o// dgu pa na dung ngo // bcu pa na bsdigs pa'i mdzub mo'o// bcu gcig pan/ 
27a1(rgyud): bum pa bzang po'o// bcu gnyis pa na thag mdung ngo // bcu gsum pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'od zer dmar po'i dkyil 'khor can// pad+ma la bzhugs bsgom par bya// la yi/ 
27a2(rgyud): zhing cung bgos pa yi// steng du bla gos gyon pa ste// sna tshogs tshig gu na gzar gsol// cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gzugs 'phro// sum bcu'i lha rnams ltung ba dang / 
27a3(rgyud): bgegs rnams shin tu 'jigs skrag par// thal mo sbyor bar byed pa ste// 'di 'dra gang zhig rtag sgom zhing // bsgrims nas gsang sngags brjod pa des// sangs rgyas nyid du thob 'gyur na// dngos grub
27a4(rgyud): gzhan lta ci zhig smos// ting 'dzin ngo bo thob 'gyur zhing // sdig rapa kun las rnam par 'grol// rgyal ba mtha' yas pa'i ye shes bskul bar byed pa'i stobs kyi rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i
27a5(rgyud): tingange 'dzin to// ra yaM ye shes la bsgrubs pa// rin chen sgron/ ma zhes bya'i gzugs// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum kha// phyag drug gser gyi mdog dang ldan// na chung dar la bab pa'i
27a6(rgyud): tshad// zhal ni cung zad bzhad pa ste// phyag ni rin chen gdu bus gtams// phyag gnyis rin chen thal mo ste// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor phreng ba 'khrug/ g.yas pa'i phyag na mi 'jigs sbyin// gsum pa mda'
27a7(rgyud): ni rnam par gsor// g.yon mdzub ma rungs rnams la bsdigs// gsum pa yis ni gzhu yang 'dzin// 'od zer dmar po legs par 'bar// rol stabs thabs kyi zhabs kyis gnon// sangs rgyas
27a8(rgyud): sprin ni 'phro zhing sdud// chos 'dzin yid du 'ong ba yi// lha mo 'di 'dra bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas rin chen sprin gyi ye shes kyis snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// b+h+rUM yi ye shes las bsgrubs
27b1(rgyud): pa/ 'jigs las sgrol ba khro gnyer can// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od dang mtshungs// phyag drug pad+ma la bzhugs pa// rol pa'i stangs la brtson pa ste// zhal ni khro dang bcas/ 
27b2(rgyud): par bzhad// legs par 'bar ba'i rtser lha can// g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste// gnyis pa be con 'dzin par bshad// gsum pa yis ni mda' yang gsor// g.yon pa bsdigs pa'i mdzub mo can/ 
27b3(rgyud): gnyis pa ril ba spyi blugs bsnams// gsum pa na ni mtshon cha ga zhu// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprin 'phro zhing // de bzhin gzhan dag legs sdud pa'i// nyal dang 'greng dang 'dug pa na// lha mo 'di 'dra dag
