27b4(rgyud): tu bsgom// 'jigs pa thams cad dmigs pa med par byed pa 'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// hUM gi ye shes la sa bsgrubs pa// ming ni rdo rje lu gu rgyud// thams cad 'ching ba
27b5(rgyud): bskyed pa ste// sems can ma rungs phung bar byed// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// phyag drug sngo bas gzugs/ bzang ma// zhal ni chung zad bzhad par mdzad// lag pa g.yas
27b6(rgyud): na rdo rje ste// gnyis pa rdo rje lu gu rgyud// gsum pa na ni mda' yang bsnams// g.yon pa bsdigs pa'i mdzub mo ste// gnyis pa na ni zhags par gsungs// gsum pa gzhu yang thogs par
27b7(rgyud): brtson// sangs rgyas rnams ni sprin 'phro ba// rdo rje lugu rgyud bsgoms na// byang chub skad cig gis 'thob na// dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos// rdo rje sgrog gi ye shes kyi rdo rje lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting
27b8(rgyud): 'dzin to// me yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// thub pa'i skyes mchog byams pa ni// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// de yi 'og na pad+ma ste// sems dpa'i skyil mo dkrung du bzhugs// phyag bzhi dag
28a1(rgyud): gis rnam par rgyan// phyag gnyis chos 'chang phyag rgyas brgyan// g.yas pa yis ni phyag gnyis pa// sems can skyob pa mchog sbyin mdzad// g.yon pa lha rdzas klu shing gi/ me
28a2(rgyud): tog ze 'bru'i mgo lcogs bsnams// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi// sprin chen de bzhi 'phro bar mdzad// byams pa'i stobs kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje rnam par rgyan pa'i ting 'dzin to// mu gi ye shes
28a3(rgyud): las bsgrubs pa// gzhon nu 'jam pa tshig gi lam// shes rab ye shes mchog thob pa// zab mo tshul ni ston pa po// zhal gsum spyan gsum zur phung gsum// gzhon nu rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste// cod
28a4(rgyud): pan bzang po mi 'khrugs can// me tog sna tshogs rnams kyis klubs// 'og na pad+ma chen po la// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs// 'jo sgeg thabs kyis rol pa ste// zhal ni cung
28a5(rgyud): zad bzhad pa la// dpa' bo chen po phyag drug pa// dang po mi 'jigs sbyin par bya// gnyis pa na ni ral gri nyid// gsum pa na na ma ngar yang gsor// de bzhin g.yon pa shes rab 'chang / 
28a6(rgyud): gnyis pa na ni u dpal thogs// gsum pa na ni gzhu nyid do// shes rab ye shes mchog gis klubs// sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin gyi bsnams// 'phro bar sangs rgyas 'dod pas sgom// 'jam pa mchog
28a7(rgyud): gi shes rab dang ye shes kyi rdo rje snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// spos kyi glang po ye shes tog/ de bzhin du ni bzang skyong dang // blo gros rgya mtsho blo gros ni// mi zad pa dang spobs brtsegs nyid// ngan
28a8(rgyud): song kun spong mthu chen thob// mya ngan kun mun 'joms pa'i blo// nor bzang dang ni dra ba'i 'od// de bzhin zla 'od 'od dpag med// namakha'i mdzod dang sgrib kun sel// de ltar de sogs grangs med pa'i
28b1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa kun// sa bon yig 'bru rnams las 'khrungs// yi ge phyag rgya'i sbyor ba can// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// sna tshogs thabs kyis rol par mdzad// byang chub
28b2(rgyud): sems dpa' 'di yi rgyu// gsang sngags bzlos par bsgom par bya// mdog ldan du zhing 'phro mdzad pa// rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu bsam// hUM gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// gzi brjid ldan pa 'jam
28b3(rgyud): dbyangs kyi// gshin rje'i dgra zhes rnam grangs pa// bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba ste/ char sprin gyi ni 'od dang 'dra// zhal drug pa la phyag drug pa// de bzhin zhabs drug mi'u thung 'dra// 
28b4(rgyud): gsus khyim shin tu che ba ste// de ni drag po chen po yin// ljags 'dril rdo rje mche ba can// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste// sta da ljags kyi ni sham thabs bgos// rol pa'i stabs can ma
28b5(rgyud): he bcibs// de yi 'og tu pad+ma byas// mi thod phreng can skra 'khyil pa / a ga com ser la sgra chen 'byin// mgo yi steng na mi 'khrugs pa// sku gsum la ni rnam par bzhugs// 'jam pa'i dpal
28b6(rgyud): gyis rnam par rgyun// dang po'i zhal ni rnam par bzhad// g.yas pa ljags ni 'dril ba ste// g.yon pa'i tshems kyi sgros mnan khros// g.yas pa'i phyag na ral gri ste// gnyis pa nan rdo rje nyid// gsum pa yis
28b7(rgyud): ni mda' yang gsor// g.yon pa bsdigs mdzub zhags pa can// gnyis pa yis ni num 'dzin// gsum pa gtsun brdungs pa yis// shin tu legs par rnam par rgyan// lha mo yis ni g.yas nas 'khyung/ 
28b8(rgyud): gnyis pa na ni ud pal thogs// g.yon pa zla ba ltar snang ba// pad+ma dkar po thogs par bya// 'og tu lha dang bgegs kyi rnams// snga ma breng nas phyag kyang 'tshal// 'od zer dmar po 'bar dang bcas/ 
29a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas sprin rnams 'phro zhing sdud// rnal 'byor ngag gi sgo nas su// bsgrims nas gsang sngags bzlas pa de// 'dug dang nyal dang 'chag pa na// legs par bsams te kun zos shing // 
29a2(rgyud): 'dod pa lnga la longs spyad kyang // nam mkha' lta bur gos mi 'gyur// gshed byed thams cad rmongs par byed pa'i ye shes gshin rje gsod pa'i 'dul ba 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// pra yi ye
29a3(rgyud): shes las bsgrubs pa// khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// phyag drug gis ni rnam par rgyan// mdog ser mi thung gzugs can la// 'od zer dmar po'i dkyil 'khor
29a4(rgyud): can// pad+ma la bzhugs rol pa'i stabs// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis ba rgyan pa la// dang po'i zhal ni rnam par bzhad// de bzhin ya das pa rnam par bsgyur// g.yon pa tshems kyi sgros kyang mnan/ 
29a5(rgyud): sna tshogs tshul gyis 'bar ba ste// lag pa g.yas pa rdo rje thogs// gnyis pa na ni dbyug pa ste// gsum pa na ni mda' yang tho gas// g.yon pa bsdigs mdzub zhags pa can// gnyis pa
29a6(rgyud): yis ni nu ma 'dzin// gsum pa gzhu can yin par gsungs// spyi bo'i steng na mi 'khrugs pa// rim bzhin 'phro zhing bsdud pa ste// 'di 'dra goms pas bsgom par bya// zlos pas sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'thob/ 
29a7(rgyud): gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// ha yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// khro bo pad+ma mthar byed pa// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// kha dog dmar po phyag brgyad spyan/ 
29a8(rgyud): sku ni sbrul gyis dkris pa ste// pad+ma la bzhugs rol pa'i stabs// khro bo lta bas gzigs mdzad pa// dang po zhal ni rnam par bzhad// g.yas pa ljags ni 'dril ba ste// g.yon pa tshems kyis sgros
29b1(rgyud): mnan pa// stag lpags gsol zhing khro ba la// g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste// gnyis pa na ni dbyug to gsungs// gsum pa na ni lcags kyu ste// bzhi pa na ni mda' yang gsor// g.yon pa bsdigs pa'i mdzub
29b2(rgyud): mo ste// gnyis pa yis ni nu ma 'dzin// gsum pa na ni pad+ma ste// bzhi pa na ni gzhu nyid do// de yi cod pan mi 'khrugs pa// sangs rgyas gzugs ni mang po dag/ 'phro zhing 'du bar bsgoms byas na// 
29b3(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur te gzhan du min// rta mchog gi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// hUM gi ye she lnga bsgrubs pa// ming ni khro bo bgegs kyi gshed// me yi dkyil bzhugs sgrub pa sbyin// lag na tra
29b4(rgyud): rjes 'brangs pa// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// bgegs rnams 'joms mdzad phyag drug can// dang po'i zhal ni zhad pa ste// de bzhin g.yas pa'i zhal gdangs pa// g.yon/ 
29b5(rgyud): pa tshems kyi sgros mnan khro// ud dpal sngon po'i mdab 'dra'i mdog/ zhabs kyis bgegs ni mnan pa ste// gnyis pa pad+ma'i steng na bzhugs// g.yas kyi phyag na ral gri ste/ 
29b6(rgyud): gnyis pa na ni dgra sngar gsungs// gsum pa yis ni mnga' yang gsor// g.yon pa bsdigs mdzub zhags pa can// de bzhin gnyis pa nu ma 'dzin// gsum pa na ni gzhu yang gsungs// sangs
29b7(rgyud): rgyas rang bzhin sprin 'phro bar// ye shes mkhas pas bsgom par bya// bgegs rnams thams cad 'dral ba'i ye shes kyi rdo rjes rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// hUM gi ye shes las
29b8(rgyud): bsgrubs pa// mi g.yo bus pa'i gzugs dang ldan// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa la// dang po zhal ni bzhad pa ste// de yi g.yas pa'i zhal gdangs pas/ 
30a1(rgyud): khrag gis brlan pa'i ljags kyang 'dril// g.yon pa choms kyis sgros man mgro// rmugs snying ka'i phyogs kyang bkang // mthing shun gyi ni mdog can te// rin chen stengs pad+ma la/ 
30a2(rgyud): rol pa'i zhabs kyis stabs su bzhugs// thub pa bgegs kyi chu 'jing 'joms// phyag drug 'bar ba 'phro ba yi// 'od bzang dmar po'i dkyil 'khor na// g.yas pa'i phyag na ral gri ste// gnyis pa na
30a3(rgyud): ni rdo rjer gsungs// gsum pa mda' ni rnam par gsor// g.yon pas bsdigs mdzub zhags pa can// gnyis pa yis ni num 'dzin// gsum pa gzhu ni brdungs pa la// tshangs pas gzungs ste lta ba dang / 
30a4(rgyud): sna tshogs me tog gis bcings pa'i// cod pan dang dbu rgyan thog sa// zur bud g.yon pa bung ba'i mdog/ mi 'khrugs pa yis/ rnam par rgyan// sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin dag gis// cho 'phrul
30a5(rgyud): chen po du ma 'phro// de ltar rtag tu rnal 'byor gang // sgom pas sgom par byed pa de// bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi// them ska/ sa la ni 'dzeg par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
30a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin byed pa mi g.yo ba'i ye shes rdo rje bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// hUM gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// ming ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po ste// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ 
30a7(rgyud): phyag drug pa zhes bya bar bsgrags// dang rgyan sangs rgyas kyis rgyan pa'i// tha~Mr rmugs cong ban pa dang po can// dang po nal ni bad pal// gsas pa'is ni rnam par bsgyur// gson pa rnams kyirnam/ 
30a8(rgyud): minam gro// dpral ba khro gnyer rim pa can// 'bar ba char smin lta bu'i mdog/ dkyil 'khor dmar po 'bar bcan// phyag gnyis 'dod pa'i phyag rgyar ldan// g.yas pa na ni rdo rjer gsungs// gsum pa/ 
30b1(rgyud): mngar yis rnam par rol// g.yon pa yis ni nu ma 'dzin// gsum pa'i phyag na gzhu yang bsnams// pad+ma la bzhugs rol pa'i thabs// 'og tu bgegs kyang rnam par mnan// sangs rgyas lang yod/ 
30b2(rgyud): 'phro mdzad pa// ting nge 'dzin gyis sgom byas na// bla na med pa'i ye shes 'thob// snying thams cad 'gugs pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// hUM gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ 
30b3(rgyud): khro bo be con sngon po can// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// phyag drug gis ni rnam par brgyan// dang po'i zhal ni 'jo sgeg bzhad// de bzhin g.yas pa rnam par gdangs// g.yon pa tshems kyis sgros
30b4(rgyud): kyang mnan// sku ni kha chu 'dra ba ste// lus ni sbrul gyis rnam par rgyan// sna tshogs lcang lor 'khyil pa ste// dbu rgyan la ni sa ngas rgyas bzhugs// pad+ma la bzhugs rol stabs can// g.yas
30b5(rgyud): pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste// gnyis pa na ni be con nyid// gsum pa mtshon cha mda' dang ldan// g.yon pa bsdigs mdzub na/ gas pa ste// gnyis pa yis na nu ma 'dzin// gsum pa na ni
30b6(rgyud): gzhu nyid bsnams// dkyil 'khor dmar po 'bar ba can// sbyor ba'i ye shes kyis bkrun pa'i// sangs rgyas sprin ni rtag tu 'phro// bgegs kyis rtog pa'i ye shes rdo rjes rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i
30b7(rgyud): tingange 'dzin to// hUM zhes gsungs pa'i khro bo ni// ye shes dam pa stobs po che// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa phyag brgyad kyis ni rnam par rgyan// sprin gyi kha dog 'dra ba ste// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan
30b8(rgyud): mig dmar skra 'bar gyen du brjes// mgo bo la na mi 'khrugs bzhugs// dang po'i nal ni rnam par bzhad // de bzhin g.yas pa rnam par gdangs// g.yon pa tshems kyi smos mnan pa// pad+mal bzhug
31a1(rgyud): / 'gying pag can// drag po'i tsham rngam stang stabs can// phyogs bcu'i lha rnams phung bar mdzad// 'bar ba rnams kyis yongs bskor ba'i// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nang na bzhugs/ 
31a2(rgyud): g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste// gnyis pa be con thogs par mtshon// gsum pa yis ni ral gri gdengs// bzhi pa mda' yis rnam par rgyan// g.yon pa bsdigs mdzub zhags pa can// gnyis pa
31a3(rgyud): yis ni nu ma 'dzin// gsum pa na ni tho ba nyid// phyag bzhi pa ni gzhu can la// sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin 'phro ba// sgom pa mchog gis bsgom par bya// gnol ba med pa'i ye shes rdo rje'i
31a4(rgyud): stobs kyis rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// b+hu gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// gtsug gtor 'khor lo sa bsgyur ba ste// sku gsum ldan pa zhal ras gsum// gser gyi
31a5(rgyud): mdog can 'od bzang ba// 'dom gang 'od kyis rnam par rgyan// ting 'dzin phyag rgyar rnam par gnas// rin chen ri steng / sa pad+ma la// rdo rje skyil mo krung du bzhugs// rigs kyi yum ni
31a6(rgyud): bzhi po rnams// gzugs dang yan lag kun mdangs can// zhal ras 'jo sgeg tshul gyis rgyan// gos dang rgyun gyis klubs pa ste// chags phyir spro ba'i rtsol ba can// phyag rgya rin chen snyim dang / 
31a7(rgyud): rdo rje pad+ma ud pal ldan// lha mo so so'i phyogs na bzhugs// gtsug tor 'od zer lnga pa can// kun tu 'khor lo'i phreng ba dang // 'khor lo'i bar na rdo rje gnas// 'od zer phreng bas rnam par rgyan// sangs
31a8(rgyud): rgyas rang bzhin smin 'phro bas// namakha' thams cad 'gengs par mdzad// byang chub snying po ngan gnyer bas// 'di 'dra 'khor lo can sgom zhing // bsgrims nas rnal 'byor bsgoms pa yis// ring po mtho
31b1(rgyud): 'dod pa 'thog/ byang chub snying po thams cad kyi rgyan gyi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dza gyi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// gnod sbyin gnod gnas sku gsum can// zhal ras gsum pa phyag
31b2(rgyud): gnyis na// bI dza pu ri ne'u le can// pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa 'am// yang na bzang po'i 'dug stangs gnas// ngos na rgyan rnams thams cad kyis// brgyan pa'i gnod sbyin mo bzhi dag/ rin chen char pa/ 
31b3(rgyud): 'bebs par byed// mgo bo'i steng na sangs rgyas lnga// de yi cod pan bzang po yi// g.yon phyogs rtse bran rgyun yang chags// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprin 'phro zhing // rin chen char pa 'bebs par mdzad/ 
31b4(rgyud): gang zhig nor rdzas 'dod pa yis// gnod gnas 'di 'dra bsgom byas na// de yis sa chen nor rdzas kyis// ring por mi thog/ ngas gang bar 'gyur// lag na rdo rjes bdud rtsi yi// chu yang rtag tu
31b5(rgyud): dbul bar bya// rin po che sprin sbyin pa'i char 'bebs pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// ma yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa'i// nyi ma'i 'od ltar 'od zer can// rta bdun
31b6(rgyud): ldan pa'i shing rtar bzhugs// 'bar ba'i dkyi 'khor snang mdzad po// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum ldan// phyag drug kha dog ser por snang // phyogs bcu srung bar brtson pa ste// 'jo sgeg tshul du na/ 
31b7(rgyud): yang bzhad// na chung rgyan ni g.yo ba can// cod pan rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga// thor tshugs me tog rnams kyis rgyan// g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste// gnyis pa na ni khab skud bsnams// gsum pa na/ 
31b8(rgyud): ni mda' yang gsor// g.yon pa bsdigs mdzub zhags pa can// gnyis pa a shwa'i yal ga ste// gsum pa na ni gzhu nyid do// gzugs brnyan mang po 'phro ba yis// sdang ba'i sems can bcing ba
32a1(rgyud): dang / mig dang la ni drub par byed// gsang sngags bzlas brjod 'ab dpa ga/ gal de byung chub mchog 'dod na// lha mo nu mdzad bsgom par bya// 'dun sdom par byed pa yin// dbang / 
32a2(rgyud): du sems can rab tu 'gro// sdang ba rnams kyis mi tshugs par byed pa'i rdo rje mchog rab ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// pa yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa'i// rig pa'i ri khrod shing lo can// zhal ras gsum pa
32a3(rgyud): spyan gsum pa// zhal ras bzhad cing khro dang bcas// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste// na chung gzhon nu phyag drug ma// g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste// gnyis pa na ni dgra sta nyid// gsum pa mda' yang
32a4(rgyud): rnam par gsor// g.yon pa bsdigs mdzub zhags pa can// gnyis pa shing lo'i bam po ste// phyag gsum pa ni gzhu nyid do// thor tshugs me tog phreng bas rgyan// de steng kha dog lnga po
32a5(rgyud): dag/ rab tu 'dres pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs// mdog ser ba/ d+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// dkyil 'khor dmar po cher 'a/ bar ba// khro ba'i sprin 'phro sdud mdzad cing // gdon gang skyes
32a6(rgyud): dgu'i nang gnas pa// de dag khro bo'i mes kyang sreg/ phyir yang bsregs nas sangs rgyas kyis// kha dog bdud rtsi char 'bebs mdzad// de 'dra rnal 'byor gyis bsgoms na// mi ngas thams cad zhi bar
32a7(rgyud): mdzad// nad thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dza yi ye shes las sgrub pa// rigs sngags mtshan ni dug sel ma// sbrul mgo bdun gyi gdengs ka can
32a8(rgyud): nor bu 'bar bas brgyan pa ste// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// gzhon nu mtshan ni 'bar ba can// bzhad cing khro dang bcas pa ste// sbrul gyi ska rags dag gis rgyan// phyag drug rol pa'i
32b1(rgyud): stang stabs can// mgo yi steng na mi 'khrugs bzhugs// g.yas pa'i phyagan rdo rje ste// gnyis pa ral gri thogs par brtson// phyag gsum pa ni gang thabs kyis// stang stabs tshul gyis mnga'
32b2(rgyud): yang gsor// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can// gnyis pa dug gi me tog can// phyag gsum pa ni gzhu nyid do// dbu rgyan me tog rnams kyis brgyan// gser mdog pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs
32b3(rgyud): 'od ni dmar po dkyil 'khor can// dza rnams 'phro bas bskor ba ste// kun nas 'bar ba rnams kyis khebs// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan 'phro ba can// phyag bzang bum pa zla 'dra ba'i// kha ni dza/ 
32b4(rgyud): yis rnam rgyan pas// dug gis phog pa rnams la ldugs// rtag tu sku gsum dug sel ma// dug gis phog pa rnams la sgom// de ltar sgom par byas pa yis// ring por mi thogs
32b5(rgyud): byang chub 'thob// nyon mongs rnams kyi dug sel ba// gdeng sa ka'i dbang po rdo rje ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge/ 'dzin to// tri yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// sku chen ha la
32b6(rgyud): ha la ste// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ thor tshugs cod pan rnams kyis rgyan// zla ba ches pa bsnams pa'i lha// dbu rgyan thod bdag gis brgyan// thor tshugs rgyal po'i sku gzugs
32b7(rgyud): bzhugs// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste// pad+ma dkar po lta bur snang // sems stobs ldan pa'i 'jo tshul can// phyag brgyad zhal yang bzhad pa ste// smad g.yogs stag gi lpags pa ban pa
32b8(rgyud): g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste// gnyis pa bgreng nor phreng ba can// gsum pa yis ni mnga' yang gsor// g.yon pa pad+mas rnam par rgyan// gnyis pa yis ni nu ma 'dzin// gsum pa na ni gzhu
33a1(rgyud): nyid do// g.yas pa mdung rtse gsum pa la// sbrul gyis yongs su dkris pa ste// g.yon na thod pa dri zhim pa'i// me tog sna tshogs kyis bkang ba// pad+ma dmar po la bzhugs pa/ 
33a2(rgyud): rol pa'i stang stabs tshul du gnas// rin chen raM phug nang bzhugs par// rnal 'byor sems dpas bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas rang bzhin gzugs dang ni// cho 'phrul chen po sna tshogs 'byung // 
33a3(rgyud): rnam par mi rtog ting 'dzin gyis// kha zas thams cad za byed cing // nang gi sngags pas sngags brjod cing // rim bzhin rnal 'byor gyis bsgoms na// byang chub myur du thob 'gyur zhing // bla na med
33a4(rgyud): pa'i bde ba 'dren// 'dod pa thams cad rab bsgrubs pa// ha la hral yongs su mnyes par byed pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba 'i ting nge 'dzin to// sa yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// stong
33a5(rgyud): chen rab tu 'joms mdzad pa'i// lha mo nadang kun 'phrog ma ste// / sdang ba'i sems can 'joms mdzad ma// phyag ste/ nga ldan zhing dbu stong la// spyan gsum dag gis rnam par
33a6(rgyud): rgyan// brtson chen phyag brgyad khro ba dang // steg pa'i thabs kyis dgongs pa can// phyag g.yas mchod sbyin lha rdzas kyi// ral gri lcags kyu mda' dang ldan// phyag g.yon pad+mo rdo rje nor// zhags/ 
33a7(rgyud): pa gzhu dang sta re can// mdog dmar zhal ras bzhi pa ste// bgegs stong 'joms par mdzad pa yin// rang gi rnal 'byor la brtson pas// nam mkha'i mtha' gtugs 'jug cing spro// glang po rta dang
33a8(rgyud): skyes pa dag/ za bar mdzad ma phreng ba can// de yi las kyis bskul ba yi// gsang sngags dpa' bos gdon par bya// rnal 'byor dbang phyug las 'dod pas// 'di byas pas ni srung bar 'gyur// 
33b1(rgyud): dpung chen po la rnam par lta ba thams cad srung bstobs kyi mchog song chen po rnam par 'joms pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// d+ha zhes bya bas bskyed pa'i bsdigs pa'i
33b2(rgyud): mdzub mo'i phyag rgya can drag mo chen mo zhal bzhi pa/ spyan gsum dang phyag brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan pa la/ ral gri dang / gtun shing dang / 'khor lo dang / mda' snoms pa/ mdung rtse gsum pa dang / 
33b3(rgyud): rdo rje dang / gzhu dang / chom rkun mdzub mos bsdigs pa ste/ rdo rje ro langs 'byung ba dag/ mthong bas dpung rnams bcom gtor bas// lha mo rtag tu bsgoms na ni// ring por mi thogs byang chub 'thob
33b4(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum rnam par 'joms pa la mkhas pa la mkha/ sa pa mchog gi rtse mo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dpra yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// stobs mo che pha rol gnon
33b5(rgyud): par mdzad ma spyan gsum dang phyag brgyad kyis rnam par rgyan pa/ phyag g.yas na ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / mdung rtse gsu ma pa dang / mda' dang / phyag g.yon na rdo rje dang / zhags pa dang / 
33b6(rgyud): dgra sta dang / gzhu bsnams pa dang / sdang ba'i bgegs rnams ltung bar mdzad par bya'o// bu mi 'tsho dang mo gsham dag/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bcug nas su// lha rnams kun gyi bum pa yis/ 
33b7(rgyud): slob dpon gyis ni dbang bskur zhing // de yi mngal du byis pa ni// 'jam pa'i gzugs can 'jug par bsam// zhags pa'i phyag rgyas mtshan ngan nas// skyes pa gzugs can 'byung ba dang / 
33b8(rgyud): dran pa yis ni bral nas kyang // mngal ni bsod nams ngag gis spel// mngal thams cad rnam par lta ba so sor 'brang ma'i ye shes kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// ba yi ye
34a1(rgyud): shes rol pas bskrun// lha ma nar gyi blo gros ma// ga'i byin gser gyi mdog can la// phyag drug lang tshod la bag// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste// 'jo skrag / 
34a2(rgyud): bcas 'bar ba ste// de yi phyag g.yas mchog sbyin mdzad// gnyis pa 'bru yi snyim can// gsum pa yis ni mda' yang gsor// phyag g.yon yid bzhin nor bu dang // rin chen char 'bebs gzhu
34a3(rgyud): yang 'dzin// grogs mo'i skye bos yongs bskor cing // mngag gzhug gnod sbyin mo yi gzugs// rin chen char pa 'bebs pa dang // nor kun gyi ni char pa dag/ 'bebs par byed pa bsam par
34a4(rgyud): bya/ nor gyi blo gros chen mo 'di// de ltar sngags pas bsgom das na de// dpag tshad bdun ni rgyus par yang // nor gyi cha/ ra gyis khyab par mdzad// byang chub sbyin mchog dam pa ma/ 
34a5(rgyud): de ltar rnal 'byor bdag nyid sgom// nor gyi rgyun gyi char ra tu 'bebs pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin// / ba yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// srin mo 'bar ba'i sgo
34a6(rgyud): phreng can// ming ni dngul dkar las skyes mo// stobs mo che la pha rol gnon// gsus 'phyang mo la mche ba gtsigs ma// skra ser mo 'am kham pa gyen du brdzes pa// thor tshugs dang cod pan gyis
34a7(rgyud): rgyan pa// spyi bo la mi 'khrugs pa bzhugs pa/ phyag bco brgyad pa/ mgo bcu gnyis pa/ spyan gsum gsum can// thod pa'i phreng ba dang ldan pa/ drag mo lag na khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa
34a8(rgyud): thogs pa// smad g.yogs seng ge'i lpags pas g.yogs pa// sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa can// ral gri dang / lcags kyu dang / 'khor lo dang / gtun shing dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / 
34b1(rgyud): dril bu dang / bdan dang / lhag dbyug dang / mdung dang / mchog sbyin pa dang / gzhu dang / mda' dang / mdung thung dang / be con dang / zhags pa dang / dgra sta dang / tho ba thogs pa/ lus kyi rgyan thams
34b2(rgyud): cad kyis brgyan pa// mdog gnag pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la rol pa'i stabs su bzhugs pa/ sdang ba dang 'dul ba zhes brjod pa 'di lta bu/ rtag tu hUM gis hUM mdzad pa// bzlas brjod yang dag
34b3(rgyud): ldan par sgom// sems can kun don tshogs pa yi// byang chub ring por mi thogs 'thob// sems can thams cad 'ching bar byed pa'i mchog rang byang chub kyi snying por rnam par rgyal bar
34b4(rgyud): stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// k+ShaM zhes bya bas sgom/ pa'i gzugs// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste/ na chung gzhon nu 'jo tshul can// mgo bo skra tshugs phyed
34b5(rgyud): tu bzung // de bzhin du ni stod g.yogs kyang // la dkar seng ba bgos pa ste// de la kha dog lnga pa yi// me tog 'phrul pa rnams kyis rgyan// gser gyi mdog can bzhin
34b6(rgyud): 'dzum pa// phyed gzung bas ni rnam par rol// dpag bsam shing gis brgyan pa yi// rin chen ri la legs par bzhugs// 'jam pa'i khro bo rdo rje yis// de yi mgo bo mnan nas
34b7(rgyud): bzhugs// ma thog thag gnod sbyin mos// nam mkha' gang bar bsgom par bya// gnod sbyin mo thams cad sgrub pa'i mchog rab ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// sngags la oM AHhUM/ yi ge gsum
34b8(rgyud): pa mig gsum gzugs// khyab 'jug lha chen mes po ste// gdong gsum rang gi mtshon thogs la// rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis bskul cing // rdo rje ting 'dzin bsgoms na// mod la dngos grub thob pa/ 
35a1(rgyud): 'gyur// 'jig rten thams cad grub pa mig gsum rnam par rol pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// gzhan yang gsang sngags yige yi// sa bon gang gis sbyar byas te/ 
35a2(rgyud): rdo rje yig 'bru rnams bsgoms nas// de dag ma bsgribs bzhin du sgrub// 'phrog ma 'phrog byed las skyes pa'i// bu ni lnga brgya po rnams dang // lnga rtsen dang ni dpal can ma// myur ba nyid du 'grub
35a3(rgyud): par 'gyur// rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'di ni ting nge 'dzin rim par phye ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs/ 
35a4(rgyud): pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la zhi bar lta ba rdul dang bral ba'i mchog rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom/ sa par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum
35a5(rgyud): las sna tshogs kyi ye shes bskyed par mdzad pa 'di dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM b+ha ga ba ti ru ru s+phu ruNA/ la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ne sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swAhA// de nas las thams
35a6(rgyud): cad rab tu rdzogs par byed pa 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis// sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' mkhas rnams dgyes// bdud kyi dpung rnams 'das gyur te// sangs rgyas
35a7(rgyud): rdo rje rjes par byed// zhi ba sangs rgyas rnams kyi sum rdo rje dam tshig gis bskul na// shi ba rnams la srog sbyin mdzad// ma grub pa rnams grub par rtsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
35a8(rgyud): mdzad chen po rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa sku gsum rdo rje 'bar ba'i mchog dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje 'chang mchog thams cad bskyed pa'i yum rdo rje dkyil
35b1(rgyud): 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad rab tu sgrub par byed pa 'di phyung ngo // oM sha ka re/ shin+tiM ka ri g+hu Ta g+hu Ta g+hu Ti ni g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya g+hu Ta~M ni swA hA// de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// rdo rje gsum
35b2(rgyud): las skyes gyur pa// thams cad kyi ni mig phye nas// rdo rje shugs ni rjes dran gyur// sgrub pa thams cad srung mdzad ma// de bzhin las rnams sgrub pa yi// sdig pa thams cad 'joms ma ste/ 
35b3(rgyud): zhi dang rgyas dang 'phel mdzad ma'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis 'dod chags chen pos zhen pa pad+ma gar gyi stang stabs thugs kyi rdo rje gsum gyis rnam par 'thor ba'i dam tshig
35b4(rgyud): rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas chos tha mas cad 'dzin pa mchog gi yum 'di rdo rje gsum rnams la sa phyung ngo // oM ka Ta bi ka Te ni ka Te ka kang+ka Te swA hA// de nas chos
35b5(rgyud): kyi rgyal mtshan mchog/ dam pa 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// ting nge 'dzin gyi mig phye nas// rdo rje pad+ma rjes dran byed/ rgyas pa chen po yum yin te// chos mdzod rnam par 'phel
35b6(rgyud): mdzad ma// bsgoms shing bstan te bzlas brjod na// rgya cher srung bar mdzad pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dbang du bya ba khong du chud pas// rdo rje gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis
35b7(rgyud): dga' bar byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ye shes la 'jug par byed pa sna tshogs thams cad 'chang ba'i yum gyi sgrol ma 'di gsungs so// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ 
35b8(rgyud): de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas kun dang sras kyi rnams// spyan phye rnam par gdangs nas su// ye shes rdo rje ldan pa dran// lha mo bzlas brjod byas tsam gyis// skye dgu rnams
36a1(rgyud): ni mngag gzhug 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi ye shes la 'jug pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par/ 
36a2(rgyud): zhugs nas 'di rdo rje gsum las phyung ngo // namaHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA/ oM kha ga khA hrIhi khA hi/ sarba duSh+Tas trang ma ka a si mus la bar shu pA sha hasta/ tsat+tar mu ga tsa tur b+hu dza/ Sha thur Na/ A gats+tsha
36a3(rgyud): shAn+d+ha/ sarba rgyun rnas pa ra// ma hA hA m+b+ha / ma khyes nan/ sa r+dz+dza b+hUs kAr/  l+ri nas na / b+h+ya na pas na/ sas/  AH/  / 
36a4(rgyud): b+hin+da b+hin+da/ pa ra mu dIn/ A kaR+Sha ya a kaR+Sha ye/ sarba b+hUtA// ma tha ma tho/ nirma tha nirma tha/ sarba duSh+Te/ prA be sha ye pra/ be sha ya/ maN+Da la ma d+h+ye be ba she ta/ dzI bi tIn+ta ka ra/ ku ru kurma
36a5(rgyud): ma ma kAr+ye/ da ha daha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ mA bi la ba mA bi laM ga sa ma~M ya ma nu sma ra/ hUM hUM/ phaT phaT/ bi s+pho Ti ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba nA sha ya ri pA/ ka ra kA ra/ big+h+nAn sarba A sha ba ri pU ra/ 
36a6(rgyud): ka/ he he b+ha ga ban/ kiny+tsi rA ya si/ ma ma sarba an+t+ra sA d+ha ya swAhA// de nas khro bo 'di gsungs pas// sangs rgyas byang chub sems mkhas kun// 'dar zhing 'jigs pa skyes gyur nas// gtso ga
36a7(rgyud): rdo rje rnam snang mdzad// rdo rje ra ba dra ba yin// ye shes sna tshogs can la lta// bsrubs gcig pa 'am bsrubs gnyis pa'i// thod pa bzang po rnyed pa dang // rkang pa rjes pa'i cho ga la// lha
36a8(rgyud): mo bzhi yi sbyor ba dang // sangs rgyas lnga yis byin rlabs te// sku gsum dbyer med bsgoms nas su// myur bar khugs kyi bar du ni// rkang pas mnan te bzlas brjod bya// zhes bcom ldan
36b1(rgyud): 'das rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad chen pos bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ye shes kyi rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i mchog sprin chen po na mkha' rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
36b2(rgyud): nas rdo rje gsum rnams las snying po 'di gsung so// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA/ na mo badz+ra kro d+hA ya/ mahA Sh+To ta ka Ta b+hai ra bA ya/ a si mu sa la/ ba ra shu pA sha hastA ya/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/ kha ba khA hi khA
36b3(rgyud): hi tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ha na tsa na/ daha daha/ gar+b+ha gar+b+ha/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba bib+hA be nA ya kAn/ ma hA ga Na pa ti/ dzI bi tAn+ta ka rA ya swA hA// khro bo chen po gsungs pa yis/ 
36b4(rgyud): grags chen sangs rgyas thams cad ni// yid phyung nas ni sgras par gyur// log 'dren rnams dang bgegs rnams 'ad dar// sku gsum ye shes mchog mnga' ba'i// rdo rje rnam
36b5(rgyud): snang mdzad pa dran// de yi rkang rjes su dang ni// rlung gis gtsug pa'i shing lo la// khro bo'i 'khor lor gzir nas su// tshogs bdag rkang pa'i drung du bzhag/ hUM dang
36b6(rgyud): phaT kyis bskul nas su// bskrad pa'i sbyor ba byas na ni// sangs rgyas rdo rje can yang skrod// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
36b7(rgyud): nas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i khro bo chen po sku gsum rnams las phyung ngo // na maHsa man+ta kA ya bA tsit+ta badz+ra NA/ oM hUM dzi na ri ti Tu hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA// de nas khro bo 'di brjod pas// sangs rgyas byang chub
36b8(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams// 'jigs par gyur cing skrag gyur nas// gtso bo rnam snang mdzad pa dran// srin po 'byung po dang mkha' 'gro/ skem byed gdon rnams gzer ba la// rdo rje gzer ba'i sbyor
37a1(rgyud): ba yis// hUM tsam gyis kyang las byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mtha' yas kyis yon tan rin po che dpag tu med pa kun nas sdud pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i/ 
37a2(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje pad+ma'i khro bo chen po 'di sku gsum rnams las phyung ngo // na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ oM hUM hUM hUM/ ta ru la/ bi ru la/ sarba bi Sha g+ha ta ka/ dz+wa li ta/ bi sU li
37a3(rgyud): ga an+da T+Ta hA sa nA da ni/ ke Sha ri sa Ta to pa Ta ka ra/ badz+ra khu ra/ nir g+h+r-i ta na/ tsa li ta ba su d+ha ta la ni shA sa ma ru tota k+Ship+ta d+hA ra Ni d+ha ra/ b+h+r-i Sha na an+d+raT+Ta ta Ta Ta Ta ha sa/ a pA ri mi tA/ ba la pa rA
37a4(rgyud): kra ma ra Ar+ya ga Na b+hI ta b+hU ta ga/ a d+hu Shita/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha ha ya grI ba/ khA da khA da/ pa ra man+tan/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ sid+d+him+be.A bri ShaM A be Sha yai/ badz+ra sarba dz+wa ra pi shA tsAn/ sarba gra he Shu/ 
37a5(rgyud): a pra ti ha taM b+ha ba/ badz+ra daMSh+Ta kiny+tsi rA ya si/ i duSh+ma gra ha na/ duSh+Ta sarba ma bA/ d+hu na d+hun/ ma tha ma thaM/ mar dmarang / pA Ta ya pA Ta ya/ maT ma Ta/ baM d+ha bad+hA/ bud+d+ha d+harma sa g+ha/ a
37a6(rgyud): nu dz+nyA ta karma ku ru shi g+hA ha ya grI bA ya phaT/ badz+ra ya phaT/ badz+ra g+hA ta ya phaT/ badz+ra nai tA ya phaT/ badz+ra daMSh+Ta ya phaT/ badz+ra khu rA ya phaT/ badz+ra khu ra nir g+hA ta na ya phaT/ pa ra man+ta bi nA shaM nA ya phaT/ 
37a7(rgyud): badz+ra trai lo kya b+ha a ya~M ka ra phaT/ sarba karma su pra ti ha ta ya phaT/ badz+ra ku la san+ta sa nA ya phaT/ hU hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA// de nas khro chen byung ba yis// rdo rje pad mchog las byung rnams// yid ni 'jig
37a8(rgyud): shing skrag par 'gyur// 'khor bcas 'jigs pas rnam 'khrugs nas// byang chub tshogs ni dran byed cing // ye shes rdo rje dran 'gyur ba// lag pa la ni pad+ma dang / ha zhes bya ba mchog 'bar
37b1(rgyud): bsam// khro rdul ting 'dzin la gnas nas// rdo rje gsum yig 'dzin pa yis// khams gsum dag kyang khyab byed pa'o// mi bzang dug ni drang bar bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshe
37b2(rgyud): pa don yod grub kyis don yang dag par 'byung ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi mchog nor bu'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas khro bo'i rgyal po chen po be con sngon po can 'di rdo rje gsu
37b3(rgyud): las phyung ngo // na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA/ e hi oM hi/ b+ha ga bAn/ nI la badz+ra daN+Da/ tu ru tu ru/ hu lu hu lu swA hA// gu lu gu lu/ gu lA pa ya/ gu lA pa ya/ kra ma kra ma/ b+ha ga bAn bA yu be ge na/ 
37b4(rgyud): b+hU trAn shI g+h+na/ daH daha/ dar dar/ ba ha ba ha/ pa tsa patsa/ dam tha ma tha/ pA ta ya pA ta ya/ ma Ta ma Ta/ mo nA pa ya/ mo nA pa ya/ sarba kar+m+ma Ni/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hak+Sha ya b+hak+Sha ya/ a
37b5(rgyud): sde ma~M daM a s+ye ru d+hi ra mad dza me da/ bi shra mad dza/ ru d+hi ra/ pr-i ya e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn+da/ sarba big+h+nAn/ sarba man+t+ra Ni sarba mU la karmA Ni kr-i ti ma Ni/ sarba gra hA na/ ha na ha na/ b+han+d+ha b+hany+dza/ 
37b6(rgyud): mar da mar da/ i dam/ kaR+Sha sA d+ha ya/ hUM nI lA ya nI la badz+ra dat+tA ya/ tu ru tu ru/ big+h+nAn bi nA ya ka/ nA sha ya nA shA ye/ hu ru hu ru/ dip+pa tsaN+DA ya/ sarba sha trA na hr-i da yA ne pI Ta ya/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ 
37b7(rgyud): ba ra bid+yA nA ma/ ts+tshe da ka hU bid+mA nA ma shiSh+Ta ka/ sa ma ya a nu sma ra/ badz+ra d+ha ra bA tsa na tsa/ mar ma na~M krin+ta/ hU~M ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ paM tsa pa tsa/ ku ru ku ru/ tu ru tu ru/ hu ru hu ru/ paT
37b8(rgyud): phaT/ hU~M hU kr-i tan+t+ra ya/ de be re Shi bi dra ba ya ka/ ha na badz+ra danA na swA hA// khro bo chen po mchog gsungs ma thag tu bdud kyi ris thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams rab tu g.yos te sku
38a1(rgyud): gsum gyi mchog gtso rnam par snang mdzad dran par gyur to// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sbyor ba'i tshogs bskul na brgyartsa brgyad bzlas brjod bus pa tsam gyis mod/ 
38a2(rgyud): la khro bo chen pos gsod par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas bkod pa kun tu rnam par 'phro ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
38a3(rgyud): zhugs nas stobs po che rdo rje 'di sku gsum las phyung ngo // na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA/ oM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ u gra shU la pA Ni hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ oM dz+nyo ti nir nA da hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT/ 
38a4(rgyud): phaT/ oM ma hA ba lA ya swA hA// de nas khro bo gsungs dam gyis/ gdengs ka yos ni bskor ba kun// yid ni shin tu 'jigs skrag ste// rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad
38a5(rgyud): dran// gsang sngags rgyal po bzlas pa yis// las ku/ na rab tu grub par byed// char pa chen gcod 'gyur/ la// char pa chung na rab tu 'bebs// de nis bcom
38a6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis kun tu 'bar ba'i snying po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas khro bo chen po 'dod pa'i khro bo 'di rdo rje sku gsum rnams las phyung ngo // na maHsa man+ta
38a7(rgyud): bud+d+hA nAM/ Tak+ki hUM dzaHde nas khro bo gsungs pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu 'dar// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang skrag/ bdud kyi dpung rnams ltung bar gyur// 
38a8(rgyud): rkang g.yas sna tshogs rdo rje yi// sbyor bas mtshon ni mnan nas su// sku gsum ye shes stobs ldan pas// khro gnyer rim par gnyer byas te// gsang sngags kun gyis
38b1(rgyud): bkug nas su// sems can thams cad dbang du byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas rdo rje rab tu 'bar zhing 'phro ba'i ye shes rab tu
38b2(rgyud): 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje khro bo mi g.yo ba gtum po 'di rdo rje gsum rnams las phyung ngo // na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA/ a tsa la kA Na tsaN Da/ na Ta na Ta
38b3(rgyud): man+ta man+ta/ sar+b+ba san+na/ tan+na tan+t+ra/ tan ta na/ da tsad tu/ mo ha mo ha/ mo ha ka ra/ hA sa ha sa/ badz+ra hA sa ku ru/ hA sa hA sa/ ma ra ma ra Ta ma raT/ gar+b+he gar+dz+dza/ ha na ha na/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ 
38b4(rgyud): /  shes ldan pa la// rgyu d+h+yan/ ltung 'ang / bi g+h+nAn/ mAr ya ma y-i// \u0f7fk+Shag+hu/ sartan / ka/ re/ mahA 'am
38b5(rgyud): s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ye/ hU ts+tshats+tsha/ tri ba lI ta ra gan r+haka/ aM aM a/ hwA hAM hUM/ a tsa la tsa Ta/ s+pho Ta yi s+phoT/ ya/ hUM hUM/ a sa man+ta ka Ta Ta ma hA ba la sha ta ye/ par
38b6(rgyud): man+t+ran/ oM aM/ tsAhAM/ maM shud d+hA tu lo ka/ tuSh+Ta tu badz+ra/ na mo tu sku/ a pra ti ha ta ba le b+h+yaHdza lA ya/ traT/ a sa ha na maHswAhA// de nas khro bo maM g.yo ba// khro bo stobs chen 'di
38b7(rgyud): gsungs pa/ lha dang klu kun mngag gzhug byed gnod sbyin srin po lha ma yin/ 'jigs pa thob nas brgyal bar 'gyur// bdud kyi sde rnams lhung nas su// tshig cing rab tu zhum bzhin
38b8(rgyud): du gtso bo rdo rje snang mdzod dran// khro bo'i rgyal po du ma yis// bcug pas 'jigs pas nyin bzhin du// gtso bo rnam par snang mdzad nyid// sna tshogs las rnams myur du mdzad/ 
39a1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas sku gsum gyi ye shes rdo rje 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyis 'jigs pa chen po rdo rje zhes bya
39a2(rgyud): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rigs pa'i rgyal po chen po gnod mdzes 'di gsungs so// oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ g+h+raMh+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho/ 
39a3(rgyud): b+ha ga bAn/ bid+yA rA dza hUM phaT/ de nas khro bo 'di gsungs pas// lha yi bu mo thams cad ni// skra tshugs zhig cing gtsor bur gyur// mig rtse rig rig byed pa dag/ sku gsum rdo rje mchog
39a4(rgyud): mnga' ba'i// zhal gyis nu ma gnyis mnan pas// gabo rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad// ye shes kyis ni 'joms dran 'gyur// lcags kyu yis ni rnam dral te// rdo rje zhag
39a5(rgyud): pas bcings nas su// bu mo thams cad dgug bya ba// bu/ mo dgug pa'i mchog yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ye shes chen po rnam par bgyings pa'i dga'
39a6(rgyud): ba ston pa ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku gsum gyi mchog rdo rje 'chang bskyed par mdzad pa sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'di rjes su dran par mdzad do// 'khor lo che la rnam
39a7(rgyud): gnas nas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprin dag dang // de bzhin rdo rje 'chang ba'i sprin// rdo rje lcags kyu zhags thogs 'byin// kun mkhyen ye shes las byung gtso// gsang sngags skyes bur
39a8(rgyud): bdag bsgoms na// sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'gug byed na// rdo rje 'chang sogs ci zhig smos// bud med lha chen bu mo dag/ rlung la rkang pa bzhag nas su// lcags kyus snying la drangs nas ni/ 
39b1(rgyud): sems can kun yang 'gugs 'gyur te// 'di la dpyad pa cung zad med// rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad ni// sku chen zla ba'i kha dog yin// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// rdo rje bdud rtsi 'bebs
39b2(rgyud): bsam ste// lan grangs bcu ni brjod pa yis// de ni gdon mi za bar khugs// rdo rje dkyil 'khor las byung ba// rdo rje lcags kyu chen po yis// 'bar ba'i 'od zer 'phro ba yis// gzhon nu ma/ 
39b3(rgyud): dgo nges par 'gugs// rdo rje gsum 'khrugs khro bo ni// rdo rjes 'og gnas pa ste// lha ma yin kun nges sreg cing // lha min bu mo rjes chags pas// gsal shing gis ni bsgyel nas su// 
39b4(rgyud): rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa yis// drangs nas lha min bu mo'agugs// btsag dang thod lo kor dang ni// rab bla 'byor par gyur na ni// gzas zin chen khar bcug ste// rdzas rgyal rdo
39b5(rgyud): rje lcags kyus 'grub// drag po rlung dang khyab 'jug dang / lha mo gnod sbyin gnod sbyin ma// mngag gzhug bcas pa'i 'jigs skrag ste// ming bris kun nas rtag tu 'gugs
39b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'khor lor legs bzhugs te// 'jam pa'i rdo rjer rnam par sgom// khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed// lag na rdo rje lcags kyu thogs// khros shing 'bar ba 'phro ba yis// gnod
39b7(rgyud): sbyin bu mo bkug nas spyod// phyag rgya gsang sngags sbyor ba dang // bsam gtan 'khor lo sbyor ba yis// dgug par bya ba'i tshig gsungs pa// gzhan du byas na 'grub mi 'gyur// rgyal por
39b8(rgyud): zhabs drung kun gnas pas// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// kun gyis sems rab rdzogs byed pas// yang dang yang du bskul bar byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang ma
40a1(rgyud): chen pos rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas ye shes kyi rnam par rgyal ba'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje rgyal mo chen mo rnam pa/ 
40a2(rgyud): bsgyur mam ca sku gsum rnams las phyung ngo // oM shU li ni swAhA// de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// klu mo dbang chen grags pa dag/ gos dang bral zhing tshig bzhin du// gtso bo rnga rje/ 
40a3(rgyud): rnam snang dran// gsang sngags rig sngags 'di yis ni// klu rnams thams cad 'gugs par byed// bsam gtan rdo rje mthu dang ni// gsang sngags bzlas brjod byas pa yis// gser gdung
40a4(rgyud): rgyan ni gsol ba yi// klu mo'i mig yangs bkug nas ni// / 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas chags pa'i// klu mo nye b.rad spyod par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis na mkha'
40a5(rgyud): chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho 'phro ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting / nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas skul byed ma chen mo 'o gzungs kyi rig sngags chen po 'di gsungs so// na maH
40a6(rgyud): sa man+ta bud+d+hA nA/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ko TI nan/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsa le tsu lo tsun+de swA hA// de nas rig sngags che gsungs pas// sangs rgyas zhing rnams rab tu g.yos// byang chub sems dpa' rnams
40a7(rgyud): kyi lus// ting nge 'dzin las g.yos par gyur// bdud rnams brgyal zhing tshig nas su// thams cad cho nges 'debs par byed// sa yi 'og gi bu mo dang // lha min bu mo klu mo dang / 
40a8(rgyud): gsang dbang bu mo rnams 'khrugs nas// gtso bo rdo rje snang mdzad dran// rig sngags 'di ni bzlas pa dang // sgom pa yi ni sbyor ba yis// bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub 'gyur zhing // bkug
40b1(rgyud): nas rab tu longs spyod byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis na mkha' mdzod kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas chos bdud rtsi'i dam tshig gi rdo rje'i khro gnyer
40b2(rgyud): 'dir rdo rje sku gsum rnams las byung ngo // oM b+ha ya nA sha ni trA sa ni tra se trA sa ya/ bai ra Ti b+h+r-i ku Ti ti Ti/ bai Ta Ti bai Ti Ta/ shwe te shwe te/ dza Ta ni swA hA// de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// rig sngags
40b3(rgyud): 'chang dang lho rnams ni// g.yos shing 'jigs pa thob par gyur// bdud rnams 'jigs pas rnam 'khrugs te// gtso bo rdo rje rnam snang mdzad// yid gcig tu ni dran par byed// nor bu'i
40b4(rgyud): gdub rnams g.yo ba yis// rig sngags 'chang ma klu mo dar bcas// lha min bu mo gsang ba yi// bu mo bkug danas spyod par byed// 'dis ni las kun byed pa dang // mkha
40b5(rgyud): 'gro ma rnams 'jigs pa yin// yang na gsang sngagasams cad ni// skye bo med pa'i nags tshal du// sngag/ sa pas bye ba bzlas nas su// las rnams thams cad
40b6(rgyud): bya bar gsungs// gang gzhan slob dpon smod pa dang // theg pa chen po sun 'byin dang // mi gang gsang sngags rgyud dag gi/ sbyor ba la ni 'phya byed pa// de yis dngos grub thob mi 'gyur// 
40b7(rgyud): de ni rtag tu gdon gyis zin// bsgrims nas bsad par bya ba 'am// yang na lus ni gzhig par bya// sngags pas 'di ltar byas nas ni// byang chub dngos grub legs par 'thob// phyogs bcu'i
40b8(rgyud): sems can thams cad ni// sku gsum ye shes las byung ba'i// khyad par du ni bsgom par bya// dgra la 'di ni the tshom med// khrag 'thung chu yis brlan pa 'am// dur khrod thal ba 'am bsha
41a1(rgyud): gci yis// brlan pa'i gos ni bgos nas kyang // rkang pas mtshan ma mnan nas su// khro bo'i rgyal por sbyor byas te// gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na// sangs/ 
41a2(rgyud): rgyas kyang ni nges par 'jig/ chus brlan pa yi gos bgos te// khro bo'i mdun du bcings nas su// rkang pa g.yon pas mnan na ni// sangs rgyas nyid kyang nges par 'jig/ bshang gci yin
41a3(rgyud): ni lpags pa'i gos// rul ba'i dri can smad pa dag/ bgos nas gsang sngags bzlas brjod na// mod la 'chi ba'am bskams par 'gyur// dur khrod thal bas bsdus pa'i gos// bgos
41a4(rgyud): nas khro bo 'khrugs nas ni// lan grangs stong du brjod na ni/ rdo rje sems dpa'ang rnam par 'jig/ skra ni lhug par ba shig nas ni// kha bzhin rnam par bsgyur byas te// rkang
41a5(rgyud): pas mtshan ma mnan nas ni// na mkha'i khams kyang 'jig/ par 'gyur// ma mo'i gnas sam dur khrod dam// / khang stong 'am ni bzhi mdo'am// mtshan ma gcig pa
41a6(rgyud): 'am shing gcig tu// drag shul spyod pa brtsams par bya// de ya rkang rjes sa la ni// mi rus las byas phur bu drag/ so brgyad tsam gyi tshad tsam la// lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad brjod pa'i// 
41a7(rgyud): pur bu yis ni btab nas su// dgra yi khyim sgor brkos te gzhug/ sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog sbyin pa// shes dang mi shes spangs pa yang // zla phyed nya yi nang rol tu// 'ching ba'am
41a8(rgyud): yang na 'jig par 'gyur// mkhas pas thod pa yongs tshangs pa// khyad par can ni rnyed pa dang // de la gsang sngags tshig bris te// rdo rje tshig gis bzlas brjod nas// dgra yi sgo 'am yang
41b1(rgyud): na ni// grong du sbas na nges par spyod// ta la'i 'dab ma'am gzhan la'ang rung // khro bos gsang sngags legs bris te// dgra yi khyim 'am sgo kar ni// sbas na 'chi'am bskums par
41b2(rgyud): 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad chen pos bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsum rdo rje'i phur bu'i ye shes kyi rnga/ 
41b3(rgyud): rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te khams gsum thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i phur bu zhes bya ba 'di nyid sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung / 
41b4(rgyud): ngo // oM g+ha g+ha/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+TA na phaT phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ sarba pA paM phaT phaT/ hU hU hUM badz+ra kI la/ badz+ra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti/ kA ya bAka tsit+ta badz+ra/ kI la ya hU~M hUM/ 
41b5(rgyud): hUM phaT phaT/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// rdo rje dbang che/ na grags pa kun// brgyal nas 'jigs pa skyes rgyu ra te// rdo rje rnam snang mdzad pa dran// mi yi rus pa'i pu raM/ 
41b6(rgyud): bu'am// yang na seng ldeng las byung ba 'am// lcags las byas pa'i phur bus ni// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par 'jig/ rdo rje sems dpar mnyam gzhag ste// 'od bzang me stag 'khrug pa
41b7(rgyud): can/ sku gsum rdo rje mthas gtugs pas// gzugs brnyan pa ni bsams nas sbyar// rnam snang phyag rgya chen po 'am// yang na 'dod chags rdo rje can// phyag rgya chen po gshin rje gshed/ 
41b8(rgyud): 'dod pa'o khro bo nyid du ni// rdo rje phur bu bsam par bya// bdag nyid chen po stobs po che// bdud rtsi thab sbyor rdo rje dang // rdo rje yi ni rnal 'byor gyis// sdang dang gtum po bcad par bya// sangs rgyas
42a1(rgyud): bdag nyid chen po yang // thugs nas zhabs la thugs bar du// rdo rje phur bus rnam par bsgoms// rdo rje ting 'dzin sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par gnon
42a2(rgyud): 'di ni phur bu'i mthu rlabs te// steng 'og lha yi dam tshig yin// rgyal chen rdo rje sems dpa' dang // sangs rgyas thams cad gnon pa yi// ting 'dzin sbyor ba 'di yis ni// myur du 'chi'am
42a3(rgyud): bskams par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad chen pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i ye shes rnam par bsgyings pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge/ 
42a4(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje'i sku gnyis su med pa 'i dam tshig gi phur bu'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyi rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo // oM ts+tshan+da ts+tshin+da/ 
42a5(rgyud): ha ra ha ra/ dip+ta badz+ra tsakra hU~M phaT/ phan tshun bzlas pa'itshul gyis ni// mthe bo'i ngos kyi drung du bdugs/ snang mdzad zhabs kyis mnan nas su// rdo rje phur bus gdang / 
42a6(rgyud): par bya// btab pa tsam gyis sems dpa' che// sku gsum ye shes las byung ba// dam tshig mchog gi bzhengs par mdzad// gzhan du byas na brlag par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan
42a7(rgyud): 'das kyis rdo rje'i thugs kyi ye shes chen po rnam par bsgyings pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig chen po'i stang stabs kyi phur bu zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags 'di
42a8(rgyud): nyid kyi rdo rje sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams las phyung ngo // oM badz+ra rA dzA hUM// rtse mo lnga pa bcings nas su// me stag 'phro ba bsgoms byas te// rdo rje thugs kyis zhabs kyis mnan// rdo rje/ 
42b1(rgyud): phur bus gdab par bya// btab pa tsam gyis rgyal po che// sku gsum ye shes las byung ba// dam tshig mchog gis bzhes mdzad de// gzhan du byas na brlag par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan
42b2(rgyud): 'das kyis 'jig rten dbang phyug gi dam tshig mchog rnam par bsgyings pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gsung gi dam tshig gi stang stabs kyi phur bu'i gsang sngags 'di
42b3(rgyud): nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las byung ngo // oM traM oM b+hur+b+hu baHrdo rje sor mo bcum pa yis// pad+ma kha bye 'bar ba yis// 'dod chags rdo rje zhabs kyis mnan// rdo rje phur bus
42b4(rgyud): nges par gdab// btab pa tsam gyis rgyal po che// skug de sum ye shes las byung ba// dam tshig mchog gis pa da zhengs par mdzod// gzhan du byas na brlag par 'gyur/ 
42b5(rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyis chags pa yin// cho ga bzangs/ tsam gyis ni// rdo rje mkha' dbyings mthas gtugs / mnan 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// ces bcom ldan 'das
42b6(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad kyis rdo rje phur bu'i tshig rnams bka' stsal to// de nas sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog/ sems can khams la phan bzhed rnams// dgyes shing mgu ba brnyes nas su/ 
42b7(rgyud): rdo rje dbyings kyis 'di skad gsungs// kye ma'o gsang ba'i tshig gi mchog/ kye ma'o gsang ba kun 'dus pa// kye ma'o zhi ba chos kyi tshig/ ye shes rdo rje phur bu rmad// gsang sngags kun gyi phur
42b8(rgyud): bus 'di// bde gshegs bka' yi rjes su byed// 'di dag sangs rgyas kun gyi ste// phur bu de nyid rnams las byung // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chom rkun thams cad mdongs par byed pa'i
43a1(rgyud): rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo 'od zer ca gsungs so// oM mA ri ts+yai de ba tA ye swAhA// rig sngags gsungs pa
43a2(rgyud): mod la ni// dbang chen grags pa'i sangs rgyas kun// thugs ni dgyes shing mgu bar gyur// sras rnams kyi ni spyan yang phye// 'di ni las rnams thams cad ma// chom rkun sdang ba 'ching mdzad
43a3(rgyud): mdza/ 'di yi sbyor ba la gnas na// 'gro ba'i tshe na mthong mi 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas sdang ba thams cad rnam par 'joms
43a4(rgyud): pa sems can thams cad sgrol bar byed pa'i ye shes chen po nga'i stobs kyis rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin da la snyoms par zhugs nas stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i/ 
43a5(rgyud): rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di gsungs so// oM ma hA sa hA sa? pa mdzan par sid+d+hi da mI ge ma Ni badz+ra Na~M hU~M phaT swAhA/ de nas rig sngags che gsungs pas// sangs rgyas zhing
43a6(rgyud): rnams rab tu g.yos// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang // bdud kyi ris rnams g.yos par gyur// gtso bo rdo rje snang mdzad pa// thams cad tshig bzhin btud nas su// bcom ldan ra/ 
43a7(rgyud): sngags mthu stobs kyis// gnod bgyid thams cad gzir lags so// gang ni rig sngags stobs mo che// pha rol gnod pa 'di bzlos pa// der ni bdag cag mi mchi zhing // der ni srung ba dag
43a8(rgyud): kyang bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas brgya byin mngon par mtho ba'i stobs lha ma yin rnam par 'joms pas rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje nas
43b1(rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi gzungs chen po 'di gsungs so// oM b+ha ga ba tI d+h+wa dzA gra ke su re pa ra saM n+ya/ bi d+ha nas na ka sa saM n+ya pa ri la ni/ u lU ka mu khi/ 
43b2(rgyud): kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ pa ra s+yen+t+ra ma/ a nan+ta b+hu dze/ a nan ta mu kheH5\u0f7fhUM phaT phaT swA hA// de nas rig sngags che gsungs pas// sangs rgyas zhing rnams g.yos par gyur// byang chub sems dpa'
43b3(rgyud): rab g.yos shing // bdud kyi sde rnams tshig par gyur// gnod sbyin srin po gos bral nas// 'jigs shing skrag par gyur pa yis// gtso bo rdo rje rnam snang dran// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags
43b4(rgyud): kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis tshig lags te/ bdag cag dmatshig la gnas par 'tshal lags na mgon mdzad cing lus nga thams cad rab tu bsgrub tu gsol// de nas bcom ldan
43b5(rgyud): 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa sa mngal thams cad yang dag par skyes pas khyab pa'i/ rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig
43b6(rgyud): sngags kyi rgyal mo so so 'brang ma 'di gsungs so// oM ma Ni d+ha re badz+ra Ni ma hA pra ti sa re swA hA// rig sngags chen mo gsungs pa dang // rig sngags rgyal mo'i mthu yis ni// mi yi skye dgu 'tshe
43b7(rgyud): byed pa// mthu tshon mngal ni 'phrog pa dang // log 'dren kun dang sdang ba'i rnams// mi bzad me lces tshig gyur nas// 'jigs pa dang ni skrag pa yis// rdo rje snang mdzad drung lpags te/ 
43b8(rgyud): zhabs la gtugs te tshig smras pa// bdag cag dam tshig gnas par 'tshal// rig sngags dam tshig rtag gnas pa// gang gis mngal yang mi 'phrog cing // rtag tu mngal ni spel bar mdzad// de na
44a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas nor gyi rgyun gyi yang dag par 'dzin pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig sngag/ 
44a2(rgyud): kyi rgyal mo chen mo nor rgyun 'di gsungs so// oM ba su d+hA ri ma hA ba su d+ha ra br-iSh+Ta ni pA ta ni ba su swA hA// nor gyi rgyun ces bya ba yi// rig sngags gsungs pa'i mod la ni// bgegs dang log 'dren thams/ 
44a3(rgyud): cad dag/ yid ni 'jigs shing skrag gyur nas// rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad kyi// drung du nye bar 'ongs nas su// dam bcas pa yi tshig smras pa// bcom ldan nor rgyun ces bya ba'i// mtshan ni mi
44a4(rgyud): mchog sgrogs bgyid na// de la nor gyi char 'bab cing // nor da chen dang ni ldan par bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sa gnod par byed pa thams cad 'dul ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
44a5(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas srin mo glog 'bar ma bsgyur ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so// a re du tre ni pra ku pa ta tsaN+De/ ma hA be ga d+ha ri b+hid d+h+r-i dzi tre/ ma ho da r-i/ 
44a6(rgyud): drikra pA la ma la d+hA ri Ni dza Ta ma kuM Ta/ man+ti te/ na nA pra ha ra Na/ d+ha ri hUM hUM phaT phaT/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya ma nu sma raM/ ku ru ku ru/ hU hU/ pra ma d+ha ma/ sarba sha tAr+N+Na/ sho ni ta bi ba/ pra tsaN+De/ be
44a7(rgyud): d+ha ri/ pa tsa ta pa tsi ta/ bi ki ra ta sa ta ya hU~M/ da ha da he/ sarba sha tru/ sarba duSh+TAn/ ni krin+ta/ pra sA da ya hUM/ ma hA b+ha ga ba te/ dz+wa la dz+wa la hUM phaT/ che ge mo zhig me ba sha mA nA ya swA hA// de nas srin mo
44a8(rgyud): 'bar ba'i klog/ rig sngags chen mo gsungs pa yis// bdud kyi gnas rnams tshig par gyur// dgra rnams kyi ni snying yang bskams// dur khrod kyi ras la srin mo btsag gis bris nas
44b1(rgyud): legs par spras te gu gul gyi bdug pas sreg cing brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ me tog dmar po dang / dri dmar po dang / gtor ma dang lha bshos dmar por byas pa byin nas dur khrod
44b2(rgyud): du brko bar bya'o// de'i steng du ming nas smos shing brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa'i yungs kar gyis gtor to// brkos pa'i mod la phyir rgol ba dang dgra thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro// 
44b3(rgyud): mnan pa dang rmongs par byas par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phrog ma'i dga' ston gnod sbyin mo'i tshogs dga' bar byed pa'i dngos grub kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin snyoms
44b4(rgyud): par zhugs nas rdo rje chen po 'phrog ma'i gsang sngags 'di ga sungs so// oM hA ri t+yai ma hA yak+Shi NA~M ye/ ha ra ha ra/  sarba yak+Shi NI pra be sha ni swA hA// de nas 'phrog dga'i 'phrog/ 
44b5(rgyud): ma ni// gnod sbyin chen mo gsungs pa dang // gnod sbyin/ ma kun g.yos nas su// dngos grub phyir ni mngon phye/ gas gyur// khro mo'i 'khor lo gnod sbyin ma// brgyad
44b6(rgyud): dbus 'phrog mas rgyan byas te// lcags kyu 'bras bu ni la can// gnod sbyin brgyad kyis klubs nas su// gnod sbyin ma kun bsgrub par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nad chen po
44b7(rgyud): thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas mi ngas chen po zhi bar mdzad pa'i rig sngags ri khrod kyi shing lo can ma 'di gsungs so// oM pi shwa
44b8(rgyud): ci par+Na sha ba ri sar+b+ba mA ra pra sha ma ni hUM phaT/ de nas rig sngags che gsungs pas// sangs rgyas zhing rnams rab tu g.yos// gnod byed nad 'gro srin po dang // sdang ba rnams kyi snying yang
45a1(rgyud): zags// yam shing 'o ma can dang til// 'o mas du bzhi par 'gyur// namakhar kun nas rig sngags kyi// rgyal mos legs par bkang nas su// bdud rtsi char
45a2(rgyud): 'bebs bsams na ni// mod la gnod pa zhi bar 'gyur// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyur 'phrul dra ba las 'di ni gsang sngags kyi ye shes rnam par bsgyings pa rim par phye ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / 
45a3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sku gsum ye shes kyi rdo rje las yang dag par byung ba lag pa'i phyag rgya tha/ 
45a4(rgyud): dad pa rnams mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems kyis nyon cig// gang zhig bcings pa tsam gyis ni// sdig pa kun las rnam grol zhing // 'di ni lus ni byin rlabs te// rang gi gzugs
45a5(rgyud): su rnam bsgoms na// sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// lag pa gnyi/ sa khu tshur bcangs pa las mtho bo gnyis bteg pa ni de
45a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i ste// sku byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las g.yon pa'i mthe bo nang du bcug ste g.yas pa'i mtho bo bteg pa ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ste gsung byin gyis brlas
45a7(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las g.yas pa'i mthe bo nang du bcug ste g.yon pa'i mthe bo bteg pa ni rdo rje 'chang gi ste// thugs byin gyis brlag pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcings pa las
45a8(rgyud): g.yon pa'i 'dzub mo bsgreng ba'i thor to g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis bzung ba ni rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i phyag rgya'o// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du 'dug nas lag pa g.yon pa pang par bzhag ste/ 
45b1(rgyud): g.yas pas la gnon pa ni mi 'khrugs pa'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las g.yas pa mchog sbyin par byas pa ni rin chen 'byung gnas kyi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las lag pa gnyis bsam gtan gyi
45b2(rgyud): tshul du byas pa ni 'od dpag med kyi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las g.yas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin par byas pa ni gdon mi za bar grub pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis rdo rje bcing bar byas gung mo bshi bra
45b3(rgyud): te sgreng ba ni rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las gung mo'i tshogs dang po bkug ste/ rin po che'i tshul du byas pa ni rdo rje rin chen ma'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las gung mo pad+ma'i 'dab ma ltar gdub
45b4(rgyud): bu'i tshul du byas pa ni rdo rje chos ma'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid la das gung mo nang du bskum pa ni rdo rje las ma'i phyag rgya'o// de lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba las mdzub mo
45b5(rgyud): gnyis gdub bu ltar byas te mthe bo'i rtse mor mig gi tshul du byas pa ni sangs rgyas spyan gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bcings pa las gung mo sgreng ba'i tshig gsum par mdzub mo gnyis
45b6(rgyud): rdo rje'i tshul du bzung ba ni mA ma kI'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar te pad+ma kha bye ba'i tshul du byas pa ni gos dkar can gyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar
45b7(rgyud): ba las mdzub mo gnyis bkug pas gung mo'i sen mo mnan te mthe bo gnyis dbus su bzhag nas cung zad bkug pa ni sgrol ma'i ud pa la'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar te/ mdzub
45b8(rgyud): mo dang gung mo'i tshigs dbu mar gdub bu'i tshul du byas nas mthe bo gnyis glor bzhag pa 'di ni bskul byed ma'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'o// de nas rdo rje bcings pa byas pa las mdzub mo gnyis mtha
46a1(rgyud): bo'i rtse mor bkug pa 'di ni rin chen sgrol ma'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis brkyang ste mthe bos so so'i mthe'u chung gis sen mo mnan nas lhag ma rdo rje'i mtshan nyid du byas pa 'dzin
46a2(rgyud): khro gnyer can ma'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis so sor khur tshur bcangs pa las mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud ltar bcings pa 'di ni rdo rje lugu rgyud kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis khu chur
46a3(rgyud): bcangs pa las gung mo dang srin lag gnyis bsgrengs te rtse mo'i tshul du byas la gung mo'i rgyab du srin lag bsnol la/ mdzub mo gnyis gdub bu'i tshul du byas pas dkris pas mthe bo gnyis mdun du
46a4(rgyud): bzhag pa las cung zad bkug te kha'i tshul du byas pa 'di ni gshi don rje gshed kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las khro bo'i mdzub mo snying kar gzhag ste/ 
46a5(rgyud): lag pa g.yas pa thal lcag gi tshul du byas pa ni khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis la the'u chung lu gu rgyud ltar mdud la mdzub mo gzhibs te sgreng pa
46a6(rgyud): las bzlog ste dpral bar gzhag pa ni rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bos srin lag dang / mthe'u chung gnyis kyi sen mo mnan la ral gri shubs nas dbyung ba'i tshul du byas
46a7(rgyud): pa ni 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcas pa las rgyab sprad de mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud ltar bcings nas mdzub mo gnyis bsgrengs pa las zhags pa'i
46a8(rgyud): tshul du byas pa ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdzub mo snying kar bzhag la/ g.yas pa khro bo'i sor mo be con gyi tshul du phyar ba ni/ be con sngon po
46b1(rgyud): can gyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje snying kar bzhag la g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur rdeg stangs dang bcas par byar ba ni stobs po che'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis so sor khu tshur bcangs/ 
46b2(rgyud): la/ mdzub mo dang gung mo bsgrengs te sprad nas me tog gi tshul du byas pa ni byams pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis kyis srin lag gnyis kyi sen mo
46b3(rgyud): mnan nas/ ud pal la kha bye ba'i tshul du bzhag pa ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa pang par bzhag pa/ lag pa g.yas pa glang po che'i sna ltar byas pa ni spos kyi glang
46b4(rgyud): po'i phyag rgya'o// g.yon pas rdo rje khu tshur na mkha' la sgreng ba lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mor ba dan gyi tshul du byas nga pa ni ye shes tog gi phyag rgya'o// bzang po'i 'dug stangs
46b5(rgyud): su 'dug ste/ thal mo khong stong du sbyar te snying kar bzhag/ pa ni bzang skyong gi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis chu rlabs kyi tshul du brkyang ba las sor mo rnams chu rlabs drang ba
46b6(rgyud): ni blo gros rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur snying kar bzhag la g.yas pa mchog sbyin pa ni blo gros mi zad pa'i phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur pang du bzhag la/ g.yas pa
46b7(rgyud): se gol gtogs pa'i tshul du byas pa ni spobs pa brtsegs pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis pad+ma cung zad kha bye ba ltar byas pa ni mthu chen thob kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis me tog
46b8(rgyud): 'dor ba'i tshul du byas pa ni ngan song thams cad spong ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba las bsnun pa'i tshul du byas pa ni mya ngan thams cad kyi mun pa nges par 'joms
47a1(rgyud): pa'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis brkyang nas 'phro ba'i tshul du byas pa ni dra ba can gyi 'od kyi phyag rgya'o// g.yas pa mchog sbyin par byas la g.yon pa zla ba'i
47a2(rgyud): tshul du byas pa ni zla 'od kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis bum pa'i tshul du byas nas dbang bskur ba ni 'od dpag med kyi phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur byas la g.yas pa'i khu tshur na mkha'
47a3(rgyud): la kun tu bskor ba'i tshul du byas pa ni na mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa sa la brkyang nas lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo dang mthe bo sprad nas zhi ba'i tshul du byas pa ni sgrib pa thams cad nges
47a4(rgyud): par sel ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur las khro bo 'i mdzub mo snying kar bzhag la hUM zhes bya zhing / lag pa g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur rdeg stangs dang bcas par phyar ba ni
47a5(rgyud): ri khrod lo ma can gyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa sor mo brkyang ba las mdzub mo dang mthe bo skam pas 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas lalag pa g.yas pa khab kyi tshul gyis 'tshe
47a6(rgyud): bar byed pa rnams kyi kha mig 'drub pa ni 'od zer can ma'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis spyi bor sbrul mgo gdengs ka'i gdugs ltar byas nas phud ces brjod pa ni dug sel ma'i phyag rgya'o// 'dod
47a7(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po'i phyag gnyis sgreng ba ni rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las g.yas pa'i khro bo'i lcags kyu yis dza zhes byas pas dgug pa ni rdo rje khro bo lcags kyus dgug pa ste/ de bzhin ga/ 
47a8(rgyud): pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa ste rdo rje khro bo lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mthe'u chung mche ba'i tshul du byas pa las bsnol te 'gram pa gnyis su gzhag la/ lce ljib cing khro bo
47b1(rgyud): lta bas blta bar bya ba ni rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mthe'u chung gnyis bskum// mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul du byas nas kha'i grwar bzhag ste hUM zhes bya zhing khro ba'i lta sa#
47b2(rgyud): ba ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste bsnol nas gyen du bteg pa ltar byas pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'o// de nyid
47b3(rgyud): las khrig ma gnyis bsnol te bstod cing bteg pa ni sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bsnol nas mtshan khung du bsnams te khro bo'i lta bas 'gyur ba dang bcas pa ni gdon thams
47b4(rgyud): cad skrag par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon brkyang / da ste kha sbub pa la de'i steng du g.yas pa bzhag nas lag pa gnyis kyis sor mo bskyod pa ni lha ma yin gyi sgyu dang 'khrul 'khor
47b5(rgyud): 'byed pa dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo smrar gzhug pa'i phyag rgya'o// / lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud ltar bcings te bzhag la/ lhag ma bden rtse gsum pa'i
47b6(rgyud): tshul du byas nas stang stabs dang bcas par hUM zhes bya ba ni khro bo rdo rjes 'og gi phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi khro bo'i mdzub mos bsdigs pa ni rdo rje bdag mo'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje
47b7(rgyud): bcings pa las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste phur bu'i tshul du byas pa ni rdo rje phur bu'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur brdung ba'i tshul du byas pa ni rdo rje tho ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa
47b8(rgyud): gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste rdo rje mdud pa dor ba'i tshul du byas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje bcing ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis kyi rdo rje
48a1(rgyud): khu tshur bcangs te sog le drang ba'i tshul du byas pa ni rdo rje sog le'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis thal mo zla ba'i tshul du byas te gdong g.yog cing brkyang la khro bo'i mig/ 
48a2(rgyud): du byas nas a la la zhes bya ba ni rdo rje srin mo'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis lu gu rgyud du bcings pa la mdzub mo dang mthe bo gnyis pad+ma'i tshul du byas pa ni sprin thams cad gtub pa'i char pa'i phyag
48a3(rgyud): rgya'o// lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las mdzub mo gnyis gdub bu ltar byas te skam pa'i tshul du dpung pa brkyang ba ni 'khrul 'khor gyi phur ba dbyung ba'i skam pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa
48a4(rgyud): gnyis kyi mthe'o lag mthil du bzhag ste/ lhag ma rnams da'adab ma ltar g.yab cing rkang pa ya gtsigs la btsugs ngal/ gcig rgyab du bskums nas khro mo lta bas lce ljib cing
48a5(rgyud): hUM phaT ces bya bas rim gyis bskyod pa ni rdo rje na mkha' lding / gi phyag rgya'o// 'di bcings pa tsam gyis khams gsum khyab pa'i dug kyang skad cig gi sel bar byed do// 
48a6(rgyud): rdo rje khu tshur gnyis mda' gzhu dag gi tshul gyis phyogs bzhir mda' bkang ste 'phangs pas pha rol dpung gzhig pa ni mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje mda' phyag rgya'o// khu tshur gnyis las gu
48a7(rgyud): mo gzhibs te sgreng ba las rin po che'i tshul du bkug la mthe bo brkyang ba'i steng du mdzub mo gnyis gdub bu'i tshul du byas pa ni sangs rgyas 'khor lo can gyi phyag rgya g.yul las sgrol bar
48a8(rgyud): byed pa'o// lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bos sor mo mnan te gung mo sgreng la g.yas pas pad+ma kha 'byed pa'i tshul du byas pa ni ha la ha la'i phyag rgya'o// khu tshur gnyis kyis mthe'u chung gnyis
48b1(rgyud): dkris la mdzub mo gnyis gzhibs te bsgrengs nas bzlog la dpral bar bzhag pa ni rdo rje khrag 'thung gi phyag rgya ste/ dur khrod du 'jug pa namakhar 'gro ma rnams 'jigs par byed pa'o// g.yon/ 
48b2(rgyud): pas thod pa gzung la g.yas pas mdung rtse gsum pa thogs nas ral bcings te zla bas rgyan cing mtshan sbrang la/ mig gsum pa gar byed pa ni gar thabs kyi phyag rgya ste/ 'di ni bde byed kyi phyag
48b3(rgyud): rgya'o// g.yon pa mi 'jigs par byas pa las sor mo rnams cung zad phye ste mthe bo lag mthil du bzhag/ de bzhin du g.yas pa'i khu tshur dbyug to 'dzin pa ltar byas pa ni khyab 'jug gi phyag rgya
48b4(rgyud): lag pa gnyis brkyang nas pad+ma'i tshul du byas pa ni tshangs 'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong dus+thA dar te me tog ltar byas pa ni ma mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o// rdorje
48b5(rgyud): khu tshur gnyis kyi ni// rgyab tu mdud pa ltar 'dor zhing / rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa'i// rin chen cod pan pring dbang bskur// ting 'dzin gnas pas 'khor lo can/ 
48b6(rgyud): 'khor lo mnga' ba'i lha rnams la// sangs rgyas sa ni rab 'gyengs pa'i// gsang ba'i mchod pa 'byung bar bsam// 'gyur zhing cung zad 'jo tshul can// sgeg mo yi ni phyag rgya yis// gar gyi
48b7(rgyud): tshul du bkod nas kyang // hUM zhes bya ba glur blangs shing // de nas sangs rgyas kun dgyes pa// rdo rje rgyud ni sbreng bar bya// de nas phreng tshul phreng ba yis// lha rnams kun la bcing bar bya// 'jo
48b8(rgyud): sgeg thabs la spro ba yis// lag gnyis bskor zhing dgrol ba dang // g.yas nas g.yon du bskor ba yis// gar thabs byas la mgo la bzhag/ me tog dbul ba'i tshul du ni// gang gi
49a1(rgyud): me tog thal mo sbyar// bdug spos rtse mo sbyar ba yis// gung mo gnyis ni bzlog te sbreng // bskor zhing bsgyur ba byas pa yis// mtheb gnyis mar me'i tshul du
49a2(rgyud): bzhag/ dung gi tshul du lag bsgyur nas// dung phor lta bur mchod yon dbul// de nas lha rnams kun la yang // lag pa'i gar gyis byug tshul bya// de nas sil snyan tshul gyis su// lag
49a3(rgyud): gnyis sil snyan lags par brdung // dung dang gling bu bud pa dang // lag pa gnyis ni rnga yab g.yog// bsil yab tshul gyis bsil yab dang // sor mo gnyis kyis rgyal mtshan bya// tshon
49a4(rgyud): dgye tshe na lcug phran ltar// bskyod cing tshon gyi phreng ba dgye// lag g.yon snod kyi tshul byas la// g.yas pa yis ni dalha bshos dbul// khang pa brtsegs pa bzhag nas su/ 
49a5(rgyud): gos kyi tshul gyis gos rnams dang // gdub bu ska rags rkang rgyan dang // rna cha do shal sna lnga bzhag/ de nas ga dugs kyi tshul gyis su// lha rdzas gdugs ni lags par
49a6(rgyud): gzugs// bsam gtan tshul gyi lag pa dag/ na mkha' la ni mdzes bskor na// sangs rgyas zhing rab 'gengs byed pa'i// bla re rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyur// grwar ni pad+ma'i phreng ba dang // dril bu
49a7(rgyud): g.yer ka'i dra bas rgyan// gsang sngags 'di ni cho ga bzhin// rdo rje dril bu bsil ba yis// sgo 'phar dag kyang dbye bar bya// oM badz+ra g+haN+Da ra Ni ta/ pra ra Ni ta/ saM pra ra Ni ta/ sar+b+ba bud+d+ha k+She tra/ pra tsa li
49a8(rgyud): re/ pradrA pA ra mi tA/ nadas b+hA be badz+ra d+harma hr-id las n+to da Ni shUd+hU hUM// lag g.yas rdo rje gsor bya zhing // sna tshogs khugs su 'gyur ba yi// rdo rje glu yis bstod pa bya// rdo rje theg pas mnyes
49b1(rgyud): byed pa// 'di ni don dam mchod pa yin// gang gis rnam rtog rnam spangs te// byang chub sems ni rnam bsgoms pas// lus ngag sems ni rnam dag pa// de yi mchod pa bla na med// sems
49b2(rgyud): can gang gis dbu ma yi// theg pa gong ma ma bsgoms shing // theg pa dman pa lhag mos pa// de yi mchod pa kun rdzob pa// sangs rgyas dbang chen grags kun gyis// mchod pa de dag
49b3(rgyud): gsan pa dang // ngo mtshar byung ba'i spyan phye nas// legs so zhes ni rab tu gsungs// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// byang chub sangs rgyas thabasu ste// rdo rje bsgom pa byas pa yis/ 
49b4(rgyud): nyon mongs med par byang chub 'thob// rdo rje theg chen leg/ des pa ste// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa legs/ dazab cing rgya che legs pa ste// rdo rje rin chen kun 'dus legs// 
49b5(rgyud): de nas ye shes kyi sku gsum las byung ba'i byang chub sems dang pa' de dag gis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje theg pa bsdu gas pa thos nas// dga' bas spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas/ 
49b6(rgyud): gtso bo rdo rje snang mdzad la// dga' ba'i yid kyis bstod par byed// thog ma med cing skye ba med// 'gyur ba med cing gnas pa med// mkha' bzhin rnam rtog las grol ba// rtog pa rnams kyis
49b7(rgyud): rnam par brtags// thabs su brtags pa gang yin des// ye shes kyi ni sras po kun// rdo rje theg pa bsgoms pa yis// sangs rgyas sa yang thob par 'gyur zhes smras so// bde ba las
49b8(rgyud): 'khrungs rdo rje 'chang ba yis// dngos po dngos med 'byung gnas chen por mkhyen// dang po gang du rnam par snang mdzad ni// dag cing dri med blos ni oM du sprul// gzugs mang tshul gyis phreng bas
50a1(rgyud): bskor ba yi// sgyu 'phrul drang khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gsung snyan yi ge kun la khyab pa yi// spos med gsung du 'jig rten dbang phyug bzhugs// mig gsum lha mo
50a2(rgyud): dang bcas 'dul mdzad pa// sgyu 'phrul tshul mang ldan pa 'ga' ma mchis// gang du bde chen rang bzhin rjes chags pa// na chung dag dang lhan cig bzhad mdzad cing // g.yas pa'i phyag gis rnga/ 
50a3(rgyud): rje gsor nas su// g.yon pa'i phyag gis dril bu sgra snyan 'khrol// lha mo mtha' dag btsun mor gyur pa yi// dam tshig rnams kyis bya ba byas par 'gyur// gcig gi lag pas kun nas
50a4(rgyud): 'khyud pa ste// gnyis pa rjes su chags phyir bde ba'i mthu// gsum pa mi bzod me tog phreng ba 'thor// bzhi pa bde da ba yis ni mda' yang 'phen// gang zhig glu 'di len par byed
50a5(rgyud): pa dag/ bde ba'i rdo rje can dang mnyam par 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje'i glu yi na no// oM a nut+ta ra sarba pU dza me g+ha ud ga te/ s+pha ra Na
50a6(rgyud): i ma ga ga na khaM hUM phaT swAhA// 'di lan gsum brjod pas mchod pa'i sprin rab 'byam thams cad byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'di ni phyag rgya'i
50a7(rgyud): mchod pa rim par phye ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po sku dang thugs rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems
50a8(rgyud): dpa' thams cad kyis tshig 'thun par sgra dbyangs gcig gis gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs kun gyi// ye shes gces pa dri med pa// byang chub sems ni rin po che// bla na
50b1(rgyud): med pa bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab par thugs su chud nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
50b2(rgyud): sems ni lus kyi rnam yin la// lus kyang sems kyi rnam pa yin// sems kyang tshig gis brjod pa yin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad len
50b3(rgyud): gsung dang thugs kyi rnam par sbyor ba thos nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma kun tu bzang po ni// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// chos rnams skye ba med pa ste// g.yo ba med cing
50b4(rgyud): gnas pa med// rtog pa'i dri ma spangs pa 'di// bskyed pa/ dbya zhes rab tu gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bani na gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas gsung spros pa med pa'i
50b5(rgyud): rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dngos po 'di dag ma smras te// chos can med cing chos nyid med// nam pa
50b6(rgyud): bzhin du dmigs med pa'i// byang chub sems 'di brtan pa yin zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
50b7(rgyud): pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dngos po 'di dag
50b8(rgyud): dngos med de// chos kyi mtshan nyid spangs pa yin// bdag med chos las legs byung ba'i// byang chub sems 'di brtan pa yin zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gis
51a1(rgyud): gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis rdo rje me lce 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sem/ 
51a2(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// / dngos po skye ba med pa ste// dngos po ngo bo yod min pas// na mkha'i go 'phang thob po zhes// dngos rnams rab tu brjod pa yin zhes bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag
51a3(rgyud): med kyis gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla ma'i yang bla ma ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
51a4(rgyud): par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// bzod nas dag cing rnyed pa med// sems can med cing srog kyang med// sangs
51a5(rgyud): rgyas nyid dang byang chub med// rmi lam sgyu ma ltar snang ba'i// byang chub sems 'di bstan pa yin zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub kyis gsungs so// 
51a6(rgyud): de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi sems rnam par/ 
51a7(rgyud): dag pa mthong nas ngo mtshar skyes par gyur te ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// kye ma'o sangs rgyas kye ma'o// kye ma'o chos ni bstan pa rnams// bdag med chos las/ legs byung ba// byang chub sems
51a8(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems ni sgom pa yis// migayo yi ge las byung ba// rmi lam sogs ltar ma skyes pa// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// gnas dang stan ni rnam bsams te/ 
51b1(rgyud): sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas// dang por rang bzhin dag pa'o zhes// dag pa'i chos kyi tshul la gnas// yid kyis rku byas rdo rje can// rdo rje sems mas byin gyis brlabs// rin chen lus
51b2(rgyud): sung rgyal bya// lag pa bstod de bskor ba yi// lcags kyu yis ni spyan yang drang // byon nas dang por phyogs bcings te// dam tshig yang dag dbul bar bya// gdan rnams so sor phul nas
51b3(rgyud): su/ mchod yon dbul ba'i sbyor ba byas// dbang bskur mtshon cha go cha sogs// sil snyan mchod sogs ngo bo bya// rnam pa kun gyis mnyes par bya// rnal 'byor bdag nyid can gyis brtag
51b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor rnam gsum shes bya ste// byin gyis brlabs dang yongs brtags dang // gzugs gnyis rdzogs par / dar pa ni// rnal 'byor yin zhes sangs rgyas gsungs/ 
51b5(rgyud): sngags kyis byin rlabs nga rgyal bskyed// rnal 'byor byin rlang / sa yin par gsungs// byang chub sems ni dag pa dang // gsang sngags sa byon bskyed pa che// phyag rgya'i chog su/ 
51b6(rgyud): bsngags pa yin// rims kyis gzugs ni rdzogs byas pa// de ni brtag par brjod pa ste// rnal 'byor cho ga yin par gsungs so// bsdu dang spro bar byas pa las// rnam pa'i mchog kun
51b7(rgyud): ldan pa dag/ skad cig ye shes kyis rdzogs pa// rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes brjod do// dang por dam tshig byin rlabs par// rnal 'byor spyod pa bdag gis brtags// rab tu rdzogs par
51b8(rgyud): bya ba dag/ 'di ni rnal 'byor cho gar bshad// nyon mongs dri mar byas pa'i sems// byang chub sems kyis dag byas te// de ni rang bzhin dag pa'o zhes// brjod cing thal mo gsum gyis sbyang / 
52a1(rgyud): ngag gyur de nas blo yis ni// sems la so sor brtag par bya// sems la so sor brtags nas kyang // phyi rol rang bzhin stong par bya// sems tsam la ni gnas nas su
52a2(rgyud): byang chub tshegs kyi bag chags des// sgom par bya ba'i ngo bo dag/ zla ba'i gzugs su rnam par brtag/ lag pa'i pad+ma la gnas pa'i// oM gyi myu gus bskrun pa yis// yan lag kun gyi
52a3(rgyud): mtshan nyid gzugs// rdo rje skur ni bsgom par bya// AHzhes bya ba spros med gsung // sems ni hUM zhes bya bar sprul// yi ge gsum gyis byin rlabs lus// snying la gnas pa'i zla ba'i
52a4(rgyud): gzugs// de la rang gi yi ge ni// mdog gzugs 'od da ni byed bsams te// nga rgyal bskyed nas de la ni// rdo rje'i dbadag nyid bdag yin brjod// rgyan kun yongs su rdzogs pa/ 
52a5(rgyud): dang // 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rgyan pa// cha shas kyi ni drwa ba can// ye shes sems dpa' rdzogs par brtagade 'og lag pa'i phyag rgya yis// go cha mtshon cha la sogs bya// 
52a6(rgyud): rdzogs sangs rgyas lngar dbang bskur te// cod pan phreng ba rnams kyis klubs// de nas de 'og sangs rgyas kyi// sprul pa mdzad pa'i sgyu ma spro// yan lag bzhi pa'i dbus ldan pa'i// phyogs
