52a7(rgyud): bcur khro bo bcu dag dang // bsnyems ma dang ni rtogs ldan ma// mtshon cha mda' dang rtse mo can// sgyu ma'i cha byad rnam mang po// rnam par 'phrul par byin gyis brlabs// kun la khyab
52a8(rgyud): par byed pa yi// sna tshogs dbus su bzhag nas ni// de nyid chen po bdag nyid lngas// phyogs bzhi'i 'khor lo khyab byas te// dga' bas dga' byad bzhi yang spong // ting 'dzin kun gyi dga'// 
52b1(rgyud): ba la// longs par spyod pa'i sngags pa yis// 'khor lo la ni rdo rje'i gzugs// pad+ma'i gzugs la de dag ni// 'khor lo kun las pad+ma yi// ngo bo yis ni rol pa dang // e zhes bya ba 'phos pa/ 
52b2(rgyud): las// mdog ldan bdag nyid gzugs su bya// mdzes pa'i rgyan nyid kun ldan pa// nyid kyi stan la bzhugs par blta// sgeg mo glu dang gar rnams dang // rgyal mtshan la sogs tshon dgye nga
52b3(rgyud): sil snyan mchod pa'i rnam pa ni// sna tshogs rnams kyis mchod par bya// rnam pa kun dang ldan par ni// bdag nyid kyi ni lus bsgoms nas// myur ches pa dang bul ba dang // mig gsal gug
52b4(rgyud): skyed nyams pa dang // rtog pa ngan pa rnam spangs nas// de nas gsang sngags bzlas brjod bya// bzlas pas skyen lag g.yas kyis// bsgrims te rdo rje gsor nas kyang / 
52b5(rgyud): g.yon pas rdo rje dril bsil zhing // rdo rje glu tshul sna tshogs dang // ba ngan tshul du bya bas mchod// bzlas pa'i mdzu/ ga ni brtul nas kyang // gshegs su gsol te bdag nyid
52b6(rgyud): srung/ lus dang ngag dang sems bsgoms te// brtan por ci bder 'gro bar bya// bar chad du ni gyur na yang // yi ge brgya pas byin gyis brlab// de ltar sgom pas sgom byed pa// rdo rje theg pas
52b7(rgyud): rab rdzogs pa'i// byang chub des ni myur thob nas// zla nya'i dkyil 'khor lta bur snang // sna tshogs las kyi thog 'dren cing // rin chen rgyal mtshan rab dga' byed// chags chen pad+ma'i
52b8(rgyud): gdung rgyud can// gnas chen 'jig rten dbang phyug 'gyur// dpal ldan rig sngags kun gyi gtso// dga' chen rdo rje lcags kyur 'gyur// sgyu ma bshig pa kun shes shing // dregs pa
53a1(rgyud): 'joms byed khro bar 'gyur// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'di ni byang chub kyi sems sgom pa'i ye shes sgrub pa rim par phye ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// 
53a2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka'i 'khor lo rab tu sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
53a3(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs nas phyi nang gi 'khor lo thams cad rab tu sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi las kyi sbyor ba rab 'byam 'di bka' stsal to// lha ni gang yang rung ba zhig/ 'khor lo'i dbus su bzhag
53a4(rgyud): na ni// de yi ming spos rdo rje yi// dkyil 'khor yin zhes de sangs rgyas gsungs// zhi dang rgyas dang drag shul dang // rang gi las la sbyor ba na// 'khor lo'i rgyal po rnam bsgoms
53a5(rgyud): nas/ bdag po nyid kyis rab tu bya// zhi ba spun dang skul bya dmas// rgyas la rin chen gos dkar mar// dbang / sgrol ma lu gu brgyud// yams dang gnod pa gzhig pa'i
53a6(rgyud): phyir/ 'od zer can dang ri khrod mas// drag shul spyad la mA ma kI/ khro gnyer can ma ngag gis bya// 'di dag shes rab rol pa ste// chags pa'i rdo rjes rjes chags pa// gsang sngags de nyid kyis
53a7(rgyud): bskul na// gdon mi za bar phrin las mdzad// spyan dang lha mo skul byed ma// dbang po zhi ba zla 'dra ba// phyag gnyis na ni bgrang phreng dang // ril ba spyi blugs kyis rgyan pa// dang por ting 'dzin
53a8(rgyud): gyis sprul nas// bum pa zla ba'i mdang ldan pa// bdud rtsi'i 'o mas rab bkang ste// lag gnyis pad+ma'i gdub mchog gis// rnam par snang mdzad zhabs drung du// nad pa la ni gdugs par
53b1(rgyud): bsam// rin chen ma dang gos dkar can// sku tshe kha dog ser po ste// lha mo ser mo snang ba la// phyag na rin chen pad+ma can// dang por ting 'dzin gyis sprul nas// yid 'ong rgyal ba'i 'dod pa yis / 
53b2(rgyud): chen 'byung ba'i zhabs drung du// bdud rtsis rab tu dgang ba dang // bla med rin chen khar bab na// rgyas pa mtshungs med mdzad par 'gyur// lha mo sku chen mdog dmar ba// sgrol ma de bzhin
53b3(rgyud): lu gu brgyud// kun nas 'od dmar 'bar ba can// lha rdzas lcags kyu zhags thogs pa// rab tu bzhad cing spun phye bas// 'od dpag med pa'i zhabs drung du// bsgrub bya rgyags pas myos pa
53b4(rgyud): dag/ bkug ste mda' yis bsnun na ni// skad cig nyid la dang du mdzad// mings gnod pa gzhig pa'i phyir// sku chen na mkha'i kha dog can// 'od zer can dang ri khrod
53b5(rgyud): mas// rdo rje don yod zhabs drung du// mkhas pas sngar bsha da tshul du ni// bdud rtsi yis kyang rnam par bzlog/ lha mo khro gnyer ma ma ki/ margad lta bu'i mdog can ma// hUM
53b6(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrogs pa// rdo rjes bsdigs pas brtson pa yis// rdo rje mi 'khrug zhabs drung du// khros nas rdo rje'i me yi char// 'bebs par rnam par bsam par bya// rdo rje rab tu
53b7(rgyud): 'bar ba des// bsgrub bya tshig nas mog ces byed// sbyor ba 'di yis mod la ni// de ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba'am// yang na lus ni 'jig par mdzad// byin rlabs dam tshig dbang bskur la/ 
53b8(rgyud): rdo rje sems ma rin chen dang // chos dang rdo rje las ma bzhi// sbyor ba rnams ni rab tu sbyar// sems dpa' chen po bcu drug kyang // bla med 'khor lo byed pa ste// rang gi phyogs nas las byas na// 
54a1(rgyud): 'bras bu don yod sbyin par byed// khro bo'i lus la legs gnas te// khro bo'i rgyal po sbyar bar bya// dam tshig la sogs cho ga bzhin// der ni rdo rje bsgoms nas bskul/ 
54a2(rgyud): rkang pa'i rjes kyis blangs la// dur khrod thal ba dag dang bsreg/ de yi ras blangs mi rus dang // chu 'gram gnyis kyi sa dag ni// brtags nas lung bong gcin gyis sgra// de las dgra bo'i gzugs byas
54a3(rgyud): la// de tshe gzugs brnyan bcing bar bya// dug dang skye tshe lan tshwa dang // 'bru mar tsha ba rab bsres te// dgra bo che ba skyed pa'i phyir// de yis lus nang rab tu dgang // de nas rnam shes rlung 'dra ba/ 
54a4(rgyud): lcags kyu yis ni bkug nas kyang // srin bu me khyer 'dra bcu/ dag ste// zhags pa yis ni dam du bzung // de ni rdo rje/ sgrog du gzhug/ bsgrims nas de yi ming smos te// dgra bo'i/ 
54a5(rgyud): lus ni ma lus par// po son cha yi tsher mas dbug/ me rus las byas pur bu 'am// yang na seng ldeng las byung bas// dpal ba snying mgrin dpung mgo gnyis// gnas lnga dag tu
54a6(rgyud): bsgrims te gdab// nim pa'i shing la sbar ba yis// me sbar ba la bskal par bya// mkhas pas rkang pa nas brtsams ste// mtshon cha rnon pos gtubs nas ni// 'bar ba'i lus can khros
54a7(rgyud): pa yis// de yi dum du sbyin bsreg bya// las 'di la ni lhag par yang // rus sbal gyi ni rkang thabs sbyar// nyi ma'i gung ngamanam phyed na// las 'di nyid ni bsgrub par bya// las 'di byas nas
54a8(rgyud): nges par ni// gang zhig rgyal bas bsrungs na'ang des// nges par 'chi na khyab 'jug dang // lha chen tshangs pas ci zhig smos// phyi rol gyi drag shul spyod pa'i go che'o// gsod pa'i ye shes las
54b1(rgyud): sprul pa// nang gi yang ni bshad par bya// bsgrub bya yid kyis bsrungs nas su// cho ga bzhin du dgug par bya// lag na ral gri mtshon cha dang // be con rdo rje gtun shing zhags// lag nas 'khor
54b2(rgyud): lo mda' gzhu can// khro bo sna tshogs bsnams pi des// bsgrub bya zhags pas bcings nas su// rdo rje yi ni khro bo yis// lho yi phyogs su khrid pa dang // rdo rje gzhan gyis brdeg pa dang // de ni
54b3(rgyud): ral gris gtub pa dang // sgyu ma lang long nar bar bsam// oM hUM badz+ra rAk+Sha sa/ b+hak+Sha ya tha phaT/ rdo rje srin mo bsgoms nas kyang // bya rog wa dang bya rgod kyis// kun nas yongs su bskor nas su// 
54b4(rgyud): de dag rang thob byed par ni// sgom zhing ming nas bskul b.radang // rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// rdo rje rnga mo rnams bsams te// bsgrub par bya bar yongs brtags pa
54b5(rgyud): de yi rgyab tu zhon nas su// rdo rje khro bos gzer bzhin du// mA phyogs su ni bkri bar bya// de yi rkang rjes sa la ni// rlung gis rngurtsubs pa'i shing l-i la// de yi ming nas brjod byas
54b6(rgyud): te/ rdo rje sna yon drung du sbas// de lta bur ni sbyor ba'i las// skom zhing cho ga bzhin byas na// brgya byin nyid kyang bskrad 'gyur na// sa steng skye bo smos ci dgos// de ming gsang dang sngags spel te/ 
54b7(rgyud): 'ug pa'i sgrol bris nas ni// dge sbyong bram ze'i sgras dkris te// sa yi 'og tu bskos nas gzhug/ rdo rje khro bo gnyis kyis ni// 'thab mo 'gyed du 'jug par bya// de ltar bsams pa'i sbyor ba yis/ 
54b8(rgyud): 'dod pa bzhin du 'bye bar 'gyur// hUM zhes bya bas gang ba yi// rdo rje phra mo sgom byas nas// sna yi rtse mo nas bton te// bsgrub bya'i lus ni dgang bar bya// lus kyi tshogs ni thams cad du/ 
55a1(rgyud): sna tshogs rdo rje bcings nas su// rdo rje 'bar ba 'phros gyur pa// des ni lus kyang bskam par bya// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bsgoms te// kun nas kyang ni gzhig par bya// a
55a2(rgyud): badz+ra DA ki nI/ a mu ka s+ya rak+ta A kaR+Sha tsa sha ya hUM phaT// sbyor ba'i rim pa 'di yis ni// bskams 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// mkhas pas rlung gi phyogs song ste// dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas nas ni/ 
55a3(rgyud): spos kyi thag le bdun byas te// de dag kham pa'i phor pa dgab// de ni ri rab thams cad nas// rtse mo brgyad par sprul byas te// rdo rje 'phro bas brgyan pa yis// de dag rnams ni mnan par bya// yaM zhes bya bas
55a4(rgyud): bskyed pa'i rlung bdun rnams// laM zhes bya bas mtshan ma dbang chen gyi// nang du rlung rnams nges par chud par bya// de lta'i sgo dar bas 'jig pa'i rlung yang bcings// pad+ma 'dab brgyad bsgoms
55a5(rgyud): nas de'i 'dab la// klu brgyad bkod dbus me tshogs 'bar bcan// rdo rje khri bo'i sku yi zhabs mthil gyis// klu rnam sa mnan na char sprin char pa 'bebs// hUM zhes bya ba gnyis
55a6(rgyud): dbus klu rnams kyi// snying po yongs bcug spel mas gzir nas su// hUM zhes bya ba bzlas brjod byas nas su// 'jigs dus char pa lta bu char pa 'bab// nyi ma'i mdog ltar dmar po'i 'od
55a7(rgyud): bzang zhal// nam mkha' khyab par rnam par gdangs nas ni// kun nas char chus yongs su gang ba'i sprin// hUM zhes bya ba'i 'bar ba'i lce yis ldag/ dbugs rngub pa yis bkug nas 'byung ba yis
55a8(rgyud): shil bal bzhin du rab tu gtor bar bya// yang na rang gi phyag rgya'i tshor 'bar ba// btang bas skad cig la ni bcad gtubs te// hUM zhes bya bas bsdigs pa byas na ni// na mkha' dag kyang ston ka'i dus
55b1(rgyud): ltar snang // me yi dkyil 'khor la gnas snang mdzad kyi// zhabs drung dpral 'byes nas byung mi g.yo bran// bdud las rnam rgyal phyag drug mda' gzhu zhags// ral gri 'khor lo rdo rje char 'bebs/ 
55b2(rgyud): pa/ khro bo grangs med pa yis yongs bskor nas// bgegs rnams sreg mdzad hUM gi sgras bkang nas// 'jig rten gsum po gang ba'ang rnam par 'jig/ rkang rjes sa dang mi yi khrag dag las// 
55b3(rgyud): mi yi gzugs byas mi rus pur bu la// 'od zer can gyis gsang sngags bsgrags pa yis// lan grangs nyi shur mngon bsngags mig tu gdab// tshogs kyi bdag po'i khar ni ming bcug nas// 
55b4(rgyud): phyi bzhin rdo rje gtun shing dag gis brdung // oM sum+b+ha badz+ra mus dalen/ tsud+d+ha ya na ra big+h+nAn hU~M phaT// las 'di bsams sa mod la ni// me yi bgegs kyang bzlog par 'gyur// sta
55b5(rgyud): zil kha dog lta bu na mkha' lding // lus la sbrul stong dag gis rgyun byas pa// na mkha' la 'dug nas gdengs ka stong/ ldan pa'i// klu brgyad dag dang char sprin rnams la bsgo/ 
55b6(rgyud): brgya byin bka' ni de dag gis thos nas// sprin tshogs bum pa'i char gyis ma yang gsod// na mkha' lding gis 'dab mas bkab nas ni// mchus brkos chu klung gis ni mtshams kyang bcad// 
55b7(rgyud): oM badz+ra nA rA ya Na/ ni ra ba bA ya/ ha ba ma mu me g+he hUM// zhal ras gsum pa ston ka'i zla ba'i mdog/ phyag bzhini 'od dmar sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od// lha mo bzhi pa bsnyems ma byams ma dang // 
55b8(rgyud): sprin rgyal mtshan me tog rol pas bskor// g.yas pa'i phyag gis rdo rje legs gsor zhing // g.yon pas rdo rje dril bu sgeg par gzhag/ ldem bag 'jo sgeg tshul gyis rol pa ste// sems da
56a1(rgyud): 'byung ba'i sprin rnams rnam par 'phel// rnam pa kun gyis rnam rgyan cing // rin chen cod pan dbang bskur bas// na mkha' la ni 'bab pa yis// thog thog rnam
56a2(rgyud): pabazlog par byed// oM ma hA puk+ka badz+ra// che ge mo dza zhes bya ba dang // hUM zhes bya ba nas/ pU ra Ta ban d+ha hUM phaT// sbyor ba 'di ni byas pa yis// bla med byang chub rgyas par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan
56a3(rgyud): 'das rdo rje'i 'de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad chen po'o// mi 'khrugs rin chen 'od dpag med// don yod gsang sngags rgyal rnams dang // bzang po rnam pa bcu drug po// kun dang drag pa
56a4(rgyud): ting 'dzin la// gnas pa yis ni khro bo dang // gsang sngags dgas mdzad rig rgyal ma// rnam pa kun dang ldan pa dag/ derims bral rang gi ting 'dzin gnas// thams cad ldan pa'i/ 
56a5(rgyud): 'khor rnams la// gzigs pa chen pos rnam gzigs nas// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// smin ma mdzes par ba spyod nas su// yan lag 'phrog pa'i 'dzum bstan nas/ 
56a6(rgyud): thugs kyi sems ni dga' bar mdzad// dga' bar mdzad pa'i mod la ni// sangs rgyas mchog kun gyis mchod pa// shes rab chen po'i thog 'dren pas// bsgrims te so sor gsor nas des/ 
56a7(rgyud): bde chen ting 'dzin la gnas te// ldem bag 'jo tshul gyis bltas nas// lag gnyis pad+ma'i tshul gyur te// spyi bor thal mo sbyar byas nas// ye shes lam ni rab ston pa// rgyal chen rnam par snang
56a8(rgyud): mdzad la// lag na rdo rje stobs po che// yid rgyas pa yis tshig gsol ba// ci slad rnam pa thams cad du// zur gyis rnam par gzigs pa dang // smin ma bskyod byas 'dzum mdzad pa// ye shes rnam par
56b1(rgyud): bsgyings pas gsung // byang chub chen po'i rdo rje can// lag na rdo rje gsol mod la// brtan zhing zab pa'i gsung gis ni// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rol pa bshad// sgom pa'i lam la legs byung ba// rdo rje ye she
56b2(rgyud): rnams kyi thabs// bde bas byang chub thob 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas kun dang sangs rgyas kyi// rjes su 'brang ba'i 'khor nyon cig/ gang la dngos rnams dngos med cing / mthu gnyis kyi ni mtshan ma med// dbus la'ang
56b3(rgyud): spyod pa med pa dag/ dus gsum 'das pa na mkha' 'dra// thabs dang shes rab rnam spangs pa// de la byang chub ji ltar rtogs// rtogs par 'dod pa de dag ni// thabs rnams nga yis bshad par bya// 
56b4(rgyud): phung po dngos po yod med pa'i// byang chub sems ni grogs kyu dar pa// spro ba dang ni btung ba yis// sku gsung mchog da ni mchod par bya// sems kyis sku ni 'thob 'gyur zhing // 
56b5(rgyud): sems kyis chos rnams bstan pa yin// sems kyis byang / chub 'thob 'gyur bas// de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par sgo ma// sems ni sgyu ma'i rnam pa ste// byang chub kyang ni sgyu ma
56b6(rgyud): 'dra/ dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'gas// gyo mo la ni sngags bzlas te// legs par byas pa'i gzugs dag la// sbyor ba goms pas bsnun na ni// rkang pa bzhi pa la sogs pa'i gzugs// 
56b7(rgyud): zhen pa'i sems la snang bar 'gyur// de bzhin bsod nams yis las byung ba'i tshogs kyis sgom pa'i sems// sems can rnams kyi bsams pa la// bla med byang chub snang bar byed// dngos po
56b8(rgyud): don dam mi shes pa// phyi rol dngos la mngon zhen pas// ngan par rtogs pa'i rnam rtog gis// rin chen sems 'di dri mar byas// 'byung ba chen po bzhi rnams dang // dngos po thams cad ldan zhes
57a1(rgyud): gsungs// de la gtsang dang mi gtsang sogs// mi shes pa yi yongs su brtags// bdag tu 'dzin pa mngon nan pas// don dam phyi rol byas pa yi// theg pa dman pa rnams kyis/ 
57a2(rgyud): bla med byang chub ci ltar 'thob// byang chub rnam pa gnyis gsungs te// lhag ma dang bcas lhag ma med// lhag bcas phung po'i ngo bo ste// nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su bsregs// lhag med bag
57a3(rgyud): chags med pa ste// mkha' ltar dri ma med pa yin// bla med byang chub 'di lta bur// sangs rgyas kun gyis rnam par bshad// de yi byang chub spel ba'i phyir// las kyi tshul ni sna tshogs yin// 
57a4(rgyud): rnal 'byor can gyi gsang sngags gang // ye shes sems dang / de'i zhabs drung du// rtag tu mnyes byas ma grub pa'i// / lhag ma nga yis bshad bya ste// de ni bde blag thabs kyis su// 
57a5(rgyud): tshar bcad nas ni sgrub pa bshad// rdo rje lcags kyu rgyal po che/ rdo rje zhags pa rab gdung byed// rdo rje khu tshur gzi brjid / rdo rje phur bu rnams 'dril byed// rdo rje tho brdung pa ste// rdo
57a6(rgyud): rje nag mo cher 'beb pa// lha rnams kun la 'jigs pa skyed// phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs 'di// bsgoms nas las la sbyar na ni// dam tshig rgyal bas bstan pa'i phyir// mtshungs pa med pa'i las
57a7(rgyud): byed do// gsang sngags rigs pas hUM zhes pa'i// lcags kyu btang nas zhabs drung dgugs// 'di ni gal te sangs rgyas sam// rdo rje 'chang ba'i snying las 'gugs// dam tshig gis ni zhugs pa dang
57a8(rgyud): rdo rje bcing bas bcing bar bya// rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung nas// rdo rje nag mos kun tu bsdigs// rdo rje yi ni phur bu yis// gzugs brnyan gyi ni gnas lnga'o// dpral ba mgrin pa snying ka dang // de bzhin
57b1(rgyud): dpung pa gnyis su gdab// rdo rje tho bas brdung bar bya// cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas nyid kyang nges par gnon// sdigs la sogs pa'i sbyor ba yis// gzugs rnyan mig yor gyur pa dang / 
57b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub rab rdzogs pa'i// dngos grub de tshe sbyin par mdzad// 'di ni mthu yis grub pa yi// sbyor ba gcig pu gsang chen yin// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag gis gsang
57b3(rgyud): ba'i sgrub pa thos nas mgrin cig tu thams cad kyis lags so zhes bya ba gsol to// gtso bo rdo rje rnam snang mdzad// dpa' bo chen po leg so zhes// zab mo chos kyi mchog gyur pa// dam pa bshad pa
57b4(rgyud): mdzad pa legs// sems can phan phyir thugs rje yi// lcag sa kyus kun nas 'bar ba legs// bdag med chos rnams sgrub pa yi// ye shes snying ku 'bar ba legs// gsang
57b5(rgyud): chen thams cad bstan pa yi// rdo rje theg pa nges par gsungs// / theg pa'i tshul 'di la gnas na// bla med byang chub bde/ khor thob// oM badz+ra aM ku sha A kaR+Sha ya hUM/ oM badz+ra pA sha
57b6(rgyud): ban+d+ha hUM/ oM badz+ra Tak+ki ra dzA ya hUM/ oM badz+ra muSh+Ti gr-ih+Na hUM/ oM badz+ra kI la ya/ kI la ya hUM/ oM badz+ra mu ga ra A ko Ta ya hUM// ye shes kyi snying kus snying po can du gyur pa'i gsang sngags dag pa mchog tu
57b7(rgyud): gyur pa don yod pa'i las 'di dag su la yang bstan par mi bya'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'di ni sbyor ba'i thabs kyis sgrub pa'i rim par phye ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / 
57b8(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad chen pos sbyor ba'i las thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dbab pa la sogs
58a1(rgyud): pa'i las bya ba 'di bshad do// oM zhes bya ba mgor bzhag ste// aHni bzhin gyi pad+ma la// hUM ni bskul nas snying kar bzhag/ ya ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor la// bzhag nas
58a2(rgyud): bsgrims te gdeg byas nas// 'gro ba dang ni gnas pa yi// 'gro ba thams cad dbab par 'gyur// dbab snod skul byed gzugs de yi// gzugs kyi ngo bor bsams nas su// rdo rje 'chang ba'i nga
58a3(rgyud): rgyal gyis// gsang sngags bsnyems dang bcas par bklag/ brjod par bya ba thogs pa med pa'i phreng ba ni// na maHsa man+ta nA/ samyak+Sha bud+d+ha ko Ti nan/ tangad+ya thA/ oM tsa le tsu le tsun+da swA hA// brtson 'grus
58a4(rgyud): / chen po thogs pa med par 'dul ba/ stobs che ba/ pha rol ga/ non po che ba/ phyag na ral gri dang / tho ba dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa bsnams ma// khro mo chen mo khro mo'i dbang phyug ma/ 
58a5(rgyud): drag po'i gzugs can ma/ zhal ras mtha' yas pa/ phyag stong ma/ ma pa ma ma/ gzhan gyis mi thub ma/ don yod pa/ gdul bar dka' ba/ mig stong ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa
58a6(rgyud): thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs ma/ lha thams cad kyis phyag byas shing mchod pa rab tu grub ma/ rdo rje'i sen mo can/ rdo rje rdo rje 'dren ma/ rdo rje'i mtshon cha can/ rdo rje'i sku can ma/ rdo rje spyan gdangs
58a7(rgyud): pa'i stang stabs can// drag shul ma lags kyang drag shul can gyi gzugs can du bsgyur bar snang ba/ sku rdo rje dang bai DUr+yas rgyan ma/ oM b+ha ga ba ti tsun+de dru dru dru drA/ mr-i mr-i/ ru ru/ sru sru/ ru ru/ gr-ih+Na
58a8(rgyud): gr-ih+Na/ A be sha ya A be sha ya/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya/ sa ra sa ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ ha ra ha ra/ b+hin+da b+hany+dza/ mo ra ma ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ bca pa tsa/ daha da ha~M/ gr-ih+Na gr-ita/ sdang ba'i gdon dang / rims/ 
58b1(rgyud): zhag gcig pa dang / zhag gnyis pa dang / zhag gsum pa dang / zhag bzhi pa dang / rtag pa'i rims dang / yud tsam pa dang / 'byung po dang / ro langs dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum gyi/ 
58b2(rgyud): gdon dang / mngal nas skyes pa dang / las las skyes pa 'gro ba dang / gnas pa 'di dag dang / sdang ba gang dag bdag la 'tshe ba thams ca dang / sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ mar da ya mar da ya/ sho Sha ya sho Sha ya/ ta pa
58b3(rgyud): ya ta pa ya/ u pa d+ha ya u pa d+hA ya/ ha na ha na/ badz+re Na sa ra sa radaN+De na/ ma ra ma ra/ khang+gen hu hUM hUM/ tsu tsu tsu/ tri tri tri/ oM tsa le tsun+de sarba sA d+ha ya swA hA// de nis rjes bskul nas su// rdo rje dril bu
58b4(rgyud): bsil bya zhing / rdo rje bcing ba bskyod par bya'o// dbang chen dadakyil 'khor la gnas oM// dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgya dad dang // 'brel pa'i pad+ma bzhag nas su// aHzhes bya ba
58b5(rgyud): brgyad kyis rgyan// dbus su bsgrub bya bzhag nas su// hUM bzhi yis ni mdzes par bya// kham por kha sbyar nang bcug/ steng du rdo rje 'chang bas mnan// sgom zhing gsang sngags
58b6(rgyud): bskul tshig gis// bzlas brjod dag ni bya ba dang // ba zhes bya ba'i theg pa yis// kun nas kyang ni bkri bar bya// 'di ni sku gsum las byung ba'i// lha dang mi kun mnan par 'gyur// sngags
58b7(rgyud): la mkhas pa'i bdag nyid na// kha dog dmar po rdo rje can// 'dod chags tshe dang ldan pa'i gzugs// 'dod pa'i lha dang lhan cig bsam// sku gsum ldan pa mda' thogs shing // g.yon pa
58b8(rgyud): yis ni gzhu yang bzung // oM hUM bud med spyi bor bsam nas ni// 'dod pas snying zag dregs bdog// mdog dmar thal mo sbyar nas ni// 'dud bzhin du ni mdun bzhag ste// rdo rje mda' yis bsnun na ni/ 
59a1(rgyud): pad+ma ga nas zil pa 'dzag/ rdo rje mdara' yi sbyor ba yis// 'dod chags can ma 'dzag par 'gyur// rnal 'byor can gyis dbang bya'i phyir// 'dod chags rdo rje can yang
59a2(rgyud): sgom// mi thod las byas cang te'u la// spre'u'i lpags pa g.yogs nas ni// ngos nyid la ni pad+ma bri// bud med khrag gis 'dzag par bya// de yi dkyil du pre bris te// mi yi skra yis btags nas
59a3(rgyud): ni/ mthing ril gyi ni rkang rus kyi// pre hUM ming nas brjod cing brdung // lam gyi bzhi mdor dkyil 'khor ni// rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bos bri// grwar ni bu mo zas sbyin ma// 'gugs par brtson
59a4(rgyud): pa'i lcags kyu bya// gtso bo khrag 'thung cha lugs kyis// gzugs can gyis ni rting pas brdung // 'dis ni kham/ sa gsum rnam gnas pa'i// bu mo zas sbyin 'gugs par
59a5(rgyud): 'gyur// gang yang rung ba'i gzugs brnyan la// gnas pa yis ni nga rgyal gyis// rnal 'byor 'khor lo rdzogs gyu ra na// tshig gi rnam pa tsam gyis kyang // lha dang lha min mi la
59a6(rgyud): sogs// rnal 'byor can gyis thams cad byed// gang tshe dbang nyid la gnas pa// de tshe thams cad mngag gzhug 'gyur// bltas pa tsam gyis 'chi ba 'am// de tsam gyis kyang gcod pa'i mchog/ 
59a7(rgyud): sgyu ma'i ye shes kyis bskul nas// rnal 'byor can gyis glu dang gar// ji lta ji ltar sgom byas pa// de ltar 'gro ba rab tu byed// sbyin sreg de nyid la gnas pa'i// me yi lha ni zhal yin pas// sna
59a8(rgyud): tshigs las rnams grub byed pa'i// sbyin sreg las ni rab tu bshad// sbyin sreg gis ni lha rnams tshim// tshim par gyur nas dngos grub ster// gsang sngags lhag chad gang yin pa// thams cad
59b1(rgyud): sbyin sreg dag gis sto// de phyir sku gsum mkhas mchog gis// sbyin sreg rab tu bsngags par mdzad// rtsub shing las ni byung ba'i me// dge ba yini las rnams byed// gdol pa'am dur khrod las
59b2(rgyud): byung ba'i// me yi las rnams rab sgrub pa// thab khung zlum po gru bzhi pa// zla gam dang ni zur gsum pa// dkyil 'khor zur gyi kha khyer ba// rdo rje mtshan ma dag gi rgyan// sbyin sreg de nyid tshul rigs
59b3(rgyud): pas// thab khung rnams kyi dbus su ni// pad+mo steng gnas gtsug tor dang // rdo rje rin chen pad+mo bzhag/ ci ltar rigs par 'dug nas su// lag gnyis pus mo'i bar bzhag ste// dgang gzar gyis ma
59b4(rgyud): gyis bkang nas ni// blug gzar bkang ste de bzhin sreg/ sbyin sreg la dgos g.yas su bzhag/ g.yon du chu yi/ snod dag go/ las kun byed pa bzlas nas su// bsang
59b5(rgyud): gtor dang ni mtho nga srung ba// ku sha'i rtse mos gnon pa yis// thab khung khor yug bskor bar bya// me ni 'bar bar shes pa dang // g.yas pas mi 'jigs 'theb bskyod cing / 
59b6(rgyud): gsang sngags 'dis ni cho ga bzhin// me yi lha ni spyan drang ngo // tshur spyon tshur spyon 'byung po che// lha yi drang srong bram ze mchog/ sreg blugs zhal zas bzhes nas kyang // 'di nyid du ni bzhugs
59b7(rgyud): su gsol// oM ag+na ye/ di pya dI pya/ A be sha ma hA shri ye/ ha bya ka ka bya/ ba ha nA ya swA hA// lag g.yon rdo rje bsang gtor te// mchod yon mchod pa rnam lnga dbul// me yi phyogs nas bod pa
59b8(rgyud): ni// gsus po che la mig gsum pa// gdong bzhi lag pa bzhi dang ldan// 'od dmar ral pa'i thor tshugs can// me yi dkyil 'khor la gnas shing // las kyi 'od zer rnams kyis rgyan// lag
60a1(rgyud): ba dang po mchog sbyin la// gnyis pa na ni sngags nor phreng // g.yon na ril ba spyi blugs te// gnyis pa na ni bcon nyid// mdog dmar rgyun ni med pa la// drang srong
60a2(rgyud): rnams kyis yongs bskor ba// 'di lta'i gzugs ni bsams nas kyang // thab kyi dbus su bzhugs su gsol// de la sbyin sreg la dgos pa// kun nas lan gsum sreg blugs dbul/ 
60a3(rgyud): de nas thor 'thung byas nas su// 'bar ba'i rnam par bsgyur bar bya// rim pa 'di yi tshul gyis ni// mkhas pas lha rnams tshim par bya// legs par tshim byas bzod gsol te// 'dod pa'i
60a4(rgyud): dngos grub gsol ba gdab// bum pa rgyal mtshan rdo rje gdug sa// pad+ma lcags kyu'i rnam par dag/ me lce mdog/ dkar snang ba dang // 'khyil pa'i mtshan ma mkhas pas
60a5(rgyud): brtag/ de nas myur du 'grub 'gyur bas// sgom dang bzlas la 'bad par bya// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang la ni// oM zhe sa pa dang swA hA mthar// dbyangs kyi rgyun ni sring ba dang // bar
60a6(rgyud): tshad med pa'i dbyangs kyis sbyar// zhi ba'i sems kyis zhi ba mo// 'byor pa rgyas pa mngon par spel// dregs gdong stabs tshul bcas pa dang // dbang du gyur pas dbang bya'o// drag shul
60a7(rgyud): spyod tshul la gnas pas// hUM zhes pa dang phaT dang bcas// lus ni me lce 'bar ba dang // 'jig rten gsum po bzar bsams nas// bskul ba'i tshig dang spel ba yi// gsang sngags yi ge
60a8(rgyud): nges par sbyar// sngags grub chog shes pa yis// sbyin sreg cho ga thams cad la// sna tshogs las dang ldan pa'i lha// gang dag yin pa mchod par bya// sbyin sreg de nyid kyis bskul cing // 
60b1(rgyud): dang po dgang thugs sreg cing dbul// phyis ni rim bzhin rnam par spel// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang rnams la// dge ba rdzas rnams sbyin bsreg bya// bshang gci khrag rkang rus pa dang // sha chen dag kyang / 
60b2(rgyud): sbyin bsreg bya// ci ste ye shes sems dpa'i zhal// mi gtsang ba yis bkang na go/ ci ltar sdig pa mi skye 'gyur// gal te sdig 'gyur 'bras bu gang // sems can mi shes pas rmongs te/ 
60b3(rgyud): thams cad shes rab rnam spangs shing // phyi rol dngos la mngon zhen pa// rnam rtog dra bas blun byas gang // de dag gis ni dge sdig gi/ phung po gnyis su rnam par brtags// chos 'dir/ 
60b4(rgyud): bzhin gyis dag ste// skye ba med cing gnas pa med// sem/ nas can shes pa spel ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas rnams/  kyi thabs kyis bstan// dam pa'i don du dge spang na// bsod/ 
60b5(rgyud): nams med pa ci zhig smos// dper na chus gang chu klung gi/ pha rol 'gro ba'i sems can dag/ rtswa dang shing la sog sa bsdus te// chu las rgal ba'i gzings byas na// de la
60b6(rgyud): 'jus te legs rgal na// bor te bde bar 'gro ba ltar// de bzhin 'khor ba'i pha rol gyi// chos kyi lam ni bskyed byas kyang // chos dang chos min rnams spangs nas// byang chub bde ba thob pa bzhin
60b7(rgyud): dephyir rtam rtog drang spongs la// zab mo yi ni chos spel te// de bzhin gshegs pa gsungs lam la// sngags rig rnam rtog ma byed cig/ rnam rtog rmongs pa chen po ste// 'khor ba'i rgya
60b8(rgyud): mtshor ltung byed pas// nam mkha' lta bur dri med pa'i// rnam par mi rtog ting 'dzin gnos// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar te// lus dang ngag dang sems 'ardzams// nga'o snyam pa'i gzi bskyed
61a1(rgyud): gzugs// rnam pa kun gyis rnam par rgyun// rnal 'byor ldan pa tshe 'di la// ye shes rdzogs pa nyid du 'gyur// las las byung bar rnam bstan pa'i// skyes pa bung na
61a2(rgyud): gzugs mang la// brnyas pa nyid du mi bya 'dis// rdo rje lus can dam tshig yin// ngan rtog bzang rtog dra ba yis// sems kyis sems can rnams la ni// sna tshogs gdung bas sun mi dbyung // 
61a3(rgyud): rdo rje sems ldan dam tshig yin// sred pas bskyed rtsub phra ba yis// tshig dag rnam par mi smra zhing // mnyan na bde bar byed pa 'di// rdo rje ngag can dam tshig yin// rnam par snang mdzad cher 'khrugs
61a4(rgyud): mchog/ sha yi khams la gnas pa yin// rkang la mi 'khrug rgyal po ste// khrag la rin chen 'byung ba gtso// sems da can rnams kyi rus phung gi/ rus gong la ni 'od dpag med/ 
61a5(rgyud): rtsa yi tshogs rnams rnam 'dren pa// thub pa skyes mchog gang na yod la// dam tshig shes pa rnams la ni// gsang chen nga yis bstan pa 'di// blo ldan rdo rje sems kyis ni// 
61a6(rgyud): rtag tu bsten zhing bsgom par bya// 'dod chags zhe sdang de bzhin rmongs// sred dang de bzhin rnam spel ba'i// chos ni rnam pa lnga po 'di// thub pa skyes mchog rnams kyis gsungs// bshad
61a7(rgyud): gci khu ba mchil ma khrag/ 'dzag pa 'byung ba bzhin bsdus pa// sgom pa'i blo gros rdzogs pa yis// dam tshig bsten par bya ba ste// rtag tu bza' zhing btung bar bya// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po
61a8(rgyud): sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'di ni sbyin sreg rim par phye ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas ting 'dzin
61b1(rgyud): thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i mchog dngos grub 'di bka' stsal to// lag la rdo rje gsang sngags sgom
61b2(rgyud): pa'i rnal 'byor gyi tshogs yang dag par bskul nas rdzas thams cad kyi dngos grub pa'i thabs gsang chen 'di nyon cig/ rnam par snang mdzad ting 'dzin la// gnas shing sku gsung thugs bsgoms te// 
61b3(rgyud): mdun du 'khor lo legs par bzhag/ sku gsum rdo rje can gyi gzugs// 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrug pa'i 'od// 'khor lo'i nang du zhugs gyur par// sgom zhing 'khor lo bsgrub par bya// me yi 'od
61b4(rgyud): ltar 'bar ba'i 'od// 'khor lo chen po 'phags par 'gyur// / spyan ni bzlas brjod byed bzhin du// bla med 'khor lo blang bar bya// rgyal chen 'khor lo drug pa dag/ 'od ni rnam par
61b5(rgyud): snang mdzad bzhin// lan gsum 'jug pa'i sems can la/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur// mi 'khrugs par ni rnam sgom zhing // rdo rje mdun du bzhag nas ni// rim pa bzhin
61b6(rgyud): du bzhin du bskul na 'dis// sku gsum rnam par 'phel 'gyur zhing // 'bar ba'i phreng chen mnyam pa'i 'od// rdo rje chen po 'phags par 'gyur// mA ma kI ni zlos bzhin du// rdo rje bla med blang bar bya// 
61b7(rgyud): rdo rje rgyal po blangs pa yis// gtso bo rdo rje 'chang gnyis 'gyur// gtso bo chen po sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpas yongs bskor nas// sems can kun sems la gnas pa'i// lag na rdo rje
61b8(rgyud): rdo rje 'chang // 'jig rten khams su rnam rgyu zhing // kun gyi bsam pa yongs rdzogs byed// rin chen 'byung ba bsgoms na ni// rin po che ni mdun bzhag ste// sbyor ba'i rim pas rnam spel na// rin chen
62a1(rgyud): chen po 'phags par 'gyur// rin chen sgrol ma zlos bzhin du// 'od bzang gzi brjod 'bar ba can// phyogs kun snang bar byed pa yi// nor bu'i rgyal po blang bar bya// lha rdzas
62a2(rgyud): nor bu blangs pa yis// rin chen 'byung ba gnyis par 'gyur// de ni sems can thams cad kyi// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen bzhin// rin chen char pa rab 'bebs shig/ sems can kun gyi
62a3(rgyud): dbul ba 'joms// gtso bo yid bzhin nor bu can// sangs rgyas zhing du rnam par rgyu// 'od dpag med par rnam bsgoms nas// pad+ma chen po dun bzhag ste// rim bzhin gzi brjid gzengs
62a4(rgyud): bstod na// 'dab ma bye bas rnam rgyan pa// 'od bzang ltar 'ab ra ba can// pad+ma chen po 'phags par 'gyur// gos dkyu rwa can ma'i gsang sngags kyis// yid las byung ba'i pad+ma bla
62a5(rgyud): pad+ma'i rgyal po blangs pa yis// 'od dpag med pa gnyis par 'a// gyur// chos mdzad rnams kyis thog 'dren cing // sems can rnams la bdud rtsi rtsol// sangs rgyas zhing
62a6(rgyud): rnams snang byed gtso// bde ba can gyi rgyan du gyur// don yod grub pa rnam bsgoms nas// ral gri mdun du rnam bzhag ste// rnal 'byor rim pa 'di yis ni// sgom pa de nyid kyis bskul na// rdo rje
62a7(rgyud): 'bar ba lta bu'i 'od// ral gri chen po 'phags par 'gyur// sgrol ma'i gsang sngags zlos bzhin du// ral gri bla med blang bar bya// de ni ral gri mchog blangs nas// don yod grub pa gnyis
62a8(rgyud): par 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhing du rnam rgyu zhing // sems can rnams kyi mi shes gcod// rtag tu dri med snang gyur te// chu yi nang gi ston zla bzhin// rdzas kyi dngos grub bstan nas ni// phyag rgya chen po
62b1(rgyud): bsgrub par bya// rnal 'byor che la rnam gnas pa// de bzhin gshegs kyi btsun mo che// zhe sdang rigs ni 'dren mdzad ma// rdo rje gdan can mA ma kI// rin chen 'byung ba'i lha mo dang // lha mo 'dra/ 
62b2(rgyud): pa dbang mdzad ma// mkha' la longs spyod spyod mdzad ma// rim pa bzhin du nga yis bshad// de nas bu mo mig yangs ma// lo ni bcu drug lon pa la// gzugs dang mdangs dang lang tshor ldan// 
62b3(rgyud): gser gyi rna cha g.yo ba can// gcig gcig bsgrims te btsal nas su// lha mo byi dor legs byas te// rigs lnga yi ni tshogs can ma// las kyi rjes su bsgoms byas nas// bzhag ste sprad
62b4(rgyud): pa'i sbyor ba yis// pad+ma la ni rdo rje bzhag/ sprad pa dang ni 'khyud yis// rdo rje dang ni pad+ma bskul// gar gyi tshul du gyur pa dadang // de bzhin spro dang bsdu ba yis ni// mod la sgyu mas dregs
62b5(rgyud): myos nas// rdo rje las ni bdud rtsi 'byung // rnal 'byor ldan pa shes rab lag/ pad+ma la gnas bdud rtsi btung // rna la 'byor ldan pa'i kha yis// 'thungs pas de bzhin gshegs
62b6(rgyud): lnga yis// sku ni yongs su 'gyur ba 'thob// na mkha' 'dra ba'i chos kun la// thabs dang shes rab rnam par 'phel// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku yi snying po sgrub pa ste// 'dod lnga'i
62b7(rgyud): yon tan rjes 'jug pa'i// byang chub bde bas bsgrubs na ni// rdo rje pad+ma byin rlabs nas// rjes su chags pas 'thob par 'gyur// grub chen gsang ba'i dngos grub ni// sdug bsngal med pa'i
62b8(rgyud): bde ba'i thabs// rje su chags pas bde ba yi// rdo rje theg pas mnyes par 'gyur// sbyor ba'i khyad par 'di yis ni// lan gsum 'jug pa'i gsang sngags dang // las kyi phyag rgyangs
63a1(rgyud): bshad de// de dag lag pa'i phyag rgya dag ye shes phyag rgya rab bskul bas// dam tshig mchog gis 'grub par 'gyur// thub chen sna tshogs gzugs mnga' ba// sna tshogs
63a2(rgyud): phrin las mdzad par 'gyur// de nas phyag na rdo rjes khams gsum gyi dam tshig gi 'khor lo 'di nyid kyi rdo rje'i sku dang thugs las phyung ngo // sa ni spyan du brjod pa ste// chu khams mA ma kI zhes
63a3(rgyud): bshad// sgrol ma rlung zhes kun tu brjod// gos dkar can ma me ru bsgrags// rdo rje dam tshig na mkha'i dbyings// ston pa rdo rje 'chang bas bshad ces de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
63a4(rgyud): sa'i dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' chen pos da gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i di bzhinan/ dpa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs
63a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du gnas/ pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
63a6(rgyud): la rnam par bltas nas cang mi gsungs par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to// 
63a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs gsang ba 'dus par dbang bskur ba'i slob dpon de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems
63a8(rgyud): dpa' thams cad kyis ci ltar blta bar bgyi lags// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyis 'di ni rdo rje'i byang chub kyi sems su blta
63b1(rgyud): bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems dang rdo rje slob dpon 'di gnyis gnyis su byar med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i bar nas rigs kyi bu mdor bsdus nas yang bshad par bya'o// phyogs
63b2(rgyud): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs shing gzhes pa'i bar de dag thams cad dus gsum du byon nas/ slob dpon la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pas
63b3(rgyud): mngon par mchod nas 'di skad ces bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha yin no// bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma yin no// bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams
63b4(rgyud): cad kyi ston pa yin no zhes rdo rje'i yi ge gsum phyung nas slar ya dang rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs par 'gyur ro// / rigs kyi bu dper na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyogs
63b5(rgyud): bcu na bzhugs pa'i bar de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'a ngas rnams kyi rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bsod nam sa kyi phung po bas ni rdo rje slob dpon de'i spu'i khung bu gcig gi
63b6(rgyud): bsod nams kyi phung po ches khyad par du 'phags so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi snying por gyur pa'i bar nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i
63b7(rgyud): ye shes kyi 'byung gnas yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'jigs shing skrag pa'i yid kyis cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs
63b8(rgyud): pa dang / rin chen 'byung ba dang / don yod grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad rnams rdo rje 'chang thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi dam
64a1(rgyud): tshig la dmigs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bos nas shes ldan byang chub sems dpa' thams cad nyon cig/ 
64a2(rgyud): phyogs bcu dus gsum du byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje slob dpon gyi drung du byon nas mchod par mdzad cing phyag 'tshal bar brjod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
64a3(rgyud): dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ston pa yin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang de nyid ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bdag po yin pa'i phyir ro// de nas byang chub
64a4(rgyud): sems dpa' de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dngos grub gang
64a5(rgyud): la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka'/ stsal pa/ rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba/ gsum ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi lus dang ngag dang yid la gnas so// 
64a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis gsol pa/ rdo rje slob dpon gyi lus dang ngag dang sems kyi gsang ba gang la gnas/ na mkha' la gnas so// nam mkha' gang la gnas/ rdo rje slob dpon gyi
64a7(rgyud): sems la gnas so// sems gang la gnas/ gang du yang ma yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ngo mtshar du gyur nas cang mi zer bar 'khod do// dkyil
64a8(rgyud): 'khor dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya dang / stang stabs dang / 'dug stangs dang / bzlas brjod dang / sbyin sreg dang / mchod pa dang / las la sbyar ba dang slar bsdu ba rnams ni gsang sngags kyi tshul
64b1(rgyud): de kho na nyid bcu yin par gsungs so// dus gsum du 'byung ba'i rgyal ba thugs rje'i ro gcig pa rnams kyi gsang ba dang gsang chen dang ye shes rnam pa gsum gyi snying po bstan pa dag ni slob dpon gyi kha nas/ 
64b2(rgyud): bla ma la gus pa'i slob mas shes par bya'o// bla mas dam tshig ci ltar lta ba bzhin gyi dbang du byas nas bshad par bya'o// bsgrims nas sems can rnams la rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor
64b3(rgyud): chen po dang / lhag pa'i rnal 'byor rnams go rims bzhin bshad par bya'o// 'di mtha' dag ni rgyud thams cad kyi spyir shes par bya'o// de kho na nyid kyi dngos po mtha' dag yongs su mi shes par
64b4(rgyud): gsang sngags smra ba nga yin no// zhes mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'chad par byed na dam tshig thams cad nyams par 'gyur ro// dam tshig las nyams na bdud kyis
64b5(rgyud): gzung bar 'gyur ro// skyes bu shi nas dmyal ba'i gnas/ mi bzad pa chen por 'gro bar 'gyuro// sems can rnams la rten te byang chub thob par 'gyur bas sems can la bslu bar
64b6(rgyud): mi bya'o// zhes shes par byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam de nyid la sems can de dag sbyar bar bya'o// gang zhig 'di la brtson par ma byas pa de dag gis ni lag pa dang / rkang pa dang mig
64b7(rgyud): sbyin pa'i dka' ba spyad pa dang / dka' thub ci lta bus kyang sdig pa gzhom pa 'am/ bdud rtsi'i ro thob par mi nus so// rnal 'byor gcig khong du chud nas dben par song ste sgom pa byas na sdig
64b8(rgyud): pa las 'grol zhing tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams dang / chos bdag med par bsgoms pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i rnal 'byor khong du chud par bya'o// shes rab dang ye shes kyi 'jo
65a1(rgyud): tshul gyis gsang ba lnga'i bdag nyid kyi gtso ba la mchod par bya'o// dngos po thams cad dngos med par// bzhi bcu'i don na rtogs pa dang // rdo rje pad+mas dbang bskur bas// 
65a2(rgyud): bdud rtsi lngas ni dga' bar byed// gsang bar bya ba'i chos gsang ba// gsang zhing sbas te bzhag par bya// 'dod yon lnga yi rnam pa ni// gzugs sgra dri reg bya sogs// rnal 'byor sems
65a3(rgyud): dpa' spyang bya zhing // de bzhin bza' dang btung byas na// bltas dang khu tshur rnam pa yis// sems can thams cad dbang du byed// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las cho ga thams cad
65a4(rgyud): bstan po rim pa bye ba ste bcu pa'o//  // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa / lce dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za dang / thams cad dang / 
65a5(rgyud): ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sa gsungs pa mngon par bstod do// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba theg pa chen po'i yang theg pa chen po'i/ 
65a6(rgyud): tshul zab mo gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba chen po rdzogs s+ho/ bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// 
65a7(rgyud): / rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bAka tsit+ta kr-iSh+Tha ya ma ri nA ma tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po zhes bya ba'i rgyud 'phags pa 'jam
65a8(rgyud): dpal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i btsun mo thams cad kyi
65b1(rgyud): ga rnams la bzhugs te/ gti mug rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang / phra ma rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang / 'dod chags rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang / phrag dog rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang / zhe sdang rdo rje gshin rje/ 
65b2(rgyud): gshed dang / tho ba gshin rje gshed dang / dbyug pa gshin rje gshed dang / pad+ma gshin rje gshed dang / ral gri gshin rje gshed dang / mtshams rnams su rdo rje tsartsi ka dang / rdo rje phrag mo dang / rdo rje dbyangs
65b3(rgyud): can ma dang / rdo rje gau rI ste rnams mtshams su'o// de dag la sogs te gshin rje gshed kyi tshogs chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje de bzhin gshegs
65b4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi bdag po la gsol ba btab pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nga pos bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting
65b5(rgyud): nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las nges par bton to// zla ba rdo rje sbyor ba yis// gshin rje mthar byed bsgom/ par bya// bdud rnams zhi bar bya phyir dang // zhe sdang thams cad
65b6(rgyud): bsal ba'i phyir// 'od zer lnga yis 'khrigs pa yis// rdo rje srung ba'i don du sgom// phyir mtshams rdo rje sa gzhi dang // ra ba dra ba de bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed
65b7(rgyud): pa po bdud 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gti mug rdo rje gshin rje gshed la sogs pa thams cad kyi sa bon 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje rnams las nges par phyung ba
65b8(rgyud): dbus su ya dang k+She ma ma da yats+tsha ni rA dza sa do ru Na yo ni ra'o// ya sogs yig dang po las// gshin rje gshed du 'gyur ba yin// yi ge k+She ni gti mug brjod// yi ge ma ni phra mar gsungs// yi ge me ni
66a1(rgyud): 'dod chags nyid// yi ge da ni phrag dog 'gyur// gshin rje gshed sogs lnga ru grags// yi ge ya las tho ba 'gyur// yi ge ts+tsha las dbyug pa'i gtso// lag na pad+ma ni/ 
66a2(rgyud): yig las// lag na ral gri rA las yin// dza las tsartsi ka zhes brjod// yi ge sa las phag gdong ma// yi ge do las dbyangs can bsgrags// yi ge ru las gau rI dran// na yo ni ra mtshams kyi bzhi// thod pa/ 
66a3(rgyud): bzhi ru 'dod pa yin// sna tshogs rdo rje 'jigs rung ba// nam mkha' rdo rje dkyil du bsam// de dkyil bzhugs pa'i gshin rje gshed// gnag cing 'bar ba bsgom par bya// shar du gti mug rdo rje ste/ 
66a4(rgyud): lho ru de bzhin phra ma yin// nub du 'dod chags rdo rje ste// de bzhi ngan byang du phrag dog go/ mtshams kyi rdo rje rtse bzhi la// tsa cig sogs rnam par sgom// sgo yi rdo rje rtse bzhi la// tho ba la
66a5(rgyud): sogs rnam par sgom// sna tshogs rdo rje'i mtshams bzhi ru/ mi yi mgo bo bzhi dag go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de ba zhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos gshin rje gshed
66a6(rgyud): po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas zhe sdang chen po'i rigs kyi sngags gsungs pa// oM hrIHSh+Ti wi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
66a7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi bdag pos gti mug rdo rje chen po'i sngags gsungs pa// oM dzi na dzi ka/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos phra ma rdo rje'i sngags gsungs pa/ 
66a8(rgyud): oM rat+na d+h+r-i// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos 'dod chags rdo rje'i sngags gsungs pa// oM A ro li ka/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
66b1(rgyud): cad kyi bdag pos phrag dog rdo rje'i sngags gsungs pa// oM pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje tho ba'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM muD+ga ra d+h+r-ika/ de nas
66b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje dbyug pa'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM daN+Da d+h+r-ika/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje pad+ma'i
66b3(rgyud): sngags gsungs pa// oM pad+ma d+h+r-ika/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje ral gri'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM khaD+ga d+h+r-ika/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
66b4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje tsartsi ka'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM mo ha ra ti/ de nas bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje phag mo'i
66b5(rgyud): sngags gsungs pa/ oM dwe Sha ra ti/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje dbyang sa can ma'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM rA ga ra ti/ de nas bcom
66b6(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje gau rI ma'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM badz+ra ra ti/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab
66b7(rgyud): pa'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko tsa/ oM sarba ta thA ta thA ga ta bAka badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
66b8(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po zhe sdang chen po'i sku nges par bstan pa/ zhal gsum phyag drug khros pa la// in+d+ra ni la 'dra ba'i mdog/ phyag na rdo rje bsnams pa nyid// gshin rje gshed na
67a1(rgyud): bsgom par bya// zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba la// gsal ba'i gzugs dang 'dra ba'i 'od// phyag na 'khor lo bsnams pa nyid// gti mug rdo rje rnam bsgom bya/ 
67a2(rgyud): zhal gsum phyag drug rgyas gyur pa// gser gyi rnam pa'i 'od dang ldan// phyag na rin chen bsnams pa nyid// phra ma rdo rje rnam bsgom bya// zhal gsum phyag drug dbang byed pa// pad+ma rA ga mtshungs
67a3(rgyud): pa'i 'od// phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa nyid// 'dod chags rdo rje rnam bsgom bya// zhal gsum phyag drug thams cad la// rin chen margad 'od dang ldan// phyag na shubs can bsnams pa nyid// phra ma'o
67a4(rgyud): rje rnams bsgom bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las mdo na par rtogs pa'i rim par phye ma ste le'u dang po'o// 
67a5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' chen po la bstod pa/ gshin rje gshed po rab 'jigs pa// gti mug rdo rje'i ngo
67a6(rgyud): bo khyod// ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin// rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// gshin rje gshed po rab 'jigs pa'i// phra ma rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod// rdo rje thugs dang rab mtshungs pa// rdo rje rin
67a7(rgyud): chen phyag 'tshal bstod// 'dod chags rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod// gshin rje gshed po rab 'jigs pa// rdo rje gsung dang rab mtshungs pa// rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod// phrag dog ngo bo'i rang
67a8(rgyud): bzhin khyod// gshin rje gshed po las kun pa// rdo rje chags dang rab tu mtshungs// phyag na ral gri phyag 'tshal bstod// sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos po khyod// sangs rgyas thams cad gcig
67b1(rgyud): bsdus pas// sangs rgyas kun mchog gtso bo'i gtso// dkyil 'khor gcol phyag bstod// rdo rje mig dang / rdo rje sna bu dang / rdo rje lce dang / rdo rje lus dang / rdo rje thugs zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis
67b2(rgyud): gsungs pa ni mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs pa'i cho ga'o// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// 'dod pa'i don grub grub byed pa'i// gshin rje gshed po nyid mtshungs pa// gshin rje 'jigs pa'i
67b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor lo// skud pa gsar pa legs bsgrims la// legs pa'i tshad la mdzes pa yis// skud pa shes pas thig gdab po// gshin rje tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor lo// mtshan rnams thams
67b4(rgyud): cad rab rdzogs shing // bar chad thams cad rab nyams pa/ zhi ba la sogs rab 'jug pa'i// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo/ de'i cha byad la// rtse mo lnga dang ldan mnyam pa'i// las kyi rdo rje
67b5(rgyud): la bris// rdo rje 'bar ba 'khrigs pa yi// rdo rje da yi dbusasu bri// ral gri byang gi phyogs su bri// 'khor lo'i 'od kyi bskor ba yi// 'khor lo shar gyi phyogasu bri// 'od
67b6(rgyud): phreng ba mnyam 'phro ba'i// rin po che ni lho ru bri// pad+ma rA ga'i mdangs 'dra'i 'od// pad+ma nub kyi phyogs bri// 'od zer lnga dang mnyam ldan pa'i// shar gyi mtshams su 'khor lo bri// lho ru rdo rje bri
67b7(rgyud): bar bya// nub du pad+ma'i me tog ni// yu ba dang bcas kha bye gsal// 'od kyi phreng ba mnyam 'phro ba'i// ud pa la ni byang nub bri// shar gyi sgor ni tho ba ste// dbyig pa de bzhin lho yi sgor/ 
67b8(rgyud): 'dam las skyes pa nub kyi sgor// byang du rdo rje ral gri'o// shes pas dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa la// mchod pa khyad par 'phags pa ni// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag gis// 'jigs pa med par
68a1(rgyud): mngon par mchod// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las dkyil 'khor chen po'i rim par bye ba ste le'u gnyis pa'o// 
68a2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis bstod nas gsol ba btab pa// sdig pa thams cad 'joms pa yi// 'jigs pa'i gshin rje 'joms dkyil
68a3(rgyud): 'khor// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi gtso bo// mgon po dkyil 'khor bri bar mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin chen pos nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rnams las bdud rtsi myang ba'i cho ga nges par
68a4(rgyud): phyung ga/ oM AHhUM/ rdo rje me lce sbyor ba yis// rdo rje can kun mnyes pa dang // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad ba/ dgas// ye shes 'byung gnas ngo bo nyid// dgug pa dang ni gzhug
68a5(rgyud): pa dang // bcing dang de bzhin dbang bya nyid// tho ba la sogs sngas/ sa bzhi yis// mnyam par gzhag pas rnam par sgom// ma he rdo rje rnam bsgoms la// dkyil 'khor gtso bo rnam bsgom
68a6(rgyud): bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// gti mug rdo rje rnam bsgom bya// rta bdun ldan pa'i dbus gnas pa// phra ma zhes bya rnam bsam bya// dkyil 'khor dam pa'i dbus gnas pa// 'dod
68a7(rgyud): chags rdo rje rnam bsgom bya// las kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// rdo rje las ni bsgom par bya// zhi ba'i gti mug rdo rje ste// rgyas pa de bzhin phra ma yin// 'dod chags rdo rje dbang du byas// rdo rje las
68a8(rgyud): kyis thams cad du'o// rdo rje las kyi sbyor ba yis// mi tshil mi yi thod par bzhag/ de bzhin mi skas sdong bu bya// dur khrod dag tu du bsgrub// mig sman dag ni de bzhin du// mig sman las kyi sgom pa dang / 
68b1(rgyud): las kyi bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis// mig spyan 'di ni 'grub par 'gyur// khrag dang gur gum bdur byas nas/ sgrub pa byug pa bsgrub par bya// las kyi rdo rje sbyor ba yi// rkang pa byug pa 'grub par 'gyur// 
68b2(rgyud): bdud rtsi lnga ni mnyam pa la// sha lnga dang ni ldan pa yis// lcags gsum du ni btsug byas na// las kyi sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur// kan ta'i lcags kyi ral gri ni// las kyi sbyor ba bsgrub par
68b3(rgyud): bya'aM las kyi rdo rje sbyor ba yis// las kyi ral gri rab 'grub 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag pa'i rgyud las las kyi rim par phye ba ste le'u
68b4(rgyud): gsum pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs dpa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin chen po dal bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis bstod nas gsol ba btab pa/ 
68b5(rgyud): las kyi dbye ba'i dbye ba las// sems can 'jug pa ji ltar 'gyur// rdo rje chen pos bshad du gsol// yon tu na rgya mtsho rnams nyan lags// de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos// 
68b6(rgyud): las ni thams cad rab sgrub pa// nyes kun gsol ba'i bdag nyid kyis// 'di skad kyi ni tshig gsungaso// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad// thugs rdo rje nyid kyi mthus phyag 'tshal
68b7(rgyud): zhing mchod pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te// yang dang yang du phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung nyan to// de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos// dbang du bya ba'i 'khrul
68b8(rgyud): 'khor bstan// gshin rje gshed kyi 'khor lo mchog/ ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// bud med dbang du bya ba dang // srung ba'i don dang de bzhin du// zhi ba'i ro tsa nas bzung ste// gro ga'am de bzhin
69a1(rgyud): sdug shun la// 'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam bris nas// na mnams rnam sten la// gnag dang yu can ma yin pa'i// khams por gnyis ni la sbyar te// mar dang snang / 
69a2(rgyud): rtsis bkang bar gzhug/ skud pa dkar pos kham phor bcing // shar du mngon par phyogs pa yis// me tog dkar pos dus gsum gtor// gshin rje mthar byed chu shel 'drar// bdag nyid bsgom
69a3(rgyud): nas mdun bkod la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas// bsgrub bya bltas nas dbang bskur bya// bdud rtsi lnga yis gang ba yi// bum pa dkar po zla ba 'dras// rdzogs sangs du mas khrus byas te// 
69a4(rgyud): bltas nas sngags kyi bzlas pa brtsam// oM na maHhrIHSh+T+r-i da wi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT de ba dat+ta ya shAn+tiM ku ru nA maHswA hA// zhi ba'i cho ga gsungs pa'o// skyes pa zhi ba'i gur gum gyis/ 
69a5(rgyud): bri bya de bzhin rgyas pa yang // 'khor lo gnyis ni kha che mi// swA hA sa ming ni rgyan pa yi// bsgrub bya'i ming ni bris byas la// mar dang sbrang rtsis bkang nas ni// kham por kha sbyar
69a6(rgyud): nang du bzhug/ skud pa ser pos bcings nas ni// me tog ser po dus gsum gtor// byang du kha bltas mdog ser ba'i// gshin rje gshed du bdag nyid bsam// bsgrub bya zla ba ser nag la
69a7(rgyud): bum pa ser pos bskur bya zhing // dbang bskur ba ni bsgom byas la// spros la rgyas pa'i bzlas pa bya// oM hrIHSh+Ti wi kri pran hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA// de ba dat+ta puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA// oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA/ 
69a8(rgyud): nan hUM hUM phaT phaT/ bau ShaT de ba dang s+yo ba puSh+TiM ku ru bo Sha Ta swA hA// 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyas pa'i cho ga gsungs pa'o// gro ga'am ras la rgya skyegs kyi// khu ba 'am tsan dan dmar po 'am/ 
69b1(rgyud): srin lag gi ni khrag kyang rung // yi ge ho yis brten pa yi// 'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam par bri// 'khor lo nag po sogs bral ba'i// kham por gnyis ni kha sbyar du// mar dang sbrang rtsi bkang ba
69b2(rgyud): bzhag/ skud pa dmar pos bcings byas la// nub phyogasu ni kha bltas nas// me tog dmar pos mchod par bya// bdag nyid gshin rje mthar byed pa// kha dog dmar po che 'bar ba// zla ba
69b3(rgyud): dmar po la gnas pa'o// bsgrub bya yang ni rnam bsam bya// rang gi lus las byung ba yi// 'od zer dmar po lcags kyu yis// bsgrub bya dgug par bya bar bsam// sngags ni spro zhing khri bzla/ 
69b4(rgyud): bya/ des ni bsgrub bya nyams gyur nas// rkang pa gnyi su lhag sa gyur nas// gos bral skra ni bshig gyur pa// rnam par bas ma la bzlas pa rtsam// gal te dbang du ma gyur na// mar la
69b5(rgyud): sogs pa bral byas la// du ba med pa'i seng ldeng mes/ 'khor lo de ni sgrub pos sro// oM hrISh+TiHwi kr-i tA na/ na hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA// ho de ba dat+taM ba shaM ku ru ho// oM hrIHSh+T+r-i
69b6(rgyud): wi kr-i tAnan hu hU~M phaT phaT swAt+ma// bo 'aT de bdeta s+ya ya ba sha ma na ya bo ShaT/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang du bya ba'i cho ga gsungs// dur khrod gos sam yang na ni// rang byung gis bskum
69b7(rgyud): ras la ni// khrag dang rgya skyegs bsres pa yis// 'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam bris la// yi ge dza dang yi ge hrIs// ming ni rnam pa rten byas la// btsun mo yi ni pad+ma'i snod// kha sbyor nang du bcud
69b8(rgyud): byas te// skud pa dmar pos bcings byas la// me tog dmar pos mchod par bya// bdag nyid gshin rje mthar byed pa// nub ka'i nyi ma dang 'dra dmar// lcags kyu dmar pos bkug pa yi// bsgrub
70a1(rgyud): bya dag ni rnam bsgoms bya// snying la lcags kyus brgyab nas ni// skyes nas zhags pas bcings byas te// gcer bu skra ni ma bcings par// rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis/ 
70a2(rgyud): seng ge dmar po'i stang 'dug la// rdzas lnga yis ni bkru bya zhing // 'ongs pa ru ni bsam par bya// gal te bsgrub bya mi 'ong na// seng ldeng gi ni me 'dag la// der ni bzlas pa brtsam par bya// brtul
70a3(rgyud): zhugs can gyi 'khor lo sro// oM hrIHSh+NI wi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ hrIHa mu kaM A kaR+Sha ya hrIHoM hrIHSh+T+r-iHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT dzaHde ba dat+ta A kaR+Sha ya dzaH// 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis
70a4(rgyud): dgug pa'i cho ga gsungs pa'o// dur khrod gos la mkhas pas ni// yung ba yi ni khu ba yis// 'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam prar bri// yi ge lam gyis brten pa yi// bsgrub bya'i ming yang
70a5(rgyud): bri bar bya// kham por kha sbyor nang du ste// kham por ser pon/ steng du bzhag/ de la mkhas pas re khA bri// re khA bdu/ na nam yang na bzhi// mnyam par gzhag pas bri bar bya// 
70a6(rgyud): ri rab cog brgyad zhes grags pa// de yi steng du mnyam par bri// yi ge hUM dang yi ge baM// ri rab de ni brten par bya// de yi steng du lam yig las// dbang chen dkyil 'khor dgod par bya// sna tshogs
70a7(rgyud): rdo rjes mnan pa la// skud pa ser pos bcings nas ni// gshin rje gshed po mdog ser po// dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// bsgrub bya ser po rnams bsams la// ri rab kyis ni mnan byas
70a8(rgyud): pa/ phyag na rdo rjes mnan byas pa// dbang chen dkyil 'khor gyi 'og tu// man dar sogs ri bo dang // sna tshogs ri bo rnams kyis kyang // bsgrub bya mnan par bsgom par bya// de la gnas nas bzlas pa
70b1(rgyud): oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ laM de ba dat+ta s+thA ne stam+b+ha ya ku ru la// 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rengs par byed pa'i cho ga gsungs pa'o// ngag ni rengs par 'dod pa yis// de bzhin 'khor
70b2(rgyud): lo gnyis bris la// bsgrub bya'i ming yang bri bar bya// der ni sngags kyang spros la bzlas// oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tAn na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ laM de ba dat+ta s+ya ya thA sra ra thA/ ka ra krit+te nan+ti ba ra ya thA bi ru pa kaM debang t+to ya/ 
70b3(rgyud): dz+nyA dat+ta ya s+ya bA ka stam+b+ha na ku ru la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rengs par byed pa'i cho ga de skad gsungs so// shin tu legs par sbas pa yis// 'di las gsungs bzhin dgongs pa dag/ gshin rje
70b4(rgyud): gshed nag sbyor ba yis// nyi ma gcig gis 'grub paragyur// sngar bzhin dur khrod kyi ras la// 'khor lo ga nyis bris brtul zhugs can// ske tshe dang ni tshwa dang yang // dug
70b5(rgyud): dang gzhan yang nim pa dang // tsha ba gsum dang tsha ba'i mar/ dur khrod kyi ni sol ba dang // da du ra'i lo ma'i khu ba dang / tsan da li 'bras mdzub mo khrag/ tsha sgo can gyis blangs te/ 
70b6(rgyud): gdol pa'i rdza ma'i dreg pa dang // rab tu ltogs pa'i smyu gu yis// bcu bzhi la bris brtul zhugs can// khros pa'i sems kyis nyin byed na// gdug pa can rnams bsad pa'i phyir// sems can
70b7(rgyud): gnod pa byed pa'i ming // yi ge hUM gis brten byas la// bdag nyid gshin rje mthar byed pa'i// sbyor bas lho phyog kha bltas te// khro chen rab tu drag po'i gzugs// rus pas mgo bo rnam rgyan la
70b8(rgyud): ma he la bzhugs lce phyung 'dril// gsus pa che la rab 'jigs dang // skrag byed skra 'bar gyen du 'greng // sma ra smin ma de bzhin srer// g.yas na rdo rje chen po dang // gnyis pa na ni ral gri dang / 
71a1(rgyud): gsum pa'i phyag na gri gug go/ da ni g.yon pa'i bri bar bya// 'khor lo dang ni pad+ma che// thod pa nyid ni g.yon na'o// rtsa ba'i zhal ni shin tu gnag/ g.yas pa'i zla 'od
71a2(rgyud): bzang po 'dra// g.yon pa'i dmar po yin par brtag/ rdo rje rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan// ba spu khung nas 'jigs chen po// rang rigs bdag po rab 'phro ba// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor steng na ni// zhabs
71a3(rgyud): ni g.yon pa brkyang bas gnas// mche ba gtsigs shing rgyags pa yis// bskal pa'i 'bar ba me dang mtshungs// 'di lta bu yi bdag nyid kyis// bsgrub par bya ba mdun du dgod// gdug pa'i
71a4(rgyud): mtshon gyis rgyas pa yis// dri ma can la nad kyis gzir/ gos med 'dar zhing nyams chung bas// don 'dod pa yi tshig smra zhing // mtshon gyis gzir ba byas pa yis// gnag gi thum
71a5(rgyud): pos lus gang ba// grang ba'i rlung gis gtses 'gyur zhing // / me yi nang du zhugs pa la// ma he dang ni stag dag dang / khyi dang mchu rings can dag gis// sangs rgyas sde ni mngon 'jig
71a6(rgyud): pa'i// sdig po che dag za bar byed// mthar byed pa yi lhor gnas po// tsher mas lus ni bkang ba dang // rkang pa shing lcags sgrogs gis bsdams// de bzhin dum bu dum bum byas// lpags pa dag ni
71a7(rgyud): bshus byas nas// de la tshwa dang ske tshe bskus// hUM zhes zer ba bsgom par bya// de yi lus srung la sogs la// bcad pa dag ni mdun du dgod// de'i go cha'ang med byas nas// stong pa'i lus ni mdun du
71a8(rgyud): bsam// rang gi lus byung khro ba ni// gshin rje gshed sogs bdag nyid 'dras// de yi lus la brgyab nas ni// tshil bu rkang dag 'thung bar byed// de yi mdun du gshin rje bsgoms// lag na dbyig pa/ 
71b1(rgyud): stobs po che// gdug pa can des brdegs par byed// de yi rgyu ma'i phreng ba sogs// bya rgod kyis khyer mkha' la 'gro// sa yi 'og nas klu dang ni// lha ma yin la sogs pas brdeg/ 'di ltar bsgrub
71b2(rgyud): bya nyams bya ba// snying rje la gnas sems kyis ni// byed pas 'khor ba'i gnas bton nas// sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro bar byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khyad par
71b3(rgyud): can gyi 'di lta bu'i gsung phyung bar mdzad do// e ma'o bsad pa'i yang dag bsad// bsad pa ma yin sdig las dkrol// ji srid bsad kyang ma bsad ste// sdig pa stong phrag byas pa yis// mnar
71b4(rgyud): med la sogs mi skye bas// e ma'o sangs rgyas che ba'i bad ga/ bsad pas byang chub thob par byed// sems can ga/ sod pa bsad pa nyid snying rje chen po nyid kyis byas// e ma'o snying
71b5(rgyud): rje stobs kyi mchog/ snying rje dman pas 'grub mi 'gyur/ oM hrIHSh+T+r-iHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ hUM de ba dat+ta mA ra/ ya hUM phaT/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tAn na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ de ba dat+ta
71b6(rgyud): mA ra ya phaT/ de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par rtog pa'i rdo rje 'khrul 'khor dang sngags dang sman gyi bsad pa la sogs pa'i cho ga'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje
71b7(rgyud): gshed nag po'i rgyud las rim par phye ba bzhi pa'o// de nas 'khor lo gnyis bris la// yi ge phaT kyis brten pa yi// bsgrub bya'i ming ni br-i byas la// thod pa kha sbyar
71b8(rgyud): nang du gzhug/ skud pa sngon pos btsongs byas te// nyi ma phyed kyi dus su ni// dur khrod sa yi nang du sbas// gshin rje gshed kyi sbyor ba yis// rta dang ma he zhon pa yi// lag na mtshon thogs
72a1(rgyud): bsgrub bya gnyis// mdun du bsgrub bya dgod par bya// khros pa'i lus la sprul pa'i tshogs// gnyis ka'i phyogasu bsam par bya// gnyis kas 'thab mo mang po byed/ 
72a2(rgyud): khros shing gdug pa'i sems ldan pa'i// stobs ldan khros pa bsgoms par bya// bsgoms pas bzlas pa brtsam par bya// oM hrIHSh+T+r-iHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ de ba dat+ta ya dz+nyA dat+te bi de ShA ya hUM
72a3(rgyud): phaT/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis dbye ba'i cho ga gsungs pa'o// cho ga dag ni snga ma bzhin// 'khor lo gnyis ni bri byas la// yi ge hUM phaT gyis brten pa// thod pa kha sbyar nang du gzhug/ bskrad pa
72a4(rgyud): nag pos bcings byas la// sha za'i tshul du sba bar bya// gshi ngan rje'i sbyor ba la gnas pas// mdun tu bsgrub bya bsgom par bya// yaM byung gzhu'i dbyibs 'dra ba'i// rlung gi dkyil
72a5(rgyud): 'khor nag po la// de steng mdog sngon rnga mo sgom// de la ga dug pa can bskyon la// lho yi phyogasu kha bstan te// khro bo'i tshogs kyis de brdeg pa// sangs rgyas yin yang
72a6(rgyud): bzlog pa dka'// oM hrIHSh+TiHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ hUM phaT de ba dat+ta uts+tsha Ta ya naM hUM phaT// 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bskrad pa'i cho ga gsungs pa'o// khros pas rnal 'byor lhor bltas
72a7(rgyud): la gar khrag mi bsregs thal ba dang // dug gi tshwa dang ske tshe dang // mar khu smyon pa'i khu ba yis// dur khrod ras la 'khor lo gnyis// rim pa 'di bzhin bri bar bya// bsad pa gshin rje'i lus la
72a8(rgyud): gnas// dbye ba rta dang ma he yi// bskrad pa rnga mo'i lus la gnas// zhi ba zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis// rgyas pa zla ba ser po la// btsun mo snying kar dbang du bya// ral skyon pas 'gugs par byed/ 
72b1(rgyud): ri bo dkyil du rengs bya ba zhag/ sha ra ba 'am seng ges dgug/ de bzhin gzhan yang mtshon par bya// ro tsan dang rgya skyegs dang // kha che yi ni khyad par gyi// dbang du bya ba gro bar bri// dge ba'i sems
72b2(rgyud): kyis bzung byas na// 'grub par 'gyur te the tshom med// kham por kha sbyar nang du gzhug/ khwa yi sgro yi smyu gu yis// nyi ma phyed nas bri bar bya// pad+ma'i kha sbyor ro bsregs sar// gshin rje'i rnal
72b3(rgyud): 'byor bdag nyid kyis// oM hrIHSh+TiHla sogs gsang sngags bzlas// lho phyogs gnas te tshar bcad bya// mtha' yi ya bor zhi ba la// yi ge ni de gnyis ka dang // phyi nas dkyil gyi ya spangs te// 
72b4(rgyud): yige lhag ma ci bde bar// mngon du bsnyen pa khri tsam bya// 2dis ni las rnams rab sgrub pa// ye shes rdo rjes bya ba ste/ 8// gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor pas// rab tu grags pa'i
72b5(rgyud): 'khor lo 'di// yi ger bris nas gnas pa dang // 'khoralo bris nas gnas pa yi// khyim der 'thab mo rtag tu/ 'byung // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs
72b6(rgyud): gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las 'khrul 'khor gyi go rim bri ba zhes bya ste rims par phye ba lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis
72b7(rgyud): gsol ba btab pa// gang gis rdo rje can mnyes pa// zhe sdang phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor gyis// rdo rje'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pas// dngos grub rgya chen thob par byed// de nas rdo rje 'chang rgyal pos/ 
72b8(rgyud): 'di lta bu yi gsung bsgrags so// dkyil 'khor gyi ni lha kun gyi// dbul gshin rje gshed po sgom// rtag tu dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// rtag tu sbyin bsreg gis kyang dgang // rtag tu dam tshig das/ 
73a1(rgyud): kyang bzung // sdong ba dag kyang yang dag bzung // dang po la ni cod pan dang // gnyis pa ral gri sbyin par bya// gsum pa rdo rje dril bu dang // zla ba bza' ba bzhi pa ste/ 
73a2(rgyud): bzhi po 'di ni dbang chen po// nag po'i zhal nas byung ba yi// dbang 'di dag gis bye brag gis// rgyal ba'i sras kyis byang chub thob// 'byung po kun gyi gtor ma'i lus// sngags 'di de nas rab bshad
73a3(rgyud): bya// sngags chen bzlas pa tsam gyis ni// 'byung po thams cad 'dar 'gyur ba// oM in+d+ra ya hrIHya mA yaSh+TiHba ru NA ya wa~M/ ku be rA ya kr-i/ I shA na ya ta/ ag+na ye A/ nai ri te ye na/ bA ya be na
73a4(rgyud): tsan+d+ra ya hUM/ a kaR+Sha ya hUM/ brah+ma Ne phaT/ ba su d+ha ri N+yai phaT/ be ma tsi tri Ne swA hA/ sarba b+hU te b+h+yo hwA/ ha hi hi hi/ hUM hUM/ pe/ phaT phaT swAhA// bi Ta mu tra chu ba sres pas/ dkyil 'khor
73a5(rgyud): gru gsum byas byas nas ni// lha rnams kyang ni tshim par byas// ha ha zhes kyang dran par bya// dkyil 'khor rim gsum bya ba ni// brgyad dang bcu gnyis bcu drug pa'i// dkyil 'khor
73a6(rgyud): mkhas pas bris pa la// sngags ni kun tu dgod par bya// brtul zhugs can gyi sa bcu gnyis par// grub pa'i sngags rnams dgod par bya// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsum// ma lus lus
73a7(rgyud): pa med par 'grub// oM ya ma rA dza/ sa do ma ya/ ya me do ru/ Na yau da ya/ ya da yo ni ra yak+She ya/ yak+She yats+tsha/ nai rA ma ya/ hUM hUM phaT/ dkyil du ya byas shar du k+She// lho ru 'jam po'i rdo rje ste// yi ge me ni
73a8(rgyud): nub tu bri// byang du dan+ta 'da' ba na// bsgrub bya'i ming ni sbyin bya ba// mtshams kyi stong pa dag tu'o// hUM gnyis kyis ni brten byas la// dgos pa thams cad sgrub par byed// ya tsa ni ra dza sa do ru/ 
73b1(rgyud): na yo nair la sogs pa// phyi rol rim par g.yon brtsams bri// don kun rab tu sgrub pa'i phyir// rim pa gsum pa de la ni// kun tu cha re bor ba la// shar nas brtsams nas bri bar bya// oM ASh+Ti/ 
73b2(rgyud): la sogs pa'i sngags// de yi bar dag thams cad kyi// cha brgyad por ba dag la bri// a mu ka ku ru/ uts+tsha Ta ya ba shi ku ru/ bi dwe Sha ya/ shAn+tiM ku ru/ puSh+paM ku ru/ 'di ltar g.yon nas ni// las dang
73b3(rgyud): rjes su 'thun par ni// phyag 'tshal na ma tha ma'i bar// tha mar bau ShaT dang // hUM phaT dang ldan sa bon gyis// zhi dang rgyas dang mthar dbang byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin
73b4(rgyud): rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las 'khor lo rnam par bri ba zhes bya ba ste/ rim par phye ba drug pa'o// khrag dgug pa yi sbyor ba ni// zhal gsum phyag drug skem pa yi// phyag na
73b5(rgyud): 'khor lo zla 'od 'dra'o// mkhas pas tsar tsi ka bsgom bya// chang dag dgug pa'i sbyor ba ni// zhal gsum phyag drug phag gdong ma// rab sngo phyag na rdo rje bsnams// mkhas pas/ 
73b6(rgyud): phag mo bsgom par bya// shes rab bskyed par bya ba'i phyir// zhal gsum phyag drug dmar ba la// zhi ba phyag na pad+ma bsnams// dbyangs can brtul zhugs can gyis sgom// khu ba dgug pa'i
73b7(rgyud): sbyor ba ni// zhal gsum phyag drug ral gri snams// nor bu margad 'dra ba ni// gau ri mkhas pas bsgom par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gshin rje gshed po bsad pa dang dgug pa zhes bya ba'i
73b8(rgyud): ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje tsartsi ka'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM tsartsi ke sid d+hen+na nI la ha ri Ni rat+na tra ya a pa ka ri No ru d+hi ra A kaR+Sha ya dzaHsngags 'di dag ni dran byas na// kha gdangs pa dag
74a1(rgyud): byas pa yin// 'jig rten gsum gyi khrag chen po// 'gugs par 'di la the tshom med// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gshin rje gshed chen po chang 'gugs pa zhes/ 
74a2(rgyud): bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// rdo rje phag mo'i chang 'gugs pa'i sngags gsungs pa// oM badz+ra g+ho ne g+he ne su badz+ra mA ma kI b+ha ra b+ha ra/ saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/ ke tu kAr+yaM/ a kaR+Sha ya dzaHrdza
74a3(rgyud): mkhan lag pa phyis pa'i sas// bum pa kha mdzes nyer byas la// rkun ma'i sgra ni rten bzhag ste// sngags ni rje su dran par bya// sngags 'di che ba'i bdag nyid 'di// ba ta mchod rten dag tu bstan// 
74a4(rgyud): dal gyis dmigs nas 'bad par bya// chang ni 'gugs par darab tu grags// de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen bro'i gshin rje gshed rdo rje shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya
74a5(rgyud): ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM bi tsu pi tsu pradz+nyA bar+d+ha ni/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ me d+ha bar+d+ha ni/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ bud+d+hi bar+d+ha naM swA hA// tshes kyi dang po n+da
74a6(rgyud): bzung ste// kun tu zla ba nya yi bar// sbyar ba'i skad ni smra bar bya// ji srid zla ba'i rjes 'jug pas// rtag tu tshigs bcad brgya zin 'di// ngag gi dbang phyug 'grub par 'gyur// khams gsum
74a7(rgyud): ma lus pa dag ni// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed rdo rjes khu ba 'gugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// khu ba 'gugs par
74a8(rgyud): byed 'ag rdzags dig su mas gas nga kyag lji lda sa thams/ sa rdzas nga gyu chu // ba pa nga// l+r-ing khrug bu 'a gyu sa//  da nam/ 
74b1(rgyud): pa'i sbyor ba ni// khu ba'i tshogs ni 'gugs par byed// nags kyi nang ngam dben pa ru// las 'di dag na bskul byas nas// nub bdun tsam du sbyor ba yis// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// de nas bcom
74b2(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje gshin rje gshed chen po/ rdo rje nag po 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dbang bskur ba mchog gi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung bar mdzad
74b3(rgyud): do u dum ba ra man dar// ba ri dza ta ka phreng dang // dkar ni ka yi phreng ba ni// bu khyod zung la byin gyis rlobs// ral gri chen pos khams gsum pa'i// sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa/ 
74b4(rgyud): 'byung po thams cad 'gugs par byed// las kyi ral gri dam pa 'di// gzung na bdud las rgyal bar 'gyur// shes ra rab thabs kyi ngo bo nyid// rdo rje dril bu sgrub pa 'di// long la
74b5(rgyud): slob ma yang dag gzung // btung ba rin po che 'dis ni// rdo rje lus ni rab tu sgrub// kun tu ye shes bu khyod kyis// 'thung shig ye shes las byung ba// slob ma'i khar yang blugs bya ba/ 
74b6(rgyud): gshin rje gshed kyis bsgrubs pa yin// rdo rje slob ma bdag nyid ches// shin tu dga' ba'i semasu bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las
74b7(rgyud): 'gugs pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba rim par phye ba ste bdun pa'o// / de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// srung ba'i 'khor lo sbyor bar byed// bgegs dang log par 'dren pa dang // gdug pa
74b8(rgyud): can dag bsal phyir gsungs// dpal ldan ral gri 'chang ba'i bdag/ srung ba'i 'khor lo sbyor bar byed// ral gri 'bar ba'i bdag nyid kyis// rig pa gsum las mchod par byed// sems can
75a1(rgyud): thams cad skyob pa yi// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyis// sa dang pha rol phyin pa la// lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur// gshin rje gshed kyi dkyil 'khor ni// slob
75a2(rgyud): dpon dag gis dkyil 'khor bri// gos kyis gdong ni bcings byas la// dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun sgor bzhag/ khyod su zhes kyang 'di skad dri// skal bzang bdag ces tshig tu brjod// gsol btab
75a3(rgyud): pa yi blo bzang la// yol ba'i nang du sbyin par bya// dbang bskur don du gus chen pos// de nas lan gsum ched du brjod// ji ltar sangs rgyas chos chen pos// rdo rje sems dpa' dbang bskur
75a4(rgyud): ltar/ bdag kyang mgon pos dbang bskur zhing // mchog kyang bdag la stsal du gsol// de bzhin glu dang rol mos mchod// de bzhin khrus dang byug pas kyang // slob ma dad pas
75a5(rgyud): blug par bya// de la bstod pas kun kyang bya// de nas rdo rje 'chang gi rgyal pos stong pa'i sngags gsungs pa// oM/ shUn+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM// oM pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma/ 
75a6(rgyud): ki haM/ oM d+harma d+hA tu badz+ra sa b+hA At+ma ko haM// zhi ba la sogs byed pa yi// sbyin sreg de nas bshad par bya// sbyin sreg gang gis grub pa yi// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa// zhi bzhi pa'i sems
75a7(rgyud): kyis te// rgyas pa rgyas pa'i sems kyiso// dbang yang der gtad sems kyis te// bsad dang bskrad pa la yang ngo // zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams pa ste// rgyas pa yi ni rdzing bu 'dra// dbang du bya
75a8(rgyud): bzla gam ltar// na mkha'i khams 'dra bas ni bsad// zhi ba khru gang tshad du ste// de bzhin rgyas pa'i 'khru do pa// ji ltar rgyas pa de ltar dbang // bsad pa la ni sor nyi shu/ zhi ba steng du khru phyed tshad/ 
75b1(rgyud): rgyas pal mi tsam ste// so lnga gnyis ni bas dpal// dbang la ra de bzhin dgug/ chos cig zhan ning bya// zla banyal rgyas pa ste// bcu bzhi la ni mngon spyod pa// dbang gi las ni ches brgyad/ 
75b2(rgyud): la'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las sbyin sreg go cho ga rim par phye ba ste brgyad pa'o// / rgya mtsho'i sa ni blang byas
75b3(rgyud): lal klu yi gzugs cig brtsams byas te// yi ge hUM phu snying kar ni// hriHSh+T+rIHla sogs bzlas pa bya// char ni mi 'bab dus dag tu// bzlas pa khri byas 'bab par 'gyur// sbrul nag po yi sha
75b4(rgyud): dang ni// nim pa'i lo ma dang bsres la// de la ril bu byas nas ni// brtul zhugs can gyis rgya mtshor bzhug/ sngags kyi bzlas pa khri byas na// mtsho rlabs rengs byed mchog/ 
75b5(rgyud): yin no// tsan dan 'bras bu brgya blangs la// 'bras dang / mar shas bsris byas te// 'bum phrag brgya nir ba bzlas la// sbyin sreg byas na lha mthong 'gyur// dur khrod
75b6(rgyud): ro bsregs yog pa'i shing // brtul zhugs can gyis gzugs su bri// smyon pa'i khu bas bsku byas la// sngags khri bzlas pas mdzes thebs 'gyur// grub pa'i yungs kar blangs byas na/ 
75b7(rgyud): 'bum phrag bzhi ni bzlas byas na// sbrul gyis bzung nas 'gyel ba la// gtor na 'tsho bar the tshom med// rig shong chu yis blangs la// sngags kyi bzlas pa 'bum byas na// mgo la bskus pa
75b8(rgyud): tsam gyi ni// mgo yis nad ni nyams par byed// sngags ni lan bdun mngon bzlas pa'i// lag pas mgo bo mnyes nas ni// mgo ni zug gzer 'byung mi 'gyur// de ni 'di ltar the tshom med// bram
76a1(rgyud): ze yi ni sha dag na// dur khrongs dang thal ba las// gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs byas te// phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig pa la// rdo rje chen po g.yas pa na// de bzhin mi
76a2(rgyud): mgo g.yon pa na'o// mdog ni dkar po cher 'jigs pa// de yis gdug pa 'joms par byed// bdud rtsi lnga ni sha lnga yis// nyin re bzhin du gtor ma sbyin// bdag gi dgra bo choms shig ces// 
76a3(rgyud): rnal 'byor pas bdag gsol ba gdab// nub mo de skad brjod pas nyal// dgra ni tho rangs 'chi bar 'gyur// chu 'gags la sogs pas gzir zhing // yang na nad kyis thebs par 'gyur// dgra yi
76a4(rgyud): bai ro tsan blang // mi yi rkang sbubs yongs bkang ste// rab tu bkang nas 'bum bzlas na// shing rtser rgyu ba'i yi dgas mtshungs// lha rdzas dngos grub kun byed cing // dgos pa sna
76a5(rgyud): tshogs rab sgrub po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las 'jig sa byed gshin rje gshed ces bya ba'i rim par phye ba ste dgu
76a6(rgyud): pa'o// / ro langs chen po'i sgrub thabs ni// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// sgrub pa bzang po kun byed cing // dgos pa sna tshogs rab sgrub pa'i// bzang po mgong rma med la// shi
76a7(rgyud): la sbyangs pas bsdus byas la// phab la legs par bkru bya ste// der 'dug sngags bzlas brtul zhugs can// e ma'o ngo mtshar sngags kyi mthu// bsam pa chen po'i 'o dod 'bod// gshin rjernam
76a8(rgyud): 'byor ldan pa yi// yid kyis cung zad 'jigs mi bya// rnal 'byor lam ni gang 'dod pa// de kun thams nad ster bar byed// ma he dang ni ku be ra// stag dang de las gzhan pa dang // dom dang spre'u dag
76b1(rgyud): ni/ khyi dag gi ni khyad par dang // dug dang ske tshe tshwa dang ni// de bzhin tsha gsum so ban dza// 'di dag legs par sbyar gzugs bya// gshin rje gshed po 'jigs pa'i gzugs// de la rnal 'byor
76b2(rgyud): pas gsol gdab// hrIHSh+Ti/ la sogs sngags kyis ni// che ge mo de bdag la stsol// de yi pha yis ster bar byed// gal te rnal 'byor pa ma phyin// rmi lam gshin rje gshed brdeg cing / 
76b3(rgyud): lho yi phyogasu khyer ba byed// sade nas de yis pa yis ster// zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs pa la// in+d+ra ni la 'dra ba'i mdog/ tho ba 'dzin pa'i brtul zhugs can// phyag tu tho ba dgod par bya// 
76b4(rgyud): zhal gsum phyag drug khros pa la// mdog dmar po ste khro// sa pas 'jigs// 'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs par// mdzad// mkhas pas phyag tu dbyig pa dgod// zhal
76b5(rgyud): gsum phyag drug dmar ba la// 'jigs pa chen po bsdigs pa yis// phyag na pad+ma dmar po bsnams// pad+ma zhes bya mkhas pas sgom// zhal gsum phyag drug ljang ku ste/ 
76b6(rgyud): phyag na ral gri bsnams pa yi// las kun byed par gyur pa'o// ral gri zhes bya rnam bsgom bya// b+ha gar ling ga rnam sgom nyid// dkyil 'khor bdag po rnam par sgom// zhe sdang rjes dran rnal 'byor/ 
76b7(rgyud): gyis// gti mug rjes dran bsgom par bya// gti mug rjes dran la dmigs nas// phra ma rjes dran bsgom par bya// phra ma rjes dran rnal 'byor gyis// 'dod chags rjes dran bsgom par bya// 'dod
76b8(rgyud): chags rjes dran rnal 'byor gyis// pra dog dran bya brtul zhugs can// so so'i rigs kyi sprin rnams ni// ba spu'i khung nas spo ba bya// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khol dbus su ni// gtum po'i khro
77a1(rgyud): bsgom par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// lha mo bzhi po rab bsgom bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag/ 
77a2(rgyud): po'i rgyud las rjesu dran pa rim par phye ba ste bcu pa'o// zhe sdang gis mnan 'gro mthong nas// zhe sdang gshin rje gshed gzugasu// bcom ldan gshin rje'i dbang du mdzad/ 
77a3(rgyud): zhe sdang thams cad zad par byed// gti mug gis mnan 'gro mthong nas// gti mug gshin rje gshed gzugs su// bcom ldan gshin rje gshed dbang mdzad// gti mug thams cad zad
