98a3(rgyud): song shig/ bsams pa tsam gyis rdo rje 'dzin pa yang zhag bdun gyis 'chin phra mo srog chags gzhan lta ci smos/ de nas gzhan yang bsam gtan gyi rab tu sbyor ba 'byung ba ni ma he'i gdong pa'i sbyor ba gsang
98a4(rgyud): pa gnas te las thams cad bsgrub par bya'o// me'i dkyil 'khor dgyi dbus su bsgrub bya du bar bsams la/ de'i mdun du/ srin po mang po bsam par bya ste/ srin po de dag tha dad pa'i lu
98a5(rgyud): can ma rungs pa/ shin tu gtum par sha za ba dang / khrag 'thung bar rnam par bsam par bya'o// gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bya rnams te/ bya rgod dang / bya rog dang / 'ug pa dang / 
98a6(rgyud): wa rnams dang / khyi rnams kyis sha za ba dang / khrag 'thung bar rnam par bsam par bya ste/ bsam gtan 'di'i rab tu sbyor bas the tshom med par 'chi'o// dpag tshad brgya na gnas pa'i skyes bu yang sems
98a7(rgyud): kyis bzung bas bsam gtan brtsam mo// sngags pas bsam gtan brtan par bya'o// de nas 'bras par 'dod na ma he'i snying kar bsgrub bya bsam par bya ste/ bsgrub bya gzhan rta'i snying kar rnam par
98a8(rgyud): bsam par bya'o// rta dang ma he gnyis phan tshun 'thab par byed par bsam ste/ ji srid du rta dang ma he gnyis phye bar ma gyur gyi bar du'o// phyi nas bsgrub bya de gnyis rab tu mi mdza' bar bsam par bya ste/ 
98b1(rgyud): bsams pa tsam gyis nyi ma bdun gyis nges par mthab par 'gyur te/ gzhan du ma yin no// de nas bskrad par 'dod na de ru yaM las yongs su gyur pa'i rnga mo bsams par bya ste/ ya de'i rgyab dul gi rnam pa las
98b2(rgyud): gyur pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla ba phyed pa'i rnam par bsam par bya'o// de'i steng du bsgrub bya gcer bu skra bshig pa bred par gyur par bsam par bya ste/ ma he'i gdong can gyi sbyor ba la gnas pas de'i rgyab tu
98b3(rgyud): gshin rje'i gzugs lag pa g.yas pas dbyug pa 'dzin pa skra bsil ba rnam par bsam par bya ste/ rnga mo de kha lhor bstan la btang ngo // de'i ming dang bcas par gshin rje'i sngags brjod pas rnam par
98b4(rgyud): bsam par bya'o// rnal 'byor pas 'di bsams pa tsam gyis zhag dbadun na 'di ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa yang skrod par 'gyuraro// gan ngan yang bsam gtan gyi rab tu sbyor ba ni bya rog gam/ bya rgod
98b5(rgyud): kyi rgyab tu bsgrub bya skra grol ba gcer bu rnam par bsam mo// de'i rgyab tu gshin rje rnam par bsam par bya ste/ lag pa dz+ra/ ba thogs pa bsgrub bya'i sgra gzung ba de ma he'i gdong can gyis
98b6(rgyud): bka' bsgo ste/ khe lho ru bltas nas song bar bsam par bya ste/ rtse gcig pa'i sbyor ba bsam par byas na/ rtse gcig pa'i sbyor ba des zhag bdun gyis skrod par 'gyur ro// de nas 'gugs par byed
98b7(rgyud): par 'dod na yi ge yaM las byung ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du a las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du gshin rje'i gzugs lcags kyu dang zhags pa lag tu thogs pa rnam par bsam mo// 
98b8(rgyud): ma he'i gdong ba'i rnal 'byor la gnas pas de la bka' bsgo/ gshin rje song la yul che ge mo nas bu mo che ge mo myur bar khu ga cig/ de skad bskul bas yaM gi rnam par bskyod de song bar rnam par bsam pa
99a1(rgyud): bya'o// bsam gtan 'di'i rab tu sbyor ba la gnas pa'i sngags pas khams gsum du gtogs pa'i bud med bkug la rol par bya'o// ji ltar bsam gtan brtan par gyur
99a2(rgyud): na 'di'i rab tu sbyor ba de dag bya'i gzhan gyis mi bya'o// de nas sbrul gyis zin pa blang ba'i rab tu byed pa gsungs te/ rang gi snying kar pad+ma dkar po mdab ma brgyad pa rnam par bsam mo// de'i steng du dbyangs yig
99a3(rgyud): gsum pa mdab ma brgyad pa rnam par bsam mo// de yis ni 'og gi klu'i gzugs rnam par bsam par bya ste/ de'i spyi bor yi ge i kha dog dkar po las bdud rtsi 'dzag pa bsam par bya'o// klu de'i
99a4(rgyud): mig rnams nas bdud rtsi 'phros nas bsgrub bya de'i lus la thim dpar bsam par bya ste/ bsam gtan 'di'i sbyor bas kha rnams gsum yongasu gang ba'i dug kyang med par 'gyur ro// dug
99a5(rgyud): khur stong yang za nus so// de nas zhu ba'i bsam gtan gyi rab tu sbyor ba 'byung ste/ bsgrub bya mdun du bsam ste/ de'i rkang pa gnyis la yi ge yaM las gyur pa'i rlung gi dkyil
99a6(rgyud): 'khor bsam par bya/ de'i steng du gsang ba'i gnas su me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum kha dog dmar po raM gyis byin gyis brlabs pa bsam par bya'o// de'i steng du snying khar sa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa
99a7(rgyud): mdog ser po lam gyis byin gyis brlabs pa bsam par bya'o// de'i steng du dpral bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam par bya'o// de'i dbusu yi ge ba mgo thur du gnas pa las bdud rtsi 'dzag
99a8(rgyud): par bsam ste/ 'di ni legs par rnam par bsams nas rlung gis me rab tu sbar te/ me des dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor bsregs par rnam par bsam/ dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyi drod kyis bdud
99b1(rgyud): ci'i dkyil 'khor de zhu bar bsam par bya'o// 'di'i sbyor ba tsam gyis ni// de yi bud med du 'gyur te// 'o ma mini shing bzhin du// zhu bar byed par the tshom med// de nas rgyal po'am rgyal po'i blon po dbang
99b2(rgyud): du bya bar 'dod na sngags pa ma he'i gdong can gyi rnal 'byor la rab tu gnas la/ de nyid mdog dmar por bsams te/ bsgrub bya gang du gnas pa de'i steng du gnas la/ phyi nas rang gi lus 'jam
99b3(rgyud): dpal mdog dmar po phyag na lcags kyu dang zhags pa can phyung ste/ 'jam dpal des bsgrub bya'i snying ka dang mgrin pa bcings nas bkug par bsam ste/ 'jam dpal gyi sku la rab tu gzhug go/ 
99b4(rgyud): bsgrub bya de mos par bsam par bya ste/ de'i snying kar yi ge bcu pa'i sngags rnam par bsam par bya'o// yang kha dadog dmar po sgrub pa pos ye shes kyi gzugs kyis yi ge
99b5(rgyud): la gzhug par bya'o// de dang bsgrub bya gcig tu gyur pa bya'o// bsam gtan 'di'i rab tu sbyor bas nyi ma bdun gyis 'khor los bsgyur ba yang dbang du 'gyur te/ ji srid mchog
99b6(rgyud): bar du the tshom med do// rab tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i sngags pas mi g.yo ba'i bsam gtan gyis bya'o// rgyud gang la yang mi sbyin no// gal te sngags kyang mi bstan/ dpal rdo rje
99b7(rgyud): 'jigs byed chen po ma he'i gdong can gyi bsam gtan gang la yang mi sbyin/ smra bar yang mi bya/ sngags kyi dbye ba yang mi bya/ bris sku yang gang gi mdun du yang mi dkram ste/ thang ka yang gsang bar
99b8(rgyud): gzhag go/ rgyud 'di rab tu sbyor ba dang / bzlas pa dang / smra ba gzhan su la yang 'ga' tsam yang mi smra gal te smras na dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed dang / gzhan yang rnal 'byor ma rnams dang / mkha' 'gro
100a1(rgyud): ma rnams kyis za'o// dam tshig nyams par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir sngags pas su la yang mi sbyin no// de nas dam tshig mnyam pa dang / rnam par rtog pa med pa dang / 
100a2(rgyud): dam pa'i brtul zhugs can dpa' bo bla ma la gus pa dul ba can/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la nges par 'dzin pa/ rgyud sbas pa/ mi khro ba/ snying rje dang ldan pa/ bzlas pa dang / bsam gtan
100a3(rgyud): la phyogs pa/ rnam par smin pa la 'dzem pa/ 'di lta bu'i yon tan khyad par can ni slob ma bzang po ste/ dkyil 'khor dam pa dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po la mchog tu gus pa/ snying rje chen pos
100a4(rgyud): yid brlan pa/ rnam par rtog pa med pa/ mchog tu bla mngal gus pa rab tu brtag pa la shin tu rnam par bsams te/ bla mas de lta bu'i slob ma la dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i rgyud
100a5(rgyud): sbyin no// sngags pas gzhan la byin na de dang slob mar/ bcas nas dmyal bar 'gro bar the tshom med do// 'jig rten 'dir ni 'jigs pa chen por 'gyuraro// 'jig rten pha rol
100a6(rgyud): tu ni dmyal bar 'gro'o// dam tshig kyang nyams par 'gyur ro// 'di ni 'jam dpal 'jam pa'i mchog dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las bsam gtan gyi las bsgrub pa'i brtag
100a7(rgyud): pa ste bdun pa'o// / dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i 'khor lo'i rgyud 'bum pa nas btus nas phyung ba rtog pa'i phyogs bklags pas 'grub pa/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen
100a8(rgyud): bo mche'i gdong can gyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i rtog pa rdzogs s+ho// / dpal ur+yan gyi gnas chen po nas dpal 'jam dpal gyi rgyud las phyung rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed
100b1(rgyud): chen po zhes bya ba bla ma dam pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i slob dpon dpal lA li ta badz+ra sa bton nas mdzad pa rdzog s+ho// / rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta mchog gi dngos grub brnyes pa b+ha ro phyag rdum gyi zhal snga/ 
100b2(rgyud): nas dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong rdo rje grags kyi bsgyur ba'o// / bcom ldan 'das dpal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// don dam chos sku zhi ba nyid// gang 'dir khams gsum
100b3(rgyud): rnam rgyal te// gshin rje dgra zhes grags pa yi// 'khor lo bskor ba'i cho ga bshad// yon tan ldan pa'i sngags pa yis// cho ga bzhin du mnyes par bya// dur khrod dben pa la sogs par/ 
100b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor khru do tshad du bya// dri dang ba yi rnam lnga dang / nyi zla sogs pa byi dor bya// ba glang la sogs dam rdzas lnga// gzhan yang tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang // phyi nang phyed pa'i bye brag
100b5(rgyud): gis// legs par mchod pa byas nas ni// 'khor lo bA dang btu ba dang // drang ba dang ni spo ba brtsams// sngags ba rnal 'byor ldan pa yis// lho yi phyogasu kha bltas te// dam/ 
100b6(rgyud): tshig rje su dran pa yis// oM badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM// gsang sngags 'di ni rjes dran byed// 'khor lo bri ba brtsam par bya// dbus nas sor tshad bcu drug par// kun nas zlum pos bskor na ni// 'di ni nang gi
100b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor te// rim pa gsum du bskor ba la// sgo med lcags mkhar bcu drug bya// 'di ni gshin rje'i grong khyer te// srid pa gsum gyi 'jug sa yin// de yi phyi rim mu khyud gsum// kun
100b8(rgyud): tu lcags ris bskor ba ste// mu khyud de dag re re yang // khang pa sum cu gnyis dang ldan// bgro ba'i chos bzhin gsod pa yi// 'khor lo 'di ltar bris nas ni// phyi rol mu khyud tha ma la// yi ge ka sogs/ 
101a1(rgyud): da yig mthar// nganya bsal nas dgod par bya// yi ge d+ha sogs k+Sha yig mthar// de yi rjes su bri bar bya// mu khyud dbus ma dag la ni// dbyangs yig bcu gnyis nyis
101a2(rgyud): 'gyur dgod// btu dang dgod sogs rtsom pa na// mtshan ma 'di dag shes par bya// zla ba mig dang yon tan dang // rig byed mda' dang dbang po dang // rgya mtsho bkra shis gza' dang phyogs// dregs pa nyi ma
101a3(rgyud): yan lag sogs// tshes zhes bya bar rab tu grags// phyi rol mu khyud tha ma la// shar gyi tshangs thig nas brtsams nas// rim min gza' can khang pa nas// yi ge bkra shis tsam blangs te// nang gi ngos
101a4(rgyud): kyi mu khyud kyi// tshangs thig gi ni ngos dag la// phyogs bzhir dadamig gi tshad du sbyin// rim min phyogs can khang pa nas/ yig dmigs gi tshad blangs te// shar du de'i g.yas g.yon
101a5(rgyud): bzhag/ rim min bkra shis khang pa nas// dbyangs yig gnyi sa pa can blangs nas// mig gi tshad du byas nas ni// de yi ngos la re re gzhag/ nub kyi tshangs thig nas bgrangs pa'i/ 
101a6(rgyud): rgya mtsho can gyi khang pa nas// dbyangs yig bcu cig pa ldan pa// mig gi tshad du blangs nas ni// lho'i ngos su de bzhin sbyin// nub nas rim pa min pa'o// zla ba can gyi khyim nas ni// dbyangs yig
101a7(rgyud): bcu gsum pa ldan pa// mig gi tshad du blangs nas ni// lho ngos de rjes sbyin par bya// de nyid dbyangs yig gsal ba ni// mig gi tshad du blangs nas kyang // sngon sbyin nub kyi ngos su sbyin// nub nas bkra
101a8(rgyud): shis khang pa nas// dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa ldan pa// mig gi tshad du blangs nas ni// nub kyi ngos su de bzhin sbyin// byang nas bkra shis khang pa nas// dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa ldan pa// 
101b1(rgyud): mig gi tshad du blangs nas ni// byang gi ngos la de bzhin sbyin// rlung gis bon zhes bya ba// mig gi tshad blangs de bzhin sbyin// mda' can khang pa na gnas pa'i// 'od kyi gong bur byas pa dang // de nyid nas ni
101b2(rgyud): bgrangs pa yi// gza' can khang pa la gnas pa// dbyangs yig gnyis pa ldan pa dag/ zla ba'i tshad du blangs nas ni// byang shar mtsham su re re sbyin// rgya mtsho'i khang pa la gnas pa// dbyangs yig
101b3(rgyud): gnyis pa ldan pa dag/ rim min yon tan khang pa nas// zla ba'i tshad du blangs nas ni// shar lho mtsham su de bzhin sbyin// rim min bkra shis khang pa nas// dbyangs yig lnga pa ldan pa dag/ yan lag
101b4(rgyud): can gyi khang pa nas// zla ba'i tshad du blangs nas ni// lho nub mtsha rnams su de bzhin sbyin// rim min tshes can khang pa nas// dbyangs yig gsum pa ldan pa dang // rim min bkra shis khang
101b5(rgyud): pa nas// zla ba'i tshad du blang nas ni// byang shar mtshams su de bzhin sbyin// de ltar dgod par byas nas ni// de nas drang kha brtsams par bya// dam tshig rje su dran byed cing // rdo rje shugs
101b6(rgyud): dang ldan pa yi// shar gyi tshangs thig ngos gnyis nas// yi ge zung ldan drangs nas ni// dbus kyi khang par gzhag par bya// phyogs gzhan tshangs thig ngos dag na// de bzhin zung ldan drangs nas ni/ 
101b7(rgyud): de bzhin dbus kyi khang par bzhag/ de nas shar gyi yi ger yang // rim pa gnyis pa'i khang par drangs// phyogs gzhan du yang de bzhin no// shar gyi zung ldan gsum pa yang // rim pa gsum/ 
101b8(rgyud): pa'i khang par drang // phyogs gzhan du yang de bzhin no// mtshams kyi yi ge ya bral 'dis// rang rang gi ni mtshams su drangs// de dag phyung ba'i khong steng du// dbyangs kyi yi ge drang bar bya// dbyangs
102a1(rgyud): kyi yi ge bzhi la ni// ming gi yi ge drang bar bya// so so'i las dang 'thun pa yi// bskul ba'i yi ge dgod par bya// bsad dang bskrad dang dbye ba la// yi ge phaT ni bzhag/ 
102a2(rgyud): par bya// mnan pa la yang yi ge lam// zhi ba la ni yi ge oM// rgyas pa de bzhin yi ge sa// dbang la ba gyis brgyan pa ste// dgug pa la ni yi ge dza// de la las kyi 'od zer ni// zhi ba chu ste rgyas pas
102a3(rgyud): dbang ni rlung ste drag po me// dbye dgug bskrad pa dbang dang 'thun// mnan pa dag ni rgyas pa bzhin// drang ba'i sbyor ba byas nas ni// sre ba'i sbyor ba rtsam par bya// gnyis med sngags dang ldan pa yis/ 
102a4(rgyud): dbus kyi bkra shis yi ge yang // zla ltar 'od kyi gong bur bya// sngags kyi rgyal po bcu pa yang // 'od kyi gong bu de nang du// 'dod pa'i bsgrub bya bzhag par bya// de dkyil rang ming
102a5(rgyud): dang por bzhag/ phyogs kyi khyim na gnas pa yi// yi ge// zung ma thams cad dang // de tshe 'od kyi gong bur blta// sngags kyi rgyal po bcu pa yang // bcu gnyis khyim du spel
102a6(rgyud): te bri byin rlob hUM zhes bya ba yang // khang pa re la zur res dgye// yongs su dag pa dgod byas nas// mchod dang gtor ma byas nas ni// spo ba dag ni brtsam par bya// las kyi dbye ba ji lta
102a7(rgyud): bar la 'khor lo las ni blang bya ste// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa la// shin tu rgyas pa'i ras la bya// dbang dang dgug la smad 'tshong sogs// bsad dang dbye dang bskrad pa dang // mnan pa la ni dur
102a8(rgyud): khrod ras// gi wang gur gum zhi ba rgyas// dbang dang dgug la tsan dan dmar// mnan pa la ni ldong ros sogs// bskrad la bya rog khrag gis te// dbye ba rta dang ma he sogs// bsad la dug/ 
102b1(rgyud): la sogs pas bri// dge ba'i las la bzang po'i shing // dge min la ni rus pa dang // lcags la sogs pas bri bar bya// zhi la shar blta dbang la nug/ rgyas la byang ste drag po lho// gzhan ni
102b2(rgyud): ci rigs sbyar bar bya// zhi rgyas dbang dang dgug pa la// sa bskor rim bzhin dgod par bya// gnam bskor dag ni rim par bzlog/ bsang bskad dbye ba mnan pa la// sa bskor rims las bzlog
102b3(rgyud): pa ste// gnam bskor dag ni rim bzhin bri// de ltar legs par ma bris na// 'khor lo rang la ldog par 'gyur// de bas nan tan bskyed de bya// ras kyi 'khor lo legs zin nas// dkyil
102b4(rgyud): 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor te// ras kyi 'khor lor spyan dadrangs te// rdo rje bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// dkyil 'kho/ dar 'khor lo btu bar bya// ras kyi 'khor lo mchod nas ni/ 
102b5(rgyud): bden pa'i byin rlabs dmigs par bya// ji ltar gsungs pa 'i cho ga bzhin// 'khor lo spo ba byas nas ni// gas nga sngags bzlas pa brtsam par bya// oM badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dam
102b6(rgyud): tshig gi sngags so// oM badz+ra be ga/ rdo rje shugs kyi sngags so// oM badz+ra a sa me tris me ma hA sa ma ye swA hA// yi ge bsre ba'i sngags so// oM badz+ra sa mA dza/ 'khor lo spo ba'i sngags so// 
102b7(rgyud): oM badz+ra sa ma ya ya ma rA dzA sa do ma ya// ya me do ru Na yod ya/ ya da yo ni ra yak+She ya/ bak+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya phaT phaT/ 'di ni rtsa ba'i sngags te/ las thams cad pa'o// shIn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ zhi bar
102b8(rgyud): bskul ba'o// puSh+TiM ku ru sA hA/ rgyas pa'o// ba shaM ku ru swA hA/ dbang gi'o// ma ra sa phaT bsad pa'o// uts+tsha Ta ya swA hA/ bskrad pa'i'o// staM b+ha ya hU la/ mnan pa yi'o// A kaR+Sha ya hUH
103a1(rgyud): dza dgug pa yi'o// oM suM sur dgrol ba'i sngags so// a li ka li grong khyer ni// gsang sngags 'byung ba'i rtsa ba ste// las kyi btson dag kyang yin// yig btub med/ 
103a2(rgyud): na ni// gsang sngags sgra ni log par 'gyur// yi ge tshang bar ma bkod na// gsang sngags sgra ni log par 'gyur// gsang sngags brda yis ma brjod na// sngags ni dngos grub med par 'gyur// 
103a3(rgyud): drang ba dag ni ma byas na// shin tu 'khor bar mi 'gyur ro// yi ge bsreb ma byas na// bcu drug khang pa don med 'gyur// bskor phyogs log na don mi 'grub// rig sngags nyams dang log
103a4(rgyud): pa ni// lha min g.yul las pham pa dang // dbang po dgra yis bsad bzhin no// 'khor lo slob ma byas na// cho ga dag ni nyams par 'gyur// rgyu yin pa dang sbyor ba dang // dad pa
103a5(rgyud): brtan pas 'grub par 'gyur// de bas nan tan bskyed de bya/ dpal gshin rje gshed kyi 'khor lo bri ba'i cho ga'o// rdzogs s+ho/  // de nas gzhan yang bshad
103a6(rgyud): bani las kyi grogs kyis byed pa ste// zhi ba'i las ni zla ba yin// rgyas pa de bzhin mig tu bsgrags// dbye ba yon tan zhes bya s+ho// dbang du bya ba rig byed min// dgug pa'i las la de bzhin
103a7(rgyud): mdam sa brgad dang mnan pa dbang po bzhin// mnan pa'i rjes su 'brangs pa yis// bsad pa'i las ni rgya mtshor 'dod// las rnams de dag re re sang // 'phags tshogs mchod sbyin / 
103a8(rgyud): boH// nyis gnyis pa gtor ma sbyin// gsum pa bzlas pa rnam par 'bang // bzhi bsnyen grag chang bar bya// lnga pa las kyi 'khor lo bzhir// drug pa bsam gtan ci gcig bya// bdun
103b1(rgyud): pa las kyi lhag chad bskang // grangs kyi las la khyad par du// las kyi gtsor ni gang sgrub de'i// 'khor lo bskor ba nyi ma bzhi// las kyi bye brag 'di shes na// zhi bas 'jigs pa brgyad las
103b2(rgyud): skyob/ rgyas pa yon tan drug dang 'byor// dbang gi mos pa rnam bzhir bsgyur// dbye bas gsang sde brgyad dang 'byed// mnan pas dbang po drug 'ching byed// gzhan yang ji lta de bzhin du/ 
103b3(rgyud): sngags dang rdzas kyi sbyor ba la// dpyad na dngos grub mi 'grub ste// gal te yid gnyis za gyur tam// bsam pa 'gyur ram dad pa nyams// de tshe dngos grub nye ba yang // phyir bzlog 'gyur bar
103b4(rgyud): gdon mi za// dad pa brtan par bsgrubs pas na// na mkha' med par gyur na yang // sngags kyi dngos grub med mi srid// lha dang drang srong gis bshad pa'i// rig sngags
103b5(rgyud): bslu ba mi srid na// 'dod chags bral bas bshad pa yi// gsang sngags sbyor bas bslu ba ni// ma byung 'byung bar// mi 'gyur ro// chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// don la/ 
103b6(rgyud): the tshom med pa yi// mkhas pa la ni dngos grub te/ rtog cing dpyod pa'i rtog ge ba// de la sgrub pa'i dngos grub ring // man ngag dam pa brtan byas kyang // slob ma yid gnyis za gyur na// 
103b7(rgyud): de la dngos grub ring bar bshad// bla mas man ngag sbas byas kyang // slob ma yid gnyis mi za zhing // bla ma'i man ngag dam pa zhes// gces spras byas na 'grub par nges// de yi phyir
103b8(rgyud): na sngags pa yis// rang gi yid gnyis spang ba'i phyir// bla ma mnyes par bya ba gces// bsnyen bkur byas pas nus mthu che// gsang ste brjod pas bar chad med// yon tan phul ba byas pas ni// 
103b9(rgyud): yang na blun mo pa pa brtan// de la sbyor ba'i dngos grub nyi// 
104a1(rgyud): rang sems rin chen rnam gnyis 'gyur// rin chen gnyis las grub par 'byung // dkon par gyur na bsngags pa brjod// bsngags na yon tan 'byung 'gyur te// bsngag/ 
104a2(rgyud): bdag ni ma byas na// ji ltar yid bzhin nor bu yang // gang gis bsngags pa ma byas na// de la 'dod don mi ster ro// dad pa sangs rgyas dad pa chos// dad pa dge 'dun dad pa ma// dad pa bla ma dad pa pa
104a3(rgyud): dad pa lam chen dad pa gru// dad pa yid bzhin nor bu ste// dad pa gsang sngags dngos grub nyid// dad pa bsod nams nor yin te// de yi phyir na sngags pa yis// rang sems dad pa bskyed pa'i
104a4(rgyud): phyir// gzhan la gus pa mchog tu bkur// rdzogs sngo// / de nis gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sngags pa das rtag tu brten pa ni// ru sbal 'o ma zhes bya ba// de bzhin 'od
104a5(rgyud): kyi lo ma dang // 'jim pa skam po nyid dang ni// de bzhin me yi khu ba dang // sgra snang gi ni rdzas dag dang // 'di rnams rtag tu dpyad na ni// rang bzhin gyis ni nad med cing // tshe ring
104a6(rgyud): dbang po rgyas pa dang // rtag tu lang cho dar la bab// lha rnams kun gyis byin gyis rlob// 'di la dpyad par mi bya ste// mthu dang ngo bo nyid kyis grub// ting 'dzin sngags kyis byin rlabs nas/ 
104a7(rgyud): las kyi rnam smin sbyong bar byed// rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa la gnas// de phyir cho ga bzhin du brten// tshes cig skya reng shar ba ni// snod la ma reg ru sbal no// drod ma yal bar btung ba 'am// yang na nyi
104a8(rgyud): ma'i sbu gus btung // mar gyi ngo yi tshes gcig la// 'od kyi lo ma btsal nas ni// de nyid nas ni bzung bar bya// zhag gsum chu yis char pa btang // lo ma de bcad bza' bar bya// yang na nyi ma
104b1(rgyud): rmu gus btung // 'jim pa skam po sbyar nas ni// nag gsum chu yi nang du spang // de blangs nas ni yang bskams nas// phye ma byi la'i slar chad re// ba yi 'o ma dang sbyar nas// sngags pas
104b2(rgyud): rtag tu btang bar bya// me yi sdong po ser po na// sa yi mar gyis dril nas ni// kha sbyar sbyor dang ldan byas na// me chus yis btsir nas ni// btung ba'am nyi ma'i sbu gus btung // lan cha bral ba dag/ 
104b3(rgyud): la ni/ zhag gsum 'chi ba'i sgra brnyan rdzas// nam gyi dus la sngags pas blang // cha gsum snod du zhag gsum bzhag/ kha yi cha ni byugs pa ste// dbus ma'i tshe ni bdud rtsi nyid // rtsa ba'i cha ni
104b4(rgyud): dor ba ste// 'di rnams so sor brten pa na// tho ma la 'bru/ sa bu gsum gyi phye// byi la'i sngar tshang de dang sbyar// ma sbyar na yang nyes pa med// tshogs par bsten nas bza' bar/ 
104b5(rgyud): bya// re re sten yang nyes pa med// dam rdzas rmad du bsgyur teb/ na pa'i cho ga rdzogs s+ho// nad med rnams kyi chub grub rtags bshad pa'o// dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed
104b6(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// bcom ldan nyid kyi sku gsung thugs// rdo rje rnams las byung ba yi// rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po yi// lho phyogs rgya mtsho ba bskal nas// de na
104b7(rgyud): gshin rje'i grong khyer ni// ga la ba yi gnasu byon// mi bzad zhabs ni bcu drug gis// lcags mkhar sgo med bcu drug brdzis// ye shes rtse gcig mtshan ma yis// dbus kyi lcags mkhar chen po
104b8(rgyud): brdzis// de tshe bdud chen las brgyad nas// ha ma hi hi sgra sgrogs pas// chos kyi rgyal po la sogs pa// gzir bzhin du ni rab smras pa// dpa' bo chen po ga la ci// dpa' bo'i dgongs pa bdag gis
105a1(rgyud): bgyi// bdag cag srog gi snying po rnams// tshul bzhin 'bul gyis dpa' bo bzhes// lha ma yin sde brgyad kyi srog gi yang snying phul ba ni// gshin rjes ya phuH
105a2(rgyud): ma mos ma// srin pos ra phul gnod sbyin k+She/ mi yis na phul sa bdag sa// btsan gyis tsa phul bdud kyi nga// de rnams cig tu dril ba ni// bran du yang ni khas blangs so// gtan tshigs
105a3(rgyud): chen po de yi phyir// ye shes lnga yi dgongs pa dang // bsnyen pa nyams 'og rab chung nas// lha yi bsnyen pa rab chung nas// sngon gyi thugs dam las mi 'da'// mi 'grub pa ni mi srid
105a4(rgyud): do ya ma rA dzas do med ya// ya me do ru Na yod ya// ya da ro na ra yak+She ya// yak+Sha yats+tsha ni rA ma ya/ hUM hUM da phaT phaT// de skad smras pa dang // rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po/ 
105a5(rgyud): yis// chos kyi rgyal po la sogs pa// gshin rje'i po nya la sogs kun// sgrol ba'i ging du byin gyis pra rlabs// ma dang sring ma bu mo dang // 'khor bcas kun la
105a6(rgyud): bka' bsgo ba// lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma la// nga yi bstan pa 'byung ba'i tshe// rnal 'byor rigs 'dzin ldan pa la// bka' bsgo'i las rnams tshul bzhin gyis// zhes pas dam bcas pa
105a7(rgyud): dang // mnan bzhin du mna' bor ro// gtam brgyud kyi rtog pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ ya mA ri kr-iSh+Na karma sarba tsakra sid+d+ha kar na ma tan+t+ra rA dzA/ bod skad du
105a8(rgyud): gshin rje gshed dgra nig po'i 'khor lo las thams cad grub par byed pa ces bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis
105b1(rgyud): thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i btsun mo'i b+ha ga la gti mug rdo rje dang / ser sna rdo rje dang / 'dod chags
105b2(rgyud): rdo rje dang / pra dog rdo rje dang / sa rdo rje dang / chu rdo rje dang / me rdo rje dang / rlung rdo rje dang / byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po ma dang / yon tan gyi phreng ba ma dang / sem kyi rgyud tshim par byed
105b3(rgyud): pa ma dang / brtson 'grus kyi ngo bo ma dang / bdug spos ma dang / me tog ma dang / mar me ma dang / dri chab ma dang / de la sogs pa dpag tu med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs s+ho/ 
105b4(rgyud): de nas lha mo be ta li stan las langs te// thal mo sbyar nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar 'di na gdug pa can rnams kyis
105b5(rgyud): sems can thams cad la 'che bar bgyid pa dang / ma 'ongs pa na yang theg pa chen po pa dang / sems ca na thams cad la'ang 'tsha bar bgyid pa dag 'byung na de rnams
105b6(rgyud): ji ltar tshar bcad par bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das bgegs thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las snying
105b7(rgyud): po 'byung ngo // hrI/ de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das nyid zhal drug pu zhabs drug pa'i ngo bor gyur nas ma he ru gnyis pa la brdzis te/ ma he'i bdag po chung ma bcas par oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA/ 
105b8(rgyud): na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA// zhes zhal bzhad pa dang bcas pas// oM gsung zhing mnan par gyur to// lha dang / lha ma yin dang / bdud thams cad kyang skrag cing 'dar ba dang bcas pas
106a1(rgyud): 'dud par gyur to// tshangs pa dang dbang po la sogs pa thams cad kyang phyag 'tshal zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan khro bo yi// rgyal po chen po rab 'jigs pa/ 
106a2(rgyud): thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// de nas sgrub pa bshad bya ba// rtsibs brgyad dbus kyi lte ba la// bdag nyid phyag dang zhal rnams ni// drug drug ldan par
106a3(rgyud): gyur pa sgom// zhabs kyang de dang 'dra bar ste// g.yas kyi dang po'i phyag na ni// rdo rje tho ba g.yas gnyis na// ral gri de bzhin g.yon gyi yang // dang por zhags pa bsdigs mdzub ldan// gnyis pA
106a4(rgyud): gtun shing legs par 'dzin// rdo rje dril bu tha mas bsnams // steng zhal nag po rab 'jigs pa// zhabs gnyis rdo rje skyil krung ste/ bskum gar gyis zhabs bzhir gnas/ 
106a5(rgyud): stag lpags kyis ni srad dkris shing // seng ge se ra la ra/ la pa ni// gyen 'greng bsdus te spyi bor yang // thod/ pa'i phreng bas rnam par bcings// 'di ni khro bo tshol ba ste/ 
106a6(rgyud): lag cha sna tshogs dag dag ldan// shar rtsibs la sogs rnam bzhi la// gti mug sogs te bzhi po yang // dkar dang ser dang dmar ba yang // de bzhin bzhi pa ljang ku ste// g.yas kyis
106a7(rgyud): 'khor lo rin chen 'bar// pad+ma sna tshogs rdo rje ste// g.yon gyis dril bu legs par 'dzin// mtsham su lam sogs las skyes pa// lha mo bzhi po nges par bsam// bdag po 'dra ste sgeg
106a8(rgyud): nyams 'dzin// grwa yi lha mo mtshan la ni// lA s+ye mu ti kur ldan no// rin chen phreng ba phyag gnyis bsnams// pi wang sgrogs pa'i gsung dbyangs can// gar gyi rgyas par 'gro ba yi// don la
106b1(rgyud): rtag tu brtson 'grus ldan// bdug spos sogs dang bzhi po yang // rang gi mtshan ma nges par 'dzin// phyag rgya'i sngags rnams brjod pas so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
106b2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi bdag pos gti mug rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM dzi na dzig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sngags 'di gsungs pa ni ser sna rdo rje'o// 
106b3(rgyud): oM rat+na d+h+r-ika/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sngags 'di gsungs so// oM A ro li ka ste 'dod chags rdo rje'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de
106b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos phrag dog rdo rje 'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
106b5(rgyud): po bde bar gshegs pas sa rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsungs so// lo tsa na hUM// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos chu rdo rje'i sngags 'di
106b6(rgyud): gsungs so// mas ma hAd+hA/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag zos me rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsungs sa// bAn+d+ha ra d+ha/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
106b7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rlung rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsungs so// tA ra a/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bde ba chen po bskyed par byed par/ 
106b8(rgyud): sngags 'di gsungs so// lA ste/ de nas yang yon tan brgyud pa bla ma'i sngags 'di gsungs so// mA lI/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyangs can ma bskyed par byed pa'i sngags 'dig sum
107a1(rgyud): gI ti/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi gar ma'i sngags 'di gsungs so// nr-i ti/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mchod pa'i sngags rnams gsungs pa ni/ oM badz+ra d+hU pa/ 
107a2(rgyud): oM badz+ra puSh+pa/ oM badz+ra dI pa/ oM badz+ra gan+d+he/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das thams cad 'gugs par byed pa'i sngags dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzhug pa dang / de bzhin gshegs/ 
107a3(rgyud): pa thams cad bcing ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su dgyes par byed pa'i sngags rnams bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos gsungs pa ni/ oM badz+ra aM
107a4(rgyud): ku sha dzaHoM badz+ra pA sha hUM/ oM badz+ra s+pho Ta baM/ oM badz+ra A be sha hoHblo ldan mkhas pas ci nus kyis// thig gis thig ni gdab pa la// tshad ldan 'jur mdud med pa dang // gsher zhing
107a5(rgyud): sar pa mdzes pa yis// shar du bltas te gdab par bya// tshangs thig gnyis pa gdab pa yang // lho ru bltas te/ gdab par bya// de 'og mtha' yi thig gdab pa// byin zar gnas
107a6(rgyud): te dbang ldan blta// rlung gnas bden bral kha bltas te// nub tu legs par bri bar bya// de gnas shar du kha bltas te// byang du bri te byin zar gnas// bden bral min pa'i mtha' ma gdab// blta
107a7(rgyud): ba bden bral phyog su'o// slob dpon ldang min grogs po ni// ri dgas zhon pa'i phyogs 'dug ste// mtshams thig dang po gdab par bya// gnyis pa'ang bden bral phyogs 'dug ste// bgegs
107a8(rgyud): phyogs brkyang la gdab par bya// dbus dang mtha' mar phye ba yi// gzhal yas khang pa'i mtshan nyid ni// gru bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dang // rta babs bzhis ni brgyan pa yi// dbus kyi rtsibs brgyad
107b1(rgyud): lte ba la// rdo rje tho ba bri bar bya// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus nyid du// gri gug kyang ni bri bar bya// shar rtsibs 'khor lo chen po ste// rin chen lho yi phyogs rtsibs la// pad+ma dmar po nub tu bri/ 
107b2(rgyud): byang du rdo rje kun tu rtse// shar lho phyog su'ang de dang 'dra// grwa bzhir brgyad po'ang nyis rtseg tu// mtshan ma rnams ni legs par bri// sgo bzhi dag tu bri bar yang // lcags kyu zhags pa sgrog dril bu/ 
107b3(rgyud): gzhan yang rgyan kun legs par bri// mchod pa legs par dgram par bya// khu tshur dku gnyis bzhag pa dang // de bzhin dpral bar nyug pa dang // kha nas 'byin dang gar bskyod dang // bdug spos
107b4(rgyud): nyug dang me tog mthor// mthe bong sgreng ste rang lus la 'am// gzhan la nyug tshul gnas pa ni// brgyad po mchod pa'i dalha mo dag/ bskyed dang legs gnas phyag rgya yin// sku
107b5(rgyud): gsung thugs kyi lha rnams dang // rang lus bcug ste gnas pa la// sngags kyis byin gyis brlab pa ni// oM sarba ta tha ga ta kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tha/ 
107b6(rgyud): badz+ra sa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko ho/ mig sogs byin gyis brlab pa la// gti mug rdo rje sogs kyis srung // dbang sbubs stong pa nyid byas te// snying po 'am
107b7(rgyud): ming gi yi ge yis// rigs kyi phyag mtshan bsnams pa yi// sku rnams nges par bskyed pas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bdud rtsi
107b8(rgyud): myang ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te sngags 'di gsungs so// oM AHhUM/ dag cing 'bar bar rnam rtags te/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pas// zhes sdang rdo
108a1(rgyud): rje'i bdag po ste// zla ba'i dbus su gti mug bsam// rin chen dbusu bsam pa yang // ser sna nyid du bsam par bya// pad+ma'i dbus su 'dod chags bsam/ 
108a2(rgyud): sna tshogs dbusu phrag dog bsam// bsam bya ljags la sa bon te// 'phros pas bkug ste tshim par bya// shar ni dkar po chen po ste// lho ni ser po nyid du'o// nub ni dmar por nges par shes// byang
108a3(rgyud): ni ljang kur yang dag ldan// de las de bzhin re ga'i rim// dkyil 'khor sgom pa'i tshe na yang // byams dang snying rje dga' btang snyoms// tshad med pa yi rim pa yis// sems can rnams la phan
108a4(rgyud): gdags phyir// brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po rnams// yod min med min gnyis ka min// gnyis ka min pa'ang ma yin/  te// spros bral ngo bo med par sgom// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra sa
108a5(rgyud): b+hA ba At+ma ko he// raM las nyi ma rnam bsgoms te// de dbus la/ spyi rdo rje ni// kun tu rtsa lnga'i rang bzhin te// de dbus hUM la sa rdo rje ni// kun tu phra mos bgegs bcom ste// re ba gurd
108a6(rgyud): sa gzhi yang // de yi 'og tu nges par sgom// gru gsum gyen sgreng dkar po ni// shin tu gsal bar bdag gis dmigs// zhe sdang las ni sngar ma byung // byung zhing 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// byang chub sems
108a7(rgyud): la gzhol ba dang // gtong zhing thos pa'i khengs pa med// le lo bcom zhing khro ba med// ser sna med de g.yo yang med// sgyu spangs shes rab gsal ba dang // gcig tu theg pa che la gzhol// des ni dka'
108a8(rgyud): ba med par yang // gzhan gyi don du 'di brtsams na// grangs ni bye ba tshang ba yis// bcu bzhir chang ba'i gsang sngags kyis// las rnams kun grub the tshom med// yang lha mos bcom ldan 'das la 'di/ 
108b1(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// de yi 'khrul 'khor ji lta bu// yi ge rnams ni ji ltar bri// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bdun tshan bdun dang ldan pa yi// re mig legs par bri bar bya// las kun
108b2(rgyud): byed pa'i 'khor lo la// mchod pa yis kyang legs mchod la// de 'og las rnams brtsam par bya// bzlas pa'i mtshan ma rmi lam 'am// mngon sum byung bar gyur nas kyang // 'khrul 'khor rnams
108b3(rgyud): ni bri bya ba'i// rmi lam mtshan ma 'di yin te// tshal chen zug pa'i gling dag dang // lha gang mchod rten gzhal yas su// dam pa rnams dang nges phrad de// dbang bskur ri la 'dzegs pa dang // rgya mtshor
108b4(rgyud): bcas pa'i chu rgal lam// kla klo bran du 'khor rmin// nges dpar 'grub ste 'khor lo bri// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dkyis 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa gsungs te// yaM las
108b5(rgyud): byung ba'i rlung dkyil 'khor// sngon po gzhu'i dbyibs can la/ ba dan ldan par nges par bsam// raM las byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor// gru gsum dmar po bsam par bya// baM las
108b6(rgyud): byung ba chu yin te// dkar po zlum po bsam par bya// lam byungs yi dkyil 'khor ni// ljang ser gru bzhi bsam byas te// sngon du bsam bya lta rims bzhin// tar phyin nas nges par bsam// bruM las byung
108b7(rgyud): ba'i 'khor lo'i rtsibs// drug gnyis ldan pa'i lte ba la// bru las gzhal yas khang pa ste// gdan dang ldan par sgrub pos bsam// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags kyi/ 
108b8(rgyud): bde bar gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa bsdu bar bya'o// oM badz+ra sa mA dzaHlag ngar gnyis ni nges bsnol la// mdzub gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul byas te// se gol brdab cing brdung bar bya// lcags
109a1(rgyud): kyul sogs rnam pa bzhis// nges par dgug pa la sogs bya// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos mchod pa'i sngags 'di gsu
109a2(rgyud): oM ar+g+ha pra tIts+tsha swA hA// pra ba ra sad kA ra pra tits+tsha swA hA// nag po ra ri med pa yi// bum pa lto che bre tshang ba// mchu 'phyang mgrin ring gdan ldan par// snying por ldan pa'i sman sogs gzhugs// mgrin
109a3(rgyud): bar ras bzang dag gis dkri/ mdab mar ldan pa'i lcug ma yang // dri dang ldan pa'i kha rgyan te// bdud rtsir ldan pa yis kyang mchod// bla re gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang // ba dan sil snyan rol mo rmi
109a4(rgyud): gus pas dkyil 'khor la yang mchod// 'dzam bu'i gling ngam gling gzhan dag/ nor bu rin chen bkang ba yang // stod gsum la sogs de bzhin te// zhum pa med par byas te
109a5(rgyud): dbul// blo ldan sgrub pos sems can la// phan pa'i sems kyis srog mi gcod// ma byin par yang mi blang ngo // 'dod pa mi spyad brdzun mi smra// gnod pa'i rgyu phyir chang mi btung / 
109a6(rgyud): gdug pa rnams la bzlog te bya// dngos su 'am yang na sngags dang gzhan// 'khrul 'khor dang ni ting 'dzin// sman gyis kyang ni bya ba ste// de ltar mi byed de yi ni// nges par dam tshig nyams par
109a7(rgyud): 'gyur// gdon dang log 'dren dag gis kyang // nges par 'chi ste dmyal bar ni// yun rings sdug bsngal gyis sdung ste// de bas nan tan ldan pa ru// bzod pa mi bskyod snying rje yis// sngags kyis nges
109a8(rgyud): par bsad par bya// mi ldog pa'i semasu gnas// byang chub chu yis ra ro zhing // shes rab pha rol phyin pa yi// phyag rgya che la de gzhon te// ngo bo dang bral dngos po 'jig/ ma byin byang chub blang ba la/ 
109b1(rgyud): brtson pas le le dor bar bya// brdzun du shes bya dngos po rnams// de nas de bzhin gzhan la brjod// rgyas btab pa yi dngos po la// rgyab shig shes rab ral gri yis// bcad cing rnam pa med pa la/ 
109b2(rgyud): bsad pa yang ni nga yis bsgrags// ud med pa yi ge rnams// steng gi g.yas phyogs nyid nas bri// 'og gi yi ge bri ba ni// de nyid g.yon gyi phyogs nas bri// a li ka li nges bris te// k+Sha ma gtogs
109b3(rgyud): par dbus stong ste// de la bgegs kyi mtshan ma 'am// ming sogs nges par bri ba yang // lto ba'i nang du chud par bri// 'khor lo nyid kyang de 'dra ba// grwa bzhi dag tu bri ba ni// ma ning 'dod pa'i ka li
109b4(rgyud): dang / a li min te lhag ma yin// gdug pa'i yi ge bcu bzhi po// ming dang bcas par phyogs bzhir bri// dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi pa yis// bzhi pa gcig gi mgo stengs su// sum
109b5(rgyud): bskor nyid ni shis pa yin// las kun byed pa'i 'khor lo de// 'dri bar byed pa'i spyi dus dang // khyad par dus tshes lha yi// ni// rnal 'byor med pas bya ba min// phyogasu blta ba'i
109b6(rgyud): bye brag gis// las kyi sgrub pos shes par bya// las kun byed pa'i 'a khor lo ni// bde gshegs kun gyi snying po ste// de bzhin ga shegs pa'i bsang ba'ang yin// 'khor lo 'dir ni bcug
109b7(rgyud): pa gang // sangs rgyas kyang ni nges par 'jig/ dam chos smod pa'ang de bzhin zhi// 'khor los bsgyur ba'ang dbang du 'du// lha min pra ti'ang zhi bar byed// dgra bcom gsod pa'ang de zhi la// brgya byin
109b8(rgyud): nyid kyang dbang du nges// de lta bu yi 'khor lo de// thog mar bris te de 'og tu// byin rlabs ma nor de nyid la// mchod pa gus par bdag gis bya// mchod min las rnams byas pa la// 'bras
110a1(rgyud): bu 'byung min 'khrul pa'ang // 'bras medangal ba nyid yin no// yang lha mo langs ma nyid stan las langs te mchod pa chen po byas te 'di skad ces gsol pa btab bo// 
110a2(rgyud): 'khor lo 'dra ba'i sdug chagang// bri ga zhi sdug gu dza lta bu// gcigags 'on te de tha dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ leg so lags so// 
110a3(rgyud): de'i phyir legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do// ji ltar las rnams bye brag yod pa ltar// bri ba'i gnas dang gzhug pa'i gnas// tha dad de bzhin 'khor lo sgrug// snag cha tha dang
110a4(rgyud): rnams bzhin// grong khyer chen po srung 'dod dam// skyes pa srung ba/ ra 'dod na yang // gro ga de bzhin u b+hi shun zla gor zho sha shun pa'am// ras la kha ches 'khor lo ni// bskul
110a5(rgyud): ba'i tshig dang ldan par ro// som btang ba'i kham por du// sdang ma ra dag dbus 'khor lo gzhug/ skud pa dkar pos leg/ sa bar dkri/ nang par shar du kha bltas te// me tig / 
110a6(rgyud): po dag gis mchod// bdag nyid dkar po'i mdog tu bsam// mdun du skyes pa zla ba la// mtha' dag gnas pa bdun du bsam// sangs rgyas phyogs bcur bzhugs pa yis// bdud rtsi lngas gang bum
110a7(rgyud): pa yis// chu rgyun dag gis dbang bskur te// de 'og bzlas pa brtsam par bya// swA hA'i sngon du bskul tshig ldan// bud med la ni gi wang ste// phyi rol mtshams bzhir pur pa yis// bgegs bskrad steng
110a8(rgyud): dubla re bre// phye ma skyes pa'i ji bzhin no// bye brag tu yang skyes pa 'am// bud med zhi bar 'dod na yang // ga bur tsan dan dag gis ni// shir sha shing gi shun pa las// 'khor lo yi ge legs bri te/ 
110b1(rgyud): shar du nang par bltas te mchod// las kun byed pa'i thab la yang // sngo gsungs zhal ldan bgod par bya// phyi rol mtshams bzhir phur ba yis// bgegs bskrad steng du bla bre// bum pa brgyan
110b2(rgyud): dang ldan zhing // rin chen 'bru dang sman du ldan// dri zhim chu dang ldan par bya// gos bzang gis ni mgrin pa dkri/ phyogs bzhi dag tu bzhag par bya// thang ka 'am dkyil 'khor la mchod do// dri'am chu dang
110b3(rgyud): me tog dang // bsres pa'i sbyor mos chu yang blugs// gzar bu stong gis sbyin bsreg bya// chu des gzhan yang gtor bar bya// bar ma chad par nyin bdun du// de ltar rgyan tu gtor ma sbyin// phyi nas
110b4(rgyud): 'khor lo rin chen de// bum pa'i nang nas rnam phyung ste// rgyal mtsha na rtse la btags nas su// gnas mthon por yang ba/ zhag par bya// zhi bar byed par the tshom med// sngar bshad
110b5(rgyud): pa yi shing shun dang // dur khrod ras la sgrub po yis// yung ba'i khu bas 'khor lo bri// so ma btang ba'i kham phor du/ sgrub pa'i rkang rjes sa dag dang // snang mdzad chu ngogs sa
110b6(rgyud): dag dang // ri dang la sa btags nas ni// ldong ros dang ni yung ba yis// khu bas sbrus te gzugs byas la// 'khor lo gnyis dril yung ba dang // ldong ros kyi ni khu bas bsku// snying kar bcug
110b7(rgyud): ste gzhug par bya// seng ldeng phur ba sor brgyad pas// lus la sogs pa gdab par bya// dgra rnams 'ong ba'i lam du yang khung bur brkos te gzhugs par bya// lam las dbang chen gyis mnan ci/ 
110b8(rgyud): sum las skyes pa de stengs na// sna tshogs las kyis mnan pa yi// kham por skud ser dkri bar bya// rgyal chen dag ni ser po yang // dbang chen la gnas lhor bltas te// bsgyur bya ser po'i ris
111a1(rgyud): mnan par// bsams nas bzlas pa brtsam par bya// sAhA med par swam+b+ha ya// yi ge mtha' can lnga stong bzlas// gtor ma rgyun tu sbyin par bya// rengs pa chen po la
111a2(rgyud): 'di yis// dmag gi dpung yang nges par rengs// 'ga' tsam la ni smos ci dgos// sran ne lan gsum bsngags pa yis// dur khrod ras la 'khor lo bri// rims dang dug gis zin pa ste/ 
111a3(rgyud): de yi steng du bzhag par bya// bdag nyid dkar por rnam bsams te// tsho gas bya ba cing gdon par bya// de ni de nas zhi bar 'gyur// ngag dag rengs par 'dod na yang // smyo byed khu ba dur khrod sol// 
111a4(rgyud): gcig rnam bsres te so ma btang // kham por gnyis la 'khor lo 'di// po dang mo yi bskor phyogs gnyis/ dam nor bris te kha sbyar la// ro bsregs sa dang thal bas
111a5(rgyud): g.yogs// steng du bzlas shing spel ba ni// stam+b+ha na dang ku ru laM// sA hA med pa'i sngags 'di yis// kha bcingab ni nges par 'gyur// gang zhig bsad par byed pa la// snying
111a6(rgyud): rjer ldan pa'i gang zag gis// gdug byed las 'di byed pa la// gshin dgra lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// zhag cig gis ni 'grub par byed// bcu bzhi nyi ma phyed pa na// bya rog sgro rtsa'i smyu gu yis// 
111a7(rgyud): dur khrod kyi ni ras dag la// dug dang tshwa dang ske tshe dang // nim pa tsha ba gsum dag dang // tsha ba'i mar khu dur khrod sol// smyo byed mdzub mo'i khrag gis bri// ro bsregs pa yi thal ba dang // baMsgrub bya'i
111a8(rgyud): rkang pa'i rjes kyis// mi yi rus phye la sogs la// gzugs byas de yi snying kar gzhug/ dur me dag la de bso zhing // khros pa'i sems kyis khri bzlas na// skad cig tsam gyis 'chi ba ni/ 
111b1(rgyud): / de yi khyim 'am dur du sba// de lta'i las kyi de 'grub ste// mtshan mo phyed na kha lhor blta// bdag nyid 'jigs pa'i gzugs can te// zhal sogs sngon du gsungs pa ltar// mtsho'i steng na mche ba bcim/ 
111b2(rgyud): gsus khrim che la gyen skra 'bar// spu sogs gzhan yang de 'dra'o// baspu dag gi bu gnas// 'jigs mtshon sna tshogs thogs pa yi// khro bo mang po 'phro ba ste// bdag nyid bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar// 
111b3(rgyud): bsgrib bya mdun du bsam bya ba// mtshams med rdzogs pa'i sdig dang ldan// dri ma can de phyogs gos 'chang // grong khyer skye bos 'che ba can// grang ba'i reg pas lus la rgyas// mtshon gyis btab pa
111b4(rgyud): byas pa la// gcan zan sogs za mdun du bsam// ngag tu'ang de ltar yang yang brjod// lcags kyi khyud mos yan la/ dag bsdams// tsherams dbugs pa byas pa ste// lus ni lug
111b5(rgyud): pa med par bsam// ske tshe lan tshas lus byugs te// a chu ba yi sgra 'byin bsam// de yi mgon skyabs bsal byas ni sa// gshin rje'i lto ba'i tha mar bzhag/ be con thogs pas
111b6(rgyud): de za'o// 'di ltar bsad pas sangs rgyas kyi// sras bu de ni skye bar 'gyur// las kyi sdig las de grolo// gsod pa'i sngags de spel ba ni// hUM che go mo mA ra ya hUM// bsgrub bya nang dag dbye ba na// ma he/ 
111b7(rgyud): rta yi lpags pa dag/ yang na ro dang dur khrod ras// rta dang ma he byi la'am// khyi dang nim pa'i mdab khu dang // khyim bya'i khrag dang skem che bsre/ dar ni 'khor lo 'di bris te// rnam par 'gras pa
111b8(rgyud): bskul dang ldan// rta sbal dag gi nang bcug ste// ma he'i rmig pa'i nang bcug la// stong phrag bcu ni tshang par bzlas// nim pa'i shing bsros de nang sba// de nang 'bras pa nyid dang ni// dpag
112a1(rgyud): tshad brgyas mchod 'bab par 'gyur// a mu ki dang a mu ki/ bi de Sha ya phaT// rims kyis thebs par bya ba la// dur khrod ko ba che ba la// arga shing gi lo ma
112a2(rgyud): dang tsi tra ka dang ske tshe dang // khrag gis 'khor lo bri bar bya// bi ba bskos la ri mo dag/ seng ldeng mdab ma dug med la// bsro zhing khros pas lnga brgya bzla// khyim dang lam gyi bzhi mdo dang // dur
112a3(rgyud): khrod sbas na rims kyis 'dzin// rgyas pa'i las kyis rgyas 'dod na// gi wang gis ni gro ga la// 'khor lo gnyis ni rnam bri te// bskul tshig ldan par yi ge bri// zla drug thang gi mdun dag tu// gnod sbyin
112a4(rgyud): dang ni gnod sbyin mos// rin chen char ni 'bebs pa dang / krag shin dgra ser po zla ser la// gnas par bsam te khri ba zlas te// 'phags pa nor 'dzin 'dra bar 'gyur// oM che ge mo puSh+TiM ku/ 
112a5(rgyud): ru oM/ gro ga sogs kyi shog shog la// gi wang dang ni ra/ nga byung gi/ me tog dag gis bri ba ste// yang na tha ltag khra/ ga dang ni// bil ba'i lo ma'i khu ba dang // ras dmar po yi khu ba dang / 
112a6(rgyud): rtsi rnams bsrel la bri bar bya// spra tshil gyis ni 'khor lo bri// bum pa mar sbram ldan par bzhag/ dus bzhi dag tu mchod pa ni// me tog dmar pos mchod pa'o// de tshe bzlas pa tshul dag ni// ho ba sha ku/ 
112a7(rgyud): ru ho// de ma thag tu lha rnams kyang // dbang du byed par des 'gyur ro// gro ga dag la bri ba ni// zla ba gzas zin dus dag gam// rgyal gyi nyin par bri bya ste// skud pa dmar pos 'khor lo dkri/ me tog
112a8(rgyud): dmar pos mchod pa bya// thod pa kha sbyar nang bzhag ste// bzlas pa khris ni brgya byin gyi// bu mo 'ang rnyed par nges 'gyur ro// dur khrod kyi ni ras dag la// gur gum sogs kyis 'khor lo bri// yi ge
112b1(rgyud): thig les rnam bskor te// a mu ki dang mA ma kI/ mo ha na dang rnam spel la// bsgrub bya'i gos kyi mtha' ma la// legs btags chos kyi dbyings nyid du// bsgoms nas zlos shing 'gro na yang // lha dang
112b2(rgyud): lha min gyis mi mthong // bdag nyid gshin dgra nyid bsgoms nas// chu yi steng nas 'gro 'dod na// rdul phran lha yi rnam par te// ur+yan du ni bdag rang nyid// nges par steng 'gro gzhan dag kyang // 
112b3(rgyud): bu mos nags kyi ras bal la// skud pa bkal ba gzhon nu mas// sum sgril du yang de yis bya// gdug sngags stong du tshangs par te// bzlas tshul sngon du gsungs pa bzhin// skar ma rgyal gyi dus
112b4(rgyud): la bzla// bri ba'i nyin mo'ang de'ang de la'o// dkyil 'khor ra gyi ni lhar brtag pa// g.yon gyis mdun byas gzhan la gdags// ma lus mtshon dag rengs byed de// gcer bu la yang
112b5(rgyud): rengs par byed// me tog las ni gzhan du min// shaR+Sha sogs kyi ril bu ni// legs par grib ma dag la bska mas// lcags gsum ngag gis dkri bar bya// bzlas shing
112b6(rgyud): mchod pa byed pa'i tshe// dngul dag gi ni rangs bzhin bya// 'bar bar gyur pa nyid na yang // mchod pa legs par rnam byas te// bskor ba brgya phrag du ma byas// de nas blo ldan sgrub pa pos// 
112b7(rgyud): khar bcug tsam gyis 'dod pa sgrub// phyung na sngon ltar rnal ma nyid// gso ba 'dra bas 'o mas kyang // nges par 'khrul 'khor bkru bar bya// rig sngags 'khrul 'khor las grol te// rnal ma nyid
112b8(rgyud): la gnas pa yin// snam ster dag gi sa bon la// nya lcibs dang ni byi tang ka/ khu bas yang de byugs pa la// thod pa sas ni rnam bkang bar// sbas te bzlas pa grangs med bya// de tshe mtsho dang gtor
113a1(rgyud): ma dag/ yongs rgyas 'bras bu rnams blangs te// khar bcug mkha' 'gro byas 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// zhus dang 'das byung gdug pa dang / 
113a2(rgyud): mngon par rtogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin// dkyil 'khor rnam par spros pa dang // thig gis gzhal yas mtshon pa dang // rdul tshon phyogs las rnam par brtags// yang dag byin gyis brlab
113a3(rgyud): pa dang // bdud rtsi myang bar bya ba dang // tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi sgom pa dang // sngags kyi dngos med de bzhin mtshams// chos 'byung dang ni sgrub po dang // bzlas dang de yi grangs tshad dang // 
113a4(rgyud): 'khor lo dang ni yi ge gnyis// nges te nga yis bstan pa/ yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'byung po rnams la gtor mas tshim par bya ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin bzhi dang / 
113a5(rgyud): de bzhin snag tsha dang / so so las kyi bye brag ste// bsdus te nga yis bstan pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sa 'byung po rnams la gtor mas tshim par bya ba zhes bya ba'i/ 
113a6(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo // oM hrIHSh+T+r-iHwi kr-i tA nan hu hUM phaT phaT swAhA// 'byung po rnams dang rnam spel te// tha mar sbyar ba
113a7(rgyud): byas pa ni// hi hi hi hUM pa pe swA hA// dur khrod rgyan gyis rnam bzhugs pa'i// zhe sdang gshin rje gshed rdo rje ni// spros med na mkha' lta bu las// snying rje thabs kyis sku sprul pa// ye shes khro
113a8(rgyud): rgyal rab 'jigs pa'o// dud kha mun chen sku la 'dud// gar dgu nyams dang ldan pa yi// gti mug rdo rje gshin rje gshed// skye med don dam ngang nyid las// thabs kyi sprul pa'i skur bstan/ 
113b1(rgyud): pa/ 'jigs byed drag po'i cha lugs can// zla ba nya 'dra khyod la 'dud// bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba yi// ser sna gshin rje rdo rje ni// 'dzin pa po las grol ba yis// gdug pa 'dul phyir
113b2(rgyud): khro bo sprul// gter 'chang ser sna grol mdzad pa// gcom gser 'dra khyod la 'dud// chags pas ma lus dbang mdzad pa'i// 'dod chags gshin rje rdo rje ni// skye med rnam dag chos dbyings
113b3(rgyud): la khams gsum pa dag khro bar sprul// ma chags spyan ldan thugs rje can// ban 'du lta bu'i sku la 'dud// shes rab thabs ldan he ru ka/ phrag dog gshin rje rdo rje ni// rnam rtog dpe dang bral
113b4(rgyud): ba las// thugs rje'i sprul pa'i khro bo ni// 'gro don brtson pa'i ral gri can// sna tshogs mdog can khyod la 'dud// thams cad la bskyed pa'i lha mo che// dbang po lta bur bsgyur
113b5(rgyud): mdzad pa// khams gsum gzigs pa'i spyan dang ldan// / rnam snang can gyis bdud bzhi 'jigs// bde ba chen bos rtag tu dgyes// ye shes spyan can khyod la 'dud// 
113b6(rgyud): kun sdud lha mo rin po che// rnam rtog skyon las rnam grol yang // dus gsum bde gshegs bdag gir byed// rin chen tog can mdzes pa'i sku// don dam thugs chung 'khor ba sel// ma lus
113b7(rgyud): kun gyi bdag la 'dud// 'dus byas ma lus sreg byed pa// rnam rtog zhi ba'i rang bzhin las// khams gsum ma lus sgrol bar byed// 'od dpag med kyis rab mdzes pa// ma chags phyag na
113b8(rgyud): bsnams pa yi// phrin las dag byed can la 'dud// thugs rjes g.yo ba'i rang bzhin can// 'jig rten gsum dag sgrol bar byed// gnyis med bde chen dang nyid las// phrin las grub pa'i rang
114a1(rgyud): bzhin can// btang snyoms bzhugs par 'gro ba 'dul// kun tu las kyis rgyal la 'dud// ces gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa la so sor yongasu bstod do// de nas
114a2(rgyud): yang thams cad kyi bdag pos leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ lha mo rnams kyi sku la btsud de// gdug pa 'jigs pa'i yi ge ni// bcu bzhi pa la dmigs pa yang // 'khor bar dmigs par bya ba 'am/ 
114a3(rgyud): nyi ma'i steng na skyes pa ltar// dmigs te ma yengs brjed pa med// bzlas pa nyid ni de ltar bya// bye ba tshang bar bzlas pa yis// rab 'byams las la mi 'grub pa// med de de yis thams cad
114a4(rgyud): 'grub// 'bum dang sa ya bzlas pas kyang // phra mo'i da las rnams 'grub par byed// gzhan du mi 'gro sems kyi ngas ni// de lta'i tshul du bzlas pa bya// yul gzhan blo ni 'gro ba
114a5(rgyud): yis// bskal par bzlas kyang 'bras mi 'byin// mi 'a/ phros sems kyis 'di bzlos shing // lam du zhugs pa 'i skyes bu la// stag sogs chu yis mi 'jig so// de nas yang // 
114a6(rgyud): dag bshad bya ba// dbang gis blo sbyangs rab ldan pas// 'bras thob de med mi 'grub ste// de bas de ni bshad par bya// bum pa'i dbang gis thog mar sbyang // gsang ba'i dbang gis gnyis par ste/ 
114a7(rgyud): gsum par bya ba de nyid ni// shes rab ye shes de yin te// de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa yin// brtan g.yo dngos po ma lus pa// bsgom par bya ba'i dus nyid la// blos ni yongs su mi sgom ste// kun gyi
114a8(rgyud): mtshan nyid ma shes na// sgom pa kho na de min te// thams cad dngos nyid yongs shes na// de ni sgom par yongasu bsgrags// de nyid bla ma'i kha yis te// 'bad pas mnyes bya de mi smad// de la thams
114b1(rgyud): cad 'byung ba ste// bla ma la smad g.yo sgyu can// nges pas de ni dug dang yang // gdon chen dag ni ma lus pas// 'chi zhing rlabs par de gyur nas// dmyal ba dag tu yun ring ltung // bskal pa du mar
114b2(rgyud): sdug bsngal te// rtag tu cho nges 'debs par byed// de bas blo gros chen po la// nam du'ang mi smad gzhan du na// bkur sti pu dud 'gro ba la// phan pa'i sems kyis de ltar bya// gzhan yang bsgom
114b3(rgyud): bar bya ba nyid// gang dag dbang po'i lam 'gro ba// de yi ngo bor bdag gis bya// bsam gtan mi byed de blo yis// kun tu blo yis bsgom par bya// bcom ldan bdag po chen po yis// gsang dbang lag na rdo// 
114b4(rgyud): rje la bos nas gsang ba'i dbyangs 'di gsungs/ gzugs sgra la sogs drug po rnams// dngos med mkha' dang 'dra ba las// long spyod yul du du mar snang // shel la tshon ni
114b5(rgyud): ji bzhin du// 'dod pa lnga dang chos rnams la// rtag tu rna la 'byor spyod par shog/ a la la ho// rol du gsol mnams par mdzod// mi 'dzin sgyu ma lta bu la// gar gyis
114b6(rgyud): dgyes pa'i rol pa mdzod// rig bya dgag pa med pa la// mo g.yo bzhin du rol par mdzod// ho chags pa med pas chags par mdzod// de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// sngags dang phyag rgya dbang
114b7(rgyud): bskur ba'i// de yi mtshan nyid bshad pa'i phyir// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// lce la sgom pa'i rdo rje ni// rdo rje gnod mdzes nag po ste// kha ni kun tu gyes pa ni// lag gnyis thal mo nges sgra
114b8(rgyud): te/ gung mo'i rtsa ba'i tshigs nyid la// mthe bong nges par sbyar bar bya// mdzub mo gung mo'i rgyab rtser sbyar// 'di ni dam tshig phyag rgya ste// snying ka dpral ba lkog ma dang // spyi bor byin gyis brlabs pa bya/ 
115a1(rgyud): oM hriHSh+Ti/ wi kri tA nan hUM hUM Ta phaT a d+hi tiSh+Tha sa mA// gzhan yang rdo rje sems ma sogs// phyag rgyas dbang bskur dbu rgyan brtag/ gti mug rdo rje la sogs pa// so so'i
115a2(rgyud): bdag po dbu rgyan cing // dbang bskur tshe na bum pa che// phyag gis bsnams te dbang bskur ro// 'khor lo las kun byed pa la// gsang dbang lag na rdo rje yis// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis bstod
115a3(rgyud): gtug pa skrag byed 'khor lo me ltar 'bar// dus gsum khro rgyal he ru ka yi thugs// las rnams dag byed phrag dog rdo rje ste// ma lus tshems gcod gsol bas sku yi ngang // hUM dang phaT kyi gdug
115a4(rgyud): rtsub sbyor bas gsung // kun gyi rang bzhin khyod kyis gshin rje yi// lhor 'dzud bka' las des kyang mi 'da' zhing // daphyogs bcu'i sprul pas gnas na 'gugs mdzad pa// ma lus
115a5(rgyud): kun byed 'khor lo che mchog la// gzhan gyi don rdzogs gus pas phyag 'tshalo// khyod ni dpa' bo thub chen kun gyi bdu // nga yis lam bstan bdud bstan bdud rnams mi phyed kyang / 
115a6(rgyud): dam las 'da' zhing log pa kun skyed la// khyod kyang bka' las ma 'da' las rnams sgrubs// tshe dang srog bsdus yan lag rnam par bcings// bdud rtsi chu rgyun rnal 'byor nga la 'dod bsgrub na// 
115a7(rgyud): ngas ni sbyin bya khyod ni dam las ma 'da' shig/ ces dpal gshin rje dgra nag po'i 'khor lo gzhan gyi lto ba la gnas 'cha' bar 'dod pa'i gtan 'pho ba ma yin pa'i tshe bya'o// 'khor lo snying kar lta bI
115a8(rgyud): tshe// sa bon tshul te lte ba la// yi ge ma lus 'dod pa yang // mtshan nyid ngan pa'i rtog pa las// grol te mtha' gsum ngo bo las// k+Sha ni zad pa'i bdag nyid la// u ni hU~M gi bdag nyid de// de ni sems
115b1(rgyud): kyi rang bzhin nyid// dga' las 'das pa'i ye shes te// thabs ni shes rab ldan pa las// dus thabs bsten pa'i bdag nyid kyis// 'thob ste gzhan du de mi 'thob// chu 'gram chen po bas mtha' dang // 
115b2(rgyud): dur khrod shing drung dgon pa ste// dben pa'i yul dang ma mo'i khyim// der ni mgon po 'di la 'bad// gzhan du bsgrubs kyang de mi 'grub// skad cig de la rang bzhin kun// nges par mi snang rig pa yi// lam
115b3(rgyud): du gyur pa med par shes// 'bras bu de ni rgya chen te// mtha' yi 'thob pa de yin no// de nas yang thams cad kyi bdag po bde bar gshegs pas rdo rje sa'i cho ga gsungs// skyob pa sangs rgyas thams
115b4(rgyud): cad kyi// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyis// sa dang pha rol phyi ngan pa la// lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur// srung ba'i dkyil 'a 'khor rab gnas pas// sdang ba'i log 'dren skye bo dang / 
115b5(rgyud): bgegs rnams bsal ba 'di skad gsungs// dpal ldan pa/ dag ni rdo rje 'dzin// srung ba'i 'khor lo rab sbyor bas/ bdag gis ye shes rdo rje yis// lus ngag yid du bcas pa/ 
115b6(rgyud): dgas// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid ni// khro bo gshin rje nag po'i bdag/ slob dpon gyi ni dkyil 'khor bri// zhes lan gsum gyi bar du brjod par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi ni drung nyid du/ 
115b7(rgyud): dar gyis gdong ni bkab pa la// sgo drung gnas pa khyod gang yin// slob dpon gyis ni rab brjod do// de bdag skal pa ldan par brjod// ji ltar bla med dpa' bo yis// mgon la dbang ni bskur ba
115b8(rgyud): bzhin// bla med byang chub gnas bya'i phyir// bdag la'ang mgon pos dbang bskur gsol// me tog sogs te mchod pa'i mchog/ rab 'byam rgya mtsho ma lus slob dpon dpa' bo de nyid la// yang yang
116a1(rgyud): mchod cing bstod pa'i tshogs// rgyas par mnyes bya de 'og tu// dpa' bos de la dbang rnams sbyin// de nas rgyal po bde chen po// dpa' bo longs spyod kun ldan pa/ 
116a2(rgyud): 'gro don brtson pa'i sku gsum bdag/ nyid kyis 'di skad bka' stsal to// sbyin sreg med na 'bras mi 'byin// de bas bdag nyid dam pa yis// de yi las la 'bad par bya// gos nag rgyan
116a3(rgyud): gyis rnam brgyan la// gshin rjer rnam bltas rnal 'byor pas// khro bo'i skyil krung bcas pa yis// sran te'i stan la bdag 'dug nas// las rnams bsgrub par bya ba ni// mtshan mo 'am nyi ma
116a4(rgyud): phyed nyid la// rang byung me yi dkyil 'khor du// hUM phaT mtha' na yod pa yi// sngags kyis thog ma bar tha mar// sbyin bsreg bya ste de mi ni// durari khrod me'am rus pa 'am// rdo nyid las
116a5(rgyud): ni byung ba 'am// tsaN+Da li yi khyim nyid nas// thab khung gru gsu/ ma can der ni// tsher ma can gyi bud shing rdzang // rlung ya/ ba sbar te dz+wa la raM// dza la hUM brjod me sbar brjod// lag g.yas/ 
116a6(rgyud): ku sha bcas pa yis// mthe bong srin lag rtsa ru gzugs// oM o h+ye he ma hA b+hU ta de ba r-i Shi dI dza satwA ma gri hi tra a hU ti a hA ra asmin saM ni hi to b+ha ba zhes brjod la spyan drang ngo // 'bar ba me yi dbus nyid du/ 
116a7(rgyud): ming de zad byed ces bya ba// khro bo me ltar phun sum tshogs// ba spu kham pa de bzhin du// du ba'i mdog can zur mig steng du gzigs// sgra che mche ba bzhin ldan stobs po che// yaM las rlung gi dkyil
116a8(rgyud): 'khor te// bzhugs nas drag po'i yi ge brjod// spyan gsum pa la phyag bzhi pa// rig pa'i gnas la legs par bzhugs// zhal bdun rnam gtsigs ma he la// bcibs pa du ba'i phreng rnams 'khrigs
116b1(rgyud): phyag gnyis mdung dang rdo rje 'dzin// gnyis kyis ral gri gri gug 'dzin// de yi g.yas kyi phyogs nyid du// de bzhin mdun gyi phyogs nyid dam// spyan drangs byin rlabs ldan pa la// ar+g+ha
116b2(rgyud): sogs kyis mchod pa bya// oM ar+g+ha pra tIts+tsha swA hA// lag g.yas mdzub mo mthe bong dag/ skam pa lta bur rnam byas pas// chu blangs bskyod pas dbul bar bya// oM ba ta ma mthar ni sngon gyi
116b3(rgyud): brjod// zhabs bkru dal shis pa yin// dgang bzar yub sor bcu drug/ de min sor bzhi zabs sor gnyis// zur gsum dbu su sor gnyis tshad// rtse gsum phreng bas yongasu bskor// de mi/ 
116b4(rgyud): dbus su'ang mtshan ma ste// stag sbrul gang 'dod pas mtsha dan bya// khu bcud 'dzag pa sor gcig/ khro bo rdo rjes mchu yi dbyibs// byin rlabs so gcig tshad can no// 
116b5(rgyud): blugs gzar yu ba sor bcu bzhi// zab su sor gcig gru gsum dang // yu ba'i mthar ni rtse gsum pa/ gdengs pa byin rlabs mngon spyod kyi// gzar bu yin par
116b6(rgyud): yis bstan// gnam lcags tsher ma can sogs shing // de la de byas sangs rgyas 'jigs// sreg rdzas gzugs brnyan la sogs sreg/ stong du tshang bas 'bras bu ni// nges par 'byin par
116b7(rgyud): byed pa yin// g.yon gyi rtsa der dgang bzar la// g.yas pa glugs pa'i gzar ba yin/  ma nam ma la rgyama'o// rdo rje bar gyi thod pa dag/ sreg rdzas kyi ni snod yin la// rdzas rnams rdo rje
116b8(rgyud): rin chen dpa'// hU~M phaT kyi ni mtha' can gyis// bsreg byas chu me dang rlung // namakha' lta bu'i dbusu gnas// kha bye gnas pa rtag tu'o// kun tu'ang kha bye bskor bar bya// bzhi gnyis 'dab ma
117a1(rgyud): steng du ste// lte ba dang ni yang dag ldan// lhan cig rnam par shes pa'i lha// nam mkha' nyid du nges par 'bar// de yi mtshan mar shes bya ba// rdul gyi rnam par de nyid do// thig le/ 
117a2(rgyud): yi ge med pa ste// rgyun mi 'chad par 'od kyis gnas// brgyar bshags skra yi tshad kyis so// argas rab tu sbar bar bya// sngar gsungs 'byung ba rnam bzhi dang // nam mkha' yang dag ldan pa yis// 
117a3(rgyud): sor mo lnga dang ngas ldan pas// gang gi sbyin bsreg des bya'o// gzhan dag sor mo gsum gyis bsres// dmigs pa thams cad 'gags par 'gyur// sten mang stong pa na mkha' dra// shes rab pha rol
117a4(rgyud): phyin pa yi// phyag rgya chen po dbang du 'gyur// bde gshegs kun dang mnyam 'gyur ba// shes rab dang ni snying rje ches/ 'gag pa med pa'i chos 'gyur ro// bde chen na mkha' lta bu ste/ 
117a5(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa yi dmigs pa yin// mdog gnag mdab brgya/ da lta bu la// rgya dang zab su so mo ni// nyi shu de bzhi bcu/ pa'i thab// byang du rtse mo bstan pa la// rdo rje tho ba'i mtshan ma de
117a6(rgyud): sor ni bzhi par bri bar bya// de steng sor mo gsum bor bar// khe khyor kyang ni de yi tshad// sa nag bong bu rnga mo'i spangs// mi rus 'bras kyi phub ma dang // sol ba'i phye mas rnam byugs la// mi zhim dri dang
117a7(rgyud): bdug pas mchod// dur khrod shing ngam bong bu dang // rnga mo'i sbas bskams bud shing ngo // sor gcig gis ni dma' ba yin// nim pa de bzhin seng ldeng dang // se ba de bzhin bse shing dang // dur
117a8(rgyud): khrod shing bu sor bcu pa// rtsa ba'i cha las rnam byung ba// dur khrod mar khu rnams bsnyugs la// de yis yam shing bya ba yin// bya rog 'ug pa'i bshog pa dang // nim pa'i mdab ma thal ba dang // rkang
117b1(rgyud): rjesas dang bong bu dang // rnga mo sogs kyi spangs dang ni// skra dang zhag dang bshang ba dang // gcing mi rus yungs kar dang // yungs mar khrag dang lan tshwa dang // de la sogs pa re re zhing // ji ltar rnyed pa
117b2(rgyud): rdzas rnams ni// dug dang khrag dang smyo byed kyi// mdab khu thal ba sol ba dang // 'bras kyi phub ma la sogs la// dgra bo dag gi gzugs byas la// mgo nas brtsams te ral gri yis// dum bur
117b3(rgyud): gtub cing lcags phor du// khrag dang chu dang mi rnams dang // bong bu'i gcin la phaT ldan pa'i// gdug pa'i yi ge rnams bzlas pa'i// rdzas la gsang gtor byas nas kyang // slob dpon la sdang
117b4(rgyud): rmongs pa 'di// brjod cing sbyin bsreg dbul bar bya// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// 'byung ba tshim bya gtor ma dang / bstod bzlas mnyes par bya ba dang // dbang gi dbye ba bstan pa
117b5(rgyud): dang dkyil 'khor 'jug par bya ba dang // de yis la mchod pa sogs// cod pan du ni bde gshegs bzhag/ mngon spyod hom gyi cho ga dang // bsdus nas bar du rnam pa brgyad
117b6(rgyud): pad dkar po 'dra mgrin pa ring // gzugs mdzes ha cang ring ba min// lus la rdul 'byung yid 'phrog ma// dri ni shin tu'ang zhim pa yin// lta stangs ni gsogs ri dgas 'dra// mgrin dang lto ba'ang ri
117b7(rgyud): dgas kyi// skal bzang rked pa'ang ri dgas kyi// glang chen dri ldan bzhin phel che// myos shing nu ma rab tu rgyas// gzhan yang kun rdzob bden pa ni// bong thung de yi skra yang thung // rkang lag ring
117b8(rgyud): zhing bzhin ring ma// nya yi dri bro bong ring ma// zla 'dra skye gnas rab tu ring // skyes gnas chung zhing yan lag rtsub// bong ring de bzhin nu ma mkhrang // skra srab dal smra yan lag chung // sngo bsangs ri mo
118a1(rgyud): mnyam pa de// gsang ba shes rab rnam gnyis la// rig ma rang yis bsgrags pa yin// ngang pa'i 'gros can skra 'khyil ma// bzhin zlum nu rgyas lus rkyang rgyas// shin tu
118a2(rgyud): ring min dal bar smra// dbus nas rna 'brang gnyer gsum can// mtshan nyid ngan zhi le lo che// yan lag gnag zhing skra 'khyil ma// khang par gnas shing lus rtsub ma// sa'i 'dri 'byungs la'i gro/ 
118a3(rgyud): nu spangs de ni skyes bu bzhin// chang gis myos pa'i dpa' mo ste// chang la shin tu chags pa yin// de gnyis de la shis pa yin// tha ma tha mar nges par yin// 'chi ba'i bsam gtan de nyid ni// 
118a4(rgyud): bde ba dam pa kho bos 'dod// 'di la'ang bde ba de nyid yin// dka sogs spangs pa'i a la ni// bcu drug yin te phrag da gnyis po// 'khor lo sogs pa'i sa bon yin// zla ba de dag
118a5(rgyud): sum cu gnyis// a sogs spangs pa'i ka li ste// bcu bdu na gnyis pa de stengs su// ya sogs spangs pa min pa nyid// gsum pa'i gsum dang bzhi pa'i gnyis// bcu phrag
118a6(rgyud): bzhi ste de phrag gnyis// sen mo zangs sogs sa bon te// nyi mar rnam bsgrags de dbus gnas// hUM dang a yi rang bzhin las// rdo rje tho sogs so sor rtog/ thim pas nan tan ye shes te// chos
118a7(rgyud): kyi dbyings nyid dag pa ste// gshin dgrar bdag nyid 'dod pa yin// rgyan gyi bye brag lus la gnas// de ni 'di skad bya ba ste// rig pa shes rab bstan pa dang // bskyed pa'i rgyu yi bye brag ni// tha mar bstan
118a8(rgyud): te sdom gsumo// mtshon par byed pa'i bdag nyid// mtshon bya sngon bstan nyid mi nog shin rje gshed nag po'i las thams cad grub par byed pa'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// 
118b1(rgyud): rgyag skad du/ shrI badz+ra b+her bkawa tAn+t+ra ra drA/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// ngag gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tsha'o// de nas 'dir na bshad bya ba// ji ltar 'gro
118b2(rgyud): zad byed pa// sdug bsngal rnams mthar byed pa yi// bsgrub bya'i thabs chen mchog gyur pa// ga sang sngags de las 'byung bar 'gyur// dang po rnam par snang mdzad de// de dang nye bar ngag dbang phyug
118b3(rgyud): rdo rje 'khor lo bsgyur ba'o// gdon gyi bdag dang 'byung po'i rje// mgo dang mtha' ma gnyis ldan bya// mchod rten sreg byed mtha' dang bcas// gzhan du shes par mi 'gyuraro//  ma kyi ga she #
118b4(rgyud): na/ nyams pa thams cad sel byed cing // zhi dang rgyas dang dang dang mngon spyod// gsod dang skrod dgug dbye rengs dang // dadaman par byed dang rgyal srid sogs// thob pa nyid la the tshom med// 
118b5(rgyud): dur khrod tshang tshing khrod ngogs rtsub// shing cig khang stong mtsha na cig dben// gang 'dod gnas su bsam gtan brtsa ma// shing cig khang stong mtshan cig dben// gang 'dod gnasu
118b6(rgyud): bsam gtan brtsam// de nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la khyab pa me long lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// sku dang ye shes thams cad la khyab par bya ba'i phyir// sku
118b7(rgyud): mdog dkar po zhal lnga dang ldan par byas nas/ 'jig rten pa thams cad la gzigs nas// rang gi rigs kyi yi ge nyid brjod pas sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yon tan dang phrin las dang ye shes/ 
118b8(rgyud): kyang gcig gis ngo bo sprul pa'i skur gyur to// kye ma bcom ldan rdo rje che// don rnams bskyed pa yang nyid do// mkha' dkyil 'od kyis 'gengs 'gyur ba// slar zhing kha dog lnga ldan pa// sa bon sngags
119a1(rgyud): kyis bskul ba yi// 'od kyi rtse phran thub pa'i sku// kun kyang sangs rgyas gnas las skyes// rang la zhugs pas sku rdzogs gyur// zhal drug khro gnyer rab brjid pa// ma he'i zhal ldan
119a2(rgyud): stang gnas pa// 'jam dpal zhal ni 'dzum bcas bzhugs// lhag ma dkar dang ser dang dmar// dur ba'i mdog mtshungs gyin skar ldan// thod pa skam rlon sgyu ma sprul// rus pa rdo rje'i phreng bas rgyan// glang chen
119a3(rgyud): stag lpags gyon nas ni// hUM phaT glur len gad mo can// nam mkha'i lus can khro bo'i sprin// yang dang yang du spro byed pa'i// phyag drug rab tu brjid pa yi// dbyug pa thob gtun shing dag/ g.yas pa'i phyag
119a4(rgyud): gis rim bzhin 'dzin// dgra sta dang ni lcags kyu dang // zhags pa ga yon pa'i phyag gis 'dzin// pad+ma nyi ma ma he dang // gshi dan rje'i steng na 'gying bag can// zhabs drug g.yon kyang gar gyi
119a5(rgyud): gnas// 'jig rten bdag po mthar mdzad pa'o// de ltar gang zhig dang pa dang // blo ldan g.yo sgyur rab spangs shing // legs pa/ ra dbang rnams thob byas nas// rdo rje slob dpon mnyes byed pas/ 
119a6(rgyud): yang nas yang du dran byed na// bstan pa chen po thob par 'gyur// lha yi dge 'dun nga la nyon// dang po chang la rab dga' zhing // sha chen rtag tu mur byed na// las rnams de yis myur du 'grub// sku ni du ma 'phro byed
119a7(rgyud): cing / sku la sgra rnams nges thim byed// thams cad sgyu ma nyid shes pas// 'jig rten rnamasu yid sad byed// khong stong kha dog dkar ba ste// rgyun tu rlung ni 'dzag par byed// chu skyes dmar po kha sbyar gnyis/ 
119a8(rgyud): yan lag gnyis kyis legs par bcun// shes pa 'phel ba me dang rlung // nyi ma zla ba thabs ldan dang // shes rab ldan par shes par bya// gnyis pa de nyid rnam spangs na// khong du chud par mi 'gyuraro// chu skyes
119b1(rgyud): kha sbyor la bsten te// gsum gnas pa yi ting 'dzin la// rdo rje chos kyis btab pa yi// thabs dang shes rab grol ba'i rgyu// blo ldan 'das pa shes par 'gyur// de phyir de la brtson par bya// chos rnams
119b2(rgyud): chos nyid dbyer med pas// stong pa nyid kyi ye shes che// mi shigs rtog bral mtshan ma med// bde chen ye shes rdo rje sku// ye shes mi rtog rtog pa bral// rtog pa'i mtshan ma thams cad sreg/ spros pa'i
119b3(rgyud): mtshan ma mtha' dag ni// ji snyed sgyu ma'i rnam par shes// de nyid shes nas grol ba'o// ma shes pas ni phyir zhing 'khor// 'jig rten skyemo ldan 'ga'// nges par rtogs pa thabs kyi mchog/ sdug
119b4(rgyud): bsngal chen pos rab 'jigs nas// bde ba 'dod pas nan tan bya/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las// thabs dang shes rab kyi bsam gtan bstan pa'i le'u ste
119b5(rgyud): dang po'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// sngags/ grub pa las byung ba yi// las rnams 'dir ni shes bya ste// der ni lha yi sku yang sbyar// zhi sogs bzlas
119b6(rgyud): pa'i rim pa la// rdo rje'i dbus su rdo rje ni// nyi zla la brten yi ge yi// phreng ba kha dog lngar shes pa// skyen bu la spangs nas klag pa ni// mkhas pas bzlas pa'i rim pa'o// drag po'i las rnams sku/ 
119b7(rgyud): pa la// nyon mongs gcod pa'i 'khor lo ni// sngon po rtse rtsibs bcu pa la// 'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba bsam// zhi bar 'dod pa'i skyes bu des// sems ni yang dag mnyam gzhag nas// sngags kyi
119b8(rgyud): 'od kyang 'gro gzhan la// phan pa'i yid dang ldan par bya// gro kha ras dang shing shun la// gur gum gi waM dri rnams kyis// mchod rten rim pa lnga ldan zhing // gdugs dang 'khor lo ldan par bya// 
120a1(rgyud): sgrub pa po yi ming dang rus// de yi bum pa'i nang du bri// rten 'brel snying po la sogs pa'i sngags kyi g.yon nas bskor ba bri// cig shos g.yas nas g.yon du bri// de la spel tshig me/ 
120a2(rgyud): pa'am// yang na 'khor lo'i bar du bzhag/ 'khor lo kun la kha sbyor gnang // rab tu gnas par byas nas kyang // lus sam mgul lam gang bder bzhag/ des ni gdon dang byang bsnyems dang / 
120a3(rgyud): rims dang yams rnams sel bar byed// gang zhig yul rnams gzhom 'dod na// hUM gi sa bon dang ldan par// ming yig tsam po bri bar bya// so phag phye ma ldong ros dang // ba bla ma he'i khrag gis brdzis
120a4(rgyud): zla gam gnyis pa'i gzugs byas te// bar du gang 'dod sgrub pa yis// gzugs brnyan sor brgyad pa yi tshad// byas la gan rkyal du bzhag la// ma he gdong gi sbyor ba yis// khri phrag gci
120a5(rgyud): tu sngags bzlas nas// dum bu dum bur btubs byas te// chu bo'i/ gzhung du gtor byas na// skad cig de la de dbang 'gyur// / bya rog 'ug pa'i gzugs byas te// ma nu ma li ro tsa nas/ 
120a6(rgyud): khyo shugs bsgrub bya'i ming bris te// gshin rje'i phyogs bltas gsang sngags gdon// rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas ni// mi yi rje ngar phur bus gdab// skad cig tsam la de dag dbye// de nas 'dir ni/ 
120a7(rgyud): bsad pa yi// cho ga'i rim pa bshad par bya// zhal drug phyag drug zhabs drug pa 'am// yang na zhal bzhi phyag bzhi pa 'am// zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa yang rung // ma he gdong pa'i sbyor ba yis/ 
120a8(rgyud): khrag rnams sna tshogs tha dad dang // bsgrub bya'i rjes dang dug gi rigs// rta dang ma he bong du'i chus// smras pa'i bsgrub bya'i ling ga bya// lus la tsher mas gzugs bya zhing // til mar gyis kyang bsku
