120b6(rgyud): gzugs ni ral gri dang // dbyig pa 'dzin pa bris nas ni// de dang de nyid lto sbyar la// mtshan ngan thod pa'i nang du gzhag/ tsha gsum ske che dug mu bi// ro nyes bkang nas dkyil 'khor ni// gru gsum ngas/ 
120b7(rgyud): su bzhag par bya// yungs kar bra bos lu nag/ dza b+ha bra bo sogs rnams la// gsang sngags rgyal po brjod byas te// dro'am dub 'thul bar du// rims dang rims kyi khrag rnams ni// ma lus zang
120b8(rgyud): par 'thung ba yi// ma yengs par ni bsam gtan bya// yang na bsgrub bya za bar mthong // shing gcig rtsar ni rengs pa dang // mal 'og du ni zha zhing lkugs// chu mdor 'byed cing bskrad// bsang ba me
121a1(rgyud): thab 'og tu ste// dgug pa ni sgo khang 'og/ lnga'am 'khor lo sgyur ba'o// bde gnas rnams kyis dbang du 'gyur// mar khu chen po thong ba yi// nang du blugs nas bskol byas
121a2(rgyud): te// bzhar bas mig la byug byed na// mngon shes de nyid myur du 'thob// rigs ldan rgyal po las rnyed cing // mdog ldan lang tsho gsang bkug la// tsan dan lde gu mang byas te// las kyi sbyor bas de nyid bci
121a3(rgyud): yang na me la gdung bas 'grub// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ya ma rA dzaHbadz+ra kI li kI la ha na ha na ma rA ya phaT/ ces bya'i gsang sngags brjod byas la// rus pa'i phur pa gdab par bya// gsal shing la btsugs skye bu yi/ 
121a4(rgyud): rdzas la brten te bsgrub par bya// til mar byugs la thod pas ba/  zhar// mar me byas pa'i dud pa yis// mig rnon dag ni/ 'grub par 'gyur// gsang sngags rgyal po thogs med la// bsten
121a5(rgyud): pas thog bya mang yod kyang // 'di ni brjod pa ci zhig dgos/ yang na 'di ltar shes bya ste// rang nyid sngags dang ting 'a dzin ldan// brtson chen gzhan du ma yengs pas// gang du brtsams
121a6(rgyud): bde 'grub 'gyur// smad 'tshong rang byung nyid kyis ni// sngon bstan tsakra legs bris te// ling ga'i snying khar bcug byas la// rang mdun khrag gi zla gam ste// khrag gis byugs pa'i steng du bzhag
121a7(rgyud): mi 'am rgyal po'i bu mo dag/ dgug dang dbang gi yi ge yis// de nyid du ni nges par 'gyur// nyal ba'i 'og tu mnan par bya// mi glang ra khyi bse pag khrag/ 'khor lo bris nas ling ga yi// mgrin par
121a8(rgyud): bcug nas bya rog gi/ khrag gis khrag skyug sngags bris nas// yi ge de ldan thod pa ru// bcug nas gsang sngags mang bzlas te// dur khrod me thab 'og bzhag na// khrag skyugs pa la the tshom med// 
121b1(rgyud): bsros na cha ba'i nad kyis 'chi// sbal khrag pa wang klad pa yis// 'khor lo de nyid legs bris nas// ling ka'i mchan khung g.yon bcug la// g.yas g.yon sbal khrag glang khrag thugs// ling ga'i
121b2(rgyud): phyogasu rang nyid kyi// rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bos mnan// de tshe bzlas pa mang byas nas// rgya gram lam du mnan la bzhag/ de nas bzlog pa bris nas ni// shing cig khong par sbas na rengs// rnga mo bya
121b3(rgyud): rog rgan po'i khrag/ 'khor lo bris nas ling ga yi// rkang gnyis par bcug rang mdun du// khrag gi rnga mong gzugs bris te// de yi steng bzhag rang nyid kyis// rlung gi bsam gtan nges ldan na/ 
121b4(rgyud): bskrad pa nyid du the tshom med// ri bo rtse la 'dzegs te sba// naM 'u le sbrul rta ma he dang // bya rog 'ug pa'i khrag gis ni// khyo shugs rkang pa'i rjes sbrus pa'i// ling gsor brgyad par byas te
121b5(rgyud): khrag des bris pa'i 'khor lo dag/ snying khar bcug pa gnyis bya sa te// ne'u le gzugs byas steng du bzhag/ lag gnyi sa rta dang ma he yi// rus pas brdung zhing gsang sngags zlos// rtse
121b6(rgyud): dud shing khar sbas na 'byed// tsan dan dkar pos legs bris nas// gser sogs rin chen rdzas su dril// mdun du zla ba'i gzugs stengs su// bzhag pa nyin re bskor ba ni// ji srid byas na srung bar nges
121b7(rgyud): spyi bor btags na g.yul las rgyal// rkang par btags na chu stangs 'gro// ba yi 'o mas khrus byas te// ku sha ba mar sogs mchod nas// gsol btab nad rnams thams cad srung // de nas bcom
121b8(rgyud): ldan 'das las phra ba thams cad las rgyal ba// zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// las thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i sngags 'di// sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // 
122a1(rgyud): mA ra ya phaT/ ces pa bsad pa'i'o// bi de 'am dbye ba'i'o// ur+thaT ya bskrad pa'i'o// mo ha ma rmongs pa'i'o// wa shi ku ru dbang du bya ba'i'o// stam+b+ha ya mnan pa'i'o// A
122a2(rgyud): kaR+Sha ya dzaHdgug pa'i'o// oM hrIHswA hA/ kha dang lag pa bshal ba'i sngags so// oM hrIHSh+Ti ja pa ng+ya Ta ya stam+b+ha ya phaT phaT swA hA// snying po'i sngagaso// oM hrIHkA la ru pa b+hU bi/ nye ba'i snying po'o// oM
122a3(rgyud): hrIHkruM Tu sU dz+dza hUMg/ snying po dam pa'o// oM hrIHha/ b+ho ma hA kro d+ha gats+tsha gats+tsha smat+pA dza pra ti gr-ih+NA pra sa da de bi mA~M ku ru swA hAM// spyan drang ba'o// oM hUMHSh+T+rIHhaHyon chab bo// oM hUM phaT phaT zhabs bsil lo// 
122a4(rgyud): oM sarba duSh+Ta sa tad ma ka ga ga/ ces pa dri chab kyi sngags so// oM ku mA ra ru pi Ni dzaHdzaHhUM phaT/ me tog 'bul ba'i sgra gras so// oM hrI/ haHhe phaT/ bdug pa'i 'o// oM kA la rUb
122a5(rgyud): sarba duSh+Ta satwa da ma kaM ma hA b+hU ta pa ti i maM ba ling gr-ih+Na gr-ih+NA pa ya/ swA hA/ gtor ma'i sngagaso// oM d+hip+ta lo tsan bi kr-i tAn/ na ma hA T+TaT+Ta hA sa nA dI na di pA ya swA hA/ mar me'i sngag so// oM
122a6(rgyud): dza ya dza ya su dza ya bi shA ru pa d+ha ri gats+tsha gats+tsha swas+yA ni kr-i ta tan ta thA ga ta shu bi sardza ya ma ma kAR+Sha ku ru swAhA// ces pa gshegasu gsol ba'i sngags so// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid/ chos
122a7(rgyud): thams cad kyi rjesu 'gro ba dang / ldog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gsang sngags yongasu rdzogs pa'i phrin las 'di nyid bka' stsal to// na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas
122a8(rgyud): par/ hUM las yongasu rdzogs pa yi// rdo rje 'jigs byed bsam par bya// dmar po zhal cig phyag gnyis pa// srin po rab tu khros pa 'dra// dbyug pa thong khrag phyag na 'dzin// ma he pad+ma nyi ma la/ 
122b1(rgyud): g.yon brkyang ba'i tshul gyi sgom// oM ya mAn kr-ing hUM phaT// gsang sngags rgyal po 'di bzlas na// 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'byung // na mkha'i dbyings dbus gnas par// ya yig sngon po las
122b2(rgyud): skyes pa'i// khro bo rdo rje 'jigs byed ni// pad+ma nyi ma'i gdan stengs na// sems dpa'i skyil klungs kyis gnas pa'i// gri gug bin+di pa la dang // dgra snga dang ni thong khrag dang // phyag bzhi po na rim pas
122b3(rgyud): 'dzin// ma he nag po'i zhal steng na// 'jam dpal zhal ni ser zhing 'dzum// dpa' bo chen po rang nyid sgom// rab tu zhim pa'i chang btung zhing // sha chen dag kyang mur bar bya// mtshan mo dur khrod/ 
122b4(rgyud): rgyu byed cing // rtag par gsang sngags bzlas par bya// thig dale 'dren pa'i rnal 'byor ni// bsgrub bya'i phyogasu bsam pa dar bya// las rnams myur du 'dis 'grub po// yang na 'di ltar
122b5(rgyud): bya ste// ma he gdong gi sbyor ba yis// sku yi kha dog so sor she sa// khyad par du ni bsad pa la// nag po ma he'i zhal can ni// rtse gsum lcags kyu 'dzin pa ste// ma he sha steng bsam/ 
122b6(rgyud): byas na// khrag 'dren pa yi mchog tu gsungs// res 'gag sku la khro bo ni// lcags kyu 'dzin pa grangs med spro// zla ba spyang kis zin dus su// byi la'i sder mo ra snying dang // bya yi khrag dang mi rus bsre/ 
122b7(rgyud): gang la phog pa spro bar 'gyur// dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las sbyor ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// sgrub par byed pa'i rnal
122b8(rgyud): 'byor pas// dur khrod ras sam dpa' bo'i gos// yang na mtshan gyi khab ma la// rnam snang mdzad dang rdo rje'i chu// dpa' bo'i khrag dang chang dang dug/ go ro tsa nas ras chos bya// legs par dam por
123a1(rgyud): drung byas te// lus ngag yid kyi gnas ni// bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa'i chus// yi ge oM dang AHhUM bri// skra byed dur khrod sol ba dang // khrag chen ldong ros pa bla yis/ 
123a2(rgyud): dbang thob dam tshig srung byed cing // shin tu gsang la dam pa yi// ri mo mkhan ni brtson ldan des// rgyud kyi don la mkhas byas nas// nag po'i dus kyi mtshan phyed dus// gsang ba'i gnas su rab
123a3(rgyud): zhugs nas// bcom ldan rdo rjes 'jigs mdzad bri// rtsa ba ma he khros pa'i zhal// de stengs 'jam dpal 'dzum pa'i zhal// lhag ma dkar dang ser dang dmar// dur ba'i mdog mtshungs gyen skra
123a4(rgyud): cam/ rab tu brjid cing khro ba'i zhal// drug dang ldan pa'i sku lus ne// thod pa skam rlon sgyu ma sprul// rus pa rdo rje'i phreng bas t+ya/ na// glang chen stag lpags gyon nas ni// pad+ma nyi ma ma he la/ 
123a5(rgyud): gshin rje mnan nas zhabs drug gis// g.yon brkyang g.yas sku ma gar gyis 'gying // phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po na/  cig gnyis pa thob ste// gsum pa gtun shing mkha'
123a6(rgyud): la 'phyar// dgra sta lcags kyu zhags pa ni// g.yon pa'i phyag gis 'dzin pa bri// na mkha'i mdog can thal bas byugs// sku la khro bo du ma 'phro// sna tshogs mchod pa'i lha mos bskor// legs par
123a7(rgyud): de ltar bris pa yi// rgyab dang phyogs rnams thams cad du// dur khrod chen pos bskor ba bri// mgo dum sgyu ma mkha' la khyer// rkang dum lag dum ro langs dang // wa dang spyang ki gtum po dang // mkha'
123a8(rgyud): 'gro po mo sha za'i tshogs// bya dang gcan zan sna tshogs bri// spyi bung rab tu 'jigs bris nas// de ni sgrub pa po yang bri// gri thod bzung nas sha chen mur// gos nag gyon nas khrag chen 'thung / 
123b1(rgyud): rta dang mahe rus pa yi// phreng ba bzung nas gsang sngags 'don// bcom ldan 'das la lta ba bri// de ltar bris nas chang dang khrag/ sha chen go ro tsa nas mchod// mnyam gzhag lha yi dge 'dun des// 
123b2(rgyud): dus gsum rgyun du mchod byed na// rdo rje 'dzin pa myur du thob// sku ni rab tu sba zhing gsang // phan yon dam pa 'di las 'byung // dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po las// bris sku'i le'u ste
123b3(rgyud): gsum pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad par bya// rtog pa ma lus zad byed cing // las rnams thams cad 'grub 'dod pas// blo ldan ser sna rnam spangs te// brtul phod g.yeng ba
123b4(rgyud): rnam spangs nas// sbyin sreg las la rab brtson bya// mtshal da dang ba bla ldong ros dang // shan pa'i go thal dur khrod sa// da mi dang ma he khrag gis brdzi// khru do pa la khru phyed rtsig/ gru
123b5(rgyud): bzhi'i steng du zlum po ni// rdo rje rgya gram ldan byas la// de steng 'khor lo rtsibs drug la// mtshan ma drug ni dgod par bya// lte bar me yi dkyil 'khor ni// mtho gang tshad du byas pa
123b6(rgyud): la ma he'i khrag gis legs par byug/ bdag nyid lho yi phyogs bltas te// ma he zhal gyi sbyor ba yis// thab kyi nang gi lte ba la// me yi sa bon mngon bltas la// bskal pa'i me chen
123b7(rgyud): lta bur sgom// der ni me lha bsgom bya ste// zhal gsum phyag drug nag la rtsub// phyag gnyis rang 'dra'i yum la 'khyud// g.yas pa'i phyag gis 'gro rnams la// skyabs sbyin mdzad cing bgrang
123b8(rgyud): / phreng 'dzin// g.yon pas ril ba mchog rtsol brtson// zhabs drug rigs drug mtshan ma brdzis// zhal nas me rnams rab 'phro zhing // 'od rnams sna tshogs rnams kyis rgyan// de ltar shes na/ 
124a1(rgyud): rab bsregs na// 'dod pa'i don rnams rab tu 'byung // dgra bo'i gzugs rnams sha chen dang // chang dang ma he'i khrag bcas pa// stong phrag gsum du bsregs byas
124a2(rgyud): na/ bsgrub bya khrag tu skyugs nas 'chi// glang po rta bong khyi sha la// stong phrag gsum gyis dbang du byed// bya rog 'ug pa khyi sha chu// bsreg na me lta 'phye bar 'gyur// til dang nas dang gro sa lu/ 
124a3(rgyud): yung ba gi waM so phag rnamasu// stong phrag drug tu gang bsregs pa// longs spyod thams cad rnyed par 'gyur// rta dang rnga mo bya rog sha/ mi sha rdo rje chur bcas pa// gsang sngags rnal 'byor ldan byas
124a4(rgyud): te/ brgya rtsa brgyad kyis nges par skrod// ra sha daN+Da ud pa la// dachang dang ma he chur bcas pa// gang 'dod brgya rtsa brgyad kyi das lkugs// dug dang khrag dang sgog pa dang // sha chen til
124a5(rgyud): mar rab sbags te// brgya rtsa brgyad du bsregs byas na// pha rol gzhan gyi gsang sngags gcod// tsan dan dkar po 'bras dkar dang // til can 'bras can yungs kar dang // ud
124a6(rgyud): pal ka rag bur dang // shar du bltas te brgya rtsa brgyad// bsregs na dus rnams kun tu srung // gang zhig bya ba'i rigs sogs dang // sngags rnams bsam gtan nges ldan pas// snying rje yid
124a7(rgyud): ni ma bral na// 'dod pa thams cad 'dir bsgrub bya// gzhan du spongs pa'i byas pa bslu// blo gros med gang shes rab 'tshal// sngags dang dam tshig dman gyur cing // ting 'dzin la mngon
124a8(rgyud): g.yel ba// brtson pa chung zhing lhod pa 'gags// bskal pa stong du bsgrubs byas kyang // 'bras bu yod pa ma yin te// sha thang chad pa nyid du zad// dper na blo zhal byis pa rnams// 'ga' zhig 'bras
124b1(rgyud): 'dod 'khrul gyur nas// phub ma rlung khar byed pa la// 'bras yod nam yang mi 'gyur bzhin// ji ltar sprin dang chu zla dang // dbang po'i gzhu rnams rtag min te// thar pa 'dod pa'i bya ba yang // sgyu ma nyid la
124b2(rgyud): sgyu ma rol// ye shes gcig pu rnam grol rgyu// stong pa dpag par blos mi nus// de la spyad cing gzhal bzod na// brtags pa'i snying po de la med// de la dngos rnams ma grub na// sgrub pa'i rim gzhan
124b3(rgyud): smos ci dgos// bya ba dang ni byed pa dag/ nges par de la rtag mi bzod// ngam grog g.yang sar lhung yang bla'i// chad par rtog pa 'di mi bzod// rtag pa nyid kyang rigs min te// dngos po yod par
124b4(rgyud): ga la 'gyur// dper na byis pa rnams la mas// sa 'dir sngo/ dad dang ma nyid kyis// 'bras bu shing thog mang blangs la// khyod la bde bas sbyin zhes brjod// de bzhin rnam pa du ma ya // 
124b5(rgyud): 'jig rten rtog pa tha dad pas// de dag drang bar bya phyir bshad// bcom ldan lha yi lha mdun du// sha chen po yi zhal zas dang nga // chang dang til mar ma he khrag/ rab tu zhim pa'i zas
124b6(rgyud): mchog rnams// dus rnams rtag tu dbul bar bya// gsang sngags rgyal po yi ge bcu// bdag gis rgyun tu gdon bya zhing // bsam gtan rtag tu brtson par bya// de ltar shes shing sgrub byed pa'i// 
124b7(rgyud): skyes bu blo ldan de yis ni// sangs rgyas nyid kyang myur 'grub 'gyur// zhi sogs las la smos ci dgos// grong khyer dkrug na sngags pa des// khyi sha sbal sha ru sbal sha/ rnga mo byis pa'i sha rnams
124b8(rgyud): lastong rtsa brgyad du bsreg par bya// rta sha dri chen rab sbyar nas// ril bu byas nas bdag mdun du// gsang sngags rgyal po zlas byas nas// brgya rtsa brgyad du bsregs pas ni// rgyal po dbang du byed par
125a1(rgyud): 'gyur// bud med dbang du byed 'dod na// nya sha chang dang sha chen rnams// rdo rje chu yis sbags byas te// brgya rtsa brgyad du bsreg par bya// tha ma la dbang du byed 'dod na// sha
125a2(rgyud): chen glang po sha dang bcas// byang chub sems dang bsres byas te// stong phrag brgyad du bsreg par bya// dgug pa dus rnams thams cad du// khyi sha nya sha bdud rtsi lnga// cha mnyam ril bu byas nas ni// 
125a3(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad du bsregs na 'gugs// sbyin sreg las rnams thams cad kyang // ma he zhal gyi sbyor bas ni// gsang sngags rgyal pos 'dod pa sbyar// ma yengs rtse gcig sems kyis bya// 
125a4(rgyud): gsungs dang ma gsungs mtha' dag kyang // ji lta ba yi rim pa yi das// rgyud kyi rgyal po nyid nyer gnas// sangs rgyas 'a dbras bu myur du thob// zhi la zhi ba'i sems kyis te// rgyal po lnga
125a5(rgyud): bur rgyas pa la// sdang bral chags pas dbang la'o// drag po'i/ las la khro zhing rtsub// rab tu gtum pa'i yid kyis ni// gsod pa'i sems dang ldan par bya// gang zhig ltos pa med pa'i
125a6(rgyud): mi grub pa myur du tshol byed na// sems kyi rang bzhin rnam dag pas// rdo rje 'dzin par de 'grub 'gyur// dngos po gang dang gang spyod yul// de dang de yi rang bzhin 'gro/ mnyam gzhag nyams par mi bya la// 
125a7(rgyud): dus rnams rtag tu rnal 'byor pas// shin tu mnyam par gzhag par bya// de ni thar pa nyid kyi rgyu// rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di la ni// 'dod pa'i dngos grub myur byed de// dka' ba med pa'i thabs 'di ni// dka'
125a8(rgyud): spyod brtul zhugs rnam spangs te// shin tu bde bar sgrub pa'i thabs// du kha 'jigs med bdud rtsi'i ro// blo ldan legs par blang bya ste// shin tu 'bad pas bsgrub pa bya// mi shes blo gros rmongs pa 'ag
125b1(rgyud): rtog pa'i dra bas bsgribs pa'i tshe// bsod nams dang ni sdig pa yi// phung po rnam pa gnyi su brtags// 'od kyang 'dod pa thams cad ni// rgyud mchog 'di las 'byung 'gyur phyir// dmar zhing brtson pa chung ba
125b2(rgyud): 'ga'/ 'di la zhugs na myur du 'grub// de bas ngo mtshar rgyud 'di ni// rnyed dka' khyad par mchog gyur pa// yi ge'i dbyibs kyang mi bstan na// bshad cing 'grol ba smos ci dgos// dbang rnams nges
125b3(rgyud): par ma blangs shing // bla ma mnyes par ma byas tshe// bstan kyang thos par mi 'gyur te// tsha ba la sogs 'khor bar 'khor// de skad ston pas bshad pa'i tshe// sde rnams myos shing brgyal rmongs te/ 
125b4(rgyud): kun kyang 'dud cing mgo bo spang // 'jig rten 'di ni shin tu g.yos// gang zhig rgyud 'di nyan pa dang // shes nas 'chang bar byed/ pra dang // dus rnams kun tu 'don byed na// tshe 'dir 'jigs pa
125b5(rgyud): kun bsal te// shi nas mtho ris myur du 'thob/ gal te gzhan du rgyud mchog 'di// bstan nam bshad dam gsal phye/ na// de ni sdug bsngal mang myos nas// shi nas myur du dmyal
125b6(rgyud): bar 'gro/ rang gis shin tu bcang bya zhing // dngos grub nyid bzhin mngon byas na// sdug bsngal mtha' dag nges zad nas// myur du bla mod thob par 'gyur// dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyud kyi
125b7(rgyud): rgyal po las// sbyin sreg gi rim par phye ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / dpal ldan rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las kyi dngos grub brtag pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// // paN+Di
125b8(rgyud): tate chen po a mo g+ha'i zhabs nus pa can dang // bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba mar pa ban d+he chos kyi dbang phyug grags pas bsgyur cing zhus pa'o// slad kyis grub thob chen po kaR+Sha shrI'i zhal snga nas mnyan te// thar pa lo ts+tsha/ 
126a1(rgyud): banyi ma rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing nus te gtan la bab pa'o// rgyag skad du/ shrI pa/ ya ma ra ra dza na ma/ bod ska du/ dpal gshin rje gshed
126a2(rgyud): dmar po zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'od skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skung / 
126a3(rgyud): gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs so// der bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung thugs kyi snying po gsang ba las shin tu
126a4(rgyud): gsang ba'i mchog/ e mgo// phyag na rdo rje leg so legs so// snying rje chen po byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rdo rje/ sdang rdo rje/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying po
126a5(rgyud): gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sku nyon cig/ phyag na rdo rjes ga/ sol pa/ gshin rje 'joms pa po rnams ji snyed lag sa pa 'dir bshad du gsol/ gti mug rdo rje gshin rje gshed
126a6(rgyud): dang // phra ma rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang // 'dod chags rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang // phrag dog rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang / zhes pa ste/ rdo rje tsa rtsi ka dang / rdo rje phrag mo dang / rdo rje dbyangs can ma dang / rdo rje ga
126a7(rgyud): yang ngo // zur du bum pa bzhi rnams so// de ltar rab tu bskor ba'i gshin rje gshed kyi tshogs chen po rnams so// de nas nges par bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje/ rdo rje sems dpa'/ de bzhin gshegs
126a8(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bos par gyur to// de nas nges par bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnga' bdag/ bdud thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
126b1(rgyud): gcig nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams la nges par phyung bar gyur to// sngags kyis dgug dang dbang chen dang // de bzhin nus pa rnam mang po// ral gri sgrub thabs rgyal srid dang / pha rol sde ni
126b2(rgyud): rnam 'joms dang // mi snang mig sman bcud nyid dang // nges par grib la 'phrog par mkhas// ro langs gnod sbyin sgrub pa dang // sbrul dang gdug pa'i tshogs srung dang // sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor las
126b3(rgyud): rnams dang // byang chub sems ni rnam spyod dang // nyer mkho thams cad spyod pa dang // pha rol grong du rab 'jug pa'o// 'od zer lnga ni mnyam 'khrigs pa'i// rdo rje srung ba'i don bsgom bya// sa yi cha
126b4(rgyud): yang rdo rje yis// de bzhin rab dang ni gur// de nas bcom lda/ na 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskyed pa po bdu dad thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
126b5(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs te/ gti mug gshin rje gshed la sa gas pa 'di thams cad kyi sa bon nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang b+hu gas rnams la nges par byung ba// dbus su ya'o// k+She ma me dang
126b6(rgyud): yats+tsha ni rA dza do ru Na yo ni ra ya yig la sogs pa gshin rje 'joms par 'gyuraro// gti mug kle yig la brjod bya// phra ma nyid brjod ma yig la'o// 'dod chags nyid kyang me yig la// da yig la yang
126b7(rgyud): phrag dog yin// lnga rnams gshin rje 'joms par bsgrags// dza yig tsartsi kA ra brjod sa yig la ni phag mo ste// dbyangs can ma brjod do yig la// ru yig la ni gau rIr 'dod// Na yo ni ra zur bzhi ru// 
126b8(rgyud): mi yi thod pa bzhi rnam so// de nas nges par bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnga' bdag gshin rje rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// zhe sdang chen po'i rigs 'di
127a1(rgyud): sgom pa'i rnal 'byor 'di gsungs so// sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod par ldan// blo bzang sems can don dang cig/ byams sogs yon tan yang dag rdzogs/ 
127a2(rgyud): dad dang thos pas rnam par rgyan// brtse ba'i bdag nyid can snga dro// thog mar kha sogs dag byas te// skye bos dben phyogs dur khrod sogs// bde ba'i stan la rang brtsam bya// rang nyid pad+mar nyi ma la/ 
127a3(rgyud): rnam bkod shin tu gsal ba'i blta// de 'od rnams kyis sems can don// phun tshogs byas nas spyan drangs te// bla ma rdzogs sangs rgyas bsgom bya// ma lus mkha' dkyil rnams khyab pa// dmigs te/ 
127a4(rgyud): de rnams la ni phyag/ lus kyi tshogs kyis rnam par brtson// tsar tsi ka sogs rnams kyis mchod// de nas sdig pa rab bshags bya// lus ngag yid kyis yang dag sdig/ byas dang byed
127a5(rgyud): 'gyur de bzhin du// gang yang rje su yi rang ba// mgon po du/ sa gsum byas de bshags// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang nga mtshungs rnams kyi// bsod nams tshogs la rjes yi rang / 
127a6(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dam chos bcas// tshogs mchog rnams la skyabasu mchi// yon tan rgya mtsho khyed rnams slar// rang lus dag ni dbul bar bgyi// dam chos thams cad ston mdzad cing // 
127a7(rgyud): shin tu mthar thugs mdzes par bzhugs// yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas dam chos// de nyid sbyin sogs rang bzhin la// sku gsum ye shes thob phyir du// rab tu dang bas gnas par bgyi// sems
127a8(rgyud): can rnams kyi don sgrub phyir// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed bgyi// bsod nams yang dag nyer sgrub gang // rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs bsngo// dpal ldan gshin rje mthar byed du/ 
127b1(rgyud): gyur nas bdag gis 'gro pan bgyi// smon lam 'di ni btab byas te// de dang de rnams blos gshegs bya// brtse bas cho ga bzhin bltas te// sna tshogs stong par rnam bsam bya// sbyor ba bral
127b2(rgyud): ba'i rang bzhin te// rgyu nyid kyis dang mtshan ma med// rnam par rtog dang bral nyid phyir// smon pa rnam par spangs pa'o// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra sa b+ha wa At+ma ko haM/ ya ra ba laM/ dkyil 'khor bzhi
127b3(rgyud): bsdus pa'i b+h+rUM yig las skyes pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa bsgom par bya// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi yis rgyan pa ste// do shel do shal phyed pas spras// lha dang lha mos legs par mdzes// 
127b4(rgyud): sna tshogs rtse mo rlung bskyod pa'i// ba dan dril bu mnyam paraldan// de yi dbu gnas paM yig gis// sna tshogs pa pad+ma rnams bsam bya// der ni lte ba'i dbus gnas pa'i// sna tshogs
127b5(rgyud): rdo rje dbyug par bcas// mtshan ma mtha' dag yongs gyur na/ sa// zhe sdang bdag nyid rnam par sgom// pad+ma nyi ma ma nyam mnan cing // ma he dmar po'i steng bzhugs pa// g.yon brkyang
127b6(rgyud): pa yi zhabs kyis ni// bdud rnams thams cad nges 'joms pa// nyi ma bye ba'i 'od ldan lha// ro langs ma yis mgrin mkhyud cing // dpa' bo zhal cig phyag gnyis pa// klu ni brgyad kyis rnam par rgyan
127b7(rgyud): spyan gsum dmar po 'jigs pa ste// khrag ldan mgo bo'i phreng ba can// g.yas na rdo rje dbyug pa dang // g.yon na thod pa 'dzin pa'o// khro bo zhal dang mnyam ldan zhing // ljags 'gril mche ba
127b8(rgyud): gtsigs pa can// khro gnyer ldan zhing sku rgyas pa// stag gi lpags pas rked pa g.yogs// thung zhing gsus 'phyang 'jigs par byed// dri med dag pa'i 'od zer 'bar// ro langs ma yi g.yas pa na/ 
128a1(rgyud): gri gug gson na thong ba can// spyan gsum ldan zhing su grol ba// phyag rgya lngas ni rnam par rgyan// mgo ma phreng ba mnyam ldan zhing // gtso ba'amachul myang ba mo// shar gyi mangs
128a2(rgyud): ma la gti mug rdo rje dkar po// rdo rje cir tsi kA dang snyoms par zhug so// lho'i mdab ma la phra ma gshin rje gshed ser po// rdo rje phag mo dang snyoms par zhugs pa'o// nub kyi mdab ma la 'dod chags
128a3(rgyud): gshin rje gshed dmar po rdo rje dbyangs can ma dang snyoms par zhugs pa'o// byang gi mdab ma la phrag dog gshin rje gshed ljang ku rdo rje gau rI dang snyoms par zhugs pa'o// tsa ra tsi kA nag mo// 
128a4(rgyud): phag mo ser mo// dbyangs can ma dkar mo/ gau ri ljang ku/ g.yon na thod pa g.yas na gri gug ste/ phyag dang zhal dang dbyi bas ni dpa' bo ji lta bzhin no// me'i zur du mu men gyi bum
128a5(rgyud): pa bzhin mnyam gyis gang ba'o// bden bral du gser gyi du/ ma pa gla rtsis gang ba'o// rlung du byi ru'i bum pa sih+la sa gang ba'o// dbang ldan du dngul gyi bum pa ga pur
128a6(rgyud): gyis gang ba ste thod pas kha bcad pa rnam par sgom pa'o// khra bo 'ching ba'i sngags gsungs pa// gtso bo dpa' bo'i ni/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA// snying po'i sngag so// oM hau k+Sho k+Sha
128a7(rgyud): ka rA ya/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA// nye ba'i snying po'i sngagaso// oM ma hA yak+Sha se na d+hi pa ta ye ma hA dur dan ta da ma kA ya/ nA sha ya nA she ya/ bi drA pa ya bo drA pa ya/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA// phreng ba'i sngag so// 
128a8(rgyud): oM.o dwe Sha ra ti nud nud/ truT tru Ta hUM dzaHswA hA/ rje btsun ma'i sngag so// oM mo ha an ta kr-i ta hUM hUM phaT/ oM bi shu na an+ta kr-ita hu hU~M phaT/ oM rA ga an ta kr-ita hUM hUM phaT/ oM Ir Sh+ya an+ta kr-ita hUM hUM phaT/ dpal
128b1(rgyud): bo bzhi'i sngags so// oM mo ha ra ti hU~M dzaHoM bi shun ra ti hUM dzaHoM ra ga ra ti hUMHdzaHoM Ir Sh+ya ra ti hUMHdzaHdpa' bo'i dbang phyug ma bzhi'i sngag so// oM mar+the maR+tha bi g+ha te/ oM badz+ra tsartsi ke/ ha ra ha ra/ 
128b2(rgyud): buk+ka mA ra ya/ a mu kA ya dzaHoM g+ho Ne/ su g+ho Ne/ badz+ra mA ma kI/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sa b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hUM dzaHoM maR+Ye mar+tha k+Sho b+ha Ni badz+ra sa ra sa ti/ da ra dar/ tha ra tha ra/ pa ra pa ra/ ka ba ka pa/ d+hun d+hu na/ hUM a muH
128b3(rgyud): dzaHoM ga b+hI re/ badz+ra karti ke/ g+ha g+ha rak+ta sho Ni ta pri ye gau rI ye e mu ka dzaHgdengs can mtha' yas sngon po yis// skra bcings shin tu 'jigs par mdzad// klu ni 'jog po dmar po yis// rna
128b4(rgyud): bar drag pos rna rgyan byas// rigs ldan sna tshogs dpung pa'i rgyan/ gdengs can ser po dung skyong ni// lag gdub dag tu 'a dzin pa ste// pad+ma dkar po do shal mdzes// karko Ta ni sngo bas
128b5(rgyud): kyang // mchod phyir thogs pas mdzes pa ste// gdengs can nor/ rgyas bdud rtsi yi// kha dog lta bu'i ska rags byas// pad rtsa lta bu dkar ba'i mdog/ pad+ma chen pos rkang gdub byas
128b6(rgyud): thams cad phud kyi rnam pa sgrogs// lce gnyis phreng ba'i mche ba can// zhes pa 'khor ba myang 'das kyis// gzugs can gshin rje gsod pa ste// rnam rtog thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir// sngags
128b7(rgyud): kyis yang dag byin rlabs bya// rang nyid sa bon lcags kyus dgug/ zhal nas zhugs te thams cad du// mkha' khyab rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun// zhal nas zhugs rnams snying khar zhu// der ni sa
128b8(rgyud): bon phyung byas te// rdo rje'i lam nas zhu ba ste// rang 'od pad+ma'i nang gnas pa// sa bon rang bzhin can blta bya// sa bon de rnams kyis byin rlabs// 'od zer mi bzad 'phro ba ni// mkhas pas cho ga
129a1(rgyud): bzhin bsgom bya// bltas te snying khar zhu byas la// rdo rje'i lam nas nges phyung ste// rang gi rig ma'i pad+ma yi// ze 'brur lha mo'i tshogs bltas byas// me tog sna tshogs nyes
129a2(rgyud): spyod sogs// lag pa'i yal gas bzung ba dang // yid 'phrog klu yi mchod pa dang // sna tshogs gar gyi rang bzhin nyid// bde ba chen po rab ster ba// rol bcas de rnams kyis mchod bya// kye kye gshin/ 
129a3(rgyud): rje gshed dmar po// bla ma srin po'i gzugs rang bzhin// khyod mthong kho bo rnam par 'jigs// bla ma khro bo'i rang bzhin spongs// khyod kyis gar mdzad sa stengs dang // sa bla dang ni sa 'og g.yo// 
129a4(rgyud): chags pas brgyan pa'i kho bo yid// gar mdzad khyod ni ro langs lag sa// sku ni dmar zhing thung ba ste// rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ dazugs sprul pa// rdo rje dbyangs can mas btud che/ 
129a5(rgyud): gar mdzad khyod ni bde ba che// hrIHSh+T+rIHgsang sngags dag gis khyod// sa gsum po yi 'khrul pa sel// snying rje'i khro bo rje ba tsun khyod// gar mdzad 'gro ba rnams la gzigs/ 
129a6(rgyud): oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu dza badz+ra swa b+ha wa at+ma ko ha// sgra yi tshegs rnams thams cad ni// sgra brnyan dang mtshungs rnam par blta// 'khor lo'i gtso la bstod byas te// de yis de rnams de lta bzhin// gti mug
129a7(rgyud): rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod// shin tu 'jigs pa gshin rje gshed// ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin// sku yi rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal// phra ma rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod// shin tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rje gshed
129a8(rgyud): thugs kyi rdo rje rab gsal ba// rin chen rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal// 'dod chags rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod// khyab bdag chags pa'i chos 'byung gnas// dbyangs mchog kun gyi mchog gi mchog/ gsung gi rdo rje
129b1(rgyud): khyod phyag 'tshal// phrag dog rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod// las kun byed pa'i gshin rje gshed// sku yi rdo rje rab gsal ba// phyag na ral gri khyod phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin khyod// sangs rgyas
129b2(rgyud): thams cad gcig bsdus pas// sangs rgyas kun rab mchog gi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dbang phyug khyod phyag 'tshal// aHyig las skyes pad+ma'i snod// mi mgo gsum gyi steng gnas pa// dag par rnam
129b3(rgyud): par bsgred byas te// der ni 'og tu me dkyil 'khor// zur gsum ra yig las byung ba'o// dar ni 'og tu rlung dkyil 'khor// sngon po g.yo ba gzhu lta bu// ba dan gyis mtshan yaM las byung // der ni nga
129b4(rgyud): ming dang po las// bskyed de rnam snang la sogs pa// bum yig sogs las yang dag byung // glang po sa sogs pa lngas// hUMd skye rdo rje'i kha chod kyi// bkab pa mkhas pas bsgom par
129b5(rgyud): bya// me la rlung gis bskyod pa na// der ni nu ba rnam bsam bya// rdo rje'i ro mnyam dag gyur cing // shin tu dri ma med bltas te/ hUM yig 'od kyis sangs rgyas rnams// spyan drangs ye
129b6(rgyud): shes rang bzhin can// sngags kyi gzugs kyis rab gzhug cing // mchog gi bdud rtsi lngar bltas nas// de nyid gsum gyis byin brlabs bya// dkyil 'khor bdag po tshim bya ste// lce la rdo rje gtsa
129b7(rgyud): ma nyid// hUM yig yang dag byung bltad der// de 'od sbu gu'i rnam par la// yang dag bkug pa de yis kyang // rdzogs sangs rgyas kun sna tshogs gnas// dkyil 'khor ba rnams de bzhin gzhan// ye
129b8(rgyud): shes 'od kyi snying khar bkug/ kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs// thog ma tha ma dbus dbye bas// der yang gzung ba gcig yod min// de nyid kyis ni 'khrul gzugs med// gang la 'khrul pa gnyis
130a1(rgyud): la gnas// thams cad chen sems 'khrul med// lus ni spro dang sdud pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las/ 
130a2(rgyud): mngon par rtogs pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol
130a3(rgyud): ba btab pa// las kyi dbye dang rab dbye las// ci ltar sems can rab tu 'jug/ rdo rje chen pos bshad du gsol// ye shes rgya mtsho rnams nyan 'tshal// de nas rdo rje 'chang rgyal po// nyes pa thams
130a4(rgyud): cad gso ba'i bdag/ las kun rab tu sgrub pa pos// gsung ni 'di dag bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'dangs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje'i mthu mnga' ba la
130a5(rgyud): mchod pa byas te phyag 'tshal ba/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal zhing // bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung mnyan to// de nas rdo rje 'chang
130a6(rgyud): rgyal pos// dbang byed 'khrul 'khor rab gsal byed// gshin rje gshed nag 'khrul 'khor rnams// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// bud med dbang byed phyir de bzhin// bsrung ba'i don du bya ba nyid// 
130a7(rgyud): gi baM bzung bya zhi ba la// gro ga de bzhin skrag shun la// 'khor lo gnyis ni mngon bris te// na maHming ni nang du spel// nag po rtsa ba sogs spangs te// kham por gnyis ni kha sbyar la// mar dang sbrang rtsi'i
130a8(rgyud): dbus bzhag ste// srad bu dkar pos dkri bar bya// me tog dkar pos thun gsum du// shar du kha bltas mchod par bya// gshin rje mthar byed zla shes 'od// bdag nyid bsam te 'du 'god bya// bsgrub
130b1(rgyud): bya zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// zhen pa bltas te dbang bskur bya// bum pa dkar po zla 'dra ba// bdud rtsi lnga yis gang rnams la// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas khrus byed pa// bltas nas bzlas pa brtsams par bya// 
130b2(rgyud): / oM hrIHSh+TiHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT na maHlha sbyin gyi shAn ti ku ru na maHzhi ba'i dam tshig gsungs pa'o// skyes pa rnams kyi zhi ba la// gur gum gyis bri rgyas pa la'ang // kha che rnams kyi 'khor lo gnyi/ 
130b3(rgyud): swA hA ming gi nang du spel// bsgrub bya'i ming ni blangs nas ni// mar dang sbrang rtsi'i dbus bzhag nas// kham por kha sbyar du bzhag ste// srad bu ser pos dkri bar bya// me tog ser pos thun gsum du/ 
130b4(rgyud): byang du bltas mchod par bya// gshin rje 'joms pa sku ma dadog ser// bdag nyid nges par blta bar bya// bsgrub bya ser po zla bar gnas// bum pa ser pos dbang bskur bya// dbang
130b5(rgyud): bskur ba ni bsgoms nas su// rgyas par byed 'dod yang da/ ga bzlas// oM hrIHSh+T+r-iHwi kr-i tA nan hU hU phaT phaT sahA// lhas sbyin gyi puSh+TiM ku ru swAhA// bau ShaT oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tAn na tsU d+hu
130b6(rgyud): baT phaT swA hA// bau Sha Ta lnga sbyin gyi puSh+TiM ku ru bau ShaT ces pa gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyas pa'i dam tshig go/ gro ga 'am/ yang na ras la yang // rgya skyegs khu ba 'am tsan dan dmar// ming med
130b7(rgyud): khrag dang bsres pa yis// 'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam bris te// hoHyig gis ni nang du spel// nag po la sogs spangs 'khrul 'khor// kham por gnyis ni kha sbyar te// mar dang sbrang rtsis yongs gang
130b8(rgyud): ba ra/ srad bu dmar pos dkri bar bya// nub tu mngon par phyogs byas te// me tog dmar pos mchod par bya// bdag nyid gshin rje 'joms pa po// sku mdog dmar po cher 'bar ba// bsgrub bya zla ba dam
131a1(rgyud): bo la 'azhon pa nyid kyang rnam bsam bya// rang lus las 'bros 'od zer ni// dmar po lcags kyu'i dbyibs rnams kyis// bsgrub bya bkug par bsams nas ni// spro
131a2(rgyud): ba'i sngags ni khri bzlas bya// de yis bsgrub bya ba rgyal 'gyur zhing // rkang pa dag la de bzhin 'gyel// gos dang bral ba'i skra grol ba// bsams te bzlas pa brtsam par bya// gal te dbang du ma gyur na// 
131a3(rgyud): dud med seng ldeng me la ni// mar sogs der bcas brtul zhugs can// 'khor lo de ni gdung bar bya// oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ hoHlha sbyin gyi mchod sbyin pa shing ku ru hoHoM hrIHSh+T+r-iHwi
131a4(rgyud): kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT bau ShaT/ lha sbyin gyi ba shA mA na ma/ dachod sbyin bau ShaT/ ces pa gsungs te bcom ldan 'das/ kyai dbang du bya ba'i dam tshig go/ dur khrod ras sam yang na ni// rang
131a5(rgyud): byung bskus pa'i ras dag la// rgya skyegs sgra rlon khragabasres pas// 'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam bris te/ dzaHyig dang ni hrIHyig gis// bsgrub bya'i ming ni nang spel bya/ 
131a6(rgyud): btsun mo'i pad+ma'i snod du ni// kha sbyar bzhag ste mchod par bya// srang bu dmar pos dkris nas ni// me tog dmar pos mchod par bya// bdag nyid gshin rje gshed po ni// 'tshams kyi nyi ma ltar 'bar ba
131a7(rgyud): lcags kyu kha dog dmar po yis// bsgrub bya bkug pa nyid bsgom bya// lcags kyu rnams kyis snying phug cing // zhags pas rked pa la bcings te// rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba las// seng ge dmar
131a8(rgyud): po mnyam zhon pa// rdzas lnga yis ni bsang bya ste// de ni 'ong bar rnam bsam bya// gal te bsgrub bya ma 'ongs na// seng ldeng shing me 'bar ba la// 'khrul 'khor de bsros brtul zhugs can// der ni bzlas
131b1(rgyud): pa yang dag brtsam// oM dzAHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tAnan tu d+ha phaT paT dzIHA mu ka A kaR+Sha ya hU~M/ oM hrIHSh+T+r-iHwi kr-itA nan d+hu d+hU phaT phaT dzalA smin AkaR+Sha ya dzaHces pa gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bkug/ 
131b2(rgyud): pa'i dam tshig/ blo ldan dur khrod ras ma la// yung ba yi ni khu ba yis// 'khor lo gnyis ni mnyi ma bris te// le yig gis ni nang du spel// bsgrub bya'i ming ni yang dag blang // kham por kha sbyar du
131b3(rgyud): bzhag ste// kham por ser po steng bzhag nas// der ni mkhas pas ri mo bri// dang po ri mo bzhi bcu bdun// mnyam par gzhag ste mnyam bri bya// cog brgyad du grags ri rab ni// de yi steng du yang
131b4(rgyud): dag bri// hUM yig dang ni baM yig ste// de yis ri rab nang du spel// de yi nang du laM yig gis// dbang chen dkyil 'khor dgod par bya// sna tshogs rdo rjes mnan pa la// srad bu ser
131b5(rgyud): pos dkri bar bya// bdag nyid gshin rje gshed po ni// sku mdog ser po rnam bsam bya// lho ru mngon phyog sa rnal 'byor pas// dbang chen dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i// bsgrub
131b6(rgyud): bya ser po rnam bsams nas// ri rab kyis mnan myur dgod bya// sna tshogs rdo rje mnyam mnan la// dbang chen dkyil 'khor las 'og tu// man dar sogs 'jigs rung ri// gangs ri g.yo ma
131b7(rgyud): mtshungs rnams kyis// bsgrub bya mnan pa bsgom bya ste// de nyid bzlas pa bya ba nyid// oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ laM lha sbyin swa s+thA na staM b+ha ya laM swAhA// zhes gsungs te// bcom/ 
131b8(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi rengs pa chen po'i dam tshigo/ ngag ni rengs par 'dod pa yis// rang bzhin 'khor lo gnyis bris nas// bsgrub bya'i ming rnams nang spel te// de nas spos shing sngags bzlas bya// 
132a1(rgyud): oM rbASh+NIHthi kr-itAnan tsu hU phaT phaT laM/ lha s+t+rIn ya thA prAr+tha kAR+Sha s+ya kr-i te/ ta ni ba ra ya to bi ru pa ka/ ba ra ta ya to bi ru ba ka/ ba ra ta ya d+hA dang s+ya na ga sta b+ha na ku ru la/ 
132a2(rgyud): zhes pa gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ngag rengs pa'i dam tshig go// de ltar dgongs pa gsungs pa 'di// nang du shin tu legs sbas pas// gshin rje gshed dmar rab sbyor las/ nyi ma gcig
132a3(rgyud): gis 'grub par 'gyur// dur khrod ras la 'khor lo gnyis// sngar bzhin bri bya brtul zhugs can// skye che dang ni lan tshwas kyang // dug dang nim pa yis kyang ste// de bzhin lan tshwa tsha ba gsum// dur khrod
132a4(rgyud): sol ba nyid dang ni// smyo byed mdab ma'i khu ba dang // de bzhin gtum po'i sa bon nyid// mdzub mo'i khrag ni blang bya/ das te// tsi tra ka yi khu ba 'am// tsha sgo can gyis blangs te// gdol
132a5(rgyud): pa'i rdza ma'i dreg pa dang // ltogs pa can gyi smyu gu yis/ gdug pa'i sems kyis bcu bzhi la// nyi phyed na bri ba rtul zhugs can// ma rungs pa rnams bsad rgyu yi// sna tshog/ 
132a6(rgyud): sems can rnam 'joms pa'i// hUM yig gis ni rnam spel bya// lho ru mngon phyogs rnal 'byor pa// bdag nyid gshin rje gshed po ni// gtum po chen po khro bo'i gzugs// thod pa'i
132a7(rgyud): dum bus rnam par rgyan// ma he la zhugs ljags 'gyur ba// gsus pa che zhing 'jig su rung // gtsigs shing gyen du 'bar ba'i sku// de bzhin smar smin ma ser// g.yas pa rdo rje'i dbyug pa che// g.yon
132a8(rgyud): bzod pa nyid kyang ste// rnam 'gyur mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal// bskal pa'i me ltar yang dag mtshungs// de ltar bdag nyid rnam bsams te// de mdun bsgrub bya myur dgod bya// dri ldan rims gzir nang nam
132b1(rgyud): kyis/ gdug pa'i lus la gzir ba dang // gos dang bral bas 'dar ba dang // nyams chung lus ni rma dang ldan// 'bras kyi phreng bas yan lag bskor// mtshon cha yis ni gzir bar bya// grang ba'i rlung gis nye
132b2(rgyud): bar gtses// me yi dbus su yang dag gnas// ma he dag dang stag dang ni// khyi dang mchu rings can rnams kyis// sangs rgyas sde ni rnam 'joms pa'i// ma rungs chen po za byed cing // mthar byed lho
132b3(rgyud): ba'i nang na gnas// tshor ma rnams kyis lus gang ba// gdos dang sgrog gi rkang par bsdams// de bzhin dum bu dum bur byas// lpags pa med par byas bsams te// ske tshe dang ni lan tshwas byug
132b4(rgyud): sIng yig brjid pas bsam par bya// de yi lus kyi srung ba sog/ das// bcang nas bdag mdun dgod par bya// de yi go cha bgos byas te// stong pa'i lus bzhin sgom par byas// bdag
132b5(rgyud): lus las byung gshin rje gshed// khro bos bdag nyid sku rnam/ sa kyi// de ni gdung bar bsgom bya zhing // zhag dang tshil dag 'thung bar byed// de mdun gshin rje bsam bya ste// lag na
132b6(rgyud): dbyug pa stobs po che// gdug pa de yis gdungs pa ni// ma rungs de la rnam bsgom bya// de yi nang grol blangs bya ste// bya rgod kyis khyer mkha' dkyil 'gro/ klu rnams kyis ni sa 'og 'gug/ dran med la
132b7(rgyud): sogs rnam par gzir// de ltar bsgrub bya rnam bsams te// sems ni snying rjes nges mkhyud pas// 'khor ba las ni bton byas te// sangs rgyas zhing rnamasu skyes 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das
132b8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thugs rab tu dgyes te tshig 'di gsung so// e ma'o gsod pa 'di ni bzang // gsod pa gsod pa ma yin te// ci sring sdig pa las grol ba'i// 'chi ba 'chi ba nyid ma yin// 
133a1(rgyud): sdig pa stong phrag rnams byas nas// mnar med sogs par gnas 'gyur ba// e ma sangs rgyas bdag nyid che// gsod pa byang chub thob par mdzad// slar yang
133a2(rgyud): snying rje rnam mdzad nas// bsad 'os sems can gsod par mdzad// e ma snying rje mchog gi stobs// snying rje dman pas mi 'grub bo// oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i ta na na hU hUM phaT phaT/ tsU de ba dat+ta mA ra ya ts+tsha
133a3(rgyud): oM hrIHSh+T+r-iHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT hUM phaT/ de ba dat+taM mA ra ya hUM phaT/ ces pa gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rnam par rtog pa chen po gsod pa'i rdo rje/ 'khrul 'khor sngags dang / rgyud kyi gas
133a4(rgyud): pa la sogs pa'i dam tshig go// de nas 'khor lo gnyis bri/ sa te// phaT kyi yi ges rnam spel bya// bsgrub bya'i ming / ni blangs byas te// thod pa kha sbyor du dgod bya// srad bu nag
133a5(rgyud): pos yang dag dkri/ sdang ba'i sems kyis nyin phyed na/ dur khrod rnamasu sba bar bya// gshin rje mthar byed du yang dmigs// mdun du bsgrub bya dgod par bya// rta dang ma he maH
133a6(rgyud): zhon pa// lag na mtshon thogs de gnyis dang // khro bo 'dus pa rnams kyis bskor// gnyis ka'i phyogasu rnams bsam bya// khro bos dkris pa yi sems kyis// gnyis po de dag dbyug 'gyed par/ 
133a7(rgyud): bsgom bya 'thab mo'i bsam pa can// bsgoms te bzlas pa brtsam par bya// oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na huM hUM phaT phaT/ de ba dat+taM yadz+nya dat+to bi dwe ShA ya phaT/ ces gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbye
133a8(rgyud): pa chen po'i dam tshig go// sngar bzhin cho ga de nyid kyis// 'khor lo gnyis ni bri bya ste// hUM dang phaT yig rnam spel bas// thod pa kha sbyor du bkod de// srad bu nag pos yang dag dkris// ma mo'i
133b1(rgyud): tshal rnams su snga bya// gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor gzung // mdun du bsgrub bya rnam bsgom bya// yaM byung rlung gi dkyil 'khor ni// nag po gzhu yi rnam pa la// rnga mo chen po mdog sngon po// de yi
133b2(rgyud): steng du rnam bsgom bya// de la ma rungs che bskyon te// lho yi phyogasu de khyer la// khro tshogs rnams kyis brdungs pas na// nges par sangs rgyas rnams kyang bskod// oM hrIHSh+TiHwi kr-i tAn na hUM hUM
133b3(rgyud): paT phaT/ de bdat+taM uts+tshu Ta ya hUM phaT/ ces pa gsungs te bcom ldan 'das kyi bskrad pa chen po'i dam tshig/ khros pa gshin rjer bltas rnal 'byor// khrag bces ro bsregs thal ba dang // dug
133b4(rgyud): dang lan tshwa ske tshe dang // til mar smyo byed mad ba de bzhin// dur khrod ras la 'khor lo gnyis// de ltar rim pas bri ba dar bya// gshin rje'i lus gnas bsad pa la// rta dang ma he dag
133b5(rgyud): las dbye// rnga mo'i lus gnas bskrad pa la// zhi za zla ba 'i dkyil 'khor la// rgyas pa zla ba ser po la// btsun mo'i snying khar dbang du byed// lkugs par yi lus la gnas// 
133b6(rgyud): lhun po'i dbusu rengs pa ste// seng gi sha ra b+ha gnas dgug/ de ltar gzhan rnams las mtshon bya// gi brgya skyegs nyid dang ni// kha che yi ni bye brag gis// gro ga'i mdab ma la bris dbang // 'dir ni
133b7(rgyud): 'grub 'gyur the tsom med// kham por kha sbyar du bzhag ste// dge ba'i sems kyis yang dag bzung // bya rog sgro yi skug gu yis// nyi ma'i gung la nges par brtsam// ro bsregs pad+ma kha sbyar la/ 
133b8(rgyud): gshin rje gshed bdag rnal 'byor las// oM hriHSh+TiHsogs kyi sngags brjod cing // lho ru gnas pa'i tshar gcod bya// zhi la mtha' yi yi ge ya// dbye ba ni gnyis kyis yang ngo // phyi nas
134a1(rgyud): dbus kyi ya yig gis// lhag ma'i yi ge ci bde ba'o// sngon du bsnyen pa khri bzlas te// las 'di rab tu sgrub pa ni// gshin rje gshed dmar rab sbyor las// ye shes rdo rje/ 
134a2(rgyud): yis bya ste// drag po chen po'i 'khor lo 'di// bris pa gang du gnas pa dang // yi ge bris pa'i khyim du yang // rtag tu 'thab mo 'byung bar 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang
134a3(rgyud): thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las// 'khrul 'khor gyi dbang du byas pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // ri bo skye bos dben phyogs dang // legs sbas yid pa'i khyim rnamaso// thang sku
134a4(rgyud): bkram ste rnal 'byor bdag/ sngags kyis dgug pa yang da dag brtsam// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar// dgri gug thod pa 'dzin pa mo// khrag 'gugs pa yi rab sbyor la/ 
134a5(rgyud): tsartsi ka sgom rnal 'byor pas// de nas bcom ldan 'das ga shin rje chen po 'joms pa'i rdo rje khrag 'gugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje tsartsi kA'i sngags
134a6(rgyud): / 'di dag gsungaso// oM badz+ra tsartsi ke sid d+hen+da nI la hA ri Ni rat+na tra ya/ a pa ka ri No ru d+hi raM kaR+Sha ya dzaHkha ni rab tu gdangs bya ste// sngags 'di rje su dran par bya// khams gsum pa'i khrag chen po/ 
134a7(rgyud): 'dir ni 'gugs par the tsom med// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gshin rje gshed pos chang dgug pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje phag mos chang dgug pa'i dam
134a8(rgyud): tshig 'di gsungaso// oM g+h+r-i Na su g+ho Ne badz+ra mA ma kI/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sam+b+ha ra sam+b+ha ra/ t+yu d+hA tu ka ma d+ya A kaR+Sha ya dzaHrdza mkhan lag pa phyis pa'i sas// bum pa byas te kun nas bsgribs// rkun pa/ 
134b1(rgyud): skra yi gzhir bzhag ste// sngags ni rje su dran par bya// paN+Di tas ni mchod rten du// sngags 'di'i bdag nyid che ba bstan// 'bad pas brtan par dmigs byas nas// chang dgug pa ni rab tu 'grub/ 
134b2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje chen po 'joms pa'i rdo rje shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// dbyangs can mas sngags 'di gsungaso// oM pi tsu pi tsu
134b3(rgyud): pradz+nyA bar+d+ha ni/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ mi d+hA bar+d+ha ni/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ bud d+hi bar+d+ha na swA hA// bzung nas ji srid tshes gcig nas// kun nas zla ba rdzogs pa'i bar// legs sbyar byed 'dod brtsam bya ste// ji srid zla bI
134b4(rgyud): rjes 'jug las// ngag gi dbang phyug 'grub par 'gyur// // de nas tshigs bcad brgya byed cing // khams gsum pa/ da ni ma lus pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'khrugs// de nas
134b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das mthar byed chen po 'joms pa'i rdo rje'i khu ba 'gugs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ khu ba 'gugs pa gau rIs sngags 'di gsungaso// 
134b6(rgyud): oM a kaR+Sha ni a kaR+Sha ni/ gau rI dzaHhriHduSh+Ta s+ya duSh+TA ya/ shu kra A kaR+Sha ya dzaHdzaHhUM swA hA// mkha' sgo rdo rje lam dang rlung // dril bu lcags kyu'i sbyor ba las// bzlas dang sgom par rab sbyor las// khu hrI
134b7(rgyud): tshogs rnams 'gugs par byed// dben pa'i nags khrod rnamasu yang // las 'di rab tu bsgrub bya ste// mtshan mo bdun gyi rab sbyor gyis// 'dir ni 'grub par the tsom med// de nas bcom ldan 'das
134b8(rgyud): gshin rje gshed chen po dus 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// dbang bskur ba mchog gi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje rnams las nges par phyung bar gyur to// 
135a1(rgyud): u dum ba ra man+da ra// pa ri dzA tra ka mA li ka/ kar ni ka ra'i phra ba yang // bu khyod zung la byin gyis rlobs// khams gsum pa yi ral gri che// sangs rgyas thams cad/ 
135a2(rgyud): phyag mdzad pa// bzung nas bdud las rgyal bar 'gyur// las kyi ral gri dang mtshungs mchog/ shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin ni// rdo rje dril bu'ang sgrub pa'i phyir// mnyes shing gsang ba'i rdo rje/ 
135a3(rgyud): zung / khyod ni slob ma bsdu bar gyis// 'di ni btung ba rin chen te// 'grub pa'i lus ni rab sgrub byed// skyes bu byung ba'i chu 'thungs cig/ mnyes gshin kun tu ye shes nyid// slob ma'i kha yis
135a4(rgyud): btung bya ste// gshin rje gshed ni rab sgrub phyir// rdo rje slo dam bdag nyid che// sems ni shin tu dga' bar mdzod// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs
135a5(rgyud): gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las sngags kyi dgug pa'i rab tu sbyor ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // ral gri'i sgrub thabs bshad par
135a6(rgyud): bya// khab len lcags kyi rang bzhin las// ral gri yang na dngul chu yis// phyed byas khru gang tshad kyis ni// ral gri rnam bsam brtul zhugs can// bcu bzhi yang na brgyad pa la// dur khrod dbusu bzung bar
135a7(rgyud): bya// bdud rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan// thun gsum khri phrag bzlas par bya// zla ba so so'i bcu bzhi las// gtor ma mchod pa sngon 'gro bar// zla ba gcig gis 'bum phrag bzlas// 'bum phrag lngas ni
135a8(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur// grub nas ral gri rab tu 'bar// snang ba chen po'i 'od zer lnga// de nas bzung bya 'grub par 'gyur// 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal mi// 'jigs byed gshin rje gshed sbyor las
135b1(rgyud): gang tshe ral gri grub rnal 'byor// rtsed rmongs ni grub byed de'i// g.yul du de yi bzod par dka'// rkang pa gnyis dang rkang bzhi dang // blta phyir phyogs bcu rnamasu 'gro/ lha dang lha min rnams mi bzod/ 
135b2(rgyud): mi yi 'jig rten smos ci dgos// rgya mtsho'i 'jim pa blangs byas te// zla ba gcig gis yang dag sgrub// oM pu'iHyi ge snying khar dgos// hrIHSh+T+r-iHla sogs sngags bzlas bya// char pa mi 'bab/ 
135b3(rgyud): dus rnamasu// khri khrag bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur// sbrul nag dag gi sha rnams dang // nim pa'i lo mas bsres byas te// de yis ri lur byas nas ni// rgya mtshor zhugs byas brtul zhugs can// 
135b4(rgyud): khri brag tsam zhig rab bzlas pas// chu rlabs rengs pa'i mtsho/ dag yin no// gtum po sa bon brgya blangs te// sran ma 'bra ngas dang bsres pa ni// 'bum phrag bdun du rab bzlas pas/ 
135b5(rgyud): lha ni sbyin sreg las gzigs 'gyur// dur khrod kyis ni gso ma blangs// gzugs brnyan bya ba brtul zhugs can// smyo byed khu bas byug pa yis// khri phrag gcigs 'gugs
135b6(rgyud): par byed// 'bum phrag bzhi ni bzlas pa yis// don grub sa bon kun bsags pas// gnyid log langs te bya ba dang // tshor bar yang ni the tsom med// rgyun lam gyi ni sa blangs te// sngags ni 'bum
135b7(rgyud): phrag bzlas pa las// spyi bor rab tu byugs tsam gyis// spyi bo'i nad ni rnam par 'joms// lan bdun mngon par bsngags byas te// lag pas spyi bor mnye bar bya// nad kyis nyams pa med 'gyur te// 
135b8(rgyud): 'dir ni the tsom yod ma yin// bram ze yi ni sha dag dang // dur khrod thal bas de ni// gshin rje gshed kyi sku gzugs bya// phyag gnyis dang ni zhal gcig pa// g.yas pa rdo rje chen po ste// de bzhin
136a1(rgyud): g.yon na mi mgo'o// sku mdog dkar po 'jigs byed chen// de yis ma rungs 'joms par byed// sha dang bdud rtsi lnga yis ni// nyi ma so sor gtor ma dbul// rtag tu gsos/ 
136a2(rgyud): btab rnal 'byor pa// bdag gi dgra bo 'joms par mdzod// ces pa brjod de mtshan mo nyal// dgra ni tho rangs 'chi bar 'gyur// yang nan par 'gyur ba ste// myos pa la sogs kun tu 'khrug/ dgra
136a3(rgyud): rnam snang blang bya ste// mi yi rkang ni rab bkang bya// 'bum phrag bzlas pas rdzogs nas ni// shing gi rtse mor sbyang bya nyid// rtag tu yi dgas tshal du bskor// rnal 'byor dbang phyug mnyes na bde// de nas
136a4(rgyud): gzhan yang rab bshad bya// ro langs chen po'i sgrub thab so// // thams cad 'grub par byed pa'i mchog/ sna tshogs bya ba rab sgrub pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang
136a5(rgyud): gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las// 'jigs byed ces bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas rgyal srid sgrub thabs mchog/ 'di las yang dag rab
136a6(rgyud): bshad bya// 'phyang ba'i shing ni bzung bya ste/ mnyam sa de zhin ma med ga/ blangs la gdu bar byed yang // bzlas pa'i phreng bar rab bsgrub bya// zla ba zla ba'i bcu bzhi la// sha lnga yis ni byug par bya// bdud rtsi lnga dang yang dag
136a7(rgyud): ldan// bzlas par 'grub par byed pa'i mchog/ 'di yis 'bum phrag bzlas pa yis// nges par rgyal srid 'grub par 'gyur// a ma sngags kyi nus pa ni// gnyid log sgra ni sgrogs par byed// 
136a8(rgyud): gshin rje gshed kyi sbyor ldan pas// skad cig kyang ni 'jigs mi bya// gang gang 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pa// de dag thams cad thob par 'gyur// ma he dang ni chu srin dang // stag dang de bzhin gzhan rnams
136b1(rgyud): kyis/ dom dang lce spyang dag dang ni// spre'u yang ni bye brag las// sked tshe lan tshwa de bzhin du// sha badzan tshwa ba gsum// 'di yis sku gzugs yang dag sgrub// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can gshin rje
136b2(rgyud): gshed// de la gsol btab rnal 'byor pa// hrIHSh+T+rIHla sogs sngags bzlas te// rgyal po che ge bsad nas ni// bdag de rengs par sbyang bar bya// bye ba bzlas pas 'grub 'gyur te// bden zhing
136b3(rgyud): bden par the tshom med// de nas gzhan yang // rgyal gyis zla ba'i dkar phyogs dang // nyi mar bsgrubs la yang dag sbyar// rdul ldan gos ni yang dag blang // thang sku mchog ni bri bar bya// bri bya bkra shis
136b4(rgyud): mchog snag tsha// chen po yang dag ldan rnams kyi// skum// dog dkar po drag shul che// phyag gnyis dang ni zhal tsa/ ga mchog/ g.yas pa rdo rje 'bar ba ste// g.yon pas 'dzag
136b5(rgyud): pa'i mgo bo 'dzin// zhabs ni g.yon brkyang rnam 'gyur dang // rin chen cod pan rnam par rgyan// rin chen rgyan rnams yongasu rdzogs// 'od zer phreng bas kun tu 'jigs// gsod
136b6(rgyud): pa'i bsam pa'i rgyal po ni// 'og gi cha la nges par sbyar// thun mongs kha dog yang dag ldan// ji lta'i dbyibs ni rnam par gnas// 'dus byas lha ni bsgrub par bya// ci ltar 'byor pa'i tshad la ni/ 
136b7(rgyud): de yi mdun du sbyin bsreg bya// nges par zur gsum dkyil 'khor la'o// sbyin bsreg 'bum gyis de rgyal srid// thob 'gyur 'di ni the tsom med// de nas gzhan yang / zla ba gzas zin dus su ste// gal/ 
136b8(rgyud): te nyi ma la blta bya// dur khrod thal ba yang dag blangs// gzugs brnyan bya ba brtul zhugs can// shrI gI rA dzI sha lnga dang // nim ba d+ha du ra lo mas// mkhas pas cho ga 'di yis ni// gcig tu byas
137a1(rgyud): gzugs brnyan bya// sku mdog sngon po drag shul che// phyag gnyis dang ni zhal gcig pa// ma he la bzhugs rnam 'gyur nal// rdo rje dang ni thod pa 'dzin// bsgrubs te sku gzug
137a2(rgyud): rang bzhin la// mchod pa byas na slar yang ni// rgyun tu hriHSh+T+rIHla sogs sngags// 'bum phrag bzlas te mnyes par bya// sde bcas g.yog 'khor bcas pa yis// rgyal po che ge gzhom bya ste// bzlas
137a3(rgyud): pa 'bum gyi bdag rnal 'byor// byas nas 'bum phrag khyad par las// mchod pa'i las ni yang dag ldan// bzlas pa'i sbyin sreg cho ga 'dis// sems can don mchog blo dang ldan// rgyal srid thob 'gyur/ 
137a4(rgyud): the tsom med// de nas gzhan yang // bkra shis kyi ras la rdo ba'i na mkha'i chu yis zla mtshan gyi gos bkrus te thang sku mngon dpar bri bar bya'o// zhal cig dang phyag gnyis pa// sku mdog
137a5(rgyud): nag po 'jigs rung ba// dbu skra 'bur ba yang dag ldan// mgo/ bo'i phreng ba rab tu 'phyang // gri gug dang ni thod pa phyagam he'i steng du bri bar bya// de ni sgom pa brtsam byas te// dgra
137a6(rgyud): yi mdun du rnam par sgom// gri gug gis ni bcad byas te// tshil dang zhag rnams 'thung ba dang // rgyu ma rnams dang 'jim pa dang // khrag ni mang po 'thung ba byed// 'bum phrag tsam gyis bkur bar 'gyur// 
137a7(rgyud): yang na rma yis snying khar gzir// de nas gzhan yang // mi yi rus pa sor bzhi pa blangs la// hrIHSh+TiHla sogs pa'i sngags nang du spel ba dgra bo'i sgor mnan pa byas na// gal te brgya byin dang
137a8(rgyud): mtshungs pa'ang 'khor dang bcas pa skrod par 'gyuraro// gcig pu skye bos dben par 'dug ste// rje btsun gyi thang sku bkram nas/ phyogs bcu na zhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams
137b1(rgyud): mdun du byas nas// mi'i rus pa bcad pa'i khrag chen po dang bsres pa'i bya rog gi khrag gis sor bcu gnyis pa'i tshad// rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lo la/ sa bon bcu gnyis dang / de nyid du dgra na
137b2(rgyud): mi'i dbu su spel la/ tsheg drag dang bcas pa'i kha sbyar ba tha yig gsum gyis phyi rol tu bskor ba bya rog gi mgrin par btags te/ gal te 'bab chu la bsgyur na de'i tshe 'khrug par 'gyur ro// de kho na ltar sa
137b3(rgyud): bon bcu gnyis bri bar bya ste// phaT phaT hUM hUM na na tA kr-i biSh+TiHhriHoM/ ji ltar 'byor pas phud mchod nas// stobs po che yi bdug pa phul// gal te 'bab chu la bsgyur na de'i tshe 'khrug par 'gyur ro// 
137b4(rgyud): gal te ma gyur na bya rog gi bshog pa la lan bdun mngon par/ bsngags pa byas nas/ dgra bo'i sgo nang du ming dang spel ba da ni 'phral du 'khor dang bcas pa skrod par byed do// de kho na ltar
137b5(rgyud): rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus su// tsha ba gsum dang dug dang ske che rnams rus pa chen po'i 'dri smug gis me'i sa bon gyi dbusu// tsheg drag dang bcas pa'i g+haHyig gnyis
137b6(rgyud): kha sbyar ba'i tha yig gsum gyi phyi rol du bskor bI mI bud shing gi me la gdung bar bya ste/ de'i skad cig la bu dang chung ma dang g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa 'chi bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
137b7(rgyud): cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las// rgyal srid kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas pha rol sde rnams 'joms// 'di las yang dag rab bshad bya// bram ze
137b8(rgyud): ma yi rdul gos la// rgyal dang nyi mas yang dag brtsam// ma he'i zhal gyi thang sku bri// brgya phrag phyag ni rab gsal ba// de ni phyag mtshan rnon po bsnams// thams cad du ni bri bar bya// thang sku dkar/ 
138a1(rgyud): bo bri bya ste// pad+ma dkar pos mchod par bya// sngags kyi bzlas pa 'bum phrag rnams// byas te de bzhin pad+ma slar// thang sku skam pa mngon phyogs par// ba dan steng du 'dzin pa ni/ 
138a2(rgyud): rkang gnyis rkang bzhi la sogs pa// skye bo rnams kyi mthong gyur gang // de nas thams cad gdong gzhan 'gro/ seng ge mthong ba'i glang po bzhi// de nas gzhan yang // tshangs pa'i sa bon mar khu che// ku
138a3(rgyud): da ri ts+tshan gyis ldan pa// rnga mo'i gcin gyis yang dag ldan// ril bu bya'o brtul zhugs can// rang ste gdong par thig le byas// pha rol sde ni rnaM par 'joms// A Sha ka shing rtsar song ste// brgyad pa
138a4(rgyud): 'am yang na bcu bzhi la// thun gsum du de zla ba gcig/ sngon bsnyen 'bum phrag cig byar 'gyur// oM sid+d+hi a nan tad na la hA ri Ni pa ra s+ye n+ya bi nA sha ni hriHswA hA// 'di nyid kyis ni 'grub
138a5(rgyud): par 'gyur// mthong ba las pha rol gyi sde rnam par 'joms shing gang la bltas pa de 'bros par 'gyuraro// de nas ga zhan yang / shing gcig rtsa bar phyin nas ni// mchog gi rol
138a6(rgyud): 'dug byas te// g.yas na ral gri 'dzin pa dang // g.yon brkyang ba yi zhal gyis ni// hrIHSh+T+rIHla sogs pa'i sngags mtshan mo mtha' dag bzlas par bya ste// de'i tshe ral gri yongasu 'phro zhing de'i tshe pha rol
138a7(rgyud): gyi sde rnams srung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las// pha rol gyi sde rnam par 'joms pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// 
138a8(rgyud): de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos// mi snang 'grub par rab gsal mdzad// thog mar mi snang ba sgrub pa'i don du// rnal 'byor pas rgyal dang nyi ma'i nyin mo brtsam zhing sngon du yang dag par btags la 'bum phrag
138b1(rgyud): bzlas par bya ste/ de drod 'byung bar 'gyur// gzas bzung ba'i dus nas pa Ni DA ka ri rtsa bdang / ro dang / kha gA ri dang / e rab ra'i rtsa ba dang / thams cad gcig tu byas te ril bu byas nas khar bcug na/ 
138b2(rgyud): mi mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gzhan yang / kho Do dang / dza s+t+wa~M dang / dza yin ti dang / br-id+d+ha ra ka'i rtsa ba dang thams cad mnyam por gcig tu byas te/ bre ga'i gcin la nyi ma gsum bsgos la ril bu \u0f7f
138b3(rgyud): nas khar bcang bar bya ste/ mi mthong bar 'gyuraro// de nas gzhan yang / gzas bzung ba'i dus na/ ul+lI'i mchu dang / ro dang / d+hud+hA ra ka na ka hA ya nyid/ ba Da b+hi'i gcin gcig la yang dang dag par
138b4(rgyud): bzhag ste/ ril bu byas nas khar bcug na mi snang ba'i mchog dgo/ de nas gzhan yang / byi ba'i mig dang / bya rgod kyi mig dang / sa 'og rkyang bas kyang cha mnyam por gcig tu byas pa'i ril
138b5(rgyud): bu bshang lam du gzhug par bya ste/ skad cig de las de mim thong bar 'gro bar byed do// de nas yang / nyi ma'i res la byi ba'i mig bar du blangs te/ tsi kra ka sngon po'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig/ 
138b6(rgyud): bya rgod kyi khrag gis brtag par ste/ mi snang ba mchog go/ de nas gzhan yang pA shI mA na sa dang / bA la mAn sa dang / ba hUr pa la bsnyams te dar gos kyis dkris nas bram ze'i thod pa la me lce'i dreg
138b7(rgyud): pa 'chags par bya'o// de'i mig sman gyis mig gnyis la byugs na mi mthong bar 'gyuraro// de nas gzhan yang gdol pa'i me tog dang / shA tA ba d+ha dang / 'dab bzangs kyi mig rnams ril bu byas te/ 
138b8(rgyud): khar bcug na de mis mi mthong bar 'gyuraro// de nas gzhan yang / mdab bzangs blangs la nyi ma bdun gyi bar du dngul chu ma shA ka cig byas te bza' bar bya'o// des blun du gyur pa gang yin pa de dang / 
139a1(rgyud): lhan cig bdag nyid kyi khu bas thig le byas na mi mthong bar 'gyuraro// 'dis ni mi snang ba'i rab tu byed pa'o// // mig sman bshad par bya ste/ thog mar re shig mig
139a2(rgyud): sman gyi don du bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags 'bum phrag lnga yongasu bzlas te mig sman sgrub pa btsam par bya'o// dung dang bya rgod dang ku ra ra rnams kyi mig blangs te/ ma nyams nas sa 'og gi sbrang rtsi'i khu bas/ 
139a3(rgyud): dar gos kyi sdong bus dreg pa 'chags par 'gyur ro// gang gis 'dis mig sman byugs pa tsam gyis/ sa yi bu ga mthong bar 'gyur ro// skar ma lag la/ b+hI ha ti dkar po'i rtsa ba dang / dza yan+ti nag
139a4(rgyud): po'i rtsa ba dang / lce spyang gi mig bsnyams te/ sbrang rtsis lha na cig btags nas thig le byas na sa'i bu ga mthong bar 'gyur ro// b+hU mi la ta'i til mar dang / bi shang ka ra ra'i rtsa ba'i
139a5(rgyud): khu ba ra dza dang bcas pas/ dar gos la gzhon nu mas byas pa 'i srad bus dkris nas sdong bu byas te/ mi yi thod pa la/ dreg pa 'chags par byas la/ mig sman byas na nges par
139a6(rgyud): gter mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nas gzhan yang rgyal gyi zla ba dang / skar ma snams la zla mtshan gyi gos blangs te/ brgyad pa'am bcu bzhi pa la rdo rje tsartsi kA'i thang sku mngon par bris la/ mchod pa
139a7(rgyud): chen po byas na mtshan mo 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na nges par rmi lam gyi gter mthong bar 'gyuraro// de nas gzhan yang / shing nim pa'i rtser song ste/ brgyad pa 'am bcu bzhi pa la thang sku'i mdun du
139a8(rgyud): tsartsi ka bsams nas lce spyang gi mgo'i steng du khri phrag bzlas na tsartsi ka drung du 'ongs nas bdag gis ci bya 'dri bar 'gyur zhing sgrub pa pos bdag la mig sman gyi grub pa rab tu rtsol ces pa dang / bdag
139b1(rgyud): la ro'i bcung len gsol ces brjod par bya'o// gi bang dang lce spung gi mig dang dngul chu dang / shing ta la'i khu ba dang / sbrang rtsi mnyam pa rnams mkhas pas ril bu bya'o// 'dis mig sman byas par
139b2(rgyud): mig ni/ sa'i bu ga mthong bar 'gyuraro// lce spyang gi mig dang / bya rgod kyi mig dang / ku ra ra na'i de kho na ltar/ g.yon pas g.yon pa dang / g.yas pas g.yas pa bzung ste/ til mar chen pos
139b3(rgyud): dreg pa 'chags par bya'o// 'dis mig sman byas pa'i mig ni sa'i bu ga mthong bar 'gyuraro// de nas gzhan yang gi wang dang / mi'i mkhris pa dang / ga pur gyi dngul dang / de bzhin du ha rang byin nas brtag
139b4(rgyud): par bya'o// 'dis mig sman byas na sa'i bu ga mthong bar 'gyur// / de nas gzhan yang / grub pa sna tshogs gnas kyi don// nor dang 'bru sogs phun sum tshogs// lcags brgyad 'jom
139b5(rgyud): shing na mkha' la// spyod pa nyid kyang ster bar 'gyur// sngon du bsnyen pa'i don du sngags 'bum phrag gcig bzlas nas dang la chu'i sgrub thabs brtsam par bya'o// thog mar dngul chu blangs
139b6(rgyud): te/ tsi tra ka da ra po'i khu bas bsnur bar bya'o// de'i rjes la zangs kyi khu ba dang / gser gyi phye ma byin nas Sha DA ka'i khu bas bzhi cha tshad kyi nor bu bya'o// glang po che'i sha dang / ldong ros kyis mnyam
139b7(rgyud): por btags te skong bu kha sbyar gyi nang du bgyi 'grob rgyag gong thar 'byed pa byas nas/ ra ti'i tshad kyis zangs 'joms shing gser dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro// ro 'di dag til mar chen pos bskur nas/ lhang
139b8(rgyud): tsher dang / mu zis til mar chen po nyi ma gsum btso bar bya ste/ ji srid slar gong bur gyur gyi bar du'o// sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig cung zad zos pa la skyes bu lo stong phrag tu 'tsho bar 'gyur la/ dngul
140a1(rgyud): bcos nas gser du 'gyur ro// gzhan yang sa hA sa'i khu ba byin nas dngul chu bsnur bar bya ste/ ji srid gong bur gyur gyi bar du'o// sha tA la dang 'dzam b+hi'i ra'i khu ba dang / shA khoH
140a2(rgyud): ka'i 'bras bu'i shun pa so sor mnyam por byin nas kong bu'i nang du bzhag ste/ de nyid kyis rab tu byugs par byas zhing bskams la phyi nas skong bur bsregs par bya ste/ myur du gong bu'i tshad du 'gyuraro// 
140a3(rgyud): ra ti gnyis kyi tshad kyis nyi ma nyi shu rtsa cig ji srid par lo ma dang skyur po spangs shing thams cad du bud med brten pa yang spang bar bya ste/ skyes bu lo stong phrag bcu gnyi su 'tsho zhing / mkha' la spyod pa nyid/ 
140a4(rgyud): thob par 'gyuraro// ba ga bcom nas dngul chur 'gyuraro// de de nas gzhan yang / ran dzA ni la'i khu bas/ su bah+ma mAk+Shi dang / piSh+Ta sA ra ti'i rtsa ba mnye bar bya ste/ lhang tsher dang / na ra
140a5(rgyud): do Ni'i khu bas gong bur bya'o// kong bu'i nang du bzhag nas pa ri'i til mar la sbyar bar bya ste/ zla ba drug gis gong bura'agyur na lcags brgyad rnams nges par gser du 'gyur la/ 
140a6(rgyud): zos pas mkha' la spyod pa nyid thob par 'gyuraro// mthong ba dang reg pa tsam gyis lo lnga brgya rnamasu 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// de nas gzhan yang / dngul chu ku ma ri'i khu bas bsnur bar bya ste/ so ma ta dang // 
140a7(rgyud): pa lA sha'i rtsa ba dang / nA ga ke sha ra'i shun pa dang / gtsag dang / ka thi ni nyid dang / de bzhin du slar ba Da'i 'o ma dang mnyam pos bsro bar bya ste/ thun gnyis kyi gong bur 'gyur// cung zad zos pa tsam
140a8(rgyud): gyis nges par sa gsum du 'gro bar byed cing / ra ti tsam gyis nges par zangs srang gser du 'gyuraro// de nas gzhan yang / dngul chu shrI kha Na Da so dzu'i 'o mas cung zad mnyes te/ mu zi dang
140b1(rgyud): zangs kyi snod du dzam b+ha ra'i khu bas mnye zhing nyi 'od la bskam par bya'o// gong bur gyur pakong bu'i nang du bzhag ste/ thun gnyi su bsro bar bya'o// su ki ti'i kong bur bcug la ra ti'i tshad kyis dbug
140b2(rgyud): par bya ste zangs bcom nas gser du 'gyur ro// lus kyi yang gnyer ma dang skra dkar spong zhing phan par 'gyur ro// de nas gzhan yang / dngul chu ba la'i rtsa bar bsnur bar bya zhing / slar yang gdol pa'i ma
140b3(rgyud): tog gi khu bas bsnur bar bya'o// slar yang skan tsaka dang / ba ha ri'i khu ba la bsnur bar bya'o// de'i la ra ti'i tshad kyi gser gyi phye ma byin nas gong bur bya'o// 'dab ma bdun pa'i kong bu'i nang du kun dza
140b4(rgyud): ra'i rkang pa'i tshad kyis dum bu byin na gong bur 'gyuraro// de b+hA dngas ter ti'i tshad kyis zangs 'joms shing gser du 'gyu// lus la'ang ra ti'i tshad kyis skyon gsum 'phrog par 'gyuraro// 
140b5(rgyud): gcong nad la yang 'tsho ba dang / rnal 'byor pa chen por 'gyur// zos pa tsam gyis rgyang grag su 'gro bar byed do// de nasagazhan yang / dngul chu snod du bzhag ste/ rdo ba'i gzhi la bsnur
140b6(rgyud): zhing / tri tri'i rtsa ba dang / ka ran dza dang / pA thA'i rtsa bas bsnur bar bya// gong du byas nas kong bu'i nang du bzhag ste mtshan mo mtha' dag par bsro bar bya'o// de nas rdzogs par 'dus byas te/ ra ti'i tshad kyi tshig
140b7(rgyud): lazangs 'joms pa dang / zos na ra ti'i tshod kyi skra dkar dang gnyer ma spong bar 'gyuraro// zla ba drug gi rab tu sbyor ba la/ lo stong phrag rnamasu 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// de nas gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba nyid ste
140b8(rgyud): dngul chu srang gcig blangs nas shring ga be ra'i khu bas bsnur bar bya'o// lhang tsher dang gser cung zad dang ldan pa/ shring gi dmar po dang mnyam pos ga DA ya'i khu ba blangs te/ nges par zhag bcu gnyis rnaH
141a1(rgyud): so// de'i rjes la kong bu'i nang du bzhag ste/ bsro bar bya'o// kuny+dza'i rkang pa'i tshad las/ de nas blangs te ra ti'i tshad kyis yang dag par blangs la bzhugs par bya ste/ zangs/ 
141a2(rgyud): ma lus bcom nas nges par gser du 'gyur ro// zos nas mkha' la spyod pa nyid thob cing du 'tsho bar the tsom med do// gnod sbyin dang mi 'am ci'i bdag po rnams kyis brtan cing gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams
141a3(rgyud): su 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas gzhan yang / lcang tsher nag po srang cig dang / b+ha ka dang paR+Sha dang dngul chu dang ldan pa rnams kyis zla ba phyed tu sbyar te/ rtsi bo che dang ro mnyam du byas pa za ba'i tshad kyis chu grang
141a4(rgyud): mo dang yang dag par ldan par bza' bar bya ste/ zla ba sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ bdag nyid rgas pa dang 'chi ba med par 'gyuraro// de nas gzhan yang / lcags tsam srang gang blangs te/ ra ga na
141a5(rgyud): mar byas te/ ka shi'i khu bas mnyam par ldan pa me lce'i 'od/ zer la bskam par bya'o// dngul chu dang mu zi rnams der ba/ zhi cha'i tshad sbyar ba las/ kak+ko la dang / li shi phye ma rnams
141a6(rgyud): phyed dang gnyis snga ma'i tshad las te/ thams cad gcig tu byas la rdo ba'i gzhi la lcags bsnur bar bya'o// gser kong bur bzhag nas bsro bar bya'o// de nas blangs te lcags chen po zla ba'i tshad kyis
141a7(rgyud): bza' bar bya ste/ skra dkar dang gnyer ma rnams 'joms shing rgas pa dang 'chi ba med par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las/ 
141a8(rgyud): mi snang ba la sogs kyi le'u bdun pa'o// / de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// grib ma 'phrog dra'i rab tu dbye ba gsungs pa/ rkang gnyis dang rkang bzhi pa rnams kyi dgra bo tshar gcod pa'i phyir rab tu sbyor
141b1(rgyud): 'di brjod par bya'o// thog mar re shig sems can thams cad rmongs par bya ba'i phyir/ dpa' bo gshin rje gshed bsgom par bya'o// rang khyim rnams sam mtshan mo'i dus// stag lpags gdan la su/ 
141b2(rgyud): byas te// zhal cig dmar po mi bzang pa// zhags pa dang na lcags kyu 'dzin// ro la bzhugs pa drag shul che// spyan gsum shin tu 'jigs rung ba// thams cad rmongs par byed pa'i lnga// mi bzad pa sa/ 
141b3(rgyud): me stag 'phro// 'di ltar bsams nas 'bum phrag bzlas// phyi nas cho ga kun spyod pa// kan pa'i dkar rtsa ba// de bzhin nan Da dmar rtsa ba// sbal ba'i khrag gis bsdur byas te// thig le bcang bya brtul zhugs
141b4(rgyud): can// gang gi grib ma 'phrog byed pa// rkang pade yang rmongs pas 'thob// rkang gnyis rkang pa ni thams cad ni// rmongs par 'a gyur bar the tsom med// nyi ma rengs dang dkar phyogs la// srin
141b5(rgyud): bu lto ba nas skyugs pa// rab tu 'bad pas de blang ste// yis ni thig le bya// dpral bar thig le byin byas pa// gang gi grib ma 'phrog par byed// nges par rmongs pa 'thob par cu
141b6(rgyud): 'o ma rnams kyis rab bkrus dge/ dan tI roH u ha raSh+Ti'i// rtsa ba 'di rnams skam mnyam par// bya rog khrag gis bsnur nas ni// thig le bya'o brtul zhugs can// thig le 'di yi byin rlabs kyis// lba
141b7(rgyud): yang rab tu bskyod par byed// nges par som nyi mi bya ste// bya ba la yang rmongs par 'gyur// de bzhin rab tu sbyor ba gzhan yang ras shring gi ku thA rI/ pa Ni na ga pa Ni de bzhin// 'di rnams kun gyi sha
141b8(rgyud): bcas pa// ril bu bya'o brtul zhugs can// na mkha'i rdo ba'i chu nyid kyis// spyi bor thig le bcang bar bya// nges par reg ste gdongs ltas na// mi ni khrag tu skyug par bye// ka ka ma rtsi sbrang rtsi dkar// 
142a1(rgyud): khu byug dkar po'i mig gis ni// na mkha'i chu dang mnyam par ldan// spyi bo la ni thig le bya// thig le 'di yi byin rlabs kyis// dgra bo rnams ni dbang du 'gyur// gang du phyag ni
142a2(rgyud): 'tshal byed pa// de rnams nges par rmongs par 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba yin te// sbrul nag po yi lce dang ni// de bzhin sre mo'i lce nyid dang // byi ba'i khris pa yang dag bsres// khri phrag lnga
142a3(rgyud): yi ril bu rnams// thig le 'di yi byin rlabs kyis// dgra bo bran du byed par 'gyur// ma rungs 'khor dang bcas pa yis// rgyal po rmongs par byed par 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang rab tu sbyar ba yin te// 
142a4(rgyud): 'chi med rtsa ba'i sI ta ka/ de bzhin bahu DA pa la// 'di rnams mnyam po'i cha yis kyang // ril bu bya'o mkhas pa yis/ thig la 'di yis yang dag bzung // 'jig rten gsum po rmong
142a5(rgyud): par 'gyur// kha yis bdud rtsi blang byas te// g.yon pa'i ming / med kyis kyang ni// 'di ni ril bu byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngag sa te// oM ma hA yak+Sha se na a dI pa ta ye ma hA dur dan+ta da ma kA ya/ 
142a6(rgyud): nA sha ya na sha ya/ bi drA pa ya bi drA pa ya hUM hUM sarba duSh+TAn phaT/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las le'u ste brgyad pa'o// 
142a7(rgyud): 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis ro langs la sogs pa'i sgrub thabs gsungs te// oM hriHdzaHa pa rA dzi taHoM hUMHdzaHa dzaM ta/ oM hUM dzaHpu ra NaHoM hUM dzaHoM pu ra NaHoM shu dzaSh+ma san a d+hi pa ti/ oM ru dzaH
142a8(rgyud): ku le shwa raHoM tuM dzaHbud+d+he shwa raHoM aM dzaHki ka ra ut+ta maHces pa 'di rnams 'byung po'i bdag po chen po rnams so// gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sgrub thabs ni// dpal rdo rje dbyug pa 'dzin pa'i mdun du/ 
142b1(rgyud): 'bum phrag bzlas par bya ste/ sngon du bsnyen par 'gyuraro// de nas zla ba nya la mchod pa chen po byas nas/ zho dang / bu ram dang / 'o ma sbyar ba'i zas dkar po rnams kyis ji ltar gsungs pa mchod pa bya'o// gu
142b2(rgyud): gul gyi dud pa byin nas mtshan mo mtha' dag bzlas par bya'o// nges par tho rangs 'ongs par 'gyur te/ gal te 'ongs par ma gyur na skad cig de la 'chi bar 'gyur ro// 'ongs nas kyang bdag gis ci bya zhes
142b3(rgyud): bka' stsal du gsol/ bsgrub pa pos bdag gi bran du mdzod ces smra bar bya'o// de nas brtsams te ci bya ba'i las rnams bya ste/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal srid kyang ster ba dang / dgra rnams tshar gcod par
142b4(rgyud): byed do// lha mo ri bong can blangs te ster bar byed cing rgyab tu khur/ te/ lha'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba dang / brgya byin nyid ster bar byed do// bskal pa bdun du 'tsho ba byed par 'gyuraro// de nas
142b5(rgyud): mi thub pa'i sgrub thabs 'di yin te/ mtshan mo mchod rten gyi mdun du 'dug ste/ zhag bdun du stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa ra bya'o// zhag brgyad pa la mchod pa chen po byas nas gtor
142b6(rgyud): ma phul te gu gul gyi dud pa dbul zhing bzlas par bya'o// bzlas pa na nges par 'ong bar 'gyuraro// kye sgrub pa po bdag gis ci bya zhes so// sgrub pa po bdag gis ci bya ba khyod mkhyen no// zhes smra bar bya'o// 
142b7(rgyud): de nas brtsams nas ci bya ba'i las rnams byed do// slar yang rgyal srid ster ro// lo stong phrag tu 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du ci bya ba'i las rnams byed do// che ge 'tshe bar gyis shig/ 
142b8(rgyud): ces pa dang / che ge 'chi bar gyis ces pa thams cad byed do// de nas gsang ba'i sgrub thabs yin te/ rdo rje 'dzin pa khang par song ste/ nyi ma bdun du stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o// nyi ma brgyad pa la
143a1(rgyud): mchod pa chen po byas nas zan no dkar po ji ltar gsungs pa dbul bar bya'o// mtshan phyed pa ci srid pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// ji srid mtshan byed pa de nas rang nyid 'ong / 
143a2(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// me tog gi mchod yon dbul bar bya ste/ mnyes par gyur na rgyal srid ster zhing bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed do// de nas kun tu gsang ba'i sgrub thams yin te/ gdung dang
143a3(rgyud): bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du/ khri phrag bzlas par bya ste/ sngon du bsnyen par 'gyur ro// de nas zla ba nya ba la ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas/ mtshan phyed pa ci srid pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de nas
143a4(rgyud): mtshan byed na myur du 'ong zhing / 'ongs shing mdun du gnas te/ kye mnyes gshin ci byed ces smra bar byed do// sgrub pa/ pos bdag gi ci bya ba khyed mkhyen ces brjod par bya'o// de nas
143a5(rgyud): brtsams te ci bya ba'i las rnams byed do// gnod sbyin gyi du mo mchog bkug nas ster bar byed do// 'dod ldan gyi mchog ston mo ster bar byed do// nyi ma so sor bza' ba dang gos zung dang
143a6(rgyud): di nA ra lnga rnams rab tu ster ro// lo lnga brgya rnams 'tsho bar byed do// de nas dur khrod bdag po'i sgrub thabs yin te/ mtshan mo dur khrod du song nas nyi ma mdun du stong phrag brgyad bzlas par byed do// nyi/ 
143a7(rgyud): ma brgyad pa la nya dang / sha dang til dang / dzam bu li ka dang / zan dkar po dang / zho dang / bu ram dang / bdug pa dang / 'bras bu ji ltar gsungs pa'i nye bar mkho ba rnams kyi gtor ma dbul bar bya'o// gu gul
143a8(rgyud): gyi bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// mtshan phyed pa ji srid pa de srid du bzlas pa bya'o// de nas mtshan phyed nas ha ha'i sgra thos par byed de/ de la 'jigs par mi bya'o// 'khor dang bcas pa tshogs kyis yongasu bskor nas
143b1(rgyud): 'ong bar 'gyur// 'ongs pa na mched par dbul zhing mnyes par gyur na 'byung po thams cad bran du 'gyur// nyi ma nyi mar dri nu rab rgyad rnams rab tu ste byed do// dgra thams cad 'joms par 'gyuraro// man/ 
143b2(rgyud): phrag 'tsho bar 'gyuraro// de nas rigs kyi dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs yin te/ lha'i gnasu song ste/ dri dang ldan pa'i me tog dmar po dang / gu gul gyi bdug pa byin nas khri phrag bzlas par bya ste// sngon du bsnyen
143b3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// nag po'i phyogs la mtshan mor nya dang / sha dang / til dang / 'dzam bu li ka dang / bza' ba dmar po'i cho ga gtor ma bzhin dbul bar bya'o// tu ru ka'i bdug pa byin nas ci srid mtshan
143b4(rgyud): phyed kyi bar tu bzlas par bya'o// de nas 'bar ba chen po zab cing 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur te/ de la 'jigs pa mi bya ba'o// mnyes shi ci byed ces smra bar byed do// sgrub
143b5(rgyud): pa pos bdag ci bya ba khyed mkhyen ces pa brjod par bya'o// de nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du ci bya ba'i las rnams byed do// nyi ma nyi mar thun gsum du di nAr lnga ster ro// 'dod pa'i lha rdzas
143b6(rgyud): kyi ston mo ster ro// lo lnga brgya 'tsho bar byed do// de nas 'byung po dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs yin te/ mtshan ma gcig par song ste/ gcig pus zhag gsum du mtshan mor bza' ba kha zas dmar po dang 1
143b7(rgyud): sha dang til dang / 'dzam bu li ka'i gtor ma dbul bar bya'o// nyi ma gsum pa la rang nyid myur du 'ong zhing mdun du gnaso// de 'di ltar bdag gis ci bya zhes smra'o// sgrub pa pos bdag gis ci bya ba
143b8(rgyud): khyed mkhyen ces brjod par bya'o// rtag tu rje su 'brel bar 'gyur te/ nges par lha mo blangs nas ster bar byed do// rang nyid kyis bza' ba dang gos blangs te rnam pa kun tu byed do// lo stong phrag gnyis
144a1(rgyud): rnams 'tsho bar byed do// de nas po nya mchog gi sgrub thabs yin no// rdo rje 'dzin pa khang par song nas nag po'i bcu bzhi la bzlas pa khri bya'o// nyi ma bdun rnamasu sngon du bsnyen
144a2(rgyud): par bya'o// de nas sgrub thabs brtsam par bya ste/ tsan dan gyi maN+Dal byas nas gu gul gyi bdug pa byin la/ zho dang mar dkar po sbyar ba'i zas dang / ku sha'i chun bu la nye bar 'dug pas mar gyi mar me rab tu
144a3(rgyud): sbar te mtshan mor ci srid mtshan phyed gyur pa de srid bzlas par bya ste/ rang nyid po nya mchog tu 'ong bar 'gyuraro// 'ongs pa na tsan dan gyi chu yis mchod yon sbyin par bya'o// mnyes par gyur na bdag gi
144a4(rgyud): ci bya zhes dri'o// sgrub pa pos bdag gis ci bya ba khyed mkhye na ces brjod par bya'o// de nas brtsams te ci bya ba'i las rnams byed do// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad rab tu ster ro// 
144a5(rgyud): yid la 'dod pa phun sum tshogs par byed do// de nas 'dod/ pa'i dbang phyug ma sgrub pa ni gro ga'i mdab ma la gi ba gi gzugs brnyan bris te/ gcig pu stan la 'dug nas
144a6(rgyud): bzlas pa stong phrag bya'o// de nas zla ba'i mthar mchod pa chen po byas nas mar gyi sgron me rab tu sbar te mi smra bar bzlas par bya'o// de nas mtshan phyed nas nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro// 'ongs pa na 'dod
144a7(rgyud): pa byas te chung mar 'gyur ro// lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang bza' ba la sogs pa gdan la bzhag ste 'gro'o// bud med dang 'grogs pa dor bar bya ste/ gzhan du na rnam par 'joms par byed do// de nas ka nas
144a8(rgyud): ka ma ti'i sgrub thabs yin te/ shing ba ba'i rtsa bar song nas nya dang sha'i gtor mchogs dbul bar bya'o// bdag nyid kyang 'thungs te lhag mas mchod yon sbyin par bya'o// stong phrag gcig bzlas pa
