144b3(rgyud): te/ ri mo mkhan la gtad la thang sku bri bar bya'o// gser gyi mdog can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag g.yas na ud pa la can dza ti'i me tog gis mchod par bya'o// gu gul gyi bdug pa
144b4(rgyud): byin pa stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o// bzlas pa'i maHdar ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas mar gyi sgron me rab tu sbar te/ ji srid mtshan phyed de srid par bzlas pa bya ste/ 
144b5(rgyud): rang nyid 'ong bar 'gyuraro// 'ongs nas mi smra bar 'dod pa/ byas te chung mar 'gyuraro// sgrub po'i 'khor rnams skyong zhi / lha rdzas kyi 'dod pa dang ston mo rnams dang / dngul chu'i
144b6(rgyud): bcud len rnams ster bar byed do// di nA ra nyi shu rtsa lnga ster bar byed do// de nas pad+ma ma ni'i sgrub thabs yin te rang gi khyim du spyi bo'i gnas tsan dan gyi maN+Dal byas te/ gu gul gyi bdug pa byin nas stong phrag
144b7(rgyud): gcig tshad bzlas par bya'o// de nas zla ba nya la ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas/ ji srid mtshan phyed pa de srid du bzlas pa byed ste nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro// 'ongs pa na 'dod pa byas te chung mar 'gyuraro// 
144b8(rgyud): lha rdzas kyi 'dod pa rab tu ster zhing / dngul chu'i bcud len dang / grub pa yis kyang ster bar byed do// de nas ral gcig ma'i sgrub thabs// 'di las yang dag rab bshad bya// gnod sbyin mo rnams sgrub dus
145a1(rgyud): su/ ral gcig ma ni rnam sgom byas// zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste// gri gug thod pa 'dzin pa mo// sku mdog sngon mo 'jigs byed che// b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor la bsgom
145a2(rgyud): bya/ shar du dza ma b+ha la bsam bya// nor 'dzin yang ni lho ru ste// chu dbang nub du dgod par bya// byang du tsi bi kuN+Da li// me la sogs pa'i zur du yang // gnod sbyin mo bzhi rnam sgom pa// kuN+Da la ha tI nI ro
145a3(rgyud): hi// mdzes mchogs dgod par bya// de nas sgo skyong bsam bya ste// dbyug pa la sogs mtha' dag las// ji ltar snga ma'i 'khor lo mthong // de ltar kha dog rab sbyar bya// thams cad gtso bo'i mtshan ma

145a5(rgyud): gyis// 'jig rten gsum po puk+ka sIr// sku mdog ser skya zhwa la bzhi pa// phyag bzhi bong bu la zhon pa// bsgom bya puk+ka/ sI yi las// bya rog tho ba mda' dang ni// gzhu rnams bsgom

145a7(rgyud): cig las mi mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las// gnod sbyin mo sgrub pa'i thabs kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//

145b3(rgyud): khar bsam bya ste// hriHSh+T+rIHla sogs sngags bzlas cing // 'od zer rnams kyis dug dgug bya// phyag g.yas de bzhin g.yon pa la// mdab brgyad pad+ma dgod par bya// de dbusu yang hUM yig gis

145b6(rgyud): ni the tsom med// sa bon yi ge rdzogs pa ni// 'dzin pa bcings pa'i mchog yin no// kha dog ser po yang dag byung // sos btab gnas la nges par sgom// oM yig dang po tsheg drag mtha'// cho ga
145b7(rgyud): nges sbyar ha tha dag/ dug gi bya bas bcings pa la// sbyor ba rnams kyis bcings pa la// spyi bor gser 'joms legs par rtogs// de ltar gzhan rnams kyang g.yan pa dang phol
145b8(rgyud): mig dang / dmu chu la sogs pa gos pa legs par tshar gcod pa'i rab tu sbyor ba mang pos kyang ngo // de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos/ srung ba'i 'khor lo rab sbyor mdzad// bgegs dang log 'dren 'dug
146a1(rgyud): pa rnams// dgug pa'i don phyir yang gsungs pa// bdag ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// srung ba'i 'khor lo rab sbyor las// 'bar ba'i sku dang dbyug pa yis// lus gas/ 
146a2(rgyud): las skyes dag par bya// skyob pa sangs rgyas rnams kun gyi// lha mo khyod ni dbang por gyur// slob dpon gshin rje 'joms dkyil 'khor// bdag ni dkyil 'khor bri bar bgyi// gos kyis gdong pa
146a3(rgyud): bcings nas ni// dkyil 'khor khang pa'i nang bzhag nas// kye khyod su zhes brjod bya ste// bdag skal bzang zhes smra bar bya// blo bzang yol ba nang byas nas// bla ma mchog la gsol btab bya//

146a5(rgyud): mchog kyang bdag la stsal du gsol// klu dang rol mo de bzhi/ na mchod// mchod yon zhabs bsil de bzhin nyid// slob mas mchod pa la dbul bya// yang na der ni bstod pa bya//

146a8(rgyud): dbang la nyid// drag po yis ni gsod pa la'o// zlum po rnam pa zhi ba ste// rdzing bu rnam pa rgyas pa'o// dbang la zla ba phyed par brjod// mkha' khams mdog can bsad pa la'o// zhi ba la ni khru gang yin// 
146b1(rgyud): de bzhin khru gnyis rgyas pa la'o// ji ltar rgyas pa de bzhin dbang // sor mo nyi shu bsad pa la'o// khru phyed brtsigs pa zhi ba la// rgyas pa la ni khru gang ngo // lnga gnyis bsad pa las byas te// ji ltar
146b2(rgyud): dgug pa de bzhin dbang // zhi ba'i sbyin sreg tshes gcig la// zla ba nya la rgyas pa ste// bcu bzhi pa la mngon spyod do// brgyad pa la ni dbang gi las// shel dang nya phyis zhi ba la// mu tig 'bras bu

146b4(rgyud): braphrag gcig ni zhi ba la// de bzhin brgyad lhag rgyas pa la// dbang dang dgug pa nyi shu lnga// drug cu rtsa bzhi mngon spyod la'o// / brgya phyed sngags kyis bsgrub pa la'o// ril bu rgyu bar bya/

146b6(rgyud): bcad pa ni mthe chung la'o// kha dog dkar po zhi ba la// kha dog ser po rgyas pa la// dbang la dmar po rtag bsam bya// nges par gsod la nag po 'dod// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang
146b7(rgyud): gsung dang / thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / rnal 'byor bzhi dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i sna tshogs pa'i bza' ba dang / ston
146b8(rgyud): mo dang / myang ba dang / bldag pa dang / btung ba la sogs pa yang dag par ldan pa'i dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu dang / ba dan la
147a1(rgyud): sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par gang ba'i rol mo'i sgra chen po lnga bsgom par bya ste/ mdun du gtor ma'i snod sgyogs sam zangs gzhong gi nang du bza' ba tsam bcas
147a2(rgyud): pa'i chu khyor ba gsum ji ltar rnyed pa'i dam tshig gis rdzas dang ldan pa bzhag la/ de rab tu gsal bar drung du bzhag la sgom pa brtsam par bya'o// nam mkha'i dbyingasu pad+ma mdab ma brgyad pa ze ba dang
147a3(rgyud): bcas pa bsgom par bya'o// ze 'bru la yaM yi ge rlung gi dkyil 'khor kha dog sngon po gzhu'i dbyibs can/ mtha' gnyi su g.yo ba'i ba dan dang rgyal mtshan brgyad kyis rgyan pa'o// de'i steng dur yig da

147a5(rgyud): gnas pa'i AHyig dmar po la skyes pa'i pad+ma'i snod phyi dkar la nang dmar ba'o// der pad+ma mdab ma brgyad pa'i rnam pa/ bsam par bya'o// de la shar la sogs pa'i mdab ma

147a8(rgyud): du blta bar bya'o// de'i steng du oM yig kha dog dkar po des bkab pa'i rang bzhin bsams la/ oM yig las skyes pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de'i steng du dz+ra yig dkar po las byung ba'i
147b1(rgyud): dbyug pa de'i sa bon gyis mtshan pa blta bar bya'o// de nas slar pad+ma'i snod las 'og gi steng bu la/ oM AHhUM lan bdun bzlas cing brjod la bsgoms te/ snga ma bar ma chad par rlung gi dkyil 'khor bskyed
147b2(rgyud): de/ ma'i dkyil 'khor rab tu 'bar bas gdungs shing bkol te sbar bas 'bar ba'i gong bu la sogs pa dam tshig gi rdzas bcu'i rang bzhin mtha' dag zhu bas rdo rje'i dbyug pas bkrug pa blta bar bya'o// 
147b3(rgyud): de nas slar rdo rje'i dbyug pa zhu bar gyur te/ bdud rtsi nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog lta bu dngul chu'i rnam par bsam par bya'o// de las slar oM aHhUM gi yi ge gsum las 'thon pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs rnams
147b4(rgyud): kyis khams gsum ma lus pa na gnas pa'i bdud rtsi shin tu mang ba dar blangs par sgom zhing de nyid rab tu gzhug par bya'o// dade nyid rab tu bcug pa la mkha'i rnam pa shin tu gsal ba'i
147b5(rgyud): tshogs bsil ba'i sbrang rtsi 'dus pa'i gzugasu brtan par bya zhing / phyi nas yi ge gsum gyis byin brlab par bya'o// kha dog tra ro phun sum tshogs// dri med ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od// ye
147b6(rgyud): shes bdud rtsir rab sbyor gyis// 'bad nas gtor ma rdzogs byas te// gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs 'dzin pa'i sngags pa khro bo phyag na zhags pa dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa spros nas/ phyogs
147b7(rgyud): skyong rnams kyi snying la lcags kyus phug cing // mgul pa la zhags pas bcings te bkug par bsam par bya'o// de nas oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT duSh+Ta in+d+ra sa pa rI wA ra A kaR+Sha ya dza
147b8(rgyud): sngags 'dis mig stong pa dkar ser/ glang po che dkar po'i gdan la/ g.yas pa dang / gcig shos na rdo rje dang / sdigs mdzub mdzad pa bkug ste shar du bzhag par bya'o// sngags de nyid kyis nye dag/ 
148a1(rgyud): mkha' lding gi gdan la/ rin po che'i cod pan can g.yas na be con dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa/ g.yon na dung dang ko sta b+ha 'dzin pa/ de nyid kyi g.yon du bcang mi ring bar
148a2(rgyud): bzhag par bya'o// yang de nyid kyis gshin rje ma he la zhon pa dbyug pa 'dzin pa lho ru bzhag par bya'o// yang de'i nyid kyis chu lha kha dog dkar po brang 'gro la zhon pa/ phyag na klu'i zhags pa can nub tu
148a3(rgyud): bzhag par bya'o// yang de nyid kyis lus ngan ser po gter la gnas pa phyag na bI dza pU ra dang / na ku li can byang du bzhag par bya'o// de nyid kyis glang sna dkar po bye ba la gnas pa/ g.yas na bgrang
148a4(rgyud): phreng dang dgra sta 'dzin pa// g.yon na la phug dang / la du'/ dzin pa dbang ldan du'o// de nyid kyis dbang phyug dkar po khyum dachog la zhon pa ral pa 'dzin pa phyag na rtse gsum dang thod pa can/ 
148a5(rgyud): phyag gnyis dkar mo la 'khyud pa dbang ldan du bzhag par bya'o// yang de nyid kyis me lnga dmar po ra la gnas pa phyag na bgrang phreng dang spyi blugs can mer bzhag par bya'o// yang de
148a6(rgyud): nyid kyis srin po ro la zhon pa phyag na gri gug dang thod pa can/ sngon po mi sdug pa khro ba dang bcas pa bden bral du bzhag par bya'o// yang de nyid kyis rlung lha du ba'i mdog can ri dgas ser po la gnas pa
148a7(rgyud): rlung du bzhag par bya'o// yang de nyid kyis nyi ma dmar po phyag gnyis kyis pad+ma 'dzin pa rta bdun la gnas pa steng du bzhag par bya'o// yang de nyid kyis zla ba dkar po phyag gnyis kyis ku mu da 'dzin pa shing rta/ 
148a8(rgyud): la gnas pa steng du bzhag par bya'o// yang de nyid kyis tshangs pa ser po zhal bzhi pa spyi blugs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / dbyug pa dang / bgrang phreng 'dzin pa ral pas rgyan pa dang pal gnas pa steng du/ 
148b1(rgyud): bzhag par bya'o// yang de nyid kyis sa'i lha mo pad+ma la gnas pa g.yon na bum pa 'dzin pa/ phyag g.yas na dam bcas khas len pa 'og tu bzhag par bya'o// yang de nyid kyis thags bzangs ris sngon po
148b2(rgyud): shing rta la gnas pa/ g.yas pa dang cig shos na ral gri dang / bsdigs mdzub 'dzin pa de nyid du bzhag par bya'o// de nas khro bo gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs phyag na phur ba 'dzin pa rnams la
148b3(rgyud): khro bo mgrin pa 'phyang ba nyid thugs ka'i sa bon gyis bkug ste/ de rnams kyi snying kha dang / mgrin pa dang / spyi bo rnamasu rkang pa'i mthar yang sngags 'dis phur ba gdab par bya'o// oM hrIHSh+T+r-i
148b4(rgyud): wi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ sarba In+d+ra A din kI la ya daphaT/ ces pa'i phur pa btab pa'i mthar grub pa'i bcud ba sdus la lha de rnams thams cad kyang gshin rje mthar byed kyi rma
148b5(rgyud): par bskyed par bya ste/ byang chub kyi sems khu bas sam/ yang na de'i tshe sa bon dang mtshan ma'i rim pas bskyed par bya 'o// de las sa bon hriHyig las rdzogs pa dbang po'o//

148b7(rgyud): las rdzogs pa me lha'o// sa bon na yig las rdzogs pa bden bral lo// sa bon na yig las rdzogs pa rlung lha'o// sa bon hUM yig las rdzogs pa zla ba'o// sa bon hUM yig las rdzogs
148b8(rgyud): pa nyi ma'o// sa bon phaT yig las rdzogs pa tshangs pa'o// sa bon phaT yig las rdzogs pa nor 'dzin ma'o// sa bon sA yig las rdzogs pa thags bzangs ris so// sa bon hA yig las
149a1(rgyud): rdzogs pa 'byung po thams cad ces pa'o// de ltar bskyed de rnam par bsams nas/ de rnams kyi mig la sogs pa rnams la/ gnas ci lta bar mig la sogs pa
149a2(rgyud): bskyed cing / lus la sogs pa rnams la sku rdo rje la sogs pa rnams dang / gshin rje mthar byed kyi cod pan nyid dang / dang por mchod yon bsang gtor dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa phul/ byin

149a4(rgyud): dbul bar bya'o// oM rak+ta mu ku TA ya/ rak+ta dza TA ya/ rak+ta/ mu khA ya/ rak+ta sha ri rA ya/ rak+Sha b+hu dzA ya/ rak+ta muN+Da mA lA dab+ha ra NA ya/ rak+ta ra tha sa mA ru D+hA ya/ rak+ta pad+ma A sa na ye/ 
149a5(rgyud): rak+Sha b+ha ra Na b+hU Sha Na ya/ i daM bi laM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ ma ma bi g+h+raM ha ra/ ha ra/ tsa tur mA rAn ni bA ra ya ni bA ra ya/ tA sa ya trA sa ya/ b+h+ra ma ya b+h+ra ma ya/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da de b+hin+da/ na sha ya na sha ya/ 
149a6(rgyud): sho Sha ya sho Sha ya/ ts+tshe da ts+tshe da/ b+he da b+he da/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA// phyi nas yan lag so sos dbul bar bya ste/ oM in+d+ra ya na maHhrIHya mA ya na maHSh+TaHba ru NA ya na maHbi ku be rA ya na maHkr-i a shA nA ya na/ 
149a7(rgyud): ma/ ta ag+na ye na maHAHne ri t+yA ya na maHna b+ha ya be na maHna tsan+d+ra ya na maHhUM A ya na maHhUM/ brah+ma Ne na ma phaT/ ba su d+ha rA yai na maHphaT/ bai ma tsi tri NaM na maHsA/ sarba b+hU te b+h+yo na ma hA/ hA hA hA/ hI hI hI/ 
149a8(rgyud): hUMhUM hUM/ pho pheM pheM/ spyi bo nas me tog dang / bdug pa dang / mar mi dang / lha bshis la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o// de rnams la sgrub pa pos phul ba'i bcud thams cad gsol zhing nye bar longs spyod
149b1(rgyud): par mdzad do// de gnas pa rnams la rdo rje gsor la 'gying ba dang bcas par dril bu 'khrol zhing bstod pa byas te/ gti mug dga' ma la sogs pas mngon par 'dod pas gsol ba gdab cing / bzhang
149b2(rgyud): pa rnam pa brgyad kyi sngags brjod par bya'o// de la sngags 'di yin te/ ha ha he he ho ho hUM hUM/ gshegs par bya ste/ oM aHmuHces pa 'dis kyang ngo // phyi nas sgrub pa po'i mngon par 'dod pa yang mdzad// 
149b3(rgyud): khyod kyis sems can thams cad don// ji lta'i rjes 'thun grub pa stsol// sangs rgyas yul du gshegs mdzad de// skad nas kyang ni 'byon par mdzod// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
149b4(rgyud): gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las dgator ma'i le'u bcu cig pa'o// / de nas nges dpar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ 
149b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' chen po la bstod pa/ gaN+DI mug rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod// shin tu 'jigs rung gshi na rje gshed// ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin// sku yi
149b6(rgyud): rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo// phra ma rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod// shin tu 'jigs rung gshin rje gshed// thugs kyi rdo rje rab gsal ba// rin chen rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal// 'dod chags rdo rje'i rang bzhin
149b7(rgyud): khyod// 'dod chags chos kyi 'byung gnas gtso// dbyangs mchog kun gyi mchog gi mchog/ gsung gi rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal// phrag rdog rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod// las kun byed pa'i gshin rjeg she/

150a1(rgyud): dbang phyug khyod 'tshal// rdo rje spyan dang / rdo rje spyan dang / rdo rje gangs dang / rdo rje ljags dang / rdo rje dang / rdo rje thugs ces pa'o// zhes pa bcom ldan 'das kyi

150b7(rgyud): sogs sngags sa bon dang // swA hA mtha' yis nges par sbyar// bshang ci chu dang bsres pa yis// maN+Dal gru gsum byas nas ni// lha rnams tshim byas rnal 'byor pa// hA hA'i rnam pa slar drin

151a1(rgyud): can ka re mig bcu gnyis la dgong gya/ mi d+hu rgyu bcas 'jig rten gsum// ma lus lhag ma med par 'grub// ya ma rA dzas do me ya/ ya me do ru Na yod ya/ yang /

152a1(rgyud): khyams bltas te// de ni 'o ma rab sbyar bya// 'o ma goms pa'i sems gcig gis// phyag rgya chen po rab bsgrub bya// phag mo'i gzugasu bsam bya zhing // btsun mo kun la/

153a1(rgyud): du min// sngags ni cung zad thos pa ste// gshin rje'i slob dpon mi yi mchog/ ma he mi dang glang po che// ba lang rang bzhin rta nyid dang // bong bu rnga mo'i rus pa gzung // bzlas/

153a6(rgyud): zad gang 'thung ba// gzhan yang bza' ba thams cad kyi// phud ni gshin rje gshed la dbul// de nas bla mar yon dbul bas// 'di las yang dag rab bshad bya// bdag nyid zhi ba nyid phyir dang //

153a8(rgyud): pasna tshogs na bza' nyid// gdugs dang rnga yab mdzes pa nyid// khang pa khri dang dri bzang dang // de bzhin glu dang rol mo nyid// ral gri dang ni rgyan nyid kyang // bla mar rab dbul brtul zhugs can// 8/ 
153b1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las// nye bar mkho ba thams cad sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas sems can thams/ 
153b2(rgyud): cad kyi bdudu 'joms pa'i don du// dmar pa nyid ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa 'joms pa'i don to// spyan gsum ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus gsumo// phyag
153b3(rgyud): gnyis ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'joms pa'i phyir ro// shes rab dang 'khyud pa ni stong pa dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i sbyor ba laso// klu brgyad ni rnam par shes pa brgyad mtshon pa'i phyiraro// 
153b4(rgyud): mgo ba'i phreng ba rgya phyed ni/ yi ge lnga bcu'i sbyor ba las so// g.yon na thod pa ni e shes rje du ra yong su rdzogs pa stong / nyid kyi rang bzhin no// g.yas na dbyug pa ni/ phung po dang / 
153b5(rgyud): nyon mongs pa dang / lha'i bu dang / 'chi bdag gi bdud bzhin ma par 'joms pa snying rje'i rang bzhin no// g.yon brkyang kha ni khams gsum pa rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir// lha mo
153b6(rgyud): phyag g.yon na bdud bzhi'i khrag dang bcud len gyi ro du ma myang ba'i phyir thod pa'o// g.yas pa na dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i rnam par rtog pa gcod pa'i phyir gri gug go// ma rungs pa 'dul ba'i phyir khro
153b7(rgyud): bo'i gzugs dang gsus pa 'byung ba nyid do// mya ngan las mi 'da' ba nyid las dbu skra ser po gyen du 'greng ba nyid do// gru bzhi ni sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam gyi
153b8(rgyud): bden pa bzhi rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir ro// sgo bzhi ni bdud bzhi kun tu skrag par byed pa'i phyir ro// zur bzhi ni tshangs pa'i gnas yong su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro// ka ba brgyad ni rmi lam dang / dri za'i grong
154a1(rgyud): khyer dang / brag cha dang / sgyu ma dang / sprul pa dang / smig sgyu dang / me long gi gzugs brnyan dang / chu'i zla ba lta bu brgyad kyi rang bzhin nyid las na mkha' ltar dngos po dang dngos/ 
154a2(rgyud): po med pa'i nyon mongs pa 'joms pa'i don no// gang gis skyes pa rab tu 'joms pa nyid las dra ba byed pa rnam so// rta babs bzhi ni sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don dpyod pa dang / don 'thun pa nyid dang / 
154a3(rgyud): yang dag par spong ba bzhi rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// de nas rdo rje mkha' gro ma'i// sgrub thabs 'di las rab bshad bya// mkha' dbyings dbusu gnas pa yis// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mchog bsam bya/ 
154a4(rgyud): phyag tu rdo rje rnam bsgoms nas// lhag ma phyag gzhan rnam dgod dbya// shar du sangs rgyas mkha'agro ma// phyag drug gti mug yang dag mtshungs// phyag na 'khor lo 'jigs byed che// 
154a5(rgyud): rnal 'byor dkyil 'khor bsgom bya// lho ru rin chen mkha' 'dra ma// phyag drug phra ma yang dag mtshungs// phyag na rin chen 'jigs byed che// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bsgom bya/ 
154a6(rgyud): nub tu pad+ma mkha 'gro ma// phyag drug pad+ma 'dzin pa'o// byang du las kyi mkha' 'gro ma// dkyil 'khor snying po ral gri ma'o// me la sogs pa'i zur bzhi ru// lha mo rnam sgom brtul zhugs can/ 
154a7(rgyud): sgeg mo phreng ba gar de bzhin// glu ma dag gi khyad par nyid// de nas sgo skyong bsam par bya// las kyi cho ga mthong ba yi// dang po thob dbyug pa dang // pad+ma de bzhin ral gri'o// oM bud+d+ha DA kau ni/ oM badz+ra DA
154a8(rgyud): ki ni/ oM rat+na DA ki ni/ oM pad+ma DA ki na~M/ oM karma DA ki ni/ la ma naM ga zur du'o// oM mud ga ra dzaHoM dat+t+wa hUM/ oM pad+ma baM/ oM khang+ka hoHzhes gsungs bcom ldan rdo rje can// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i sgrub thabs/ 
154b1(rgyud): ring po nas thos grub don du// rdo rje mkha' gro ma sgom bya// de lta rab tu 'grub pa'i sngags kyi tshig tu gyur pa ni/ oM A ka sha tsa ra badz+ra DA ki ni swA hA// de nas rab tu bshad bya gzhan// rdo rjes
154b2(rgyud): 'og sgrub pa'i thabs// sa 'og 'jug pa sgrub don du// gnod mdzes rdo rje bsgom par bya// phyag drug sku mdog sngon po mdangs// phyag tu gtun shing dgod par bya// dkyil 'khor snying po'i dbus
154b3(rgyud): ni// 'di dgod rab tu bsgom par bya// shar du spyan ma dgod bya ste// de bzhin lho ru mA ma kI/ nub tu lha mi gos dkar mo// byang du sgrol ma dgod par bya// me tog bdug pa mar me dri// me la sogs
154b4(rgyud): pa rnam su dgod// tho ba la sogs sgo rnams la// sbrul gyi rgyan dang ska rags te// las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis// 'khor 'di ltar bsgom par bya// rdo rjes 'og rnal 'byor ldan// 
154b5(rgyud): bug pa rmi lam du shes 'gyur// de nas rgyal po bdud dkyil 'khor ra// 'di las yang dag rab bshad bya// mkha' la spyodad+ha/ da sgrub don du// rta mchog rab tu bsgrub par bya// phyag
154b6(rgyud): gnyis pa dang zhal gcig pa// sku mdog ljang ku 'jigs rung ba// nyi ma'i steng du yang dag bzhugs// shin tu 'jigs byed rta yi zhal// g.yas pa ral gri khu tshur te// g.yon pa'i phyag ni tha~Md
154b7(rgyud): pa ste// oM pu pu hi hi/ sngags 'di bzlas bya shes rab can// rta mchog rab tu grub pa'i phyir// shar du rdo rje ma rnams bsam// lho phyogasu yang myur 'gro ma// nub tu rgyal po bdun pa ste/ 
154b8(rgyud): byang du rta mchog dgod par bya// gtso bo'i zhal dang phyag dag gis// thams cad g.yas kyis bsgom bya nyid// sngags 'di yis ni thams cad nyid// spro ba dag tu rab tu grags// gling bu'i wan
155a1(rgyud): rdza rnga dang / rnga zlum yang ni zur du'o// ba lang rna ba glang chen sna// bzhin bzang bzhin ngan de bzhin du// gtan shing dang ni dgra sta dang / lcags kyu zhags pa nyid kyang ste/ 
155a2(rgyud): gar la sogs tshul rnal 'byor las// sgo bzhir rtag tu bsam par bya// g.yon du ya ba si bsam bya// de bzhin g.yas su rang rtag so// rta mchog sngags ni ji lta ba// rdo rjes 'og g.yo bar byed// 
155a3(rgyud): rta mchog bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor las// khams gsum mkha' la yong su bskor// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku dang gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las/ rnam par dag pa
155a4(rgyud): dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u steb bcu drug pa'o// de nas 'di la thig gdab 'i'adam tshig las/ a ka ro mu kha sarba d+harmA dz+dza/ adu nung panan/ 
155a5(rgyud): tAta/ slob ma rnam snang du byas te/ gshin rje mthar byed dpal/ gzugs kyis// ye shes srad bu rtse gzung mchog/ le/ gas par mnyam gzhag gdab par bya// de la 'di ni dkyil
155a6(rgyud): 'khor chen por 'jug pa'i dam tshig go// oM aHhUM ring ba dkrol 'khor nyis 'gyur la// sgo yi nyi shu cha dag ste// ba yi rnam lngas yang dag byug/ srang bu gnyis ni yang dag brtag/ de la 'di ni rnga/ 
155a7(rgyud): rje chen po la gsol ba btab pa'i dam tshig go// e ma sangs rgyas slob dpon che// e ma chos dang tshogs kyi gtso// bdag la dam tshig de nyid gsol// byang chub sems kyang bdag la gsol// de yang
155a8(rgyud): 'di ni sa chen po yongasu gzung ba'i dam tshig go// rdo rje sa'i lha mo spyan drangs te/ skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par dang / sa dang pha rol phyin rnams la// lha mo khyod ni dbang du/ 
155b1(rgyud): gyur/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni brgyad cha sgo// shes bya bdag nyid cha rnams kyis// khyams chen dag ni dor bya ste// yid du 'ong ba legs par spras// sgo mnyam sgo khyud shes bya ste// de phyed lha yi snam bu'o// 
155b2(rgyud): rdo rje lha mo yang dag ldan// glu gar rol mo sogs rnams kyis// sgo yi phyed kyi 'gram dang logs// ces pa dra ba dra phyed kyang // nyi zla me tog phreng snam bu// de yid phyed kyi rdul tshon sa// de bzhin
155b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor phyi rol thig/ de la 'di ni snying po che// bdag nyid dkyil 'khor mkha' la dgod// de nas phyag rgyar bcas pa brten// dam tshig gis ni yi ge gzhug/ de ltar dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrub/ 
155b4(rgyud): shar phyogasu ni dkar po che// lhor ni ser po yang dag ldan// nub kyi cha ni dmar po ste// ljang ku byang du yang dag ldan// 'od 'bar in+d+ra nI la'i tshul// dbus kyi sa gzhi yang dag bri// 
155b5(rgyud): denas phyag rgya dgod par bya// las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis/ dbus su rdo rje yang dag bri// 'khor lo shar du mnyam par bri// de bzhin lce ru rin chen te// nub kyi phyogasu pad+ma'o// 
155b6(rgyud): ral gri de bzhin byang du dgod// de ltar sgyu ma mkha' mtshungs pa// rtag tu phyag rgya blta bar bya// de la 'di ni dgang gzar dang // blugs gzar yu ba'i tshad bya'o// kun nas khru gang tshad dag gis// de
155b7(rgyud): phyed dkyil 'khor bya ba ste// sor mo bzhi yi tshad dang ldan// zabs ni sor mo gnyis pa la// phyi rol tshad ni sor gsum mo// dma' ba the bo'i lto gang ste// rgyar ni sor mo gnyis pa'o// pad mang ba rnam
155b8(rgyud): pa'i blugs gzar gang // tshad ldan rgyud du rab tu bsngags// dkyil 'khor rab tu ma zhugs shing // mtshams med lnga ni byas pa dang // gang zhig srog chags gsod pa dang // nya dang sha la sogs
156a1(rgyud): pa za// chang dang 'dod pa dag la chags// yod pa min pa'i brtul zhugs 'dzin// mi gang mngon par dbang ma bskur// gang zhig rtsed mo du ma byed// grong ba'i skye bor dga' ba/ 
156a2(rgyud): mang / gshin rje gshed rgyud pha rol bgrod// ji ltar dmar po'i gsung bzhin du// som nyi med par 'grub par 'gyur// de nas byams pa la sogs pa rdo rje chen po'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
156a3(rgyud): kyi gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i tshig thos nas cang mi smra bar gyur to// de la 'di ni rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshig go/ de yang 'byung chen sa bon gyis// 'khor lo bzhi la rab bsgrub bya// gnas bzhi'i rab tu sbyor ba
156a4(rgyud): yis// nam mkha' la yang g.yo bar byed// rkang par yaM yig lte dbar ro// snying khang laM yig spyi bor ba// gzhu yi rnam pa na dag po che// gtum po 'jigs par byed pa'i rlung // gru gsum
156a5(rgyud): bsregs pa'i me ltar 'bar// nyi ma'i 'od zer lta bur 'bar/ gru bzhi ser po chen po ste// rdo rje'i sa gzhi 'dzin pas ma nan// ri rab lhun pos mnan pa yis// nor 'dzin mar ni bsgo
156a6(rgyud): par bya// zlum zhing 'khyil pa mdangs dkar po// sprin gnas kyis bzhin char pa'i rgyun// stong phrag yang dag rdzogs pa yi// g.yo ba med cing bsil ba'i gangs// gnas bzhi rab tu sbyor ba yis// 
156a7(rgyud): slob mas rdo rje can bsgom bya// rdo rje snang mtha' rab sbyor las// myur ba ru ni 'bab par byed// de la 'di ni dri ba'i dam tshig ste// mgon po chen po rdo rje chos// snang ba mtha' yas bde ba che// dge dang mi
156a8(rgyud): dge gang dris pa// gsungs shig 'dod chags chos chen po// khru gang nas ni yang dag brtsams// ji srid khru ni stong gi bar// slob ma chen po 'phar bar 'gyur// 'di ni dbab pa'i dam tshig go// de nas sku
156b1(rgyud): gzugs ri mo yi// mtshan nyid 'di las yang dag bshad// snum pa'i 'jim pa blang bya ste// sbyar bar bya'o brtul zhugs can// sran ma'o ma de bzhin sha/ bu ram tin ti DA la sogs// til mar nim pa/ 
156b2(rgyud): lo ma dang // de bzhin na DA'i 'bras bu yis// thog mar ri mo bri de yang // dkar po kha dog gzhan yang ste// dkar rtsi dang ni btsag dag gis// sbyar brgya skyegs mdog tu 'gyur// yung ba dang ni rams
156b3(rgyud): dag gis// de bzhin kha dog ljang kur 'gyur// sngon po dag ni rams kyis te// de bzhin drag po nag po'o// ser skya ba bla ldong ros kyis// de bzhin dmar po mtshal gyis so// bil ba'i snying po lo ma sbyin// 
156b4(rgyud): dman min de bzhin lhag pa'ang min// lhag pa nag po dag tu'/ gyur// dman na skya bo 'gro bas 'gyur// zhi ba khro bo rna rnams gnyis so// sgom pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya// zhi ba
156b5(rgyud): rol par rab tu gsungs// khro bo sbam thung ces par thos// sor mo bzhi yi tshad kyis ni// dpral bshangs dang de bzhin zhal// sor mo bzhi yi tshad dag gis// mgrin pa mgul ba de
156b6(rgyud): bzhin brtag/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i khru gang ste// gyen du sor mo nyi shu skyes// phyag dang zhabs dang gdong ji bzhin// mig gi tshad ni mthe bong ste// rna bar sor mo gnyis rab gsungs// de bzhin sgo yi shuH/ 
156b7(rgyud): la bzhi// mchu dang sor mo gnyis rab gsungs// lte ba'i zabs ni sor bzhi'o// zhal gyi cha ni lus la te// mgrin pa'i rnam pa bor bar 'dod// ral pa dang ni zhal gyi tshad// spor ba sor mo tsang
156b8(rgyud): pan drug/ de nas 'phags pa dzam gu li'i// sgrub thabs 'di las rab bshad bya// gang gis bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni// chu yi steng du 'gro bar byed// zhal gsum phyag drug sor mo ste// chu yi/ 
157a1(rgyud): sa bon las byung ga/ phyag na sbrul dang sku chen mo// rma bya'i bzhon pa dag la dgyes// shar du dgod bya rma bya ma// de bzhin lho ru khro gnyer can// nub tu ri khrod lo
157a2(rgyud): ma can// byang du rdo rje lcags sgrog ma// sgro dang spyi blugs yal ga dang // lcags sgrog rnams kyang bsgom par bya// ser po dmar po de bzhin ldang // sngon po'i kha dog rab dbye las// de ltar
157a3(rgyud): bsgom bya shes rab can// de nas sngags kyang bzlas par bya// oM phu dza phu dza/ sgo ru tho ba sogs dgod cing // zur du me tog ma sogs dgod// 'phags ma dza gu li rnal 'byor// ldan pas rtag/ 
157a4(rgyud): tu chu stengs 'gro/ de nas ku ru kul+la yi// sgrub thabs 'di las rab bshad bya// gang gis bsams pa tsam gyis ni// klu yi btsun mo 'gugs par byed// sku mdog dmar
157a5(rgyud): mo zhal bzhi ma// phyag brgyad dang ni yang dag ldan// hrIHyig/ sa bon las byung ma// klu rnams 'gugs par byed pa mo// mtha' yas la sogs rigs brgyad klu// phyag brgyad
157a6(rgyud): la ni dgod par bya// rgyan rnams thabs cad brgyan pa'i lus// rang bzhin bsgom bya brtul zhugs can// sngags ni ku ru kul+le hrIHpu swA hA// de nas 'di la gsang ba bshad// mdor bsdus pa
157a7(rgyud): ste rgyas par min// gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis// lha yi bu mo 'gugs par byed// phyag gnyis pa dang zhal gcig ste// phyag na mda' dang gzhu bsnams pa// sku mdog ser mo sku
157a8(rgyud): chen ma// lus med rnam par bsgom par bya// shar du dga' ma bsam bya ste// lho ru 'dod pa mdzes pa mo// nub tu 'dod pa'i lha mo ste// byang du 'dod pa la spro ma'o// 'dod pa'i lha mo thams cad/ 
157b1(rgyud): ni/ phyag du mda' gzhu bsgom par bya// ser po dmar po de bzhin ldang // dkar dmar ngag ni bsgom par bya// zur nyid du ni rtag tu yang // ma 'gags uSh+Ta ba san te// chu srin rgyal mtshan yang
157b2(rgyud): sgom mo// chal rab tu bshad par bya// kan dar pa ka de bzhin du// dran pa dang ni 'tshams kyi bdag/ lha rnams dag ni thams cad kyi// spyi bor gshin rje gshed po sgom// bud med bya rog
157b3(rgyud): gdong mthar gnas// rdo rje lus med rnam bsgom bya// shing yig sngags ni yang dag 'byung // kun nas rnam par spro ba ste// 'khrul cing 'khrugs par bsams byas nas// 'dod yig bde ba
157b4(rgyud): la spo ba// gos dmar gyis ni rab bkris pa// rkang pa dag ltung ba nyid// de la nges par sngags bzlas bya// oM yig dbyangs kyis phye ba la// sahA yi ge de nas sbyin// shing
157b5(rgyud): yig sngags ni brjod par bya// che ge bdag gi dbang gyur ci/ gaM/ zhag bdun du ni bsgom par bya// ci ltar dmar ma 'i gsung bzhin du// 'dod pa thob 'gyur rnal 'byor pa// 
157b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sku dang gsung dang thugs go shin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las// lus med la sogs pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// de nas he ru ka chen
157b7(rgyud): gyis sgrub thabs 'di las rab bshad bya// 'khor bcings la rnal 'byor pa// gang gis shes na myur grol 'gyur// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog sngo// gtum chen phyag tu rdo rje bsnams
157b8(rgyud): gzhan la thod pa dgod par bya// spyan gsum dbu skra gyen du 'greng // phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyan// g.yon gyi cha la kha thA ga/ rkang gdub chen pos rgyan pa'o// hUM legs bon las byung ba// 6
158a1(rgyud): tu bzhad cing yi dgas gnas// sangs rgyas lnga yi rab sbyor las// spyi bor thod pa lnga rnams so// mi bskyod cod pan du bsams te// he ru kar brjod rnam bsgom bya// 
158a2(rgyud): shar du chos kyi 'khor lo dgod// sangs rgyas byang chub lho ru'o// nub tu 'dod pa lnga rnyed de// he ru ka mtshungs byang du'o// sna tshogs gzugs can rnam par dgod// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan
158a3(rgyud): pa rnams// yi dgas la gnas mdzes pa'i gzugs// gti mug thams cad nges 'phrog pa'o// de bzhin chos kyi 'khor lo dgod// yid bzhin nor bu dpag bsam shing // bum bzang de sgom lha/ 
158a4(rgyud): mo yi phyag g.yas cha la rdo rje ste// mi yi thod pa g.yas min la// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo nges par sgom// spyan ma mA ma kI sgrol ma// gos dkar shin tu yid 'ong ba// me la sogs
158a5(rgyud): pa'i zur bzhi la// phyi rol dkyil 'khor gshin rje gshed/ shes rab mthar byed rta mgrin dang // 'khyil bar bcas par bsgom par bya// 'khor lo can bsgom rnal 'byor pa/ 
158a6(rgyud): glu bzhi'i rab tu sbyor ba yis// 'khor lo can bskul rig par bya// tsar tsi ka sogs klu snyan gyi// rol mo drug rnams kyis glu blang // rje btsun snying rje'i khro bo bzhengs par mdzod// jo bo bdud bzhi/ 
158a7(rgyud): po 'di las rgyal ba// dgos pa'i thugs kyis rje btsun bzhengs pa mdzod// 'jig rten 'gron gnyer stong nyid bzhugs sam ci// rje btsun 'jig rten bsod nams dbang gis bzhengs// 'jig rten
158a8(rgyud): byang chub rang bzhin 'gron gnyer nas// khyod nyid stong nyid sems shing bzhugs sam ci// ci ltar skar mda' 'phro ba ltar// byang chub sems la de nas bzhugs// snying rje chags pa'i sems kyis/ 
158b1(rgyud): ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa rang nyid zhu// dang por rnal 'byor bsgom par bya// gnyis pa rje su rnal 'byor te// shin tu rnal 'byor gsum pa yin// bzhi pa rnal 'byor chen po'o// rdo rje sems dpa' kun
158b2(rgyud): rdzogs pa// rnal 'byor ces par mngon par brjod// de yi rgyu 'thun lha yi sku// rjes su rnal 'byor ces par bsgrags// 'khor lo thams cad rdzogs pa yis// shin tu rnal 'byor rnam bsgoms
158b3(rgyud): nas// lha yi spyan sogs byin rlabs dang // sku dang gsung dang thugs nyid dang // ye shes 'khor lo rab gzhug dang // bdud rtsi myang ba nyid dang ni// mchod chen bstod pa rnams kyang ste// de ni rnam
158b4(rgyud): 'byor chen po nyid// slob dpon nges par mi smad cing // bde dgashegs bka' las 'da' mi bya// de bzhin khros pas spun rnams kyi// skyon nyid rab tu bsgrag mi bya// sems can kun
158b5(rgyud): la byams pa'i sems// nam yang dor bar mi bya'o// byang sems spang bar mi bya zhing // rang gzhan chos la smad mi bya// yongasu ma smin sems can la// gsang ba rab tu bsgrag ma
158b6(rgyud): bdag nyid phung po rnams mi spad// bcom ldan chos rnams sun mi dbyung // gdug pa'i byams pa rtag spangs shing // chos la tshang nyid mi bya'o// dad pa'i sems can sku mi bya// dam tshig rnams ni rtag tu
158b7(rgyud): brten/ shes rab rang bzhin bud med rnams// sun 'byin las dang skyon nyid do// slongs mos mi rgyu rnal 'byor pa// rnal 'byor rnam par spang mi bya// rtag par rgyun du sngags bzlas shing // dam tshig la
158b8(rgyud): sogs rtag brtan bya// bla mar de bzhin dam tshig don// gal te bag med las gyur na// de tshe dkyil 'khor nges bris te// bde gshegs rnams la nyes pa bshags// bla ma la dad dam tshig bsrung
159a1(rgyud): rab tu ston min brtse ba can// nyes pa mtha' dag rnam spangs sems// bzlas pa mchog gzhol bsam gtan can// skyes bu de rtag bla mar bya// brtan zhing rnam dul snying rje yi// 
159a2(rgyud): sems cig dad dang dam tshig dang // bzod pa 'dzin pa rab sngags te// gshin rje gshed gus bla mar gus// slob ma la bshad yongs smin bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
159a3(rgyud): cad mchog tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin can// rdo rje sems dpa'i gsung nye bar gsan nas cang mi smra bar 'khod do// 'di lta bu'i ched du brjod pa gsungs pa// 'khrul 'khor mthar thug gshin rje gshed/ 
159a4(rgyud): brtul zhugs mthar thug thod pa che// rgyud rnams mthar thug 'dus pa ste// ma byung byung bar mi 'gyur ro// e ma zhi ba chen po ches// e ma drag po 'jig su rung // e ma mya ngan
159a5(rgyud): 'das pa mchog/ e ma 'khor ba dag gi rgyud// e ma 'di ni shin tu mtshar// rab skyon de ni yon tan 'gyur// byang / chub med cing mngon rtogs med// dngos po med cing sgom pa'ang
159a6(rgyud): med pa khams med rnam par shes pa'ang med// na mkha' mnyam pa nyid du gnas// nam mkha' lta bur bdag med pas// chos 'di bde ba chen po'o// sa med chu med me med cing // rlung med na mkha'
159a7(rgyud): yod ma yin// rdo rje sems dpa'i rab sbyor las// skye ba 'di ni rab tu gnas// dngos po thams cad dngos med brjod// des ni rang bzhin med par brjod// rnal 'byor nyid ldan rnal 'byor pa// chas
159a8(rgyud): ma yin rtag pa min// phyag med zhal dang kha dog med// mchog tu dga' ba'i mtshan nyid do// nges par bde min dngos po kun// thog ma bar dang mtha' ma spangs// de nas bcom ldan 'das tsar tsi ka chen mo la/ 
159b1(rgyud): sogs pas ched du brjod pa 'di gsungs so// e ma mchog dga'adri med dag pa ste// bsod nams sdig dang yang dag ma 'brel ba// mgon po snying rje'i thugs kyi gnas pa 'di// kun tu snying rje'i gter chen
159b2(rgyud): gcig pu ste// mchog tu dga' ba 'di yi rang bzhin ni// bde chen rang bzhin chos kyi ngo bo ste// de la skye dang 'gag pa yod ma yin// gzugs med bsod nams med cing sdig pa med// de bzhin gshegs
159b3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las// byang chub kyi sems nges par bshad pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas gtam rgyud bshad
159b4(rgyud): par bya ste// bcom ldan 'das thams cad sangs rgyas pa na/ dpa' bo 'jigs rung ba du ma'i bdud kyi dpung gi tshogasanadams lpags te/ bcom ldan 'das thub pa chen po'i byang chub rnam
159b5(rgyud): par gnom par 'dod pa de'i dus na bdud chen po las mchog tu rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las
159b6(rgyud): khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed 'di nges par phyung bar gyur to// nges par phyung nas phyag na rdo rje la bcom ldan 'das thub pa chen pos bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje khyod khro bo gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs 'di
159b7(rgyud): yang dag par zung la/ bdud rnams dang / klu rnams dang // lha ma yin rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / srin po rnams la skrag pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / bsad par gyis shig ces gsungs so// 
159b8(rgyud): de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das la dngos su thos te/ skad cig gis blangs nas nges par bzung ste/ yang dag par bsdus la bsngags shing sems la yang legs par bskyed do// 'di gsungs pas/ 
160a1(rgyud): gsang bdag chen po pha rol grong // 'jug phyir 'di ni rab gsal bya// 'gro dang 'ong bar 'dod pa de// mnyam par gzhag ste sngags bzlas bya// bye ba bzlas pas 'grub
160a2(rgyud): 'gyur te// bye ba lnga rnams kyi brjod cing // dang po'i rnal 'byor yang dag brtsam// bdag nyid nam mkha' dang mtshungs par// thog mar sgom pa'i dus su yang // sems ni cig par nges gzhug bya// ji ltar// 
160a3(rgyud): rmi lam rang bzhin sems// 'gro zhing slar 'ong bar byed do// de bzhin skye bo nyid bya ste// pha rol du ni 'gro zhing 'ong // ji ltar sems ni ring por 'gro/ slar yang skad cig las bzlog byed// bar med
160a4(rgyud): goms pa'i sbyor ba la// de bzhin nyid du rnam par gnas// ji da lta'i rang bzhin gnas bya ste// gzhu la mda' bzhin pa rjod par bya// de ltar yid kyis gzhu 'di nyid// bar chad med
160a5(rgyud): par 'gro ba nyid// zla ba 'am nyi ma'i sbyor ba yang // sems ni rlung la nges gzhug bya// lus dang rnam par bral ba yid// de nyid du ni 'ong zhing 'gro/ cung zad drod ni yang dag thob// gnang
160a6(rgyud): ba thob pa'i sgrub pa po// ji ltar lus kyi nang 'gro zhing // grong las pha rol 'gro bar 'gyur// sgra gcan dang phrad sbyor ba las// zla ba nyi ma za bas 'gro/ rlung gi bgrod pa'i rnal 'byor pa// 'pho ba go/ 
160a7(rgyud): 'phang kun bsgrubs te// 'chi ltas mtshan nyid shes byas la// 'pho ba'i cho ga mtshon par bye// rgyu bcas mi rgyu ji ltar 'dod// sna tshogs rang 'od kyis skyo 'gyur// thur sel bshang lam rtags kyi
160a8(rgyud): mthar 'der nas lte bar yang dag bsam// snying kha mgrin par son pa'i srog/ sna bug la ni rnam par rgyu// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i
160b1(rgyud): rgyud las/ pha rol gyi grong du rab tu 'jug pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// / dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// yon tan mtha' yas pa
160b2(rgyud): mnga' ba'i bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po che'i bka' lung gis/ dpon chen kun dga' bzang pos yon bdag byas pa'i dus na/ kha che'i paN+Di ta ru hu la shri b+ha dra dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong blo brtan gyis/ dpal
160b3(rgyud): sa skya'i gtsug lag khang chen por bsgyur ba'o// nga skad du/ shrI ma rak+ta ya mA ri tan+t+rar rdza na ma/ bod skad du/ dpal ldan gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba// gshin
160b4(rgyud): rje mthar byed dmar po la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos rab dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tha thams cad gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa bdag med ma'i b+ha ga la
160b5(rgyud): bzhug so// de la mgrin par dam 'khyud de// rang nyid sems can ched zhus pa// kye rdo rjer gsungs pa dang // thar bde ba zhin sdom par yang // 'dus pa la sogs rgyud du yang // slar
160b6(rgyud): yang ches mang du gsungs kyang // sems can bsam pa yongs rdzogs byed// da ni bdag gis rab bshad bya// kha cig rgyal srid 'dod pa dang // tshe ring nad med phu sa tshogs// zhi ba la sogs las rgyas
160b7(rgyud): pa sna tshogs rgyud du gsungs pa yang // gang yang mngon par spyod pa dang // dgra yi sde nyams byed pa dang // skrod dang 'gugs dang gsod pa dang // sna tshogs rgyud du ma brjod pa'i// 'khrul 'khor
160b8(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum rnyed dka'// khyod la phan pa'i thabs gzung phyir// bshad bya lha mo gus bcas nyon// 'khrul 'khor gang gi mthu stobs kyis// rtag tu rgyal srid thob bya ni// ji srid nyi ma zla ba
161a1(rgyud): bzhin// 'tsho bar 'dod do gal te min// da ni ming gi spyod yul du// khu ba rengs dang sde 'gugs dang // mkha' spyod nyid dang mchog tu myur// de yi sman ni bshad par bya// 
161a2(rgyud): dang por byams pa bsgom par bya// gnyis par snying rje de bzhi no// gsum par dga' ba bsgom par bya// bzhi par btang snyoms rnam bsgom bya// 'jig rten chos rnams brgyad po ni// yongs btang
161a3(rgyud): stong par bsam par bya// slar yang stong nyid byang chub ste// gnyis pa la ni sa bon bsdu// bzhi par yi ge dgod pa'o// ra yig las byung nyi ma la// hUM byung sna tshogs rdo rje'o// de nyid kyis ni rdo rje yi/ 
161a4(rgyud): ra ba zhes dang de bzhin du// sa gzhi rdo rje bcings pa'o// dang dpor stong par bsgom par bya// de nas yi ge aM dmar po yo/ dngasu gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro// de'i steng du yig hUM
161a5(rgyud): dmar po'o// de'i steng du brlan dang bcas pa'i mgo bos rgyan pa'i dbyug pa'i dbus su hUM yig dmar po'o// der yanganyi ma la hUM yig go/ de las nges par byung ba'i 'od zer rnams
161a6(rgyud): kyis na mkha'i phyogasu dpa' bo'i gzugs de la 'jig rten gsum pa thams cad bsdus nas slar yang de nyid du bcug ste/ dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i gzugasu bdag nyid bsam par bya'o// 
161a7(rgyud): sku mdog dmar po g.yon brkyang zhing rnam par 'gyur ba'i zhal mche ba gtsigs pa/ ljags sgril ba 'jigs par byed pa/ klu brgyad kyis rnam par rgyan pa/ dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'bar ba/ 
161a8(rgyud): sked pa'i phyogasu stag gi lpags pa 'dzags pas rnam par rgyan pa/ mi'u thung gsus pa 'phyang zhing 'jigs pa/ spyan gsum pa shin tu 'jigs par byed pa dmar po 'bar ba'i rgyun mi zad pa 'od
161b1(rgyud): ber sna tshogs kun tu 'khrugs pa/ g.yon par sred med kyi bu la sogs pa'i khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang / g.yas par bdud bzhi rnam par 'joms par byed pa'i dbyug pa dkar po dang klu'i rgyun la
161b2(rgyud): sogs pas spras pa/ rdo rje ro langs mas phrag par 'khyud pa 'dod chags chen po gcig tu nges par rgyas pa dang mtshungs pa gang yin pa'i rje btsun gyi gzug so// rje btsun ma yang de dang 'dra ste khyad
161b3(rgyud): par du mgo bo skam pos rgyan pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni 'dzag pa dang bcas pa'i mgo bo'i rgyan dang ska rags kyang grol bar gyur pa'o// ma he dmar po la g.yon brkyang gi zhabs kyis gnas par
161b4(rgyud): bzhugs pa'o// phyi nas bcom ldan 'das las skyes pa'i rtse gsum pa'i dbyug pa dkar ba'i dbus su slar yangs dpon kha dog dmar po bsam par bya'o// phyi nas bcom ldan
161b5(rgyud): 'das kyi rdo rje yang hUM yig las skyes pa'o// slar yang bcom ldan 'das ma'i gsang ba'i pad+mar yang pad+ma 'dab ma brgyadapa dngos su AHyig gis rdzogs par mtshan pa'o// de'i

161b7(rgyud): son pa'o// spyi bor son pa'i re kha dkar po slar yang bsam par bya zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu la gzhug par bya'o// slar yang rdo rje'i lam der son par blo bzang pos bsam par bya'o// phan tshun gnyis
161b8(rgyud): gnyis par zhugs pas ro mnyam pa'i sa bon gyi gzugs can no// sa bon de lha mo bzhis rang gi gzugasu blang ba ni/ shar la sogs pa'i phyogs bzhi rnams na gnas pa de rnams rang gi bdag po la
162a1(rgyud): blta zhing spongs par byed pas lha mo thams cad blang ba'i ched du glu'i mchod pa byed par blta'o// thugs rje'i khro bo rje btsun nyid bzhengs shig/ sa gsum mtha' dag
162a2(rgyud): rmongs pa sol mdzod cig/ rdo rje tsartsi ka yis so// jo bo bdud bzhi po ni las rgyal ba// sems ni g.yengaso rje btsun nyid bzhengs shig/ phag mo yis so// 'jig rten 'gron gnyer stong nyid bzhug
162a3(rgyud): sam ci/ rje btsun 'jig rten bsod nams nyid kyis bzhengs/ dbyangs can ma yis so// byang chub rang bzhin 'jig rten 'gro na gnyer nas/ khyod nyid stong nyid sems shing ci la bzhugs/ gau rI'i / 
162a4(rgyud): rab tu sad par byas nas slar yang de la rab tu zhugs so// de'i'o// gtu de la khu ba'i tshogs gyur pa las bdag nyid lha'i ba/ ngag nyid can ma ha dmar po'i steng na de yang gar gyi nyams dgu
162a5(rgyud): dang ldan pa ban d+hu ka'i me tog lta bu drag po zhal gcig pa/ phyag gi nyis pa mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa/ dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum pa/ smar dmar ser 'jigs par byed pa mi'u thung
162a6(rgyud): gsus pa 'phyang zhing 'jigs pa/ dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa/ ljags sgril zhing khrag 'dzag pa/ smin ma gnyer zhing drag tu bzhad pa/ mgo bos mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dkar po g.yas pI
162a7(rgyud): phyag gis 'dzin pa/ phyag g.yon pas myos byed dang khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa 'dzin pa/ nyi ma bye ba'i gzi brjid dang mnyam pa/ g.yon brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis gnas pa/ gshin rje 'jigs
162a8(rgyud): shing bsdigs par mdzad pa/ ma he'i rgyab na gnas pa brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa can/ klu brgyad kyis rnam par rgyan pa/ mgo bo'i phreng ba dbu la bcings pa mgo ba'i phreng ba rab tu 'byung ba/ 
162b1(rgyud): stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can/ rdo rje phag mos 'khyud pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs dang kha dog 'dra ba la gri gu dang thod pa can phyag rgya lngas rnam par rgyan pa'i lus can mar brtson pa'i
162b2(rgyud): sems kyis bsgom par bya zhing de nas nga rgyal byas na bdag nyid grub par 'gyur bar the tsom med do// de nas badz+ra swa b+hA wa at+ma ko haM gis gsang sngags klog par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
162b3(rgyud): mas rjes su chags pa chen pos yan lag dang nying lag thams cad rnam par bltas nas pad+mar rdo rje gsor te gnyis ka'i stag lpags kyi na bza' 'phyar bar bsgom par bya'o// de la 'di dag rje su chags
162b4(rgyud): par byed do// zhes byas nas rdo rje pad+ma dag sems la byin nas hUM dmar po yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rtse mor oM yig ser pos byin gyi sa brlabs pa rab tu bsgom par bya'o// AHyig dmar pos
162b5(rgyud): pad+ma de'i ze 'bru la AHyiges byin gyis brlabs pa'o// de na/ sa oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na badz+ra sa b+hA ba At+ma koH/ zhes klogs nas/ rdo rje pad+ma mnyam par sbyor ba las bzhengs

162b7(rgyud): 'dres par bsgom par bya'o// dkar po dang dmar po de dag yongasu gyur pa gti mug gshin rje gshed la sogs pa rnams bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du pad+ma'i dbus bsams nA bcom ldan 'das ma las skye
162b8(rgyud): bar bsgom par bya'o// de'i 'og tu de rnams mdun tu bltas nas rang rang gi gnas so sor gnas par bsam par bya'o// de nas shar gyi mdab ma'i nyi ma la gti mug gshin rje gshed tsartsi ka
163a1(rgyud): nag mos 'khyung ba'o// lho'i mdab ma'i nyi ma la phra ma gshin rje gshed ser po pag mosar mos 'khyud pa ste de yang phag pa'i gdong ba can no// nub kyi mdang maH
163a2(rgyud): ma la 'dod chags gshin rje gshed dmar po dbyangs can ma dkar mo dang sbyor ba'o// byang gi mdab ma'i nyi ma la phrag dog gshin rje gshed sngo bsangs go rim dang snyoms par 'jug pa'o// yang
163a3(rgyud): na gshin rje gshed dmar po dang / ro langs ma dang mtshungs par bsgom par bya'o// me ru mu men gyi bum pa bzhi mnyam sbyar bas gang ba'i// bden bral du gser gyi bum pa gla rtsis gang ba'o// 
163a4(rgyud): de bzhin du rlung du byi ru'i bum pa sih+la sa gang ba'o// dbang ldan du dngul gyi bum pa ga pur gyis gang ba ji lta ba bzhin no// // thod pa gang ba bltas nas nyi ma dang zla ba kun rdzogs pa dag
163a5(rgyud): la'o// 'di nyid bde ba chen po dang zung du 'jug pa mchog las pa/ zhan pa ma yin pa'o// de nas rang gi snying khar pad+ma dang / nyi ma la gnas pa'i hUM yig las skyes pa de'i 'od zer rnam
163a6(rgyud): kyis dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo mchod pa kun gyis mchod nas/ dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes pas bden par dgug pa dang / gzhug pa la sogs pa dang mchod par bya'o// sems can rnams thams cad
163a7(rgyud): bla ma'i man ngag ji lta ba las so zhes rnal 'byor gnyis pa'o// de nas phyogs bcur bzhugs rnal 'byor// rnal 'byor ma tshogs de rnams la// blo dang ldan pas sngar bzhin dgug/ mchod
163a8(rgyud): cing dbang bskur la sogs pa// zhes te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dbang bskur bzhin pa la spyan ma la sogs pa rnams kyis kun dga' ba'i thugs kyis sna tshogs par gyur pa'i glu la
163b1(rgyud): sogs pa dang gar gyis bdud rtsi lnga yis gang ba'i bum pa rnams kyis// dbang bskur rin chen chen po la// khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi// gnas
163b2(rgyud): la byung ba sbyin par bya// zhes klog cing bstod pas// dkyil 'khor pa thams cad kyi dbu la khu ba sder du 'byung ba las/ rdo rje sems dpa' rgyas btab par bsam mo// cho ga'o// gti mug
163b3(rgyud): dang / phra ma dang / 'dod chags dang / phrag dog rnams kyis gsol ba 'debs par bye ba ni/ kye kye gshin rje gshed dmar po// bla ma srin po'i gzugs rang bzhin// kho bos khyod mthong
163b4(rgyud): rnam par 'jigs// zlu ma khro bo'i rang bzhin spongs// khyod kyi sa gar mdzadas steng dang // sa bla dang ni sa 'og g.yo/ chags pas rgyan pa'i khro bo yi// gar mdzad khyod ni ro

163b8(rgyud): dbusu bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga dang / zho dang 'o ma dang / sha dang nya la sogs pa dbyug pas dkrugs pas ro mnyam par byas la tshos nas rgya skyegs kyi khu ba lta bur blta'o// oM AHhUM/ zhes pa 'dis
164a1(rgyud): bsil bar gyur par byas nas su mig yongs su gyur pa'i lce sbu gu can bsams nas btung bar bya'o// rang rang gi kha yis ni lha mol bdu sbyin par bya'o// dkyil lacha/ 
164a2(rgyud): ba rnams kyis kyang bsams nas kun tu spyad par bya'o// de nas bdud rtsi myangs pas yang dag par dges par gyur nas phye nas gsang sngags bzlas par bya'o// snying khar gnas pa'i sa bon dang
164a3(rgyud): mtshan ma bstan par byas nas gsang sngags bzlas par bya'o// oM hrIHSh+TiHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA// zhes pas ji srid 'dod par bsams nas bzlas par bya'o// ldang bar 'dod na
164a4(rgyud): rang gi lus kyi 'od zer gyi sems can gyi don byas nas thams cad bdage la rab tu bcugs te yid kyis gshin rje gshe dad lhan cig skyes pa'i rnal 'byor gyis ji ltar bde bar gnas par
164a5(rgyud): bya zhes pa'o// lhan cig skyes pa'i gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor gyi gnas skabs ni bdag nyid kyi gzugs lta bu rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i gshin rje gshed du nga rgyal byed par
164a6(rgyud): brjod par bya ste/ rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i zhal cig pa phyag gnyis pa gshin rje gshed kho nar nga'o zhes// rnal 'byor chen po'o// rnal 'byor bzhi brjod pa 'dis thun gsum nyid kyis sam/ 
164a7(rgyud): thun bzhis kyang rung ste/ de ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i dus su rtag tu yongasu rdzogs pa'i bar ji srid du'o zhes so// de nas 'bum phrag gi mthar mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya ste/ sngo/ 
164a8(rgyud): du bsnyen par byas par 'gyur ro// de nas las thams cad pa'i thabs kyis tshogs mar dang sbrang rtsi dang me tog dmar pos stong phrag bcur sbyin bsreg bya ste/ re re zhing gsang sngags bklags
164b1(rgyud): nas so// mahAHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na nA ma n+ta sid+d+hi m+me tsi tI hUM hUM phaT phaT swAtwa// de nas gsang sngags kyi sngags kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// las thams cad kyi dngos grub bo// dmar po zhes/ 
164b2(rgyud): pa'i lha la sogs pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / 'dir bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya che'i// dngos grub ji ltar 'gyur ba dang // rnam pa ci yis bsgrub
164b3(rgyud): bya ba// de'ang bcom ldan gsung du gsol// kha yis kha la'o byas nas// phan tshun dam po yis ni 'khyud// mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs kyis ni// dga' ma bshad par bya yis nyon// gar
164b4(rgyud): byer pa'i 'byung gnas rnal 'byor bdag nyid kyi gzugs gang yin pa// bcom ldan 'das mchog tu rnam par ma chad par 'bab pa ste// dper na chu klung gi rgyun rab tu 'bab pa bzhin
164b5(rgyud): 'dir ji srid du bsgoms pa las skyon sngags bzlas par bya/ 'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs ga la te// myur du grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan du ma yin no// ji srid du/ 'di'i
164b6(rgyud): dngos grub kyang phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kho na de'o// 'di rnams kyang rnal 'byor goms pa kho nas thams cad sgrub par byed kyi gzhan du ma yin no// goms pa'i sbyor bar 'gyur ba ni skyes pa
164b7(rgyud): dang byung ba dang ma byung ba dang / sngon du gnas pa rnams thar pa'i don dang 'dod pa'i don rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang sangs rgyas nyid kyi dngos grub kyang skye ba 'di nyid la'o// las thams cad yongasu spangs
164b8(rgyud): nas der son pa'i yid du gyur nas/ ji srid rang nyid 'ongs nas smra bar byed de// kye kye sgrub pa po mchog ci yin pa de stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas mchod yon byin nas phyag byas te dngos grub blang
165a1(rgyud): bar byas pa de sbyin par byed do// oM dz+nyAHSh+T+r-iHwi kr-itAn na A gar+b+ha A gats+tsha hU hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ de nas rdo rje ro langs ma sgrub par 'dod na/ rdo rje ro langs ma'i

170a8(rgyud): nub kyi 'dab ma la de dang mtshungs pa'i lam phor la me tog dmar po dang / sen rtsi dang / rgya skyegs kyi khu ba bsre khwa sbyin 'asres phyo'o / byang phyogs kyi 'dab ma la sbrang chen gyis gang ba'i kham por la yang dag
170b1(rgyud): par bzhag nas thab khung gru gsum du shing sin+d+ra ka shu dang shing saM ko tsa dang shing kaN+Di ka dang / dug dang / ske tshe rnams kyi sbyin bsreg bya'o// dgu yi bdag nyid can 'bad pas// dang por dam chi/ 
170b2(rgyud): byas nas ni// rgyan lnga yis ni brgyan pa yis// rnal 'byor ma yang de dang mtshungs// sna tshogs rin chen rang bzhin rgyan// rnga yab dkar pos rgyan pa yis// lag pa dag gis rdo dril yang / 
170b3(rgyud): yang nas yang du gtor ma sbyin// ji ltar kha cig yon phul bas// gang gis mnyes par 'gyur ba yin// dbus su'ang de dang mtshungs par bya// mtha' ru bzhi 'gyur du bya'o// dge 'dun
170b4(rgyud): bza' ba yang bya'o// dman dang zhan la rjes brtse ba// so// sor bdag ni dam tshig mchod// shes rab bcas shing yon dang bcas// rigs ni lnga po rnams kyis ni// de
170b5(rgyud): nas zho bcas bza' ba yi// me la sbyin sreg bya ba'o// blo bzang 'bad pas bzhag mi bya// dbyug pa lhan cig de sgo bzhir// rnga bo che yi sgra bya'o// gang dang gang du sgra thos pa/ 
170b6(rgyud): rol sde ni rab 'bros nas// rna ba rnams ni gsal bar byed// mig gis mthong bar mi byed cing // sde rnams dbang du byed pa dang // mgo la zug rngur 'gyur ba dang // skrod pa dag ni byed pa yin// / 
170b7(rgyud): yang na bya'i bshog pa la bcings nas brjod par bya ste// gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang de nyid du pha rol gyi sde rnams ni rang gi chung ma yang yongasu dor nas spro bar 'gyur ro// bdag nyid g.yul la mchog
170b8(rgyud): tu gzhol bar 'gyur ro// glang po che rnams dang rta la sogs pa rnams kyis ldog sde bdag nyid kyi sde yis 'gro bar byed do// gang gi tshe sde tshan gsum gyis g.yul byas nas dum bus ltung bar byed/ 
171a1(rgyud): po nya gcig pus gnas pas ji lta ba bzhin du 'tsho ba tsam gyis 'tshe bar byed do// de'i thal bas pha rol gyi sde bshog par byed pa 'am/ kun tu bskor bas sgrib par
171a2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// glo bur du glang po che'i tshad kyi rdo ba 'bab par byed do// char chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro// klu'i tshul gyi sgrub pas sbyin sreg 'bum gyis 'dod pa rnyed do// shi ba'i pha rol tu yang dgra
171a3(rgyud): bo de rnams 'bangasu 'gyur ro// 'di ni sum 'gyur gyis sa dang 'jig rten gsum la dbang byed par 'gyur ro// de nas shing se ba la'i 'bras bu 'bum phrag gcig gis de'i 'bras bur 'bras bur 'gyur
171a4(rgyud): zhes pa gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud du dngos grub phran tsheg das kyi las rab 'byam gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ de nas b+ha ga la
171a5(rgyud): rtags yang dag par sbyor ba'i khu ba 'di nu ma rab tu 'phel ba ra bya ba la nad nyams pa las dang / yid bud med kyi dab gyur pa med pa las dang / de 'ching bar byed pa las kyang khu ba
171a6(rgyud): yis nu ma la bsrung ba dang bskyab pa'i sbyor ba bsha du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis nga la zhus pa leg so zhes gnang nas/ dang por phung po sbyang bya ste/ phyi nas
171a7(rgyud): rab 'byam las brtsam bya// 'bras bu gsum gyi/ phye ma gzung / yang bak+Sha ra pA lA sha/ zos nas bu ram 'thungs pa las/ srin dang 'khogs pa rab tu 'joms// til mar ke ta kaM'i/ 
171a8(rgyud): khu ba// hil mo ci khu ba dang // rgya mchu 'thungs shing byug pa de'i// srin bu shig rnams 'joms par 'gyur// til mar ke ta ka'i khu ba// pi tsi n+da wa Na yang dag ldan// drag mo b+h+ra ma Na sbyor bas// 
171b1(rgyud): nI wa Na yis 'joms par 'gyur// hi la mo tsa'i khu ba dang // rgya mtshwa cung zad yang dag ldan// grib mar rab tu 'jug byas nas// pi tsi pi tu 'joms par byed// til mar ke ta ka'i khu ba// rgya
171b2(rgyud): skyegs rtsa bar sba byas nas// 'thung ba'i sbyor bas til mar 'joms// kuSh+maN+Da khu rka mar dang // pi tse nAM wan yang dag ldan// klu yi phye ma 'thungs gyur na// bad kan rnams kyi sbrang rtsi 'jom// 
171b3(rgyud): nyi ma re re re bya ba'o// phyi nas sman ni brtsam par bya'o// de nas 'bras bu sbyin par gnas// gzhan du 'bras bu med la dga'// shal mi li shun phye ma dang // tap+ta snying pos bza' bar bya/ 
171b4(rgyud): rnam bdun bsngags la tho rangs su// rung ste bza' ba za byed la 8// slar bdag ji srid 'tsho yi bar// khrag dang khu ba 'phe dal bar byed// oM tsaN ma hA ro Sha Na i maM di bya a mr-i ta me ku/ 
171b5(rgyud): ru hUM phaT/ sa Ti taM dang ma hi ShaM/ na ri ke la dag la yang wA shI'i nying khu yang dag ldan// phag las byung ba'i rmi/ khu yis// rtags dang rna ba nu ma'i dang // b+ha ga yi yang rnam
171b6(rgyud): par mnyes// lus kun rnam par mnyes pa yis// 'phel bar 'gyur bar the tsom med do// nges par sen mos bsdigs byas nas// bskus nas kyang ni de nyid kyis// skye gnas dbusu rab
171b7(rgyud): gzhug bya// rgas pas skye gnas 'phel bar 'gyur// se 'bru'i lpags pa snyigs ma yis// yungs kar til mar la rtso bya// nu ma mnyes pas 'phel bar byed// yungs kar dkar po shu dag
171b8(rgyud): dang / dri bzangs dri hA tI byas pas// snyigs ma yis ni ling ga 'phel// nu ma rna ba 'phel bar 'gyur// gzhan gyis mi thub dkar po dang // lag ldan pi pi ling byas pas// ma he yi yang mar
172a1(rgyud): sar gyis// 'thungs pas ling ga 'phel bar byed// dad+hA ra khu ba rta bon po/ rtsa bar bcug nas ma he yi// mar gsar dang ni bsres pa dang // da d+hAr 'bras bu go Daka/ 
172a2(rgyud): nyin dang mtshan du gdung bar bya// de nas ma he yi saM gu Da mnyes nas sngar brjod pas mtshan mo gsum du byugs nas mnyes par bya ste 'phel bar 'gyur ro// lham bu chu shel gyi phye ma yis mar bsdus
172a3(rgyud): nas btsun mo'i skye gnas kyi nang du byug par bya'o// shi thi la yis skye gnas dam por 'gyur ro// pad+ma'i sa bon dang / uta pa la'i sa bon dang / pad+ma'i rtsa lag dang / pu shel tse dang / gla rgang rnam
172a4(rgyud): til gyi til mar la btso bar bya'o// des b+ha ga'i yan lag mngon par bgrod dka' ba'i don du// shi thil la nyam dang bar 'dor ba la sogs pa 'joms par byed do// nim+pa'i
172a5(rgyud): shun pa bskol ba yis b+ha ga bkru bar bya'o// nim pa'i shun pas bdug par bya'o// gzhon nu ma bzang mo nyid dri bzla nga po can/ skal pa bzang mo la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan

172a8(rgyud): byug par bya ste/ slar yang skra rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ma he dang / phag pa dang / glang po che dang / khyim bya rnams kyi mar khu dag gis mnyes pas nu ma la sogs pa rnams 'phe'o// dza ti'i me
172b1(rgyud): tog gi til mar gyis btags na b+ha ga 'phel bar 'gyur ro// ma he'i mar gsar dang / shu dag dang / shing kuT dang rnams lte bar mnyes par bya ste nu ma 'phel bar 'gyuraro// rnga mo'i chu yis bskus
172b2(rgyud): pa las ling ga 'phel bar 'gyur ba de dang 'dra'o// ngaN+Dod pa la'i rtsa dang ba las byung ba'i mar gyis btung bar bya ste/ sbrum par 'gyuraro// bal dang / a ti ba lA dang / shi ta dang / shirkar dang /

172b4(rgyud): gyis dril phyis las lus thams cad bzang por 'gyuraro// zla mtshan gyi dus su phag gnon pa'i rtsa ba rna ba la bcing ba las sbrum mar 'gyur ro// ka lam+bI pA kaM bza' bar bya ste khu
172b5(rgyud): ba 'phelo// skyu ru ra'i phye ma dang / li khri dang / zho zos pas khu ba 'phelo// khu ba dang khrag zos pas khu ba 'a/ phe lo// bud med kyi bshang ba dang bud med kyi gci ba spabs
172b6(rgyud): nas btung bar bya ste khu ba 'phel lo// skyu ru ra'i phye ma dang / chu dang mar dang / sbrang rtsi rnams brjod pa'i dus su bza' bya'o// mig la stugs pa dang shes rab kyang skye bar byed do// skyu ru ra'i
172b7(rgyud): bye ma dang / 'o ma la sogs pa bza' bar bya ste/ lo'i sbyor bas tshe brgya'o// skyu ru ra'i khu ba srang cig dang / wA gu tsI phye ma zho cig btung bar bya'o// 'khogs pa la tho rangs zla ba cig tu
172b8(rgyud): zos nas lo lnga brgya'i tshe ru 'gyu ro// wA gu tsI zho gcig dang / dar ba dang / chu dang phebs dang / 'o mas kyang rung ste 'thungs na zla ba drug gis lang tsho la sogs pa dang ldan no// muN+Di ri phye ma dang
173a1(rgyud): mar bza' bar bya ste/ nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig gis lo bcu drug tu byed do// Sha Na'i sa 'on gyi phye ma srang cig dang / sa lu dmar po srang gcig dang / bakha dog gcig pa'i'o/ 
173a2(rgyud): kham por gnyis bza' bar bya ste/ thog mar 'o ma kham por gcig zad par 'thungs nas sa Na la sogs pa de la byin nas btung bar bya'o// de nas bza' bar bya'o// 'khogs pa 'o mas btud
173a3(rgyud): bar bya ste nyi ma mdun nam gsum gyi bar du ji srid par rlung dang tshad pa spang ngo // bya ba ji lta bu dang bya ba phyi ma ji lta bus de'i sku la sogs pa ltung bar byed do// de nas skra dkar dang gnyer ma spangs te/ 
173a4(rgyud): lo brgya phrag lnga 'tsho bar byed do// khrag skrod pa'i rtsa ba dang / dmar dang sbrang rtsi'i byi la'i rkang pa tsam bza' bar bya ste 'bras bu ni ji lta ba bzhin kho na'o// skyu ru ra dang a ru ra dang
173a5(rgyud): bung ba'i rgyal po dang / paM pi ling dang / na le sham dang lcags kyi phye ma rnams sbrang rtsi dang sha ka ra dag gis u dum pa ra'i 'bras bu'i tshad kyis ril bur bya'o// de nas ril
173a6(rgyud): bu bza' bar bya ste/ zla bas tshe lo sum cur 'gyur ro// ku mA ri srang cig dang mar dang zho dang ldan pas bza' bar bya ste stobs chen por 'gyuraro// b+ha tra lI dang / lig dur sum 'gyur gyi a ru
173a7(rgyud): ra dang / chu cha gcig la sogs pa zos pas stobs chen por 'gyuraro// thams cad du bdag nyid lnga'i rnam par bza' bar bya'o// sngags kyis mnyes shing byin gyis brlab par bya'o// khu
173a8(rgyud): rengs pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas ngan da'i shing gi rtsab babs kyis btags nas mgo la mnye bar bya ste/ mgo bo'i gzer 'joms par byed do// sbrang dang mar dang mig sman
173b1(rgyud): du bya ste/ mtshan mo long ba 'joms so// shing se pa la'i 'bras bu'i rtsa ba zos pa las sba ba 'joms par byed do// la phug gis bon dang / pri yang ku dang / tsan dan dmar po dang / ru ta btags/ 
173b2(rgyud): nas dril phyis byas pa las spre'u la sogs pa rnam par 'jom so// sha ba'i sha skam po dang / ra'i 'o ma btung bar bya ste/ gza' rnams 'jom so// skyu ru ra dang pi pi ling dang / tsi tra ka dang
173b3(rgyud): sge'u gsher dang bu ram snying pa dang / mar dang sbrang rtsi mnyam par bza' bar bya ste/ dus ma yin pa'i lud pa dang dbugs mi bde ba 'joms so// sge'u bsher dang / zir nag po dang / zho'i nying
173b4(rgyud): khus kyang rung ste/ lan tshwa dang lhan cig tu btung bar bya'o// de'i khrag sri ba rnam par 'jom so// li kha ra dang / bak+Sha ra mnyam par bza' bar bya'o// so b+hAny+dzan
173b5(rgyud): bskol ba btung bar bya ba 'am yang na rdo 'joms pa btung bar bya ba'o// a ru ra dang / tsi tra ka'i chu btung bar bya ste/ mchin pa'i nad 'jom so// zir nag po dang bu ram bze'i
173b6(rgyud): bar bya ste// rims 'khor ma 'jom so// ya wak+Sha ra 'am zho btung bar bya ste/ rlung nad rnam par 'joms so// tsha ba'i til mar la byi thang ka dang rgya mtsha byin nas cung zad bsros pa'i nying khu btung
173b7(rgyud): bya bar sta me dpal dang / srin bu dag rnam par 'joms so// a ru ra dang bu ram bza' bar ste/ ming ngan pa rnam par 'joms paso// a ru ra dang sga skya bza' bar bya ste rlung nad 'jom so// 
173b8(rgyud): rtsa dur ba la yung bas btags nas byug par bya ste khyi rdo 'jom so// 'di nyid 'di nyid kyi khyi dang shu ba dang / 'brum bu dang / 'joms pa la sogs pa rnams 'jom so// bu ram dang tsha ba'i
174a1(rgyud): til mar btung bar bya ste/ dbugs mi bde ba rnam par 'jom so// ardzun dang / shing tsa dang / mar la sogs pa rnams bza' bar bya ste/ snying gi zug

174a3(rgyud): par byed do// 'bras bu gsum gyi phye ma dang / mar dang sbrang rtsi rnams btung bar bya ste/ nad thams cad 'jom so// a ru ra'i phye ma dang mar dang sbrang rtsi dus gsum kun tu bza' bar bya ste/ rlung dang bad
174a4(rgyud): kan rnam par 'jom so// ba sha ka'i yan lag lnga dang / da shu dag dang tshangs ma'i shing dang / pi pi ling skam po phye mar byas nas rgya mtshwa dang sbrang rtse yis wa Di ru bya ste de nas bza' bar
174a5(rgyud): bya'o// dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang bad kan 'joms so// shAl+ma li dkar po'i shing shun phye mar byas nas pad+ma'i sa bon dang / ku mu ti'i 'bras bu lhan cig tu byas btags te/ rtsa ba'i
174a6(rgyud): sngags stong phrag cig tu bzlas nas la du'i ril bu'i tshad kyi ril bu rnam par byas te/ grib bskams byas nas tsa na ya'i khu bas skam par bya'o// tho rangs zos nas ji srid 'dod par btung bar bya ste/

174a8(rgyud): bar bya ste 'bras bu ni de kho na bzhin no// gshin rje mo dang / a ru ra dang / sgra s+ya dang / rgyam chu dang / mAn sA mAn rnams bza' bar bya ste// 'khogs pa thams cad 'joms// sle rjes kyi khu ba dang sbrang \u0f7f/ 
174b1(rgyud): btung bar byas te gcin nad 'jom so// mA tral 'o ma dang / pi pi ling gi phye ma dang / mar dang sbrang rtsi rnams btung bar bya ste/ rims phra mo dang lung ba la sogs pa rnam par 'joms par byed do// ngo tsha can nga/

174b6(rgyud): sgra'i mig sman no// phag pa mo dang / tsha ba gsum cha mnyam par phye mar byas nas/ wan+ti ka'i dbusu 'bar bas 'og tu phyogs pa'i wAn+ti ka'i rim pas spre'u'i til mar brgya phrag bzung nas thigs pa gnyis
174b7(rgyud): kyi sbyor bas gnyer ma dang skra dkar po spong ngo // 'dis mnyes te khu bas mdzel byugs pas zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'phral gyi mar gsar gyis mnyes nas gan+d+ha ka dang ma sa kA dang lhan cig ra sa to la kI dang / 
174b8(rgyud): 'bras sa lu dang / tsi lo Na~M/ a'i gong bus bum pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyi bum pa'i nang du mr-i Shi kA yis bkab la wa lu ka dang lhan cig me la byin pa las ro 'ching ngo // za ba las ni nyi ma'i tshogs kyi be'u/ 
175a1(rgyud): thun bzung nas ril bur bya'o// rgya spos kyi rtsa bas btags nas dkri bar bya'o// ril bu re re zos nas dug b.ra' ste/ dug rab tu med par 'gyuraro// zhes pa rgas
175a2(rgyud): pa 'joms pa'i le'u sde drug pa'o// / kye bcom ldan 'das dbang du byed pa'i cho ga gsungs shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa dkar po'i rtsa ba la khu ba
175a3(rgyud): yis pa Di ka byas thig les bud med dbang du byed par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa'i dbyug pa dang / shu dag dang / ru rta dang / sbrang rtsis brtags la dril phyis byas na gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// daN+Dod pa la'i/ 
175a4(rgyud): rtsa ba la tam+bu la'i sa sbyin par bya'o// de bzhin du tshangs pa'i dbyugad pa dang / shu dag dang / ru rta dang / na ga ge sar dang / tam+bu dal byin na dbang du 'gyur ro// gi wa dang rang byung gi me tog gi
175a5(rgyud): thig les skal pa dang ldan pa dbang du 'gyur ro// gi wang dang / shi shu lo la dang / b+hing+ga rA dzas lhan cig skar ma rgyal la wa'i ga'i rnam par bya ste thig les dbang du byed par 'gyur ro// 
175a6(rgyud): b+hing+ga rA dza'i rtsa ba la bdag nyid kyi khu bas mig sman bya'o// de bzhin du rma bya'i gtsug pud dang / shi ba'i phreng ba dang / kha ta'i lce skam po'i phye ma gang gi mgo la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// ba lang gi so
175a7(rgyud): la bza' ba dang btung ba btags nas byin na dbang du 'gyur ro// khyab 'jug gnon pa'i rtsa ba btags la byugs na dga' ba las de bzhin no// skar ma rgyal la nga d+hu ra'i rtsa ba gzung nas skar ma skag la
175a8(rgyud): wa Da'i shing shun no// me bzhi la mdab ma'o// nag pa la me tog go/ snrubs la rtsa ba'o// cha nyams pa'i phye ma la sbrang rtsis pa Di ka ru bya'o// ras la btums nas bskams par bya'o// tam+bu
175b1(rgyud): la la byin nas dung gi bye mas dbang du 'gyur ro// shing ang+ga'i sol ba dang / smyo byed dang / khyi'i mig dang / rkang pa'i mthe bos gang gi ming bris te che ge mo shog ces brjod pas 'ong bar byed do// dug
175b2(rgyud): med pa'i me la gdung bar bya'o// skar ma rgyal la gzhan gyi mi thub pa'i rtsa ba'i rtsa ba bton te ma'i zhun gyi mar khus de la bskus na thod pa ru dud pa btung bar bya'o// mig sman des bud med dang skyes pa
175b3(rgyud): dbang du byed do// rgya spos dang / byi thang ka dang / seng ldeng ru rnga byin na mi 'dod pa 'joms par byed do// pri yang gu dang / gi ba dang / ldong ros dang / na ga ge sar gyis mig la mig sman du byas
175b4(rgyud): dbang du byed do// gla rtsi dang / ngo tsha can dang / dA d+hu ra dang / sa ha de rnams kyis byas pa'i til mar gyis dbang du byed do// na ma shuN+Da lI che ge mo me wa sha mAn ya swAhA/ stong phrag bcu
175b5(rgyud): bzlas pas sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas bsnyen pa khri'o// du khrod kyi thal ba la bcu bzhi la brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon par ba sngags te/ bud med kyi mgo la byin na dbang du 'gyur te/ 
175b6(rgyud): rtag tu nges par sems pas slar yang dga' bzhin pa'i sems dang ldan no// khu ba rengs pa'o// shing khu byug gi mig dang / shi rta'i rtsa ba dang / d+ha d+hu ra dang / gzhan yang byang gi muk+ta shi kha snyed/ 
175b7(rgyud): pa la bcings nas khu ba rengs par byed do// sra rtsi pog dang / wA ma d+ha ti dang / gzhan yang shar dkar po dang / buM kha'i rtsa bas kyang 'khrig pa las khu 'angs par byed do// 'jam 'bras la sbubs
175b8(rgyud): byas nas dngul chus bkang ste srad pus sked pa la bcings na khu ba 'dzin no// pag pa'i til mar dang / rgya skyegs dang / rany+dzi dang ang+kar dkar po'i shing bal gyi snying pos sbar na khu ba rengs so// 
176a1(rgyud): sa'i 'khril shing gi phye ma dang / dbus kyi snying po til mar gyis bsreg par bya ste/ khu ba reng so// til gyi til mar dang / sa'i 'khril shing phye mar byas nas sam me tog gi/ 
176a2(rgyud): mar khu btung bar bya'o// des rkang pa'i mthil la bskus na khu ba rengaso// khwa ta dkar po'i rje ngar gyi rtsa ba dang / pad+ma dkar po'i ge sar dang sbrang rtsi rnams kyis lte bar byugs na khu ba rengs so// pad+ma
176a3(rgyud): 'dab mas khyab 'jug gnon pa'i rtsa bar 'dab mas dkris nas wa ny+dzi dkri bar bya ste/ khu ba rengs so// bad+ma'i khu'i mig sman dang / dngul chu dang / pi pi ling dang / rgya mtsha dang / ru rta dang / puH
176a4(rgyud): ron gyi brun rnams kyis ling ga la dril phyis byas pa las khu ba de rengs so// gu s+tha dang ud+b+ha ba li dang / ban+d+ha dang shrig d+hA dgas na stang du 'gyuraro// shing ka pad kyi rtsa ba dang / darbi dang / 
176a5(rgyud): ra'i gcin gyis btags nas ling ga la kun byugs te/ pad+ma dbye bar bya ste/ lan gsum du steng du 'gyur// tsha ba 'i chu yis bskus na rab tu zhi bar byed do// 'gron bu'i nang du
176a6(rgyud): dngul chus bkang nas kha ru bzhag na khu ba reng so// ra'i gcin gyis dbang po chu lha mo la nyi ma bdun du bgo bar bya'o// des dril phyis byas pa las ling ga rengs par 'gyur ro// d+ha d+ha ra'i rtsa ba dang kA ma
176a7(rgyud): ci'i rtsa ba dang / oM Sha Ni'i rtsa ba dang / ga pur gyi khu bas btags nas ling ga la byugs na 'dod pa'i bud med 'dzag par byed do// rgya mtshwa dang / tshal dang / ga pur dang / g+ho Sha'i phye ma sbrang brtsis
176a8(rgyud): btags nas ling gal thugs na'ang de bzhin no// phug ron gyi thun sbrang rtsis btags nas ling+ga la bskus na 'dod pa'i bud med 'dzag par byed do// ka mA tsA'i rtsa ba dang / tramU la shin tu dga'aH
176b1(rgyud): dus su bud med kyis zos na de 'dzag par byed do// pakra dang / tin DI dang ma l+li ka rgya mtshwa bsres par byas nas rang gi bsdigs mdzub kyi sor mor bcug ste/ de'i b+ha gar bcug nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang
176b2(rgyud): phyug ma'i rtsa ji srid du de 'dzag par byed kyi bar du bskyod par bya'o// ga pur dang / dngul chu dang / tshal dang / shing ha ti dang / pi pi ling dang / sbrang rtsi rnams kyis byugs na bud med 'dzag par byed// 
176b3(rgyud): shing dza yin+ta'i rtsa bas btags nas 'bras thug po che dang / chu bsres pa'i zla mtshan gyi dbusu de'i skye gnas la rab tu byugs na bud med mo sham du 'gyur bar the tshom med do// pA la sha'i sa bon btag
176b4(rgyud): nas byug par bya zhing / mar dang sbrang rtsi 'thungs pa las khrag dgi mtshan ma'i bud med mo sham du 'gyu ro// ga dang / phye ma leb kyi phye ma dang / phyis sa skye gan su byin na dam por 'gyuraro// khu ba
176b5(rgyud): rengs pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / mgrin pa bteg nas dam 'khyud cing // lha la yang yang 'o byas na/ sa// rgyal po'i dngos por byas pa cig/ 'khor los bsgyur ba/ 
176b6(rgyud): ci ltar 'gyur// gang zhig nye bar ma zhugs pa// gnas cig tu ni rgyal srid 'gyur// dgra bo g.yo med 'gyur ba dang // dga' zhing zhabs la 'dud pa 'am// kun tu 'gugs shing 'dren pa dang // mang
176b7(rgyud): bdag de bzhin der bzlas pa// sems can don du bdag la shod// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bris sku dang ni gzugs brnyan la// nyer spyod lnga rnams kyis mchod nas// drug cu rtsa bzhi
176b8(rgyud): yongs rdzogs pa'i// gtor mthun mtshams gsum du sbyin// gser 'bum de bzhin kham por brgyad// 'khrul 'khor rgyas pa'i sbyor ba yis// de bzhin sngags la mchog gzhal ba// sra/ 
177a1(rgyud): yang shing rta khams por sogs// mar dang sbrang rtsis bkang ba yis// gtso bo dpal gyi khyim steng du// aHyig 'khor lor nges bcing bya// gsang sngags rig padz+ri
177a2(rgyud): Sh+T+rI sogs// blo dang ldan pas dus gsum mchod// ga Da ka yi stang gi char// dkyil 'khor lnga po byas nas ni// legs par dkri ba byin nas ni// 'bad pas sa kun sbyang bar bya// sa gzhi yongasu
177a3(rgyud): gzung bar byas nas// dkyil 'khor mchog ni bya ba yin// rdul tshon mdzes pas bri ba 'am// yang na 'bras ni thug po che// kha dog lnga po de bzhin ldan// de bzhin slob dpon lnga rnams kyis// cung
177a4(rgyud): zad myos byed 'thungs nas ni// steng gi ri mo'i steng du ni/  dgu bdag dkyil 'khor yid 'ong ba// grwa bzhi ru ni thod pa/ da'o// rang gi 'dod lha'i rnal 'byor ldan// srad bus thig gdab
177a5(rgyud): shes rab can// lha mo'i dkyil 'khor ches mang ba// rnam pa ji bzhin mngon bri bya// mdab bzhir de bzhin bri byab / khyad par dbyug pa dkar po'o// dbus su dbyug pa dkar/ 
177a6(rgyud): po ni// sna tshogs rdo rje bzhin bri bya// rigs ni lnga po mtshungs par bya// skal pa byas nas legs par bslab// rgyud la sogs pa'i sbyor bas 'dir// rab tu 'bad pas dbang bskur sbyin// slo ba da
177a7(rgyud): gsang ba shes rab dang // bzhi pa de slar de bzhin no// slob dpon bzhi po rnams nyid kyis// yang dang yang du gtor ma sbyin// dril bu rdo rje mnyam par gnas// sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa yis/ 
177a8(rgyud): kun tu ser po'i gos nyid dang // mi yi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o// gser dngul zangs lcags bzhi yis ni// bum pa dkyil 'khor yang dag dgod// dbus su gser gyi bum pa yang // sna tshogs
177b1(rgyud): rin chen legs par mdzes// gser dngul zangs dang lcags las byung // 'khrul 'khor bzhi po rnams dang ni// dbus su gser gyi 'khrul 'khor ni// me tog dmar pos legs mdzes pa'o// 
177b2(rgyud): slar yang phyir gzhan dkyil 'khor bzhir// sdong po bkod sogs 'bad pas bklag/ phyi ru zan la 'dus pa nyal// longs spyod de bzhin gzhan la bdun// dge 'dun yon dang long spyod kyang // rma
177b3(rgyud): bzang 'bad pas bya ba yin// shar du wa DaHlho ru ni/ a shwat+thaHnub wa ku la/ byang du nag ge gsar ro// shar du me tog dkar lhor ser// de bzhin nub dmar byang du yang // ljang ku de bzhin
177b4(rgyud): steng du yang // ma ru la ra rje rigs dang // bram ze rdo rje na chen sogs// shar gyi phyogasu rab sbyin phyir// skye dbo 'di dag sa ga la// sna tshogs rgyan kun gyis brgyan pa'i/ 
177b5(rgyud): mi bdag gi ni ngos bzhi ru// bzhi 'gyur 'dren ma rnams dang ni// lhan cig mchod sbyin 'dus pa la// brgya rtsa brgya da rab sbyin byas nas// pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga ni// sa btsugs
177b6(rgyud): lag pa sbyar byas nas// rin chen la sogs kyis spras pa// sna tshogs la sogs brgyan dang gser// gang ba'i snod la de brjod pa// sa stengs thams cad gnod med pa'i// lha yi rgyal srid bdag la
177b7(rgyud): stsolal/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid dang // dbang po nyid kyang bdag la gsol// de nas dpal ldan gshin rje gshed// dmar po'i slob dpon bden pa la// rgyal po chen po 'di dag ni// yid kyi/ 
177b8(rgyud): shing rta rdzogs par bgyi// gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor pas// sngags dang bsam gtan mchog gzhol ba// blo ldan gus pas cung zad nyon// shes rab pha rol phyin pa bklag/ dzam+b+ha la la chu
178a1(rgyud): sbyin dang // yi dgas gtor ma de bzhin ston// brtse ba'i ngang tshul 'jig rten skyong // deng khyod la sogs brjod par bya// mi bdag bdag la bden par spos// mang/ 
178a2(rgyud): bdag bden las gzhan min pas// mi bdag gis bden brjod par bya// mgo dang snying khar rdo rje ni// lan gsum byin nas rgyal srid bya// dkyil 'khor bsten par bya ba'o// gnasu bdag la
178a3(rgyud): smra ba ni// deng bdag skye ba 'bras bur bcas// mi yi 'gro ba legs par thob// de nas dpal ldan gshin rje gshed// dmar po'i rnal 'byor pa bdag ni// 'jig rten gsum rgyal srid byas nas// 
178a4(rgyud): phyi nas dbang po la sogs pa// bzlog pa bdag gis byed pa da yin// de bzhin slar yang ke lA shar// bud med rgyal srid byas nas ni// rgyal srid 'byor grub chen mang dang // mtha' dag
178a5(rgyud): rgyal srid khur bzung nas// mi bdag 'phrog byed zla ba ltar// sangs rgyas kun dang dngos grub kun// gang gis myur du// 'byung 'gyur ba// da ltar lha yid mdzod la// mnga' bdag
178a6(rgyud): bdag la mchog stsol cig/ de bzhin kho nar bden dang bden// sa yi gnasu phyag byas nas// bzod par gsol nas khyim 'gro bya// de bzhin sna tshogs glu dang ni// rol mo la sogs pa rnams
178a7(rgyud): kyis// spro bar bcas pas sbyin bsregs bya// nyi ma so sor nyer spyod bcas// mtshan mo phyed nas tshogs 'khor dang // shes rab bcas shing yon dang bcas// rim 'dis nyi ma nyi shu ldan// 
178a8(rgyud): zla ba drug gis mchod sbyin rdzogs// de bzhin kun tu 'ongs nas gar// glang po rta la sogs pa'i yon// byin nas mchog ni blang bar bya// de tshe yang dang yang du ni// gang gang mi bdag gang yin te/ 
178b1(rgyud): gzhan du po nyar rab tu 'jog/ rgyal srid bdag gis bzung ba nyid// gal te min na chad pa la// rab tu bzhag nas 'byin par byed// sna tshogs rin chen la sogs pa// myur 'gro rnams ni 'bul/ 
178b2(rgyud): bar byed// rang pan rang gi skal ba rnams// rab mchog gal te 'dod na ni// de yis rgyal srid sbyin par byed// gang gang ming gis mi 'ong na// de yis 'khrul 'khor seng ldeng gi/ me la gdung
178b3(rgyud): bar bya ba yin// skad cig de las de rmongs te// gzhan gyi yul du 'gro bar 'gyur// btso ba'i thabs kyi thal ba gang // gang gis nang la sogs byin pa// de dag nye bar zhi bar byed// gal te gas
178b4(rgyud): sbyong bya ba yi// dbang po nyid ni thob par byed// sbyin sreg gi sa 'di bzhi 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das ma kye khyod la/ dngo ma tshogs pas bshad pa yin// de yi sngags mchog cung
178b5(rgyud): zad kyang // 'jig rten gsum du rnyed pa dka'// lha mo dpal ni kyai rdo rje// bstan pa thar pa mchog dang ni// dpal ldan bde mchog rgyud du yang // mang zhing rgya che'i rnal 'byor ma// 
178b6(rgyud): mo dpal ldan 'dus pa dang // rgyas par rnal 'byor rgyud du yang // gang gi'i klung gi bye mtshungs pas// ches mang dga' ba'i dngos grub rnams// gshin rje gshed ni dmar po'i rgyud// lha mo gus dang bcwa
178b7(rgyud): pas nyon// lha mo bdag ni mya ngan 'das// dbang po sogs kyis mi mthong ngo // mig mi bzang gi rnal 'byor dbang // tshangs pas skye bar 'gyur ba yin// brtson 'grus chen po stobs chen ldan// de phyir chos
178b8(rgyud): ni ston pa po// ci 'dis bskyangs par gyur nas ni// rgyud ni legs par sbas pa thob// gsang sngags 'bum phrag gcig bzlas nas// bdag la sgrub par byed pa dang // rab tu spyod par 'gyur ba yin// 'dzam
179a1(rgyud): bu'i gling na sna tshogs pa'i// dngos grub rab tu ster bar byed// 'gugs pa'i sa bon gas ka/ 'di dag bdun gyi rnal 'byor pas// skyed tshal rnyed par byed par 'gyur/ 
179a2(rgyud): slar yang ka nau yu ga dang // pa la got+ta la dang ni// go ma tsA rA lA b+hI ti// la sogs rnal 'byor pa yis 'gyur// ka lang+gi dang pad+ma dang // gau rI dang ni ma ga d+ha// su ra ka rgyal u bi kri/ ba tsi ka la ra dza dang / 
179a3(rgyud): go de ra ma kaM gi ling+ge// bi mo dzi zhes bya sogs rgyal// dpal ldan gshin rje gshed dmar po'i// rnal 'byor pas ni 'gyur ba yin// gang yang smra brjod byed pa dang // gang yang brtson 'grus ldan
179a4(rgyud): pa dang // gang yang pha rol gnon pa che// kha cig 'dir ni 'ji ngag rten sogs// slar yang sngags la mchog gzhol ba// slar yang rgyal srid dbang po sogs// 'khor los bsgyur bar
179a5(rgyud): 'gyur ba yin// gsang sngags chen po legs sbas pa// zla sa pa'i rnal 'byor la mi bstan// bden par sangs rgyas nyid 'dod pa// rgyud la 'jug pa la bstan bya// 'di las
179a6(rgyud): rgyud 'di brjod pa la// dang por dbang bsgyur bya ba ste// phyi nas 'di ni bstan par bya// rgyud rgyal rgyud kyi mchog gyur pa// sngags dang bsam gtan brjod nyung ba// bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub par
179a7(rgyud): 'gyur// gang sdig las la dga' ba dang // dad pa dman pas 'grub mi 'gyur// gang yang sdig pa byed pa yang // bslab pa 'dzin par byed na ni// 'bad med dngos grub nyid 'grub par// 'gyur bar
