203a7(rgyud): nas// zhabs dang zhabs kyi gnon pa yis// sdud cing 'dor ba 'jug pas mdzad// g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag gnyis kyis// rjed pa'i rtse mo mtha' nas dgrol// cung zad zur gyis gdangs pa'i spyan// 
203a8(rgyud): mdzes pa'i spyan tshugs rnams bsgyur ba'i// spyan gyi phyag rgyas gar mdzad pas// 'gro la rgyas btab 'dud par 'gyur// sems dpa' chen po dpa' bo la// dbyangs 'di yis ni bskul mdzad cing // 
203b1(rgyud): shin tu dgyes che dkyil 'khor du// rnal 'byor ma kun gnas par 'gyur// shin tu dgyes che rdo rje dag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen po// dkyil 'khor mchog tu dgyes pa yi// de nyid bcom ldan nyid kyis shon
203b2(rgyud): rnam pa kun tu skye med pa'i// bde bas rol cing chub mdzad pa'i bdag cag gzugs kyi dam dang bcas te rnam spyod 'gyur ba med pa'i yid// bde mchog byang chub sems ni rnam pa kun tu sdug bsngal yongs bral te/ 
203b3(rgyud): che ba'i ye shes lhun gyis grub mchog ldan pa bde spyod bde la rol par mdzod// 'di ni glu ru blangs pa yis// shin tu srid pas mya ngan 'das// dga' chen de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnams// dkyil 'khor 'di la
203b4(rgyud): byin gyis rlob// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bde ba chen po zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas pas rgyas pa spyan ud pa la kha phye ba bani na smin ma dang sku rnam par 'gyur ba// klog dang chu rlabs bzhin du/ 
203b5(rgyud): 'gyur ba'i rnam par gnon pas nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rnga rje de kho na nyid 'di gsung so// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor zhe/ sa bya ba// rdo rje ye shes thugs la gnas// dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i
203b6(rgyud): mchog nyid ni// bdag nyid sbyor bas brtags pa yin// rdo rje dgyes pa chen po yi// dkyil 'khor zla ba gang ba 'dra// 'od zer dkar po phreng bas mdzes// byang chub sems mchog 'dra ba yin// rdo
203b7(rgyud): dpa' bo'i dkyil 'khor ni// mdzes pa zla ba kham pa yi// mthing ka'i 'bar ba kun rgyas pa// me dang rlung gis bus pa bzhin// shin tu dgyes pa'i mchog sgrub pa// rdo rje rin chen dkyil 'khor
203b8(rgyud): ni/ dga' byed dkyil 'khor cha brgyad kyi// 'bar dang bcas pa'i nyi ma bzhin// dkyil 'khor dgyes mchog 'byung byed pa// pad+mo'i dbang po pad+mo 'dra// mdab ma brgyad po gyes pa yi// ge sar zla bas mdzes
204a1(rgyud): byas pa'o// thams cad las ni grub byed pa// rdo rje'i las kyi dkyil 'khor ni// dga' byed dkyil 'khor gru gsum te// rab du 'bar ba medang 'dra// de la sogs pa'i mtha' yas pa/ 
204a2(rgyud): 'khor rnams ni brtag par bya// skyong ba rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ji ltar de nyid sprul pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang bzhengs nas brjid pa'i rdo rje'i gar dag gis gar mdzad
204a3(rgyud): cing glu dang sil snyan gyis gling bu dang pi bang dang / rdza rnga dang / dun wa dang / pan waM dang / ba li ka dang / zhi ba'i thal mo la sogs pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis kun tu brdung ba dang / sil snyan la sogs pa'i rnam
204a4(rgyud): par rol pas lha'i ro dang / ro'i zas dang / bza' ba dang / bca' ra ba dang / btung ba dang / theg pa dang / stan dang / gos dang / bldag pa dang / bzhib pa dang / 'jams la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshog
204a5(rgyud): kyis bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje 'dzin la bstab sa nas gus pa dang bcas pas pad+mo'i sor mo khong stong du mdza/ da de g.yon du btud pa'i tshul gyis 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i spyan
204a6(rgyud): gdangs te/ yang de kho na nyid bskul bar mdzad pa'i dbyangs 'dis bstod pa mdzad do// shin tu bde ba'i byams pa kuH gzigs pa'i thugs rje spyan mnga' bas// byang chub chen po snying por 'gro ba sgrol bas skye
204a7(rgyud): yid mi mnga' ste// 'thun pa'i lam ston nyon mongs drug las bsgral pa'i phyir// nam mkha'i tshul du gzungs kyi rang bzhin bde gshegs kun la stobs// e ma'o bde ba kun tu rgyas pas che ba'i ye shes 'dren/ 
204a8(rgyud): cing banabs// sa yi khyad par bde bas rdzogs pa'i sku nyid stong pas tshogs pa'i rgyal po bzhin// chos nyid ji bzhin de la reg pas sku nyid che ba kun ston cing // snying po byang chub bgrod phyir 'gro ba thams cad
204b1(rgyud): sbom mo// bsam gyis mi khyab bstan// dpal gyi snying po gzugasu bstan te// rigs lnga'i gtso rnams mnyes mdzad cing // dgyes pas drongs la banabs shing rab tu dgyes pas rol mo mdzod// de bzhin
204b2(rgyud): gshegs pa'i bde ba mnos te bying ba'i gnas nas bslang ba'i phyir// gnod sbyin cha lugs skye 'gog med pa'i tshul dang rnam par ldan// snying rje chen po rgyun dang bcas nas bde ba chen po ston pa'i chos nyid
204b3(rgyud): nam mkha' bzhin// dgyes pa mchog gi ngang la sprul pa'i lha mo skye mched dang // rol pas 'dus pa'i tshogs la bde mchog stsol bar mdzod// ha ha ho bde la gnas shing bde mnobs hUMHdgyes pa mchog
204b4(rgyud): dang ldan bI mi skye bde mchog bde la char pa rab tu dbab du stsol/ rnam pa kun tu mtha' dang bral ba'i dbyings la bde gshegs slob ma gzung du gsol// dpal gyi rgyal po tshul bzhin de ltar
204b5(rgyud): bzhugs pa'i gnasu banab su gsol// ngo mtshar byang chub/ che ba 'di nyid 'gro ba rten bzhin bde thob pa// pha rol phyin drug dngos nyid gang la yang ni mi brten par// mi skye mya ngan 'das
204b6(rgyud): pa'i gzungs dang rtag tu rnam par ldan// mtha' dang bral bI bde bas chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa yi// rmongs pa'i bde bas bying zhing gnas pa'i 'gro la snying rje'i chus khrus mdzad do// de nas shin tu dgye
204b7(rgyud): mchog mi chags pa// 'di ni glu ru blangs pa yis// yid dang 'thab pa'i bde chen po// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' de
204b8(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la gsol ba'i dbyangs kyis bstod pa nye bar gnas nas yang chu skyes kyi mdab ma dri ma med pa dang 'dra ba'i spyan gyis kun tu gzigs shing 'dzum pa dang bcas pas zhag
205a1(rgyud): rgyas par gyur nas/ yang tshad med pa mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi tshogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mang po bskal pa rgyas pa'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho ma lus lus pa med
205a2(rgyud): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / nor bu rin po che dang / pad+mo dang / las kyi rigs thams cad las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin dang / rin chen 'dzin dang / chos 'dzin dang / 
205a3(rgyud): sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po thams cad dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gi tshogs chen po dang / thugs las byung ba dang / mtshon dang dga' ba dang / sgog mo la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug chen
205a4(rgyud): po'i g.yog gi tshogs tshad med par 'dren par byed pa dang / 'gug/ rnas par byed pa dang / 'jib par byed pa la sogs pa'i rdo/ rje na mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo'i chog
205a5(rgyud): dang / grangs med pa'i rdo rje 'phrogs par byed pa'i tsho gas dang // zhan yang phyi rol gyi rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+mo dang / las kyi rigs la byung ba'i rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang
205a6(rgyud): phyug chen po dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs rnam par bde ba chen po gyur pa dang bcas pa'i kun tu gzigs pa'i spyan gyis gar mdzad pa dang rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas pa'i rnam par gnon pas kun tu gnon
205a7(rgyud): pas rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas pas 'degs shing tshems kyis 'debs pa dang / rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas pa'i kun tu 'brel pa'i phyag gis gar mdzad pa dang / rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas pa'i
205a8(rgyud): sgeg pas 'gying ba dang / spyod pa dang mi spyod par bcas pa'i rnams dang / kun tu 'dor ba'i rnam par gnon pas 'khor gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po la byin gyis brlabs nas dgyes pa chen po rdo rje gdon
205b1(rgyud): mi ba ba zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las gsungs pa// bdag nyid de nyid mnyam gzhag dang // de bzhin lha yi de nyid dang // sngags dang phyag rgya de nyid ni// de yis
205b2(rgyud): 'khor mchog tu 'gyur// yan lag thams cad sgom las 'das// rdog dang mi rtog rnam spangs pa// 'dren dang tshig las yang dag 'das// 'di ni dkyil 'khor mchog ces bya// chos dang chos min rnams// 
205b3(rgyud): spyod pa// chos rnams thams cad brtag par bya// rnam dag na mkha' 'dra ba yis// dkyil 'khor 'di ni bstan pa yin// 'dod chags mi chags 'dod chags mnyam// chu yi pad+mod mar ba 'dra// rang sem/ 
205b4(rgyud): bsod nams shin tu chags// 'di ni dkyil 'khor mchog yino// ga/ zugs dang gzugs min dri med pa'i// gang khams kun la 'jug 'gyur ba// sems ni chu dang bskul byed pa// dkyil
205b5(rgyud): 'khor dkyil 'khor zhes pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rna/ la 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po g.yog dang bcas pa dang / pho nya dang pho nya mo dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen po dang / nam
205b6(rgyud): mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po rdo rje 'dzin gtso bo chen po la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma'o rab dgyes sem
205b7(rgyud): dpa' mchog/ kye ma'o rab dgyes phyogs bsgyur ba// rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs mchog gi/ dkyil 'khor gsang ba nyid kyis gsungs// sangs rgyas sbyor ba sbyor che ga/ rdo rje sbyor bablan de 'jig gsum bde
205b8(rgyud): mchog thob 'gyur ba'i// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid kyis gsungs// rin chen pad+mo sna tshogs che// sna tshogs sbyor ba gang mdzad pa// rnam grangs thig le'i 'jig rten du// rnam dag dkyil 'khor nyid
206a1(rgyud): kyis gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor ma thams cad gar dang bcas pa'i phyag pad+mo'i sor mo'i mang ba makun tu 'brel ba rdo rje'i thal mo dang / gar rnam par 'gyur ba
206a2(rgyud): brjid pag tu bcas pas 'grol zhing ma mchu tshems kyis mnan nas chu skyes sar pa'i mdab ma bzhin gzigs par bshad pa/ glu'i phyag rgyas dbyangs len pa dang / gcig la gcig bskul ba dang / bdag
206a3(rgyud): nyid kyi dpung pa la 'degs shing g.yas dang g.yon pa'i rnam par gnon pa'i tshul gyis// oM hUM a la la la ho// kun tu snang zhing mi chags par// mi chags pa'i bde mchog gis// bdag gi rnal 'byor
206a4(rgyud): gzungs kyi rnams// stobs shing bde ba sbyin mdzad pas// a la la la ho// bsam gyis mi khyab na mkha'i rang bzhin te/ 8/ bzhengs shing gzhan la stobs la grub par mdzod// chags pa
206a5(rgyud): mi gos dngos po yi// bde ba kun la reg par mdzad cing dgongs/ su gsol// de nas kun tu bzang po shin tu dgyes pa chen po rdo rje'i bdag po de kho na nyid kyi dbyangs chen pos bskul bas
206a6(rgyud): thugs sad par gyur te/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po kun tu longs spyod pa rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs
206a7(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i gar sna tshogs shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rnam par gnon par gar mdzad// shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje'i dbyangs kyi mgur len// rdo rje rnam par rol pa chen pos rnam par rol/ 
206a8(rgyud): shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje bzhad pa chen pos bzhad cing nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i zla ba'i thig le'i dkyil na/ oM ma hA su kha hUM zhes brjod nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
206b1(rgyud): mo ye shes dbyings phyag ma byung ngo // steng du nagam ldan pa yin// gnyis pa yi ge ma lta bu// mtshan du thig le ldan byas pa// ye shes gsar bar rnal 'byor ma'o// a li ka li 'dren bya ba// dbus / 
206b2(rgyud): ri mo brtag byas te// de yi mgo dang mjug dag tu// khro bo gnyis po mchog bsam bya// 'di ni btsun mo'i rab gsal ba// dkyil 'khor rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'o// 'di ni dran pa tsam gyis kyang // bsod
206b3(rgyud): nams kun gyis byin rlob 'gyur// a li gnyis dbus ri mor bri// ldan pa 'dren pa yang dag ldan// de steng zla gam thig le dga'// mgo mjug gnyisu gzhan yang tra// 'di ni don dam gsal ba ste/ 
206b4(rgyud): rin chen rnal 'byor ma dbang sbyin// dran pas bsod nams 'thob 'gyur te// sdig pa rnams kyang 'jig par byed// a li ga nyis dang ldan byas te// tsheg drag yi ge gnyisu bshad// 'di ni
206b5(rgyud): rab dga' kun tu chags// chu srin ma zhes bstan pa yin// dang po bskal pa chen po yi// tsheg drag po dang bcas pa gzhan// sangs rgyas kun gyi a li 'di// sangs rgyas byang chub
206b6(rgyud): rab sbyin byed// bdag nyid la 'am yang na gzhan// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste// bsgrub bya'i dkyil 'khor grub byed na// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// 'di ni dkyil 'khor rnams kyi mchog/ 
206b7(rgyud): gi'i phyag rgya'i mngon gnas pa'i// 'dzin pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba// bris pa yis kyang khyad par 'gyur// e ma'o bde ba ye shes che// de yi ye shes tshe 'di la// 'dod byed bde ba bsten byed cing // 
206b8(rgyud): yi tshul gyis thob par 'gyur// khams gsum mchog gi dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'di las rgya che mchog gzhan med// sgrub pa po yi sems can kun// tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas 'grub// zla gsang thig le
207a1(rgyud): gsang ba'i rgyal po chen po shin tu dgyes pa rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po rgyas pa mchog tu gsang ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje btsun mo
207a2(rgyud): rnams kyi gsang ba chen po rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug chen po rnams kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor te dang po rdzog so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
207a3(rgyud): mtshar du gyur te/ dgyes pa'i yid bde ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid dga' ba bskyed nas/ gar dang shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje bzhad pa mdzad cing yang shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba gnyi su med pa'i ye shes
207a4(rgyud): rdo rje zhes bya ba 'du ba mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs par gyur to// bde byed chen po bshad pa shod// bde ba chen po bshad pa shod// gsang ba chen po bshad pa shod// dgyes
207a5(rgyud): pa chen po bshad pa shod// khyod las 'dod chags yang dag 'byung // / khyod las zhe sdang chen po ste// khyod las bde byed sdug bsnga la dang // khyod las khams gsum thams cad 'byung // khyod
207a6(rgyud): las skyes pa ma ning dang // khyod las 'dod gzir bud med dang // khyod los 'dod las rnam grol dang // khyod las byang chub bla med 'byung // khyod las na mkha' rlung dag dang // khyod las gzi brjid ma yi khams
207a7(rgyud): khyod las de bzhin chu dang sa// khyod las spyod dang mi spyod kun// khyod las sangs rgyas dpa' chen po// yang nas yang du 'byung bar 'gyur// khyod las chos dang dge 'dun dang // khyod las pha rol phyin pa'i tshogs// 
207a8(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' dpa' chen dang // re dang skye bo thams cad 'byung // khyod las rdo rje sems dpa' dang // khyod las dri med pad+mo dang // khyod las rin chen tshad med che// de bzhin rdo rje sna tshogs 'byung // khyod/ 
207b1(rgyud): las phyag rgya sngags kyi rnams// khyod las rig pasnyeng las 'byung // de nas bcom ldan 'das sun mi 'dzums par smin ma brgyang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'apha rol tu
207b2(rgyud): byin pa la sogs pa chen po dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje na mkha' la 'gro ba dang / namakha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / gzhan yang lha dang / 
207b3(rgyud): dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lA ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa kun 'dus pa thams cad la skad cig skad cig tu kun tu gzigs nas brjid pa dang / 
207b4(rgyud): bcas pa'i phyag 'jam pos/ nyid kyi snying ka'i rdo rje gsor zhing nyid kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rdo rje su chags pa rab tu rgyas pa che/ na po'i lta bas 'khor thams cad zil gyis mnan te/ nyid kyi
207b5(rgyud): thugs pad+mo zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yi ge'i thig le'i dkyil nas phyu nga ste kun tu snang bar byin gyis brlabs nas/ shin tu dgye sa gdon mi za ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen
207b6(rgyud): po 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // dang po'i yi ge bcu gsum pa// thig ler bcas pa bsam byas te// bde chen tshul bzhin bzhag byas la// gzhan gyis mi phyed thig ler
207b7(rgyud): bcas// yi ge drug pa 'dren pa ru// tshul bzhin 'og tu yongasu brtag/ 'di ni gsang ba chen po ste// rmad byung yi ge'i phyag rgya'o// bde chen bde bar bskyed pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas kun gyis bsgrags/ 
207b8(rgyud): pa yin// ye shes kyi ni phyag rgya 'dis// skad cig snying pos rgyas btab na// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi 'chad pa po// ston pa rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur// bde ba chen po bskul byed pa'i// sangs rgyas rnam
208a1(rgyud): kyis rtogs par byed// yi ge ye shes grub pa yis// ye shes dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur// 'phrul gyi mig dang shes rab che// mi shes sdig pa 'joms par byed// rdo rje sem
208a2(rgyud): dpa' nyid 'dra bar// tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur// bde ba chen po reg pa che// sdug bsngal 'dod pa 'joms byed pa'o// shes rab ye shes dngos grub che// byang chub myur du 'thob 'gyur te// rig ma
208a3(rgyud): 'bum phrag brgyas bskor cing // sems dpa' chen po de dang rtsen// rdo rje pad+mo mnyam sbyor bas// thal mo brkyang ste rol pa yis// tshe dang lang tsho skal dang ldan// dran pa tsam gyis 'thob par 'gyur// 'dod pa
208a4(rgyud): yis ni dgos pa'i rnams// myur ba nyid du 'grub par 'gyur// / 'og dang steng gi na mkha' la// bdag 'dod bzhin du 'gro 'ong byed// sa yang rnam par phug nas su// stobs chen de 'dir
208a5(rgyud): 'ong bar byed// sangs rgyas kun la gnod byed de// byang chub pa ra ni gdon mi bya// bde ba chen po'i rnam mdzad pas// gan ma zhing de bzhin myang ba yi// rdo rje blo yis bdud kyi rnams// rnam
208a6(rgyud): par 'gyur bas thams cad bsgral// bde ba chen po gtong ba yis// skad cig nyid du gsol bar bya// grub pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa che// dpa' bo chen pos dgug par bya// rnal 'byor ma rnams ci 'dod par// rnam gnon
208a7(rgyud): tshul gyis gnon par bya// dbang po nye dbang dbang chen po// gnod byed stobs kyis dgon gnas par// rab tu rnam 'joms gnon pa yis// gzhom pa'i tshul gyis bsgral ba bya// mtshon cha lnga yis rnams gnon pa/ 
208a8(rgyud): gzhan gyi bud med brtson par bya// kye ma'o bde ba bde gnas pa'i// sems can chen pos grol byas te// byang chub sems ni bde 'byung bas// sems dpa' bdag nyid mchod par bya// dam tshig rje su ldan pa
208b1(rgyud): yis// rnal 'byor rtag pa'i ngo bor 'gyur// skad cig mtho ras 'gro bar byed// rdo rje'i shugs kyis thams cad du// sems can skad cig 'di ru'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi gan su 'gyur// sems can rnams pa/ 
208b2(rgyud): grags chen po// thams cad kyi ni rigs rnams dang // pha rol phyin rnams skye gnas te// de bzhin rigs dang pha rol phyin// de dag 'di la rab tu gnas// dbang por gyur pa brtan chen po// yon tan tshogs ni
208b3(rgyud): nam mkha' bzhin// de nyid dngos po thams cad la// thams cad dus gsum mnyam gnas te// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu bde// sems dpa' thog ma tha med yin// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i
208b4(rgyud): shin tu bde ba chen po'i rdo rje chos kyi yi ge zhes bya ba yi ge chen po 'i phyag rgya'i ye shes// bcu gsum gyi ni yi ge che// ye she sa thig le ldan pa ste// rdo rje yid 'byung lhags pa yi// ha lar
208b5(rgyud): sngags dbu bskor bya// 'di ni yid las skyes pa ste// shin tu gyes che mdzes pa yis// yi ge'i phyag rgya phyag rgya che/ gtso bo'i spyan sngar gnas pa yi// gsang ba'i snying gi
208b6(rgyud): pad+mol// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// da ni de ma thag nyid du// shin tu dgyes pa'i mnyes par 'gyur// gtso chen rdo rje sems dpa' la// de yi bde bas mnyes byas te// dbang po yi ni sbyor ba sri/ 
208b7(rgyud): de dang rol pas myur du 'grub// de gnyis phan tshun dgyes pa las// shin tu dgyes pa'i gzhir gyur te// rig 'dzin mchog gi gzugs ldan dang // lha mi kun gyis mchod par 'gyur// de dang lhan cig rol pa
208b8(rgyud): na/ lha chen tshangs pa gtogs 'dod rnams// phyag rgya sbyor ba'i tshul gnas pa'i// bdag nyid che la phyag byed pa'o// nyes gsum dri ma spangs pa yi// shin tu sbyor ba'i rgyas btab pa// sems can gar ni byed
209a1(rgyud): pa dang // sems dpa' chel mnyes par byed// de nis dang na mkha' la// bde bar gnas shing 'gro bar byed// sna tshogs lha mo bde che ba'i// sna tshogs bde bas nyer spyod do// phyag
209a2(rgyud): rgya'i gar gyis gar mdzad cing // sems can myur du rtogs par byed// ral grir gyur pa gzi chen po// na mkha' kun tu phan tshun 'gro/ lha mo 'phrul gyi 'gro ba dang // lha min klu yi bu mo dang // gzhan yang
209a3(rgyud): 'phrul ldan mi bu mo// de yis bud med kun bsgrub bya// phyag rgya'i ye shes rab gnas pas// de nyid kun tu 'gro byed de// ji tsam 'dod par dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje sems dpa' che gnaso// sangs rgyas
209a4(rgyud): thams cad myur du 'grub// thams cad chos ni bde chen po// dge 'dun chags med thams cad rnams// de dag thams/ cad de yin no// dbang po nye dbang dbang chen gyi// thogs med
209a5(rgyud): stobs kyis bkug nas su// rdo rje sems dpa' thabs gan/ pas// gzhan gyi bud med brtsen par byed// de la sogs ba mtha' yas pa// phyag rgya ye shes bsgrub bya ste// skad cis
209a6(rgyud): skad cig bsten pa yi// bdag gi sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur// gnyis med sbyor ba 'di yis ni// de ni dngos grub kun 'gyur te// bdag med nga rgyal med 'gyur te// snang ba med cing yi ge med// shin
209a7(rgyud): tu dgyes pa chen po'i yid dang rjesu 'thun par mdzad ma'i yi ge'i phyag rgya'i ye sheso// // lha mo rdo rje kI li ni/ dang por oM gyis rnam rgyan pa// bgegs mthar byed dang ldan pa ni// dbang mchog
209a8(rgyud): sbyin par mdzad ma ste// nga yis bud med snying kha ru// bdag nyid kyis ni byin rlabs te// dbang po gnyis ni sbyor ba yis// mkhas pas tshul bzhin bsgom par bya// de nas rnal 'byor chen po de/ 
209b1(rgyud): rnal 'byor dbang phyug byin rlabs pas// nam pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag tu// mdzes pa'i spyan dang rol cing 'gro// bdag gam 'on te gzhan dag la// phyag rgyad de yis rgyas btab te// rdo rje pad+mo
209b2(rgyud): ba yis// sgrub pa pos ni myur du sgrub// pad+mo rnam par phye byas te// phyag rgya sbyor bas rol pa yi// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na// 'gro dang 'ong ba gdon mi za// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i tshul gyis su// 
209b3(rgyud): lag pa'i phyag rgya bzung byas te// sbyor ba chen po sgom byas na// de ma thag du na mkhar 'gro/ bdag nyid gan rgyal gnas byas te// nyid kyi steng du phyag rgya bzhag/ nyid kyis byin rlabs phyag rgya la/ 
209b4(rgyud): sngags pas tshul bzhin bskyod par bya// g.yas dang g.yon gyi glo dag tu// dgyes dang 'dza' ba gnyis bzhugs par// mi g.yeng phyag rgya bzhag byas te// bdag nyid shin tu dgyes pa
209b5(rgyud): sgom// 'di yis dngos grub 'thob 'gyur te// 'di dag lhan cig/ 'grogs pa yis// gzungs ma kun gyi dkyil 'khor du / sangs rgyas la sogs thams cad 'gyur// 'di dang lhan cig/ 
209b6(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// nam mkha' bdag po sangs rgyas bzhin// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin rlabs pas// de ni sangs rgyas ngo bor 'gyur// dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas// nub gcig bdud rtsi dbyung byas te/ 
209b7(rgyud): gzungs ma'i phyag rgya la brten nas// rmad 'byung nyid ni 'thob ces bshad// mtshan gyi mtha' dang nyin gyi mtha'// dang por gnyi ga 'dug byas na// sngags kyi dbyings phyug gar 'gro ba// de dang lhan cig/ 
209b8(rgyud): dngos grub 'gro/ phyed dam yang nam phyed na// rig ma'i dbyingasu reg bya zhing // myur bas khros pa'i sgra sgrogs pas// gyad kyi 'gyed pas brtsam par bya// bgye ba'i mjug du de ma thag/ 'o ma mchog ni btung
210a1(rgyud): byas na// de nas de ni rdo rje 'grub// blags dkyil du 'gro bar byed// bya ba de bzhin bzlog pa dang // ci bde brten pa byas pa las// byang chub sems ni 'char ma thag/ 'phrog ma
210a2(rgyud): yi ni dngos grub bo// 'di yis rin chen gtsug nyid du// mi g.yeng mtshan mo byas 'gyur na// sangs rgyas dngos grub 'phrog byed do// sangs rgyas dngos grub nyid kyis 'thob// 'di yis snying kha'i zla
210a3(rgyud): gsang la// thig le nyid du brtag byas nas// de ni de ma thag tu yang // zla gsang thig le'i mchog 'drar 'gyur// 'di yis reg pa tsam gyis kyang // dngos grub gang dga' thob byed de// rdo rje'i phyag rgya gzi
210a4(rgyud): chen po// rgyal po 'di ni rnam par rgyu// 'di ni sgrub pa'i dus su yang // rnam par rtog pa yong mi bya// rtag tu mi rtog 'gyur/ dab yis// nan tan gyis ni bsgrub par bya// sdug bsngal ba
210a5(rgyud): yi sems can la// sbyin pa bzhin rtag tu sbyin// de la bde ba sbyin byas te// mi snyan nam yang sbyin mi bya// shin tu dgyes pa'i sems ma chen mo dpe med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rjeni
210a6(rgyud): li kI li shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen po 'thob par byed pa'o// thog ma oM ste 'ja' chen po// rdo rje shin tu dgyes dang 'brel// 'di ni 'dod chags thams cad la// 'dod chags bde byed snyoms par
210a7(rgyud): 'thob/ rol pa'i sbyor bas bud med la// 'di ni rtag tu mnyes par bya// 'di yis 'gro ba gsum dag tu// dngos grub myur du 'thob par byed// pad+mo kha phye rgyas pa'i spyan// sngags mkhan de ni skad
210a8(rgyud): cig 'gyur// gtso bo yi ni bde mchog gis// a li ka li mnyam sbyor bya// spros pa'i phyag rgya rgyas btab ste// skad cig skad cig spyad par bya// dus dag tu ni reg pa dang // gtsug pa yang ni rtag tu bya/ 
210b1(rgyud): bskyod dang mnyes pa de bzhin du// mnyam du 'grogs pa'i cho ga bya// bskyed pa dang ni sbyang ba dang // skad cig skad cig bsnyen par bya// gar dang kun nas bskor ba dang // 'jib dang de bzhin btung ba dang / 
210b2(rgyud): the tsom med pa'i sems kyis ni// dam tshig dang ni bsgrub par bya// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// mi g.yo tsher ni dngos grub ste// sangs rgyas byang chub dngos grub dang // bskal par gnas pa smos ci
210b3(rgyud): dgos// 'di ni dngos grub 'thob ma thag/ pad+mo 'dzin pa'i rjes 'gyur te// lag na pad+mo 'bar khyer bzhin// blo ldan mi g.yeng bskal par gnas// brjid pas dpal dgyes lhan cig tu// bde ldan zhing
210b4(rgyud): du 'gro 'gyur te// rnal 'byor chen po der phyin nas// bde da ldan gyi mchog gtso bo yi// pad+mo'i gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// de ni bde bar gnas par 'gyur// bde ldan rtag tu
210b5(rgyud): 'grogs 'gyur ba// dngos grub ye shes bde myong 'gyur// yi ge yi ni phyag rgya 'dis// pad+mo las skyes gzungs bzung ste// byin gyis brlabs nas bde myangs na// pad+mo bde ba'i bdag
210b6(rgyud): por 'gyur// gzhan gyi bud med bdag nyid kyis// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab te// bsten byas 'dod pa'i gzugs nyid du// sngags mkhan 'gyur ba gdon mi za// sdug cing la sogs rgyan pa yi// 
210b7(rgyud): nyi ma'i 'od zer sar byung bzhin// dri med yangs pa'i lta ba yis// pad+mo sems dpa'i tshe 'grub po// ji tsam na mkhar nye bar ni// dpa' bo chen po 'phur byed de// rig ma 'bum phrag brgya tshogs kyi// lnga
210b8(rgyud): mo yis ni mchod pa byed// sangs rgyas sras dang bcas kun gyis// sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag nyid mchod// 'khor ba nyid na gnas pa'i tshe// 'khor ba'i dri mas mi go so// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab
211a1(rgyud): na// rtag tu nyon mongs dag 'gyur te// sman gyis phye ma sbyor ba yis// sbrul ni gsod par gyur pa bzhin// zla gsang thig le'i dga' byed 'di // tshe 'di nyid la 'thob 'gyur te// 'di yis/ 
211a2(rgyud): mthu yi ngo bos yis// dgos pa thams cad dngos grub bo// gang 'dod dngos grub don yod pa// 'khor ba 'di dang pha rol gyi// mthu chen phyag rgya 'di nyid kyis// dran pa tsam gyi dadangos grub// shin tu dgyes
211a3(rgyud): pa pad+mo phreng ba zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya ye sheso// dang por oM dang yang dag ldan// tha mar bsgyings pa'i hU~M nyid de// dbus su rab dgyes rdo rje bzhag/ yi ge 'di ni rmang 'byung ba'o// phyag rgya 'di yi rgyas btab
211a4(rgyud): sdig pa skad cig med par 'gyur// khams gsum 'di na dngos grub che// dpal gyi bsgyings po 'thob par 'gyur// bdud dang bdud las rjes 'jug pa// mi thogs par ni rgyal byed de// sna
211a5(rgyud): tshogs rdo rje mnyam sbyor bas// de yis khams gsum 'phro ga par byed// bdag gi mthu yis rnam rgyal te// de yi kha mas gsum longs spyod do// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste// 
211a6(rgyud): pad+mo rdo rje rab ldan bya// phreng byed phreng ba'i tshul gyis su// phreng ba bskums te 'dzin pa bzhin// 'di yis byin gyis brlabs byas te// bsnyen na myur du dngos grub po// g.yas dang g.yon gyi smin bsgyur
211a7(rgyud): bas// chu skyes can ni sbyar byas te// phyag rgyas btab ste rol byas na// bla ma'i dngos grub thob par byed// rdo rje rnal 'byor nye ba yis// rdo rje bdag nyid mchod byed de// de dag kun gyis bskor byas/ 
211a8(rgyud): nas/ dkyil 'khor du ni dbang bskur ro// rdo rje sems dpa' dpa' bo yis// 'jigs shing skrag pas byin byed pa// rang nyid kyis ni phyag rgya'i gzungs// nyid kyi dngos grub stobs par byed// gzhan ni sa
211b1(rgyud): dag pa rol phyin// sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan rgyun// de yang de la 'jigs smag nas// rang gi dgyes mchog stobs par byed// bdag nyid chen po dmigs gsum dang // che ba'i pha ni ngo bzhi dag// 
211b2(rgyud): 'dzin dang gtogs rnams dang // rang gi sdug pa stobs par byed// gshin rje sha ka rgyal po yang // rdo rje 'dzin rje dngos grub la// 'ongs nas bdag gi sdug pa'i rnams// srog gi phyir yang bstobs par byed/ 
211b3(rgyud): gzhan gyi 'phrul gyi lus kyi rnams// khams gsum lam la gnas pa dag/ myur du nye bar 'ongs nas kyang // bdag nyid dngos grub sbyin par byed// sna tshogs gnyen ni rgyal po che// dbang phyug dam pa sna tshog
211b4(rgyud): byed// de yang nyer 'ongs gtsug gtugs te// rnal 'byor sna tsho gas ma sbyin byed// gnod sbyin srin po'i gzugs la sogs// sha za yi dgas bu mo rnams// sbyor ldan phyag rgya blangs byas te/ 
211b5(rgyud): brtag pa mchog gis brtag par bya// thams cad las byedade/ ge ba yis// 'di yis dngos grub myur du 'grub// lhad/ ngak+Sha yi bu mo dang // lha min lha yi mngal skyes pa// phyag rgya
211b6(rgyud): 'di yis byin rlabs na// grub pa myur du dngos grub bo// gzugs bzang yang na ngan yang rung // gang de bud med gzung byas pa// rim pa 'di yi tshul gyis su// phyag rgya'i sbyor ba rtag par bya// 'di yis
211b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad dang // de bzhin dpa' bo kun nyid du// skad cig skad cig rgyas btab pas// tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur// shin tu dgyes pa chen po sna tshogs dpe med pa'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i
211b8(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// // nga ro bcu gsum steng nyid du// de bzhin thig le'i rgyal po ste// rab dgyes rdo rje lha che bde// mtha' ni yi ge hi sbyor ba'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bde chen spyan ni
212a1(rgyud): dga' byed yin// phyag rgya'i yi ge 'di yis ni// mkhas pas byin gyis brlabs byas nas// des ni de ma thag tu yang // bla med 'phrul gyis spyan du 'gyur// stong nyid ye shes
212a2(rgyud): gnas pa yi// sangs rgyas shin tu phra ba mthong // smin ma rnams bsgyur rgyas pa yis// lta ba'i phyag rgyas gar byed cing // 'gugs byed sangs rgyas thams cad dang // dpa' bo rdo rje kun 'dzin dang / 
212a3(rgyud): pha rol phyin pa thams cad dang // de bzhin gzungs ma'i tshogs dang // rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' 'gro dang // phyi dang nang gi tshogs rnams dang // lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo// lha min dngos grub lus kyi mchog
212a4(rgyud): grul bum ma'am yi dgas sam// sha za 'phrul gyi mi bu mo// 'di ni snying khar bzhag pa yis// rdo rje 'dzin du bdag nyid 'gyur// sangs rgyas yang na nyi ma dang // pad+mo dra ba sna tshogs blo/ 
212a5(rgyud): lha dang lha min mi dag dang // gzhan yang gnod sbyin srin po dang // bdud dang bdud kyi tshogs rnams kyi// gzhan gyis 'dra/ ga par yong mi nus// lha dang lha min gyis mchod cing // dngos
212a6(rgyud): grub khams gsum 'gro bar byed// lha dang lha min rten byed cing // skad cig nyid du 'gro bar byed// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mkhyen pa'i yul// sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhing kun tu// rig pa'i rigs ni brgya da/ 
212a7(rgyud): dang / de ni rtsen cing 'gro bar byed// 'jigs med yan lag kun spangs pa// thog ma tha ma med 'gyur te// sangs rgyas rnams kyis mkhyen sbyor bas// dgyes pa'i rmad mchog gcig tu 'gyur// rdo rje'i nang
212a8(rgyud): na rdo rjer 'gyur// rin chen nang na rin chen 'gyur// pad+mo'i nang na pad+mor 'gyur// sna tshogs nang na sna tshogs mchog/ de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ mnyam dang mi mnyam chos kyi dbyings// phyag
212b1(rgyud): rgya'i ye shes byin rlabs pas// dam pa sna tshogs nyid du 'gyur// gzugs mi sdug pa gzugs mchog 'gyur// mig med pa yang mig ldan 'gyur// rna 'on pa yang sgra thos te// glen pa yang ni yid rjor/ 
212b2(rgyud): 'gyur// de la sogs pa dpag med pa// mig gi phyag rgyas btab par 'gyur// de yi lus la yonan ni// yon tan dam pa mdangs cher 'gyur// ji tsam de ni na mkha'i mthongs// 'phur zhing 'og tu 'bab
212b3(rgyud): par byed// de ni ri yang phug nas 'gro/ sa dang sa yi 'og tu ni// sna tshogs rdzu 'phrul rnams byed pas// de ni skad cig 'gro bar byed// sna tshogs mkha' gro'i dkyil 'khor du// sngags mkhan 'gying bar gar/ 
212b4(rgyud): byed pa// bde ba chen po bskyed pa yis// sems can de ni 'jugadar byed// mi g.yeng lta ba'i bsgyur ba yis// las rnams thams cad de yis byed// 'degs pa dang ni lta ba yis// gar
212b5(rgyud): dang rnam par bskor ba dang // 'gro ba thams cad 'bab byed de// ri dang sems can thams cad la// smra ba dang ni sgra 'byin dang /  ga ba ni ga par byed/ sdug pa'i stabs srog chag rnams/ brdeg pa dang ni bsgral ba
212b6(rgyud): byed// gtum dang gdug 'jigs che ba dang // khro bo'i lta bas bsgral bar byed// shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje spyan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad 'grub par byed pa'i yi ge'i phyag rgya ye
212b7(rgyud): kyi mthu chen po'o// / dang po oM gyis rnam par brgyan// tha mar 'brug gi sgra 'byin pa// rdo rje rab tu dgyes pa'i sku// bde ba skyed byed bshad pa yin// phyag rgya 'di ni phyag rgya che// sangs rgyas rdo rje
212b8(rgyud): dpa' bo yi// gang gis 'di ni bsgoms ma thag/ rdo rje gsum gyis byin rlob 'gyur// bdag gam yang na gzhan yang rung // 'di yis nyid kyi snying kha ru// bsgoms te gnyis med sbyor byas na// sangs rgyas
213a1(rgyud): / sku ni rab tu 'grub// bsgrubs nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bud med kun dang rtsen byed de// a li ka li mnyam sbyor bas// sems can dman yang dngos grub bo// shin tuskal ldan thas/ 
213a2(rgyud): cad dang // sangs rgyas skal ldan 'thob 'gyur te// skal dang ldan pa thams cad kyi// chu skyes zhabs la bsnyen par byed// lha dang lha min bu mo de'i// rig mas mthong na dga' byed de// phyag rgya'i ye shes/ 
213a3(rgyud): rgyan pa yi// sna tshogs 'dod pa'i gzugasu 'gyur// spyod dang mi spyod mi dag dang // lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // mi 'am ci dang skyes bu yi// dngos grub pas ni 'phrog mi nus// de la sogs pas stong
213a4(rgyud): byed de// 'jigs par 'gyur ba'i sems kyis ni// bla ma bzhi na du mchod byed cing // kun gyis bstod mchod sti stang byed// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ nam mkha' mtha' klas lha
213a5(rgyud): rnams dang // nyi ma bcu yi 'od zer bzhin// rnal 'byor chen/ po 'grub pa 'gro/ sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing kun tu// 'o// da kyis thams cad mnyes byed cing // sangs rgyas byang chub sem
213a6(rgyud): dpa' rnams// zil gyis mnan te gnas par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid la// sras rnams 'dud cing phyag byed de// lha dang lha min grul bum dang // tshangs pa gtogs 'dod lha chen po/ 
213a7(rgyud): phyag rgya'i ye shes byin rlabs der// 'jigs shing skrag pas 'ong bar byed// bcom ldan dngos grub bka' stsal stsol// ji ltar thugs la dgongs pa bzhin// spyi bos bka' blang gdul dka' rnams/ 
213a8(rgyud): de dag thams cad sgrub par byed// mdor bsdus rnam pa bzhi po yi// dam pa rnams kyang bskyang bar bgyi// zla gsang thig le'i mchog nyid kyi// dbang bskur ba yang blang bgyi ste// rigs lnga rnams kyi
213b1(rgyud): rlom pa nying // rnam pa pan pa thams pad bang // mu skyes ngos grub myong nabs drung // 'tshoba'i bar du bdag cag 'dangs// byang gyi spya sa na 'tha~Mng du// cing kyi zhes ni bga'ad dang // phyag rgya sesang+yas
213b2(rgyud): btab na// spyod bcas mi stong dga' byed de// rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams kyi mchog/ shin tu bde dang mdza' ba myong // rdo rje shin tu dkyis pa'i sku chen mo bde ba pe med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i ting
213b3(rgyud): 'dzin to// dang po oM snying thig le ste// gzhan gyis mi phyed khros bcas pas// gnyis kyi dbusu bzhag pa ni// gsung gi rdo rje shin tu dgyes// bde gsung sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// ma
213b4(rgyud): tu ron myong byed ga/ dam chos sgra yis gang byas pa'i// gas ring gas la rna ba dga' bar byed// yi ge'i phyag rgya chen po da// byang chub chen por grub byed de// yon tan yon tan sdug
213b5(rgyud): mtho ba'i// tshad med yon tan 'dzin pa'o// dpal ldan bya ga rgya 'dis btab na// dpal kun bdag po de ma thag/ bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin spangs pa// sangs rgyas kun gying/ 
213b6(rgyud): nyid 'thob// phyag rgya 'di yis bdag gam gzhan// rgyas btab 'dod pa spyad byas na// dngos grub rmad du byung ba yi// de yis myur du 'thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// sgrub pa po yi bka
213b7(rgyud): nyan te// ci ste rmongs pas 'da' byed na// de yi srog ni tha ma yin// de yis srung ba byas na dpal// tshe dang lang tsho bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje gsung gis bstan pa bzhin// gdon mi za bar 'thob par 'gyur// 
213b8(rgyud): phyag rgya ye shes rjes bsdus pas// sgrub pa mi byed cung zad med// bdag nyid thams cad sprul pa ni// mchog gi ye shes dngos grub 'gyur// phyag rgya'i ye shes byin rlabs la// sangs rgyas byang chub
214a1(rgyud): mi ldog dang // chos dbyings mi mnyam rab klas pa// dngos grub bdag nyid gshegs nas kyang // shin tu 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// sems dpa' chen po de khrid do// rang gi/ 
214a2(rgyud): ting 'dzin ldang ba'i tshe// dam tshig mchog tu bsrung bya ba// ji snyed na mkha'i dkyil 'khor du// 'dod pa thams cad de spyod do// rnal 'byor chen po mi 'da' zhing // ngan song gsum yang mi 'gro byed// de
214a3(rgyud): ni chung zad 'og sdug bsngal// 'gro ba thams cad myong mi 'gyur// rdo rje gsum de rmad 'byung bas// sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags byed do// bag chag mtshams sbyor rnam grol bas// na mkha'i rim par
214a4(rgyud): 'gro 'ong byed// lho yis rtag tu mchod byed de// mchod par byas pas shin tu mchod// sems dpa' chen po 'gro dug kyang // bde byed kun gyis bdag nyid dge/ gnas dang zas
214a5(rgyud): dang btung la sogs// na mkha' las ni skad cig rnyed// bud/ med rin chen mchog mkha' las// bsam pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// las kyi dbyings ma ma lus pa/ 
214a6(rgyud): de yis khams gsum thob par byed// rnal 'byor sbyor ba dngos grub kyi// rnal 'byor grub chen 'phrog par 'gyur// 'di las brtul zhugs drag pa med// dka' thub 'di dang 'dra med do// bud med
214a7(rgyud): mchog tu bde ba las// 'dod pa'i legs spyod spyad pas 'grub// dge ba'i pad+mo'i rigs kun tu// sems dpa' chen po ngag dbang 'gyur// gzugs ma kun gyi bde chen po// rgyal po chen por de 'gyur// 
214a8(rgyud): gsung thams cad kyi rdo rje dpe med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde chen pa thos par byed pa khams gsum kun tu snang bar grags pa pad+mo'i rigs kyi tshogs zhal gyi gsung gis dgongs
214b1(rgyud): pa thams cad 'grub par byed pa'o// oM bcas mi byed tha mar ste// rab tu sems ni bdeb ste/ rdo rje ba gyes pade byed de/ dbusu ming ni sbyar bar bya// phyag rgya 'di yis dngos grub che// byang chub sems ni rab bsgrubs
214b2(rgyud): pa/ 'di yis byin gyis brlabs ma thag/ bdud rtsi'i mchog ni chud par 'gyur// thams cad 'dod pa ldan byas na// de ste thams cad sems kyang rung // bde ba chen pos sems thams cad// sngags
214b3(rgyud): mkhan reg pa'i rgyas btab na// 'di yis rdo rje 'dzin nyid dang // rdo rje dpa' bo nyid du yang // lha mo'i phyag rgyas byin rlabs pa// skad cig tu ni 'thob par 'gyur// lha mo rnams dang gar byed cing // de ni na
214b4(rgyud): dgyes bdag po khrid// pho brang dga' byed rab dgyes che// tu chen po bde 'thob tu// seng ge'i gdan rab 'jog byed do// bzhi dang bzhi yi mchog nyid kyi// rdo rje pad+mo sbyor ba yis// de ni
214b5(rgyud): khrid nas dbang bskur ro// de nas rdzogs sangs tshe dpag med// byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus che// yod dang med pa 'i 'dod spangs pa// de la phyag ni byed par 'gyur// rdo rje sems
214b6(rgyud): mchog 'jog byed de// rang gi spyad pa'i tshul gyis ni// pha rol phyin pa thams cad dang // sangs rgyas kun gyis mdun du bskor// sa gsum thams cad kun tu ni// sems dpa' chen pos ston byed pa// 
214b7(rgyud): res 'ga' shin tu dga' spyod pa// res dga' khab nas 'byung ba dang // res 'ga' byang chub res 'ga' lhums// ris dga' skye dang res dga' 'pho// res dga' spyod chen rol pa dang // res 'ga'
214b8(rgyud): bdud las rgyal bar mdzad// res 'ga' byang chub mngon byang chub// res 'ga' 'khor lo bskor mdzad de// res 'ga' sna tshogs 'jug par mdzad// res dga' dus su shin tu mdzes// res 'ga'
215a1(rgyud): bud med skyes pa dang // res 'ga' lha dang skye dgu'i bdag/ res 'ga' 'dod dbang rgyal po ste// res 'ga' 'dod la rgyal gyis phyogs// res 'ga' zhi la res 'ga' drag/ res
215a2(rgyud): 'ga' gdon chen bgegs mdzad de// de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pa// ci dgar dngos grub 'dod pa la// bdag gis ngo bor ston par byed// mi phyed cho ga sbyor ba yis// 
215a3(rgyud): 'dren pa mi phyed nye byas te// phan tshun reg pa chen po yis// rdo rje can gyis de 'bigs te// gzungs ma mang po tshogs kyi rnams// bde byed chen po gzhan ci smos// spyod bcas mi spyod bde dam pa// 
215a4(rgyud): 'bad pa mi dgos 'thob par 'gyur// brjid pas byang chub snying po ru// rtag pa ru ni gnas 'gyur te// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// sbyor ba rjes sdud ldan paso// thams cad cha ni rnam
215a5(rgyud): bral ba// byang chub sems ni mchog bzhin du// yi ge 'dis ni/ sbyor ba yis// bdag nyid chen por de 'gyur ro// rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po tshim pa'i yid la skyes pa dpe med pa dang / 
215a6(rgyud): ldan pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya ste// las thams cad grub par byed pa'o// / dang por oM ni sbyor ba ste// tha mar gnyis po rdzo rje'i sgra// rab gyes rdo rje byin rlabs pa'i// lha mo dngar byed dbus
215a7(rgyud): bzhag/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rab dgyes thob pa rmongs byed ma// rdo rje ye shes thugs gnas pa// dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par byed// sngags mkhan yi ge phyag rgya 'dis// bdag gam
215a8(rgyud): gzhan la rgyas btab ste// rdo rje 'dab skyes bcug byas na// de nas de myur dngos grub bo// thams cad las byed dpal dang ldan// tshe dang lang tsho skal ldan pa'i// rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra 'thob ste// rdo rje sems
215b1(rgyud): dpa' rab tu 'grub// sangs rgyas rnams dang dpa' bo yi// sangs rgyas kun dang rtson byed cing // sde dbang rnams dang lha rnams kyi// 'phrul gyis bud med 'phrog byed do// rdo rje rab tu dgyes pa chen po dngar
215b2(rgyud): byed kun tu myang ba me tog gi rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa zhe bya ba'i phyag rgya ste// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba las thams cad byed pa chen mo gdon mi za ba'i gzhan gyis mi phyed ma'o// / 
215b3(rgyud): tshangs pa'i gsungs gi nga ror bcas// tha mar dril bu'i nga ro gnyis// dbus su ming gi phreng ba ste// yi ge 'di ni chu 'dzin mchog/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yid kyi dngos grub 'thob byed de// 
215b4(rgyud): 'dod pa yid ni thams cad rnams// yi ge skad cig 'grub paradabyed// 'di yis rgyas btab bud med rnams// bdag rang gi slob ma'ang rung // de nyid sbyor bas bsten byas na/ 
215b5(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin dpal 'dra bar 'gyur// rnal 'byor ma rnams bdag por ni// myur du mkha' la 'gro byed de// tshangs pa gto/ sa 'dod dbang chen dang // lha rnams kyis ni mchod par 'gyur// 
215b6(rgyud): lha mo'i tshogs dang rtsen byed cing // lha mo kun gyi bdag por 'gyur// 'phrog byed la sogs bdag po che// 'jigs par byed dang rku byed pa// sems can kun gyi mchog dam pa// sems dpa' chen
215b7(rgyud): por de 'gyur ro// stug po'i tshogs kyi dbus ni// brjid la sogs pas spyod pas 'gro/ brjid che pad+mo chen mo la// thams cad kun tu brjid pa yis// bde byed chen po myong byed de// rab tu dgyes
215b8(rgyud): pas bsregs pa bzhin// rab tuska la ldan ma grin ma khyud pas// rnal 'byor chen por de gnas te// 'dzin stong la bris pa yis// ci 'dod par ni 'dod pa 'thob// phyag rgya chu skyes btab byas te/ 
216a1(rgyud): de ltar byas na phyag rgyad gyes// rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen mo'i dri ma med pa'i mdog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya ste// thams cad las byed pa dge ba'o// dang po nyid / 
216a2(rgyud): oM bya ste// thig le'i rgyal pos nye bar rgyan// tsheg drag bcas pa 'dren pa gnyis// ldan pa mtha' mar bzhag byas te// rdo rje rab dgyes rgyan byas pa// rdo rje ston ka dbusu bsam// 'di ni sangs rgyas tham
216a3(rgyud): cad kyi// ye shes snang ba rab bsgrub pa// yi ge yi ni phyag rgya 'dis// nyid kyi snying khar rgyas btab na// sangs rgyas ye shes mchog byed pa// de yis ston ka ma dngos grub// sde dbang lhar bcas lha rnams
216a4(rgyud): dang gnod sbyin srin por bcas pa dang // sbrul dang mi 'am cig danas pa// thams cad 'di yi g.yog tu 'gyur// 'di ni 'od ze dar rab tu 'bar ba yis// sangs rgyas mchog gi thugs ldan/ 
216a5(rgyud): de 'gro ste// sna tshogs rab 'byung yang dag khyab// chos mcho/ dam pa byed pa gtong byed cing // spyod bcas mi spyod 'jig rten snang byed de// sprin dang bral ba'i zla ba'i 'od mchog byed// ma
216a6(rgyud): dbyings rnam par bsgyings pas rab tu dga'// a li ka li pad+mo mchog la// myong zhing mchog byas bskal par gnas par 'gyur// 'di yis sdig pa 'phrog byed de// 'di yis myur du dga' bar 'gyur/ 
216a7(rgyud): 'dis ni bde ba'i ngo bo de// 'di yis dngos grub grub par 'gyur// skye ba'i sdug bsngal rgyab phyogs pa// tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa// ye
216a8(rgyud): shes kyi snang ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya chen mo sde// thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes 'grub par byed pa'o// // dang po oM dang yang dag ldan// tha mar dgyes pa'i yi ge gnyis// rdo rje shin tu
216b1(rgyud): dgyes pa che// dbus su gsal ba'i yi ge bsam// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sna tshogs chen mo'i mdun du 'gro// sna tshogs chen mo 'di yis ni// sna tshogs ye shes dngos grub bo// sngags
216b2(rgyud): mkhan nyid kyis byin rlabs pa// sna tshogs sna tshogs bdag chen 'gyur// sdig pa'i yan lag kun spangs te// bsod nams kun gyi yan lag dge/ kun tu 'gro ba'i dngos grub ni// 'di nyid kyis ni rab
216b3(rgyud): tu 'grub// sna tshogs sgyu ma'i bde chen gyis// sna tshogs chen po'i bskal par gnas// rdo rje'i bdag nyid rgyan pa yi// bud med kun dang rtsen par 'gyur// de nas de yi chos dbyings nas// dbang phyug
216b4(rgyud): mchog gi dngos grub bo// pad+mo'i mdun du thog ma'i lha// byas te/ rdo rje bsgrub par bya// mthe bong srin lag de phyung ste// kha yin/  du bzhag par bya// chang bzhin myang bar byas na ni// mdo la 'ad/ 
216b5(rgyud): pa'i gzugasu 'gyur// a li ka li rab sbyor bas// bud medarna mas dang rtsen par byed// blo ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi// 'di ni shin tu dgyes zhes bya// bsil bdaga' byed chen mo ste/ 
216b6(rgyud): sna tshogs 'di ni 'gro la gnas// dang po oM ni gnas pa ste// tra ta dang ldan tha mar bya// rdo rje shin tu dgyes che ho// sgeg mo dbu su bskul ba'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bsgeg par bya ba sprul
216b7(rgyud): pa yin// 'di dag mnyam par sbyor ba yis// sgeg mos ye shes bskyed par bya// rdo rje blo ldan brtag po yis// bde bar 'dod pa'i pad+mor gzugs// 'dod pas 'dod pa spyad par bya// myur du 'dod pa/ 
216b8(rgyud): dngos grub bo// de nas rdo rje 'dod dpal te// bde byed thams cad nye bar sgrub// sems can kun gyi 'dod skyed pa// bde ba chen por de 'gyur ro// mthu yis pha rol phyin pa'i mchog/ pad+mo'i tshul du/ 
217a1(rgyud): skrag pa yis// rdo rje sbyor thabs la gnas pas// rje chen po dngos 'grub// ci dgar 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis// rtag pa'i las dang yang dag ldan// rtag pa'i chos kyis rje/ 
217a2(rgyud): 'thun spyod// bsgrubs na rtag pa rtogs par 'gyur// 'di yis kun tu bzang zhes bya// de ni dngos po kun yin te// 'dod pa med cing nyon mongs med// nga rgyal med cing 'dzin med pa// sangs rgyas mchog tu
217a3(rgyud): rtag pa yi// sangs rgyas chen po de yi dngos// dpal ldan thog ma tha ma med// chos rnams kun gyi rje su 'thun// 'dis ni dngos po thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas bdag por bdag nyid 'gyur// sangs
217a4(rgyud): rgyas rnam par snang mdzad dang // 'di la khyad par cung zad med// shin tu dgyes pa chen po rdo rje bdag po'i dpal shin tu dgyes rapa sgeg mo dpe med pa dang ldan pa'i yi ge'i mchog gi sku'o// 
217a5(rgyud): dang po oM bcas lha mo yi// tha mar tsheg drug mi phyed gnyis/ de gnyis dbus kyi phyogs nyid du// he zhes bya ba rnam rgyan te// shin tu dgyes pa'i rdo rje che// bzhad pa nyid ni rab tu smra
217a6(rgyud): yi ge yi ni phyag rgya 'dis// nyid kyi snying la rgyas btab na// phreng ba'i rgyan gyis rnam brgyan pa// dpal ldan des ma thag tu 'gyur// yid kyis ji ltar bsams pa bzhin// de ni sangs rgyas yul du/ 
217a7(rgyud): 'gro// de ni dpyir sangs rgyas mthong // chu skyes de dang rtsen par byed// de nas 'dus pa dgyes 'gyur te// sangs rgyas yang dag zhing nyid nas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi bde ba che// dngos grub rnal 'byor
217a8(rgyud): de la sbyin// byed pa dang ni zlog pa dang // bde ba chen po 'phrog pa yis// rnal 'byor gsang ba'i dbang phyug la// gsang ba chen pos mgu bar byed// thabs bcas shes rab chen po la// rgyal
217b1(rgyud): nyid kyis stobs byed de// a li ka li mnyam sbyor bas// bde ba chen po mgu bar byed// bde ba thabs kyi dngos grub rnams// sgyu ma'i tshul gyis bsgrub par bya// yi ge yi ni phyag rgya 'di// shin tu dngos
217b2(rgyud): grub mchog tu brtag/ rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba'i phreng ba rgyas pa dpe med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste// las thams cad kyi don gyi dngos grub sbyin pa'o// / oM ni dang por
217b3(rgyud): gtsug tor bya// te te skad snyan tha mar te// dbus su he dga' zhes bya ba// bde chen dga' ba rdo rje dbyangs// rdo rje shin tu dgyes che yi// phyag rgya 'di ni rab dgyes 'brel// bris pa dang ni 'dzin pa dang / 
217b4(rgyud): dran pa yis kyang dngos grub ster// sdig pa kun las grol byed cing // bsod nams thams cad nye bar 'gro/ mi dge thams cad ma lus spong byed cing // sems ni phyag rgya'i yi ge rgyan te
217b5(rgyud): 'gro/ 'jig rten thams cad kun tu bskur sti byed// rig ma nA/ nga gis mngon par mchod byed cing // rig 'dzin mu sman dud med rnams kyis ni// g.yag rnga dkar po'i tshogs kyis g.yob
217b6(rgyud): byed pa'i// 'jig rten dbang po bde mchog 'brel pa 'thob// blo ldan na mkha' ngos ni thams cad du// rdo rje 'dzin gyi dgyes pa'i rnal 'byor ma// yid du 'ong ba'i spyan ni rgyas pa dang // rnal 'byor spyod pa'i
217b7(rgyud): bde bas 'bigs pa yis// mgul nas 'khyud pa'i brtson pas rol par byed// pi bang gling bu ya mtshan sgra snyan gyis// glu blangs dngos grub rgya che thob par byed// ji snyed yid du 'ong ba'i glu dag ni// 'jig
217b8(rgyud): rten grags pa'i bde ba'i bde ba dag/ bde ba'i sgra yis bskyed par rnam bsgyur ba'i// de dang 'thun pa'i dbyangs 'dis sgrub par byed// Sha Ta pa dgar dza'i dbyangs// glu ru blangs pas pad+mo gnas// dngos grub
218a1(rgyud): myur du 'thob par byed// 'di yis byin rlabs dag pa dang // 'di yis byin rlabs bde ba'i rnams// sbyor ba 'di yis sbyar ba yis// 'dod byed thams cad 'thob par 'gyur// shin tu
218a2(rgyud): dgyes pa chen po rdo rje sems dpa'i mchog tu dgyes pa chen mo'i dbyangs dpe med pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin oM ni dang por te// dbusu he dgyes bde ba che// rdo rje gar byed dpe pa gnyis/ 
218a3(rgyud): 'di ni thams cad bde byed de// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rab tu dgyes nyid// rnal 'byor yi ni rgyas btab na// bde dang ldan par byed cing 'gro/ 'og min gyi ni gnas chen du// sangs rgyas rnams dang thabs/ 
218a4(rgyud): gcig 'grogs// bde byed chen po'i dbang chen dang // chos da kyi rgyal po bde chen 'thob// ji snyed gar gyi gtsug lag las// bsgyur ba byed pa bshad pa dang // ji snyed de snyed phyag rgya'i
218a5(rgyud): rnams// gnyis min 'dus pas 'dis dngos grub// kye ma 'o dgyes pa bde byed che// kye ma'o bde ba bde chen po// kye ma'o 'dod pa 'dod chags che// kye ma'o sna tshogs bdag nyid che
218a6(rgyud): de la sogs pa tshad med pa// 'jig rten gyi ni yo byad rnams// pad+mo gsal ba gar gyis ni// rnal 'byor gar byas dngos grub po// sangs rgyas kun gyi phyag rgya 'di// sna tshogs gar ni ston byed pas/ 
218a7(rgyud): myur du gar ni mang byas pas// gar gyi gtsug lag dngos grub bo// rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i dpal bde ba chen po dga' byed gang zhes bya ba'i yi ge phyag rgya phan tshun bcu pa rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gsum
218a8(rgyud): pa'o// bcu gsum yi ge dang po nyid// rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa che// rdo rje'i sku ni sna tshogs che// tha mar 'bar dang 'dra ba'i dza// na mkhar zla skar 'dra ba yi// phyag rgya'i ye shes rmad 'byung ba'i// 'di/ 
218b1(rgyud): 'di yi thabs kyis mnyam gzhag ste// gzung ba gsal bar gzung ba yi// tsha ba'i gser gyi gzi brjid 'dzin// ye shes snying khar bsam par bya// nam mkha' nyi ma bum 'dra bar// de ni de ma thag
218b2(rgyud): tu 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// shin tu rmad 'byung thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor kun gyi bde 'brel ba// rdo rje blo mchog dngos grub bo// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin dge yi// 
218b3(rgyud): sna tshogs chen po thob 'gyur nas// 'dod pa'i chos kyis mi gos blo// 'dod pa chen po sten par byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po shin tu dgyes pa chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa
218b4(rgyud): rdo rje ma lus pa lus pa med pa'i rdo rje'i sku dpe med pa dang ldan pa da zhes bya ba'i yi ge chen po'i phyag rgya'o// // de bzhin oM ni bzhag bya ste// rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen// rdo rje'i sgra
218b5(rgyud): ni bde 'bral ba// tha mar khro bcas sbyar bar bya// phyag rgya 'di ni bde mchog ste// bar bcas pa yang thos par 'gyurar// khams gsum ngo bo thams cad ni// sgra yi thos pa dngos
218b6(rgyud): grub bo// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub ste// bud med pad+mo ud pal dang // ma lus rgyal ba'i rnams dang rtsen// rdo rje pad+mor sbyar bas na// dga' byed myur du
218b7(rgyud): dngos grub bo// rab tu dgyes pa chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i tshad med pa'i yon tan gyi sgra dpe med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba don gyi dpal thams cad grub par byed pa'o// oM ni spyi gtsug thig ler
218b8(rgyud): babs// rab dgyes chen mo rdo rje can// rdo rje dri bder 'brel pa tha mar gnas shes rab sbyar bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sna tshogs chen mo'i mdun du 'gro/ sna tshogs chen mo 'di
219a1(rgyud): yis ni// sna tshogs ye shes grub par 'gyur// bdag nyid rdo rje rgyan pa yi// de ni mtshan ldan kun dang rtsen// de nas chos dbyings gnas pa des// a li ka li mnyam
219a2(rgyud): sbyor bas// dga' byed lhan cig rtsen byas na// dbang phyug dam pa dngos grub 'gyur// 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa' yi// blo ldan rab tu dgyes zhes bya// rdo rje'i dri dpe med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i yi
219a3(rgyud): ge'i phyag rgya'o// / oM mchog gtsug tor rnams byas te// shin tu dgyes che dbus nyid du// rdo rje ro ni sbyor ba che// tha mar he ste thig le gnyis// 'di yi rab tu dgyes par 'gyur// dpal
219a4(rgyud): ldan dpe med bde ba dang // bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// sna tshogs sbyor ba sna tshogs bdag/ sangs rgyas kun dgyi rol pa yis// mchod pa mi bzang byed par 'gyur// sangs
219a5(rgyud): rgyas rnams kyi gnas thams cad// nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid thob bo// rab tu dgyes pa'i dbang po shin tu dgyes pa rma na po'i ro mchog gi rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba sems can
219a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi don thams cad grub pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag po zla gsang thig le bshad pa'i rgyal po las/ chos kyi 'khor lo ste gnyis
219a7(rgyud): pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' kun tu bzang po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las shin tu dgyes pa chen po gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po
219a8(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bshad nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas na mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi rdul phran dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad gsang ba'i
219b1(rgyud): gzungs dang g.yog tu bcas pa rnams kyis yongasu bskor ba// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po dang bcas pa rnams kyis mdun du byas pa ma lus pa lus pa med pa'i namakha' la 'gro ba dang / 
219b2(rgyud): namakha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs dang ldan pa// phyi nang gi pho nya dang po nya mo rab tu rgyas pa rnams shin tu ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te// dgyes shing spyan ni rgyas pa yis// bzhengs nas dgyes pa chen po la/ 
219b3(rgyud): brjid pa'i phyag gis gar mdzad cing // thal mo sbyar nas gtsug nyid du// bzhag pa yis ni 'dud par byed// bskul ba yi ni dbyangs 'di yis// de dag gcol mnyes par byed// kye ma'o chos ni
219b4(rgyud): ngo mtshar tshe// kye ma'o spyod pa ngo mtshar che// kye ma'o sras bango mtshar che// kye ma'o bde ba yang dag 'byung // kye mtsho kun tu bzang po'i don// kye ma'o rabar gyes yang dag 'grog/ 
219b5(rgyud): kye ma'o bde ba dag pa che// kye ma'o bde ba bde mchog ste/ kye ma'o sngags kyi yang dag sbyor// kye ma'o snying po ya nga dag bsdus// kye ma'o phyag rgya mnyam par bzhugs/ 
219b6(rgyud): kye ma'o sgrub pa rmad 'byung ba'o// kye ma'o pha rol phyin ma yin// kye ma'o ji ltar mthur rig ma// kye ma'o sna tshogs dgos pa che// kye ma'o dag pa gsum sbyar ba// kye ma'o rdo rje mnyam sbyar ba'i/ 
219b7(rgyud): kye ma'o pad+ma rnam phye bas// kye ma'o dbang po gnyis sbyor ba'o// kye ma'o mchog dang mnyam pa'o// kye ma'o gar ni dag pa che// kye ma'o glu rab dri ma med// kye ma'o sil snyan rnam par brel// kye ma'o brdab
219b8(rgyud): dang mun pa sel// kye ma 'odag byed ma tog phreng // kye ma'o pog snod dge ba ste// kye ma'o mar me mun pa sel// kye ma'o dran shin tu bsil// kye ma'o rnal 'byor mnyam par sbyor// kye ma'o sbyar ba nam/ 
220a1(rgyud): mkha' 'dra// kye ma 'o sangs rgyas rdo rje mchog/ kye ma'o rin chen bde mchog bskyed// kye ma'o sna tshogs pad mchog ldan// kye ma'o sna tshogs sgyu ma mdzad// kye ma'ong mtshar sangs
220a2(rgyud): rgyas dang // kye ma'o ngo mtshar dpa' bo rnams// kye ma'o ngo mtshar sems dpa' rnams// kye ma'o ngo mtshar lho yi rnams// shin tu dgyes tshe rdo rje la// rgyan pa kun gyis bstod byas te// rdo rje sems dpa'i
220a3(rgyud): 'gying ba yis// dga' dang bde byed skyes par 'gyur// de nas pha rol phyin thams cad// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dgyes 'gyur te// sems dpa' che la phyag byas nas// mchog gi dbyangs kyis bstod/ 
220a4(rgyud): par byed// chu skyes zhal ni 'dzum bcas pa// yangs pa'i spyan gyis gar mdzad de// phyag dang zhabs ni bsgyur ba yis// rab tu dgyes ldan smin ma bsgyur// yid tsam 'dzum pa'i spyan
220a5(rgyud): zur gzigs// sha rgyas brla ni nu mar mdud// rked pa'i dbyi/ bas ni rnam par yangs// snam gyi ngos kyang che la mdzes// / chags pa cung zad tshems kyis gnon// tshems kyi phreng ba
220a6(rgyud): kun da zla// mi drag zlos pa'i dbugs 'byin cing // rab tu dgyes tsha dgyes par bstod// bde bas bde la longs spyod mchog tu bde ba'i rang bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab bstan// dgongs pa'i dbang dang
220a7(rgyud): ldan pas 'gro ba ya mtshan chen po'i sgo nas 'dul mdzad cing // gsang ba'i thig le 'jig rten gsum po 'dir ni dngos grub gtsor bstan te// 'jig rten gsum po sbyar bar bya ba'i chos de bder ga
220a8(rgyud): don du mdzad// ngo mtshar yon tan ldan pa dam tshig bde las 'byung // bde mdzod bde spyod dga' la rol pa tshul bzhin mdzod// thams cad dga' ba'i ngang nyid thig la'i dkyil du bskyed mdzad de/ 
220b1(rgyud): byang chub snying po 'gro ba'i lam 'di bde bar bskul la bsnyen par mdzod// ngo mtshar de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig rig pa che la dgyes shing bzhugs/ bdag cag 'du shes rnams dang bral ba nyid
220b2(rgyud): kyang bzhugs spyod 'dzem bcas pas/ tshangasa'i rgyal po dbang ldan pas kyang de ni de la rag lus so// a la la ho// yangs pa'i spyan can drangs shing bcug ste rol pa tshul bzhin mdzod// rnam dag
220b3(rgyud): ye shes chu des 'gro ba rnams kyi sdig pa khrus// byams ma'i dang gzungs ma bdag nyid che dang rab tu rtsen mdzod la// thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin dag pa'i chu nges bdag bskur cig/ 
220b4(rgyud): mi g.yo mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ye shes thab 'dod phyir/ dadam tshig chen po gsum po gdi la gnas nas ni// zla ba/ sang thig le'i dbyings bdag cag ngogs med 'gro bar bgyi/ 
220b5(rgyud): dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'di yis ni// shin tu srid pas skyo ba yi/ sangs rgyas kun kyang 'dod pa bzhin// glu blangs myur du ba skul bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das la dbyangs kyi rgyal
220b6(rgyud): po 'dis bstod pas shin tu gyes te de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' bcas pa dang / rdo rje dang rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / las kyi rigs kyi btsun mo de dag thams cad la rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa'i
220b7(rgyud): bde ba chen pos mnyes par mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs rnams dang / byang chub dpa' ra bcas pa dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha'
220b8(rgyud): la 'gro ma'i tshogasu bcas pa'i rnams dang / phyi nang gi rdo rje rigs las skyes pa'i rnams las shin tu dgyes pa dgyes pa chen po'i gar dang dbyangs dang / rdung ba dang / zhi ba'i thal mo la sogs pa rnam
221a1(rgyud): par mdzad pa chen pos rab tu mdzad nas/ dam tshig chen po rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa 'dod pa'i dbang mo dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas bde bar cang mi gsung bar
221a2(rgyud): gyur to// de nas de dag kun dgyes nas// shin tu dgyes pa nyid byas te// thal mo sbyar nas sa steng du// dbus mo'i lhang nga btsugs mdzad de// chos kyi phyir ni gsol ba 'debs// dkyil 'khor
221a3(rgyud): dam tshig bdag nyid la// bcom ldan 'das dgyes pas// bshad du gsol/ gang gi sems can bde nyid kyi// bde bas dkyil 'khor sgrub par bgyid// de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig 'dod pa nye
221a4(rgyud): bar longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug sa te// dkyil 'khor mdzad do// phyag gnyis gar dang bca sra pa yis// mdun du thal mo bkan par bya// sor mo kun gyi rtse
221a5(rgyud): mo la// pha rol phyin pa'i tshogs rnams bsam// de dag ming gi/ brda yis ni// sor mo thams cad brtag par bya// sbom/ po gtsun bsnol byas te// shes rab mchod rten du ni brtag
221a6(rgyud): rdo rje mchod rten sbyar byas te// lhag ma 'od bzhin spro bar bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab pha rol phyin ma dge/ gang gis bcings pa tsam gyi kyang // sangs rgyas byang chub byin rlob po// 
221a7(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// rtag pa'i pho brang 'gro 'od byed// sangs rgyas snang mdzad dpal dang ldan// btso ma'i gser gyi kha dog 'dzin// shes rab ldan pas sbyor byas na// 'di yis myur/ 
221a8(rgyud): du dngos grub bo// skal ldan 'phrul gyi bu mo la// 'di yis byin rlabs gar byas te// rdo rje pad+mo bzhag byas nas// sems ni bzhugs pas bsgrub byas la// de nas sems de blangs byas te// blo ldan de yis
221b1(rgyud): btung byas te// grub pa gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du// yang dag dngos grub 'gro bar byed// shes rab dang ni 'phrul gyi 'am// de bzhin gshegs pa 'phral rtag 'thob// sangs rgyas rdo rje blo ldan gyis/ 
221b2(rgyud): kun tu 'phrog par yong mi nus// shin tu dgyes pa kun tu longs spyod pa'i bde ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// thal mo de nyid khro skyes pa// sbom po skyil krung bzhag byas te// sna tshogs
221b3(rgyud): bong ba 'bar byed pa// rnal 'byor gyis ni lhag ma spro// 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyang // shes rab pha rol phyin ma gsal// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// rdo rje ye shes bla na med// 'di yis myur
221b4(rgyud): du 'thob par 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// 'di da ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // ring du sdig pa 'jig par byed// tshe dang dpal dang ye shes skal// rdo rje 'dzin gyis thob
221b5(rgyud): par 'gyur// 'di ni dbang bskur tsam gyis kyang // rdo rje 'dzin rjer de 'gyur te// rdo rje dkyil gyi mtshan btab pas/ sa chen 'ong zhing 'gro bar byed// 'di ni dga' byed rdo rje rigs/ 
221b6(rgyud): rdo rje bud med 'grogs pa dang // rdo rje gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje sems nyid 'thob par 'gyur// ji ltar dngos grub 'dug pa dang // sangs rgyas rdo rje dpa' bo rnams// skad cig gcig
221b7(rgyud): gis 'dren par byed// bsgral dang mnyes par bya ba dang // rgyas btab de bzhin rmongs pa dang // gso bar byed dang za ba dang // phan tshun du mi skyed par byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
221b8(rgyud): rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba rdo rje bre ba zhes bya ba shin tu dgyes pa bde ba thob par byed pa dpe med pa'i rdo rjer byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje'i thal mo de nyid las// khro mo rgyab ni bskum byas te// sor mo lhag ma snga
222a1(rgyud): bzhin// phyag rgya 'di ni dbang bskur ba'o// rims dang gdon dang dug la sogs// de ma thag du 'phrog par byed// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // sangs rgyas kyi ni dgyes pa 'thob/ 
222a2(rgyud): 'di nyid kyis ni dbang bskur dang // 'di nyid kyis ni bde dam pa// 'di nyid kyis ni rgyal po che// 'di nyid kyis ni dpal dam pa// 'di yis rtsen pa byas pa yis// rang dga' 'gug pa dngos grub bo// mi la
222a3(rgyud): 'di yis byin rlabs te// nyi ma byed na spyad byas na// 'di ni de ma thag tu yang // dpal ldan rdo rje gzi brjid 'dzin// nyi ma bcu gnyis 'od 'drar 'gyur// zhag bdun gyis 'gyur gzhan gyis min// sangs
222a4(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi 'dul ba dang // dge ba thams cad dbang du byed// grol 'dod rnams kyi mun pa sel// blo ldan phyag rgya mchog tu 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// bde ba chen po// 
222a5(rgyud): gzi brjid dpe med pa dang ldan pa'i phreng ba zhes bya ba// ba dan gsu ma pa'i 'jig rten gsum du bde ba chen po 'thob par byed/ pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen po'o// // pha rol phyin pa'i/ 
222a6(rgyud): phyag rgya nyid// dge ba'i khro mo dang bral ba// pha rol phyin pa'i chos yin te// tshig dang tshig rnams bral ba'o// phyag rgya 'di ni btsongs pa yis// chos kyi dbyings nas rje ru 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi/ 
222a7(rgyud): dbang bskur bas// dbang phyug dam par de 'gyur te// thams cad dam pa mos pa yis// pad+mo dmar po mchog 'dzin 'gyur// pad+mo sgyu ma rnams mdzad pas// sna tshogs chen por de 'gyur ro// sdug
222a8(rgyud): bsngal thams cad 'phrog pa byed// sems can kun la thams cad sbyin// 'dod chags chen po nyes spangs te// de ni bdud rtsi 'dra bar 'gyur// 'di ni myur du gar byas pa// sgrub par mi byed cung zad med/ 
222b1(rgyud): 'di ni pad+mo sbyor ba yis// bde mchog rtag pa thob par 'gyur// shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i mos par byed pa'i dpal pad+mo phreng ba zhes bya ba thams cad kyi don dpal shin tu dgyes par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// 
222b2(rgyud): 'di nyid gnyis pa'i spyi gtsug tu// bsgyur nas bzhag par byas pa ni// ma lus dri ma 'phrog byed pa// sna tshogs chen por der 'gyur ro// 'di yis dbang ni bskur ma thag/ khams gsum sna tshogs
222b3(rgyud): byed par 'gyur// sna tshogs dbang po rgyal po che// sna tshogs gzugs dang sna tshogs bdag/ sgrub pa thams cad bde dam pa// 'dod pa kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa// thams
222b4(rgyud): cad 'di yis dngos sgrub bo// bud med 'di yis byin rlabs nas// sngo bsangs khur tses dkar mo dang // de dang lhan cig gar byas pas// sna tshogs bdag po chen por 'gyur// sngo bsangs
222b5(rgyud): zhing ma phreng ma dag/ byin gyis brlabs nas dus gsum du/ mtshan gyi mthar ni bsnyen byas nas// las kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rigs ngan can dang sme ma dang // gar mkhan
222b6(rgyud): de bzhin gar byed dag/ phyag rgya ye shes byin rlabs te// bsnyen dang dngos grub thob par 'gyur// shin tu dgyes pa sna tshogs bde ba sbyin par byed pa zhes bya ba 'dod pa zhes bya ba 'dod par byed pa thams cad
222b7(rgyud): kyi mchog sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de dag bstan pa'i rnams// gar gyi tshul gyis rang gi gnas// dam tshig mchog gi dam tshig gis// dngos grub chen po'i mthur 'gyuraro// thal mo
222b8(rgyud): de nyid sbyar byas te// rdo rje bcings pas bcings par bya// de nas dga' byed dbang bskyed de// 'da' yi tshul gyis bzung bar bya// 'di ni rab dgyes gtso bo yi// pha rol phyin mchog sdug pa yin// 
223a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyi myos byed pa// dpa' bo rnams kyang rmongs par byed// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // mi shes byed pa 'jig pa byed// las kyi don ni dga' bzhin du// dga'
223a2(rgyud): nas bran bzhin byed par 'gyur// dga' dang lhan cig gar byed cing // 'di dbang sar ni 'gro bar byed// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu dgyes pa kun tu bzang mo'i dgyes pa chen mo'i bde ba gnyi su med pa dang / 
223a3(rgyud): ldan ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya chen po'o// snying kar gzung ba'i sbyor ba yis// 'di yis las kun byed 'gyur te// bdud rnams thams cad 'bigs par byed// rgyal ba 'dod chags bral spyod pa// bde
223a4(rgyud): gshegs mya ngan 'das kun dang // thams cad 'di yis slo dang bar byed// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byas nas// myur du las la sbyor bar byed// dbang po nye dbang dbang chen gyi/ 
223a5(rgyud): gdug pa thams cad 'joms byed de// 'jigs byed drag po chen po yis// gdug pa thams cad gdung bar byed// rdo rje pad+mor bcug pa yis// mche bas ma mchu bzung byas te/ 
223a6(rgyud): sor mo phan tshun bsnol ba yis// dpung pa brkyang ste gar du bya// sna tshogs chen po rab rgyas pas// bde chen po yi bde 'thob bo// 'dod ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// 'dod dang thar par grub byed te// 
223a7(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na// 'dod pa bzhin du 'phur bar byed// rab dgyes 'brel pas gar byas shing // nam mkha' gzungs ma'i thabs nyid kyi// phan tshun bcu pa'i gnon pa yis// bcings na 'di/ 
223a8(rgyud): yis dngos grub bo// de ni de ma thag tu yang // lha dang lha yin mchod byed// dbang po nye dbang dbang chen dang // nyi zla gshin rje chu dbang rnams// sbyin po yis ni phyag byas nas// rang gi dpal mchog stobs
223b1(rgyud): byed de// rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyang // nyid kyis dpal can stobs pa yis// brtan pa de la mgu byed cing // sangs rgyas dgos par bsgrub byed// 'di yis las kyi tshul gyi rnams// las dang rje su mthun
223b2(rgyud): 'gyur te// rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnam mdzad pas// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor te// gzungs dang gnyis med sbyor ba yis// yid la 'dod pa'i las kun byed// 'dzum dang gnas dang sbas pa dang / 
223b3(rgyud): spyod pas gar gyis byas paso// gzhan dag kyang de dngos grub che// pad+mo'i mdab ma rnams phye bas// byang chub sems ni rab sgrub pa// sgrub pa pos ni pad+mo sgrub// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ 
223b4(rgyud): bde ba gnyi su med pa'i dpal// shin tu dgyes pa'i pad+mo mdab ma zhes bya ba shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba 'thob par byed pa'o// // thal mo de nyid bcings pa yis// bcings pa gyen du bzung
223b5(rgyud): byas te// mthe'u chung gnyis ni sgreng byas te// de bzhin sbom po gnyis kyang bya// phyag rgya 'di ni chu srin zhes// rgyal mtsha/ na ldan par bshad pa yin// rdo rje sems dpa' sprul pa ste// 'dod
223b6(rgyud): bral chags par sgrub pa yin// phyag rgya 'di yis bde ldan gyi// pho brang chen por 'gro bar byed// der phyin chos kyi 'khor lo dag/ bla med par ni bskor bar byed// sangs rgyas pha rol phyin mas bskor// sdig
223b7(rgyud): spangs rnams ni bkug nas kyang // spyod pa drag po'i tshul gyis ni// bskal pa bye bar bsnyen par byed// yang dag byang chub gnas pa yi// sangs rgyas 'di yis mnyes par byed// de nas dgyes te sna tshogs che// 
223b8(rgyud): sna tshogs ye shes skye ba yi// rang gi dam tshig gsungs pa yi// sems dpa' chen po sgrub par byed// bla med dngos grub thams cad kyang // 'di yis thams cad grub par byed// sbyor dang ldan pas byin
224a1(rgyud): rlabs te// snying khar nye bar bsam byas na// las kyi ngo bo tshul 'di yis// thams cad las ni byed du gzhug/ gar dang dbyangs kyi ro dga' dang // sil snyan brdung ba rnams byed dang / 
224a2(rgyud): pi bang gling bu rdza rnga yi// phyag rgya 'di yis bsgrub par bya// dpal rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i thugs kyi dgyes pa dpe med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// thal mo de nyid mnyam bzung nas// 'gying / 
224a3(rgyud): zhing 'gying bas gar byas te// bcing ba chen po bcings byas nas// sbyor ba chen po gnyi su bya// khu tshur gnyis po dku nyid du// g.yon du 'gying bas brtan par bya// phyag rgya 'di ni rgyal la sogs/ 
224a4(rgyud): bde ba dam pas mchod byas te// 'gying ba'i sbyor bas gar byas na/ dngos grub thams cad grub par byed// 'gying pa tsam gyi sa sbyor ba yis// 'gying ba thams cad 'phrog par byed// lha
224a5(rgyud): dang lha min rig ma yis// 'bum phrag rgya yis mchod par byed// rab tu dgyes pa bde mchog che// kun tu gar byas gnas par 'gyur// klu mo lha dang lha min dang // de bzhin mi 'am
224a6(rgyud): bdag por ba// nam mkha' 'gro ma'i khyor 'gyur te// rnal 'byor ma kun bde ba che// gzungs ma rnams kyi dag pa bdag/ gsang ba pha rol phyin pa'i rje// las kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni// thams cad las ni
224a7(rgyud): byed par bshad// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba che// gsang chen sbyor bas dngos grub bo// dpal shin tu dgyes pa bde ba chen mo sems can thams cad sgrol bar sbas pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya thams
224a8(rgyud): cad 'grub pa'o// phyag rgya de nyid mnyam bzung ste// lag pa'i 'dab ma gar dang bcas// myur bar steng du dor ba yis// mgyogasu 'gro ba dngos gru'o// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rmad byung dam pa
224b1(rgyud): mchod byas pa// sbyor ba gar gyis mchod byas na// thams cad las byed dngos gru'o// gang dag dngos grub med pa dang // gang dag bde ba med pa'i rnams// de dag phyag rgya 'dis btab na// na mkha'i dkyil
224b2(rgyud): 'khor 'gro bar 'gyur// de yis thams cad las rnams ni// rmad 'byung dam pa 'grub par byed// brdzun mo chen mo de bzhin gshegs// 'di yis de ni 'grub par byed// gzhan yang mchog tu rgya che ba/ 
224b3(rgyud): mnyam dang mi mnyam chos kyi dbyings// btsun mo dam pa de bzhin gshegs// phyag rgya'i sbyor bas dngos grub bo// dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje rab tu dgyes pa'i me tog gi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// 
224b4(rgyud): de nyid 'og gi ngos su dor// steng du cung zad bsgrub par bya// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bde mchog yid ni tshim byed pa// 'dis ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // bdud rnams
224b5(rgyud): shin tu ring bar 'gyur// phyag rgya bcings te bsdigs pa yis// skrag nas dngos grub sbyin par byed// sangs rgyas dam/ tshig gsum gnas pa'i// 'di yis mchod pa byas par
224b6(rgyud): 'gyur// de nas gtso bo 'dis mnyes nas// mchog gi thabs ni stobs par byed// phyag rgya bcings pa sbyor ba yis// 'di ni thams cad byed par 'gyur// rgyun tu byas na rnal 'byor pa// dngos
224b7(rgyud): po thams cad byed par 'gyur// sdig pa thams cad 'phrog byed de// bde ba pad+ma 'thob byed cing // tshe 'di dang ni pha rol du// phyag rgya'i gnasu de 'gro'o// dpal shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba
224b8(rgyud): tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste// dri ma thams cad spongs pa dpal shin tu dgyes ma'o// thal mo de nyid sbom po sgreng // lhag ma gsal ba'i nyi ma bzhin// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// ya/ 
225a1(rgyud): shes mchog tu snang byed pa'o// thog ma med nas bskor ba yi// 'di yis gti mug 'phrog byed de// mnyam par gzhag nas bcings ma thag/ sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis rlog
225a2(rgyud): mnyam nyid ye shes dri med dang // pad+mo dra ba dga' ba che// sna tshogs dra ba dpal chen po// bde phyed chen po 'thob par 'gyur// rdo rje dgyes pa chen po'i dpe med pa'i dpal dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// 
225a3(rgyud): g.yas dang g.yon pa'i lag pa yis// brjid pa'i gar gyi gar bya zhing // thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyar te// g.yon gyi khu tshur spyi bor bzhag/ rgyal ba rnams kyi phyag rgya 'di// mchod pa thams cad grub
225a4(rgyud): byed do// thams cad don rnams grub pa dge/ bkra shis rgyal ba 'thob par byed// gang zhig bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // mchod pa'i sprin nyid rgyas pa che// mtha' yas dri med gzi brjid
225a5(rgyud): dang / sangs rgyas zhing ni dngos grub bo// phyag rgya sbyor bas sbyar byas te// skad cig gcig gis gar byas nas// rdzog sa sangs rgyas dang sras mchog kyang // 'di yis thams cad
225a6(rgyud): 'bab par 'gyur// sna tshogs kyi ni sbyor ba yis// sna tshogs gar gyis gar byas na// dpa' bo thams cad kun tu 'gro/ phun sum tshogs pa 'dis 'grub bo// dpal shin tu dgyes pa chen po
225a7(rgyud): bde ba'i sems 'phel bar byed ma zhes pa'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po dpal kun tu bzang po shin tu dgyes pa chen po bde ba'i bdag nyid rnam
225a8(rgyud): par snang mdzad chen po bshad pa mthas klas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang bzla gsang thig le mchog tu pha rol tu phyin pa// gsang ba chen po dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes
225b1(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu gyes pa// rdo rje gdon mi pa pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po bskal pa'i mthas klas pa zhes bya ba gsum pa rdzogaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po'i gsang ba'ing
225b2(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad nas slar yang bde bar cang mi gsung bar gnas par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang / pha rol tu phyin ma
225b3(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i tshogs thams cad dang / na mkha' la 'gro ba dang / na mkha' la 'gro ma'i tshogs thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur nas phyi nang gi rdo rje rig su gtogs pa 'phrog par byed pa'i tshogs thams
225b4(rgyud): cad la slab dbugs byung ste/ de las bzhengs nas gar mdzad cing rab tu dgyes pa'i spyan rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das so/ yang dang yang du lta zhing dbyangs kyi mchog bde ba 'dis glu blangs te / 
225b5(rgyud): par byed do// rnam mang bde ba'i rol pas bdag nyid chen po ma sa// skye dang mi skye'i chos nyid ya mtshan rmad dag dpal bas na pa// shin tu bde ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten 'dir phyung ste/ 
225b6(rgyud): rang bzhin dag pa'i gzungs ma'i dkyil 'khor nas bskyed par mdzod// ngo mtshar rmad du byung bas bde bas rol mdzad cing // bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin 'dus pa rnams la 'bugs 'byin cing // gsang ba'iH/ 
225b7(rgyud): le dngos nyid na mkha' 'dra ba rnams spyad de// bde ba phun sum tshogs pa'i long spyod rgyu las dbang mdzad pas// byang chub mchog gi lam 'di nyon mongs mtha' dang rnam bral zhing // bde ba'i 'byung gnas skye
225b8(rgyud): shi med pa'i sgo mor pad+mo rnams dag pa// nyon mongs mi go sgyu mar gnas pa chu zla'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// e ma'o kun tu bzang po rig pa rgya chen bsam gyis mi khyab pa// dngos nyid med pa'i chos la dag
226a1(rgyud): ba'i rol pas// gzungasu 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi bde mchog bdud rtsi ras yan// ji ltar bde la rten cing kun tu snang bar mdzad// kye ma bde mchog bde bas rol pa tshul
226a2(rgyud): bzhin mdzod// sdug bsngal 'gro ba'i las can bde bas tshim par mdzod// byams pa'i can thugs rje nyi mas 'gro ba kun la shar mdzad nas// gti mug thibs po'i mun nag byang chub sems kyis gsal
226a3(rgyud): bar ston// de ni 'dus pa'i tshogs la bde sbyin rol pa'i rgyal pos gsungs// byang chub mchog gi sems des snying po dbang bskur cig/ dbyangs kyi phyag rgya 'di yis ni// skad cig skad cig bskul byas
226a4(rgyud): na// rab tu dgyes pa'i bdag nyid kyi// mdun du gnas te dngos grub sbyin// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i bdag po kun tu bzang po rdo rje zla gsang thig
226a5(rgyud): le chen po la// rdo rje na mkha' la 'gro ba gsang ba chen po tshad med pa dang // mchog tu pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs chen mo de rnams kyis bstod cing
226a6(rgyud): bskul ba byas pa dang // gsang ba thabs kyi bde ba chen po shin tu dgyes pa longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di la snyoms par zhugs nas// shin tu dgyes pa chen po gdon
226a7(rgyud): mi za ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // gru zhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs rnams pa bzhi yis rgyan// dar dang dril
226a8(rgyud): bu'i chun po dang // nyi ma zla ba rnam par rgyan// rin chen mu tig 'bras bus spras// do shal gdubu rnams kyis rgyan// sna tshogs gdugs ni rnam bres pa// sna tshogs phreng ba gos kyis rgyan// 
226b1(rgyud): sras bu bzhi dang ldan pa ste// ka ba brgyad mchog yang dag gnas// dbus kyi dga' byed stan la ni// dngul la sogs pas rnam par rgyan// sna tshogs pad+mo dar gyis g.yogs// thams cad stan te/ 
226b2(rgyud): dag ces bya// dbus su rdo rje shin tu dgyes// stan de la ni bzhag par bya// tshad med pad+mo dmar 'dra ba'i// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// yid bzhin nor bu dbu rgyan ldan// rin chen gtsug/ 
226b3(rgyud): gis rnam par mdzes// tshad med dar ni sbyangs pa yis// dbul chun pos mdzes par bya// sna tshogs sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag/ sna tshogs ye shes rab tu gnas// chu skyes spyan ni yid tsam gyis/ 
226b4(rgyud): dga' byed yid tsam g.yon tu 'dud// g.yas pa'i phyag gis rdo rje che// snying kar gsor la shin tu brtson// de la sogs pa nga'i yon tan ldan// thog ma nyid du rnam par gzhag/ slob ma
226b5(rgyud): 'am yang na gzhan yang rung // mtshan kun gyis ni rnam rgyan pa// tshul bzhin byin gyis brlab bya ste// dbus kyi dkyil du bzhag par bya// bdag nyid kyang ni mnyam gzhag ste// de la
226b6(rgyud): sogs pa yon tan gtso// dbus kyi stan la 'dug pa na// bdag ni rab dgyes zhesu smra// des ni slob ma byin rlabs te// thams cad las byed phun sum tshogs// rdo rje pad+mo las 'byung ba'i// gas
226b7(rgyud): ba yis kyang dbang bskur ro// rab dgyes la sogs yon tan ldan// yid 'ong bu mo btsal byas te// mgrin pa dpral ba snying spyi bor// lha la sogs pa'i 'bru bsgoms te// mtshan ma phyag rgyar rab
226b8(rgyud): 'bar ba// rdo rje pad+mor mnyam sbyor ba'i// rang la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis// tshul bzhin thams cad bzhag par bya// mdun du lha mo smos byed ma// ma mchu 'dzin pa'i ro la dgyes// dkar dam
227a1(rgyud): dog 'dres pa yi// thams cad rgyan dang yang dag ldan// lo ni bcu drug lon pa'i mchog/ shes rab can gyis mdun du bzhag/ g.ya su lha mo gsod byed ma// mtshon cha'i
227a2(rgyud): mda' ni 'dren par brtson// do shal rkang gdub dag gis rgyan// lo grangs nyi shu lon pa ste// gser gyi ri bo zhu ba 'dra// chu skyes spyan ni yid tsam sngo// sems dpa' che la dgyes mdzad cing / 
227a3(rgyud): 'di ni tshul bzhin bzhag par bya// rgyab tu lha mo rmongs byed ma// pad+mo dmar po mdog gi 'od// chu srin rgyal mtshan mdzes ma'o// sku tshe'i tshad ni nyi shu gcig/ dga' byed 'dod pa'i ro la dgyes// 
227a4(rgyud): sna tshogs na bza' yang dag gsol// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// sna tshogs pad+mo sbyor la sogs// ga dar gyi bya ba rab bslabs bzhag/ g.yon du sna tshogs chen mo ste// 
227a5(rgyud): sna tshogs dgos pa'i rjes bslabs pa// sku tshe'i tshad ni ba/ cu gnyis ldan// rnal 'byor pa la shin tu brtson// lha dang lha min mi yi rnams// 'gro ba thams cad myos 'gyur ma/
