227a6(rgyud): sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// sna tshogs dar gyi na bza' gsol// grwa rnams kyi ni thams cad du// gzugs sgra dri ro reg gi rnams// gdug pa me tog gsung ldan pa// gzi brjid chen po
227a7(rgyud): 'od dang ldan// ci rigs par ni bzhag par bya// sgo yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rang gi las kyi phyag rgyar ldan// skal ldan dga' la rnam mos pa// sgo srung bzhi ni bzhag par bya// gzhan ya
227a8(rgyud): rnam par sna tshogs rnams// pi bang gling bu brdab pa dang // rnga rngarnga chen mu ku dang // mur dza dang dar dang // gar dang dbyangs dang bzhad pa che// rol mo yo byad sna tshogs rnams// dga' byed dkyil
227b1(rgyud): 'khor bzhag par bya// phyi yi dkyil 'khor thams cad do// dkyil 'khor 'di'i phyi rol du// rdo rje nam mkha' 'gro ma bzhag/ yi dgas rgyal po yang dag zhon// dpa' bo 'jigs byed gzugs 'dzi/ 
227b2(rgyud): te// skal ldan rang gi lag car ldan// gdug pa'i sems kyis bsdigs byed cing // sha khrag dang ni rgyu ma dang // rkang dang tshil bu za spyod pa// dkyil 'khor byas te 'dug pa ni// tshogs kyi dkyil
227b3(rgyud): 'khor bzhag par bya// dga' bar byed dang 'dren par byed// gsod par byed dang spro bar byed// rdo rje mkha' 'gro tshogs kyi rnams// shar gyi phyogasu bzhag par bya// gzi brjid che dang 'bar byed ma
227b4(rgyud): 'jigs byed bong bu'i lho ru ste// gtsug lag mthong ba'i/ rgyu yis ni// mkhas pas tshul bzhin bzhag par bya/ chags chen mo dang chags bral dang // 'khor lo mo dang rgyas
227b5(rgyud): 'debs mo// rab tu sbyor bas sbyor byas te// ci rigs nub tu bzhag par bya// sna tshogs lus dang srung ba dang / gnod sbyin ma dang yang dag 'brog/ sngags dang phyag rgyas byin
227b6(rgyud): rlabs te// sngags mkhan ci rigs ci rigs byang chub bzhag/ shar gyi grwa ru bzhag pa ni// bya rog gdong ste mig 'dra zhing // 'jigs pa'i mig dang 'jigs pa'i gdong // ji ltar rje su 'thun
227b7(rgyud): byas te// yi dgas stan la yang dag 'dug/ sna tshogs mchog gi mdog 'dzin te// lag pa dri dang khar gzhong thogs// mchog tu sha dang khrag za ba'o// nub dang lho yi mtshams bzhag pa// 
227b8(rgyud): bzhad dang 'ug pa'i gdong ring ma// khros pa'i khyi dang phag gi gdong // gsus po che la lto 'phyangs ma// nub byang gi ni mtshams dag tu// rnga mo bong bu'i gdong 'dzin dang // khros pa'i ra dang
228a1(rgyud): byi la'i gdong // sgyu ma'i mgo nas pa byed rnams// shar dang byang gi mtshams dag tu// keng rus dkar po 'dzin pa ste// khros pa rus pa'i phreng bas klubs// sngo 'byungs mo la/ 
228a2(rgyud): bum pa 'dzin// phan tshun 'thab par brtson pa yi// lce spyang gi ni 'khor gyi rnams// 'jigs byed gdong ni mche ba 'byin// rnam par 'gyur ba'i gzugs 'dzin pa'o// sgo srung gi ni phyogs kun
228a3(rgyud): tu/ sgo bzhi rnamasu bzhag bya ba// byang gi phyog su 'bod 'grogs te// bum pa rna ni shar nyid du// nub tu rnam par 'jig pa'o// lhor ni gshin rje rgyal po bzhag/ de dang gzhan yang rgyal
228a4(rgyud): po mchog/ na mkha' 'gro bas kun tu bskor// bum pa na mas pa sna tshogs te// gser dang dngul las byas pa la/ sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag dkris// me tog 'bras bu
228a5(rgyud): rnams kyis brgyan// bdud rtsi lnga yis gang byas pa// sna na lnga dang ni yang dag ldan// rin chen lnga dang ldan byas pa/ 'bru rnams lnga yis rgyun byas pa'i// bum pa bcu drug banas/ 
228a6(rgyud): byas te// bcu gnyis brgyad dam yang na phyed// tha na chung ngu gcig tsam yang // ji ltar rims bzhin bzhag byas te// dbu su bum pa ro yi mchog/ dam tshig chus ni gang byas pa// gser ram
228a7(rgyud): dngul lam zangs kyang rung // lcags sams las byas pa la// zla ba nyi ma dri chu dang // btung ba snum por ldan pa yi// dbang po kun las 'byung ba rnams// sha srang gcig gis rab bsres pa/ 
228a8(rgyud): kun las 'phags pa ro yi mchog/ tshogs kyi dbusu bsgrub byas te// btung ba bzhin du myangs pa yos// rdo rje blo ldan bskal par gnas// rnam pa sna tshogs nye ba'i zas// bza' ba dang ni bza
228b1(rgyud): bas mchod// mchod pa nye ba'i zas lnga dang // tshad med 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas// tshad med rnal 'byor ma tshogs la// skad cig skad cig mchod par bya// sngags mkhan tshun bzhin mnyam gzhag ste/ 
228b2(rgyud): 'byung po rnams la gtor ma byin// lnga rnams kyi ni thams cad la// he ru ka yi phyag rgya yis// nyid kyi gtor ma byin rlabs te// spyan drangs gtsang sbras byas pa dbul// gzungs kyi tshogs ni de rnams
228b3(rgyud): la/ mnyes pa byas nas slar gshegaso// rnal 'byor ma chen dkyil 'khor du// slob ma'i mchog ni gzhugs par bya// mtshungs par spyod pa rab mdzes ma// sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag dkris// 
228b4(rgyud): lag pa g.yon gyis bzung byas te// rabang gyis longs spyod/ dpag rgya yis// bcug nas sgo yis gnyid du// blo ldan dadam tshig bsgrag par bya// 'di las mi bya cung zad med/ 
228b5(rgyud): thabs dang shes rab sems nyid kyis// rtag tu dogs pa ni/ da byas te// 'dod pa lnga yi yon tan spyod// gzhan ya nga dam tshig nyams pa dang // skye bo gang dag dam la gnon// 
228b6(rgyud): brtul zhugs khyod kyis de drangs te// khrag chen po ni btung bar bya// gang dag slob dpon smong byed dang // gang dag bka' rnams mi byed pa// de dag khros nas khrag chen po// blo ldan snying las btung ba
228b7(rgyud): bya dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed dang // slob dpon la yang gnod byed pa// rdo rje khro bo'i bsdus pa yi// dam tshig bsgoms te bsgral bar bya// de nas dam tshig blung byas te// rdo rje bdud rtsi ro/ 
228b8(rgyud): mi mchog/ dung chen por ni bzhag par bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu thung // kye dmyal ba yi ni chu 'di ste// khyod kyi snying la kun tu gnas// dam tshig bsrungs pas dngos grub ste// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'ong
229a1(rgyud): 'thung // oM badz+ra ud ka hUM tha// dam tshig la ni brgyar bzlas pa'i// byin gyis brlabs te 'thung du gzhug/ gzhan du dam tshig mi 'gyur te// dngos grub nyid du'ang 'di 'gyur// 
229a2(rgyud): bdag ni dam tshig skal dga' zhes// slob ma sngags ni brjod du zhugs// sgo glar gnas nas bri bya ba// kye khyod dga' ba ci la dang // 'jug pa yis kyang smra bya ba// bdag ni skal ldan pade mchog la/ 
229a3(rgyud): rab dgyes 'phrul la bdag dga' ste// mchog tu dga' la bdag dga'o// de nas rnal 'byor ma mchog gis// dkyil du me tog bor byas te// me tog gang la lhung ba yi// lha nyid du ni dngos grub bo// 
229a4(rgyud): dbang bskur ba yi phyag rgya yis// de nas spyi bor dbang bskur bya// / bum pa rnam pa bzhi yis kyang // mnyam par gzhag ste lnga po yis// pad+mo dkyil 'khor zhugs byas te// de nas
229a5(rgyud): yang ni dbang bskur bya// ci rigs par ni gzungs ma'i rnams// bdag ni skal ldan zhesu smra// gang dag 'go bar gyur/ pa yi// lha de nyid ni bstan par bya// dga' bar byed pa'i gzun/ 
229a6(rgyud): mde'i// khyod kyis rtag tu sgrub par gyis// de nas rgyal dbang slob ma de// nang gi sbas pa bsdus pa yi// gsang ba mnyam par 'jug pa yis// sbyor dang ldan pas dbang bskur bya// rdo rje pad+mo las drangs
229a7(rgyud): pa// sbom po dang ni dbang gis blangs// rdo rje dkan du bzhag byas nas// rtag pa dge ba bde ba che// kye ma'o dam tshig bde brjod cing // kye ma bde ba blang bar bya// 'di ni gsang ba zhes bya ste// dbang bskur ba yi
229a8(rgyud): thabs mchog go// rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid che'i// rang gi khar ni rdo rje bzhag/ sems dpa' chen po drangs byas na// sems kyis byang chub bde ba 'thob// 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba ste// dbang bskur ba
229b1(rgyud): yi bde ba'o// slob ma mi shes pa rnams la// 'di dag thams cad bsgrubs mi bya// rdo rje slob dpon gyis bya ba// yang nas yang du brtag par bya// 'di yis dbang ni bskur ma thag/ slob ma tshogs kyi
229b2(rgyud): bdag por 'gyur// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa yi// slob dpon nyid du bde bar 'gyur// gzungs ma rnams kyi dga' ba'i bdag/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi rjer bshad do// mkha' la 'gro ba'i khyor 'gyur/ 
229b3(rgyud): te// ri dang 'gro ba kun gyi bdag/ de nas shes rab ye shes dbang // slob ma mchog la sbyin par bya// gzungs ma de ni bdag nyid la// bla ma nyid kyis byin rlabs te// dngos grub 'bras bu myur
229b4(rgyud): 'thob phyir// slob ma la ni sbyin par bya// dbang bskur shin tu spras pa yis// rdo rje slob dpon tshul ji bzhin// blo/ ldan the tsom med pa'i phyir// rnam pa bzhi po 'di sbyin no// 
229b5(rgyud): de tshun cad ni slob ma la// rgyud kun las ni gang cung zad// yi ge'i tshul gyis sbas pa rnams// gsang ba mchog ni bstan par bya// de nas de nyid langs byas te// slob dpon
229b6(rgyud): rkang par gtugs byas nas// rgyal po dbang phyug bde dam pa// thams cad yon ni dbul bar bya// gzungs de de dag thams cad la// ci dga' bar ni yon yang 'bul// slob dpon cung zad gang 'dod/ 
229b7(rgyud): pa// yid la bsams pa'i yon yang rung // dam tshig 'das pas 'jigs sa yis// de dag thams cad dbul bar bya// slob dpon la ni yon gyi mchog/ rigs kyi khyab par dbul byas te// seng ge
229b8(rgyud): gdan la nyid kyis ma// sangs rgyas byin ni yon mchog yin// glang po rin chen gser dag dang // sring mo bla ma'i yon mchog yin// rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs yin te// yon de mchog gi yon yin no// 
230a1(rgyud): rin rin pad+mo'i chung ma dang // shing rtarta ni shin tu rgyun// sna tshogs rin chen rnam dag pa// mu tig phreng bas shin tu mdzes// bu mo rin chen dra ba'i yis// rgyan te sna tshogs rdo rje la'o// 
230a2(rgyud): rgyal po yi ni dbang phyug dang // chung ma bla ma dbul bar bya// 'phrul gyi gzhon pa Na sngar sna tshogs pa/ glang porta ni shin tu rgyan// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi rje// nan tan bla ma dbul bar bya// bla ma'i yon/ 
230a3(rgyud): gyi phyag rgya 'di// rdo rje blo ldan slob ma yis// ci ste bde byed kun 'dod na// dga' dang mos pa'i sems kyis bya// de la sogs pa'i sbyor ba yis// rab dgyes gdon mi za ba'i bde// gang gis myur du 'thob
230a4(rgyud): 'gyur te// slob dpon gtso mchog nyid du 'gyur// chos rnams kun gyis dbang phyug rgya la// rdo rje blo ldan mchog tu gyur// rin chen kun gyi rigs kyi rgyal// de bzhin sna tshogs rigs su/ 
230a5(rgyud): tu/ pad+mo'i rigs kun dpal dang ldan// rdo rje rigs kun bdag por de// sangs rgyas kyi ni rigs kun dang // rgyal ba'i gtso ga mchog tu 'gyur// dkyil 'khor gyi ni 'khor lo'i gar/ 
230a6(rgyud): nyid dang slob ma'i tshogs gyur pas// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// sems dpa' bdag nyid mchog par bya// phan tshun la sogs tshul gyis ni// shes rab mchod pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje che yi thabs gnas
230a7(rgyud): te// mkha' gro kun la mchod par bya// phyi yi sbas pa gsang la sogs// nang gi mchod pa mchog gi rnams// phyag rgya'i sbyor ba tshul gnas te// tshul bzhin rgyas pa dbul bar bya// lus dang ngag sems bde
230a8(rgyud): byed kyis// mchod pa'i bdag nyid mchod par bya// 'dod pa'i rol pa myong ba yi// myangs na mchod pa 'thob par 'gyur// mchod pa kun gyi cho ga yis// rang rigs khyad par shes byas te// sgrub pa thams/ 
230b1(rgyud): cad sgrub byas nas// dngos grub thams cad myur du 'thob// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'di mthong bas// dga' mgu rangs pa'i yid kyis ni// rdo rje sems la phyag byed cing // rang gi dkyil 'khor gsol ba 'debs/ 
230b2(rgyud): bde byed chen po'i skyil mo brgya// rigs kyi khyad par gyis ni lnga// lha rnams kyang ni re re yang // sems kyi khyad par mchog mtha' yas// 'das pa'i dus na mabyung ba// mtha' yas chos ni yangs pa bstan/ 
230b3(rgyud): 'dod chags rnams kyis dkris pa yi// sdug bsngal gzir ba'i mtha' nas 'gro// 'dod pa'i mchog gi longs spyod rnams// mos pa'i rjesu zhugs shing spong // kun tu chags par mi 'gyur zhing // bde bas
230b4(rgyud): longs pa'i yid dang ldan// byang chub snying por bgrod pa ni// dam bcas rnams dang sems kyi so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa thams cad kyi bdag po kun tu bzang po chen po/ 
230b5(rgyud): rab tu bzhad cing spyan zur gyis gzigs pa'i thugs kyis shin tu gyes pa kun tu longs spyod pa'i dkyil mo krung gi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ skyil mo krung chen
230b6(rgyud): po'i dpal zhes bya ba rang gi phyag rgya'i ye shes nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // g.yas dang g.yon gyis tshul gyis ni// rkang pa gnyis ka bteg byas te// bdag nyid brla ni mi snang bzhin// rtsa ba
230b7(rgyud): skyil mo bcing bar bya// sbyor ba gar mkhan tshul gyis ni// gar gyi sbyor bas gar bya'o// rdo rje gdan gyi bde ba che// 'di yis bdud las rgyal bar 'gyur// gdug pa dang ni dgra thams cad// skad cig gis
230b8(rgyud): kyang smos ci dgos// rab tu gyes pa'i stan 'di yis// yang dag byang chub myur du thob// mi phyed pa ni thig ler bcas// 'og gi phyog su yi ge drug/ shes rab can gyis bskyod cing dazlas// 'byung ba'i tshen
231a1(rgyud): / phaT ces bshad// pad+mo mi phyed 'dren pa dang // thig ler bcas pa sbyor bar bya// mi phyed o dang yang dag ldan// tsheg drag bcas pa bde 'byung na'o// bud med la ni zhag bdun du// 'di yi/ 
231a2(rgyud): rtsen par byas pa na// na mkha' thams cad gang ba yi// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor chen po mthong // rab dgyes longs spyod gnas pa yi// sems dpa' che la slong mdzad de// gzungs kyi pad+mo las byung ba// 
231a3(rgyud): bde byed mchog gi dbang bskuraro// de nas rab dga' bde thob pa// sems dpa' deng ni dngos grubo// thog ma dang ni mtha' med par// 'dod pa thams cad de long spyod// tshe dang dpal dang phun sum ldan/ 
231a4(rgyud): gdon dang dug dang tsha ba'i nad// mkha' 'gros nye bar gtso sa pa dang // sdig can 'khor ba las grol te// sa rnams kun la rnam par rgyu// gzi brjid nyi ma shar dang 'dra// sna tshogs
231a5(rgyud): 'dra ba 'bar byed pas// sna tshogs thams cad snang byed cing nga // de yi sems can thams cad kyi// nad dang mya ngana' jigs chen 'phrog/ phyag rgya 'di yis sbyor ba yis// ye shes
231a6(rgyud): lnga ni bsten par bya// rtsa ba'i bskyil mo zhes bya ba// phyag rgya chen po'i las kyi don// thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o// bdag gi rkang pa dbus su bsdu// de yi rkang pas bcings byas te// sems dpa'i
231a7(rgyud): skyil mo bzhin du 'brel// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // khams gsum sgrub par bzhed pa yin// yi ge rnams ni snga ma bzhin// rang gi lhar ni sbyor brtson pas// bsgoms sam yang na bskyod kyang / 
231a8(rgyud): rung / sngags pa 'di yis dngos grub ste// sngags kyi sems 'dzin gtsang ma yi// zhag bdun sgom pa sgom byas nas// yang dag dngos grub nyid du 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab te// sgro
231b1(rgyud): ba shin tu bsten byas nas// gdon mi za bar rgyal po 'thob// yid bzhin dgos pa thams cad byed// rdo rje skyil mo krung ngo // gzungs ma ste bcing ba ni// rin po che ltar sbyar byas te// rang gi rkang pa mi snang
231b2(rgyud): bya// rin chen kun gyi skyil mo krung // 'di ni rin chen thams cad kyi// dbul zhing phongs pa 'joms byed de// sdig pa thams cad 'phrog byed ma// gnod pa'i dug kun 'phrog par byed// gdug pa thams
231b3(rgyud): cad rmongs byed de// dgra rnams thams cad 'joms par byed// khro bo thams cad 'dzum byed de// gdug pa rnams kyi rgyas 'debs na// mi g.yeng zla ba gcig gis ni// 'di yis rgyal po dngos gru'o// 
231b4(rgyud): yid bzhin las rnams thams cad byed// ci ste bdag dang rgyal po ru// mchog tu rmad 'byung sgrub 'dod na// rin da chen sems kyi rin chen mtshan// gsang ba'i phyag rgya tshul gnon
231b5(rgyud): pa// rgyal po khams gsum rgyal byed pa// zla phred tsam rgya sa 'grub par 'gyur// rin po che yi skyil mo'o// de bzhi na rkang pa gnyis bzhag pa// pad+mo 'dra bar sbyar byas te// bdag
231b6(rgyud): gam de bzhin gzhan yang rung // blo ldan pad+mo bde bsgrub bya// 'di yis sems can thams cad dang // mdor na sangs rgyas rnams dag dang // rdo rje nyi ma ma lus kyang // dbang du 'gyur ba gdon mi za// bde
231b7(rgyud): ldan pho brang chen po yis// bde byed 'di yis 'thob par byed// sems can khams rnams thams cad tu// sems dpa' chen po 'gro 'ong byed// pad+mo'i skyil mo'o// de bzhin skyil mo rgyus byas te// sna tshos
231b8(rgyud): tshul gyis sbyor ba bya// sngags mkhan chen po'i sbyor ba yis// sngags mkhan yi ge shin tu brtson// zlos pa byed cing rnams bsgoms na// dngos grub rtag pa 'thob par 'gyur// mi g.yeng sngon gyi gdu/ 
232a1(rgyud): pa yi/ las rnams thams cad 'phrog par byed// sna tshogs skyil du gnas pa yis// bla med dngos grub thob par 'gyur// sna tshogs kyi ni skyil mo'o// de nas mkha'agro ma'i skyil / 
232a2(rgyud): rgyas/ thams cad khrag ni 'phrog byas te// gzungs ma yi ni rkang pa gnyis// yid kyi gnya' bar rkang pa 'deg/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i sbyor ba yis// bsnyen pa khrag rnams 'phrog par byed// mnyam par gzhag
232a3(rgyud): nas gzungs ma yi// rkang pa gcig ni mgul nyid du// sbyor dang ldan pas bteg byas na// zas rnams thams cad 'phrog byed de// btung dang bza' ba bca' ba dang // gos kyi rgyan gyis grub pa yis// de bzhin
232a4(rgyud): zhag bdun nyid kyis kyang // thams cad las byed gdon mi za// dngas pa gtogs 'dod dbang po yi// dpal chen mchog ni 'phrog par byed// lag pa sgreng ba'i tshul gyis ni// khams gsum
232a5(rgyud): rim pa rgal bar byed// mig ni btsums par byed 'gyur ba/ 'gro ba gsum po rnam par 'jig/ rus sbal bzhin du/ mnyam gzhag ste// mi g.yeng skad cig bcing byas na// gdug pa'i
232a6(rgyud): srog chags thams cad dang // dgra dang spyod bcas mi spyod phrog/ sbal pa bzhin du mnyam gzhag ste// dkyil 'khor tshul gyis bskor bar bya'o// ma lus rnams kyang rmongs byed de// khams gsum rnams
232a7(rgyud): kyang rgal bar byed// gtogs 'dod kyi ni mnyam gzhag ste// sa gsum rnams kyi rgyas gdab bya// gar dbang gi ni mnyam gzhag ste// sa gsum rnams ni gar byed gzhug/ dril bu yi ni mnyam gzhag ste
232a8(rgyud): sa gsum rnams ni gdab par bya// gzhon nu'i skyil mo bcings pa yis// sangs rgyas bde chen 'thob par byed// skyil mo phyed ni mnyam gzhag nas// gnyis pa yis ni mnan byas na// khams gsum/ 
232b1(rgyud): thams cad gnon 'gyur zhing // 'dod byed thams cad dngos grub bo// dga' byed ma yi mnyam gzhag pas// skyil mo rab tu dga' thob ste// dga' byed ma yi yid 'ong ma// khams gsum thams cad dngos
232b2(rgyud): grub bo// rigs 'dzin rnam par gzhag byas te// khams gsum skad cig mnan par bya// dpal khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i// mdor 'dus gzungs ma'i bcings pa yis// 'jig rten
232b3(rgyud): gsum ni rnam rgyal te// skad cig khams gsum bdag por 'gyur// rtag par phan tshun 'brel pa yis// dpung pa gnyis ni skum byas te// thams cad sgo ni 'gegs pa yis// mche ba sbom po
232b4(rgyud): rab tu sbyar// g.yas kyi brkyang bskum tshul gyis ni// gnon dpa'i mnan pas bsdigs byas te// mi phyed sbyor bas pa skul bya ba// khros pa'i sems kyis myang bar bya// g.yon pa'i
232b5(rgyud): brkyang bskum sbyar bar bya// myur du mnan pas bteg bya zhing / mthe'u chung bong ba'i lcags kyu yis// mdzub mo lce la rA gi byas te// sa bon tsheg drag hri ldan pa'i// thig la'i spyi bor rgyan
232b6(rgyud): byas pas// bdud rtsi 'am ni rig ma drang bar bya// lce yi thog mar spro byas te// 'dren pa'i tshul gyis drang bar bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin mnyam gzhag ste// kha yi phyogasu mche ba yis// sbom po lce dang 'dra
232b7(rgyud): byas te// khros pa mtshe ba sbyor ba yis// sor mo thong ba bzhin byas nas// khrag mang po ni btung bar bya// yi ge dang po oM dang ldan spyi bor thig le ldan byas te// 'og gi phyog su ra yis gdags/ 
232b8(rgyud): u 'dren nga ros brgyan par bya// 'di ni kho bo'i snying po ste// mchog tu thams cad las byed pa'o// gsod pa dang ni 'dren pa kun// dbang dang dbang rnams byed la sogs// de la sogs pa'i las gzhan yang / 
233a1(rgyud): tshul bzhin sbyar bas byed par 'gyur// shi ba bzhin du mig btsums nas// rang gi lus ni bskum byas te// dum bu lnga mtha'i sbyor ba yi// dgra rnams thams cad bsang par bya/ 
233a2(rgyud): nga ro dang po yang dag ldan// bdag nyid ngo bo thams cad bya// sangs rgyas chen po sgom byas te// zhi ba'i 'od zer sprin phung spro// de yi lus ni zhi bar 'gyur// de yi sems can thams cad kyi// tsha ba gdon dang du
233a3(rgyud): la sogs// sdug bsngal mkha' 'gro'i mche ba dang // 'jigs pa thams cad bral bar byed// shes rab pha rol phyin mnyam gzhag/ bdag nyid kyis ni tshul bzhin du// 'di yis thams cad nang gi rnams// 
233a4(rgyud): sdug bsngal dogs par 'phrog par byed// de la sogs pa mtha' dayas pa// na mkha' sa steng las kyi rnams// snying khar rje sems dpa' bzhag/ yid bzhin thams cad byed par 'gyur// 
233a5(rgyud): myur du rdo rje slob dpon la// sngags kyi dngos grub don 'dod pas// gus pa zhes sar bcas pa yi// shin tu lhag par phyog/ sa par bya// nam yang rdo rje slob dpon gyi// sems ni dkrug pa
233a6(rgyud): mi bya ste// ci ste shes rab 'chal pas byed// myur du ma rag lhung bar 'gyur// nad dang 'tshe ba dag dag dang // gdon dang tsha bdug nyid kyis// slob dpon zhabs la smod byed pa// gti mug chen por de 'chig
233a7(rgyud): bla ma las ni dngos grub 'thob// bla ma mtho ris bla ma bde// de bas nan tan thams cad kyi// bla ma'i bka' las 'da' mi bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag po
233a8(rgyud): kun tu bzang po dpal shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba gdon mi za ba'i rdo rje dam tshig dbang bskur ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen
233b1(rgyud): po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje mchog gsang ba snga chen po zla gsang thig le'i rgyud kyi rgyal po shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i tshogs kyi dkyis
233b2(rgyud): 'khor te bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i tshogs// rdo rje rnal 'byor pa dang // rnal 'byor ma dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen
233b3(rgyud): po'i tshogs dang / rdo rje na mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ma'i tshogs kyi g.yog rnams mchog tu dga' ba chen po skyes te/ ca co 'byin cing dbyangs chen po brjod par gyur to// kye ma'o rdo rje sems
233b4(rgyud): dpa' yi// rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa che// sna tshogs thabs ni bde byed che// sna tshogs ye shes bde ba che// kye ma kun tu bzang po yi// dge ba'i ye shes bde ba che// gang ba de phyir ni
233b5(rgyud): rig ma yi// pad+mo las ni gnas pa mdzad// kye ma'o rig pa shin tu zab// shes rab pha rol phyin pa bde// sems can kun la shes rab kyi// mun pa'i thibs po sel bar mdzad// 
233b6(rgyud): kye ma'o thams cad ngo mtshar che// mkha'agro'i dra bas gar mdzad cing // rnam par mdzad dang myang ba dang // mnye ba dang ni 'phrog pa'i mchog/ e ma'o shin tu rab tu dgyes// skal ldan skal la
233b7(rgyud): sprod pa dang // sna tshogs skal bas bde byed che// sna tshogs rdo rje shin tu mdzes// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po shin tu dgyes pa chen po kun tu longs spyod pa'i 'dod pa'i lha shin tu dgyes
233b8(rgyud): pa bde ba chen po la gnas pa la rnal 'byor ma thams cad dang / mchog gi pha rol phyin ma la sogs pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo thams cad rang gi gdan las bzhengs te/ shin tu dgyes pa
234a1(rgyud): chen po'i 'gying ba'i 'dud pas phyag byas te/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba 'thob par byed pa'i dbyangs kyi phyag rgya chen po 'dis mnyes par mdzad do// rgyu ma'i bde bas
234a2(rgyud): nam mkha' kun tu gang ba yi// sprul pa'i rang bzhin skye ba mchog gi bde ba sten te// rje su chags pa'i pad+ma dga' bas kun khyab cing // chos kyi bde ba nyid kyang kun tu btang snyoms mdzad// e ma'o// 
234a3(rgyud): 'di lta'i gzugs ma bde mchog dpal dang rnam ldan ma// byams ma'i phyogasu mi gtong ye shes nyid kyis 'jug/ 'dod pa'i yon tan 'di rnams chos nyid rnam par dag/ dug gsum dbang du mdzad cing
234a4(rgyud): mos pa rnams mi bskyod// ngo mtshar phyogs dang ma bral byang chudab snying por bgrod// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa' kun tu ba bzang po 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i spyan rgyas pas 'khor de dag
234a5(rgyud): thams cad la yud tsam kun tu gzigs te/ rdo rje pad+mo dang ga/ nyi su med pa'i sbyor ba'i dpal chen mo zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ cang mi gsung bar mnyam pa
234a6(rgyud): zhugs te// dbugs mi rngub dbugs mi byin// dbugs rab tu gtong bar mi mdzad// kun tu mi gzigs kun tu rnam par mi gzigs// bzhengs par mi mdzad// bzhugs par mi mdzad// gshegs
234a7(rgyud): par mi mdzad// gsung bar yang mi mdzad// rnam par rtog pa yang mi mdzad// bzhin du bcom ldan 'das shin tu bde ba chen pos na mkha'i dbyings thams cad shin tu khyab par shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i/ 
234a8(rgyud): bde ba las btsal te rgyas par mdzad pa na// der de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad drangs bcug bcings dbang du byas te// 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan gyis mnyes par byas te bzhugs par gyur to// de nas
234b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'du ba mdzad nas/ yang nas yang bcom ldan 'das la gzigs te/ bde ba chen po shin tu dgyes pa dang / gnyi su med par long spyod pa dpal chen po
234b2(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bskul nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems chen po la yang thim pa na// khams gsum 'dir dam pa'i chos
234b3(rgyud): ston pa dang // 'jug par byed/ bstan pa la gnas par byed pa 'ga' yang med// sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun 'jug par byed pa yang med// khros pa dang gtum po chen po dang / rngam
234b4(rgyud): ba dang / rab tu gdug pa chen por sems pa dang / 'dod nadags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi mun pas bsgribs pa dang / gtum 'khrug chen po dang / gzhan gyi srog 'phrog
234b5(rgyud): pa dang / gzhan gyi sems 'phrog pa dang / gzhan gyi bud med kyis 'chums pa dang / tshig rtsub mo la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang // nye ba'i nyon mongs pas gzhan la gtses pa
234b6(rgyud): dang / gcig gi sha gcig za ba dang / thabs med pa'i lam la gnas pa rnams kyis// kye ma'o 'jig rten gsum po 'di brlago zhes sngon gyi smon lam las kyi stobs la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs
234b7(rgyud): pa rnams kyis gzig so// thabs dang shes rab kyi thugs rje'i smon lam chen po na mkha'i dbyings kun tu yang dag par gnas pa 'di lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu brlag par
234b8(rgyud): gzigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba yang dag par zhugs pa kun tu bzang po chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'dis
235a1(rgyud): bskul ba mdzad do// to rang bzhin dag padag pa pad+ma bde ba'i mchog mnga' ba// thugs kyi ying bzhin rin chen gzhan la dgongs nas bzhengs mdzad de// bskal pa mtha' nas bstan
235a2(rgyud): ba'i byams pas gzugs kyis brjid pa dang // byang chub snying po'i chu nges 'gro ba rnams kyi rang bzhin khrus// a la la la ho/ pad+mo'i 'byung gnas bde gshegs kun gyi mchog dang ldan// sdug bsngam
235a3(rgyud): kun sel ba yin thugs rjes 'jig rten gsum la gzigs// dga' ba'i rol pas gar dang bcas te bzhengs shing dbang du mdzod// a la la la to// sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis bsgrags gsang bI
235a4(rgyud): 'gro ba kun gyi yid dang 'thad pa'i gsang chen 'di phyung ste/ rnam dag spyod yul gzhan gyi mi 'phrogs na mkha' la/ dngos med rol mo'i gzhan las 'phang ba bzhes shing mdzad du gsol/ 
235a5(rgyud): a la la la 'o// skad cig ma yi spyod yul 'dis// mun pa tham sa cad sel ba'i phyir// gzhan la thugs rjes dgo/ nas su// bying ba'i lnga rnams basman du gsol// dbyings kyi rgya
235a6(rgyud): po 'di yis ni// dgyes mchog dam pa bskul byas na// pad+mo dra ba rdo rje dang // bde bar sbyor bar bzhengs su gsol// bde ba chen po bde gnas pa// gtso la 'di yis bskul ba yis// sems can kun
235a7(rgyud): don bzhengs 'gyur te// rgyal ba thams cad gdon par mdzad// de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po kun tu bzang po dpal rdo rje 'dzin yang dag pa dang ldan pa'i bde ba bde ba chen pos rgyan pa'i dpal zhes
235a8(rgyud): bya ba'i tinge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// bzhengs nas phyogs bcu mtha' yas rab 'byam mtha'as klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun gzigs nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ kye ma'o khams gsum
235b1(rgyud): 'di stong so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po rnams dang bral bas gdug pa thams cad kyis 'di dag nye bar gtses/ gnod sbyin dang srin po thams cad dang / nad dang / 'tshe ba dang gdon chen po dang / 
235b2(rgyud): non mongs pa dang / nye ba'i non mongs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par zos nas dgongs pa na/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gtong ba'i rdo rje ye shes kyi bde ba chen po dpal
235b3(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes bde ba chen po'i rang gi rdo rje dang pad+mo las byang chub kyi sems nye bar bsdu bar bya ste/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
235b4(rgyud): rdo rje las phyung ngo // thog mar oM ni thig ler bsam byas pa'i// rdo rjesems dpa' bcas pa 'brug gi sgra 'byin pa// mi phye dang 'dren pa yang dag gnyis dang ldan pa ste// 'di ni ston pa'i mchog
235b5(rgyud): sde rdo rje'i rigs nyid ngo // byung nas rnamakha'i dbyings thams cad du gang pa'i spobs snang bar byas te// slar yang 'dus nas rje lta bur gnaso// yang spro ba dang bsdu ba byas nas sgrar 'dus pa la/ 
235b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje sems dpa' lta bur gyur nas// shar gyi dkyil 'khor dbu su bzhugs par gyur pa na// hUM hU hUM zhes bzhad pa chen por bzhad cing
235b7(rgyud): zhes brjod nas bzhugs te// rang gi sems dpa'i skyil mos g.yon du yid tsam 'gying bas 'dud pa/ g.yas kyi rdo rje gsor zhing 'dzum dang bcas shing spyan rgyas pa/ che ba'i chen po dbu lnga pa// phyag
235b8(rgyud): ni bcu drug rnams dang ldan// sna tshogs sku ni mchog 'dzin pa// kha dog rnam lnga gzi brjid chen// mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs 'dzin// rdo rje sgyur mar rab tu gnas// mkhas pa gang gis snying kha nyid
236a1(rgyud): mnyam par bzhag ste 'dzin byas na// rdo rje pad+mo de tshe yis// rdo rje sems dpa' bde myur 'thob// de nas bcom ldan 'das namakha' 'gro ma kun longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i jiH
236a2(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las mchog tu gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis zla gsang thig le las namakha' shin tu dgyes pa 'thob par byed
236a3(rgyud): bde ba chen po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'ad phyung ngo // oM yi gtsug tu thig le ste// mi phyed thig ler bcas pa yi// 'og tu gzi brjid yang dag bcas// mthar ning ste
236a4(rgyud): tshig drag bcas// 'dir ni rin chen thams cad kyi// snying po ma chog tu rmad 'byung ba'o// byung ba yis ni na mkha' dang / sangs rgyas kyi ni zhing kun tu// 'od zer smin phung rgyas byas te/ 
236a5(rgyud): slar de nyid bzhugs par 'gyur// de yi thugs kar zhugs nas kyang // lnga yis tshul gyis bzhugs par 'gyur/ rgyal ba kun gyis dbang bskur nas// sems dpa'i tshul gyis s+thA/ 
236a6(rgyud): pa ni/ kha dog rnams lnga yangs par spyan// chu skyes bzhad pa 'dzum dang bcas// nyi ma'i gzi brjid mdzes pa che// phyag rgya la sogs sna tshogs rgyan// skyil mo 'gying ba g.yon du 'dud// g.yas kyi/ 
236a7(rgyud): snying khar rin chen 'dzin// brgyad gnyis phyag rgya ngo bo yis// dri ma gsum spangs rgyan pa ste// rang gi dkyil 'khor gang byas nas// sna tshogs lho ru gnas par 'gyur// rnam pa kun mkhyen mngon rig
236a8(rgyud): pa'i// nad kyis glongs pa 'jigs par 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gzi brjid chen mo mdangs che ba// dbul dang nad dang gnod chen po// sems can kun gyi 'phrog par byed// nyi ma
236b1(rgyud): 'char ba dus zhing dang // nyes byed pa dus nyidang// nyid kyi snying bar 'ang byas te// nor bu na chen sgos byas na// nag bdu kyis nings par yang // ngos grubadon dang sbyin mdzad// dang ba gnyis
236b2(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// kye ma'o bde bas dbang bskur bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po mchog tu bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu dgyes pa'i 'dod pa'i dbang gi dpal zhes bya ba'i ti
236b3(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// pad+mo chen po kun tu gzigs pa'i longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i snying po chen po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi ye shes mchog tu gsang ba zla gsang thig le las 'di bya
236b4(rgyud): ngo// dang por oM dang ldan byas te// mi phyed rab btags 'dren par ba ces// tsheg drag pa ni sngags yin te// bsam pathadams cad yongasu bskor// sngags mkhan gang gis mnyam gzha/ 
236b5(rgyud): ste/ snying khar 'di ni sbyar byas nas// bdag ni 'dod chags zhe na/ sems shing // pad+mo sbyor bas bsgom par bya// mtsha mas kyi mtha' ma dus dag tu// dam tshig 'di ni spyangad byas na// zla
236b6(rgyud): ba byed kyi nang logs su// dbang phyug mo ni dngos grub 'thob// pad+mo che las byung nas kyang // thams cad du ni rgyas 'gyur te// 'di nyid du ni slar zhugs nas// pad+mo'i tshul gyis gnas par 'gyur// kun
236b7(rgyud): tu snang bas khyab byas nas// sems dpa'i tshul gyis sprul pa ni// de nas 'dod chags babs nas kyang // pad+mo'i dbusu zhugs par gyur// dkyil 'khor du ni gang ba yis// rgyab nas rjes su mnyes
236b8(rgyud): mdzad cing // 'dzum bcas pad+mo bye ba yis// thugs kyi dbus yid tsam 'dud// dpal dang ldan pa zhal lnga 'dzin// phyag ni nyi shur bzhis ma bltam// mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs ldan// sna tshogs
237a1(rgyud): rgyan gyis klubs pa yis// zla ba bzhin du rnam grol ba// brjid pas gar ni mdzad cing bzhugs// 'di yis pad+mo'i gnas nyid du// tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur// dpal
237a2(rgyud): ldan gar dbang thob 'gyur te// 'dod chags kun gyi thabs gnas pas// 'jam pa'i phyag ni stong rnams kyi// gar du mdzad cing 'gro ba 'dul// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba
237a3(rgyud): chen po kun tu bzang pos yang sna tshogs chen po kun tu longs spyod pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i ye shes mchog tu gsang
237a4(rgyud): bzla gsang thig le chen po las phyung ngo // sna tshogs chen po o chen po// steng du thig ler yang dag ldan// 'di ni dbus te/ lha 'og khro// sngags kyi mchog ni bzhag par bya// sna tshogs 'di
237a5(rgyud): ni thugs kar grags// sna tshogs phyung nas kun snang bas// sangs rgyas tshul bzhin kun mnyes byas// de nyid sla/ ra 'khor bar bzhugs te// sna tshogs rdo rje gzugs mchog
237a6(rgyud): gnas// skad cig sems dpa' sku gnas pa// rnam pa sna tshogs bzhad pas rgyan// 'gying bcas thugs kar sna tshogs 'dzin// sna tshogs gzi brjid 'bar ba gtong // phyag ni brgyad gnyis gnyi
237a7(rgyud): kyis phyogs// kha 'byed sna tshogs mtshon cha gtong // zhal lnga sna tshogs yangs che ba// bgegs spong thams cad dngos grub mdzad// dkyil 'khor gang bar bzhag nas byang du gnas// sna tshogs rdo rje bdag/ 
237a8(rgyud): mo rdo rje yang dag gis// thugs khar mdzad nas bde bar yang dag gnas// sngags mkhan zhag bdun nyid du sgom byas na// sna tshogs gyur te sna tshogs de la bab// sna tshogs las ni sna tshogs byed par 'gyur/ 
237b1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur te/ dbyangs chen po len cing dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus kyi bcom ldan 'das la mnyes pa mdzad do// gtso bo byin gyis
237b2(rgyud): brlab pa'i phyir/ ye shes lnga yi dngos po dge/ rgyal ba nyid kyis bshad par mdzod// sangs rgyas sku la bstod phyag 'tshal// sngags rigs phyag rgya yan lag bcas// lha yi de nyid pha rol phyin/ 
237b3(rgyud): bdag ni de nyid sna tshogs che// sna tshogs ye shes bstod phyag 'tshal// gzungs kyi pad+mo yang dag ldan// 'dod byed thugs kyi mchog yin te// shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba// sbyor ba'i ye shes bstod phyag
237b4(rgyud): 'tshal// chos kyi don ni gnyis med tshul// stong pa nyid kyi lam/ rig pa// yangs pa'i spyan ni so sor gzigs// me lo// nga ye shes yang dag 'byung // bya ba nan tan sems can don// ra
237b5(rgyud): gi yon tan mi mnyam shod// de nyid rig pas sems can kun/ rdo rje gsum gyis byin rlabs pa// gang gis byin gyis ba rlabs ma thag sangs rgyas gsum ni dbang du 'gyur// de nas
237b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po gnyi su med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi rdo rje ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'bru/ 
237b7(rgyud): 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang // thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM g+hu/ stong pa chen po'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra tsit+ta hUM/ oM badz+ra kA ya oM/ oM badz+ra bAka AHoM badz+ra a b+hiShiny+tsa traM/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya ho// de nas de bzhin
237b8(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad shin tu mgu/ rab tu dgyes pa'i yid kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang rang rang gi snying po bcom ldan 'das la
238a1(rgyud): 'bu'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dge'o zhes bde ba chen po'i tshul gyis rab tu spro bar mdzad do// dge'o dge'o rgyal ba kun// dge'o
238a2(rgyud): dge'o rgyal ba mchog/ dge'o dge'o legs pa'i las// dge'o dge'o sngon 'gro ba// dge'o dge'o sna tshogs che// nyid kyi snying khar drangs byas te// rang gi gsang ba bshad par mdzod// gang gis ma 'ongs
238a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams// bde ba'i yid ni chud par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid kyi ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung // oM sar+b+ba ta/ 
238a4(rgyud): thA ga ta ma hA/ shA n+ya tAdz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko he// de nas bcom da ldan 'das me long gi ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa des rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // 
238a5(rgyud): oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a ti ri Shi dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM// de nas de ba zhin gshegs pa so sor kun tu gzigs pa'i ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang gsung
238a6(rgyud): dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA ma hA pra tu pra bak+She dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM// de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang gsung
238a7(rgyud): dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA sa me tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba at+ma ke haM// de nas bcom ldan 'das bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs
238a8(rgyud): rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sang+ga thug ta kr-il du sta na dz+nyAn badz+ras b+hA ba At+ma ki \u0f7f// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen pos yang dge ba'i tshul sbyin par mdzad de// oM dge 'o dge'i stong 'che// oM dge 'o ga
238b1(rgyud): thugs chen po// oM dge'o dge'o sku chen po// yo dge'o dge'o gsung chen po// oM dge 'od ge rin po che'o// dge'o dge sna tshogs che// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'du
238b2(rgyud): mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das la rang gi dkyil 'khor bshad par gsol ba 'debs te/ dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas rdo rje yi// dga' byed bcom ldan nyid kyis shod// gang gis sems can bde nyid kyis// 
238b3(rgyud): 'khor rab tu thob par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor zhes bgyi ba// rgyal ba'i bdag pos gsang ba gsungs// gang gis dkyil 'khor myur bris nas// dkyil 'khor gyi ni rgyan du 'gyur// dkyil
238b4(rgyud): 'khor bde ba'i gzhi nyid ni// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor rgyan pa'i bdag nyid de// gsang ba bcom ldan nyid kyi gsungs// dkyil 'khor mnyam pa'i ye shes ni/ 
238b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor snying po zhes bya ba/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni ci rigs par/ gtso bo chen po nyid kyis shod// dkyil 'khor mi mnyam ye shes ni// dkyil 'khor gsang ba pad+mo ste// dkyil 'a
238b6(rgyud): rab dgyes 'thob byed pa yis// tshad med dkyil 'khor bshad par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po rab tu dga' ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la
238b7(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs te// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dkyil 'khor chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang // gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // gzugs dang lang tses rgyan pa yi// bu mo mig
238b8(rgyud): yangs bzung bya ste// shes rab can gyis byin rlabs 'brus// mnyam par gzhag ste byin rlabs nas// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i bdag/ de bzhin gshegs kyi btsun mo bzhag/ gnyis po mdun du bzhag
239a1(rgyud): byas pa// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa'i gnas// rdo rje sems dpa'i btsun mo ste// thugs ni dgyes par byed pa yin// gsum pa lho ru bsam bya ba// dge ba sbyin pa'i bdag nyid gan/ 
239a2(rgyud): rin chen 'byung ldan btsun mo che// dbang bskur yon tan tan 'thob byed pa'o// bzhi pa tshul khrims chen mo ste// de nyid chos don yang dag gnas// rdo rje chos kyi btsun mo ste// de sbyin dga' byed ma yin no// 
239a3(rgyud): bzod pa chen mo byang du ste// bsod pa'i bdag nyid zad pa sbyin// btsun mo rdo rje gdan mi za// dam tshig gnas ni skyong byed ma'i// grwa dag tu ni thams cad du// snga ma bzhin du mchod la sogs// sgo yi phyogs
239a4(rgyud): rnams thams cad du// sgo srung rnams ni rnam pa bzhi// ci 'a 'dod par ni mchod bya ste// slob ma mchog ni gzhugs par bya// phyag rgyas lag pa rgyan byas te// 'dzum dang bcas pa'i 'ad
239a5(rgyud): chags mig/ rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par klubs// spro ba che khas gar bya zhing // lha yi 'gying ba'i 'dun pa yis/ dga' byed dkyil 'khor gzhug par bya// mig ni dar gyi gos
239a6(rgyud): nyid kyis// g.yogs te lag pas bzung nas kyang // sgo yi grwar yang gzhag bya ste// smon lam mchog ni sma ru gzhugs// rdo rje chen po bdag ces bgyi// rang gi lha rnams phyag bgyi ste// rang
239a7(rgyud): gi dgyes gnas las byung ba'i// bde byed chen mos mnyes par gyi// ji ltar bzhin du mnyam nyid 'thob// me tog phreng ba dor byas te// lha mo chen mo bzhesu gsol// khyod kyi dkyil 'khor bad
239a8(rgyud): 'tshalo// lha mo gang la lhung ba yi// de yi la ga nas bskor ba bya// lha mo 'di ni khyod dang 'thun// sems che khyod kyis 'dod par gyis// de nas slob ma de yis ni// bdag gi rab dgyes smra bya zhing / 
239b1(rgyud): de la 'dod pa spyang par mdzod// khro bo rnams kyi mi byed paT// mtha' ni ho zhes sbyar bar bya// 'byung ba'i dus su bya ba ni// a ho su kha bde zhes smra// de nas rdo rje phyung ba yi// mkhas pas de ni blang byas te// bde/ 
239b2(rgyud): ba chen po dngos grub rdzas// bla ma la ni dang por dbul// de nas de nyid kun la yang // ci bde bar ni dbul bar bya// spyi bos zhabs la btags byas te// bla ma la ni dbang blangs bya// shin tu sbas pa'i 'pha
239b3(rgyud): pa'i dbang // bcom ldan bdag la stsal bar mdzod// de nas sbyor ba chen po yi// snyoms par zhugs te de bde ba// slob dpon rdo rje phrang byas te// spyi bo rab tu bzhag par bya// lag pa yis ni ma reg pas
239b4(rgyud): kha la rab tu sbyin par bya// khyad par du ni drang byas te// ci bde dbar ni btung bar bya// gzungs ma de dag thams cad la// rdo rje yis ni sbyin par bya// de nas slob ma mchog nyid kyi// bla ma
239b5(rgyud): la ni yon dbul ba// ma dang sring mo bu mo dang // chung ma dang ni rang gi bu// bdag nyid dang ni rgyal srid dang // de bzhin long sa spyod dbang phyug dang // rdzas dang nor dang gter rnams dang / 
239b6(rgyud): glang po rta dang shing rta dag/ bla ma la ni yon mchog ste// dga' ba'i yid 'gyur dbul bar bya// phyi yi sbas pa gsang ba dang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang // rdo rje dang ni gzungs ma'i rnams/ 
239b7(rgyud): 'dod pa'i dngos grub dri bar bya// snying po yang dag shes gyur nas// dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// gsang ba yi ni dkyil 'khor 'di// ci ste rmongs pas smra
239b8(rgyud): byas na// slob dpon gyi ni dam tshig nyams// myur du zla phyed tshun can du// bstan pas rnam par 'jig par 'gyur// dang por dam tshig gzhag byas te// phyi nas dkyil 'khor bstan par bya// gzhan du
240a1(rgyud): byas na dpa' bo'i rnams// dmyal bar bskal par grangs med smin// de bas blo ldan rdo rje yis// nan tan dam tshig bsgrags mi bya// sngags kyi dngos grub don 'dod pas// dam tshig
240a2(rgyud): srung la brtson par bya// gzhan du byas na sngags mkhan gyi// sngags la sogs pa'i don mi 'grub// lha rnams kyang ni dam tshig gi/ gsol yang bzhi su mi gnang ste// 'jig rten 'di ru sdug bsngal che/ 
240a3(rgyud): 'jig rten pha rol dmyal ba'i rnams// dam tshig spyod pa 'das pas so// rmongs pa'i bdag nyid des 'thob bo// slob ma de yang de bzhin du// blo zhan sdug bsngal 'thob 'gyur te/ des na sngags kyi don mi smin/ 
240a4(rgyud): lha rnams kyi ni mchog tu bde// dam tshigs med pa'i slob ma la// nams kyang sbyin par mi 'gyuraro// de bas dam tshig gtsom dan te// thog mar dam tshig sbyin par bya// sngags rnams dang
240a5(rgyud): ni phyag rgya yang // de bzhin thabs dang shes rab rnams// mtshig de rnams thams cad kyang // sngags pas gsang sbyor ba yis// dmyal ba ngan song bzlog pa'i phyir// bung
240a6(rgyud): slob ma sbyin par byed// sngags kyi dngos grub bsod nams byed// gtsang sbra dogs pa med par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dal// dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin bri byas te// gzhon nu'i tshad
240a7(rgyud): ni bcu drug lon// dam tshig slob ma'i dkyil 'khor du// bzhag nas cho ga 'dis gzhugs bya// dam tshig rnams ni 'di yin te// sbrang rtsi sha dang dri chen po// nyi ma zla ba'i blo chen dang // rdo rje las byung chu
240a8(rgyud): bsgrubs rnams// dkyil 'khor la sogs tshul bzhin gzhag/ dam tshig yi ge bzhag gnyis// myur du dam tshig sgrub byas na// dga' byed dam tshig dngos grub ste// dngos grub thams cad 'thob par
240b1(rgyud): 'gyur// dam tshig 'di ni sna tshogs te// 'dzin pa yis ni mtha' ru 'gyur// ma 'ongs sangs rgyas chen po dang // rdo rje sems dpa' bdag po cher// blo ldan dbang bskur blangs pa yis// dbang bskur phun
240b2(rgyud): sum tshogs pa kun// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'thob 'gyur te// dbang bskur ba yi yid du 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig rdo rje ye shes chen po zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba chen po'i
240b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor te lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchog tu dgyes pa chen po yid bde bar gyur te// bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'deb so// bdug pa
240b4(rgyud): thams cad rnam 'dul ba// 'jigs par byed pa chen po 'di/ rdo rje khro bo chen po yi// dkyil 'khor chen po rnams bshad phyir// 'jigs byed chen po rnams 'dul ba// dkyil 'khor
240b5(rgyud): rdo rje thams cad kyi// khro bo'i dam tshig ded dpon gyi// gsang ba chen po nyid kyis shod// de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba/ chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
240b6(rgyud): 'dren pa'i khro bo'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje ye shes las 'di phyung // oM badz+ra ma hA tsaN+Da sar+b+ba duSh+Ta ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT// 'di
240b7(rgyud): byung ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad khro bo chen po'i mthus rnam pa drug tu g.yos// kun tu g.yos/ lha dang / klu dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / na mkha'i lding dang / 
240b8(rgyud): ci 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad 'khrugs pa chen por gyur to// de nas 'jigs pa chen pos nyen pas de dag brgya byin gyis thad du lhags na brgya byin bdag nyid kyang
241a1(rgyud): skyabs med par mthong nas tshangs pa'i thad du phyin tshangs pa yang gtogs 'dod kyi gan du phyin te/ gtogs 'dod kyang dbang phyug chen po'i thad du phyin te/ de nas dbang phyug chen po
241a2(rgyud): bdag nyid kyi mthu 'jigs byed chen po'i gzugasu byas te// 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus kun tu snang bar byas te/ lha rnams ma 'jigs shig/ klu rnams ma 'jigs
241a3(rgyud): shig/ gnod sbyin rnams ma 'jigs shig/ lha ma yin rnams ma 'jigs shig/ dri za rnams ma 'jigs shig/ lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa rnams ma 'jigs shig/ nga'i rdzu 'phrul gyis khyad par
241a4(rgyud): 'di lta bu gzhan 'gas kyang rab tu brdzi nus sam/ khyed rnams ci dgar spyod pas mnos shig ces dbugs phyung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
241a5(rgyud): gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i khro gnyer chen po zhes bya ba// khro bo chen po'i snying po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / 
241a6(rgyud): thugs rdo rje ye shes las phyung ngo // oM badz+ra b+h+r-i ku Ti/ ma hA kro d+ha ha na han/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ mA ra mA ra/ b+hadz+ra b+ha dza/ daha daha/ pa tsa pa tsa hUM/ b+h+rUM b+h+yo/ bras+thA ya pras+thA ya/ b+h+ri ku Tu na sar+b+ba mA ran+ta sar+b+ba duSh+TaM/ ma ta ma ta/ mo ta ma
241a7(rgyud): ta/ hUM bruM/ hUM traM/ tra Ta traT/ b+hI hUM tra/ hUM tra traT/ 'di brjod ma thag tu de dag snga ma bzhin du skrag nas dbang phyug chen po'i thad du nye bar lhag so// de nas dbang phyug snga ma bzhin du bdag gi che ba nye bar ston cing
241a8(rgyud): gtogs 'dod la smras pa/ khyod kyang mthu che ba'i lha chen po ste/ gdug pa thams cad kyi tshogs kyi bdag po yin// rang gi mthu rgya chen po'i rdzu 'phrul nye bar ston pas gdug pa de rnams dbugs dbyung bar mcho/ 
241b1(rgyud): cig/ de nas gtogs 'dod de ma thag tu rang gi mthu 'jigs byed kyi gzugs 'khor lo'i nag po chen por bsgyur nas rdo rje'i skad drag po chen po'i dgang pa'i gdangs 'byin pas 'jig rten thams cad la nyes
241b2(rgyud): ston cing gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po yang khro bo chen po'i pad+mo 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu pad+mo'i dra ba
241b3(rgyud): 'char ba'i khro bo thams cad slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar zhug so// zhugs nas khro bo chen po'i snying por bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang / gsung dang
241b4(rgyud): thugs rdo rje'i kha nas phyung ngo // oM pad+ma ma hA dz+wa la ma hA kro d+ha ba ta ba mu kha kha Sha/ sar+b+ba duSh+TaM/ khA hi khA hi sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+TA nA~M/ dam dram/ badz+radaSh+To ta ka Ta ma ta ma ta/ k+Sho Ta k+Sho Ta/ badz+ra kha ra/ tsa ba la
241b5(rgyud): durga be ga/ tras tras/ ma hA badz+ra pa Da ba mu kha pra ma ta pra ma ta/ hUM phaT/ hri ha ha haM haM/ tsa tur mu kha/ be sha pre NA she na/ hUM hrI hU d+hU d+hIHha// de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu tshangs ris
241b6(rgyud): chen po 'dar pad pad cing kha bub tu 'gyel te/ rngab 'tshalo// de nas tshangs pa chen po ngo mtshar du gyur te// dbang phyug chen po la dris pa// lho 'di ni shin mtshar du snang ngo // de nas dbang phyug chen pos tshangs pa
241b7(rgyud): la bskul ba// khyod ni sems can kun gyi gtso bo// lha'i tshogs thams cad kyi bdag po// khyod ni 'jig rten gsum na gtong ba dang byed pa'o// rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa de'i phyir// khyod kyis gdug pa'i
241b8(rgyud): sems can dang / gdug pa'i lus can thams cad brlag par gyis shig de nas tshangs pas rang shing kyi mthu dang // tshangs pa chen po srin po'i gzug su mngon par sprul nas// 'jigs byed chen po lta bur gdong
242a1(rgyud): bzhi pa// me lce stong gis gzi brjid can gyi lus mgul ba dang bcas pas bgad pa chen po 'byin pas lha'i tshogs kyi gdug pa thams cad la nye bar ston cing gnaso// de nas bcom
242a2(rgyud): ldan 'das kun tu bzang po yang lha thams cad rab tu bzang po yang lha thams cad rab tu 'joms pa zhes pa khro bo chen po'i ting 'dzin la yang dag par snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje chen po 'jigs byed ces bya
242a3(rgyud): ba'i khro bo chen po'i snying po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i ye shes kyi thugs kha nas phyung ngo // oM badz+ra b+hai ra ba/ ma hA kro d+ha/ sar+b+ba duSh+TA na sa ma b+hak+Sha ya hUM hUM phaT phaT/ badz+ra yak+Sha ha na ha na hUM phaT// 
242a4(rgyud): de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu brgya byin gyi khang pa 'di thams cad du ma bu brgyar rnam par bshig ste/ ri rab kyi rtse mo yang 'gul zhing kun tu 'khor nas gnas par gyur/ brgya byin 'khor
242a5(rgyud): dang bcas pa yang kha bub tsam du 'gyel te brgyal bar gyur to// / de nas langs te dbang phyug chen po la bltas pa dang / dbang phyug chen pos kyang bskul ba// khyod ni lha'i tshogs
242a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi bdag po ste// mthu che ba yin la sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha gdug pa'i tshogs thams cad kyang khyod la mnyes par byed pa yin na de ltar bdag nyid kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu nye bar ston cig/ 
242a7(rgyud): de nas lha'i rgyal po chen po brgya byin de rang nyid kyi mthu gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gzugs nye bar ston cing gdug pa'i tshogs thams cad la gdug pa dag ma 'jigs shig nga'i rdzu 'phrul 'di lta bu dag
242a8(rgyud): mthong na sus kyang zil gyis gnon mi nuso zhes dbugs 'byin par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang yang sngags kyi lha thams cad 'dren pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
242b1(rgyud): te/ lha de dag thams cad nyid kyi sku dang gsung gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i ye shes las 'jug par mdzad de// bcug nas kyang khro bo chen po thams cad phyag rgya chen por mngon par bsgyur nas bdag nyid kyang khro bar
242b2(rgyud): thams cad 'byin pa'i khro bo chen po'i gzugasu dmigs te// mche ba chen po 'byin pa/ zhal mi sdug pa/ spyan stong pa/ nyi ma chen po stong gis gzi brjid can// rab tu mi bzad par byed pa'i mi rlung gis 'das kyi
242b3(rgyud): mdog sngon po'i sku// dur khrod chen po'i dpal chen gyis phyag rgya mi'i keng rus dang / khrag dang / sha dang / klad pa dang / rkang dang / tshil rnams zasu gsol ba/ mi'i lpags pas rnam g.yogs te bsdams
242b4(rgyud): pa/ mi'i mgo bo'i phreng ba dbul 'dzin pa// seng ge dang / glang po da che dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / ma he dang / phag dang / lce spyad dang / ra dang khyi dang / 'ug pa dang / bya rog dang / bzhad dang / byil dang / gzi
242b5(rgyud): dang / stag la sogs pa'i khro bo byol song gi gdong brgya stong mang po rab gi ba spu'i bu ga nas phyang ste/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul/ gyis shar phyogs na 'jigs byed chen po 'dul ba rnam par
242b6(rgyud): gnyer ba'i 'jigs pa lta bu'i spyan dang / zhal rdo rje'i mche ba chen po gtsigs pa/ 'jigs par byed pa'i khro bo chen po brgya stong gi g.yog dang / shar phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'khyil bar gyur te gan so// lho'i
242b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du yang rdo rje khro gnyer can khro bo brgya stong mang po'i g.yog dang / 'khyil bar gyur te gnaso// nub kyi dkyil 'khor du yang pad+ma chen po rta gdong khro bo brgya stong mang mo'i g.yog dang / nub kyi dkyil 'khor
242b8(rgyud): du 'khyil bar gyur te gnaso// byang gi dkyil 'khor du yang rdo rje'ur 'ur chen po'i khro bo brgya stong mang po'i g.yog dang / 'khyil bar gyur te gnaso// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu gyes pa khro bo chen po'i tshogs
243a1(rgyud): brgya stong mang pos bskor nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbusu bzhugs te/ khro bo chen po'i tshogs de dag dang shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba chen pos kun tu spyod cing khro bo chen po'i rnam par brgya
243a2(rgyud): stong mang po'i rab kyi rdul phran dang mnyam pa snyed phyung nas/ nam mkha'i dbyings rab 'byam thams cad du gang bar byas te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kyang gang bar byas so// 
243a3(rgyud): de nas gdug pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis de dag mthong nas 'jigs spangs skyabs ma mthong nas// rang rang gi bdag po'i thad du song ste// rje cig rje cig nyid kyi bdag la skyobs shig/ de nas dbang phyug chen po/ 
243a4(rgyud): la sogs pa'i lha'i bdag po de dag bdag nyid kyi mthu sprul nas slar yang bslang ste// 'jig rten gsum po thams cad yongasu bsgom du bcug nas// 'jigs byed gdungs pa nga la skyabasu song zhe
243a5(rgyud): bsgo yang skyabasu 'gro ba mi len cing // slar yang rang gi rgyud kyi nga rgyal bskyed de// 'jigs byed chen po brgyad pa zhe bya ba phyung nas ri rab kyi bdag nyid chen po nye bar ston cing // dgad pa chen
243a6(rgyud): po'i nga ro 'byin par gyur to// oM ma hA b+hai ra ba beSh+TiSh+Ti/ Ta Ta Ta tra r+tha ta/ ha ha i ti/ 'on kyang ba spu'i bu ga'i rtse'u chung tshad tsam yang ma 'gul to// de nas yang 'jigs byed chen po 'dul bar byed pa'i khro bo de
243a7(rgyud): he ru ka'i nga ro 'byin cing mgo bor mnan nas bsnun te// he ru kas bdag nyid kyi mthu chen pos 'jigs byed chen pa nga ro nas sgyu ma'i sgrub bu drangs nas/ khrag dang rus pa dang rkang rnams za zhing chem chem mdzad pas// de'i
243a8(rgyud): 'khor la rab tu ston par mdzad de/ u ma dang 'ga' 'ga' yang rnam par bcom mo// ma mo'i tshogs thams cad kyang sgren mor byas te smra phab nas// khro bo bdag nyid kyi mthu nye bar spel cing 'khor thams
243b1(rgyud): cad kyang btul// skyabs len du yang bcug/ dam tshig la yang gnas par byas te yang dag par zhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po khro bo chen po drag po bshad pas bzhad cing rdo rje'i khro/ 
243b2(rgyud): gnyer khro bo chen po'i zhal nas ma 'jigs shig/ ma 'jigs shig ces dbugs 'byin par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa khro bo chen pos khro bo'i tshogs kun la bka' stsal pa// 
243b3(rgyud): na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ ma hA tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ tad+ya thA/ oM bo d+ha bo d+ha/ ma hA b+hai ra bad ra ba pa hA ri ha ra ha ra/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ mA ra mA ra/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ shrI g+h+raM ma hA badz+ra/ tsaN+Da sar+b+ba duSh+Ta ta kaH/ 
243b4(rgyud): na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma tha me tha hUM phaT/ 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jigs byed chen po'i 'dul bar byed pas rang gi sku na mkha'i dbyings kyi tshad du bskyed do// khro bo brgya stong mang po rnam
243b5(rgyud): bar bsnyer ba'i zhal mche ba gtsigs te// 'khyil zhing bsgyur ba phyag brgya stong mang po la mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa zhal sna tshogs mang po brgya stong me lce bzhin du rab tu 'bar ba'i sku
243b6(rgyud): brgya stong rnams 'jigs byed chen po gan ba der song ste/ rdo rje drug po'i gad mo cher 'byin pas bzhan cing mdun na gnaso// oM ma hA badz+ra he ru ka badz+ra an+d+ra Tu sa hA sa ra ha ha ha ha hUMH/ i ta~M/ de nas dbang phyug
243b7(rgyud): chen pos rdo rje drag po bshad pa chen po thos nas g.yog dang bcas par khas bub du 'gyel te brgyal bar gyur nas/ mgo la zhabs kyis bsnun te gtong bar mdzad do// oM badz+ra b+h+r-i ku Ti/ ha na ha na/ gr-ih+Na
243b8(rgyud): gr-ih+Na hUM/ ma tam ta kiny+tsi rA ya si/ sUr+ya sa ha pra hasti/ re ka ba su rA dz+wa la la rtsi pra dz+wa la ti/ mahA rmu rti A ka T+ya A kaD+D+h+ya a bya wam bya wam/ kri na ba tsakra b+he ra ba hrid ya hU hrI// de nas rdo rje khro gnyer chen po
244a1(rgyud): khro bo'i chen pos bzhad pas gzhad cing 'gro ba thams cad la khyab pa'i gzugasu mngon par sprul nas 'khor lo can gyi mdun du ston to// de nas 'khor lo can gyi 'khor 'jigs pa chen pos
244a2(rgyud): nyen te/ khas bub du 'gyel te rab tu brgyal zhing rje cig bdag cag la skyobs shig ces smra zhing / skyabs med par bdag nyid kyis mthong nas 'khor lo can la skyabasu song ngo // de nas biSh+Tas kyang bdag nyid kyi/ 
244a3(rgyud): mthu mang po rab tu nye bar ston cing shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i mdun du gnas te rgyab la zhug so// kwa'i kA'i gdug pa nye ba'i khro gnyer gyis snying dral te ji srid ma 'thungs kyi bar du de srid rang gi gnasu song shig
244a4(rgyud): de nas khro gnyer chen po rab tu 'khrugs gtum por gyur nas/ de drangs te bsdams nas snying dral te// de'i khrag la nyi ma'i khro gnyer chen po gnod sbyin chen po'i gdon gyi bdag nyid yang dag par tshim
244a5(rgyud): par mdzad do// oM badz+ra ba sUr+ya b+h+ri ku Ti kro d+ha ma hA gra ha ha ra pa ta ra/ ba su su d+he/ ra ma sa med mad dzi na/ oM b+hA b+hA b+hI/ de nas 'a/ nyekhor lo can de sems rab tu brlab par gyur te gnaso// de'i
244a6(rgyud): chung ma rug mi ni dang / ma hA shrI dang / lag smi yang g.yog dang bcas par rnam par bcom ste/ sna tshogs rnams rnam par btul nas be zhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rta gdong chen po'i rgyab tu/ 
244a7(rgyud): gcig bsnun nas gtong par mdzad do// oM badz+ra ba Da ba mu kha kha kha khA hi khA hi/ tsa tu ra mu kha/ pi ba pi ba/ a s+ya ru d+hi ra/ A kaD+D+h+ya A kar+N+Na/ hri da yA tran/ ha ma he/ badz+ra b+ha ga ba mu ka/ hi hi Sha ma hA/ 
244a8(rgyud): shwa shwe shwe ri hI hI/ de nas rdo rje rta gdong chen po rta skad chen po mdzad cing tshangs pa'i mdun du gnas par gyur to// de nas tshangs pa tshangs pa'i srin po bdag nyid kyis na mkha' bkang nas rgyu bar byed de/ de nas tshag
244b1(rgyud): pa chen po'i 'khor khas bub tu 'gyel nas/ rje cig skyobs shig/ rje cig skyobs shig ces smras so// kAre kA'i gdug pa'i gdongs myur du song song // khyod kyi rgyab tu zhon te ma dul re zhes smras// de nas
244b2(rgyud): rdo rje rta gdong chen po rab tu 'khrugs gtum por gyur nas/ tshangs pa chen po de'i mgor brdzis te/ snying drangs nas khrag btung ba la zhugs te/ sha dang / klang pa dang / tshil bu dang / rus pa rnams myangs
244b3(rgyud): nas phyogs bcur gtor ro// de'i chung ma shi ri ma dang / swa ra sa ti dang / shAn+ti rnams kyang rnam par bcom// de'i tshogs kyang gtul nas// dam tshig gi sdom pa la gnas par byas te bzhug so// de na
244b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i khro bo chen pos khros pa dang bcas pa'i lta bas gzigs te/ gtong bar mdzad do// oM gu la gu lu badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha/ A kaR+Sha ya/ A kaR+Sha ya sha kra hri da
244b5(rgyud): yaM ma hA badz+ra daSh+TA ya/ hUM b+hak+Sha ya b+hak+Sha ya hUM de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin chen po'i sku chen pos na mkha'i ngos kun bkang te/ brgya byin gyi mdun du bzhugs par gyur to// de nas brgya byin
244b6(rgyud): 'gying ba chen pos 'gyings te/ mi bzed par khros gnod sbyin chen po khyod su'i bran yin nyide la smraso// de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin chen po khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te/ snying nas gtsug gi nor bu phyung snying
244b7(rgyud): yang yang dral te/ de'i sha dang / khrag dang / klad pa dang tshil bu dang / rus pa dang / bza' ba rnams bza' bar zhugaso// de nas de'i 'khor rnams 'jigs shing sngangs pa'i yid du gyur te/ skyabasu nye bar
244b8(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de'i lha mo'i tshogs rnams kyang bcom nas de'i gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po khro bo chen po rdo rje'i rnal 'byor ma rnams dang / rol cing shin tu
245a1(rgyud): pa'i kun tu longs spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po na bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'du ba mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das la bskul bar mdza
245a2(rgyud): oM ma hA su ra ta badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha sa ha ri pa sa ha ra sar+b+ba kro d+ham/ sham sha ma/ pra sham pra sha ma/ sar+b+ba kro d+hi/ ut+ta ma kro d+ha/ sa sa ma ya ma hA maN+Da la/ s+thA pa ya swA ba ya/ sar+b+ba kro d+ham duSh+Ta pra duSh+Ta bi ba ma
245a3(rgyud): bidza ma bi dza ya sha kra pad+ma biSh+Ta ra ma hA shwa ra ma ho b+ha ga baM/ su ra ta so khya kro d+ha/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sat+te na sa ma yo tsa ho// su ra ta sa ma ya i ti// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po khro ba
245a4(rgyud): chen pos khro bo thams cad 'dren pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcingab dadang / dbang du bya ba'i phyir/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thug/ rdo rje las byung ngo // oM dzaHhUMb ho// k+ki hU~M dz+dzaHTak+ki ts+tsha
245a5(rgyud): sUTak+ki hUdz+dza/ A kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha ya/ ba d+ha ya ba shi ku ru/ sar+b+bA kro d+ha/ sa ma yaM/ dzaHhUM ba ho/ Tak+ki hUM dz+nyA /  hUM Tak+ki hUM/ de nas khro bo chen po'i dam tshig de dag thams cad 'ongs nas/ 
245a6(rgyud): rang gi dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'khor lor 'khyil par gyur te// kye bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bka' stsal du gsel zhes smra zhing gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo thams cad kyi bka'i
245a7(rgyud): 'khor lo'i rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ khro bo thams cad kyi bka'i 'khor lo chen po phyung ngo // oM suM b+ha ni su b+ha ma hA kro d+ha sha hUM phaT/ de nas de dag la khyod kyis
245a8(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gdug pa'i sems can chen po rnams gsos shig ces bka' stsal to// de dag gis bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis rab tu gdug pa'i rnams gsos zhes gsol nas/ 
245b1(rgyud): de nas cang mi gsung bar bcugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo shin tu dgyes pas khro bos phyag bsnol te btsir nas rdo rje bdud du khro ba'i dbang mo chen mo phyung ngo // oM badz+ras mr-i ta/ ma hA tro/ 
245b2(rgyud): dwe shwa ri ud shrI dzaHuta shrI dzaHbadz+ra a mr-i tits+tsha a/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ma bdud rtsi chen po de dag kun tu khros te sman ma bsgyur ba'i gzigs pa'i zhal band pa/ ru lu ru lu zhes pa'i sgra 'byin cing rang
245b3(rgyud): gi pad+mo la bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje bcug nas bdud rtsi yang dag par sgrub pa'i rig ma 'di phyung ngo // oM a mr-i ta sa dza~M ba ni ma hA mr-i ta mu khe/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ sar+b+ba badz+ra pad+ma sad yo ge/ ma hA boH/ 
245b4(rgyud): tsit+ta/ bi tha bi tha/ mUrdi a// de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa// gdug pa de dag thams cad snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid kyi lus sos par gyur te/ sems dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'kho
245b5(rgyud): lo thams cad mthong nas ngo mtshar bar gyur te// bcom ldan 'a// ngas rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa khro bo la skyabasu gdong nas// phyi'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du khro bo'i 'khor rnams gan
245b6(rgyud): par gyur to// de nas de dag rab tu mgu ba'i yid kyis// bcom ldan 'das la bstod par byed de// khyod ni sems can kun gyi yab// phan byed de bzhin yum yin te// gtso bo 'dus pas bdag cag
245b7(rgyud): rnams// 'jigs pa che las skyob pa ste// rje bo sdug bsngal thams cad sel// khyod ni 'gro ba'i dbang po rje// khams gsum 'di ni byed dang gtong // che ba che khyod skye bo skyong // thog ma med khyod
245b8(rgyud): nga ro thigs// nga ro'i stong ni cha yang med// gtso bo yog med bdud rtsi yi// rab dgyes bde byed gtong ba yis// 'gro ba kun la phan bya'i phyir// de ni sangs rgyas thams cad rnam// rab dgyes
246a1(rgyud): 'gro la bde ba'i phyir// mgon po khyod kyis gtong ba mdzad// sems can 'dam gyis mi gos shing // bla na med pa byang chub lam// sna tshogs sdug bsngal zhi mdzad pa// sems can
246a2(rgyud): sgom pa ngoms mdzad cing // 'khor ba dpa' grong grol mdzad do// myur du bde la dgongs pa mdzad// dngos po kun gyis thams cad du// rgyal ba kun gyi mi dpogs te// zhi ba'i rnam par zhir 'gyur ba// 
246a3(rgyud): rdul dang bral ba 'jug pa spangs// nam mkha' sgom las rnam 'das pa// rnam rtog dri mas ma gos te// sgyu ma kun las yang dag 'das// 'dod pa kun la rgyab phyogs pa// gtso bo khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal
246a4(rgyud): dregs pa med pa 'jigs byed la// byang chub mchog ni thob kyi bar/ bdag cag skyabasu rab tu mchi// ji srid 'tsho ba mchis pa dang // dmyal ba rtsub mo'i 'jig rten du// ltung bar gyur pa ji
246a5(rgyud): srid pa// khyod kyi dam tshig bskyang bar bgyi// byang chub mchog tu bdag cag kyang // dri med skal par gyur pa yi// gtso ba bdag cag dbang bskur ba// bde ba chen pos stsal du gsol// 
246a6(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen pos de dag gis gsol ba'i tshig nye bar gsan nam mnyam pa nyid kyi bde ba'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ zhugs ma thag tu
246a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bde ba dang yid bsgrub pa'i thabs mang po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ste// bde ba chen po'i spro ba'i 'phrul chen po'i lha'i 'khor thams cad dbang bskur te/ 
246a8(rgyud): de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha chen po de dag bde ba chen po'i spro ba'i cho 'phrul gyis dbang bskur bas yid bde bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yang dang yang du gtogs nas
246b1(rgyud): bskor babyas te/ ji lta ba bzhin du kun du yong su bskor nas gnaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po de bzhin gshegs pas yang rdo rje gzungs ma shin tu dgyes pa
246b2(rgyud): ba chen mo'i dam tshig dang sbyor ba'i thabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ cang mi gsung bar bzhugs nas/ de ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khro mo dbang mo chen
246b3(rgyud): mo zhes bya ba nyid kyi sku dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sar+b+ba thA ga ta ma hA badz+ra kro d+ha~M shwa ri sar+b+ba duSh+TA na mu drA Ni/ ma hA pa la yan la sh+ma shAn+da b+hi Sha Ne/ badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha dathA ga ra lA kr-i ta ba ne/ sar+b+ba sha dz+ra/ pra
246b4(rgyud): ma ni/ hUM hUM ma hA kro d+he shwa ri hU~M phaT phaT/ 'dis ji lta bzhin du byin gyi das brlabs nas// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du bzhag ste/ dpung pa bcu drug la phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa/ 
246b5(rgyud): zhal gsum pa mdog in+d+ra nI la'i 'od 'bar ba 'dra ba// rdo rje dang thod pa'i khar ba dang / thod pa dang / mdung dang / snga gr-i dang / zhags pa dang / rtse gsum pa dang / be con dang / mu su
246b6(rgyud): ra dang / 'khor lo dang / ka na ya dang / to ma ya dang / gzhu dang / mda' dang / shag ti dang / gri rnams phyag na 'dzin pa/ thod pa'i phreng bas dbu rgyan byas pa nyi ma brgya dang me'i 'od 'dra ba'o// de'i mdun
246b7(rgyud): du rdo rje khrag 'thung chen mo de dang 'dra ba'i gzugs dang cha lugs 'dzin pa rig pa 'dis bzhag par bya'o// oM ma hA badz+ra d+harma kro d+he shwa ri ma hA sh+ma shA na b+hi Sha Ne ni lA dz+wa la sa ha sra pra dz+wa li ta mUrti d+he re ka pA la mA
246b8(rgyud): / b+hU'i tam gu te/ nang du ti rang/ pa bu ri/ taka pA la/ a r+g+ha la dz+rag/ badz+ra tri shul gar+b+ha ma kro d+ha na/ tsu n+du hUM shUT+Ta d+hu/ he hi nan mun bri ye nu ba Ta/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu
247a1(rgyud): dgyes pakhro ba chen po'i gab brjid chen pa'i mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ do ngakyis rlom 'dabang mtshan po nyid kyi sku dang gsung byas/ 
247a2(rgyud): rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM hU tra ma hA sU r+ya badz+ra kro d+he shwa ri bi d+ha ma/ ma tha ma tha/ gra sa grA sa/ sar+b+ba duSh+Ta/ praduSh+Ta hU~M phaT/ oM hUM traM tra/ tratratra/ khro mchen mo 'di lho phyogs kyi rin chen 'byung ldan gyi
247a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du bzhag par bya ste/ gzi brjid chen por gtor zhing // shin tu 'jigs pa me bzhin 'bar// dpung pa bcu drug rno ba ste// dbu rgyan thod pas brtsegs par bya// spyan ni rab
247a4(rgyud): dmar sngo bsangs mdog/ mtshon cha'i tshogs ni bsnams pa dar brtson// gdugs pa thams cad 'char byed cing // yi dedags chen po'i sten la zhon// rang gi g.yog gis mdun du
247a5(rgyud): bskor// de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+mo 'byung gnas bko/ pa'i 'od kyi phreng ba chen po zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// pad+ma'i drab khro mo'i dbang mo nyid kyi sku dang
247a6(rgyud): gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM hriHbadz+ra pad+ma ma hA ban+d+ha mu khe/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ ma hA ma ho/ d+ha ra pi ko pe hUM he hUM hUM ha ha/ hUM hUM hri/ hi sha hi sha/ ma hA badz+ra ba da ba mu la mi ho t+yo t+ye/ hUM hUM/ 
247a7(rgyud): hi hi hUM hrIHhUM/ dkyil 'khor nang gi dbus nyid du// 'di ni rgyab tu bzhag par bya// rno ba chen po zhal gsum pa// rta gdong gyen du ston pa ste// khro mo chen mo dpung bcu drug/ rnam par bsgyur ba'i mi
247a8(rgyud): sdug gdong // mi ro'i rta la yang dag zhon// khrag mang po la 'thung byed pa// mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa ste// khros pa'i dbu rgyan thod pas brtsegs// 'od zer rnon po gtong byed cing // g.yog bcas
247b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rgyan te gnas// de nas bcom ldan 'das yang gdon mi za ba'i ye shes khro mo gnyi su med par 'du ba'i thabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gdon mi za ba'i drag po dang ldan ma n+de/ 
247b2(rgyud): bya ba khros pa'i dbang mo chen mo 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sarba a mo g+ha ma hA bi sh+lo shwa ri hUM hUM hUM/ haM haM haM/ ma hA kro d+he gu mu khe/ ma hA bi shre ba da ri Ni/ sar+b+ba duSh+Ta pra sham
247b3(rgyud): ni hUM hUM phaT// 'di nyid kyis ni ci rigs par// rdo rje gdon mi za ba yi// dkyil 'khor g.yog bcas rnam pa bzhi// sna tshogs dam tshig bzhag byas te// sna tshogs gzugs dang khyad par ldan/ 
247b4(rgyud): kun tu yongasu bskor nas gnas// bster ba dang ni btsums pa 'i gdong // rab tu drag la ro myang zhing // gdong gnyer thod dpa'i rtse mor byas// dpung pa bcu drug gis brgyan pa'i/ 
247b5(rgyud): khro mo chen mo gdong gsum pa// za byed me bzhin lta ba yi/ de yi ngo bo thams cad kyi// g.yog ni rnam pa bzhi rnams kyi sa// bskor bar shes rab can gyis bzhag/ rang gi phyag rgya
247b6(rgyud): mtshan mar ldan// dpung pa brgyad dang ldan pa yi// de ni cho ga ji bzhin du// 'byung mo'i phyag rgya yang dag zhon// dur khrod bzhin du 'jigs byed pa// phyi yi rnal 'byor ma tshogs rnams// de dag
247b7(rgyud): kun tu yongasu bskor// bzhag gam bri bar bya yang rung // de ni de lta'i stan la gnas// bzhin mi sdug pa dpung bzhi mo// gdug pa'i khro mo rnam bsgyur bcas// de la sogs pa'i rim par ldan// 
247b8(rgyud): mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de nas rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo de dag bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ yang dang yang rang rang gis mngon par gang bar byas pas mngon par mchod nas
248a1(rgyud): gsol ba 'debs so// rnal 'byor ma yi sngags tshogs dang // phyag rgya ma ni ci rigs par// gsang ba'i gar ni bde chen mo// bcom ldan de nyid nyid kyi gsungs// de nas btso/ 
248a2(rgyud): ldan 'das rnal 'byor ma thams cad rnam par spro ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi sngags dang phyag rgya sbas pa dang / de kho na nyid dang / gsang ba rnams
248a3(rgyud): nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra satwa a nu rA gi ni ma hA kro d+he hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra A kaR+Sha Ni ma hA kro d+he shwa ri hUM hUM/ dza dza hUM hUM/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ku la a nu rA
248a4(rgyud): ga ni ma hA kro d+he shwa ri hUM he he hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ro gra ma hA dkro d+he shwa ri hU~M sa swa hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA te dza a b+hi She ke hUM hUM/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA sUr+ya b+h+ri ku Te ka ro ko tra taT/ 
248a5(rgyud): ta hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA ke tu ke tu kro d+he shwa ri ma hA bi dza yot+ta ye hUM hUM tra traM phaT phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA ban+da kro d+ha An+t+ra A sa hUM hUM tri traM hri da ya hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA
248a6(rgyud): krod+ha b+hAk+Shi Ni hu hUM b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha hUM tri/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ma hA tIk+Sh+Na kro d+he shwa ri ts+tshin+dats+tshin+da hUM hU badz+ra tik+Sh+Na ha ste ts+tshe da ya hUM hUM ma Ta maT/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+hA ra tsakra d+ha ri Ni ma ho gra du bi ne hUM hUM/ ba ta ya pa ta ya ma hA badz+ra tsakre Na/ 
248a7(rgyud): tsUr+tha ya ts+tshaN+Da ya/ hUM hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA shwag pra b+ha Ni hUM hUM ma ta ma ta phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA bAM shra mu khi hUM hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA badz+ra pA Ni hU~M hU~M ha ha phaT phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA/ 
248a8(rgyud): badz+ral pA~M Tha TuhU~M// ga ga bye t+yai/ A bi b+ha A bi gahru Ta/ oMs rbA badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA badz+ra b+ha ni ma hre k+She d+h+we/ baN+Dal ban+d+ha ya/ bi ta ma paM ta ma hUM phaT/ oM sar+tha 'dz+wa d+har ta la dani pa 'gro d+ha
248b1(rgyud): oMsar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha mA la ni ts+tsharbu g+h+ya b+h+yAM/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha gar+b+ha ba ni sdug gri/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ri ma hA kro d+he shA ri mahA lo ka d+hA ra~MH/ daM ba ya pa ya hA hU~M/ oM sar+b+ba badz+rang+ga ra ma bAkro d+hi shwa ri ma hA la
248b2(rgyud): hUM/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he mA le d+hA ri Ni hUM/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA gI ti ni hUM he he/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha narti ke hUM hUM/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya dz+nyA dzA hUM hUM dzA/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra
248b3(rgyud): ma hA kro d+ha ba d+ha ba d+ha pa~M/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+he ra ma hA kro d+ha ma hA badz+ra ba shin hU~M hUM/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he shwa sh+ye hU~MH// oM hUHhriHa/ de nas rnal 'byor mde dag mgu rangs dga' bar gyur te/ 
248b4(rgyud): yang dbyangs 'dis gsol 'deb so// bde ba mchog gi rgya che ngan dgongasu gsol// bsam gyis mi khyab bde mchog dbyi dngas dang ldan// mi g.yo gsung dang bral ba'i dbyangs snyan pas/ 
248b5(rgyud): gzungs la rol pa'i bde ba bzhesu gsol// ngo mtshar chen po cho 'phrul snang mdzad cing // snying po byang chub bgrod pa rnams kyi lam ston te// rgyud rnams yang dag gang la'ang mi/ 
248b6(rgyud): rten pa/ bde ba mchog gi gzungs kyis grol bar mdzod// ra mu ma hA su hU dzo he ni dz+wa la su hUM pu mU/ ma hA su hU dzo i dz+wa la su hUM pa b+h+raM dzA ma hA su hU// i ni dz+wa la su hU u dzaM/ u ma hA su hU dze/ dza i ni dzA swa/ 
248b7(rgyud): hUM/ a la la la ho// ma hA su hU ra ma ra ma hA su hU/ a la la la ho/ ma hA suM traN/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje na mkha' la 'gro mi tshachen mo dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 
248b8(rgyud): rdo rje na mkha' la 'gro ma thams cad kyi snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ma hA badz+ra d+har cubaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ga ni tsu phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki ni ma ba ma pa ti
249a1(rgyud): phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki ni ku mA ra pri ye hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki ni dri sh+ye mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki ni ma hA badz+ra muSh+Ti tan/ b+hI ta ya b+hI ta ya/ su b+ha ni sum b+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma
249a2(rgyud): badz+ra kro d+ha ya ra la li hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki ni ma hA kro d+ha tsakre N+ye ts+tshin+da ts+tshan+da hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki ni ma hA mri tota pa ta ki hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki ni ma hA sa~M mA kro d+hi hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ka~M ni ma hA badz+ra tan+ti hUM phaT/ 
249a3(rgyud): oM badz+ra DA ki ni ma hA mA ra Ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki ni ma hA mr-i ti ka pa la hA se hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki ni ma hA sau mya kro d+he shwa ri hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki ni ma hA a mr-i ta pu dan d+ha ri hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki ni badz+ra ping
249a4(rgyud): ga li hU~M phaT/ badz+ra DA ki ni bi ba pi ka ru d+hi ra ma hA badz+re ba li hUM Ta/ oM badz+ra DA ki ni ma hA badz+ra sha ni b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha hUM phaT/ oM bar+d+haDA ki ni ma hA badz+ra sha ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki ni ma hA badz+ra pe she hUM
249a5(rgyud): phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki ni a na ya A na ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki/ ni ma hA badz+ra be b+hi ni gu gu mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki ni ma/ hA badz+ra dz+wa la ya b+ha smi ku ru hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki ni ma hA badz+ra bi ga ta/ 
249a6(rgyud): hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki ni ma hA badz+ra daSh+Te hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki ni ma hA badz+ra ki li pra bi sha pra bi sha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki ni ma hA puSh+pe mA sA sha ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki ni ma hA ka ra ba badz+ra d+ha ra Ni hUM phaT/ oM
249a7(rgyud): badz+ra DA ki ni a kaR+Sha Ni ma hA pang+gi rA li mu ku hUM dzA dzAHhUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki n+ya a bi sha ne huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki ni ma hA ban+d+ha hUM hUM ba be hUM/ oM badz+ra DA ki ni ma hA to Sha Ni sa ma ye hUM hUM A aHoM badz+ra ma hA rAk+Shas
249a8(rgyud): mA sa ru d+hi ra med pri ya/ ma hA ku b+ha kaR+Sha hUM hUM hU~M hUM k+ShaHoM badz+ra ma hA rAk+Sha sa A kAR+ShA pa be sha ya/ sar+b+ba badz+ra kA la shi ni ban d+he hUM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM badz+ra rAk+Sha se bi d+ha bi d+ha ya/ bi sha ya bi sha Na sar+b+ba na hUM hUM phaT/ 
249b1(rgyud): oM badz+ra ma hA rAk+Sha sa/ ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya/ sar+b+ba na ma hA bi kr-i tAn na/ ha ya gr-I ba hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje na mkha' la 'gro ma rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo de dag thams cad rab tu mgunas/ yid dga' bar 'gyur te/ 
249b2(rgyud): dbyangs chen mo 'di 'byin par gyur to// kye ma rdo rje sems dpa' yi// rdo rje sbyor ba rab bstan pas// mkha' la 'gro ba sangs rgyas nyid// ci bde bas ni sgrub par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu
249b3(rgyud): bzang pos yang rdo rje na mkha' la 'gro ma de dag kun mgu dga' bar bsgrub par bya ba'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM DA ki ni A kaR+Sha ya pa be sha ya/ ban d+ha ya to Sha ya/ 
249b4(rgyud): a/ sar+b+ba na badz+ra DA ki ni hri da ya hUM dzAHdzaHhUM ba hoHTak+ki hUMdz+dza/ oM he ru ka ma hA badz+ra/ A kaD+D+h+ya A kaD+D+h+ya/ be ba sha ya pra be sha ya/ bi d+ha ya bi d+ha ya/ to Sha ya to Sha ya/ hUM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra pad+ma/ 
249b5(rgyud): ma hA ba Da ba mu kha/ A kaD+D+h+ya/ pra be sha ya/ ban d+ha ya/ mau ha ya / to Sha ya/ ha ha hi// khro bo'i sngags kyi tshogs 'dis/ rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dang / mkha' la 'gro ma dang / mkha' la
249b6(rgyud): 'gro ba dang / rdo rje 'phrog par byed ma de dag la sogs pa de dag dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dbang du bya ba la sogs pa'i las bya ste/ gtor ma'i mchod pa la sogs pa'i dam tshig he ru ka'i phyag rgya
249b7(rgyud): dang / Tak+ki rgyal po'i phyag rgya dang / rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya sbyin te/ las thams cad la sbyar ro// rdo rje'i thal mo ji lta ba bzhin bcings te/ khro bo gnyis lcags kyu ltar bya/ sbom po gnyis phan
249b8(rgyud): chun rtse sbyar zhing / zhi ba gnyis kyang rab tu sbreng / lhags ma gnyis brkyang ste 'od zer ltar btang ba 'di ni phyag rgya'i mchog yin no// phyag rgya 'di ni gzi brjid che// lha dang lha min phyag byas pa/ 
250a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs// bsngags shing mchod pa byas pa yin// bcings pa de nyid 'bebs pa dang // thams cad tshogs ni 'jud par byed// gdug pa
250a2(rgyud): thams cad gsod byed ma// srin mo thams cad za bar byed// rnal 'byor dam pa gnas pa yis// 'di yis las rnams thams cad byed// las rnams thams cad sgrub pa po// mi ldan dngos grub mi
250a3(rgyud): grub mi 'gyur te/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// bsnyen pas mngos grub myur du 'thob// rdo rje bcings pa gnyisu byas te// mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang ste// phan tshun bsnol khros pa gnyis
250a4(rgyud): gyen du sgreng ste snying kar bstan nas/ brkyang bskum gyi tshul du gnas pa 'di las thams cad byed pa'o// 'di yis thams bcad las kyi rnams// ji tsam yid 'dod byed par 'gyur// tshe
250a5(rgyud): 'dir sdig pa gang byas pa// 'di yis thams cad 'phrog pa/ ra byed// de dag thams cad myur 'gyur te// dngos grub/ yid bzhin rin chen no// ji snyed na mkha'i lam dag tu// rnal
250a6(rgyud): 'byor 'di yis 'phrul par byed// rigs 'dzin mchog ni mtshon par yang / cho ga grub pa slar yang 'ong // thal mo sbyar te sbom po gnyis dbusu sbyar// lhag ma mdab ma kha bye bltar byas pa ni pad+ma'i gdan no// 
250a7(rgyud): sbom po gnyis rtse mo thur du bstan pa ni// rta gdong gi'o// gang gis sbyor byas skad cig du// de yis dngos grub chen por 'gyur// bcings ma thag tu 'bur 'gyur ba// 'dod pa bzhin du nye
250a8(rgyud): 'gro/ sa la sogs dngos 'dod pa bzhin// myur du slar yang ldog par 'gyur// de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa// phyag rgya 'di ni sbyor ba dge/ nga ni bstan de rgyal ba'i rnams// rnal 'byor pa yi//
