250b1(rgyud): drang bar bya// rnal 'byor ma rnams thams cad kyang // phyag rgya'i yan lag mchog des sbyar// de nas na mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo de dag 'dod pas gzir ba rnams rangs te// rang gi gzugs ni
250b2(rgyud): bsgyur ba yis// bzhengs te gar ni rab mdzad cing // dur khrod kyi nis chen du// mgu ba chen pos brtags par byed// phyag na thod pa gri dag dang // rdo rje kha na rnam par 'dzin// skal ldan rang gi phyag/ 
250b3(rgyud): rgyas mtshan// dbu smug rnam par bsnyer ba'i zhal// bde ba'i cha lugs sbyor ba yis/ bde ba dam pa longs spyod myong // rab tu rmongs pas bsnyen byed cing // rab dgyes/ 
250b4(rgyud): khro la gsol ba 'debs// zla ba dri me stong pas shin tu rdzogs pa'i spyan mnga' bas// thugs rje'i dbyings rum nyid du bad dag cag bskyed// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal tshabs gdungs pa yi// 
250b5(rgyud): byang chub des ni kun tu tshim par mdzod// a la la la ho// maH ga gi rol pas yang dag sgo 'byed cing // byang chub mchog gi lam 'di snying po nyid kyis ston// gsang ba'i bdag nyid bde bas
250b6(rgyud): zil mnan te// rmongs shing bying ba'i rnams la thugs rjes sgrol// a la la la to// che ba'i ye shes lhun gyis mngar ldan pa// phyogs kyi thugs rjes ma zin snyoms par dgongs// bde ba mchog gi
250b7(rgyud): gsang ba'i gnas nyid du// mya ngan 'da' ba'ang longs spyod bsten pas 'grub// 'jig rten gsum po 'dir ni dngos bstan kyang // rmugs pa'i 'gro bas bdud rtsi'i ngos ma mthong // kye ma hom skyes tshwa/ 
250b8(rgyud): te snying po las 'byung ba// bsam gyis mi khyab na mkha' dang mnyam// rab tu dgyes pa'i bde mchog 'bar ba'i gtso// rin chen sna tshogs kun 'dus 'di la gzigs// sngon med rol mo 'di la rol mdzad
251a1(rgyud): cing 'dur khrod chen po'i dngos grub stsal bar mdzod// thugs rjes pad+ma'i dbyings las bskyed par mdzod// a la la la ho// ji ltar pad+ma 'di la chags med bzhin// sdug pa'i
251a2(rgyud): bcings pas ma zin rnams grol te// 'jig rten gsum po 'di la gzigs nas rol mo mdzod// bdag cag dam tshig 'di la 'dus shig snang ba'i rnams// mnyes mdzod shin tu bde ba bzhengs du gsol
251a3(rgyud): 'gal ba'i yid dang ma chags rdo rje la// nam mkha' ji bzhin mi 'gyur tshul bzhin gnas// khams kyi rang bzhin banabs shing rnams khro yang // byams pa'i thugs rjes kun tu gnas khyab mdzad// 
251a4(rgyud): e maho bde sbyin phyag 'tshalo// rang bzhin grub pa'i bde ba dngos dgrub gsol// chags med chags dang ldan pa'i longs spyod dkyis// dam tshig skyon med bdag cag rol pa mdzod// thugs
251a5(rgyud): rje gsal ba'i byang chub sems chen des// 'gro ba kun gyi bag chags rnam par sbyongs// rgyu dang rkyen lam brten rang bzhin grub// ma chags dri med yongasu gsal zla ba bzhin// 'jig
251a6(rgyud): rten gsum po 'dir ni mnga' mdzad de// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kun tu bde bas brtsen// 'di yis gtso la bskul byas na// dkyil 'khor nyid du dngos grub bo// yid gdung gnyen pa'i nga ro / 
251a7(rgyud): yis// dpyid kyi rgyal po klu blangs te// mkha' 'gro drag pa dri med pa'i// dgodra pa thams cad bstan byas te// rdo rje pad+mo yid 'ong ba'i// dngos grub thams cad sbyar bar bya// bde byed chen po 'di yis
251a8(rgyud): ni/ bskul bas dgyes pa sbyin par byed// rdo rje can gyi yi ger ldan// dus gsum rab tu sbyar bar bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje na mkha' la 'gro ma thams cad kyi shin tu dgyes pa'i longs
251b1(rgyud): spyod dpal gyi bde ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// de dag thams cad la rje su mgu bar mdzad do// g.yon gyi lag pas gzung byas te// gsang skyes pad+mo phye ba las// rdo rje chen po
251b2(rgyud): g.yas nyid kyis// bcug na mchod pa 'thob 'gyur te// mkha' la 'gro ba dra ba 'dis// mnyes pas 'dis nas dngos grub 'thob// oM dang oM dang mi phyed rdo rje bde// mtha' ru phaT kyis stobs rab
251b3(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// kye ma'o bde ba mkha' 'gro dra ba che// rab dgyes dbang mo bde byed bde stabs mdzod// rnal 'byor ma tshogs gsal rnams la// 'di yis brtson pa rnam byas na// bde chen bde ba dgyes
251b4(rgyud): pa yi// rab dgyes dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur// rnal 'byor ma 'i che ba rje su mnyes par byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ye shes// / mgo la thad mo phyed sbyin te// chu skyes la ni yongasu rdzogs rje/ 
251b5(rgyud): rje bcings pa yang dag ldan// pad+mo'i dkyil mo bcings par bya// / 'di yis brtson par byas na ni// bud med mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur// bde ba chen pos gar byed cing // rab dgyes
251b6(rgyud): bde byed gnod byed dang // kun tu 'khyud dang spong byed dang // sna tshogs gar gyis gar byas te// thams cad zas dang ros dngos grub// mchog gi bde bas dngos grub 'gyur// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya bcings
251b7(rgyud): byas te// sangs rgyas sbyor ba bde chen po// myur ba'i thal mos bsgrub par bya// gsum gyis mtsham su rab bya zhing // 'khur tses so yis btab byas te// ma mchu yang nas yang du bzung // 'o ma
251b8(rgyud): 'dzin pa phyir zhing mnye// g.ya' byed pad+mo rnams bzhi bya// pad+mo phyi phyir rab mnye zhing // ze ba mtshan pas rab tu sbyar// sen mos mtshan khung sum mdo dang // rna ba gnyisu rab tu gzugs// dal nas
252a1(rgyud): rdo rje gzhug bya zhing // khro bo'i rgyal pos bskyed par bya// g.yas kyis shin tu bskyod byas nas// g.yon pa yis ni btang bar bya// sbyor ba 'di yis brtson pa yis// mkha'
252a2(rgyud): 'gro'i 'khor lo mchod par bya// kye ma'o bde zhes rab brjod do// bde ba chen po dbyangs kyis bskul// yang dang yang du 'dzin pa na// blo ldan sgrub pas sgrub par bya// rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi mchod
252a3(rgyud): pa chen po'i spro ba ye sheso// de dag thams cad mgu nas ni// rdo rje 'dzin la gsol ba 'debs// nye ba'i zas ni thams cad dang // de bzhin nye ba'i yo byad rnams// bde ba bsgrubs pas sgrub pa po// 
252a4(rgyud): sna tshogs chen po bsgom par gsol// sgrub pa thams cad smra byed pas// gdon mi za dka' rtag bgyid pas// gang gis myur du mnyam sbyor bas// dkyil 'khor rab tu rnam bsgyur
252a5(rgyud): bgyis/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye ba'i yo byad kha zas thams cad kyi phyag rgya gsungs pa// yo byad phyi yi thams/ cad dang // gos dang rgyan la la sogs pa'o// nye ba'i
252a6(rgyud): kha zas rnams la ni// sha dang khrag las yang dag sgrub// 'bras bu rtsa ba tshad med do// mchog tu bde ba yid tshim pa// 'di yis mchod pa byas pa na// mkha' 'gro ma ni dngos grub 'gyur// 
252a7(rgyud): bus pa'i sha las rab sgrub pa'i// 'o ma dam pas thod pa dgang // mkha' 'gro ma kun dbul byas na// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni dngos grub 'gyur// gtor ma'i mchod pa'i yo byad kyi ye sheso// de nas
252a8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang // rdo rje 'dzin thams cad bzhengs te phyag 'tshal nas yang gcig tu stug por 'du ba mdzad de bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'deb so// rnal 'byor kun gyi ye
252b1(rgyud): mtshan// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi// thams cad brda' rnams dran 'gyur ba// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i ro myong ba dang 'brel/ 
252b2(rgyud): ba'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje na mkha' la 'gro ba dang // 'gro ma thams cad kyi brda'i phyag rgya 'di gsung so// ka ni 'dod pa byed 'dod phyir// bdag ni 'dod can smras
252b3(rgyud): yin te// gti mug mdongs pas ma byin na// myur du dam tshig de nyam so// dam tshig dam tshig can mthong na// lag pa g.yas pa brkyang byas te// des kyang g.yon pa brkyang ba yis// rang gi nu ma
252b4(rgyud): rab bsdams na// mgo bos g.yon du 'dud byas nas// phyag byed bde ba dris pa yin// lag pa g.yon pa dkur brten na/ de yis phyag ni byas par 'gyur// g.yon pa mgo ru bzhag
252b5(rgyud): pa yi// g.yon du 'dud pas phyag lan no// g.yon gyi smin ma/ bskyod pa yis// myur du phyag ni byas par 'gyur// sbyor/ kha shin tu brtson pa yis// g.yas kyi smin mas phyag lan
252b6(rgyud): bya g.yas kyi lag pas snying kha ru// sbyor dang ldan pas mnye byas na// 'di ni rdo rje slob dpon mchog/ de yi mtshan mar shes par bya// g.yon gyi khro ma sgreng ba yi// nam zhig de ltar bstan byas na
252b7(rgyud): lus che de ni khros 'gyur zhes// rnal 'byor pa yi rtags zhes bya// g.yon du 'gying ba'i bsgyings pa yis// lag pa snying kar brkyang bya ste// dbang mo dgyen du rnam bstan na// de tshe mdza' bar rab tu
252b8(rgyud): brtag/ chung ngu rtse mor byas pa yi// nam zhig bskyod pa mthong ba na// de tshe rig ma rnal 'byor dbang // rdo rje pad+mo chen par 'dod// sbom po nam zhig mthong 'gyur na// de la ston mo sbyin par bya// 
253a1(rgyud): gang tshe shin tu mthor ston na// mngon pa'i nga rgyal rab tu brtag/ khro mo lcags kyu 'dra byas te// gang tshe sngags mkhan gyis bstan na// de tshe nges par 'o byas te// gzhan du na
253a2(rgyud): ni dmyal bar ltung // de nyid rnam par bzlog pa ltar// sngags mkhan gyis ni ma bstan na// de tshe myur du 'gro byas te// gzhan du byas na dam tshig nyams// gzhan rnams kyi ni phyag rgya yis// rnal
253a3(rgyud): 'byor pa yis rnam bskul na// las kyi sbyor ba shes pa yis// las de dag ni brtsam par bya// brda yis phyag rgya'i ye sheso// 'dren pa med pa'i ye shes kun// rnal 'byor pa yis rab tu brtag
253a4(rgyud): rtag tu tsheg drag rnam bral ba// 'dren tshul rnal 'byor ma yi 8// oM ni thig ler bcas pa'i brda'// sbyor ba sngags 'dzin rnal 'byor brtag/ de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog
253a5(rgyud): sbyor ba'i dkyil du brtag par bya// rdo rje pad+mo mnyam par spro/ ra bas rje su mnyes par byed pa dpal dam tshig ma zhes bya ba/ 'i phyag rgya'i ye sheso// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
253a6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po kun tu bzang po chen po yang kun tu rgyas 'debs pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// rdo rje pha rol tu phyin ma'i gsang ba rnal
253a7(rgyud): 'byor ma chen mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes 'di nyid kyi sku dang // gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // rdo rje thal mo mnyam gzhag te// sbom po skyil mo bcing bar bya// khro mo gnyis
253a8(rgyud): ni sbyar bya ste// lhag ma 'od bzhin btang bar bya// snying kar phyag rgya 'di bzhag nas// thams cad las ni rab sbyar te// sna tshogs mkha' gro'i dkyil 'khor du// gdon mi za ba'i dngos
253b1(rgyud): grub byed// thal mo de gnyis mnyam sbyar te// mchog dang rdo rje mnyam du sbyar// chung ngu gnyis kyang gdong sprad de// snying khar de bzhin sbom po sbyar// 'di yis rdo rje thams cad rnams/ 
253b2(rgyud): dam tshig 'jigs byed rab mdzad cing // sems can thams can phan mdzad ma// de ni dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid las ni rdo rje dang // mchog nyid sgreng ba'i tshul byas te// rdo rje
253b3(rgyud): thal mo gnas pa yis// drang ba'i tshul gyis drangs byas na// mi g.yeng de nas dngos grub bo// gnod byed yang dag ldan pa 'dis// rgyal ba mchog kyang 'dren 'gyur na// lha dang mi yi bu mo/ 
253b4(rgyud): dag/ lha min la sogs smos ci dgos// ji ltar yid la 'dod pa bzhin// 'di nyid kyis ni dngos grub ste// sngags kyi bzlas pa mnyam sbyor bas// mchog tu myur du 'dren par
253b5(rgyud): 'gyur// thal mo de nyid las byung khro// rtse mo yid tsam bkug byas te// lhag ma 'od zer rtse mo bzhin// des ni myos byed thob pa yin// 'di ni bcings ma thag tu yang / 
253b6(rgyud): bde bar gshegs kyang dbang bsgyur na// yid las skyes pa 'dod chags can// gti mug chos gnas smos ci dgos// ci dgar 'dod chags sbyor ba yis// de yis las rnams byed 'gyur
253b7(rgyud): / yang dag sbyor ba thams cad 'grub// sbyor dang mi ldan dngos grub med// snying kar 'di nyid kyis byas te// mgu ba'i sbyor ba bde chen pos// rgyal ba mchog ni mnyes par 'gyur/ 
253b8(rgyud): mchog gi bcing ba 'di kun dang // 'di yis las rnams thams cad dang // yid la bsam pa thams cad 'thob// phan tshun du ni mgu byed cing // mgu bar dngos grub myur du thob// rdo rje thal mo/ 
254a1(rgyud): mnyam sbyar te// rdo rje bkug nas sbom por sbyar// lhag ma 'od kyi tshul du gtong // dga' byed mchog ni phyag rngu 'di// sangs rgyas 'bras bu dngos grub 'jog/ rgyam
254a2(rgyud): sring nor dang 'bru yi rnams// de bzhin nor bu 'di dngos grub/ de ni de ma thag tu yang // lha dang lA min mchong par 'gyur// bdag nyid kyis ni 'di bcings te// mkhas pa yis ni dus mtshams phyir// 
254a3(rgyud): gnas lngar rab tu sbyor ba yis// spyi bor dbang ni bskur byas na// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi dbang // de nas de ni nges par 'gyur// lo gcig tsam du mnyam sbyor bas// phan tshun du ni dbang bskur bas// 
254a4(rgyud): khams gsum rab dgyes bdag po ru// blo ldan rdo rje mi g.yo dang 'gyur// de nyid 'khor lo bskor byas te// snying kar da 'khor lo bzhin du bskor// zla ba gcig tsam mnyam sbyor bas// 
254a5(rgyud): 'khor lo bskor ba rab tu sdug/ de nyid g.yon par rab sbyar te/ rgyal mtshan tshul du yang dag spro// zhag bdun du ni maHma gzhag pas// 'jig rten du ni rgyal bar 'gyur// de nyid
254a6(rgyud): kha nas bgad par sbyar// mnyam gzhag zla ba gcig tsam gyis// las rnams thams cad rab grub pa// bgad pa tsam gyis byed par 'gyur// thal mo de nyid mnyam bzhag ste// rtse mo kha byed
254a7(rgyud): rnams bsgyur bas// sbom po ze bar rnam byas te// lo ma lhag ma rgyas par bya// rnal 'byor 'di ni bcings pa yis// sdig pa kun las rab tu grol// bsod nams chen pos byin rlob ste// bde
254a8(rgyud): byed thams cad grub par 'gyur// thal mo de nyid snying kar sbyar// mchog dang khro mo gnyis sbyar te// de gnyis tshigs gsum rab tu dgug/ sbom po skyil mo tsam du bya// rnal 'byor dag tu/ 
254b1(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// 'di yis zla ba gcig byas na// 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal rjer// dpa' bo chen por de 'gyuraro// thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyar te// rang gi snying kar bskor bar bya// de nas
254b2(rgyud): sngags mkhan chos ston par// mi g.yeng sems kyis de 'gyur ro// sbom po lce yi tshul bzhag pas// de nyid khar ni rnam bzhag na// 'jig rten kun gyi thams cad dag/ mdor na zhag/ 
254b3(rgyud): bdun tsam gyis kyang // dbyigs dang gser dang gos la sogs// bdud rtsi btung ba mchog gi rnams// 'di yis thams cad 'phrog byed dang// 'grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// thal mo de nyid
254b4(rgyud): mnyam sbyar te// mchog rab gnyis ni 'og tu gzhug/ chung du gnyis dang sbom po gnyis// sbyar te snying kar rab tu gzhug/ yid la dga' ba'i las rnams tham pa byed// sgra
254b5(rgyud): ma'i mthu dang srid pa mthar byed pa// rtag tu blo ldan lon phyed gnyis kyis// khams gsum rgyal srid mthu chen thos par 'gyur// thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyar te// rang gi ma mchu
254b6(rgyud): dbus nyid nas// sbom po ro 'thob tshul gyis ni// khro mo 'khor lo yang dag spro// zhag bdun du ni bsgrims pa yis// 'di yis khrag 'dren dngos grub ste// sha zas bza' ba las kun byed// thal
254b7(rgyud): mo nyid ni bcings byas na// rdo rje gnyis ni pad+mor spor// sbor por zur ni sbrel nas kyang // chung ngu gnyis kyang de bzhin te// mgrin pa nas ni rtse mo brkyang // thams cad las ni sbyar byas te// 'di
254b8(rgyud): yis gdugs pa thams cad dag/ rab tu sbyar bas 'jigs par 'gyur// thal mo de nyid mnyam gzhag nas// bcing ba dam pos bcing bar bya// sbom po gnyis ni nang du gzhug/ khro mo gnyis
255a1(rgyud): kyang bskul bar bya// 'di yis gdug pa thams cad dag/ 'dzums par rab tu byas par 'gyur// skad cig tu ni gnon byed de// de bzhin bsdus dang brtsir bar
255a2(rgyud): 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// de ni dngos grub thams cad kyi// dngos grub chen po bdag po dang // thams cad las don 'grub par 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// 
255a3(rgyud): rim par myur du 'gro 'ong byed// lo gcig gi ni sbyor ba yis// las rnams thams cad sgrub par byed// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kun gyi las thams cad byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// de nas rnal 'byor/ 
255a4(rgyud): ma de dag thams cad rab tu mgu nas ngo mtshar du gyur te// rnam pur 'gyur bas gar mdzad cing // hi hi zhes pas glu ru len//  / ha ha zhes pas rab tu mgu/ ho ho zhes pas mnyes par byed// 
255a5(rgyud): he he zhes pas 'bod par byed// hUM hUM zhes pas gang bar byed// / hA hA zhes pas skyong bar byed// phaT phaT zhes pas pa sod par byed// hUM hUM zhes pas phur bur 'debs// dza
255a6(rgyud): zhes pas 'dren par byed// sa sa zhes pas dam par byed// dag bdabang nga ro mchog/ hU b+hU zhes pas gsod par byed// hUM b+hUM tsU Tu/ hUM hUM zhes pas 'bar bar byed// hUM tru zhes pas gzi
255a7(rgyud): byed// tr-i tr-i zhes pas 'dren par byed// traM traM zhes pas mchod par byed// dngos grub thams cad 'bras bu smin// hr-i dra zhes pas rmongs par byed// d+hI d+hI zhes pas 'dzums par byed// hri tswits+tsha
255a8(rgyud): pas 'dren par byed// hUM hUM zhes pas 'phyan par byed// hr-i hr-i zhes pas rmongs par byed// hra hr-i zhes pas gnon par byed// ho ho zhes pas mnyes par byed// ha ha zhes pas srung bar byed/ 
255b1(rgyud): hUM hUM zhes pas gsod par byed// hu hu zhes pas mgu bar byed// g+hu g+hu zhes pas phreng bar byed// gaM ga zhes pas tri ru byed// ra ra zhes pas rgyal bar byed// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
255b2(rgyud): cad kyi 'khor lo'i tshogs ngo mtshar cher gyur// rmad du byung ba chen por gyur te// rang gi sems mgu bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
255b3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag po kun tu bzang po chen po la phyag 'tshal te/ gsol ba 'deb so// gnyis med mchog tu rmad byung ba// bcom ldan de nyid
255b4(rgyud): bshad du gsol// gang gis sems can grub pa 'di// ga sang ba sbas pa grub par 'gyur// gar dang glu dang bzhad pa che// skrag mo rol pa bde ba mchog/ sil snyin gling bu rnam sna
255b5(rgyud): tshogs// brdab dang rgyud rnams rab 'byor pa// gsang rgyu cho ga'i rim pa rnams// rdzu 'phrul blo yi che ba che// dngos grub thams cad grub pa yis// sngags rgyal khyod kyis
255b6(rgyud): bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan ngas rgyas rnams// thams cad bdag po rgyal po che// thog ma med nas spyod rmad byung // sna tshogs chen po rnams mi rtog/ sna tshogs ye shes yon tan che// 
255b7(rgyud): bla med chos kun dbang po ste// rig dang sngags kyi bdag po che// de nyid chen po snying po mchog/ blo rmongs phyag rgya rgyas 'bebs te// rgyas 'debs rmongs byed za ba bo// gtong dang byed pa khyab pa che// 
255b8(rgyud): skyong ba sdig pa 'phrog par byed// sdig pa'i chos rnams sel bar byed// dus ngan 'dod byed khros pa po// gti mug chos rjes 'debs par byed// sa dang bar snang de bzhin bde// de bzhin rnal
256a1(rgyud): 'byor pa la sbyin// tshangs dang gtogs 'dod dbang chen pos// de la phyag dang mchod par byed// de nyid skyong byed skyob pa po// gsang ba'i gsang ba bde ba che// zla gsang thig
256a2(rgyud): le las byung ba'i// sbas pa chen po gsang ba ston// nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje// bde ba chen po 'byin mdzad de// skad ldan nye bar longs spyod kun// bud med thams cad dbang du byed// rang 'byung
256a3(rgyud): mtshan du thig le ste// bcu gsum dra ba dbu ru ldan// 'di yis bud med bskyed byas te// sa bon gyis ni rgyal po 'du// 'od zer gzi brjid 'bar ba can// rang las myu gur 'dra ba yi// 'og
256a4(rgyud): gi phyogasu bzhag pa ni// hra byas myur du dra bar bya// dang po dra/ dang ba gnyis drang bas// tsheg drag des ni lcags kyu byas // lha dang lha min mchog gi bdag/ khams gsum thams cad
256a5(rgyud): dridrang bar byed// 'di yi tshul gyis sbyor ba yi// phan tshun du ni sgra ba byas nas// rmad byung rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// dang sa grub byed pa sbyin par byed bdag nyid rang bzhin mthong bar bya// 
256a6(rgyud): sbyor ldan zla ba'i gzugs nyid du// de ste sa bon bzhag par bya// de nyid de nyid thabs kyis gnas// sngags kyi sbyor ba rab sbyor bas// de nas sngags mkhan der 'grub bo// de nyid sngags dang snying po
256a7(rgyud): dang // phyag rgya rig dang mi ldan pa// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' yang // 'grub pa nyid du yong mi 'gyur// de nyid nang du sbyar byas na// snying po snying kar sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya phyag rgyas sbyar bar byas/ 
256a8(rgyud): sngags dang sngag kyi 'bru bsgoms te// rig ma rig ma nyid du sbyar// 'di yis myur du dngos grub ste// mgyogs par 'gro ba rab tu 'grub// sangs rgyas kun gyis cher bor// 'byung dang 'byung las 'gyur/ 
256b1(rgyud): banye/ rnal 'byor 'byor don sgrub pa po// dpa' bo chen po 'gro 'ong byed// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rab tu mgu rangs par gyur te// rdo rje'i dbyangs 'di sgrog so// kye ma'o kun tu bzang po yi/ 
256b2(rgyud): rdo rje'i theg pa bla na med// bshad pa gsang ba zhes bzhi pa// de nyid don du sgrub pa ste// snying po phyag rgya dam tshig ni// sngags rig rang gi lha nyid de// bdag gi de nyid ji bzhin pa// gsang ba rgyal ba mchog
256b3(rgyud): gis gsungs// dkyil 'khor dang ni dam tshig dang // gsang ba sbas pa de nyid de// 'jig rten gsum gyis bdud pa'i rim// dpa' bo chen pos rab tu sgrogs// rdo rje pad+mo rnams mdzad pas// rig ma
256b4(rgyud): dang ni lhan cig rtsen// gdug pa thams cad mnye byad dang // dam la zhe sdang bza' ba dang // slob dpon smod la bsgral ba dang / gzungs ma'i bdag por sgrub pa dang // sangs rgyas thams cad
256b5(rgyud): bskyed bya dang // rab dgyes bdag nyid bskul ba dang // sdig pa thams cad sbyang ba dang // bud med thams cad 'dod bya/ dang // bdud rnams thams cad drang bya dang // rdo rje kun tu gzhug
256b6(rgyud): bya dang / pad+mo'i gnas ni dgang bya dang // sgrub dang nye bar sgrub pa dang // shin tu sbyor dang sbyor che ga/ sbyor ba rab sbyor sbyor skye ga/ de rnams de nyid mkhyen pa'o// bde ba chen po nyid kyis gsungs// sgru
256b7(rgyud): pa yi ni sbyor che ga/ sbyor dang sbyor mar yang dag sbyor// de nyid gsal bar sems dpa' che// phan par dgongs pa nyid kyis gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
256b8(rgyud): gsol ba'i mdo rje su dris pa// rang gi thugs la bzhag ste// nyid kyi sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig ni// kun tu sbyor ba mnyam par ldan// de nyid phyag rgya chen po/ 
257a1(rgyud): ste ye shes lnga yis rjesu bskyed// dkyil 'khor phyag rgya bzhi pa ste// phyag rgya chen pos rje su bsgrubs// rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed mdzad de// kye ma'o bde ba rnam par 'byung
257a2(rgyud): snying po ye shes zhes bya ste// ye shes bzhi dang yang dag ldan// phyag rgya ye shes phyag rgya che// dam tshig mchog ni rig ma'o// sngags kyi yi ge tshul 'dra ba// yi ge'i phyag rgya don chen sbyin// 'di yis
257a3(rgyud): sgrub pa byas pa'i gzungs// bdag gi de nyid lha de nyid// de dag de nyid ci bzhin par// nga yis gsang ba rab tu bsgrags// dam tshig ma yin mi shes la// sngags rig pas ni bstan mi bya// phyag
257a4(rgyud): rgya thams cad gsang bya ste// dam tshig rgyas 'debs gsang ba yin// de nyid lha yi sbyor ba ni// gsang ba gsang bar rab tu sgrub// rdo rje pad+mo rnams mdzad pas// rol pa phyi nang sbyor
257a5(rgyud): ba yis// rig dang lhan cig brtson bya ba// spyod pa dang ni 'khyu da pa dang // de bzhin mchu ni so yis bzung // rdo rje brtan pa gzhug par bya// g.yas dang g.yon gyi tshul gyis ni// 
257a6(rgyud): bskyod cing rnam par gar bya'o// gdug pa thams cad mnye bya ste// nub ma mtshan khung khur btsos gnyi/ 'gram pa dang ni brla gnyis rgyab// rkang pa lag pa 'jam po gnyis// mnyes pa'i sbyor ba
257a7(rgyud): 'di yis ni// mdza' ba chen po de 'grub bo// 'dod pa'i don gyi bar gcod dang // dam la zhe sdang bza' ba dang // zhe sdang can gyis zos 'gyur ba// khyad par gzhan dang gzhan yang bza'// 
257a8(rgyud): rtag par mi phyogs smra ba dang // bla ma smod rnams bsgral bya ba// sha dang khrag dang klad pa'i rnams// drangs te tshogs kyi mchod par bya// 'di ni bsad pa drag po ste// rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang / 
257b1(rgyud): blam spod byed brtson pa la// dam tshig phyir ni bsgrub par bya// gti mug de ni 'grub mi 'gyur// sdug bsngal ba yang 'thob 'gyur te// thams cad nad dang khros chen dang // 'jigs byed nye bar
257b2(rgyud): 'che ba yis// bskal pa grangs med bye ba ru// sdug bsngal chen po ston byed cing // 'odod 'bod par sbrul gyi bdag/ bstir med chen po brlag par 'gro/ lus ngag sems ni bde ngam pa// rigs
257b3(rgyud): kun la bskyod byas te// byang chub chen po bde ba yi// tshul bzhin du ni bsngags par bya// bskul ba'i snying po 'di smras te// dza zhes skad cig skad cig du// rang gi gnas nas gnas pa yis// de
257b4(rgyud): nyid las ni bskyod par bya// bcu drug cha dang yang dag ldan// zla ba gsang ba'i thig le la// me tog dang ni 'dra ba nyid// rlung gis phul ba bskyod par bya// de ni bskyod pas 'grub pa
257b5(rgyud): ste/ de bzhin du yang bskul bar bya// rgyun gyi phreng ni 'od gas la bzhin// blo ldan rtag tu bsgrub par bya// bdudan/ mas thams cad 'dren pa ni// lha mo rnams ni snying por bshad
257b6(rgyud): zhags pa'i tshul gyis gzhug pa dang // de bzhin dgang ba bcing ba'o// sgrub pa lha yi sbyor ba ste// rje su sgrub pa lha mo'i don// sgrub pa chen po gnyi ga'i rgya// mnyam par sbyor ba rdo rje'i mchog/ 1
257b7(rgyud): bar sgrub pa gnyi ga gnas// shin tu sgrub pa bde dam pa// so yi rtse mos mchu bzung ste// ma mchu mchog ni bsdam par bya// sbyor ba rab sbyor skal ldan pa'i// rab dgyes ro myang bde dam pa// lha
257b8(rgyud): dang lha nyid yang dag sbyor// 'di ni gnyi su med ces bya// snying po phyag rgya sngags rig gis// nyid kyi gzugs ni bsgrub bya ste// bdag ni sems dpa' 'o zhes bsams na// 'di ni gnyis med myur du
258a1(rgyud): 'gyur// gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa'i lha'i// dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya// sbyor dang rab sbyor sbyor che ba// rgyal ba kun gyi mchog gis gsungs/ 
258a2(rgyud): bcom ldan rdo rje sbyor ba ste// rab tu sbyor ba mkha' la 'gro/ phyag rgya de dag rab sbyor ba// sbyor ba chen po bsgrags pa yin// 'di yis dpa' bo thams cad dang // sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor
258a3(rgyud): bar sbyor ba'i dbang po bde ba che// tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na// rdo rje'i bdag po chen por 'gyur// mnyam par sbyor ba sbyar ba yis// 'jig
258a4(rgyud): rten gsum po myur du rgyal// yang dag sbyor ba sbyar tshul gyi das// drangs te rab tu bcug nas kyang // rdo rje brtan po/ sa bskul byas te// shin tu 'dod pas 'dod pa skyed// 
258a5(rgyud): mkha' 'gro thams cad thabs mkhas ldan// rgyas dang de ba zhin zag par bya// 'di ni yang dag sbyor ba sbas// sbas pa rnal 'byor ma dkyil lo// 'di yis yang dag dngos
258a6(rgyud): grub blang // rdzu 'phrul chen po 'bras bu 'thob// sangs rgyas byang chub bde che dang // byang chub mchog rab yang dag 'thob// gsang ba chen po rmad 'byung ba// de dag de nyid sbas pa che// 
258a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyis dris pa'i rgya// nga yis yang dag rab tu bstan// gang gi yang dag ldan mthong dang // bdag po chen po mchod byed na// de yis ston pa kun mthong ste// rgyal ba mchog la
258a8(rgyud): mchod par 'gyur// srad ba gcod pa por 'gyur te// 'gro ba'i ston pa mchog tu 'gyur// de la lha kun mchod byed cing // skad cig skad cig phyag kyang byed// ji ltar ston pa sangs rgyas/ 
258b1(rgyud): phan byed 'jig rten skyes gyur pa// sna tshogs ye shes rjes bsdus pas// rnal 'byor chen por de bzhin 'gyur// rang gis dam tshig bsrungs pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' bde skye ba// rdo rje sems dpa'
258b2(rgyud): sbyor ldan pas// dngos grub chen po des 'thob bo// rdo rje sems dpa' mtshan btang la// cung zad mi 'grub yong med de// phyag rgya kun gyi bde ba che// bdag nyid so sor rje su 'grub// rab dgyes mtshan
258b3(rgyud): dang mdza' chen mo// ro dang reg pa'i che ba'i che// rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba yis// dpyad mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyur// de nas de dag mgu 'gyur te// rdo rje sems dpa' bde che ba// sbyor ba 'dod pa'i
258b4(rgyud): gzir ba yis// sbyor ba chen pos mnyes par mdzad// ra ma ram des maho ma hA sa twa// rab dgyes gdon mi za la bzhugs// / sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// zla gsang thig ler yang
258b5(rgyud): dag ldan// bdag cag kun kyang dam tshig ste// skal ldan dri me da rab dgyes kyi// rnal 'byor ma snying mchog nyid du// sbyor chen nyid kyis rol pa mdzod// theg pa chen po bde che yi// pad+mo/ 
258b6(rgyud): rdorje rin chen gyis// rnal 'byor makun dkyil 'khor du// rabang gyes long spyod gnyis bsten mdzod// bdag cag thams cad nyis bral te// gnod med de ni gser dang 'dra// de nyid thams cad grub chen po/ 
258b7(rgyud): rab dgyes bdag nyid nyid bsten mdzod// spros pa 'khyud pa sbas pa dang // gzhug pa dang ni gtong ba'i mchog/ 'di ni sgyu ma'i brtan pa yis// ded dpon rab tu brtag par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen
258b8(rgyud): po kun tu bzang pos 'dod pa thams cad nye bar longs spyod pa'i rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal zhes bya ba chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sbas pa chen po'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rnal 'byor ma thams cad
259a1(rgyud): shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i kun tu ma khyud pa dang / spod pa dang / gzug pa dang / 'dren pa dang / rab tu bskul pa dang / men pa dang / thigs pa dang / tshor bar bya ba dang / bskyod pa dang / kun/ 
259a2(rgyud): tubaskyod pa dang bcing ba'i rdo rje dang / pad+ma chen mo mnyam du sbyor ba la yang dag par zhugs te/ shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen pos bde bas kun tu rgyas par mdzad cing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / gzung / 
259a3(rgyud): ma'i tshogs zad la bskyod pa dang / rab tu rgyas pa dang / rab tu rnam par 'byin cing shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i mnyam nyid kyi tshogs kyis na mkha'i dbyings thams cad kun tu rgyas par byas te/ gnas so// 
259a4(rgyud): de nas rnal 'byor ma tshan mo shin tu dgyes pa'i bdag nyid chen te de dag nyid mgu zhing bde bar gyur te/ kye ma'o bde ba che/ rdzogs sangs rgyas ni mgu 'a che// bde 'i chen po rangs par 'gyur// kye
259a5(rgyud): bde ba bde ba che// bde ba nyid kyis phyag byed de// byang chub sem/ sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po// mgu ba chen po'i bde dang lnga/ na// kye ma'o bong ba bde ba che// 'jigs shing skrag pas sdud/ 
259a6(rgyud): par byed// khros pa chen po mkha 'gro ma// rab tu mi bzad dug dang 'dra// bde byed chen po'i rol pa yis// bde byed che la mchod par byed// skal pa chen po sring mo dang // bde byed bde bas rab rmongs pa// mtsha
259a7(rgyud): pa'i sprin phung bde ldan pa'i// rgya che mchog gis mchod par byed// drag mo chen mo ma lta bu// rab tu gtum pa me 'dra ba// 'ongs nas bde byed chen mo yis// gtso bo mchog la mchod par byed// lha dang
259a8(rgyud): lha mo thams cad kyang // klu mo dang ni rta gdong yang // 'ongs nas bde ba sbyor ba yis// yid du 'ongs pas mchod par byed// de nas dbang po lha chen po// bdag nyid chen po lha yi lha// kye ma'o bde ba sna tshogs nyid
259b1(rgyud): sna tshogs sbyong ba bde ba che// mgu zhing rab tu ngam pa yis// lha mi lA ni sngon du 'gro// dpa' bo bde la phyag byas te// kye ma'o bde ba bde ba che// rang gi bde bas mngon mchod cing // 'jigs shing skrag pas/ 
259b2(rgyud): mnyes par byed// tshad med rangs pa bzhad pa che// glu gar mchog tu ldan pa dang // bza' dang bca' ba sha chen dang // sil snyan phreng ba ro chen dang // gling bu rgyud dang rdza rnga dang // pi bang pal ki gtal le/ 
259b3(rgyud): steg dang dpa' bo 'jigs pa dang // zhi dang rmad 'byung 'jigs byed dang // bdag dang khros dang spun rgyas pas// skad cig skad cig mchod byed cing // byed pa dang ni bzlog pa dang // 'phrog pa dang ni gzhug pa dang // 
259b4(rgyud): srid ces pa dang hUM hUM dang // ha ha zhes pas mnyes byed cing // rab dgyes bdag nyid bde ba yi// rang gi chung mas mnyes par byed/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po rab tu dgyes pa bde
259b5(rgyud): ba chen pos na mkha' dang na mkha'i skabs thams cad la gnas pa sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang rgyal dang / nyan thos dang / rang bzhin gyis 'gag pa dang / ngo
259b6(rgyud): bo nyid med pa'i chos nyid kyi ye shes la gnas pa rnams shin+ta dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i thabs dang / shes rab kyi bde bas bkug ste dbang bskur nas/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i ting 'dzin la yang dag
259b7(rgyud): par 'jog pa dang // shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i chos nyid kyi rgyal po rje su skyong zhing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa// nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams chen po ma lus pa'i sems can gyi khams rnams
259b8(rgyud): su rab tu gzigs pas gzigs nas/ 'jig rten dang lhar bcas pa rnams la bde ba chen pos khyab par mdzad de/ sems can dang / rigs thams cad dang / gnas thams cad dang / spyod pa dang mi spyod par ba
260a1(rgyud): pa dang / 'byung ba dang / 'thung ba las gyur pa dang / sa'i 'og dang / phung po dang // khams dang / skye mched dang / bsags pa'i dbang po lnga dang / rnam par shes pa dang / shes bya dang / 
260a2(rgyud): bdag dang / bdag gi dang / sna tshogs dang / sna tshogs ma yin pa dang / bus pa dang / rgan po dang / gzhon nu dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / skyes pa ma yin pa dang / srog dang / rab tu zad pa dang / 'jigs pa
260a3(rgyud): dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / shes pa dang / mi shes pa dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / khyab pa dang / khyab byed dang / zla ba dang / dbang chen dang / nyi ma
260a4(rgyud): dang / me dang / gshin rje dang / chu bdag dang / lus srul po dang / tshangs pa dang / gtogs 'dod dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha mo drang skal ba dang ldan pa dang / skal ba dang mi ldan pa dang / dngos po dang / 
260a5(rgyud): / dngos po med pa dang / mtshan dang / rdo rje dang / pad+mo dang / rin po che/ dang / ral gri dang / tho ba dang / dbyig pa dang / rtse gsum pa dang // / 'khor lo dang / sbyor ba dang / rab tu sbyor ba dang / stong pa dang / 
260a6(rgyud): stong pa chen po dang / mchog tu stong pa dang / shin tu stong pa dang / stong pa rab tu stong pa dang / byang chub dang / byang chub kyi sems dang / yi ge dang / yi ge med pa dang / dra ba dang / lcug ma dang / cha dang cha med pa dang / thig
260a7(rgyud): dang / ro dang / ro chen po dang / yid la byed pa med pa dang / rtag pa dang zhi ba dang / mi zad pa dang / thar pa dang / thar byed dang / grol ba dang / rigs pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / na mkha' dang / skabs dang / skabs med
260a8(rgyud): pa rnams la gcig tu stug por gyur te/ rnam par phye nas mi snang ba'i tshul du gnaso// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang / thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang / smon
260b1(rgyud): lam gyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang / rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin ma rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po shin tu dgyes pa rdo rje gdon mi za ba chen po gsang ba chen po'i dgongs pa nges
260b2(rgyud): par 'grel pa chen po phyag mdzad de/ mngon sum du yang dag par bskul nas dris pa// su ra ta s+t+waM sta ma si ha// gang phyir 'dod pa bde ba che// gang gis 'dod las byang chub 'gyur// 'dod chags bral ba ji/ 
260b3(rgyud): ltar bde// gang gis zhe sdang rdo rje che// gang gis gti mug rgyal ba che// gang gis 'dod chags pad+mor 'gyur// gang gis nga rgyal na mkha'i bdag/ gang gis phrag dog gdon mi za// byang chub sems ni ji ltar
260b4(rgyud): bde// gang gis bde byed mchod par 'gyur// mchod pa yis ni ji ltar 'grub// ji ltar gzungs dang mnyam sbyor bas// yi ge mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur// ji ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga/ 
260b5(rgyud): bsnyen pa yis ni myur du 'grub// ji ltar gsang ba mnyam sbyor ba// rmad du 'byung ba'i dbang bskur 'gyur// ji ltar pad+mo mnyam sbyor bas// dkyil 'khor rab tu zhugs par 'gyur// ji ltar dri/ 
260b6(rgyud): chu byang chub dang // dmar dang snang mdzad chen po yis// dam tshig nyid du ji ltar 'gyur// ji ltar btung ba rab tu brtag/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bdag po kun tu bzang po chen pos
260b7(rgyud): rdo rje pha rol tu phyin ma'i gsang ba chen mo de dag thams cad la rang gi bde bas mnyes par byas te/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbas pa chen po shin tu sbas pa mchog tu gsang ba'i dris lan chen po nyid kyi sku dang / 
260b8(rgyud): gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // ngan song gsum gyi 'jigs byed du/ sems can nyon mongs sdang byed pas// de phyir nga ni rdo rje che// zhe sdang zhes ni bsgrags pa yin// ngan song 'jigs pa chen po ru/ 
261a1(rgyud): sems can thams cad rmongs byed pas// de phyir 'di ni gti mug ste// rtag pa thub pa mchog yin// thabs dang shes rab tshul nyid kyis// 'gro ba thams cad dga'abyed cing // pad+mo'i tshul/ 
261a2(rgyud): tu rab rtogs phyir// de phyir 'dod chags zhes bya'o// bde chen sbyin pa'i sprin gyis ni// sems can thams cad nga rgyal skyed// na mkha'i bde ba bsdus pa'i phyir// de phyir mkha' chen nga rgyal yin// ro la sogs pa
261a3(rgyud): mnyam sbyor bas// phrag dog rdo rje gdon mi za// sna tshogs pad+mo rab 'jug phyir// de yi phyir ni sna tshogs che// 'dod chags bral ba dga' med phyir// bdag ni rab dgyes sbas pa che// 'dod pa ma gtogs
261a4(rgyud): bde byed mang // bde tshe 'dod pa nga yino// 'dod chags med par byang // chub med// byang chub med na'ang 'dod chags med// sdig pa'i nang na chags bral te// sangs rgyas bde mchog mnyes byed pas// 
261a5(rgyud): 'dod chags 'dod las bde byed kyi// bde ba mchog tu rmad 'byung gyur// byang chub sems med bde byed gzhan// 'jig rten gsum po 'dir med do// thams cad byang chub sems ngo bo// bde ba kun/ 
261a6(rgyud): gyis tshim par 'gyur// bo zhes pa ni rdo rjer bshad// d+hi zhes pa ni gzungs ma'i mchog/ ci zhes pa ni zag par bshad// ta zhes pa ni bde ba che// mchod pa med pas bde byed med// bde ba med pas mgu ba med// 
261a7(rgyud): mgu bas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// grub na bde byed rtag pa yi// phyag na rdo rje bde ba che// 'dod pa'i bde bas mchod byed cing // tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// bde ba kun gyis gzhir gyur pa'i// chos kyi dbyi
261a8(rgyud): ni rnam par 'dzin// rdo rje 'dzin phyir gzungs ma yin// hri zhes pa ni pad+mo 'dzin// 'di dang mnyam par sbyor ba yi// yi ge myur du 'grub par 'gyur// 'dod pa lnga yi yon tan kun// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa ste/ 
261b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams dang ji 'dzin// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i yong byud de// dbyer 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga// de yis bsnyen na grub par 'gyur// sngags kyi sku 'dzin dngapa ya nga ldan// dang phyug ma chog gis sngags rgya
261b2(rgyud): rdo rje sems kyi thugs las skyes// mtshan can mchog tu smras par bshad// de dang mnyam du sbyor ba yis// mchog gi dbang ni bskur bar 'gyur// pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba// dkyil 'khor thams cad
261b3(rgyud): sgrub par byed// blo ldan de ru zhugs gyur na'o// dam tshig sbas pa tshogs kyi rnams// dri chu byang chub dmar po'i mchog/ sha chen sbrang rtsi mar nyid kyis// lus la kun tu khyab gnas te// de yi phyir ni
261b4(rgyud): dam tshig che// dam tshig 'di yis dngos grub ste// dam tshig yi dger ldan pa yis// sbyor ces sbyang dang bskyed byas na// bza' rab dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// de nas pha rol phyin ma kun// 
261b5(rgyud): pad+mo'i gzigs pa rgyas pa yi// 'dzum bcas g.yon nas gar ma dzad cing // rtag pa la ni yang gsol pa// rigs ni rnam pa du ru bstan// ji ltar sbas pa gsum zhes bgyi// sna tshogs
261b6(rgyud): chen po de dag kun// bde la gnas pas bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnyi su med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi bde ba chen po zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par
261b7(rgyud): zhugs te/ de nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog du gsang ba pha rol tu phyin ma'i de kho na nyid rab tu phyung ngo // nga nyid sbyor ba bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems
261b8(rgyud): dpa' don chen sbyin// rigs kyi khyad par lnga rnams kyis// spyod bcas mi spyod rnams la rol// rtag pa mi bskyed rin chen mchog/ 'jig dbang gdon mi za grub rnams// rigs ni rnam pa brgyar bstan te// 
262a1(rgyud): mdo ru bsdus na rnam pa lnga// lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis// khyad par theg pa rnam pa gsum// de nyid gsum po rdo rje mnga'// bde ba'i gnas la rol pa mdzad// de nas bcom ldan
262a2(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur te/ rang gi sdom pa gsol ba 'debs so// sdom pa dngos grub kun sbyin pa// brtul zhugs dka' thub sngags mkhan gyi// dam tshig
262a3(rgyud): mchog tu srung ba'i rnams// bcom ldan gsang ba nyid kyis gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po mchog tu dgyes pa'i bde ba la mngon par chags pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ 
262a4(rgyud): gsol ba btab pa mkhyen te// zhal rab tu bzhad pas rgyas nas nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo // sku dang gsung dang thugs sbas pas// nan tan du ni bsrung bar bya/ 
262a5(rgyud): bsrungs pa yis ni bsod nams che// dngos grub shin tu skye bar 'gyur// de ni 'di yis rgya che ba'i// yid kyis kha dog dpying sa chen gyi// phyag rgya bcings la sogs pas btab// spangs pa'i
262a6(rgyud): sku ni rab bsgrub bya// rdo rje gsung du rab sbyor bas// chos kyi ngo bo phyag rgya brjod// ngag sbas gsang bar brjod pa ni// da ro spangs pa rdo rje'i gsung // rang sems rab tu 'bigs pa yis// zla ba rdo rje rnam par
262a7(rgyud): sgom// rang bzhin gsum po gcig tu sgom// 'di ni yid sbas chen po yin// 'di ni de nyid rgya chen mchog/ rgyun tu sgom pa rnams byas te// gsum bsgoms pas ni 'grub par 'gyur// gzhan min rdo rje 'dzin
262a8(rgyud): gyis gsungs// sbas gsum la sogs cho ga yis// phyag rgya thams cad rgyas btab ste// de bas nan tan thams cad kyi// sbas gsum rnam par sba bar bya// rdo rje mchog 'dzin chen po dang // gtso bo chen pos/ 
262b1(rgyud): byin gyis rlob// blon po gang gis 'das byas na// rdo rje 'dzin pa skad cig 'jig/ sems dpa' chen dang bral 'gyur na// ngan song gsum du yang dang yang // ji tsam na mkha'i dkyil 'khor ba// shin tu mi
262b2(rgyud): bzang smin par 'gyur// de nas dam tshig de dag kun// rdo rje 'dzin la mgu gyur te// 'jam po'i phyag gis gar mdzad cing // g.yon gyis phyag byas slar gsol ba// gar dbang rnams snom par gar mdzad cing
262b3(rgyud): mtha' yas phyag ni bcu pa'i bsgyings pa yis// pad+ma'i lom 'jam po brgyad phye nas// gnyis min bde bar rdo rje 'jog mdzad de// sbas pa de nyid mi mnyam sad par gyur// rdo rje 'dam skyes zla ba yang dag 'dra// 
262b4(rgyud): thabs dang shes rab dgyes pa bde byed sogs// bde gshegasams kyi sbas pa nyid kyis shong// sbyor dang sbyor ma yang dag sbyor// / zhi ba'i thal mo mchog tu bde// 'dod pa lnga yi yon+dan 'grub/ 
262b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa'o// de nas bcom ldan dam tshig rgyal// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// de nyid sbas pa bskur/ ba yis// sbas pa ma lus 'chad par mdzad// rdo rje pad+mo mnyam
262b6(rgyud): sbyor bas// cho gar ldan pas ngag dbang bskur// bde bar 'dod pa'i slob dpon gyis// de nyid 'di ni de las bstan// 'di la khrus med nges pa med// dka' thub med de dka' ba'ang med// sangs rgyas thams cad
262b7(rgyud): mnyam sbyor ba// nga nyid sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// rdo rje dbab pa skyes 'gyur na// ji tsam 'dod par na mkhar 'phur// snying khar rdo rje khu tshur bcing
262b8(rgyud): rdo rje lta bas rnam bltas te// dgyes pa'i tshul gyis bsnyen byas na// rdo rje sems dpa' skad cig 'gyur// rnam sgeg dgyes pa'i rnam gnon pas// rab dgyes sar ni 'gro byed de// sangs rgyas bde ba chen po dang // grub
263a1(rgyud): pa yis kyang mchod byed cing // rdo rje sems dpa'i rgya me mchog/ 'gyid pa'i longs pas gar byed pas// bde byed zla ba'i 'od 'dra zhing // las kyi khyad par la sogs gnon// sbas pa'i
263a2(rgyud): gar gyis gar byas pas// sbas pa sbyor ba'i bdag nyid 'grub// sna tshogs dkyil 'khor gar byed cing // lag pa mang po rnam bsgyur dang // phyir brkyang dbying su ldan pa dang // khro bar dri med lta ba yis// gdul
263a3(rgyud): dka' gnod par jigs byed pa'i// 'jig rten gsum po rnam rgyal 'gyur// me 'bar nyi ma'i dbus nyid du// khro bo hUM mdzad skom byas na// myur du 'jig rten don sgrub phyir// 'jig rten gsum po rnam rgyal 'gyur/ 
263a4(rgyud): lha mo bzhi dang mnyam sbyor bas// su ra ta sta zhes smra zhing // ha ra thi/ dag le tshul sbyar na// rab dgyes dam thag tu 'gyur// rabang gyi/ sa mchog tu brtag pa yi// sa chen rnal 'byor 'gro 'gyur te// lha
263a5(rgyud): mo bzhi dang 'grogs pa yi// sems can rnams kyi don kun byed/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad bde ba chen po la phyag bzhes nas gsol pa// thal mo yang dag sbyar byas te/ 
263a6(rgyud): phyag rgya de nyid nyid kyis shod// rdo rje mchog la gsol ba 'debs// bde ba'i bdag nyid mchod par shod// gzugs dang sgra dang dri che dang // ro dang reg pa yid 'ong ba// thugs rje chen pos bsgrubs pa yis/ 
263a7(rgyud): dpa' bo chen po nyid kyis shod// de nas bcom ldan bde byed che// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag po che// phyag rgya bcings pa bde ba che// de nyid mchog ni bshad par mdzad// dang po chos kyi phyag rgya ste// gnyis pa/ 
263a8(rgyud): dam tshig phyag rgya yin// gsum pa phyag rgya chen po ste// bzhi pa las kyi phyag rgyar bshad// de nas sku gsung thugs rdo rje// ji ltar 'gying bzhin bsgom bya ba// sna tshogs ye shes rje su dag/ sna tshogs chen pos
263b1(rgyud): 'chad par mdzad// rtag pa'i sku ni ser po ste// mi bskyod rdo rje dkar po yin// nam kha'i snying po mthing che// tshe dpag med pa pad+mod mar// sna tshogs kha dog rgya che mchog/ 'od zer phreng barmang byung ba'i// gdon ma
263b2(rgyud): za ba rdo rje che// don chen byed pa bsam par bya// rang rang rigs kyi gnas nyid du// myur du na mkha' 'gro byed cing // rigs kyi lha mo bzhi rnams kyis// rol pa dang ni mchod par byed// sna tshogs sbyor ba bde che ba'i// 
263b3(rgyud): lha mo bzhi dang mnyam sbyor ba// rdo rje sbyor bdag bsgoms byas na// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid 'gyur// rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' mchog/ rdo rje la sogs gdan bzhugs par// rang gi 'khor lo
263b4(rgyud): mchog gi rgyan// rang gi phyag rgyar gnas par bsam// pad+mo'i gdan gyi tshul gyis ni// brtse dang ldan pas sgom byas te/ snying po sbas don gar byas pas// sbas pa che la bde byed na// 'gying
263b5(rgyud): pa'i bde bar ldan pa yi// rdo rje chen po de 'grub ste// sna tshogs da kyil 'khor rab nye ba// sna tshogs chen po 'gro bar 'gyur// bde ba chen po thams cad 'grub pa'i sbyor ba chen po'i bde ba zhes
263b6(rgyud): bya ba'i phyag rgya rab tu rgyas pa'o// de nas phyag rgya bcings bshad de// rtag la sogs pa'i de kho na// gang gis myur du bcings pa yi// sangs rgyas dngos grub bde cher 'gro/ thabs ni g.yas kyi log su bya// 
263b7(rgyud): de bzhin shes rab g.yon par te// zhi ba'i thal mo gsum nyid kyi// sbyor ba'i tshul gyis bsdu bar byed// sor mo thams cad bar bar du// mnyam du sbyor bas khyad par sbyin// rdo rje yi ni thal mo 'dis// sangs
263b8(rgyud): rgyas thams cad nyid du sgrub// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // namakha'i snying po'i gnas su 'gro/ 'di nyid shin tu bcings pa yi// gsum du sbyor bas mchod pa bya// de nyid las ni sor mo kun// kun tu
264a1(rgyud): bskum te bcings par bya// rdo rje'i bcings pa bsdus pa ni// bcing ba ldan par rnam bsgyur te// de nyid sbom po rab bcug nas// khro mo'i rtse mo rab tu dgug/ 'di ni ji rigs kyi bcing / 
264a2(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' nyid 'grub byeng // de bzhin bcing ba rnam bzhag ste// sbom po khro mo'i rtse mo sbyar// 'di ni bcing ba bcing ba che// namakhar 'gro ba nye bar sgrub// de nyid bcing bas bcing byas te// khro mo gnyis po
264a3(rgyud): mtshan bzhin du// rtse mo sprang de dgug bya ba// bcing ba 'di yis pad+mo sgrub// bcing ba de nyid rab tu sbom// bde ba bcug nas bsdam byas te// las kyi bcing ba sbyor ba yis// don yod mchog gi rigasu 'gro
264a4(rgyud): bcing ba de nyid bcing byas te// sbom dang khro ba'i rtse mo sbyar// g.ya ngas pa'i sbom po rdo rje yis// de yi dbu su bcug bya ba// de 'di ba cing ba chen po ste// rab dgyes ro ni sgrub byed pa// gang gis bcings
264a5(rgyud): pa tsam gyis ni// rab tu dgyes pa nyid 'thob bo// dngos grub thams cad bde ba che// de yis 'di tshe 'thob 'gyur te// phyag rgya bcu nga ba'i cho ga yis// sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu gnas// phyag
264a6(rgyud): rgya bcing ba'i ye shes rnam par rgyas pa'o// bcing ba lnga yi cho ga yis// gcig gis rnal 'byor bsgrub mi bya// drug ni sbyor bas sbyor byas na// de ma thag tu rab dgyes 'gyur// bcing ba lnga yi phyag rgya'o// 
264a7(rgyud): de bzhin bcing ba gnyis byas te// g.yon gyi snying khar bcing bar bya// g.yas kyi rtse mo sgreng byas te// rdo rje'i tshul gyis bzung bar bya// phyag rgya 'di ni byang chub bde// sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu sgrub/ 
264a8(rgyud): gdon mi za bar che 'di la// rtag pa 'dra ba thob par byed// g.yon pa de nyid snyid khar bzhag/ g.yas pa sa la reg byas pa// sa la bde bar rol pa yis// 'di yis mi zad 'thob par 'gyur// de bzhin stong khar/ 
264b1(rgyud): g.yon pa bzhag/ rtag pa g.yas pa rab sbyin bya// 'di yis rin chen skal ldan sogs// namakha' nye bar 'grub par 'gyur// de bzhin g.yon pa snying khar bzhag/ g.yas kyang bzhag ste ting 'dzin gnas// 'di
264b2(rgyud): yis tshe dpag med pa nyid// tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur// de bzhin g.yon pa snying khar sbyar// lag pa g.yas pa mi 'jigs sbyin// 'jigs pa ma lus rab sgrol ba// sdig pa gdug pa 'jigs pa che// 'di yis/ 
264b3(rgyud): thams cad 'phrog par byed// gdon mi za ba'i nges pa yis// de ni chen po'i chen por 'gyur// de nyid bcing ba gnyis byas te// g.yon pa g.yon du sbyar bar bya// g.yas ni snying khar gzung byas te// brjod pas
264b4(rgyud): rab tu bzhad cing gnas// bde ba chen po thabs gnas pas// 2dri yis rab dgyes nyid 'gyur te// bde mchog nyid du sgrub pa po// tshe 'odadi nyid la the tshom med// de bzhin bcing ba bcing byas te// sbyor/ 
264b5(rgyud): dang ldan pas bstan par bya// sbom po'i rtse mo pad+mo'i gnas// g.yon gyi khro mo'i rtse mor sbyar// g.yas pa yi ni sbom po/ yis// mngon sum rdo rjer byas pa yis// bcug nas bde ba
264b6(rgyud): spyod bya zhing // skad cig skad cig bsdam par bya// de 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// dgyes pa dgyes mchog sgrub pa po// 'di ni btsongs pa tsam gyis kyang // yang dag rdo rje dgyes pa 'thob// rab dgyes
264b7(rgyud): bde mchog longs spyod kyi// btsun mo dngos grub nyid du 'gyur// g.yas ni mtshan mas drang byas te// lcags kyu'i tshul du bzhag par bya// rdo rje 'dod ma lcags kyu'i ste// rdo rje 'dod byed btsun mo yi// 
264b8(rgyud): dang por 'dren pa de nyid bzhag/ tha mar ha ra thig ler bya// rdo rje dgyes pa bde 'thob byed// ming ni dbusu bri bar bya// 'di yis snying khar bya ba yis// de bzhin gshegs pa bde mchog 'gro// phyag rgya bzhi dang
265a1(rgyud): 'grogs pa yis// lus 'dis che 'di 'grub par 'gyur// rab gyes sbyor bar yang dag ldan// phyag rgya bzhi dang mnyam 'grogs shing // rdo rje 'gying la sogs spyod pas// rnal
265a2(rgyud): 'byor 'di ni bcings pa yis// rab dgyes la sogs ma lus pa// rab dgyes rol bsgyings ma yis// skad cig nyid du 'dren par 'gyur// de bzhin sbom mo'i rtse mor sbyar// snying rje chen po der bzhag pa/ 
265a3(rgyud): skal ba chen po rdo rje spyan// de nyid don kun stan byed ma// 'di ni yang dag bcings pa yis// rdo rje rtag pa'i spyan du 'gyur// yod dang med pa rnam spangs pa// dngos po thams cad mthong bar 'gyur// rdo rje'i
265a4(rgyud): thal mo bstan bya ste// khro mo rtse mo zlum po yis// mthon por ma tshan dang 'dra byas te// sbom por rdo rje bstan pa che// de 'di bco dam ldan 'das mchog/ rdo rje pad+mo'i bde 'thob byed// rnal 'byor/ 
265a5(rgyud): 'di ni bcings pa yis// sbas pa chen po'i dgyes pa 'thob/ de nas lha mo chen mo dag/ spros pa che bas gar mdzad cing / rdo rje bde byed bdag nyid la// bdud dang bcas pas phyag byas te// 
265a6(rgyud): chos kyi yi ge thabs gnas nas// de nyid chos kyi gsol ba 'debs// chos kyi phyag rgya bde ba che// rdo rje bcom ldan bshad du gsol// sgrub pa pos ni rab bstims na// gang gis lnga ni 'grub par 'gyur/ 
265a7(rgyud): gang gis myur du byin rlabs pas// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub ste// bde byed gnyis kyis spro che ba// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas 'jug 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das lha mo thams cad kyis gsol
265a8(rgyud): ba btab pa mkhyen nas// nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs sbas pa las chos kyi phyag rgya chen po'i tshig 'di phyung ngo // bcu gsum bdag nyid 'dren pa ste// thig le lhar ni yang dag ldan// tha mar ha ra thig ler gan
265b1(rgyud): rab tu dgyes pa rdo rje dgyes// snying khar phyag rgya 'di byas nas// dga' byed lhan cig chen byed cing // spyod dang mi spyod 'grub 'gyur te// rnal 'byor bde ba chen por 'gro// de bzhin 'dren pa thog mar bya// rdo rje 'dod pa/ 
265b2(rgyud): kyo ba mchog gaha ra thig le yang dag ldan// cha gnyis gsum pa sbyar byas pa// 'di ni snying kar bzhag byas nas// bde bar na mkha'a' 'gro 'gyur te// bde ba shin tu rtag pa yi// 'di yis mchog tu dngos grub
265b3(rgyud): 'dren pa de nyid thob mar bzhag/ ltos ltos zhes pa hUM dang ldan// skal ba chen po rdo rje spyan// dbus su bskul bas 'grub par 'gyur// 'phrul gyi spyan lnga nor che ba// 'di yis rnal 'byor 'grub 'gyur te// rdo rje
265b4(rgyud): byang chub dgyes pa che// sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyu/ dar// dang por 'dren pa de nyid bzhag/ tha mar ha ra thig ler bya// / rdo rje dgyes pa bde 'thob byed// ming ni dbu su bri bar bya// 'di yi
265b5(rgyud): snying khar byas pa yis// de bzhin gshegs pa bde mchog 'bru/ phyag rgya bzhi dang 'grogs pa yis// lus 'dis 'di tshe 'gru ba par 'gyur// rab dgyes sbyor bar yang dag zhon// phyag rgya bani
265b6(rgyud): dang mnyam 'grogs shing // rdo rje 'gying la sogs spong pas// bcom ldan 'dod ma 'grub par 'gyur// chos kyi de kho na nyid kyi don gyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o// de nas bcom ldan sbyor ba che// thog ma tha ma me/ 
265b7(rgyud): ba mchog/ gdug pa thams cad gdul ba'i phyir// rdo rje khro bor de 'gyur// mdun du thog ma'i lha nyid du// rdo rje hUM mdzad nyi ma 'bar// nyi ma bcu gnyis gzi brjid che// me 'bar rab tu 'bar bar ldan// 
265b8(rgyud): 'khor gyi 'khor lo de dag kun// dur khrod kyi ni rgyan mchog gis// brgyan te gdug pa'i tshogs rnams la// de ni yang dag rol pa mdzad// khro chen mchog 'dul phyag rgya 'di// sngags ni rang gi snying khar sgom
266a1(rgyud): khro mo'i bu mos mdun du bskor// khro mo chen mode 'grub bo// 'di yis gdug pa thams cad rnams// hu byas myur du brtsub par 'gyur// de dag gdug pa gdug pa che/ 
266a2(rgyud): 'jigs shing 'khrugs te rab tu 'jig/ skyobs shig skyobs shig ces smra zhing // rdo rje gtso la dran par byed// phyag rgya 'di ni mnyam par gzhag/ 'gro ba thams cad dbab bya ste// las mchog thams
266a3(rgyud): cad sgrub pa pos// dgra yi rnams ni bzhig par bya// sbyor dang ldan pas 'bum bzlas te// las rnams thams cad byed pa na// gdon mi za bar kun 'gyur te// rdo rje sems dpa' 'ang sgrub par nus/ 
266a4(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// khro bo'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so// de nas sangs rgyas che de dag/ sangs rgyas nyid skyes thams cad mchog/ gzugs ma rnal
266a5(rgyud): 'byor ma thams cad// rang gi 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i tshogs/ phan tshun bde ba ldan pa yi// dga' bas 'khor rnams 'dra/ gas 'gyur te// rang gi bde byed skyes par 'brel// skal ba chen
266a6(rgyud): mo rtsen par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen pos rang gi 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i tshogs rnams la yang dang yang du gzigs te// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dren pa'i rig ma'i
266a7(rgyud): snying po 'dis sdud pa mdzad do// oM badz+ra ang+ku sha/ du ru du ru/ e h+ye hi kan+ta bi kar+d+ha sar+b+ba nA rA ta tsakra sany+tsa ya/ badz+ra ang+ku sha hUM phaT// 'di yi phyag rgya rdo rje yi// bcings pa gnyis ni dam byas te// rdo rje khro mo dgrol bar
266a8(rgyud): bya/ rdo rje'i khro b.rab sbyar ba// rdo rje'i kyo ba zhes bya'o// 'gro dang ri bo sems can rnams// phyag rgya 'di yis kun bkug ste// 'dod pas 'gying ba'i yid rtag rnams// mi yi bu mo smos ci dgos// rdo rje bcings pa
266b1(rgyud): mnyam gzhag ste// g.yon gyi steng du de bzhin bzhag/ dbus su sbom mo bzhag par bya// rdo rje 'dren pa gzi brjid che// rdo rje bcings pa bsdam byas te// rdo rje sbom mo rtse mo spang // bdag ni rdo rje zhes
266b2(rgyud): sgom zhing // bcing ba de ni dgrol bar bya// de nyid bcing ba dam byas te// dbang dang chung ngu'i rtsa ba'i mtshams// rdo rje sbom mo nus bya te// rab dgyes bdag nyid bskyod par bya// de las rdo rje mchog gnyis
266b3(rgyud): bskyed// mdud pa'i tshul du sbyar bar bya// gzhug pa dang ni 'dren pa'i mchog/ 'di yis thams cad dngos grub pas// rnal 'byor phyag rgya 'di nyid kyis// drangs te bcug nas bcing byas te// dbang du byas nas
266b4(rgyud): bsgrub par bya// de nas de dag thams cad drangs bcug bcings dag 'a ba bskyed na// rang gi rab tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen pos/ rang gi rgyal srid rje su skyong zhing rdo rje chos la bka' stsal pa/ 
266b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi tshul chen po// dga' byed zla gsang thig le yi// rab dgyes bdag nyid gsang ba 'di// sems dpa'achen po khyod kyis zung // de nas gdan las myur bzhengs te/ 
266b6(rgyud): thal mo sbyar te phyag bzhes nas// chos kyi ngo bor tshig smras pa// bde ba chen po bdag gis blangs// rang bde longs spyod gar byas te// rdo rje che yis 'di skad smras// rdo rje chos ni sna tshogs che// sna tshogs
266b7(rgyud): pad+mo gar rab byed// de nas pha rol phyin de kun// rab dgyes longs spyod gar byed cing // bde byed chen po'i bdag nyid rje// legs pa zhes pa sbyin byed de// leg so legaso bde ba che// leg so legaso ye shes
266b8(rgyud): che ba leg so leg so sna tshogs che// legaso legaso dgyes pa che// bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa'i thugs kyi de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ pha rol tu phyin ma'i 'khor chen mo de dag mngon par dag dga' bar gyur to// 
267a1(rgyud): blagasang thig le zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po mchog tu gsang ba yong su rdzogs so// / la ts+tsha rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// gsung bdon rtogs slob dpon gyis/ 
267a2(rgyud): sdug par bkrol te bstan pa la// ci rigs bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyis// sems can sems pade thob par smon// rgya ga skad du/ sarba thA tag ta tras grata na ma ma hA yan sU tra/ 
267a3(rgyud): bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad
267a4(rgyud): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhinadagashegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje byin gyis brlabs dang / dadam tshig gi ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khyad par dang ldan pa/ 
267a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i dbu rgyan gyis/ mas gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal po dbang bskur ba mnga' ba rnye/ pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen
267a6(rgyud): pa'i ye shes/ rnal 'byor chen po'i dbang phyug/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad mnyam pa nyid thug su chud cing thams cad kyi dgos pa mdzad pa nyid kyis sems can gyi khams ma
267a7(rgyud): lus pa med pa thams cad kyi re ba thams cad yongs su stong ba'i phrin las mdzad pa/ thugs rje che ba rnam par snang mdzad chen po rtag par dus gsum du bzhugs shing sku dang gsung thugs thams cad rdo rje/ 
267a8(rgyud): lta bur gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs shing bsngags bstod pa/ nor bu dang / rin po che chen pos sbas pa/ kha dog sna tshogs shing gi dril bu btags pa/ dar dang
267b1(rgyud): 'phan dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / rnga ma dang / dra ba dang / dra ba phyed ma dang / zla ba rlung gis bskyod pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa'i 'og min gyi lha'i rgyal po'i gnas na bzhugs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba
267b2(rgyud): phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje dang / kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dang / na mkha'i snying po dang / rdo rje khu tshur dang / 'jam dpal dang / sems
267b3(rgyud): bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / na mkha'i mdzod dang / bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / 
267b4(rgyud): gang+gA'i klung gi byed ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang thabs ra gcig tu bzhugs te/ de yang 'di ltar 'dzam bu'i gling na de de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med grangs med pa de dag gi skus kyang til
267b5(rgyud): gyi gang bu bzhin tu kun tu gang bar snang ngo // de bzhin gshegs/ pa'i sku re re las kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med ba rnams snang ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na yang chos kyi
267b6(rgyud): tshul 'di nyid 'chad do// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po na mkha'i dbyings thams cad bzhin du rtag par bzhugs shing sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje lta bur gyur pa/ de bzhin
267b7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pas rdo rje'i dbyings thams cad thugasu chud pa'i ye shes sems dpa'/ na mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs las
267b8(rgyud): byung ba'i ye shes kyi snying po/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa nyid kyis thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje chen po'i ye shes dbang bskur ba'i rin po che'i dbang du gyur pa/ na mkha'i dbyings thams
268a1(rgyud): cad du spros pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pas byang chub par gyur cing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ngo bo nyid dag par nyid kyis chos thams cad
268a2(rgyud): kyi rang bzhin dag par thug su chud pa/ na mkha'i dbyings thams cad du khyab pa'i gzugs thams cad du yang dag par ston pa mkhyen pas sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i khams rnams
268a3(rgyud): 'dul ba'i spyod pa'i mchog tu gyur cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' nod cing don yod par mdzad pa nyid kyi thams cad dang mnyam pa med cing bla na med pa'i phrin las sna tshogs mdzad pa/ 
268a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub chen por sems dpa' brtan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'i tshig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya
268a5(rgyud): ba'i ye shes kyi dbang phyug dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams/ cad kyi leg so zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa tham/ sa cad kyi rin po che'i dbang chen por bskur ba dang / de bzhin
268a6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsam pa'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che'i dpal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
268a7(rgyud): kyi bzhad pa chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dga' ba'i chos chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab chen po'i ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad / 
268a8(rgyud): 'khor lo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'chad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdon mi za bar thams cad kyi dgongs pa mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
268b1(rgyud): kyi brtson 'grus chen po'i go cha shin tu brtan po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis srung zhing bskyang ba'i rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya
268b2(rgyud): bcings pa'i ye shes rnamaso// kun bzang rab tu gdon mi za// bdud dang rab dgyes gtso bo dang // mkha' skyes shin tu gzi chen dang // rin chen dpal dang 'dzum pa che// kun tu gzig pa'i dbang chen dang / 
268b3(rgyud): 'jam dpal dkyil 'khor thams cad dang // mi gsung ba dang thams cad las// brtson 'grus ma rungs dam du bzung // rdo rje lcags kyu mnga' gzhu dang // rin chen nyid ma rgyal mtshan 'dzum// pad+ma ral gri
268b4(rgyud): 'khor lo gsung // las dang go cha 'jigs byed bcas// thog/ ma tha ma med cing zhing // ma rus khro ba bzod pa che// gnod ste den srin po dam pa brtan// gzi chen dpa' bo khyab bdag che// yu
268b5(rgyud): ma'i bdag po skye dgu'i mgon// gtogs 'dod rgyal 'dod thub pa che// 'jig rten skyong dang mkha' dngas// 'jig rten gsum dang khams gsum dang // 'byung chen sems can don rab mdzad// 
268b6(rgyud): thams cad gu lang tshangs pa dang // 'khor dang myas 'da' dang rtag/ yang dag 'tsho dang mchod pa che// sangs rgyas dag pa theg pa che// srid gsum rtag pa'ang de bzhi no// 'jig rten gsum rgyal bde sprod dang // 
268b7(rgyud): bde spyod mgon po rab 'dul mdzad// rdo rje gtso dang sa rab mchog/ ye shes pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// byang chub sems dpa' rnam thar dang // spyod dang de bzhin gshegs pa kun// sangs rgyas don dang sangs rgyas
268b8(rgyud): thugs// byang chub kun dang bla na med// rnam par snang mdzad rgyal dang mgon// rang 'byung gzungs dang dran pa dang // sems dpa' che dang phyag rgya che// ting 'dzin sangs rgyas phrin las mdzad// yang dag sangs
269a1(rgyud): rgyas kun bdag nyid// sems can rtag don rtogs mdzad pa// sdong po chen po bde ba che// thabs chen dang ni mchog chen mchog/ kun gyi mchog dang gnas dbang po// bcom ldan 'das/ 
269a2(rgyud): byang chub chen po'i thugs byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la gnaso// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di dper na te/ 
269a3(rgyud): gyi gang bu bzhin tu yongs su gang bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba byang chub kyi snying po la
269a4(rgyud): bzhugs pa gang na ba der gshegs te/ byang chub sems dpa' dril ched du rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku bstan nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gang gis phyir de bzhin
269a5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid mngon par ma rtogs pa/ ra dka' ba spyod pa thams cad la spro ba bskyed cing ji ltar na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
269a6(rgyud): par bya snyam/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bskul bas mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ de bzhin gshegs
269a7(rgyud): pa thams cad la phyag byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de kho na nyid ji lta bu lags/ ji ltar sgrub par bgyi/ bka' stsal par gsol de skad ces gsol
269a8(rgyud): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsung gcig tu 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu rang gi sems la so sor rtog cing mnyam par zhog la rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di
269b1(rgyud): dgar zlos shing sgrub par gyis shig/ oM tsit+ta pra ti bo d+hi ka ro mi// de nas byang chub sems dpa' don thams cad grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
269b2(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams bdag gi snying kan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gda' ba bdag gis rtog so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sems 'di ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal
269b3(rgyud): bas na de ni ji ltar sbyangs pa de lta bur 'gyur te/ dper na ras dkar po chen gyis bsgyur ba bzhin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i sems shes pa rgyas par
269b4(rgyud): bya ba'i phyir/ oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ut+pA da yA mi/ zhes bya ba rang bzhin/ gyis grub pa'i sngags 'dis yang byang chub sems dpa'/ sems dpa' chen po de byang chub kyi sems bskyed par gyur to// 
269b5(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bkas byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas 'di skad ces ga/ sol to// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur mthong ba gang lags pa de
269b6(rgyud): ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po sems bskyed pa kun tu bzang po khyod kyis mngon du gyur gyis/ 
269b7(rgyud): de legs par sgrubs shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems bskyed pa kun tu bzang po de brtan par bya ba'i phyir sngags 'dis rang gi snying ka'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje'i dbyingasu soms shig/ 
269b8(rgyud): oM tiSh+Tha badz+ra/ byang chub sems dpas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na rdo rje bdag gis mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka
270a1(rgyud): stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi kun tu bzang po'i sems rdo rje 'di sngags 'dis brtan par gyis shig/ oM badz+ra At+ma ko haM/ de nas namakha'i dbyings thams cad du
270a2(rgyud): mnyam par bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dbyings ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis sems dpa'i
270a3(rgyud): rdorje der bzhug so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa de lha rdo rje'i dbyings zhes bya ba'i rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ro// 
270a4(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje dbyings kyis de bzhin gshe gus pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to// bco ma ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de bzhin gshegs
270a5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi sku ni bdag lags par mthong lags so// // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po de lta bas na sems dpa' rdo rje de rnams pa
270a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i sems sangs rgyas kyi skur bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'dis ci dgar zlos la bsgoms shig/ oM ya thA sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sta thA a haM/ de nas de skad ces
270a7(rgyud): bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i dbyings kyis bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te/ 
270a8(rgyud): bos nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag byin gyis rlobs la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa de brtan par mdzod cig/ de nas de skad ces
270b1(rgyud): gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje der bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings kyis skad cig ma de
270b2(rgyud): nyid kyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya gsang
270b3(rgyud): ba'i dam tshig tu zhug so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rtogs pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ye shes kyi 'byung gnas gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
270b4(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasu gyur to// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang de bzhin dgashegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje las byung nas de bzhin
270b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes bskyed/ na mkha'i snying po'i nor bu rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang ba skur/ kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po chos kyi ye shes ni
270b6(rgyud): bskyed/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams pa cad kyi phrin las thams cad la rab tu bzhag nas ri rab kyi rtse mo gang na ba dang / khung bu rtse mo rdo rje dang nor bu'i rin po che las byas pa gang na bder gshegs te byon nas/ 
270b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi seng+ge'i gdan la zhal kun tu bstan te bzhag par gyur to// de nas de bzhin
270b8(rgyud): gshegs pa mi bskyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa rnams
271a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du so so nas bdag nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas mnyam
271a2(rgyud): ba nyid du rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir// phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas phyogs bzhir bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par
271a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad na mkha' las byung ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po'i dbang gis dbang
271a4(rgyud): bskur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun tu spyan ras ga dazigs kyis dbang po'i chos kyi ye shes dam pa'i pha rol tu daphyin pa brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin lnga
271a5(rgyud): thams cad nyid kyis gdon mi za zhing thogs pa med par ston pa/ dgongs pa rdzogs pa/ yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs pa sa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid byin gyis brlab
271a6(rgyud): nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po zhes pa'i dam tshig las byung ba sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 
271a7(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ngo // oM badz+ra satwa/ de nas de bzhin gshegs
271a8(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi thugs kha nas byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po de nyid do// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur nas byung ste/ sems can thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po yang dag par
271b1(rgyud): sbyangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyogs phyog su 'khod do// de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag las kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mtha
271b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i thug su zhug so// rdo rje sems dpa'i tingange 'dzini shin tu brten pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas na mkha'i khams thams
271b3(rgyud): cad kyi tshad dang mnyam par 'jug pa'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba can rtse mo lnga pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje'i dbyibasu gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
271b4(rgyud): kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ phyag gnyi su gnaso// de nas rdo rje de las rdo rje lta bu'i 'od zer gzugs dang kha dog sna tshogs pa'/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang bas khyab par byed pa rnams
271b5(rgyud): byung ngo // rdo rje lta bu'i 'od zer de dag gi rtse mo las 'jig rten gyi mas thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo snyed kyi de bzhin ga/ shegs pa rnams kyi sku byung ste/ chos kyi dbyings kun tu khyab pa
271b6(rgyud): thams cad dang / na mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i sprin thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon pa
271b7(rgyud): byang chub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa sna tshogs grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs mnyes par mdzad pa
271b8(rgyud): dang / byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang / bdud thams cad 'dul ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi byang chub chen por mngon par byang chub pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo
272a1(rgyud): bskor ba nas/ ji srid sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongasu skyob cing thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
272a2(rgyud): kyi ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa dam pa'i dngos grub thob pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi rdzu 'phrul rnams kyi bar du bstan nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin ni kun tu bzang po yin pa
272a3(rgyud): dang / shin tu brtan pa yin pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du/ 
272a4(rgyud): brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o bdag ni rang byung ba'i kun tu ba bzang po sems dpa' brtan// de ni brtan phyir lus min yang / sems dpa'i lus su gyur pa yin/ de nas byang chub sems
272a5(rgyud): dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i sku bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan snga na zla ba 'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur
272a6(rgyud): to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge
272a7(rgyud): 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / sems can gyi don bya ba dang / thabs chen po/ stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / ye shes chen po'i
272a8(rgyud): dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang thams cad kyi dbang por bya ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong ba bya ba nas/ ji srid de bzhin gshegs
272b1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa rnams bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs par 'grub pa'i mchog thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sem
272b2(rgyud): dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang / dar dpyad kyi dbang gis dbang bskur nas/ de bzhin
272b3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub pa'i rdo rje de de'i lag par byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lag na rdo rje lag na rdo rje zhes ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
272b4(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje phyag g.yon pa rdo rje bsgyings par bya zhugs// phyag g.yas pa rdo rje thugs khar gsor zhing 'phe ngan pa'i tshul du 'dzin cing ched du brjod pas 'di ched du brjod do// 
272b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi grub pa yi// rdo rje bla na med pa 'di// bdag ste/ bdag gi lag tu byin// rdo rje la ni rdo rje gnas// de nas pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po gdon
272b6(rgyud): mi za ba'i rgyal po'i dam tshig las 'byung ba'i sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin
272b7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas byung ngo // badz+ra rarAdzA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas phyung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de de bzhin gshegs/ 
272b8(rgyud): ba thams cad kyi lcags kyu chen por gyur te byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thug su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje lcags kyu chen po'i dbying su gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyisu
273a1(rgyud): gnaso// de nas rdo rje lcags kyu'i dbyibs chen po de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs
273a2(rgyud): pa thams cad spyan drang ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa' tingange 'dzin ni shin tu gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po nyid yin pa dang / shin tu brten pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres pa/ 
273a3(rgyud): gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po shin tu gdon mi za ba'i lus su gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te/ ched du brjod pa 'di che sa e ma'o rdo rje las byung ba'i// lcags
273a4(rgyud): kya nges pa'i rgyal po dag/ gang phyir kun tu sangs rgyas khyab/ grub phyir kun nas spyan 'dren no// de nas byang chub sems dang/ 'a sems dpa' chen po shin tu gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i sku de bcom
273a5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan
273a6(rgyud): 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa'i dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams
273a7(rgyud): ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad dgug pa dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'du ba'i byin gyis brlabs dam pa'i dngos grub kyi bar gyi phyir rje
273a8(rgyud): rje lcags kyu de byang chub sems dpa' gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po de'i lag par de bzhin du byin no// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje 'gugs pa rdo rje 'gugs pa zhes bya ba'i ming gis dbang bskur ro// 
273b1(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 'gugs pa rdo rje lcags kyu des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyis rdo rje yi// ye shes bla na med pa'i
273b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi don grub phyir// kun nas spyan drangs dam pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud ces bya ba'i dam tshig las 'byung ba'i sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs rdo// 
273b3(rgyud): rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra/ 
273b4(rgyud): rAgra/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi me tog gi mngar gyur nas byung ste/ 
273b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thug su zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje'i mda' chen po'i dbyibasu gyur te/ phyag gnyisu gnaso// de nas rdo rje'i mnga'i dbyibs de
273b6(rgyud): las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rje su mnyes par bya ba la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas
273b7(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin ni shin tu bdud byed pa nyid dang / rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud
273b8(rgyud): ces bya ba'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o bdag gi rang bzhin dag/ rang byung ba dag dgyes byed na/ 'dod chan
274a1(rgyud): bral rnam dag bya'i phyir// 'dod chags kyis ni 'dul bar byed// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi lus de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin
274a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yog phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i
274a3(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bdud kyi rdo rje'i dam tshigs dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams mgu bar bya/
