274a4(rgyud): ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdud kyi las kyi dngos gru/ ba kyi mchog thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje'i mnga'
274a5(rgyud): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud ces bya ba'i de 'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i gzhu rdo rje gzhu zhes bya ba'i ming gi dbang
274a6(rgyud): gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i gzhu zhes bya bas rdo rje'i mda' des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bdud byed cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 
274a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi 'dod chags kyi// ye shes 'di ni dri ma med// 'dod chags kyis ni chags bral bcom// bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa'
274a8(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu dga' ba'i
274b1(rgyud): tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra sA d+hu/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa
274b2(rgyud): de nyid de/ leg so zhes bya bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugasu zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje dgyes pa'i dbyib su gyur te phyag gnyisu gnas so// de nas rdo rje dgyes pa'i
274b3(rgyud): dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis leg so zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyu/ 
274b4(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin ni shin tu dga' bar byed pa dang / rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig/ tu 'dres par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal
274b5(rgyud): po'i lus su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam bar snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa/ 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o thams cad mkhyen kun gyi// legs
274b6(rgyud): sbyin nang na bdag mchog pas// rnam rtog bral ba de dag gi/ nges par dgyes pa bskyed pa yin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po'i sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ 
274b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyab na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya
274b8(rgyud): ba'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu dgyes pa bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med sems can thams cad mgu
275a1(rgyud): bar bya ba dang / thams cad bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa'i ro bla na med pa grub pa dam pa thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyi
275a2(rgyud): rdo rje dgyes pa de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje dgyes pa zhes bya ba'i ming gi dbang gis dbang
275a3(rgyud): bskur ro// de nas byang chub seMd seMda' chen po rdo rje dgyes pas rdo rje dgyes pa'i dbyibs des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la leg so zhes bya bas rab tu dgyes par byed cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 
275a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi legs sbyin pa// 'di ni rab tu 'jug byed pas// rdo rje thams cad dgyes par byed// lha rdzas dgyes pa spel ba ra'o// byang chub kyi sems chen po dang // de bzhin gshegs pa
275a5(rgyud): thams cad spyan drang ba'i dam tshig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa tham sa cad mnyes par byed pa'i ye shes dang / dgyes pa chen kho dang / 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen
275a6(rgyud): bo'i sems dpa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rin po che'i byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs
275a7(rgyud): nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra rat+na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thug
275a8(rgyud): las byung ma thag pa 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin thams cad na mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes shin tu gtogs pa yin pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ namakha' thams cad kyi 'od zer du
275b1(rgyud): gyur nas phyung ngo // namakha' thams cad kyi 'od zer de dag gis 'jig rten khams thams cad snang bar byas nas thams cad na mkha'i dbyings lta bur gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
275b2(rgyud): thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis na mkha'i dbyings de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thug su zhugs nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin ni shin tu bsgoms par gyur pa'i phyir yang nam
275b3(rgyud): mkha'i khams thams cad las byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi mnyam par 'jug pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje rin po che chen po'i dbyibasu gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gnyisu gnaso// 
275b4(rgyud): de nas rdo rje rin po che'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang / mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshe dgas pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
275b5(rgyud): cad kyi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i tingange 'dzin ni
275b6(rgyud): nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi snying po las shin tu byung ba dang / rab tu bstan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das
275b7(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o chags med rgyal ba yang // khams gsum bdag por dgongs pas na// rdo rje rin chen dam pa yi// dbang gis
275b8(rgyud): mchog ni bdag yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po'i lus de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan snga nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la
276a1(rgyud): gnas yang dag pa'i bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu rin po che'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyom
276a2(rgyud): par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i don thams cad yongasu grub par bya ba dang / thams cad
276a3(rgyud): kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don phun sum tshogs pa grub pa thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po rdo rje rin po che'i 'khor lo bskor bar rdo rje
276a4(rgyud): po che'i myur gu'i dbang gis dbang bskur nas lag tu rdo rje nor bu de byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis jo rje snying po zhes bya ba'i rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de
276a5(rgyud): nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rdo rje'i nor bu de rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnasu 'jog cing ched du brjod pa 'di rje du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyi sems dpa'i dbyings// dbang
276a6(rgyud): bskur de ni bdag yin te/ bdag gi lag du byin pas na// rin chen la ni rin chen bzhag/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen po zhes bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rin po
276a7(rgyud): tshe'i byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas
276a8(rgyud): byung ngo // badz+ra te dza/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen por gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par/ 
276b1(rgyud): snang mdzad kyi thug su zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje nyi ma'i dbyibasu gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyisu gnaso// de nas rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams
276b2(rgyud): cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer 'gyed pa la sogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho
276b3(rgyud): 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin ni shin tu gzi brjid che ba nyid dang / rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen po'i skur gyur nas bcom
276b4(rgyud): ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te ched du brjod pa/ 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sems can khams kun tu/ sna dbyed gzi brjid dpe med bdag/ gang phyir sangs rgyas dag pa yi/ 
276b5(rgyud): 'dren pa rnams dang sbyor byed pa// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid de'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi hUM gas las byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas
276b6(rgyud): phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya
276b7(rgyud): ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dam tshig dang sems can gyi khams ma lus pa med pa rnams kyi gzi brjid mtshungs pa med pa dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid
276b8(rgyud): bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi 'od 'thob cing dngos grub dam pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje nyi ma de byang chub sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen po de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no// 
277a1(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje 'od rdo rje'i 'ad ces bya ba'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i 'od ces bya ba rdo rjenyi mdes/ 
277a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la snang bar byed cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyi snang ba 'di// mi shes mun nag 'joms byed pas// shin tu phra rdul ji snyed pa'i// nyi ma'i 'od pas shin
277a3(rgyud): tu lhag/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i dpal gyi dam tshig las byung ba'i rin po che'i byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin
277a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa 'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra ke tu/ de nas de bzhin
277a5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni ba/ com ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ rgyal mtshan kha dog/ dang / gzugs dang / rgyan dang / dbyibs sna tshogs par
277a6(rgyud): gyur te byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thug su zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi dbyibasu gyur te phyag gnyisu gnaso// de nas rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi dbyibs de
277a7(rgyud): las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i rgyal mtshan sgreng ba la sogs pa sangs
277a8(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin ni rin po che chen po'i dpal nyid dang / shin tu brtan pa yin pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas byang chub sems
277b1(rgyud): dpa' chen po rin po che'i dpal gyi skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o don kun grub pa dang / dgongs pa thams cad rdzog
277b2(rgyud): pa yis// don rnams thams cad rdzogs byed pa'i// 'dra ma dpal ni bdag yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i dpal gyi sku bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs
277b3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan gyis byin gyis ba
277b4(rgyud): rdo rje zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin pashegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i rgyal man dan sbreng ba'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing
277b5(rgyud): lus pa med pa rnams kyi re ba thams cad yongasu bskang bar bya ba da / nga / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don chen po'i dngos grub dmapa
277b6(rgyud): thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje rgyal mtshan de byang chub sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i dpal de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje rgyal ba/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan
277b7(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal mtshan gyis rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor
277b8(rgyud): du bcug nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod de// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa kun// yong su rdzogs par byed pa yi// yid bzhin nor bu rgyal mtshan 'di// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// de nas yang bcom
278a1(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par dga' zhing rab tu mgu bar byed pa'i dbang po'i dam tshig las byung ba rin po che'i byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya bas
278a2(rgyud): tingange 'dzin la snyoms pa re zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgyes pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra ha sa/ de nas de
278a3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dzum par gyur te byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi
278a4(rgyud): thugs kar zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje 'dzum pa'i dbyibasu gyur nas phyag gnyisu gnaso// de nas rdo rje 'dam pa'i dbyibs nges 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin
278a5(rgyud): tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung na/ sa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rmad du byung ba la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams
278a6(rgyud): byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin ni rtag tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po yin pa dang / shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu
278a7(rgyud): dbang po'i lus gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// rtag tu mnyam par gzhag rnams kyis// sangs rgyas don la rab sbyor phyir
278a8(rgyud): e ma'o bdag ni kun mchog gi/ gzhad chen rmad du byung chen yin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rtag par dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung nas de bzhin
278b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyab kyi zla ba'i dkyil la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rmad du byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs rdo rje
278b2(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rmad du byung ba bskyed pa'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad kyi dbang po bla na med pa
278b3(rgyud): thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang po yongasu sbyong ba'i ye shes dang mngon par shes pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' chen po
278b4(rgyud): rtag par dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po de'i lag tu rdo rje 'dzum dab de de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thamasad kyis rdo rje dga' ba rdo rje dga' ba zhes rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang
278b5(rgyud): bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dga' bas rdo rje 'dzum pa des de bzhin gshegs pa tham sa cad dgyes par byed cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 
278b6(rgyud): 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rmad du byung skyed ston pa po// dgyes chen byed pa'i ye shes te// gtsug lag gzhan gyis shes mi nus// dbang bskur ba chen po dang // 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang
278b7(rgyud): ba dang // sems dpa' chen po'i don dang / dgyes pa chen po dang / 'di bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba chen po'i sems dpa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dang / 
278b8(rgyud): chen po kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i chos kyi byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i
279a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra d+harma/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das
279a2(rgyud): rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos kyi 'od zer de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kun tu
279a3(rgyud): snang bar byas nas/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du gyur to// chos kyi dbyings de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugasu zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas nam mkha'i kham
279a4(rgyud): thams cad dang mnyam par 'jug pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje pad+ma chen dpo'i dbyibasu gyur te phyag gnyi su gnaso// de nas rdo rje pad+ma'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu
279a5(rgyud): phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting 'dzin gyi ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad
279a6(rgyud): kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / chos 'phrul rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i tingange 'dzin ni shin tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po yin pa nyid dang / shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres
279a7(rgyud): par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du
279a8(rgyud): brjod do// e ma'o rang byung gdod nas dag/ dam pa'i don ni bdag yin te/ gang phyir gzings 'dra'i chos rnams la// rnam par dag pa dmigs par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po
279b1(rgyud): kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi lus de bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs las byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan snga na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te yang bka' nod cing bzhugs pa/ 
279b2(rgyud): gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting 'dzin mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
279b3(rgyud): cad rnam par sbyang ba'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi bdag dang gzhan rnam par dag par bya ba dang thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin
279b4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi ye shes dang / mngon par she/ sa pa drug thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir byang chub sem sa dpa' chen po kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dam pa'i chos
279b5(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i dbang gis dbang bskur nas de'i lag tu rdo rje padz+ra de byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rngo
279b6(rgyud): rje'i spyan rdo rje'i spyan zhes rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyi rdo rje'i pad+mo'i 'dab ma kha 'byed pas 'dod chags rnam par dag cing ma chags pa'i ngo bo nyid
279b7(rgyud): du gzigs shing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'dod chags kyi// de kho na nyid rtogs pa 'di// bdag ste bdag gi lag tu byin// chos la chos ni gnas par 'gyur// de nas yang
279b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyi dam tshig las byung ba chos kyi byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
280a1(rgyud): kyi shes rab dang ye shes chen po'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas byung ngo // badz+ra tIk+Sh+Na/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams/ 
280a2(rgyud): cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ shes rab kyi ye shes kyi ral grir gyur te/ byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thug su zhugs te/ gcig tu
280a3(rgyud): 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje ral gri'i dbyibasu gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyisu gnaso// de nas rdo rje ral gri'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin
280a4(rgyud): gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul rnams byas te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge
280a5(rgyud): 'dzin ni shin tu 'jam pa'i dpal yin pa dang / shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan
280a6(rgyud): 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ 'jam dbyangs bdag ni yin par dgongs// gang phyir shes rab gzugs med
280a7(rgyud): kyang / dbyangs nyid du ni dmigs pa yin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyi sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs
280a8(rgyud): kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig rdo rje zhes
280b1(rgyud): bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad gcod pa'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi sdug
280b2(rgyud): bsngal thams cad bcang ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi rjesu 'brang ba'i shes rab dam pa yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i bar du
280b3(rgyud): 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje'i ral gri de byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyi lag tu de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i blo rdo rje'i blo zhes rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis
280b4(rgyud): dbang 'askur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i blosadeb bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rdo rje'i ral gri des de bzhin gshegs/ 
280b5(rgyud): pa thams cad la 'debs shing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab pha rol/ phyin pa'i tshul// dgra rnams thams cad gcod byed cing / 
280b6(rgyud): sdig pa thams cad 'jom pa'i mchog/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes
280b7(rgyud): bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra na tu/ 
280b8(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ rdo rje 'khor lor gyur te byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thug su zhugs te/ 
281a1(rgyud): gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje 'khor lo dbyibs gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyisu gnaso// de nas rdo rjel khor lo dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul no// 
281a2(rgyud): tuphra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku rnams byung ste/ sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul cho 'phrul rnams 'jig rten gyi
281a3(rgyud): khams thams cad du byas te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin ni sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yin pa dang / shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' chen
281a4(rgyud): po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba'i sku ra gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs dal gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// rdo rje dam pa chos
281a5(rgyud): can gyi// oM ma'o rdo rje 'khor lo bdag/ gang phyir sems bskye/ da tsam gyis kyang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu rmo
281a6(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// 
281a7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig dang / 
281a8(rgyud): sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med par 'jug pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dam pa'i
281b1(rgyud): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bdam pa grub pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje 'khor lo de byang chub sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de'i lag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
281b2(rgyud): kyis rdo rje snying po rdo rje snying po zhes rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rdo rje 'khor longs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyir mi ldog pa
281b3(rgyud): nyid du 'jog cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// chos rnams thams cad rnam par spyod// phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo yang // byang chub snying po yin par dgongs// 
281b4(rgyud): nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po mi gsung ba'i dam tshig las byung ba chos kyi byin gyis brlabs de rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin
281b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzlas pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhi na gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka na sa phyung ngo // badz+ra d+hA Sha/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
281b6(rgyud): kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi yi ger gyur te byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugasu zhugs
281b7(rgyud): te/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje bzlas pa'i dbyibasu gyur te phyag gnyi su gnaso// de nas rdo rje bzlas pa'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin
281b8(rgyud): gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul la sogs pa byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i tingange 'dzin ni
282a1(rgyud): shin tu tshig ma yin pa dang / shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po tshig ma yin pa'i skur gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
282a2(rgyud): kyi thugs la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o rang 'byung rnams kyi gsang // ldem po ngag tu bdag dgongs te// gang phyir dam pa'i chos 'chad pa// tshig tu spros las rnam par bral// de nas
282a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po tshig ma yin pa'i sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyab na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par
282a4(rgyud): gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi rdo rje'i dam tshig las byung ba zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhi
282a5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi ye shes kyi dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi tshig/ grub pa dang / yang thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba nas de bzhin
282a6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi gsang ba nyid thob pa'i dngos grub dam pa'i bar gyi phyir rdo rje bzlas pa de byang chub sems dpa' chen po tshig ma yin pa de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
282a7(rgyud): cad kyis rdo rje'i tshig ces rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i tshig gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rdo rje'i bzlas pa des yang dag par smra zhing ched du brjod pa 'di
282a8(rgyud): ched du brjod do// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje'i bzlas par brjod pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sngags 'di myur du 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje chos nyid kyi ye shes dang / de bzhin
282b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang / ye shes dang / chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba'i ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi spros pa rnam par ldog pa'i ye shes dang 'di bzhini de
282b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sems dpa' chen po'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po phrin las thams cad pa zhes bya ba'i
282b3(rgyud): dam tshig las byung ba las kyi byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang
282b4(rgyud): gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra karma/ de nas rdo rje sems dpa'itingange 'dzin ni las thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes shin tu rtogs pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las
282b5(rgyud): byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las kyi 'od zer du gyur te byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las kyi
282b6(rgyud): 'od zer de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las kyi dbyibs lta bur gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las kyi dbyibs ma lus
282b7(rgyud): pa de yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thug su zhugs te na mkha'i dbyings thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam du gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las kyi dbyibs de las kyi rdo rje'i dbyib su
282b8(rgyud): gyur nas phyag gnyis gnaso// de nas rdo rje'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
283a1(rgyud): / du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin ni de bzhin gshegs/ 
283a2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las mtha' yas pa yin pa dang / shin tu brtan pa yin pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las thams
283a3(rgyud): cad ces bya ba'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas rnams kyi nges// 'phrin las mang po kun bdag yin
283a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas don ni lhun grub phyir// rdo rje las ni 'jug par 'gyur// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gsheg das pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las thams cad ces bya ba'i lus bcom ldan
283a5(rgyud): 'das kyi thugs las byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de
283a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod par bya ba la
283a7(rgyud): sogs pa gdon mi za bar tshad med pa dang / las kyi cho ga rgyas pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi las thams cad grub pa dang / thams cad kyi bde
283a8(rgyud): ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i 'phrin las nyid dang / ye shes dang mngon par shes pa rnams kyi dngos grub dam pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir byang chub
283b1(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las zhes bya ba 'phrin las thams cad kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i dbang gis dbang bskur nas de'i lag tu las
283b2(rgyud): kyi rdo rje de de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis don cho chog zhes rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs zhes bya bas rdo rje de
283b3(rgyud): rang gi snying kar bzhag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las la sbyor zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// las rnams thams cad byed pa'i mchog
283b4(rgyud): bdag ste bdag gi lag tu byin// las rnams thams cad byed tu bcug/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus thub dka' ba'i dam tshig las
283b5(rgyud): byung ba las kyi byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thamasacad kyi srung ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams ca
283b6(rgyud): kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra rak+Sha/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de/ go cha brtan par gyur te byung
283b7(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thug su zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje go cha chen po'i dbyibasu gyur te phyag gnyisu gnas so// de nas rdo rje go cha'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi kham/ 
283b8(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la srung ba'i cho ga rgyas pa la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad
284a1(rgyud): kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin ni brtson 'grus dam pa thub dka' ba dang / shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang
284a2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus thub dka' ba'i lus gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o brtson 'grus go cha 'di// brtan
284a3(rgyud): pa'i bdag nyid rab brtan bdag/ de ni brtan phyir lus min yang // rdo rje'i lus su byed pa'i mchog/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus chen po thub dka' ba'i lus de/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
284a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ra yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje brtan pa zhes
284a5(rgyud): bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig/ dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams
284a6(rgyud): yongasu bskyang ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i sku 'thob pa'i mchog grub par bya ba'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje'i go cha
284a7(rgyud): de byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus thub dka' ba'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i grogs po rdo rje'i grogs po zhes rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bsku'o/ 
284a8(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i grogs po des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la go cha bskon zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// byams pa'i/ 
284b1(rgyud): go chadam pa ste// brtson 'grus brtan pas srung ba che// grogs po chen por brjod pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i dam tshig byung ba lnga/ 
284b2(rgyud): las kyi byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thabs kyi dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thabs cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs
284b3(rgyud): ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra yak+ShaHde nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon cha chen por gyur te byung nas btsa
284b4(rgyud): ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thug su zhugs te/ gcig tu// 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje mche ba'i dbyingasu gyur te phyag gnyi su gnaso// de nas rdo rje mche ba'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten
284b5(rgyud): gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdug pa 'dul ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams
284b6(rgyud): cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin ni bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa yin pa dang / shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres te byang chub sems dpa' chen
284b7(rgyud): po bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i lusu gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o bdag ni sangs rgyas rnams// thugs
284b8(rgyud): can gyi thabs chen te// zhi yang sems can don du ni// ma rungs par ni ston par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i lusu bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs
285a1(rgyud): las byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
285a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu gtum pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma rungs pa 'dul ba'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams
285a3(rgyud): ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thabs chen po'i ye shes dang / mngon/ 
285a4(rgyud): par shes pa rnams thob cing dngos grub dam pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon cha de byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa de'i lag tu de bzhin du
285a5(rgyud): byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje khro za rdo rje khro bo zhes rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khro bo rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon
285a6(rgyud): cha de rang gi khar bzhag nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsdigs shing / ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// ma rungs thams cad 'dul ba'i mchog/ rdo
285a7(rgyud): rje mche ba'i mtshon rnon te// thabs dang snying rje'i bdag nyid do// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i khu tshur zhes bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba las
285a8(rgyud): kyi byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs rdo rje bcing ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams
285b1(rgyud): cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra san+d+hi/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
285b2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad bcings par gyur te byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thug su zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje bcings pa'i dbyibasu gyur te phyag gnyis
285b3(rgyud): gnas so// de nas rdo rje bcings pa'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du
285b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang / ye shes la so dgas pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin ni de bzhin
285b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur shin tu bcings pa dang / rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
285b6(rgyud): tshur zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thug su zhugs te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o rab tu brtan bcings pa'i// dam tshig bdag ste brtan bdag nyid// bas
285b7(rgyud): ba thams cad rab grub phyir// grol ba rnams kyang 'ching bar byed// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur gyi sku bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung ste/ de bzhin
285b8(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyab na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'ching ba'i dam tshig rdo rje
286a1(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcings pa'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams
286a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / lha rnams kyi dgongs pa brtags pa dang / grub pa thams cad dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
286a3(rgyud): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / phyag rgya'i dbang dam pa 'grub pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje bcings pa de byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba de'i lag
286a4(rgyud): tu de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sa rdo rje khu tshur rdo rje khu tshur zhes rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang ba bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rje
286a5(rgyud): rje khu tshur zhes bya ba des rdo rje bcings pa des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'ching zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// phyag rgya bcings pa che zhing
286a6(rgyud): brtan// sangs rgyas kun gyi myur grub phyir// dam tshig shin tu 'da' bar bka'// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i las dang / brtson 'grus chen po'i go cha brtan pa
286a7(rgyud): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thabs chen po dang / phyag rgya thams cad bcings pa'i ye shes dang 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las chen po'i
286a8(rgyud): sems dpa'o// / bam po gnyis pa// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams
286b1(rgyud): cad kyi ye shes bsgrubs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge/ 
286b2(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung // satwa badz+ri/ de nas de bzhin gshegs
286b3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu rdo rje'i 'od zer du gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// 'od zer de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang
286b4(rgyud): mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas/ de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i/ ye shes rnams la phyag rgyas btab nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ 
286b5(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang / mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje'i dbyibs chen por gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par mdzad kyi spyan snga na zla ba'i dkyil la gnas nas ched du brjod pa
286b6(rgyud): 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sems dpa'i rdo rje brtan pa bdag/ gang phyir brtan pas lus med kyang // rdo rje'i lus gyur pa yin// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung
286b7(rgyud): ba zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs par bya ba'i phyir rin po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam
286b8(rgyud): tshig las byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje rin po che'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rang gi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // rat+na badz+ri/ de nas de bzhin
287a1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu rin po che'i 'od zer du gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// rin po che'i 'od zer de dag las kyang 'jig rte/ 
287a2(rgyud): gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas btab nas/ yang gcig tu 'dres te 'jig rten gyi
287a3(rgyud): khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje rin po che chen po'i dbyibasu gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du
287a4(rgyud): brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje rin chen ba dganyid grags// gang phyir phyag rgya thams cad kyi// dbang gi tshul ni brtan po yin// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
287a5(rgyud): gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal pos de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag rgyas btab
287a6(rgyud): par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs kyi ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas chos kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i rang gi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // 
287a7(rgyud): d+har+m+ma badz+ri/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu pad+mo'i 'od zer du gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// pad+ma'i 'od zer de dag las kyang 'jig
287a8(rgyud): rten gyi khams thams cad rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas btab nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ 'jig
287b1(rgyud): rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje pad+mo chen po'i dbyibasu gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyab kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 
287b2(rgyud): e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// chos kyi rdo rje gtsang ma dag/ gang phyir rang bzhin rnam dag pas// 'dod chags yin yang dri ma med// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas
287b3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas btab par bya ba'i phyir las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje'i
287b4(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ sa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig ce/ sa bya ba'i rang gi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // 
287b5(rgyud): kar+m+ma badz+ri/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu las thams cad kyi 'od zer du gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// las thams ca
287b6(rgyud): kyi 'od zer de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rnams la phyag
287b7(rgyud): rgyas btab ste/ yang gcig tu 'dres nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi thams cad du rtse mo bltas pa'i rdo rje chen po'i dbyibasu gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi
287b8(rgyud): g.yon phyog kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// las kyi rdo rje mang po bdag/ gang phyir gcig kyang sems can khams// ma lus
288a1(rgyud): par ni las bzang byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi ye shwe kyi dam tshig dang / dbang bskur ba chen po dang / rdo rje'i chos nyid dang / mchod pa thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
288a2(rgyud): cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chen po rnamaso// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gyes pa'i mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par
288a3(rgyud): zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra lA s+ye/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu rdo rje'i phyag rgyar
288a4(rgyud): gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do//  rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i rtse mo de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams tha mas cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs
288a5(rgyud): pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ lha mo chen/ mo rdo rje 'dzin ma'i lus thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag/ nyid dang 'dra zhing kha dog dang / gzugs dang / mtshan ma dang / 
288a6(rgyud): spyod lam sna tshogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad sdud par gyur pa/ rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mor gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor
288a7(rgyud): gyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o rang 'byung rnams kyi ni// mchod pa bdag 'dra gzhan med de// gang phyir 'dod pa dga' mchod pas/ 
288a8(rgyud): mchod pa thams cad byas par 'gyur// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i phreng ba'i dbang gi dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms par
288b1(rgyud): zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo chen mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra mA le/ de nas de bzhin gsheg pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu rin po che chen pos
288b2(rgyud): phyag rgyar gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// rin po che'i phyag rgya de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
288b3(rgyud): kyi skur gyur nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ lha mo chen mo rdo rje phreng bar de bzhin du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi g.yon phyogasu zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched
288b4(rgyud): brjod do// e ma'o rin chen mchod pa zhes// bdag dang 'dra ba dar grags pa med// gang phyir khams gsum rgyal mchog kyang // rab tu mchod pa byed par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan
288b5(rgyud): 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi klu'i mchog ni dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs zhes byabating 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa
288b6(rgyud): thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo chen po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra gI ti/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi
288b7(rgyud): phyag rgyar gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi phyag rgya de las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam
288b8(rgyud): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas/ yang gcig tu 'dres te lha mo chen mo rdo rje glur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal po'i dkyis lar gyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i
289a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o bdag ni kun gzigs pa'i// glu mchog tshul gyis mchod pa yin// gang phyir sgra snyan 'dra ba yi// mchod/ 
289a2(rgyud): pa rnams kyis mnyes par byed// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gar gyi mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
289a3(rgyud): nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo chen mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra nr-i ti/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu de bzhin
289a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi gar gyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas par gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gar gyi mchod pa'i
289a5(rgyud): cho ga rgyas pa de dag thams cad las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas/ yang gcig tu
289a6(rgyud): 'dres te/ rdo rje lha mo chen mo rdo rje gar gyi skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi g.yon phyogasu zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched
289a7(rgyud): du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o mchod kun don mdzad pa'i// mchod pa rgya chen bdag yin te// gang phyir rdo rje gar cho gas// sangs rgyas mchod pa rab tu byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
289a8(rgyud): kyi bde ba dang // yid bde ba bla na med pa'i dam tshig dang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi glu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i phyir la/ 
289b1(rgyud): bla na med pa rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas de bzhin gang bye ba rnam pa snang mdzad kyis mchod pa'i lan du/ 
289b2(rgyud): slar mchod pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu tshim pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yog mo'i gtso mo rang / 
289b3(rgyud): gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra d+hU pe/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ bdug pa'i mchod pa'i sprin gyi bkod pa rnam pa dum
289b4(rgyud): rdo rje'i dbyibs thams cad du khyab par gyur te byung nas bdug pa'i ma chod pa'i mchod pa rgya mtsho de las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams/ thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshe
289b5(rgyud): pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas byung ste/ yang gcig tu 'dres nas rdo rje ba dug pa'i lha mo'i lusu gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yo na phyogasu khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin
289b6(rgyud): po che la swa grwar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o bdag ni mchod pa che// rab tu sim ldan dge ba yi// gang phyir sems can dbab ldan pas// myur du byang chub thob/ 
289b7(rgyud): par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi mchod pa'i lan du slar mchod pa'i phyir rin po che'i rgyan gyi mchod pa'i dam
289b8(rgyud): tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsol ka ma 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra puSh+pe/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
290a1(rgyud): cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ me tog thams cad kyi mchod pa bkod pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab par byed par
290a2(rgyud): gyur nas byung ngo // me tog thams cad kyi mchod pa'i sprin gyi bkod pa de las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ yang
290a3(rgyud): gcig tu 'dres te rdo rje'i me tog gi lha mo'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i grwar na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la ga/ 
290a4(rgyud): nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o me tog mchod pa bdag/ thams cad kyi ni rgyan byed de// gang phyir mchod nas de bzhin gshegs// rin chen nyid du myur du 'grub// de nas
290a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi mchod nga / 'i lan du slar mchod paHde bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
290a6(rgyud): snang ba'i mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pho nya mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas byung ngo // badz+ra A lo ke/ de nas de
290a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka las 'di byung ma thag tu thams cad du snang ba'i mchod pa thams cad kyi bkod pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad khyab par byed par gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'dra
290a8(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// thams cad du snang ba'i mchod pa bkod pa de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ yang gcig tu 'dres/ 
290b1(rgyud): telha mo rdo rje snang ba zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogasu khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i gra na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du
290b2(rgyud): brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o mchod pa'i mar me ni// rgya chen dge ba bdag yin te// gang phyir snang bcas myur du ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan yang thob// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
290b3(rgyud): gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi mchod pa'i lan du slar mchod pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dris mchod pa'i dam tshig las
290b4(rgyud): byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin dgashegs pa thams cad kyi bran mo 'di rang gi thugs ka na des phyung ngo // badz+ra gan+d+he/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
290b5(rgyud): cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag tu dri thams cad kyi mchod pa bkod/ sa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par byed par ra nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// dri tha
290b6(rgyud): cad kyi mchod pa bkod pa de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ yang gcig tu 'dres te lha mo rdo rje dri zhes bya ba'i skur gyur na/ 
290b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogasu khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i grwa na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o dri yi rang
290b8(rgyud): bzhin gyi// mchod pa'i lha rdzas yid 'ong bdag/ gang phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri// lus rnams kun la 'byin par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dbab pa dang / byang chub chen
291a1(rgyud): chen po'i yan lag bsags pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kun du snang ba dang / tshul khrims dang / ting 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / 
291a2(rgyud): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i dri rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ 
291a3(rgyud): dam tshig gi lcags kyu'i dam tshig las byung ba sems dpa'i rdo rje'i zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs thams cad kyi bdag po 'di rang gi
291a4(rgyud): thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra aM ku sha/ de nas de bzhin gsheg sa pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu de bzhin gagus pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs mang po thams cad du gyur
291a5(rgyud): nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// de ba/ zhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs de dag la/ sa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang
291a6(rgyud): mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ yang gcig tu 'dres te byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtseg pa rtse mo rdo rje
291a7(rgyud): dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i rdo rje sgo gang gi nang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gis spyan 'dren cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 
291a8(rgyud): e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yang dag spyan 'dren brtan pi bdag/ gang phyir bdag gis spyan drangs pa// dkyil 'khor kun la brten par 'gyur// de na ya bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
291b1(rgyud): thams cad kyi dam tshig la 'jug pa sems dpa' chen po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'jug pa'i gsol
291b2(rgyud): ka pa 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra pA sha/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig la 'jug pa'i phyag
291b3(rgyud): rgya'i tshogasu gyur nas phyung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'dren pa'i phyag rgya mang po de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul
291b4(rgyud): shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams/ byung nas/ yang gcig tu 'dres te byang chub sems dpa'/ chen po rdo rje zhags pa zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas/ bcom
291b5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i rdo rje rin po che'i sgo gang gi nang na zla ba 'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
291b6(rgyud): 'jug cing ched du brjod / e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje zhags pa dam po bdag/ rdul phran bzhugs pa thams cad kyang // bdag gis slar yang drang bar bya// de nas yang bcom ldan
291b7(rgyud): 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcags sgrog sems dpa' chen po'i dam tshig las byung ba sems dpa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs
291b8(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bsdams pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje pho nya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra s+phoT/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma/ 
292a1(rgyud): thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kying mchog bsdams pa'i phyag d+ha mang por gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'as rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams/ 
292a2(rgyud): cad kyi dam tshig las bsdams pa'i phyag rgya mang po de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ gcig tu 'dres te byang chub
292a3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rdo rje lcags sgrogs ces bya ba'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsigs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i rdo rje chos kyi sgo gang gi nang na zla ba'i
292a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la/ 'ching zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje lcags sgrog dam po bdag/ 
292a5(rgyud): 'ching ba kun las grol ba rnams// sems can don du 'ching bar 'dod// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbab pa zhes bya ba sems dpa' chen po'i dam
292a6(rgyud): tshig las byung ba sems dpa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi bran 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra a be sha
292a7(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig phyag rgya'i tshogs thams cad tu gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin
292a8(rgyud): pa de nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs thams cad las 'jig rten gyi kham sa sa lan da kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/ 
292b1(rgyud): gcig tu 'dres nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dbab pa'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i rdo rje las kyi sgo gang gi
292b2(rgyud): nang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'beb shing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje dbab pa brtan pa bdag/ kun gyi
292b3(rgyud): bdag tu gyur nas kyang // bran du yang ni gyur pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba dang / gzhug pa dang / 'ching ba dang / dbang du bya ba rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
292b4(rgyud): bka' bzhin byed pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bya bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdu bar byin gyis brlabs/ ra pa'i phyir rdo rje'i se gol gyi mtshan ma mdzad nas de bzhin
292b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsdu ba'i byin gyis brlabs 'di ga/ sungaso// badz+ra sa mA dzaHde nas skad cig thang cig yu/ da tsam de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad se gol gyi mtshan
292b6(rgyud): mtshan mas bskul ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam sprin gyi rgya mtsho yi thams cad nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub
292b7(rgyud): sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po dang bcas te 'dus nas khang bu brtsegs pa'i rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa gang na ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
292b8(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad gang na ba der gshegs nas kyang ched du oM sarba ta thA ga ta pA da ban+da na ka ro mi zhes brjod do// rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di ci gar zlos shing de bzhin gshegs pa thams
293a1(rgyud): cad kyi zhags la phyag 'tshal nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o byang chub sems dpa' yi// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor
293a2(rgyud): lo yi// dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes// de nas de skad ces gsungs pa dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas 'dus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad byang chu
293a3(rgyud): sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang bcas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thug su zhug so// de nas
293a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas te byung nas bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / 
293a5(rgyud): nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i phyogs thams cad du dkyil 'khor du gyur nas snyoms par zhugs te/ zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas
293a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi// rgya chen gdod nas skye ba med// rdul phran thams cad ji snyed pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams ni gcig tu gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus na
293a7(rgyud): sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongasu bskyab pa dang / thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba bstabs pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye she
293a8(rgyud): dang / mngon par shes pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa'i dngos grub dam pa'i bar gyi phyir rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di byin gyis brlabs par bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
293b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rang ga rdo rje sems dpa'i thog sa dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje chen po 'dzin pa la mang brtan brgyad pa las gsol pa btab pa/ rdo sems dpa sems dpar // 
293b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa kun// rdo rje dang po kun tu bzang // phyag 'tshal phyag na rdo rje la'o// rdo rje rgyal po sangs rgyas mchog/ rdo rje lcags kyu de bzhin gshegs// don yong rgyal po rdo rje mchog/ phyag/ 
293b3(rgyud): 'tshal rdo rje 'gugs khyod la// rdo rje chags pa bde chen po// rdo rje mda' ni dbang byed pa// bdud kyi 'dod pa rdo rje che// phyag 'tshal rdo rjeg du khyod la'o// rdo rje legs pa sems dpa'i mchog/ rdo rje mgu
293b4(rgyud): bdaga' ba che// rabang kyis rgyal po rdo rje mchog/ phyug la rdo rje rjes khyod la// rdo rje rin chen rdo rje rngon// rdo rje nam pa'i nor bu na// nam kha'i snying po dza drug/ phyag 'tshal / 
293b5(rgyud): rje snying khyod la// rdo rje gzi brjid cher 'bar ba// rdo rje nyim rgyal ba'i 'od// rdo rje'i 'od zer gzi brjid che// phyag 'al rdo rje 'od khyod la// sems can don rab rdo rje dpal// rdo rje/ 
293b6(rgyud): rgyal mtshan rab dga' byed// rdo rje chen po rin chen dpal// phyag 'tshal rdo rje dpal khyod la// rdo rje bzhad mo bzhad pa che// rdo rje 'dzum pa ngo mtshar che// dga' zhing rab dga' rdo rje ston// phyag
293b7(rgyud): 'tshal rdo rje dga' ba la// rdo rje chos rab de nyid don// rdo rje pad+mo rab dga' byed// rdo rje dbang rab rdo rje'i spyan// phyag 'tshal rdo rje spyan khyod la// rdo rje rno ba theg pa che// rdo rje ral gri mtshon chen po// 'jam
293b8(rgyud): dpal rdo rje rab tu zab// phyag 'tshal rdo rje blo khyod la// rdo rje rgyu dang snying po che// rdo rje 'khor lo tshul chen po// rab bskor rdo rje las byung ba// phyag 'tshal rdo rje snying po la// rdo rje gsung ba rang rig
294a1(rgyud): mchog/ rdo rje zlos par bsgrub sbyin// mi gsung rdo rje mchog grub pa// phyag 'tshal rdo rje gsung khyod la// rdo rje las rab rdo rje'i bka'// las kyi rdo rjekun rab 'gro/ 
294a2(rgyud): nges pa'i rgya che ba// phyag 'tshal rdo rje kun khyod la// rdo rje srung ba brtan pa che// rdo rje go cha sra ba che// brtson 'grus mchog ni thub par dka'// phyag 'tshal rdo rje brtson 'grus la// rdo rje gnod sbyin thabs
294a3(rgyud): chen po// rdo rje mche ba 'jigs pa che// bdud 'joms rdo rje mi bzad pa// phyag 'tshal rdo rje drag po la// rdo rje mtshams sbyor rab sdud nyid// rdo rje 'ching bar rab grol byed// rdo rje khu tshur dam tshig mtsho/ 
294a4(rgyud): phyag 'tshal rdo rje khu tshur la// su zhig ming rnams 'chang ba ni// zhi ba brgya po rtsa brgyad 'di// rdo rje ming dbang bskur la sogs// mchog rnams kun gyis de dbang bskur// gang zhig yon tan
294a5(rgyud): ming rnams kyis// rdo rje 'chang ba chen po la// rtag tu dbyang // sa kyis bstod pa ni// de yang rdo rje 'chang 'drar 'gyur// ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag gis// bdag cag gis ni bstod
294a6(rgyud): pa yin// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa'i// tshul chen yang ni rgyas par mdzod// mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor lo che// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa yi// cho ga
294a7(rgyud): mchog ni bshad par gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsol ba'i tshig zlos nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i rdo rje
294a8(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje dbyings zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// rdo rje dbying
294b1(rgyud): dang 'dra bas na// rdo rje dbyings zhes bgyi bar grags// sems dpa' che ba'i phyag rgya cher// sgom zhing byin gyis rlob bgyid cing // dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus nyid du// tsi rigs par ni mchis nas kyang // 
294b2(rgyud): phyag rgya la gnas de bzhin langs// kun tu rnam par bltas nas ni// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes brjod nas// bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongasu bskor// sar pa legs par bkal nas kyang // tshad dang / 
294b3(rgyud): 'thun par mdzes pa yi// thig gis mkhas pas ci nus kyi// dkyil 'khor gyi ni thig gdab cing // grub bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dang // rta babs bzhis ni mdzes bgyis la// thig bzhi dang ni ldan gyur/ 
294b4(rgyud): pa// dar dang me tog phreng bas rgyan// grwa yi phyogs ni thams na dang // sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams// rdo rje rin chen sa sa par ni// dkyil 'khor phyi ma thig gdab bo// de yi rim
294b5(rgyud): nang zhugs la// 'khor lo 'dra ba'i rdo rje yi// thig gis yo sa su bskor bar bya// ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes bgyis pa/ rdo rje ka ba'i nang logasu// zla ba'i dkyil khor lngas rgyan pa/ 
294b6(rgyud): dbus su dkyil 'khor dbus ni// sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs bzhag cing // sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun gyi// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus rnamasu// rim bzhin du ni dam tshig mchog/ bzhi po legs par
294b7(rgyud): bzhag par bya// dkyil 'khor bzhi po de dag tu// rdo rje gom pas song nas ni// mi g.yo ba la sogs pa yi// sangs rgyas bzhi po thams cad gzhag/ mi g.yo ba yi dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje 'dzin sos/ 
294b8(rgyud): mnyam par gzhag/ rin chen 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje snying sogs rdzogs par gzhag/ tshe dpag med pa'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje spun sogs dag par gzhag/ gdon mi za grub dkyil
295a1(rgyud): 'khor du// rdo rje d+ha gram la sogs gzhag/ 'khor lo yo ni grwa rnams su// rdo rje lha mo rnams kyang gzhag/ dkyil 'khor phyi rol grwa rnams su// sangs rgyas mchod pa rnams kyas
295a2(rgyud): gzhag/ sgro rnams kun gyi nang du ni// sgo bsrungs bzhi yang gzhag par bgyi// dkyil 'khor phyi rim phyogasu ni// sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang banag/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis// dam tshig mcho
295a3(rgyud): gi phyag rgya ni// cho ga bzhin bcings bzhugs nas kyang // s+pho Ta'i phyag rgyas dbab par bgyi// de la thams cad dbab pa'i snying po 'di lag so// a// bdag la byin gyis brlabs la sogs// ji lta bar ni da// 
295a4(rgyud): nod do// de ltar bgyis na bdag ming brjod// de nas rdo rje bsgrub/ bgyi ba// rdo rje slob dpon sems dpa' yi// rdo rje lcags kyu bcings nas ni// se gol mang po brdab bgyis la/ 
295a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bgyi// de tshe sangs rgyas tham sa cad ni// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs bcas// dkyil 'khor thams cad gang ba rnams// dkyil 'khor rnams su
295a6(rgyud): 'dus par gyur// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi// phyag rgya chen po sgom byed cing // ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni// cung zad bar du brjod par bgyi// de nas 'dus pa dgyes pas na// de bzhin ga
295a7(rgyud): rnams brtan par gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' rang grub pa// grogs po nyid du nye bar gnas// de nas sgo rnas thams cad du// lcags kyu la sogs las bgyis nas// las chen mchog gi phyag rgya yi
295a8(rgyud): dam tshig rnams ni gzhag par bgyi// dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya dang // sems dpa'i rdo rje la sogs pa// de ltar sems dpa' chen po bsgrub// dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes brjod cing // de nas sangs rgyas la
295b1(rgyud): sogs pa// sems dpa' chen po kun bsdu bar// spyan drangs nas ni rab tu bcug/ bcings nas de yi dbang du gyur// de nas bdag nyid chen po rnams// gsang ba'i mchod pas mnyes bgyis la/ 
295b2(rgyud): thams cad don kun grub pa'i phyir// thams cad mdzod ces gsol bar bgyi// dkyil 'khor thams cad du rdo rje slob dpon gyis de bzhin du las bgyi'o// de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po
295b3(rgyud): 'dir ni rdo rje slob ma dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa mchiso// de la dang por ni gzhug pa lags te/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongasu skyabs pa
295b4(rgyud): dang / phan pa dang / bde ba thams cad dngos grub mchog gi rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid kyi slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir gzhug sa snod du gyur pa dang / snod du ma/ 
295b5(rgyud): gyur pa brtag mi 'tshalo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'ad sa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sems can kha cig ni sdi ga pa chen po bgyid pa yang mchis te/ de dag gis rdo rje
295b6(rgyud): dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs te mthong na ngan song thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das nor dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan thams
295b7(rgyud): cad la chags pa dang / dam tshig la mi dga' ba dang / sngar spyad pa la sogs pa mi nus pa'i sems can dag kyang mchis te/ de dag kyang 'dir ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du bgyid cing zhugs pa rnams
295b8(rgyud): kyi bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das sems can kha cig ni gar dang / glu dang / gad mo dang / rtsed mo dang / kha zas kyi spyod pa la dga' ba rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thad
296a1(rgyud): kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i chos nyid khong du ma chud pa la gzhan gyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du
296a2(rgyud): re ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa// yang dag par bsdus par gyur pa/ bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs par rnams 'byung bar byed pa de ni bslab pa'i gzhis 'jigs shing skrag nas/ 
296a3(rgyud): mi 'jug pa dag kyang mchis te/ de dag ngan song gi dkyil 'khor gyi lam du 'jug par kha bltas shing gnas pa rnams kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba dam pa thams cad 'grub cing bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar
296a4(rgyud): bgyi ba dang / ngan song gi rgyu thams cad du 'jug par kha bltas ra ba'i lam las bzlog par bgyi ba'i slad du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil nga 'khor chen po 'dir 'jug tu rung ngo // bcom ldan 'das chos
296a5(rgyud): can gyi sems can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khri/ mas dang / ting 'dzin dang / shes rab kyi dngos grub dam/ pa'i thabs kyis sangs rnaMs kyi byang chub tshol ba na bsam gtan
296a6(rgyud): dang / rnam par thar pa la sogs pa rnams kyis 'bad cing nyon mongs par gyur pa dag kyang mchis te/ de dag kyang rdo rje dbyings kyis dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams
296a7(rgyud): cad 'grub par yang rnyed par dka' ba ma lags na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de la dang po kho na re shig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag bzhi bgyi'o// de ni 'di ltar lus thams
296a8(rgyud): cad kyis rdo rje thal mo brkyang ste phyag 'tshal zhing sngags 'di skad du/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta pU dza bas+tha nA ya At+ma na nir+yA ta yA mi/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badz+ra satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha sa mAM zhes brjod do// mde nas de bzhin du
296b1(rgyud): 'dug ste/ rdo rje thal mo snying khar bzhag ste/ dpral bas phyag 'tshal zhing sngags 'di skad du/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta pU dza a b+hi She kA ya At+ma na nir+yA ta ya mi sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badz+ra rat+na a b+hi ShIny+tsa mAM zhes brjod do// 
296b2(rgyud): de nas de bzhin du 'dug ste/ rdo rje thal mo spyi bor sbyar te khas phyag 'tshal zhing sngags 'di skad du/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta pU dza pra bar+t+ta na yA At+ma na nair+yA ta yA mi sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+har+m+ma pra bar+d+ha ya mAM zhes brjod do// 
296b3(rgyud): de nas de bzhin du 'dug ste/ rdo rje thal mo spyi bo nas pab ste snying kar bzhag nas spyi bos phyag 'tshal zhing sngags 'di skad du/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza kArma Ne At+ma na nir+yA ta yA mi/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badz+ra karma
296b4(rgyud): ku ru mA zhes brjod do// de nas stod g.yogs gos dmar po gyon dal gdong dmar pos dkris nas/ sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la snying po 'di brjod do// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de nas
296b5(rgyud): gung mo gnyis kyis me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin du bcug la drang zhing snying po 'di brjod do// sa ma ya hUM/ de nas bcug ma thag tu 'di skad du sgo shig/ deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams
296b6(rgyud): cad kyi rigasu zhugs kyis/ ngas khyod la ye gang gi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad grub pa yang thob na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de lta bu'i rdo rje'i ye shes bskyed par bya yis/ khyod
296b7(rgyud): kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams la mi smra shig/ dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis sems dpa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya kha nang du bstan pa dang / phyir bstan pa bcings la
296b8(rgyud): rdo rje slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag ste/ 'di skad du brjod par bya'o// 'di ni khyod kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig yin gyis/ gal te 'ga' zhig la smras na klad pa 'gas par 'gyur// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang / 
297a1(rgyud): mna'i chu'i snying pos bsngags la slob mde 'thung du gzhug go// de la mna'i snying po 'di yin te/ rdo rje sems dpa' nyid ni deng // khyod kyi snying la yang dag zhugs// gal te tshul de sna
297a2(rgyud): nani// de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ oM badz+red ka wa/ de nas slob ma la 'di skad du bsgo shig/ deng phyin chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje yin gyis/ ngas 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de bya dgos so// 
297a3(rgyud): khyod kyis nga la bsnyas pa ma byed cig/ mi bde ba ma spangs pas khyod dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes smras la/ 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlobs la rdo rje sems
297a4(rgyud): dpa' bdag la 'bab par gyur cig ces smos shig par bsgo'o// // de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis myur du sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad du brjod du gzhug go/ 'di ni rdo rje dam
297a5(rgyud): tshig ste// rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags// rdo rje ye shes bla med ni// de ring nyid du 'bab par shog/ oM badz+ra A ba/ sha a/ de nas khro bo'i phyag rgya bcings la// sems dpa' rdo
297a6(rgyud): rje ma'i phyag rgya mdud cing drangs la// theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i rdo rje tshig ci dga' bar brjod du gzhu gode pas 'bas te babs ma thag tu lha'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur te/ ye shes nges pha rol gyi
297a7(rgyud): sems shes par 'gyuraro// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyi dgos pa thams cad shes par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa thams cad la 'di'i sems brtan par
297a8(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de'i sdug bsngal thams cad zad par 'gyuraro// 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral nas gnod pa med par 'gyuraro// sems dpa' thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang byin
297b1(rgyud): gyis brlabs par 'gyuraro// dngos grub thams cad ni 'di'i mngon sum du 'gyuraro// rgyu med par sngon ma byung ba'i dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs par byed pa'i bde ba thams cad 'di la skye bar 'gyur// 
297b2(rgyud): bde ba de dag kha cig gis ni ting 'dzin 'grub par 'gyuraro// kha cig gis ni gzungs/ kha cig gis ni re ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa nas/ kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'grub pa
