297b3(rgyud): bar du yang 'gyuraro// de nas phyag rgya de bcings la rang gi snying kar dgrol zhing snying po 'di yang brjod du gzhug/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ shA shwa to me b+ha bahr-i da ya me/ a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ sar+b+ba sid+d+him+me pra yan+na n+tu/ 
297b4(rgyud): ha ha ha ha ho/ de nas me tog gi phreng ba de dkyil 'khor chen por dador zhing snying po 'di brjod du gzhag/ pra tIts+tsha badz+ra ho/ de nas gang la bab pa de 'dis 'grub bo// de nas phreng ba 'di blangs te/ 
297b5(rgyud): snying po 'dis de nyid kyi mgo bor bcings lnga 'di brjod du gzhug go/ oM pra ti gr-ih+Na swa mi maM satwa ma hA ba la/ de bcings pas se mas dpa' chen po des bdag gir byas par gyur pas 'di myur
297b6(rgyud): du 'grub par 'gyuraro// de nas de ltar babs bzhin du gdong g.yogs bkrol te snying po 'di yang brjod du gzhug/ oM badz+ra satwa sa yan+te t+ya tsak+Shur ga tan tad pa ra uta g+ha Ta ya ti sar+b+ba k+Sho/ badz+ra tsak+Shu a nut+ta
297b7(rgyud): raM he badz+ra pA sh+ya/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po rim bzhin du bstan to// dkyil 'khor chen po mthong ma thag tu ya de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'
297b8(rgyud): yang 'di'i snying ka na gnaso// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir 'od zer sna tshogs pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba la sogs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / 
298a1(rgyud): 'phrul rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// gal te na bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po nyid dam de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku cig ston par 'gyur ro// de phyin chad don thams cad dang yid kyi
298a2(rgyud): 'dod pa'i dgos pa thams cad dang / dngos grub thams cad nas rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyuraro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mthong ba'i 'og tu rdo rjes byin gyis
298a3(rgyud): brlabs pa'i bum pa'i nang gi dri'i chu dang / snying po 'dis dbang bskur bar bya'o// oM badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ de nas phyag rgya dang / phreng ba gang yang rung ba cig bcings la/ rang gi mtshan ma lag par
298a4(rgyud): bzhag la 'di skad du brjod par byed/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis rdo rje'i dbang // di ring khyod la bskur bar bya// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab grub phyir// rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long // oM badz+ra
298a5(rgyud): a d+hi pa tis+t+waM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de nas snying po 'di rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur byed// oM badz+ra/ satwa tra a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ badz+ra nA ma a b+hi She ka taHkye rdo rje zhes ga/ 
298a6(rgyud): gi ming gang brjod pa der kye zhes brjod par bya'o// dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o de nas ci khyod don 'byung ba'i dngos grub kyi ye shes dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i ye shwa
298a7(rgyud): dang / ting 'dzin gyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i ye shes nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi mchog grub pa'i ye shes kyi bar du gang 'dod ces smras la/ de nas gang gis gang 'dod pa de de la
298a8(rgyud): brjod par bya'o// de nas don thams cad kyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ rdo rje'i dbyings ni gter nus na// snying kar yongasu bsgom par bya// bsgoms nas sa la gnas pa
298b1(rgyud): mi// gter ni de yis mthong bar 'gyur// rdo rje'i dbyibs cig bris nas kyang // namakha'i ngos su bsgom par bya// gang du ltung ba mthong ba der// gter yod par ni rnam par bshad// blo ldan mi yis rnga/ 
298b2(rgyud): rje dbyibs// lce yi steng du bsgoms nas ni// 'di ni yod ces bdag nyid kyis// bden pa nyid kyis smra bar 'gyuraro// bdag gi lus ni thams cad la// rdo rje'i dbyibs su bsgoms nas ni// 'bas par
298b3(rgyud): gyur nas gar gnas pa// gter ni den yod par bshad// de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// oM badz+ra ni d+hi/ oM rat+na ni d+hi/ oM d+ham+ba ni d+hi/ oM kar+m+ma ni d+hi/ de nas rdo rje rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub grub pa'i/ 
298b4(rgyud): phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ rdo rje dbab pa byas nas/ ni// tshu la rdo rje'i dbyibs 'dra bar// bsgoms na chu yi/ steng na par// 'gro ba'i dngos grub myur du thob// de ltar dbab/ 
298b5(rgyud): pa byas nas kyang // gang gi gzugasu bdag gi lus// bsgom sa par gyur na bdag nyid ni// sangs rgyas kyi ni skur yang 'gyur// de ltar bdag la phab nas kyang // bdag nyid kyis ni
298b6(rgyud): na mkhar ni// bsgoms par 'gyur na ji srid du// 'dod pa de srid mi snang 'gyur// rdo rje dbab par bdag 'gyur nas// rdo rje yin par bdag bsgoms na// gnas nas ji srid lding 'dod pa// de srid
298b7(rgyud): mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur// de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// badz+ra dz+wa la/ badz+ra rU pa/ badz+ra A ka sha/ badz+ra ma hA/ de nas rdo rje rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ 
298b8(rgyud): zla ba'i dbyibs gcig bris nas ni// steng gi mkha' la 'phags byas te// lag par rdo rje bsgoms nas ni// rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// zla ba'i dbyibs steng 'dug nas ni// rdo rje rin chen rab
299a1(rgyud): bsgoms na// bdag nyid dag pa ji srid 'dod// de srid skad cig lding bar 'gyur// zla ba'i dbyibs kyi steng 'dug nas/ rdo rje pad+mo lag gnas par// bsgoms nas rdo rje'i spyan
299a2(rgyud): gyis ni// rig 'dzin go 'phang sbyin par byed// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas nas// las kyi rdo rje bsgoms nas ni// rdo rje sna tshogs 'dzin pa las// rig 'dzin kun tu myur bar 'gyur// 
299a3(rgyud): de dag gi snying po 'di dag yin no// badz+ra d+ha ra/ rat+na d+ha ra/ d+har+m+ma d+ha ra/ kar+m+ma d+hA ra/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa 'grub pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ 
299a4(rgyud): rdo rje kun gyi ting 'dzin// na mkha'i dbyingasu bsams nas ni// rdo rje'i bdag nyid ji srid 'dod// de srid bar du lding bar 'gyur// kun la dag pa'i ting 'dzin// bsgoms
299a5(rgyud): na bla med de bzhin du// ye shes bsgrubs pas myur du ni/ mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra ba/ ra ni// na mkha' thams cad dran byas na// bdag nyid dran pa
299a6(rgyud): brtan ldan zhing // rdo rje 'dzin par myur du 'gyur// na mkha'i dbyings ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas gzugasu bsams nas ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi ting 'dzin las// sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub par
299a7(rgyud): 'gyur// de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// badz+ra badz+ra/ shud+d+ha shud+d+ha/ satwa satwa/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes 'grub pa rnamaso// de nas gsang ba thub pa yin pas de la dang
299a8(rgyud): bor mna'i snying po brjod par bya ste/ oM sarba sa yan+tu/ hr-i da ye sa ma bsti ta ni bid+yA ta tak+Sha NA~M/ yA yad ya ti bru yang i daM na ya/ de nas 'di skad du khyod kyis mna'i snying po 'di las 'da' bar ma byed cig/ 
299b1(rgyud): khyod kyis gnod pa ma spangs pas dus ma yin par 'chi bar gyur ta re/ lus 'di nyid kyis dmyal bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo bar bya'o// de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// rdo rje dang
299b2(rgyud): par bskyed nas ni// mnyam par gzhag pas rdo rje'i thul mo'i ngos kyis dal brdabs na// ri bo yang ni dbang du 'gyur// rdo rje thal mo'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje dbab pa'i cho ga yis// rdo rje bsdams/ 
299b3(rgyud): pa'i ngos gnyis ni// dal gyi brdab par sbyor ba yis// ri bo yang ni kun nas 'gugs// de bzhin dbab pa'i cho ga yis// rdo rje bsdams pa brkyang nas ni// sor mo'i rtse mo mnyam brdabs na// 
299b4(rgyud): rigs brgya yud kyis brlag par 'gyur// phra mo dbab pa de'i cho ga byas// sor mo thams cad mnyam gzhag cing / rdo rje bsdams la sgrol ba ni// gnod pa kun las bsal gi
299b5(rgyud): mchog/ des na de dag gis gsang ba sgrub pa yin te/ bud med dam ni skyes pa yi// bu ga'i nang du 'jug par bya// yid kyis de ltar zhugs nas kyang // de'i lus kun khyab pa
299b6(rgyud): bsam// de la rdo rje thal mo'i snying po ni 'di dag yin no// badz+ra pA sha/ badz+ra/ A be sha/ badz+ra ha na/ badz+ra ha ra/ de nas snying po byin la rang gi rigs kyi lha'i phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// 
299b7(rgyud): cho ga 'di skad du bsgo bar bya ste// khyod kyis phyag rgya la mi mkhas pa gzhan su'ang rung la phyag rgya gang yang rung ba bstan par ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dkyil 'khor chen po ma
299b8(rgyud): mthong bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag gis phyag rgya bcing ba byas na de'i tshe de dag de ltar 'grub par mi 'gyuraro// de nas de dag the tsom du gyur te// gnod pa ma spangs pas myur ba nyid du dus byas nas
300a1(rgyud): dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa zhes bya bar ltung bar 'gyuraro// khyod nyid kyang ngan song du lhung bar 'gyuraro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa'
300a2(rgyud): sgrub pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes bshad do// sems rtogs pa nas brtsams nas ni// rdo rje dbyings zhes brjid byed cing // sangs rgyas gzugasu bdag bsgyur la// rdo rje nyid ma bsgoms par bya'o// grub ma thag tu 'di
300a3(rgyud): yis ni// ye shes tshe stobs na tshod dang / kun tu 'gro ba nyid rnams 'thob// sangs rgyas 'grub pa'ang dka' ba min// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs byang chub pa'i phyag rgya'o// 
300a4(rgyud): de nas rdo rje sems dpa' chen po sgrub pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcing rab yin te/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// rdo rje bsgyings pa dar sems bskyed de// bsgyings bcas rdo rje gser byed na// rdo rje
300a5(rgyud): sems dpa' bdag nyid 'gyur// 'dis ni kun tu 'gro ba dang / 'dod pa kun bdag bde chen dang // rdzu 'phrul che stobs pa zugs mchog rnams// rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur// 
300a6(rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// ji ltar ri mo'i rjes 'thun zhing // mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rnams ldan par// sems dpa' chen po bsgrub par bya// de nas 'dir ni rtog kun gyi// sgrub pa dang ni dngos grub
300a7(rgyud): dang // grub pa rnams kyi las chen rnams// go rims bzhin tu bshad par bya// dang po nyin re dus bzhin du// rang la byin gyis brlabs la sogs// byas nas thams cad bsgrub bya ste// de yi 'og tu ci
300a8(rgyud): dgar bya// de la phyag rgya chen po sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ rdo rje dbab pa byas nas ni// phyag rgya chen po cho ga bzhin// bcings nas de yi mdun phyogasu// sems dpa' chen po de sgom mo// 
300b1(rgyud): ye shes sems dpa' de mthong nas// rang gi lu su bsgom par bya// bkug cing bcug la bcing ba dang // dbang du byas te bsgrub par bya'o// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yino// badz+ra sa twa a rdo rje/ 
300b2(rgyud): dbab pa'i snying po'o// badz+ra satwa dr-i sh+ya ho// sems dpa' chen po rje su dran par bya ba'i snying po'o// dzaHhUM baM hoHsems dpa' chen po spyan drang ba dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba rnams kyi
300b3(rgyud): snying po'o// sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod pas// rgyab du zla ba gru nas ni// der bdag sems dpa'i lusu sgom// sa ma ya ste a haM brjod// sems dpa' gang gi phyag rgya gang // de ni bdag tu bsgoms nas
300b4(rgyud): ni/ rdo rje'i bzlas pas bsgrub par bya// phyag rgya thams cadasgrub pa'o// gzhan yang sgrub pa chen po ni// dzaHhUM ba hoH/ das brjod la// legs pa'i cho ga yid kyis ni// lus la sangs
300b5(rgyud): rgyas kun gzhug go// de nas bla med rdo rje las// de dag gi ni las bshad do// sangs rgyas rjesu dran grub na// sangs rgyas nyid du myur du 'gyur// sems dpa'i rdo rje ma grub na// phyag
300b6(rgyud): rgya kun gyi bdag por 'gyur// rin chen rdo rje ma phyag rgyas// de ni rin chen kun dbang 'gyur// chos kyi rdo rje ma grub na// sangs rgyas chos ni 'dzin par 'gyur// las kyi rdo rje maM phyag rgyas// rdo rje las
300b7(rgyud): ni byed par 'gyur// sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcings pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje 'dren pa'i cho ga yis// rdo rje 'dzin par spyan 'dren 'gyur// rdo rje 'dod pa'i phyag rgya ches// 
300b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed// rdo rje legs pa'i cho ga yis// sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes par byed// rin chen phyag rgya'i cho ga yis// sangs rgyas dbang bskur sbyin par byed// rdo rje ga zhi
301a1(rgyud): brjid cho ga yis// rdo rje gzi brjid myur du 'gyur// rdo rje dpal 'dzin bsten pa yis// re ba rnams ni yongasu spong // rdo rje bzhad pa'i cho ga yi// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam du bzhang/ 
301a2(rgyud): rdo rje chos kyi cho ga yis// rdo rje chos ni 'dzin par 'gyur// rdo rje rnon po'i cho ga yis// sangs rgyas kun gyi shes rab mchog/ rdo rje 'khor lo 'dzin bsten pas// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur// 
301a3(rgyud): rdo rje gsung ba'i cho ga yis// sangs rgyas gsung gi grub pa thob// rdo rje las cho ga bsgrubs pas na// rdo rje'i las skyes myur du 'gyur// rdo rje go cha bskon pas na// rdo rje sku ni thob par 'gyur// rdo rje
301a4(rgyud): gnod sbyin bsgrubs na ni// rdo rje gnod sbyin mnyam par 'gyur// rdo rje khu tshur bcings pas na// phyag rgya thams cad 'gro dab par 'gyuraro// rdo rje 'dzin ma grub pas ni// rdo rje chen po dag
301a5(rgyud): ba thob// rdo rje phreng ba bcings pas na// sangs rgyas kun gyi dang nga bskur 'gyur// rdo rje glu yi cho ga yis// rdo rje glu ni sa na par 'gyur// rdo rje gar ni bsgyur ba yis// sangs rgyas kun
301a6(rgyud): gyis de mchod do// rdo rje bdug pa'i cho ga yis// 'gro ba thams cad tshim par byed// rdo rje'i me tog sbyor byed pas// des ni 'gro ba dbang du byed// rdo rje snang ba'i phyag rgya ches// rab mchog mig ni
301a7(rgyud): sbyin par byed// rdo rje dri yi tsho gas ni// sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed// rdo rje lcags kyu drangs pas na// 'dren pa kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur// rdo rje zhags pa'i cho gas ni// thams cad rab tu
301a8(rgyud): 'jug par 'gyur// rdo rje lcags sgrog sbyor bas ni// thams cad bcing bar nus par 'gyur// rdo rje dbab pa'i cho ga yis// thams cad dbab par rab tu 'grub// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
301b1(rgyud): cad kyi rdo rje 'dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bshad de/ thal mongam du sbyar ba las// sor mo thams cad bsnol ba ni// rdo rje thal mor bka' stsal te// rab tu bsdams phyir rdo rje bsdams// dam tshig phyag
301b2(rgyud): rgya thams cad ni// rdo rje bsdams las byung bas na// de dag bsdams pa rdo rje yis// bsdams pa bla med bshad par bya// rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la// gung mo myu gu ltar mnyam sbreng // gung mo nang du
301b3(rgyud): gzhibs pa ni// sangs rgyas gnyis pa yin par bshad// gung mo rin chen 'dra ba dang // gung mo pad+mo 'dra ba dgug/ sangs rgyas lnga yi phyag rgya ni// de bzhin mdzub mo dgug pa'o// de nas de bzhin
301b4(rgyud): gshegs pa yi// rigs kyi dam tshig 'dzin pa yi// phyag rgya bcings dang dngos grub dang // las rnams yang dag bshad par bya// zla ba lta bu'i lag gnyis kyis// gung mo btang bar gyu
301b5(rgyud): pa yi// mthe bong mthe'u chung so sor sgreng // sems dpa'i rdo rje skye// nga rdo rje// mdzub mo'i lcags kyu mdzub mo sbyar// lag so sbyin pa 'dra ba ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bzhi po yi// phyag rgya
301b6(rgyud): mang po dngos grub 'di// mthe bong gzhibs la mdzub gnyis bcag/ rtse sprad rdo rje rin chen yin// de nyid gung mo srin lag dang // mthe'u chung rnams ni bsnol brkyang ba'o// de la srin lag mthe'u
301b7(rgyud): chung gnyis// mnyam pa'i gshibs pa rgyal mtshan// de nyid las ni bskor nas kyang // de yi phyogasu bzhag pa'o// mthe bong gnyis ka mnyam par gshibs// mdzub mo gnyis ka bkug pa dang / 
301b8(rgyud): de nyid gung mo sbrang rtse mo// bkug pa rdo rje ral gri'o// de las srin lag mthe'u chung gshibs// 'khor lo yin par bshad pa yin// bsdams pas mthe bong gnyis bkrol ba// bkan te kha phyogs
302a1(rgyud): bzhag pa'o// mthe bong mthe'u chung rtse sprad bkyed// las kyi rdo rje yin par bshad// de las mdzub mo gnyis gshibs pas// snying kar btung ste bzhag pa'o// mdzub mo
302a2(rgyud): rtse bkug che ba la// mthe'u chung gshibs pa brkyang ba'o// mthe'u chung gnyis par mthe bong gnyis// mdzub mo gnyis kyis brtsir ba'o// snying kar mthe bong bsnyams la bzhag/ rab tu brkyang ba phreng ba'o/ 
302a3(rgyud): thal mo sbyar te kha nas dbyung // gar las thal sbyar spyi bor bzhag/ rdo rje bcing ba thur du krugs// rang gi thal sbyar gyen du gtor// mthe bong bsnams te rab tu bsdams// rab tu brkyang nas byug pa'o// 
302a4(rgyud): mdzub mo gcig pu bkug pa dang // mthe bong gnyis ni mdud pa dor// mthe bong mdzub mo bdu bur bcing // rdo rje bcing ba mdzub mo bsdams// de nas 'di rnams sgrub bshad de// rdo rje
302a5(rgyud): sgrub pa dam pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// rang gi phyag rgya snying kar bzhag/ de nas 'di rnams las da shad pa// rdo rje'i las ni bla na med// rdo rje dbyings sogs phyag
302a6(rgyud): rgyan// de bzhin gshegs rnams 'dus pa yin// dkyil 'khor slob dpon slob mar bcas// de ma thag tu byin gyis rlob// sems dpa'i rdo rje bcings pa ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje lu/ 
302a7(rgyud): kyu bcings pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad kun nas 'gugs// 'dod pa'i rdo rje'i sbyor bas ni// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyang mnyes par byed// rdo rje dga' bas rgyal ba kun// leg so bas ni bstod par
302a8(rgyud): byed// rin chen rdo rje bcings pas na// sangs rgyas kun gyis de dbang bskur// rdo rje nyi ma bcings pas ni// sangs rgyas kyi ni 'od 'drar 'gyur// rdo rje rgyal mtshan 'ching 'gyur bas// re ba kun yang
302b1(rgyud): rdzogs par byed// rdo rje bzhad pa'i tshul gyis ni// sangs rgyas kun dang lhan cig bzhad// chos kyi rdo rje bcings pas na// rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje'i ral gri thogs pas ni// nyon mongs pa/ 
302b2(rgyud): cad des gcod do// rdo rje 'khor lo brtan byas pas// dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbang por 'gyur// rdo rje smra ba'i sbyor bas ni// rdo rje'i ngag mchog 'grub par 'gyur// las kyi rdo rje bcings pas ni// rdo rje'i las
302b3(rgyud): dang 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje go cha brtan byas pas// lus ni rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje mche ba'i mchog phyag rgyas// ma rungs bdud ni nges 'jom so// rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings pas// phyag rgya kun kyang dbang
302b4(rgyud): du 'gyur// 'dzum pas lnga yi dga' ba rnams// phreng ba yisani rgyan gyi rnams// klu yis rtag tu skad gsal gdagar gyis mchod pa brnyes par 'gyur// 'dug pas 'jig rten
302b5(rgyud): tshim par byed// me tog gis ni mdzes pa'i gzugs// ma mas snang ba bdag pa nyid// dri yis lha rdzas dri can duni// rdo rje lcags kyus 'gugs pa ste// rdo rje zhags pas 'jug pa
302b6(rgyud): byed// rdo rje lcags sgrog bcing ba ste// rdo rje dril bus 'bebs pa'o// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya rnams bshad do// badz+ra dz+nyA na sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje dbyings ni brtan par byed// de nas gzhan yang
302b7(rgyud): rab bshad pa// chos kyi phyag rgya cho ga bzhin// sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod na phyag rgya kun gyi dbang por 'gyur// A na ya swa zhes brjod na// gdon mi za bar sangs rgyas 'gugs// a ho su kha zhes
302b8(rgyud): brjod na// sangs rgyas kun kyang mnyes par 'gyur// sA d+hu sA d+hu zhes smras nas// legs pa'i tshig gis de dgar byed// su ma hata tAM zhes brjod na// sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur thob// rU pa
303a1(rgyud): d+yo ta zhes smras na// chos kyi gzi brjid nyid du 'gyur// ar+tha prap+pe zhes smras na// reb kyang rdzogs par byed// ha ha hUM he zhes bgadan// sangs rgyas bzhad pa rnyed par 'gyur/ 
303a2(rgyud): sarba ka ri zhes smras na// mi bya ba yi rnams kyang sbyong // du khaHts+tshe da zhes smras na// des ni sdug bsngal thams cad gcod// bud+d+ha bo d+hi zhes smras na// dkyil 'khor kun gyi bdag por 'gyur// pra ti sha b+da zhes/ 
303a3(rgyud): smras na// sangs rgyas rnams dang lhan cig smra// su b+ha Shi t+ye zhes smras na// kun gyis dbang dang ldan par 'gyur// nir b+ha ya s+t+waM zhes smras na// de ma thag tu 'jigs med 'gyur// sha truM b+hak+Sha zhes smra/ 
303a4(rgyud): na/ dgra rnams thams cad za bar 'gyur// sarba sid+d+hi zhes smras/ na// thams cad grub pa nyid du 'gyur// ma hA ra ti lha/ yi dga'// ru pa sho b+hes gzugs bzang nyid// sho tra sau khyab
303a5(rgyud): basbyin// sarba pU dza mchod par byed// pra hA da ni yid bder 'gyur// pha lA gA mi 'bras bu thog/ su te dzA gri gzi brjid che/ su gan+d+ha ni dri mchod can// A ya hi dza 'gugs par byed// a
303a6(rgyud): ya he hUM 'jug par byed// he s+pho Ta ba 'ching ba che// g+har+b+ha a a rab bskyod pa// de nas de rnams kyi chos kyi phyag rgyu sgrub pa dge ba bshad do// lce la rdo rje dge bsgoms na// las rnams thams cad byed/ 
303a7(rgyud): 'gyur// g.yas pa'i nang du bsgreng bar bya// byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya ste// sangs rgyas byang chub sbyin byed pa'o// mi g.yo ba yis sa reg pa// de bzhin rin chen sbyin pa'o// tshe dpag med pa'i
303a8(rgyud): ting 'dzin mchog/ gdon mi za ba'i mi 'jigs sbyin// de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams// mdor bsdus rab tu bshad par bya// rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' rnams// rdo rje las rnams byed pa ste/ 
303b1(rgyud): bsgyings bcas gsor ba gnyi ga yis// lcags kyu 'dzin ltar gnas pa dang // mda' 'phang ba yi tshul gyis ni// leg so zhes pa snying kar gzhag/ dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje gnyis// snying kar nyi ma
303b2(rgyud): brtan par bya// g.yon pa la ni gru mo gzugs// de bzhin kha phyogs bskor bar bya// g.yas pa yis ni g.yon pa dbye// snying kar g.yon pa ral gri mdud// mgal ma'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang / 
303b3(rgyud): rdo rje gnyi ga kha nas dbyung // rdo rje gar bskor dkrol ba yis// thal mo 'gram pa spyi bor bzhag/ go cha mthe'u chung mche ba dang // khu tshur gnyis ni mnan pa'o// rdo rje 'gying pa'i tshul gyis su/ 
303b4(rgyud): bsam pa g.yos pas gdud par bya// phreng ba bcing dang kha nas dbyung // rdo rje gar ni bskor ba yin// rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis ni// bdug pa la sogs de bzhin sbyin// sangs rgyas ku
303b5(rgyud): la mchod pa yi// phyag rgya'i mchod pa byed pa yi// mdzub mo/ lcags kyu bcing ba ni// mthe'u chung la ste lcags kyu rje// / mkhrig ma mdud pa mdzub gnyis gdub// rgyab gnyis kyi
303b6(rgyud): ni bsnams te mnan// de nas 'di rnams sgrub bshad pa// rdo rje las ni byed dang mnyam// rdo rje kun gyi rdo rje ni// rang gi snying kar goms par bya// de nas 'di rnams las phyag rgya// rdo rje'i las ni rnam pa
303b7(rgyud): mang / ye shes khu tshur bcings pas ni// sangs rgyas ye shes 'jug par 'gyur// mi g.yo ba yi bcings pas ni// yid ni g.yo ba med par 'gyur// rin chen 'byung ba'i phyag rgya yis// gzhan la phan
303b8(rgyud): byed ldan par 'gyur// dam chos 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas ni// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur// mi 'jigs mchog gis myur ba ni// sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin// rdo rje bgying ba brtan byas
304a1(rgyud): la/ rdo rje sems dpa'i bde ba rnyed// rdo rje lcags kyu skad cig tu// de bzhin gshegs pa kun kyang 'gugs// rdo rje mdar yis rdo rje yis// lha mo mnyes par bdag nyid byed// 
304a2(rgyud): rdo rje dga' bas rgyal ba kun// legaso zhes pas tshig kyang sbyin// rdo rje chen po nor bu sbyin// ston pa rnams kyis de dbang skur// rdo rje nyi ma bcings pas ni// rdo rje nyi ma 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje rgyal
304a3(rgyud): mtshan sgreng bas ni// des ni rin chen char yang 'bebs// rdo rje 'dzum pa bcings pas ni// sangs rgyas 'dra ba myur bzhad 'gyur// rdo rje me tog bcings pas ni// rdo rje'i chos nyid de yis mthong // 
304a4(rgyud): rje ral gri brtan bcings na// des ni sdug bsngal thams cad gtso da// rdo rje 'khor lo bcings pas ni// chos kyi 'khor lo bsgo/ ra bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi tshig rnams ni// rdo rje'i
304a5(rgyud): bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa yis// sangs rgyas kyang ni dbang du 'gyur// rdo rje'i go chas lus bcings pas// rdo rje snying po thob par 'gyur// rdo rje'i
304a6(rgyud): mche ba bcings pas ni// rdo rje nyid kyang bdag gis choms// rdo rje khu tshur kun 'phrog cing // phyag rgya grub pa kun tu rnyed// rdo rje 'dzin pas dga' ba sbyin// rdo rje phreng bas gzugs bzang ba// rdo rje
304a7(rgyud): glu yis glu snyan cing // rdo rje gar gyis dbang du byed// bdug pa yis ni yid tshim pa// me tog gis ni rgyan rnams te// mar me yis ni gzi chen po// rdo rje'i dris ni dri bar ldan// rdo rje lcags
304a8(rgyud): kyus 'gugs pa ste// rdo rje zhags pas 'jug pa'o// rdo rje lcags sgrogs gis ni bcing // rdo rje dril bu bskyod pa'o// de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi spyi'i phyag rgya bcings pa'i cho ga rgyas par
304b1(rgyud): bshad de/ de la thog ma nyid du rdo rje bcing ba'i sor mo snying kar brdab par bya ste/ snying po ni 'di brjod do// badz+ra ban+d+ha traT/ de nas phyag rgya bcings pa kun rang gi lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje'i dbang du
304b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de nas rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la snying po brjod do// a de nas yang dag par babs nas grogs po nyid du nye bar gnas par 'gyuraro// de nas phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi sems dpa'
304b3(rgyud): chen po rjesu dran par bya ste snying po 'di brjod do// ma hA sa ma ya satwa haM/ 'dis phyag rgya thams cad 'grub ste/ phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas spyi'i sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa bshad// des
304b4(rgyud): thog mar rang gi phyag rgya bcings nas rang gi phyag rgya'i sems dang / dar bdag gi snying po 'dis sgom mo// sa ma yo haM/ de nas darang phyag rgya'i sems dpar bdag sgoms nas/ sngags 'dis
304b5(rgyud): byin gyis brlab bo// sa ma ya satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha sa mAM/ de nas sgrub par bya'o// sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas dang sa grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa bshad de/ de la thog mar re shig nor/ 
304b6(rgyud): grub par 'dod na snying po 'di yin no// ar+tha sid+d+hi/ 'dis phyag rgya grub na nar chen po skye bar 'gyuraro// de nas rdo rje grub par 'dod na snying po 'di yin no// badz+ra sid+d+hi/ 'dis ci 'dod pa bzhin du rdo rje grub par/ 
304b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de nas rig 'dzin gyi grub pa 'dod na snying po 'di yin no// badz+ra bi d+yA d+ha ra sid+d+hi/ 'dis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rig 'dzin 'gru'o// de bzhin du dam pa grub par 'dod na rang gi phyag rgya'i snying pos
304b8(rgyud): sgrub bo// dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi spyi'i ring gi lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rjer bya ba'i phyir cho ga rgyas pa bshad de/ nam phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs lhod par gyur
305a1(rgyud): tam/ bdag rang gtong bar 'dod na de nas snying po 'di brtan par bya'o// oM badz+ras tra sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badz+ras d+harten pa Sh+Tha dr-i \u0f7f ma~M b+ha wa/ su to Sh+yo me thA wa/ a nu ra me \u0f7f/ 
305a2(rgyud): wa/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha wa/ sar+b+ba sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha/ sar+b+ba kar+m+ma su tsa me/ tsit+taM shre yaHku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha hoHb+ha ga wA na/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badz+ra mA me muny+tsa badz+ri b+ha wa ma hA sa ma ya satwa AH'dis ni mtshams med pa byas
305a3(rgyud): ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bslus pa dang / dam pa'i chos smod pa dang / nyes pa thams cad byas pa'ang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa pos rdo rje sems dpa' brtan pa
305a4(rgyud): gyur pas tshe 'di nyid la ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad dam / dngos grub dam pa 'am/ rdo rje dngos grub bam/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub bam/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi
305a5(rgyud): dngos grub kyi bar du myur du thob bo zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso// de nas phyag rgya thams cad dgrol ba'i spyi'i cho ga rgyas pa bshad do// 
305a6(rgyud): de la thog ma nyid du phyag rgya thams cad gang dang gang nas byung ba de dang de nyid nas snying po 'dis dgrolo// oM badz+ra muHde nas snying ka nas byung ba rin chen rdo rje'i phyag rgya rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas na gnas pas
305a7(rgyud): dbang bskur te/ mdzub mo gnyis kyis bskor zhing bcings nas/ de bzhin du go cha yang snying po 'dis bcing ngo // oM badz+ra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ sarba mu dra maM tri d+hi ku ru ba ra ka ba tse na baM/ de nas yang go cha'i
305a8(rgyud): mthar phreng ba bcings pa gtad la/ thal mo mnyam par brdabs te snying po 'dis mnyes par bya'o// badz+ra tuSh+ya ho// cho ga 'dis phyag rgya rnams dgrol ba dang / bcings pa dang / mnyes par byas nas rdo rje
305b1(rgyud): lta bur 'gyur ro// yang na rdo rje sems dpa' kyang bya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' lan cig bzlas// ji ltar 'dod pa bdag bde bar// bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa bzhin na/ 
305b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos gsung so// rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' rnams// sgrub pa dang ni las kun la// 'dir ni ci dgar bzlas na ni// rtog pa kun las dngos grub thob// snying po bya/ 
305b3(rgyud): rgya sngags rig rnams// ji ltar 'dod pa'i tshul gyis ni// rtog pa las bshad rang byas pa 'am// sgrub pa 'dir ni thams cad do// de nas gsang ba'i mchod brjod cing // 
305b4(rgyud): rdo rje'i bstod pa 'dis glu blangs te gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi bya'o// oM rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pas na// rdo rje rin tshe na bla na med// rdo rje chos ni glu blangs pas// rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur/ 
305b5(rgyud): de nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje bstod pa'i glu 'di nyid kyis rdo rje'i gar lag pa gnyis gshibs pa gsang ba bya'o// bdug pa la sogs pas mchod pa bya ste/ de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil
305b6(rgyud): 'khor du bdug pa la sogs pas mchod pa bya ste/ mchod pa de dag rang gi gnasu gzhag go/ de nas thams cad la ci nus par mchod cig ces bsgo nas de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la stsol ste/ 
305b7(rgyud): ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bdug pa la sogs pas mchod pa byed du bcug la/ ji ltar bzhugs pa rnams ci 'byor pa'i ro dang / kha zas la sogs pa thams cad dang / dkyil 'khor chen por phul ba'i yo byad
305b8(rgyud): thams cad kyis mgu bar bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub rdo rje brtul zhugs sbyin no// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// rdo rje sems dpa'i lag na 'dug/ khyod kyis kyang ni rtag/ 
306a1(rgyud): tu bcang // phyag na rdorje brtul zhugs brtan// oM sarbata thA ga ta sit+ti badz+ra sa ma ya/ tiSh+Tha e ShatA d+ha ra ya mi/ badz+ras twa coM tsi tsu/ de nas thams cad du sul yang ma pa cig
306a2(rgyud): bsgol mni'i snying po yang bstan to// de nas ji ltar zhugs pa rnams slar bkye ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba gdab cing sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings nas kha gyen du bstan te/ 
306a3(rgyud): snying po 'di bzlas shing dkrol nas/ oM khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad// rjesu 'thun pa'i dngos grub stsol// sangs rgyas yul du bzhud par mdzod// slar yang byon par mdzad du gsol// badz+ra satwa/ 
306a4(rgyud): muHde ltar dkyil 'khor thams cad la bya'o// dam tshig mchog/ gri phyag rgya rnams kyang dgrol bar bya'o// de bzhin gsheg/ nges pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa rtogs pa chen
306a5(rgyud): po'i rgyal po las rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzog so// / bam po gsum pa 'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
306a6(rgyud): gzungs dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu yang de nyid kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las bcom ldan 'das phyag na
306a7(rgyud): rdo rje de nyid de rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzungs 'dzin pa kun tu 'bar ba'i snying po rdo rje gzungs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i lha mo rnamasu gyur nas byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kun gyi de bzhin
306a8(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i gzungs kyi ye shes bsgrubs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i gzugasu gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbyings kyi
306b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams la 'khod de ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o gang phyir byang chub sems// sems can kun la phan bzhed pa// 'dul ba'i dbang
306b2(rgyud): gis dpa' bo gang // bud med gzugasu'ang mdzad par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig rdo rje dbyings kyi byin gyis brlab/ 
306b3(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di gsung so// oM badz+ra d+hA tI shwa ri hUM badz+rA Ni/ de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
306b4(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dbyin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms pa dar zhugs te rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra badz+dza/ 
306b5(rgyud): Ni hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs zhwa/ 
306b6(rgyud): bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rang rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM rat+na badz+ri Ni hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi dam
306b7(rgyud): tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM d+harma badz+ri Ni hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
306b8(rgyud): gdon mi za bar grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di
307a1(rgyud): smras pa/ oM karma badz+ri Ni n+tu/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi po bshad do/ 
307a2(rgyud): oM badz+ra satwa gu h+ya sa ma ye hUM/ oM guh+Na rat+na a ku shi hUM oM gud+ha rA gi rA gA ya hU~M/ oM badz+ra gur+b+ha badz+ra sA d+hI shwa ri hUM/ kun tu bzang mo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i lcags kyu ma dang / dga' ba la chags
307a3(rgyud): ma dang / legs ldan ma ste/ rdo rje gzungs chen mo rnamaso// oM badz+ra gu h+ya rat+na sa ma ya hUM/ oM bedz+ra guh+ya pra b+he hUM/ oM badz+ra d+h+wa dza a gra guh+ya hUM/ oM badz+ra ha sa badz+ra hUM/ rin po che'i gtso mo dang / 
307a4(rgyud): rin po che'i sgron ma dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ma dang / bzhad pa dang ldan ma rnams te/ rin po che'i gzung / sa rnamaso// oM badz+ra d+harma gu h+ya sa ma ye hUM/ oM badz+ra ko Sha guH
307a5(rgyud): sa ma ye hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya maN+Da le hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya wa tsa sa ma ye hUM/ rdo rje pad+mo dang / kun 'dzin ma dang / 'khor lo thams cad ma dang / stong du zlos ma ste/ chos kyi gzungs ma
307a6(rgyud): rnamaso// oM badz+ra gu h+ya karma sa ma ye hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya ka ba tse hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya daSh+Ta d+hA rA NI hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya muSh+Ti hUM/ dngos grub kun gyi gtso mo dang / thams cad srung ba ma dang / mdangs slar
307a7(rgyud): 'phrog ma dang / gzungs kyi phyag rgya ma ste/ thams cad kyi gzungs rnamaso// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gsang ba'i dam
307a8(rgyud): tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi po rnams bshad do// oM badz+ra gu h+yasatwa badz+ra Ni hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya rat+na badz+ri Na~M hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya d+harma badz+riNahUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya karma badz+rAHhUM/ rdo rje pha rol tu phyin pa de dag nyid la sogs pa
307b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams te/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma dkyil 'khor chen po 'bar ba dang bcas pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug par bzhag go/ 
307b2(rgyud): de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi po bshad do// oM badz+ra gu h+ya ra ti pU dza sa ma ye sarba pU dza pra brta na ya hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya a
307b3(rgyud): b+hiShe ka pU dza sa ma ye sarba pU dza pra brta na ya hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya gi ti pU dza sa ma ye sarba pU dza pra brta na ya hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya nr-i t+ya pU dza sa ma ye sarba pU dza pra brta na ya hUM/ rdo rje 'dzin ma la sogs pa
307b4(rgyud): / de dag nyid de 'bar ba dang bcas pa rang gi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rnams 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi grwa rnamasu dgod do// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba'i
307b5(rgyud): rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bshad do// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// rdo rje gsang ba zhes bshad do// dkyil 'khor
307b6(rgyud): chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor kun gyi dbus su ni// sangs rgyas phyag rgya bri bar bya// mchod rten khri la legs 'dug pa// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor
307b7(rgyud): bshad// khri yi steng du rdo rje brtsegs// rdo rje sems shes bshad pa'o// rdo rje rin chen khri yi ste// rang gi dbang ni bskur bar bshad// rdo rje pad+ma khri yi steng // mtshon cha zhes ni bya bar bshad// las kyi
307b8(rgyud): rdo rje khri yi steng // rdo rje kun zhes bya bar bshad// pad+mo'i steng du bri bar ni// 'od kyi 'khor lo brtan pa'o// khri yi snying du rdo rje bri// lcags kyu 'greng ba gnyis de bzhin// rdo rje rdo rje la skyes par// legs
308a1(rgyud): bar sbyin pa gnyis de bzhin// rin chen 'od zer 'bar bar bya// nyi ma'i phyag rgya'ang de bzhin// phyag mtshan rtse mo 'bar bar bcas// rdo rje gnyis par so yi breng // rdo rje dbus padz+ra/ 
308a2(rgyud): bri/ ral gri 'bar bcas de bzhin// rdo rje 'khor lo rdo rje rtsibs// 'bar ba'i 'od zer can gyi lce// rdo rje kun tu rtse mo dang // go cha rdo rje yang dag ldan// rdo rje mche ba yang dag bri// lag gnyis khu/ 
308a3(rgyud): tshur phyag rgya bya// sems ma rdo rje la sogs ni// dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ji bzhin du// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya bri bar ni// rdo rje 'dzin sogs dkyil 'khor du// phyi rol du yang ci rigs par bya/ 
308a4(rgyud): rang gi mtshan ma rnams kyang bri// byams pa la sogs rang dgi mtshan// ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du bri// de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir 'jug pa la sogs pa'i
308a5(rgyud): cho ga rgyas pa yin te/ de la thog mar rdo rje slob dpon gyi sem sa ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya rang gi rigs bcings te'ajug par bya'o// zhugs nas la gcig bskor te/ phyag rgya
308a6(rgyud): de bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phul nas/ rang gi snying kar tshul bzhin du bkrol te/ sgo bzhir rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas ji lta ba'i las rnams byas te phyir byung // phyir byung nas kyi
308a7(rgyud): rdo rje slob ma rnams rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por gzung ba'i tshul du gzung ngo // de nas btsud nas dngos grub kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i mtshan ma 'chang bas g.yogs la byin te/ 
308a8(rgyud): rdo rje gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// de la dang po'i re shig rdo rje gsang ba'i lus kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbusu ni// rkang lag thal mo sbyar nas
308b1(rgyud): kha/ glal cing rdo rje bsgoms byas na// rdo rje ma yang chags par byed// dpung pa bskum pa'i lcags kyu dang // mgo la rdo rje bsgom par bya// lag pa yis ni 'bod byed cing // lcags kyum
308b2(rgyud): yang 'gugs par byed// mda' 'phen pa yi tshul mig/ glal zhing snying khar 'phangs nas ni// nyid kyis rdo rje dga' ma yang / bdud kyi tshul gyis mnyes par byed// bdag gi lus kyi snying ka ru// rdo rje ga/ 
308b3(rgyud): cha'i tshul gyis ni// dpung pa bsnol bar bcings nas ni// sangs rgyas nyid kyang srung bar byed// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin// badz+ra rA ga ma ho// badz+ra aM ku shi dza/ badz+ra mA ra ya mA ra ya
308b4(rgyud): paphaT/ badz+ra ban d+ha rak+Sha haM// de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i lta ba'i bya dag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// rdo rje lta ba chags pas ni/ dga' bas mig ni rab tu bgrang // de yis bud med bltas pas ni/ 
308b5(rgyud): rtag tu dbang du 'gyur ba yin// rab tu myur bar mig bskul zhing / mig gi rdzi ma 'gugs byed pa// lta ba gzi can yi na par bshad// 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs byed pa'o khro gnyer
308b6(rgyud): gnyer ma rab bsdus pa// khro bo'i mig ni btsums pa ste// khro bo'i lta bas byas nas ni// khams gsum yang ni 'jigs par byed// ri rab ri yi brag 'dra ba// brtan par 'dzums pa med pa'i mig
308b7(rgyud): byams pa'i lta ba yon par bshad// nad dang gdon dang dug sal to// de nas 'di rnams kyi snying po ni 'di dag yin// badz+ra dr-iSh+Ti maT pA dr-iSh+Ta a~M ku shi dzaHko d+ha dr-iSh+Ti hrIHdr-i D+ha tiSh+Tha phaT/ de nas rdo rje gsang
308b8(rgyud): ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// ho ho ha~M ha zhes smras na/ sgra dang bral bas de ma thag/ sems can kun ni mgu bar byed// de ni rdo rje tshig gsal ba'o// dza dza dza dza zhes brjod na// khro ba'i
309a1(rgyud): tshig ni gsal ba ste// rdo rje 'dzin pa 'dra ba ste// skye bo kun kyang 'gugs par byed// hUM hUM hUM hUM zhes brjod na// tshig tu brjod pa gsal ba yis// ri rab dang ni 'dra ba yi// sems
309a2(rgyud): can kun la bdud byed do// haM ha haM haM zhes smras na// phra ba'i tshig ni gsal ba ste// 'jig rten 'di kun srung byed pa// rdo rje'i bdag nyid rgyal ba'ang srung // de la snying po 'di rnams yino// badz+ra hoHbadz+ra dzaH
309a3(rgyud): badz+ra hUM/ badz+ra haM/ de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'i// phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid la// bdag nyid kyis ni sgom byas la// sangs rgyas
309a4(rgyud): thams cad dbang du byed// rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa/ rdo rje snying po bdag nyid la// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms bya/ ngas na// phyag na rdo rje 'gugs par byed// rnam pa thams cad
309a5(rgyud): mchog ldan pa'i// rdo rje'i spyan ni bdag nyid la// bdag nyid kyis ni sgom byas na// chos rnams thams cad nges pa dbyed// rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'i// rdo rje thams
309a6(rgyud): cad bdag nyid la// bdag nyid kyis ni sgom byas na// rdo rje thams cad des srung ngo // de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin// badz+ra pA Ni sarba sha man ya sarba bud+d+ha ho// badz+ra gar+b+ha badz+ra pA ni shi g+h+ra A kaR+Sha ya ts+tsha/ 
309a7(rgyud): dzaHbadz+ra ne tra sarba d+harmA na mA ra ya hUM phaT/ badz+ra bi shwa rak+Sha sarban hUM/ de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// bdag gis bdag gi snying kar ni// sems dpa'i rdo rje bcing byas la/ 
309a8(rgyud): rdo rje ltabs bltas na ni// 'gro ba thams cad 'bab par byed// bdag gis bdag gi snying garini// rin chen rdo rje bcing byas la// 'bar ba'i lta bas bltas na ni// thams cad dbang du byed par 'a/ 
309b1(rgyud): bdag gis bdag gi snying kar ni// chos kyi rdo rje bcing byas la// khro bo'i lta bas bltas na ni// 'gro ba thams cad des sdud byed// bdag gis bdag gi snying kar ni// las kyi rdo rje bcing byas la/ 
309b2(rgyud): byams pa'i lta bas bltas na ni// 'gro ba thams cad srung bar byed// de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// badz+ra gu h+ya sa ma ya ho// badz+ra gu h+ya sa ma ya dza/ badz+ra gu
309b3(rgyud): rgya sa ma ya hUM/ badz+ra gu h+ya sa ma ya haM/ de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i phyag rgya chen po bcing ba bslab bo// rdo rje thal mo las byung ba// gsang ba chen po rab tu bshad// phyag rgya chen po mdor bsdus pa/ 
309b4(rgyud): dedag gi ni bcing ba bshad// mthe bong gnyis ni bsnol bya/ des la// mdzub mo rtse mo bkug pas ni// gung mo bsna rnams pa'i tshigasu sbyar// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad// 
309b5(rgyud): de nyid gung mo rdo rjer bya// gung mo gnyis ni nor bur byas// pad+ma srin lag mthe chung gung // lag pa'i sor mo rab tu brkyang / mdzub mo rdo rje mdzub gnyis rtse// de nyid mthe bong gnyis
309b6(rgyud): kyis sbas// legs pa sprin dang mdzub rin chen// mdzub mo rin chen can 'od 'bar// srin lag gnibs mthe'u chung rin chen// de nyid kyang ni bskor ba'o// kun gyi rtse mo rab tu 'gyed// mtha
309b7(rgyud): bo mthe'u chung rab tu gzhug/ sor mo bar du 'khor lo brkyang // de nyid kyang ni kha nas dbyung // mthe bong brkyang ste rdo rjes dga'// mdzub mo bsnams nas nang du gzhug/ mtheb gnyis dbye ba de/ 
309b8(rgyud): nyid las// de nas nang du rdo rjer bya// rdo rje gsang ba de rnams ni// rdo rje bcings las byung ba yin// chos kyi gsang ba'i mtshan rnams ni// thal mo nang du bkug paso// las kyi gsang ba nang
310a1(rgyud): gnas pa'i// mtshan ma lu su bstan pa'o// de nas gnan yang rab bshad pa'o// chos kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus pa/ any+dza mos/ ma a pra ta hrIm+ban pa k+Sha sam+b+ha
310a2(rgyud): gsang ba'i phyag rgya gnyis byas nas// las kyi phyag rgya rnams bya// dam tshig mchog ni ji snyed pa// gnyis bral nas de bzhin// de nas 'di rnams sgrib pa bshad// sa ma ye s+t+waM zhes smras ning / 
310a3(rgyud): bdag gis bcings pas 'grub pa ni// 'dod la chags pa bde ba'i bdag/ 'di rnams lhag par gcig kyang ni// dus kun tu ni bcing mi bya// gsang ba'am ni don chen la// mkhas pa yis ni sbyar
310a4(rgyud): bar bya// 'di rnams kun la bdag nyid gnas// rang byung rnam nas kyi lha mo brtan// sgrub pa rnams la rab chags ni/ rang gi bdag po btang nga re// de nas phyag rgya 'di rnams bcing ba
310a5(rgyud): sogs pa'i las rnams yin// bdag ma 'on te gzhan yang // rdo rje dbab pa byas nas ni// snying por bcas pa' yis ni// bcing ngam 'ching du gzhug kyang rung // badz+ra hUM ban+d+ha/ 
310a6(rgyud): de nas dgrol ba yin no// mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni// snying por bya ba 'di nyid kyis// gang dang gang nas byung ba yi// de dang de nas dgrol bar bya// oM badz+ra muHde nas brtan par bya ba yin te/ 
310a7(rgyud): rin chen rdo rje brtan byas te// snying ka nas ni spyi bor dgrol// mdzub mo yis ni go cha bci'i// snying por bya ba 'di nyid do// oM dr-i D+ha badz+ra ka ba tsa dr-i D+ha/ de nas bcing ba'i dam tshig yino// ji ltar gan
310a8(rgyud): rnamasu dgrol// go cha yis ni brtan par byas// thal mo brdabs pas kun sbyar la// snying por bya ba 'di nyid do// oM gu h+ya sa ma ya tra/ rdo rje sems dpa' ci dgar bzlas// dkyil 'khor dang ni la
310b1(rgyud): kun la// dus 'di nyid du sbyar bar bya// thams cad 'grub par byed pa'i mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rdo rje gsang
310b2(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzog so// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje phra mo'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi dkyil
310b3(rgyud): 'khor byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM suk+Sh+ma badz+ra dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo bas de bzhin
310b4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa' ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'i
310b5(rgyud): smras pa/ oM satwa sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin ga/ shegs pa rin chen 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa tha mas cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khro
310b6(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM rat+na sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe tshad med pas de bzhin ga
310b7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM d+harma sAk+Sh+ma badz+ra dz+nyA na sa ma
310b8(rgyud): ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la
311a1(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs te rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM karma sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de
311a2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje ye shis phra mo'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nyid kyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa thams
311a3(rgyud): cad kyi thugs ka nas rdo rje ye shes phra mo'i 'od zer de rnams byung nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas te/ sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ye
311a4(rgyud): phra mo'i ting 'dzin du snyoms par zhugs pa brtan par byas te/ de yang gcig tu gyur nas ting 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i skur dmigs te gcig tu 'dus nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shwa
311a5(rgyud): su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thug su zhug so// de nas bcom ldanas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin ga gas pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi thug su zhugs nas de bzhin
311a6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje 'di smras pa/ sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra/ de nas de smras ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje
311a7(rgyud): de nyid byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phra mo'i rdo rje'i dbyibasu bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shangs kyi rtse mo'i phyogasu gnas nas ched du/ 
311a8(rgyud): brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje phra mo'i bdag ste che// gang phyir phra yang che ba'i phyir// khams gsum yang ni rgyas par byed// de nas de skad ces smras pa dang / 
311b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shangs kyi rtse mo'i phyogs na rab tu phra ba'i ye shes kyi mtshan ma rgyas par bya ba'i sbyor bas de bzhin gshegs
311b2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi sku la khyab par byas nas chos kyi dbyings thams cad khyab par bya ba'i tshul gyis na mkha'i dbyings thams cad du rab tu phra ba'i rdo rje ye shes kyi mtshan ma rnams kyi khyab par byaso// nam
311b3(rgyud): mkha'i dbyings thams cad khyab par byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i dbyibasu bdag nyid byin gyis rlabs te 'dug go// de nas de nyid kyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa thams
311b4(rgyud): cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje dbus su rdo rje'i chos nyid du dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs/ pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ye shes phra mo'i byin gyis brlabs zhes
311b5(rgyud): bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te bzhug so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje de las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi snying
311b6(rgyud): po 'di phyung ngo // badz+ra nA bI ta thA ga ta hUM/ de nas de byung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje ye shes phra mor 'jug pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur zhugs nas thugs kar
311b7(rgyud): rdo rje'i dbyibasu gyur te gnaso// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje de las ye shes chen po 'di bzhi phyung ngo // badz+ra At+ma ka dr-i D+ha badz+ra aM ku sha tiSh+Tha rA ga badz+ra pra be sha hr-i da ya/ 
311b8(rgyud): a ho badz+ra duSh+Ti/ rdo rje sems dpa' ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdu ba'i byin gyis brlabs kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes pa
312a1(rgyud): byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / dga' ba chen po ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting 'dzin chen po rnam so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
312a2(rgyud): thams cad kyi snying po phyag na rdo rje ye shes phra mor 'jug pa'i tshul gyis rang gi thug su zhugs te snying ka'i rdo rje'i dbyibasu bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te bzhug so// de nas rdo rje'i dbyibasu de las snying po 'di
312a3(rgyud): byung ngo // badz+ra rat+na At+ma ka hr-i da ya/ badz+ra sUr+ya tiSh+Tha/ badz+ra d+ha dzA gra baM hr-i da ya/ badz+ra hA sa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor
312a4(rgyud): chen po bkod pa'i rgyan ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gsheg sa pa thams cad kyi re ba rdzogs par byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhad pa
312a5(rgyud): chen po'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa tham sa cad kyi rin po che'i ting 'dzin to// de nas yang bya/ ga na rdo rje ye shes phra mor 'jug pa'i tshul gyis rang gi snying
312a6(rgyud): ka rdo rje'i snying por zhugs nas rdo rje'i dbyibasu bdag byin gyis brlabs nas bzhug so// de nas rdo rje'i dbyibs de las snying po 'di bzhi byung ngo // badz+ra pad+ma at+ma ka hr-i da ya badz+ra ko Sha/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra tsakra
312a7(rgyud): da ya pra be sha/ badz+ra dzi hA gra hr-i da ya/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad shes rab kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / 'khor lo chen por
312a8(rgyud): 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshig gi spros pa med pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams pa thams cad kyi chos kyi ting nge/ 
312b1(rgyud): 'dzin to// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rang gi snying po thugs ka'i rdo rje las byung nas ye shes phra mor 'jug pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje'i thugs der bzhugs nas yang rdo rje shin tu phra mo'i dbyibasu bdag byin gyis
312b2(rgyud): brlabs te bzhug so// de nas rdo rje phra mo'i dbyibs de las snying po 'di bzhi byung ngo // sarba badz+ra At+ma ka hr-i da badz+ra ka ba tsa/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra rak+Sha hr-i da ya/ badz+ra muSh+Ti hr-i da ya/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
312b3(rgyud): las sna tshogs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / thub par dka' ba'i brtson 'grus kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / bdud thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
312b4(rgyud): thams cad kyi 'ching ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin gshe gas pa thams cad kyi las kyi ting 'dzin to// de nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rab tu phra ma'i ye shes kyi
312b5(rgyud): mtshan mas khyab pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje'i skur gyur nas de nas yang rdo rje sems dang / 
312b6(rgyud): la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi skur gyur te/ rang rang gi mtshan ma nyid kyi thugs kar bzhag nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i tshul gyis zla ba'i
312b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la gnas nas rang rang gi snying po'i ting 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste bzhug so// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi ma
312b8(rgyud): par shes pa sgrub pa'i phyir rdo rje phra mo'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// rdo rje phra mo zhes bsha/ 
313a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang bzhag/ rdo rje dbus sangs rgyas bri// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rnams yang // sems dpa' chen po rnams
313a2(rgyud): zhing / de bzhin thugs kar nying phyag rgya// ting 'dzin du bzhugs pa dang // phyag gnyis rdo rje bcings par bcings// de nas rdo rje phra mo'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yin/ 
313a3(rgyud): te/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du bzhugs pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas ye shes kyi mtshan ma lag tu byin nas rang gi sems la su rung bar bya ba'i phyir phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes bsla'o// lce ni
313a4(rgyud): dkan la sbyar bya zhing // sna yi tse mor bsam bya ba// rdo rje phra mor/ de reg pas// sems ni mnyam par gnag par 'gyur// rdorje phra mo bde reg pa'i// mtshan ma gal te byung ba na// mtshan
313a5(rgyud): mde ni khyab bya ba// sems de kun tu khyab par bya// ji tsam 'dod pa sa sems khyab nas// khams gsum du yang khyab par 'gyur// de nas de yang bsdu ba ni// sna yi rtse mo'i bar du gnas// 
313a6(rgyud): de nas shin tu mnyam par gzhag/ gang yang rung ste bsgom bya ba// de dag thams cad brtan par 'gyur// ting 'dzin ye shes kyi brtag pa'o// de nas de rnams kyi snying po 'di yino// sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra s+pha ra Na/ 
313a7(rgyud): sa ha ra Na badz+ra/ badz+ra hr-i da tiSh+Tha/ sems dpa' gang gi byams pa ni// mnyam 'gyur brtan pa chen po yis// sems kyis khyab pa'i tshul gyis ni// sems can kun la des khyab bya// byams pas khyab ni
313a8(rgyud): tshul gyis ni// snying rje can ni gang yin pa// sems can kun don ldan pa yin// sgrub pa sri ni khyab par bya// kun kyang rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// gdod nas dag pas na mkha' bzhin// chos sam yang
313b1(rgyud): na chos ma yin// bsam pas khyab cing dga' bar 'gyur// gdul dka' ba dang mtshungs 'dra ba// sangs rgyas byang chub snod ma yin// de dag rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// btang snyoms chen po goms par bya// 
313b2(rgyud): de'i snying po ni 'di rnams yi no// ma hA mai tri s+pha ra Na/ ma hA kA ru Na s+pha ra Na/ sar+b+ba bud+d+ho pra mo ha s+pha ra Na/ sar+b+ba satwa bo d+ha ya/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rje su dran pa'i ye shes bsla'o// na mkha'/ 
313b3(rgyud): yi ni phyogs gzhan du// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// 'greng ngem yang na 'dug kyang rung // rdo rje'i dbyibs ni goms par bya// de bzhin du yang gnas kun tu// rdo rje phra mo sbyor ba yis// mnyam par gzhag sa
313b4(rgyud): snying kar ni// rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sgom// ji lta ba yi rim pa shin du// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// phyag na rdo rje dbyibasachen po// gnas rnams kun tu bsgoms par bya// rnam pa thams
313b5(rgyud): cad mchog ldan pa'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi dus kun tu// ji lta ba 'i gau rims bzhin// mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom par bya// de la snying po ni 'di rnams yino// badz+ra mu khi b+ha ba/ ma hA
313b6(rgyud): bo d+hi satwa A be sha/ badz+ra pA Ni d+hA ra sha ya swa ru paM/ bud+d+ha a nu smr-i ti A be sha/ rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis na// goms par bya ba bdag nyid kyis// zla ba'i dbyibasu bdag nyid ni// byang chub sems kyis sgom pa'o// 
313b7(rgyud): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbusu ni// bdag nyid rdo rje'i dbyibs gyur par// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom bya ba// sems dpa'i rdo rje sgom pa'o// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar la// bdag nyid steng kar rdo rje sems// bdag
313b8(rgyud): nyid kyis ni bsgom bya ba// rdo rje sems dpa' sgom pa'o// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa// sangs rgyas gzugasu bdag nyid ni// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom bya ba// sangs rgyas byang chub sgom pa'o// de lasbyin
314a1(rgyud): bo ni 'di rnamaso// sa man+ta b+ha dra A be sha/ badz+ra sa twa badz+ra A be sha/ badz+ra satwa sa ma d+hi dz+nyA na a be sha/ ta thA ga toH/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid gsal ba/ 
314a2(rgyud): phyag rgya'i ye shes bsgrub bo// bdag ni de bzhin gshegs dang mnyam// rdo rje'i tshig tu lan cig brjod// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar bas// sems can thams cad chags par byed// bdag ni rdo rje
314a3(rgyud): bor mnyam// rdo rje'i tshig tu lan cig brjod// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar bas// gdon mi za bar 'jig rten 'gugs// bdag ni rdo rje chos dang mnyam// rdo rje tshig tu lan cig brjod// dbang po
314a4(rgyud): gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas// de yis 'jig rten thams cad 'jig/ bdag ni sna tshogs las dang mnyam// rdo rje'i tshig tu/ na cig brjod// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar bas// las rnam
314a5(rgyud): thams cad des sgrub bo// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ti 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis
314a6(rgyud): ni/ rdo rje'i dbus su bsgom bya ba// bdag nyid sangs rgyas sku nyid du// des ni sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub// de nas rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'i ye shes basmra'o// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar la// snying kar rdo rje la
314a7(rgyud): sogs 'khor// bsgoms na rdo rje la sogs pas// rang gi dngos grub sbyin par byed// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab 'o// 
314a8(rgyud): rdo rje bcings las legs byung bar // bcu drug rnam su bshad ba ste// ting 'dzin na dam tshig mchog/ de rnams kyini bcings pa bshad// dkyil mo krung 'dug gan rgyal du// g.yas bcus de ba ni/ 
314b1(rgyud): slar bcus pa// snying kar gnas pa bzhi pa ste// rdo rje sems sogs dkyil 'khor ro// dpral bar gzhag dang lhag pa dang // 'brag pa dang ni dgod par sbyar// khar bzhag snying khar ral gri dang // snying
314b2(rgyud): kar rgyas dang kha nas dbyung // spyi'o thong ka khar bzhag pa// mdzub mo gnyis bkug mdun de bzhin// de nas gzhan yang chos kyi phyag rgya bslab par bya'o// Tak+ti gra gra/ maT/ a gra traM tra/ aM aM/ baM baM/ tri Ta/ 
314b3(rgyud): hrIHmu/ b+h+r-i Ta kra sha ha pA ba ba ba ga/ phaT/ gras/ de nas chos kyi las kyi mchog/ phra mo'i rdo rje can rnams bslab// ye shes khu tshur dam tshig las// gnyisu byas nas sbyar bar bya// de bzhin gshegs/ 
314b4(rgyud): ba thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa chen po'i rgyal po rdo rje ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzog so// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs
314b5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi mchog gi bla na med pa'i mchod pa chen po'i cho ga rgya sa pas khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi ye shes byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
314b6(rgyud): rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+hA tu a nut+ta ra pU dza karma s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i
314b7(rgyud): mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshige rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra
314b8(rgyud): satwa a nut+ta ra pU dza kar+m+ma s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i las kyi sa
315a1(rgyud): tshig gi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs shes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oMsarba thAg ta badz+ra rak+Sha sa nut+tA pU dzakar+m+ma s+pha ra Na sa ma ye
315a2(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas pa khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
315a3(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+rad+harma a nut+ta pU dza kar+m+ma s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas de bzhin gshegs
315a4(rgyud): ba thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs/ zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig ste/ 
315a5(rgyud): mchog 'di smras pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra kar+m+ma a nut+ta ra pU dza kar+m+ma s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
315a6(rgyud): mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad du khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nyid kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs
315a7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi thugs las bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid chos kyi dbyings thams cad du khyab pa na mkha'i dbyings kun tu rgyas pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa thams cad kyi bkod pa'i cho ga
315a8(rgyud): rgyas pa'i rab 'byam sprin gyi rgya mtsho'i lha mo rnamasu gyur te byung nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam sprin rgya mtsho rnamasu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du de bzhin gshegs
315b1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs mnyes par bya ba dang / kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa sgrub pa dang / byang chub chen po'i snying por
315b2(rgyud): nye bar 'gro ba dang / bdud thams cad 'dul ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khru
315b3(rgyud): chen po bskyed pa dang / khams gsum thams cad las rnam par rgyal bar bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi don
315b4(rgyud): bya ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul thams cad bstanas bzhug so// mchod pa'i sprin rgya mtsho'i lha mo de dug kyang rang rang gi phyag rgya lag pa gnyis kyis 'dzin cing de bzhin/ 
315b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad la cho ga bzhin du yang dag par mchod de/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 
315b6(rgyud): e ma'o// sangs rgyas mchod pa bdag/ mchod pa kun ni byed pa yin// gang phyir sangs rgyas nyid chen du// sangs rgyas kun gyis grub par mdzad// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa
315b7(rgyud): thams cad kyis mchod pa la sogs pa'i las kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdo rje'i bya ba zhes bya ba'i las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba At+ma nir+ya ta na pU dza s+pha ra Na karma badz+ri Ni hUM A/ oM
315b8(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga ta sarba At+ma nir+ya ta na pU dza s+pha ra Na karma gri dza/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba At+ma nir+yA ta na a nu rA ga pU dza s+pha ra Na karma pA Ne hU~M ho// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba At+ma nir+yA ta na sA d+hu ka ra pU dza s+pha ra
316a1(rgyud): karbadz+ha k+Shas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams cad kyi ba tu dga' shing ba ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad smra 'dren ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
316a2(rgyud): mnyes par byed pa mo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes par byed pa mo rnams ni bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po rnams// oM nasaHsarbang bgata ka ya a mri
316a3(rgyud): rnam me/ marna ma sa nang sngag su pang ma ning madz+ra/ men ma sa jug tu shapa'i dU / tsan ma d+gams tha 'dza d+hA dza marbu nga?/ man mangs che dag
316a4(rgyud): tha me dA kar b+hu badz+ran skyes/ dbang mchen ma dang / snang ba te na mo dang / rin po che chen po'i cha 'bebs ma dang / darab tu dga' zhing mgum rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
316a5(rgyud): cang kyi dbang bskur ba'i mchod pa'o// oMsarbatwa thAg ta/ badz+rad+ha rmAtas mad+hiSh+Tha/ spyan mam thadurmA rbi sarba thAg zad pa ma na re/ spyan mi ma thag lda nu \u0f7f/ 
316a6(rgyud): oM sarba thAg ta~M tsakra ak+Sha ra ba badz+ra da sarba su trA nan ye/ sku no ma sa rba maN+Da le hUM/ oM sarbata thA ga ta san+to b+ha Sha bud+d+ha sa gai Sha b+hin ya/ su nom badz+ra ba rtsi Ta/ ye shes chen mo gru dang / dbyangs
316a7(rgyud): chen mo'i rjesu 'brang ma dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug ma dang / sngags kyi spyod ma rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi mchod pa'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+hU pa me g+ha s+pha ra/ 
316a8(rgyud): drung ka rba ka gaka ra/ oM sarba thA ga ta puSh+pa pra sa ra s+pha ra/ mu karba ki ri ki ri/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta mA lo ki dz+wa la sA raHpu dza ka rba ka ra ka ra/ oM sarba thA ga ta gan+d+has su dra s+pha ra/ mu / ma ku ru k+Sha
316b1(rgyud): sems can ma dang / byang chub chen po'i yan lag can ma dang / mig ldan ma dang / dri ldan ma rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi mchod pa'o// de nas 'dir de bzhin gshegs
316b2(rgyud): pa thams cad ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad la mchod pa byed pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje zhes bya ba bshad do// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje
316b3(rgyud): dbyings dang 'dra bas na// rdo rje bya ba zhes kyang grags// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// sangs rgyas sku rnams bzhag par bya// rdo rje sems la sogs tshul du// lha mo phyag rgya bcas
316b4(rgyud): pa bri// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje bya ba 'dir gzhugs pa la sogs pa'i tshig rgyas pa bshad de/ de la nga dbo rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i tshul gyis gzhug
316b5(rgyud): par bya ba// bcug nas kyang 'di skad du 'di ni de bzhin gshe gas pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dam tshig yin gyis/ mchod pa bcu drug po 'di rnams khyod kyis nyin re zhing ci nus su
316b6(rgyud): gyis shig ces bsgo bar bya'o// de nas gdong g.yogs bkrol te las kyi dkyil 'khor bstan la thams cad kyi mtshan ma lag pa gnyis su sbyin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
316b7(rgyud): cad kyis kyang mchod na gzhan gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas byang chub chen po'i sems sgrub pa'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed pa/ 
316b8(rgyud): bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsam zhing // dga' bas bdag ni mchod byed na// sangs rgyas kyi ni bde ba'ang 'thob// byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed pas// bdag ni sangs rgyas
317a1(rgyud): yin pasam zhing // phreng ba la sogs rab mchod pas// mchod na de ni dbang yang bskur// byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed pas// bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsam zhing / 
317a2(rgyud): snyan pa'i glu yis rab mchod pas// mchod na bdag de mgu bar 'gyur// byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed pas// bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsam zhing // gar gyi mchod pas bdag mchod na/ 
317a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyis kyang de mchod 'gyur// de la snying po ni 'di rnams yino// bud+d+ha At+ma ko haM/ bud+d+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ bud+d+ha sta ti ka ro me bud+d+ha pU dza ka ro mi/ de nas sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa
317a4(rgyud): phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// lus dang ngag sems cho rdo rje yino// mchog gi tshul gyis phyag 'tshal zhing / de bzhin sangs rgyas kun mchod na// rtag tu phyag byar 'os par/ 
317a5(rgyud): 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad bsod nams che// sku ga/ sung thugs kyi rdo rje skyes// rjesu yi rang bas mchod/ na// myur du sangs rgyas 'thob par 'gyur// lus dang ngag
317a6(rgyud): sems rdo rje yis// lha rdzas kyi ni bdag dbul ba'i// mchod pa kun gyis sangs rgyas rnams// mchod na de yang mchod par 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// dge ba'i tshogs rnams/ 
317a7(rgyud): thams cad ni// yongasu bsngo ba'i mchod pa yi// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// de la snying po ni 'di rnams yino// pra Na mi nuta mo de bud+d+ha pU dza pa ri na ma/ de nas chos kyi ye shes kyi
317a8(rgyud): phyag rgya bslab par bya'o// chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// ngo bo nyid kyis gzod nas dag/ chos 'di dag gis mchod pas ni// dga' ba'i bde ba thob par 'gyur// chos rnams kun ni
317b1(rgyud): 'dus pa yi// a zhes bya ba sgo zhes brjod// chos kyi phyag rgya 'di yis ni// de yi sdug bsngal thams cad gcod// 'dir ni chos rnams thams cad kyi// rgyu ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste// dam/ 
317b2(rgyud): chos 'khor lo'i mchod pa yis// mchod pas chos ni 'dzin par 'gyur// chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis// sgra brnyan dag dang 'drar bshad de// chos kyi mchod pa 'di dag gis// 
317b3(rgyud): mchod na sangs rgyas gsung yang 'thob// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// sarba shud+d+ha sa man+ta b+ha dra// d+har+m+ma tsakra niSh+Ta pany+tsa/ de nas ting 'dzin gyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab
317b4(rgyud): par bya'o// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// rang gi rdul ni phra mo da rnams// rdo rje'i dbyingasu bsgoms na ni// rdo rje'i ba dadag nyid myur du thob// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// rang
317b5(rgyud): gi rdul ni phra mo rnams// sangs rgyas kun tu bsgoms na ni/ chos kyi skur ni myur du 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems rnga rje yi// rang gi lus ni phra mo rnams// rdo rje sems dpar
317b6(rgyud): bsgoms na ni// rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam par 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis// rang gi lus ni phra mo rnams// sangs rgyas kyi ni skur bsgoms na// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur
317b7(rgyud): de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin// badz+ra kA ya/ d+har+m+ma kA ya/ sata kA ya/ bud+d+ha kA ya/ de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ rang 'byung la ni las kun gyis/ 
317b8(rgyud): 'khyud pa'i bde pa'i mchod pa ni// phul na rdo rje sems dpa'i dang // 'dra bar de ni myur du 'gyur// shin tu chags par sbyor ba yis// dam du bzung ba'i bde bani// sangs rgyas rnams la phuH/ 
318a1(rgyud): 'gyur na// rdo rje rin chen 'dra bar 'gyur// shin tu dga' zhing bde chags pas// brtan par gyur pa'i mchod bde bas// sangs rgyas rnams la phul na ni// rdo rje chos da
318a2(rgyud): 'dra bar 'gyur// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar ba'i// kun tu sbyor ba'i bde ba ni// mchod pa'i phyir ni phul bas na// rdo rje las dang 'dra bar 'gyur// de dag gi gsang ba'i snying po ni 'di dag
318a3(rgyud): yin no// ra ti badz+ra/ rA ga badz+ra/ pra ti badz+ra/ karma badz+ra/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i phrin las kyi phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ snying ka rtsi logs rgyab sbyor
318a4(rgyud): ba/ dpral ba la sogs de bzhin du// kha dang rna ba mgo ltag/ dpa// spyi bor 'phrag pa kha rked bzhag/ de nas de bani na gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyan
318a5(rgyud): ye shes bslab par bya'o// phyag rgya chen po'i tshul gyis ni/ rdo rje bcings pa dam byas la// snying ka la sogs gan sa tshul tu// bzhag nas rgyal ba rnams mchod do// de nas de
318a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs thams cad la mchod pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// oM kra sa y+ya sA tri ra kr-in khaM sha hUM hUM sha no shI sAM/ las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus na// las kyi phyag rgya
318a7(rgyud): gnyisu bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa las rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po rdo rje las zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzog so// 
318a8(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
318b1(rgyud): kyi rigs kyi rtog pa chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di smras pa/ oM sarba thA ga ta muSh+Ti ba/ de nas
318b2(rgyud): yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
318b3(rgyud): du rigs kyi dum bu'i rgyal po chen po chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra satwa muSh+Ti sa ra
318b4(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung bas de bzhin gsheg sa pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshe dgas pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs
318b5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dum bu'i rgyal po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di 'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir de bzhin ga gas pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di smras pa/ oM
318b6(rgyud): badz+ra rat+na muSh+Ti traM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas/ de bzhin
318b7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dum bu'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra d+harma
318b8(rgyud): muSh+Ti khaM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas de bzhin
319a1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dum bu'i rgyal po'i cho ga rgyas pa'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra
319a2(rgyud): karma muSh+Ti haM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje rang gi byin gyis brlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas/ de bzhin
319a3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dum bu'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir rdo rje'i dngos grub ces bya ba'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// de na
319a4(rgyud): rab tu bshad bya ba// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// rdo rje dngos grub ces kyang grags// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// mkhas pas rab tu bri
319a5(rgyud): bar bya// thog mar sangs rgyas gzugs bzhag ste// de na/ sa phyag rgya bzhi yang bri// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbusu ni// rdo rje'i phyag rgya la sogs bri// da nA rdo rje'i dngos grub kyi phyag
319a6(rgyud): rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas de bzhin du btsud de 'di skad smra bar bya'o// khyod kyi gsang ba'i le'u 'di su la yang ma bstan cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ log par
319a7(rgyud): lta ba dang / sdig pa'i las byed pa'i sems can rnams kyang yod do// brtson 'grus chung ba dang / sbyor ba med pa dang / ri mo mi shes pa de dag rdo rje 'byings la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa
319a8(rgyud): thams cad kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po rnam su brtson 'grus chung bas mi 'jug ste/ de dag gidon du rdo rje dngos grub kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs
319b1(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig du gyur pa 'di ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams rnams yongasu bskyab pa dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad myong bar bya ba nas
319b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam pa'i dngos grub kyi bar du byin gyis brlab so// khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya gsang ba 'di rnams la yid
319b3(rgyud): mi ches shing ma dad par ma byed cig/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song dang / yi dgas kyi kham su ltung bar gyur pa 'am/ mi bde ba ma spangs pas dus ma yin par shi bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo/ 
319b4(rgyud): la gdong g.yogs bkrol te dkyil 'khor bstan to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig smos shig/ bdag nyid chen po gang gang gi/ phyag rgya gang dang / 
319b5(rgyud): gang bcings pa// bzlas pa'i snying po'i don tu ni// der ni ba/ dag nyid bsgom par bya// ye shes 'di yi tshul gyis ni// phya ga na rdo rjes gsung ba bzhin// bdag nyid chen po'i phyag rgya kun
319b6(rgyud): de dag kun gyis grub par 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi gsang ba brjod par bya'o// rang gi dbang po gshibs nas ni// rdo rje bcings pas bzung bar bya// de yis phyag rgya gang reg pa/ 
319b7(rgyud): de ma thag tu de dbang bskur// de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi chos nyid brjod par bya'o// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar la// ye shes phyag rgya bcing bar bya// cho ga 'di yi tshul gyis ni// ye shes phyag rgya
319b8(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya kun gyi las brjod par bya'o// glu dang gar dang zas dang bro// spyod pa la sogs bde ba rnams// sangs rgyas rnams la phul na ni// las kyi phyag rgya dbang du 'gyur
320a1(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub pa'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// mtshan ma brtan par ra'agyur nas// dkar por gyur pa'i ras la gnas// mtshan
320a2(rgyud): ma mchod rten byin rlabs te// bdag nyid rdo rje dbyingasu sgom// rdo rje bcings pa dam byas te// gung mo myu gu bzhin du gshig/ mthe'u chung dang ni mdzub rtse sgreng // dam tshig mchog gi dam tshig go/ 
320a3(rgyud): rdo rje phra mo'i tshul du ni// rab tu mnyam par gzhag pas sgom// rdo rje phra mo'i dkyil 'khor de// ting 'dzin dbang du 'gyur ba'i tshul// rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings la// de gnyis rdo rje dam du gzung / 
320a4(rgyud): mdzub mo'i mthe'u chung bsnol ba ni// rdo rje dgos mchog dkyil 'khor lo// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcing ba bzhi ji lta ba bzhin du rlabs nas rdo rje dbyings
320a5(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o// rdo rje'i dngos grub kyi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du mi g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i dkyil
320a6(rgyud): 'khor thams cad phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du rang rang gi phyag rgya rnamasu bris na dngos grub thams cad kyang 'grub bo// de ltar ras dang / rtsig pa dang / na mkha' dang / gnas thams cad
320a7(rgyud): du bris na dngos grub thams cad 'gru'o// dkyil 'khor brtag pa nas brtsams te la la ni dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa nyid kyi tshe ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'grub/ la la ni de nas brtsams nas nyin zhag
320a8(rgyud): gcig gis/ la la ni nyi ma bzhis/ la la ni zhag bcu drug gis/ la la ni mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang ji ltar 'dod pa bde blag tu don thams cad byed cing thams cad rjesu dga' ba dang / ro
320b1(rgyud): dang / zas dang / spyod pa thams cad kyi bde ba rnams myong bar byed bzhin du yang lo gcig gis mchog 'gru'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungaso// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
320b2(rgyud): mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa da ga zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs
320b3(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra satwa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes sems can
320b4(rgyud): gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongasu bskyab pa dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub
320b5(rgyud): dam pa 'grub par bya ba'i bar du theg pa chen po mngon par rtog/ sa pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// de nas rab tu ba shad bya ba// sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyi
320b6(rgyud): dang 'dra bas na// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes kyang bshad// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor phyi rim thig gdab bo// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbusu ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bzhag pa
320b7(rgyud): bya/ de nas dgug pa dang / gzhug pa la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes rnams bskyed par bya'o// de la thog mar 'di skad du
320b8(rgyud): khyod kyis dam tshig ma mthong ba dang / khong du ma chud pa su la yang gsang ba 'di ma smra shig/ khyod ngan song thams cad du ltung ba 'am/ mi bde ba ma spangs pas dus ma yin par shi bar gyur/ 
321a1(rgyud): re zhes bsgo bar bya'o// de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub dam pa sgrub pa'i ye shes bslab bo// zla rgyas dkyil 'khor la 'dug ste// phyag rgya chen po yongs bzung
321a2(rgyud): bas// bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar ni// bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i dam tshig ye shes bsla'o// 'dod chags bral ba'i sdig lnga
321a3(rgyud): bu/ khams gsum na yang gzhan med de// de bas 'dod la chags bral bar// khyod ni nam yang ma byed cig/ ma hA sa ma ya ha na phaT ces mna'i snying po sbyin no// de ltar de bzhin gshegs/
