321a4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rnamasu dam tshig gi sdom pa sbyin par bya'o// de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bzhi bcing ba bslab par bya'o// 
321a5(rgyud): dngos grub kyang de bzhin no// ri mo la sogs pa dang / lugs ma'i sku gzugs thams cad la yang ji ltar/ 'dod pa'i cho ga bzhin du byas na dngos grub thams cad de bzhin
321a6(rgyud): du 'grub par 'gyuraro// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas par bya ba ji lta ba bzhin du yang bya'o// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang gcig tu 'dus nas bcom
321a7(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtso bo byang chub sems dpa' chen po sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje chen po la rdo rje dgyes pa'i snying po 'dis legs par gsol to// oM legs so/ 
321a8(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' khyod// rdo rje rin chen khyod leg so// rdo rje chos khyod legs pa ste// rdo rje las ni khyod legaso// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // theg pa chen po
321b1(rgyud): mngon bsdus pa'i// mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad// rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan gyis kyang // dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur// dag par byas nas bsgrubs na ni// sangs rgyas nyid kyang bde
321b2(rgyud): bar 'grub// rdo rje chos kyi sbyor bas ni// 'dod pa kun gyi bde bas bde// tshe 'di nyid kyis 'grub pas na// bde ba mi zad med mi 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus
321b3(rgyud): pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba rdzogaso// // bam po bzhi pa// de nas yang bcom ldan 'dra
321b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang gcig tu 'dus par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nga bdag po 'khor lo chen po bskor ba la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa
321b5(rgyud): 'dis gsol ba btab bo// rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje che// rdo rje ma gon po rab bsgrub mdzad// rdo rje dbang bskur rdo rje'i da// rdo rje dpal khyod phyag 'tshalo// rdo rje bzhad pa chos chen
321b6(rgyud): po/ rdo rje ral gri mchog chen po'i// dkyil 'khor kun gyi rgyal po mchog/ spros med khyod la phyag 'tshalo// rdo rje las dang srung ba che// gnod sbyin gtum pa gdon chen po// rdo rje khu tshur
321b7(rgyud): phyag rgya che// phyag rgya kun la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dang byang chub che// sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje'i ye shes ye shes che// theg chen khyod la phyag 'tshalo// 
321b8(rgyud): don kun gyi ni de nyid don// sems can don chen kun rig pa// kun mkhyen kun byas thams cad de/ kun gzigs khyod la phyag 'tshalo// rdo rje bdag rab rdo rje mchog/ rdo rje brtson rab rdo rje 'chang
322a1(rgyud): dam tshig chen po de nyid don// sems chen khyod la phyag 'tshalo// rdo rje lcags kyu 'dod pa che// rab tu dga' ba 'od chen po// rdo rje 'od dang 'od snang ba// sangs rgyas
322a2(rgyud): 'od la phyag 'tshalo// rdo rje rgyal mchog rdo rje mchog/ rig mchog mchog dang mi yi mchog/ rdo rje dam pa mchod chen mchog/ rig mchog khyod la phyag 'tshalo// rdo rje dbyings dang gsang ba che// 
322a3(rgyud): rdo rje gsang ba rab gsang 'chang // rdo rje phra ba bsam gtan che// rdo rje dgos la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas mchog sangs rdo rje mchog/ sangs rgyas byang chub mkhas pa che// sangs rgyas ye
322a4(rgyud): shes sangs rgyas che// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas khyod phyag 'tsha la// sangs rgyas mchod pa mchod pa che// sems dpa' mchod pa rab mchod pa// thabs chen dang ni dngos grub
322a5(rgyud): che/ rdo rje sgrub khyod phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dbyangs te// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems chen po rdo rje rdo rje phyag
322a6(rgyud): 'tsha'o// sangs rgyas gtso bo rgyal bka' zhan// sangs rgyas bshes gnyen rgyal mchog skyes// rnam par snang mdzad che dang khyab// ston ni khrol phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa
322a7(rgyud): nyid che// yang dag mtha' dang che ba'i tshul// pha rol phyin pa kun mkhyen pa// don dam khyod la phyag 'tshalo// kun tu bzang dang spyod pa mchog/ bdu dang bdud ni rang 'dul ba// kun gyi
322a8(rgyud): mchog dang mnam nyid ma khyen// kun tu 'gro khyod phyag 'tsho'o// sangs rgyas rku nas sbyinas pa// rjen hUM zhes 'dul 'o// rdo rje khrims cad rdo rje mchog/ phyag ni rje rje khyod byig 'chal// 
322b1(rgyud): bya mchod cing brjed pa dang // rim gror de bzhin gshegs pas bya// gang byer rdo rje sems brtan pas// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes khyod bya// rdzogs pa'i byang chub khyod dag lus// kun gzigs pa
322b2(rgyud): ni khyod yin te// byung ba dang ni 'byung 'gyur ba'i// de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis bsgrubs// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'ang yis ni// rab tu mos pas bstod byed cing // gru blang mo gang nig mtsha
322b3(rgyud): byed ga/ de ni rdo rje 'dzin 'drar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun la mnga' mdzad pa'i// mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni// sems can kun don mdzad pa'i phyir// rang gi rigs ni skyed par mdzod// 
322b4(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtso bo phyag na rdo rjes de debazhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsol ba'i tshig tho sa nus rdo rje de dag nyid kyi steng kar bzhag ste/ de bzhin gshes
322b5(rgyud): pade dag thams cad bos nas 'di skad gsungaso// bcom ldan ngas de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'tshal to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci'i phyir
322b6(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pas smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa ma rungs pa'i sems can dag kyang mchis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang zhibs gdul bar mi spyod/ 
322b7(rgyud): pa de dag la bdag gi ji ltar sgrub par bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thabs tshon
322b8(rgyud): po'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa
323a1(rgyud): spros pa nyid kyi/ ri rab ri'i rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i khang bu brtsegs par yang gcig tu 'dus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
323a2(rgyud): kyis mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs ka'i dpal gyi be'ur zhug so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs/ 
323a3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi thugasu bdag byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje mnyam pa nyid kyis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams yongasu bskyab pa
323a4(rgyud): pa dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i dam pa thams cad 'grub pa dang / dam rungs pa thams cad gdul ba'i phyir de bzhin gshe gas pa thams cad kyi snying rje chen po'i thabs kyi ting 'dzin gyi
323a5(rgyud): ye shes la dmigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad snying rje chen po'i thabs khro bo'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya/ 'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// snyoms par zhugs ma
323a6(rgyud): thag tu de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di phyung ngo // hUM/ de nas
323a7(rgyud): dpyang ma thag tu phyag na rdo rje'i thugs ka'i rdo rje las bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ kun tu 'bar ba'i snying po khro gnyer can// smin ma bcum zhing dpral bsnyer ba// mche ba lhag gar
323a8(rgyud): zung zhing mo gtsigs pa// rdo rje dang / lcags kyu dang / ral gri dang / zhags pa la sogs pa rdo rje mo lce 'bar ba'i mtshan ma lagan rdzogs pa/ rnam paduma'i kha dog dang / rgyan sna tshogs kyi cha lugs
323b1(rgyud): can phyag na rdo rje'i sku byung nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du shin tu ma rungs pa thams cad gdul ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyogs kun tu rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen
323b2(rgyud): po'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug ste ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma thabs kyis 'dul ba yi// thabs chen ldan pa bdag yin te// gang phyir sems can 'dul thabs phyir// dri
323b3(rgyud): ma med pa'i khro gnyer rab// de nas de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spros pa med pa'i chos nyid la dmigs nas/ de bzhin
323b4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo chen po rdo rje'i dam tshig rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms paran dgas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba
323b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rig pa'i mchog 'di smra sa pa oM suM b+ha ni su b+ha ni hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+Na pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ a na ya ho/ b+ha ga bAn badz+ra hUM phaT/ de nas
323b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kha nas byung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjer gyur te/ byung nas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i sprin thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa
323b7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyis dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad byin gyis brlabs te/ spyan drangs nas rdo rje dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen por bcug ste dam tshig gis bcings nas/ yang
323b8(rgyud): gcig tu 'dres te rdo rje khro bo chen po'i lus gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs khar 'dug ste ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o byang chub sems 'di ni// kun tu bzang zhing / 
324a1(rgyud): sdig med de// gang phyir sems can 'dul don du// khro bo yang ni yid 'ong 'gyur// de nas rdo rje khro bo chen po'i sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas babs nas de bzhin gshegs/ 
324a2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te yang bka' nad cing bzhug so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gis dgug pa'i rdo rje zhes bya / 
324a3(rgyud): ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcags kyu zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs ka nas byung // hUM \u0f7f/ 
324a4(rgyud): dza/ de nas de byung ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam sprin/ rgya mtsho thams cad na/ 'jig rten gsum gyi dbang dbo dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad
324a5(rgyud): 'jig rten thams cad na gnas pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa tham/ cad kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i lcags kyus bkug nas ri rab ri
324a6(rgyud): gang na ba dang / rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i khang du brtsegs pa gang na ba der lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po
324a7(rgyud): las byas pa thams cad du bskor nas 'khod par gyur to// de nas phyag na rdo rje rang gi thugs ka nas rdo rje de blangs te gsor zhing thams cad dang ldan pa'i khams gsum ji snyed pa thams cad kyi 'jig
324a8(rgyud): rten gsum gyi 'khor lo la bltas te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa la zhugs la nga'i bka' yang nyon cig/ de nas de dag gis 'di
324b1(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// bdag cag gis ji ltar sgrub par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// skabasu 'gro ba sgrub par byos// kun mkhyen/ 
324b2(rgyud): ye shes thob pa'i phyir// grogs po rnams kyis sgrub par byos// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag po lha chen po 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag
324b3(rgyud): gyur pas dregs te cher khros par ston cing 'di skad ces smraso// kye gnod sbyin nga ni 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi gtso bo// dbang phyug chen po byed pa po/ 'jig pa po/ 'byung po thams ca
324b4(rgyud): kyi dbang po/ lha'i lha chen po yin na/ gnod sbyin khyod kyi ngag ci'i phyir nyan/ de nas yang phyag na rdo rje rdo rje gsor zhing ba/ ra' stsal pa/ kye sems can ma rungs pa dkyil 'khor du myur du/ 
324b5(rgyud): zhugs la nga'i dam tshig la gnas par gyis shig/ de nas lha na/ na pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i sems can dbang phyug chen po la
324b6(rgyud): de skad bka' stsol pa 'di su zhig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi tshogs thams cad dang ldan pa la bos te 'di skad gsungaso// grogs po rnams
324b7(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la skabasu 'gro ba dang / dam tshig dang sdom pa la sgrub par gyis shig/ phyag na rdo rje 'di gnod sbyin khro bo ma rungs pa gtum pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po ste/ rdo rje 'bar bas
324b8(rgyud): khyed khams gsum po 'odi dag thams cad brlag par byas sa re/ de nas dbang phyug chen po 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi dbang por gyur pa dang / rang gi shes pa'i dbang gis 'khor mang po dang / 
325a1(rgyud): bcas pas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la 'jigs pa bstan pa'i phyir khro zhing gtum pa chen po rab tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs 'bar ba chen po gtong zhing ma rungs pa chen pos
325a2(rgyud): rtag tu dgod pa rnams bstan nas 'di skad smras so// kyeng ni 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi bdag po bas khyod kyis nga la ci'i phyir bka' stsal/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje de snyems pa dang bcas pas
325a3(rgyud): gsor zhing 'dzum ste 'di skad ces smraso// kye lus srul po mi'i sha za ba/ zasu ro bsregs pa'i thal ba za zhing kha zas dang / ma la dang / gos kyang de las byed pa nga'i bka' bzhin du byos shig/ de nas lha
325a4(rgyud): chen po dbang phyug chen pos 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag dang / na mkha' rnams khro bo chen pos non par byin gyi sa brlabs te 'di skad ces smras so// khyod kyang nga'i bka' nyon la
325a5(rgyud): dam tshig kyang longs shig/ de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo chen po/ 'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gso la to// bcom ldan 'das lha chen po zhes bya ba'i lha 'di ni rang gis
325a6(rgyud): 'tshal ba'i stobs kyis dregs pa dang / dbang phyug chen po'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa la 'dud par mi btub na/ de la ji ltar bgyi ba'i rigs/ de nas bcom
325a7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byung ba'i rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig dran par byaso// oM suM b+hA badz+ra hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' che
325a8(rgyud): po phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje snying po 'di brjod do// hUM de nas de brjod ma thag tu khams gsum pa thams cad nas 'dus pa'i lha chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum po'i dbang po thams cad kha bub
325b1(rgyud): tu 'gyel te/ nyam thag pa'i tshig 'byin cing bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la skyabasu dong ngo // lha chen po zhes bya ba'i lha de ni sa la 'gyel te dran pa med par gyur te shi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
325b2(rgyud): mkhyen bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la de skad ces bka' stsal to// phyag na rdo rje 'jig rten gsum po'i 'khor lo 'di thams cad la skyabs sbyin pa byos te ma bsad cig/ de nas phyag na
325b3(rgyud): rdo rje khro bo chen po'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa thos nas lha thams cad bos te 'di skad ces gsungaso// gal te khyod rang gi srog 'dod na sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun
325b4(rgyud): la skyabasu dong la nga'i bka' yang nyon cig/ de nas de dag gis/ 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun phyag rgya'i tshogs dang bcas pa la skyab su mchi'o
325b5(rgyud): khyod kyi bstan pa'i bka' ni bdag cag gis ma 'tshal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin pa/ shegs pas de dag bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye lha
325b6(rgyud): rnams 'di ni nged de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin du byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams/ 
325b7(rgyud): cad kyi sras kyi thub bo bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po ste/ sems can thams cad gdul ba'i don bya ba'i phyir khro bo'i rgyal po chen por dbang bskur ba na
325b8(rgyud): khyod kyi nang na yang lha chen po la sogs pa ma rungs pa'i sems can yod de/ de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang zhi bar mdzad pas sdig pa las bzlog par mi spyod pa'i sdig pa'i sems
326a1(rgyud): can de rnams tshar bcad pa'i phyir byin gyis brlabs so// de bas na khyed rnams 'di'i dam tshig la gnas par byos shig par bka' stsal to// de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol
326a2(rgyud): to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag srog yal ba la bskyab tu gsol/ bdag cag kyang bka' stsal pa bzhin du bgyid cing mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye grogaso po rnams 'di nyid
326a3(rgyud): la skyabasu dong dang / de nyid kyis kun tu skyob kyis gzhan gyis ni ma yin no// de nas khams gsum kun nas 'dus pa srid pa gsum gyi bdag po de rnams bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de dag ga la ba
326a4(rgyud): de lagasu bltas nas nyam thag pa chen po'i sgra mgrin gcig tu dbyung nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das la chi ba'i sdug bsngal 'di las kun tu bsgrub par gsol/ bde/ 
326a5(rgyud): gshegs pa kun tu bskyab par gsol/ de nas byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje lha la sogs pa de rnams bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye ma rungs pa rnam
326a6(rgyud): nga'i bstan pa la zhugs shig/ rdo rje 'bar ba 'dis gcig tu 'bar bar byas nas khyed thams cad kyang thal bar byas sa re/ de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kun tu bza
326a7(rgyud): po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems bskyed pa/ zhi ba/ dul ba/ sems can thams cad la phan par bzhed pa/ sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa stsol ba lags na/ ci'i slad du bcom ldan/ 
326a8(rgyud): 'das kyis bdag cag sreg par 'gyur/ de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye grogs pa dag gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bka' bani/ 
326b1(rgyud): du byed pa de'i phyir nga ni kun tu bzang po ste/ khyed lta bu'i sems can ma rungs pa'i ngang tshul can sdig pa'i sems rnam par sbyang ba'i phyir gal te nga'i dam tshig la mi gnas na chud gzan par bya'o// gsol pa/ 
326b2(rgyud): de bzhin du bgyi'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos dbang phyug chen po ma gtogs pa'i lha de dag gzhan dbugs dbyung zhing bslang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rdo rje
326b3(rgyud): bslang ba zhes bya ba 'di smraso// oM badz+red tiSh+Tha/ de nas de skad smras ma thag tu dbang phyug chen po ma gtogs par khams gsum pa 'dus pa srid pa gsum gyi bdag po 'dor dang bcas pa de dag thams
326b4(rgyud): cad kun brgyal ba las sems dbugs byung ste/ lha'i bde ba mo nga zhing 'jigs shing bag tsha ba dang / ba spu langs pa med pa ra gyur nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la lta zhing langaso// de na
326b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la ba/ 'astsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po lnga'i dbang po lnga chen po/ 'di ma bslang na/ 'di sreg de chud gzan par gyur te ci rung
326b6(rgyud): gsos na ni de yang skyes bu dam par 'gyur ro// de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin du bya'o snyam nas shi ba gso ba'i snying po 'di smraso// badz+ra yuHde nas 'di smras ma thag tu lha chen po lha'i bdag po shi ba las
326b7(rgyud): sos te ldang 'dod na ldang ni ma nuso// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'di lta bus 'dul lam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod skyes bu
326b8(rgyud): chen po 'di'i bka' nyan par mi 'jug na khyod la 'dul ba 'di nyid yin gyi nga ma yino// dbang phyug chen pos gsol pa/ ci bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis ma rungs pa'i sems can 'di las skyabs mdzad pa/ 
327a1(rgyud): mi spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas 'di bskyab mi nuso// gsol pa/ ci'i slad du/ bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po yin/ 
327a2(rgyud): pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis ma 'tshal to// ji lta zhe na/ khams gsum gyi bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las gzhan pa
327a3(rgyud): bdag po mchis par ma 'tshal na 'di su lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes yang lha chen po la bos te 'di skad ces gsungaso// kye ma rungs pa
327a4(rgyud): sems can nga'i bka' mi nyan tam/ de nas lha chen pos rdo rje sems dpa' tshig thos nas 'khrugs shing khros par gyur to// de ltar 'gyel bzhin du yang 'jigs pa chen po'i gzugs
327a5(rgyud): bstan te/ 'di skad ces smraso// nga shi bar bzod kyi khyod kyi nga ga mi nyan to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje rab tu khros par ston cing rang gi rkang pa'i mthil nas rdo/ 
327a6(rgyud): rje'i rjesu spyod pa 'di phyung ngo // oM pa ta ka ri Sha na badz+ra hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthil nas kun tu 'bar ba'i rdo rje'i snying po khro gnyer byas pa/ mche ba lhag ger phyung ba gdong chen po
327a7(rgyud): rdo rje'i rjesu spyod pa byung nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar bka' nyan cing 'dug par gyur to// de nas phyag na rdo rjes dbang phyug chen po sbyang ba'i phyir 'di skad ces gsungaso// oM pa ta ka ri la
327a8(rgyud): Na badz+ra hUM oM pa ta ka ri Sha/ sarba badz+ra d+ha ra a nu tsa ra ka ta badz+ra hU dza/ de skad gsungs pa dang / lha chen po dang / lha mo u mar bcas te rkang pa gyen khar bstan nas gcer bur byung ste/ skye bo thams
327b1(rgyud): cad kyis gad mos btab cing rkang pas 'gugs pa rdo rje rje su spyod pas bkug ste/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i spyan snga zhabs kyi drung du bzhag go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag
327b2(rgyud): na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can ma rungs pa mchis brang dang bcas pa 'di ji ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ oM badz+ra kra ma ho// 
327b3(rgyud): de nas de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes lha chen po zhabs g.yon pas mnan/ zhabs g.yas pas u ma'i nu ma'i steng du mnan nas rang gi snying
327b4(rgyud): po 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra A be sha ha na pa taM traT/ de nas de smras ma thag tu lha chen po la babs nas rang gi lag pa stong gis rang gi gdong stong la 'chog go/ de nas rdo rje'i nor bu rin po che'i rtse mo rdo rje
327b5(rgyud): dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa'i phyi rol na srid pa gsum po thams cad kyi nged kyi dbang po de/ bdag nyid chen po des btulo zhes sgra chen po phyung ngo // de nas
327b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis lha chen po la thugs rje chen po bskyed de/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byams pa'i snying po 'di gsungaso// oM bud+d+ha me tri badz+ra rak+Sha haM/ de nas de skad gsungs ma thag tu lha chen po la
327b7(rgyud): babs pa'i sdug bsngal de kun zhi bar gyur te/ de yang phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyi mthil gyis reg pas bde ba bla na med pa 'grub pa'i dbang dang / ting 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa dang / gzungs dang / ye
327b8(rgyud): shes dang / mngon par shes pa thob nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'grub pa'i bar du gyur to// de nas lha chen po bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs mthil gyis reg pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
328a1(rgyud): cang kyo ting 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / rnam par thar pa'i bde ba myong ste/ lha chen po'i lus phyagan rdo rje'i zhabs la phul nas 'og gi 'jig rten gyi khams pang+gA krung sum cu cu gci/ 
328a2(rgyud): kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na thal bas khebs pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der thal ba'i dbang po'i dbyangs zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs
328a3(rgyud): par skyeso// de nas lnga chen po'i lus de las ched du brjod pa 'di byung ngo // e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med// yi ge'i tshig gis mnan nas su// mya ngan las ni 'das par
328a4(rgyud): bzhag/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phywa/ na rdo rjes de las gzhan pa mthu chen po la sogs pa 'dzi/ rten gsum gyi bdag po thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal / 
328a5(rgyud): grogs po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bru~M NA~M dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs shig/ zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchig stsa
328a6(rgyud): shig/ de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin du bgyi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes srid pa gsum 'dus pa de rnams bos te 'odi
328a7(rgyud): skad ces gsungs so// grog po rnams yang gsum la skyabasu 'dong ba dang / bslab pa dang / dam tshig dang / sdom pa bzung la nga'i dam tshig la yang gnas par gyis shig/ de dag gis gsol pa/ de/ 
328a8(rgyud): bzhin du 'tshal na/ bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' dam tshig glo bar ma chud do// de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi dam tshig 'di byin no// byang chub sems ni rims bzhin du// bskyed nas de
328b1(rgyud): yi 'og tu ni// byang chub chen por ci nus par// shin tu mnyam gzhaga'ab pa bya/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes lha la sogs pa de rnams 'jug pa'i dam tshig chen pos
328b2(rgyud): phyag rgya bcing ba byas nas dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya'i snying po 'dis 'ching du gzhug/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya gr-ih+Na staM ban d+ha sa ma ya/ badz+ra satwa sa ma yaM/ a nu sma ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dri D+ho me b+ha ba/ 
328b3(rgyud): s+thi ro me b+ha ba/ A hA d+yo me b+ha ba/ a pra ti hA rau me b+ha ba/ sarba karma su tsa me tsit+taM shre yaHku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha hoHde nas 'di smras ma thag tu khams gsum gyi srid pa gsum gyi skye bo 'dus pa thams cad rdo rje
328b4(rgyud): khro bo tI rin ti ri'i phyag rgya lag tu babs nas dam du 'ching bar gyur to// de nas phyag na rdo rjes tshul bzhin du btsud nas dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad go rims bzhin du bstan te rdo rje
328b5(rgyud): rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur nas rdo rje mtshan ma' nga lag tu byin nas rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas dpa bskur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems can gyi/ 
328b6(rgyud): la bkod do// de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po thams cad kyi ming rnams yin te/ 'di lta ste/ dbang phyug chen po ni khro bo'i rdo rje'o// mthu bo che ni sgyu ma'i rdo rje'o// sgra gzhon nu ni rdo rje dril bu'o// 
328b7(rgyud): tshangs pa ni thub pa'i rdo rje'o// dbang po ni rdo rje mtshon cha ste/ rig pa'i rgyal po rnamasu dbang bskuro// de nas bar snang la spyod pa'i bdag po rnams la rje su byin pa ni 'di lta ste/ nyi ma ni rdo rje 'khyil pa'o// 
328b8(rgyud): zla ba ni rdo rje 'od do// dbyig pa chen po'i gtso bo ni dbyig pa'o// ser mug ni rdo rje ser smug ste/ de la sogs rdo rje khro bo zhes bya bar dbang bskur ro// de nas na mkha' la spyod pa'i lha'i dbang po thams cad
329a1(rgyud): la byin pa 'das ste/ sbrang rtsis myos pan rdzi glang po'i sdu'o// snang rtsir dbyed pa ni ji rje phreng ba'o// rgyal ban rdo rje dbang po'o// rtul bar byed pa ni rnam par rgyal ba 'dzirje ste/ des
329a2(rgyud): sogs pa ni tshogs kyi gtso bo zhes bya bar dbang bskuro// de nas sa bla'i dbang po thams cad la byin pa 'di lnga ste/ mdzod skyong ni rdo rje tho ba'o// me ni rdo rje me'o// rlung ni rdo rje rlung ngo // ku ber ni rdo rje 'jigs
329a3(rgyud): pa'o// de la sogs pa ni rdo rje pon dbang bskuraro// de nas sa 'og gi dbang po lha thams cad la byin pa 'di sa ste/ ngag ni rdo rje lugs kyu'o// gshin rjen rdo rje dus// gtsug bungs ni rdo rje bgegs
329a4(rgyud): gtso bo'o// ba ru Na ni klu'i rdo rje ste/ de la sogs pa ni rdo rje bran zhes bya ba'i dbang bskur// de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi dbadag po'i lha mo thams cad rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bas/ 
329a5(rgyud): dbang bskur te/ rang gi mtshan ma la rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te/ de zhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems can gyi don la rab tu
329a6(rgyud): bkod do// 'di lta ste/ u ma ni khro bo rdo rje ma'o// rug mi n+ye ni rdo rje gser ro// ShaT ni rdo rje gzhon nu ma'o// tshangs ma ni rdo rje zhi ba ma'o// dbang mo ni rdo rje khu tshur te/ de la sogs pa ni rdo rje rgyal mo
329a7(rgyud): dbang bskuraro// bar snang la spyod pa'i bud med thams cad la byin pa ni 'di lta ste/ mi 'chi ba ni rdo rje mi 'chi ba'o// ro hi na ni rdo rje mdangaso// dbyig pa 'dzin ma ni rdo rje dbyig mchog ma'o// skyeb
329a8(rgyud): 'phrog ma ni rdo rje sked 'ching ma ste/ de la sogs pa ni khro mo zhes bya bar dbang bskuraro// de nas na mkha' la spyod pa'i bud med thams cad la byin pa 'di lta ste/ gsod ma ni rdo rje 'ju ma'o// za ba ni rdo rjeH
329b1(rgyud): ba mo'o// bgo ba ni rdo rje bgob mo'o// dga' ba ni rdo rje dbang ngo // de la sogs pa ni tshogs kyi gtso mor dbang bskuro// de nas sa la spyod pa'i bud med thams cad la byin pa 'di lta ste/ zhib mo ni rdo rje po
329b2(rgyud): ma'o// rlung ni 'gyogs ma'i rdo rje ma'o// me ni rdo rje 'bar ba ma'o// ku ber ma ni rdo rje 'bar ma ste/ de la sogs pa ni rdo rje pho nya mor dbang bsku ro// de nas sa 'og na gnas pa'i bud med thams cad la byin
329b3(rgyud): pa ni 'di lta ste/ bag mon rdo rje'i kha'o// tsa mun trini rdo rje duso// sna tshad mni rdo rje rul ba mor// ba ru na ma ni rdo rje chu srin ma ste/ rdo rje bran mor dbang bskuro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag
329b4(rgyud): nardo rjes zhugs pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rnams pa skyed nas phyag rgya bcings pa thams cad bslabs te/ rdo rje dam tshig mna'i snying po 'di byin// rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje che/ 
329b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs// dam tshig 'di las 'das na ni// rigs rnams myur du thal bar byed// oMH sa ma ya hU~M phaT/ de nas snying po gzung bar bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di
329b6(rgyud): byin no// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te// mdzub mo lcags kyur bcings nas ni// gcu zhing phyir yang gcu par bya// dgos pa'i don sems gang yin pa// de yi mdun du khyed rnams ni// dgos pa 'gru
329b7(rgyud): phyir 'dug par byos// khyod kyi srog ni ma rungs par// dam tshig 'dis ni gyur ta re// rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te// mdzub mo 'gugs nas rab tu mnan// mthe bor gnyis ka mtshams sbyor bas// gu
329b8(rgyud): mo gnyis ka rab tu mnan// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa yi// dam tshig phyag rgya bcings pa las// gal te 'ga' yis bcings gyur na// dam tshig 'dis ni khyed gsod do// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis g.yas// mthe
330a1(rgyud): chung sor mo bcings nas ni// mdzub mo sor rgyub nas ni mdung // ldog sde mgo bor bzhag par bya// bdag nyid che ba'i dam tshig 'di// rdo rje rig 'dzin bcings nas ni// khros te
330a2(rgyud): gang la bltas pa yi// de yi mdun du de bzhin 'dug/ rdo rje bsdams pa'i rdo rje yi// srung ba dam bcings mnan pa ni// de ni gsang ba'i dam tshig ste// sems can thams cad srung ba'o// gang zhig gang la
330a3(rgyud): bskyab pa'i phyir// khro bor ldan pas bcings na ni// sems can gang la srung ba yi// de yi rgyab tu 'dug par byos// rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings te// g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo la// mthe'u chung gi
330a4(rgyud): ni bsdam byas// gcu zhing slar gcu drag bkrol nas// spyi bo mnyam zhugs gang yin pa'i// dam tshig 'di yang sbyar byas na// / khyed kyis de yi mdun du ni// dngos grub kun gyi mchog phyir
330a5(rgyud): 'khod// rdo rje bcing ba sbrel ba ni// mdzub mo gnyis ka dam bor bya// mthe bo gung mo'i rtse mo gnyis// rdo rje'i phyag rgyarab cings nas kyang // bzlog ste dpral bar bzhag par bya// gal
330a6(rgyud): te gsod par 'dod na ni// dgug par bya ba gang yin pa// de yi mdun du rtag tu 'dug/ de nas 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi snying po 'dzin pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dam tshig 'dzin pa'i snying po 'di yin te/ 
330a7(rgyud): oM ba li tong ba li ta badz+ra A kaR+Sha ya hUM dzaHdza/ rdo rje gcu pa'i phyag rgya lha dgug pa'i snying po'o// hUM badz+ra a gra de pa ya sa ma ye hUM/ bar snang nas spyod pa rnams kyi'o// oM badz+ra mA la a gra baM/ phreng ba can rnams
330a8(rgyud): kyi'o// oM badz+ra bar+b+ha haM/ sa la spyod pa rnams kyi'o// oM badz+ra pA tA la b+han+da b+han+da hU~M phaT/ sa'i 'og na gnas pa rnams kyi'o// oM he ru ka badz+ra sa ma ya sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya su dra bA k+Shaka hU phaT/ bud med thams cad
330b1(rgyud): kyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ma rungs pa 'dul ba por dbang bskur na/ bcings
330b2(rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor ma rungs pa de dag thams cad ji ltar sgrub par bgyi ba legs par bka' stsal par gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsan nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// oM badz+ra suM b+ha ni
330b3(rgyud): suM b+ha hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes sems can thams cad bskyab pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor thams cad 'gugs pa'i snying po 'di gsungaso// oM badz+ra sa ma ya A
330b4(rgyud): kaR+Sha ya sarba maN+Da lam badz+ra d+ha ra sa t+ya mA ti kra ma hUM phaT/ rdo rje lcags kyu gnyis bcings te// snying khar yongasu bskor bar bya// ma dzub gnyis lcags kyus phyi rol gyi// dkyil 'khor 'gug pa
330b5(rgyud): mchog yin no// de nas 'di bshad ma thag tu dkyil 'khor tha mas cad ri rab ci'i rtse mo'i phyi rol kun tu bskor te 'khod do// / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes dkyil 'khor 'dus pa de
330b6(rgyud): dag thams cad la bos te 'di skad ces gsung so// kye grogs po dag srog gcod pa dag spang zhing dam tshig gzung ba la sgrub par gyis shig/ de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyis dam tshig gi sems can de
330b7(rgyud): rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag sha 'tshal ba ma rungs pa'i sems can lags pas mdangs 'phrog pa la srog ltos na/ bcom ldan 'das
330b8(rgyud): bdag cag ji ltar 'che bar bgyi bde bka' stsal cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes ma rus pa'i jirje khra ba 'ad gsung so// e shwa 'adz+ra kri d+ha dang
331a1(rgyud): btsa bi d+hA nas ya bi ka ra sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya mu dra ma t+pa la/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ mar dmarang / khAng khAng / par man+ta badz+ra sa ma ya hU~M phaT/ rdo rje khro mdzub legs par ni// sen mo smang de dkris
331a2(rgyud): nas kyang // rtse mo gnyis ni dam sbyar ba// phyag rgya 'di ni ma rungs 'jims// de nas 'di smras ma thag tu ma rungs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di thams cad gcig tu 'dus pa rnam padu mas gtse zhing dbral ba dang / das
331a3(rgyud): tshig gi phyag bcings pa yang dral te/ ma rungs pa'i dam tshig gi sems can de rnams yang bsregs shin tu bcos pas 'o dod cher 'bod cing phongs pa'i sgra cher phyung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa
331a4(rgyud): chen po ga la ba der thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces gsol to// dbacom ldan 'das bdag cag srog dang mi dpral bar skyabs ma dzad du gsol/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes yang bcom ldan 'das la
331a5(rgyud): 'di skad ces to// bcom ldan 'das ma rungs pa'i dkyil 'khri rade rnams ji ltar bgyi ba bdag la stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ oM na su b+ha ha na ha pa
331a6(rgyud): tsa gr-ih+Na ban+d+ha hU~M phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje khro bo mi bzang pa 'di gsungaso// oM mahA badz+ra khu ra kro d+ha pa ta ye sarba duSh+Ta laM/ bi nA sha ya sarba duSh+Ta sa ma yaM b+hik+ki ra bi d+ha na sa ya s+pho Ta ya b+haH/ 
331a7(rgyud): sarbaduSh+Ta sa ma ya mu dra ban+d+ha gr-ih+Na ha na da ha pa tsa sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya satwa badz+ra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ de nas gsungs ma thag tu ma rungs pa'i dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang gcig tu gyur nas/ 
331a8(rgyud): rgya mtsho chen por ltung // de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la ma rungs pa thams cad thul cig ces
331b1(rgyud): bka' stsal na/ 'phra men ma dang gdon la sogs pa gnod pa de dag thams cad la bdag gis ji ltar bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// oM ha na ha na badz+ra hUM phaT/ de nas byang
331b2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes yang 'phra men ma la sogs pa gdon ma rungs pa thams cad 'gugs pa'i snying po 'di gsungaso// oM badz+ra A kaR+Sha ya shrI g+h+raM sarba duSh+Ta gra ha/ badz+ra d+ha ra sa twen tu
331b3(rgyud): dzad nas de smras ma thag tu 'phro men ma la sogs pa gdon ma rungs pa thams cad ri 'i pa ma phyi rol bskor te 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes 'phra min ma la sogs pa gdon ma rungs
331b4(rgyud): pa thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces gsung so// kye bzod lnga ngan rnams srog gcod pa spang ba'i bslab pa dang / dam tshig dang /  sdom pa gzung bar byos shig/ rdo rje 'od 'phro ba dang rab tu 'ab
331b5(rgyud): bdang gcig pu 'bar bar gyur pas khyod kyi rig sasal lus par/ bsregs sa re/ de nas 'phra men ma la sogs pa'i gdon ma rungs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der thal mo sbyar
331b6(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag sha 'tshal ba na ji ltar bgyi ba bka' stsol cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
331b7(rgyud): to// phyag na rdo rje sems can 'di dag rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed la thabs sbyin pa sgrub par gyis shig/ de nas phyag na rdo rje'i thugs rje chen pos sems can thams cad 'chi ba'i mtshan ma shes pa'i ye she
331b8(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya dang snying po 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra pra ti gr-ih+Na hr-i da ya mA kaR+Sha ya/ yang t+ya yaM ma to mA ma d+ha ra d+he na mi ya ti/ tad+ya s+ya hr-i da ya ni skra mi du sa ma ya hUM dzaH/ de nas de'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do// snying ka
332a1(rgyud): rdo rje la gang gnyis// shin tu dam bor bcings nas ni// rdo rje mdzub mo'i rtse mo yis// rang gi mtshan khung brud par bya// khyed rnams kyis phyag rgya 'dis sems can thams cad kyi
332a2(rgyud): snying rus la zo shig/ de nas 'phra men ma la sogs pa ma rungs pa'i gdon thams cad dga' ba'i sgra phyung nas mchod rgal te rang gi gnasu dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das
332a3(rgyud): la yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ma rungs pa 'dul ba lags par bdag la bka' stsal na/ da bcom ldan 'das rims la sogs pa'i nad de rnams
332a4(rgyud): la ji ltar bgyi/ bdag la bka' stsol cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ oM hU~M phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rims la sogs pa'i nang
332a5(rgyud): dgug pa'i phyag rgya 'di gsungs pa/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya/ an ya sarba duSh+TA dz+war d+hi nA sha ya hU phaT/ de nas 'di gsungs ma ga tu rims la sogs pa'i nad thams cad ri rab ri'i rtse mo
332a6(rgyud): phyi rol tu bskor te 'khod do// de nas phyag na rdo rjes rims la sogs pa'i nad 'di rnams le bos te/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye bzod ldan rnams sems can gsod pa las ldog pa'i bslab pa
332a7(rgyud): gzung ba'i sdom pa long shig/ de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni sems can gyi mdangs phrogs te 'tsho bar bgyid na/ da bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ji ltar bgyi/ legs par
332a8(rgyud): bka' stsol cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi las rnam par dag par gyur pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i snying po di gsung so// e badz+ra kar+m+ma bi sho d+ha ya sarba A ba ra NA ni bud+d+has
332b1(rgyud): nas ma ya hUM/ de nas phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do// rdo rje thal mo dam sbyar te/ mdzub mo gnyis ka bkug nas kyang // mthe bong mnyams te sbyar nas ni// mnan pa 'di ni sdig 'phrog pa// phyag rgya 'di rims la
332b2(rgyud): sogs pa'i nad thams cad kyi gang btab pa la las byas la bstan na de khyed rnams kyis thong shig/ khyed bdag srog dang bral la re// de nas de rnams de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol to slar dong ngo // de nas byang chub
332b3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag sgrub pa thams cad bsal ba dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyang bas
332b4(rgyud): slaspang du nyid kyi thugs ka nas phyung na de la bcom ldan 'das sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song de rnams thams cad ji ltar bgyi ba ba dag la bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
332b5(rgyud): pa/ oM k+Sha pa ya badz+ra swA hU// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen kho phyag na rdo rjes du 'bod la sogs pa ngan song gi 'gro ba'i 'a/ khor lo thams cad dgug pa'i snying po 'di gsung so// oM
332b6(rgyud): sarba a pa ya A kaR+Sha Ni be sho d+ha na badz+ra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ de nas 'od gsungs ma thag tu ngu 'bod chen po la sogs pa ngan song na gnas pa rnams ri rab kyi ri'i rtse mo'i phyi rol tu bskor te 'khod do// de nas byang
332b7(rgyud): chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes ngan song gi sar ltung ba'i sems can de dag thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye bzod ldan rnams dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu 'gro ba dang / dam
332b8(rgyud): tshig dang / sdom pa dang / ngan song thams cad las thar pa'i phyag rgya dang snying po zung shig/ de nas de dag gis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag sdug bsngal bgyis gzig
333a1(rgyud): pa'adi las bskyab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / khyod la skyab su mchi'o// de nas phyag na rdo rjes ngan song thams cad
333a2(rgyud): 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungaso// oM badz+ra pA Ni bi s+pho Ta ya sarba a pa ya ban+d+ha na ni pra mo kA ya/ sarbA pA ya ga ti b+h+yaHsarba satwa sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra sa ma ya traT/ de nas de'i phyag rgya bcings pa ba sha// 
333a3(rgyud): rdo rje bcing ba dam bcas te// gung mo gnyis ka sbyar nas su// tha ma bzhi ni rtse mo sbyar// sdig pa 'joms par grags pa yin/ de nas ngan song gsum gyi 'khor lo na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad phyag
333a4(rgyud): na rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'di mthong nas ngan song thams cad nas shi 'phos nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhabs drung du skye so// ngan song de rnams kyang rgya mtsho chen por bor ro// den
333a5(rgyud): yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sem/ sa can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i skyabs dang / phan pa/ 
333a6(rgyud): dang / bde ba thams cad myong bar bgyi ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi grub pa dam pa'i 'bras bu'i thob par bya ba'i bar du 'tshol cig par bdag la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshe/ 
333a7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi grub pa'i rdo rje stsal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal na/ mi 'di rnams ji ltar bgyi ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsol cig/ de bzhin
333a8(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyang gcig tu 'dus nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// oM badz+ra pA Ni ma hA maN+Dal pra be sha ya sarba duSh+Ta ro tran+ni ba ra ya pra be bya pra mo sha ya trur dr-iSh+Ti ba rla ba ma/ bi sho d+ha ya na sha ya \u0f7f
333b1(rgyud): nA sha ya/ ha ha ha ha hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa'i tshig de thos nas sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med par bskyab pa dang / phan pa dang / bde ba thams
333b2(rgyud): cad dang / dngos grub dam pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dang mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi ba'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig las
333b3(rgyud): byung ba 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bshad do// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba yi// dngos grub thams cad
333b4(rgyud): byed pa'i mchog/ 'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bya// rdo rje dadam tshig la byung ba// sangs rgyas byang chub 'byin byed pa'i // ma rus thams cad rnam par 'jig/ de la sngags 'das sras bu/ 
333b5(rgyud): bri bar bya'o// oM badz+ra sa ma ya sU traM/ mA ti kra mtsho// grubazhi bya zhing sgo bzhir gdod// rta babs bzhis kyang rab tu rgyan srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa ste// dar dang phreng bas shin tu rgyan// dkyil
333b6(rgyud): 'khor kun gyi grwa rnams// sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams// rdo rje rin chen rgyan par ni// dkyil 'khor phyi rim srad bu bre// shes rab can gyis de nang du// rdo rje rin chen gyis rgyan te// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// 
333b7(rgyud): ka ba brgyad dang rta babs bcas// rdo rje ka ba'i gnas mchog tu// dkyil 'khor lnga yis rgyan byas te// de ltar dkyil 'khor srad bu bre// srad bu bres par chen rtsis dgang // de la tshon la bzlas pa ni 'di'o// 
333b8(rgyud): oM badz+ra tsi tras ma ya hUM/ de nas dbu su 'dug nas ni// rdo rje slob dpon mnyam gzhag pa// rdo rje sprin rnam bzhi po// yid kyis su ni dbye bar bya// de la sgo rnams dbye ba'i sngags ni 'dir// mi brjod g+ha Ta yas
334a1(rgyud): ma ya pra be sha ya hUM/ gser ram dngul las byas pa'am// sa yang rung ste legs bris pa'i// pha gu gru bzhir byas pa la// sangs rgyas gzugs ni banag par bya// de la de bzhin
334a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'i snying po ni 'di yin no// oM badz+ra dz+wa la ag+ni pa dIp+ta A kaR+Sha ya sarba ta thA ga tA nA~M/ ma hA badz+ra sa ma ya hUM dza/ sangs rgyas spyan sngar rdo rje ni// 'bar bas bskor bas bzhag pa
334a3(rgyud): bya// de bzhin rin chen 'od bskor ba// pad+mo rdo rje kun de bzhin// de nas rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams dgod pa'i snying po 'di yin no// hUM satwa badz+ri dz+wa le mA lA hUM phaT/ oM rat+na badz+ri dz+wa la mA lA hUM traM/ oM d+harma
334a4(rgyud): badz+ra dz+wa lA mA lA hUM hrI/ oM karma badz+ri dz+wa la mA lA hUM a// rdo rje shug/ sa kyis brgal nas ni// sangs rgyas spyan sngar de bzhin du// shes pas cho ga bzhin bri ba// rdo rje hUM zhes dkyil 'khor ro// 
334a5(rgyud): de la rdo rje shugs kyi snying po ni 'di yin no// oM badz+ra be gA kra ma hUM/ 'di bzhin du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa dkyil 'khor thams cad la yang srad bu la brgal te thams
334a6(rgyud): cad du 'gro bar bya'o// de nas de'i phyag rgya bshad do// yid kyis ri mo bteg nas ni// rdo rje srad bu'am gzhan yang rung // phyir phyung nang du zhugs kyang ni// dam tshig 'gal bar de mi 'gyur// de
334a7(rgyud): yi dbusu sems dpa' che// phyag na rdo rje bri ba ni// ud dpal cher sngo 'tsher ba'i mdog/ rdo rje hUM zhes bya bar 'dus// mche ba cung zad phyung ba'i zhal// khro dang bcas pas 'dzum pa'i zhal// g.yon
334a8(rgyud): brkyang tshul du bzhugs pa ste// 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od// g.yon pa'i zhabs kyi mthil gyis ni// dbang phyug chen po mnan par bya// g.yas pa'i zhabs kyis u ma yi// nu ma'i
334b1(rgyud): steng du gnon pa bri// de yi snying po ni 'di yin no// hUM de yi phyogs ni thams cad du// rdo rje khro bo bzhag pa ni// khros pa mche ba byung ba ni// 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od// de nas de dag gi snying po ni
334b2(rgyud): 'di rnams yin no// oM badz+ra sa tra krod+ha hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha A be sha ya hU~M phaT/ oM karma kro d+ha rA ga ya hUM/ oM badz+ra duSh+Ti kro d+ha sA d+hu hU~M phaT/ dkyil 'khor dam pa gnyis par ni// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal
334b3(rgyud): nas kyang // der ni rdo rjer dbang bskur bas// rdo rje khro bos bskor bar bri// de nas de rnams kyi snying po 'di bshad do// tre oM badz+rI b+h+r-i ku Ti kro d+ha ha ra ha ra hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra sUr+ya ma hA dz+wa lA mA lA kro d+ha dz+wa la ya sar+b+ba
334b4(rgyud): hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra k+Sho d+hi ke t+yA de tsi hU baT/ oM badz+ra hAs kro d+hAHrahA ha hU~M phaT/ dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum par ni/ shugs kyis brgal nas kyang // rdo rje sngon bri bya ba// khro bo bdag
334b5(rgyud): ny-id chen pos bskor// de nas de rnams kyi snying po bshad do/ hriHoM badz+rad+ha ma kro d+hA bi na sha ya bi sho d+ha ya hU phaT/ oM badz+ra tISh+Tha kro d+hats+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra hi tu kro d+ha pra be sha ya maH
334b6(rgyud): le sarba hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra krod+ha b+hA Sha ba tab ta hUM phaT/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhi par ni// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang // rdo rje dbab pa bri ba ni// rdo rje khro bo'i tshogs kyi bskor// de nas de rnams/ 
334b7(rgyud): kyi snying po bshad do// AHhUM badz+re kar+m+ma hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra ka btsakro d+ha rak+Sha hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra yak+Sha kro d+ha khAng khA da hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha muSh+Ti sA d+ha ya sa ma ya hU~M phaT/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni grwa rnamasu// dza
334b8(rgyud): rje dbyings kyi tshul bzhin du// ji ltar go rims bzhin du ni// gsang ba'i mchod pa kun bri'o// de nas de dag gi snying po'i phyag rgya 'di yino// oM badz+ra la s+yer ga ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra mA le a b+hiShi ny+tsa hUM
335a1(rgyud): phaT/ oM badz+ra gI teg trag hUM phaT/ oM badz+ri NI t+ye ba sha~M ku ru hU~M phaT/ dkyil 'khor dam pa'i phyi rol tu// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang // de yi grwa rnams nyid du ni/ 
335a2(rgyud): mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi rnams bzhag/ de nas de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di yi no// oM badz+ra d+hU pa pu dza s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra puSh+pa pU dza s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra A lo ke pU dza s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM
335a3(rgyud): phaT/ oM badz+ra gan+ta pu dza s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM phaT/ sgo rnams bzhi yi dbus ni// lcags kyu la sogs bzhag par bya// dkyil 'khor phyi rol gnas rnams// byi rol rdo rje'i rigs rnams// de nas de/ 
335a4(rgyud): gi snying po rnams bshad// oM badz+ra ang+ku sha ma hA kro d+ha AHya sar+b+ba sa ma ya hU~M dzaHoM badz+ra pA sha ma hA kro d+ha pra be sha daya sar+b+ba sa ma ye hU~M hUM/ oM badz+ra s+pho Ta ma hA kro d+ha ban+d+ha ban+d+ha sar+b+bas ma
335a5(rgyud): hUM baM/ oM badz+ra a be sha ma hA kro d+ha a be sha ya sarbas ma yan+d+ra.a/ de nas yang 'dir 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas par bshad do// 
335a6(rgyud): de la dang po nyid du rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid kyis rdo rje khro bo ti rin ti ri'i phyag rgyas bcings te/ zhugs shing zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba btab ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag
335a7(rgyud): ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro ba'i dbang du mchis te tshar bcad par rigs pa rnams ni tshar bcad do// bsdu ba'i rigs pa rnams ni bsdun de ni ji ltar bgyi bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bka'
335a8(rgyud): srul du gsol zhes byas nas rdo rje khro bo ti rin ti ri'i phyag rgya rang gi snying kar ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag ste/ rdo rje lugs kyu la sogs pas las byas nas yang dam tshig gi phyag rgya thams cad bcings shing
335b1(rgyud): nas thams cad byon par 'gyuraro// de nas yang gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi byas nas bdug pa la sogs pa yang de bzhin no// de nas cho ga 'dis rdo rje slob ma chug shig/ rdo rje slob dpon de rang gis khro badz+ra
335b2(rgyud): tir na to byug d+ha bcings te slobs la yang snying po 'ang dang 'ching du chug shig/ oM gr-its+tsha badz+ras ma ya ts+tsha ba/ de nas gas sngon po bgos la mgol gtsug tor sngon pas bcis te dar sngon pos gdung / 
335b3(rgyud): la sngags 'dis chug shig/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya ya ma pra be shA mi/ de nas bcug ste rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang snying po 'dis de la dba' par gyis shig/ oM badz+ra A be sha a/ de nas babs na
335b4(rgyud): de ltar babs pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab so// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / dad ltar byung ba thams cad kyang skad cig gis shes so// gnod/ 
335b5(rgyud): pa yang med par 'gyuraro// sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyuraro// hUM zhes byas pas kyang sems can thams cad la tshar bcad pa dang / phan gdags pa byed nus par 'gyur
335b6(rgyud): lag na rdo rje yang rtag tu de'i dgos pa thams cad sgrub po// de nas mna'i snying po byin cig/ de nas gdong g.yogs pa dkrol te dkyil 'khor chen po ji lta ba bzhin du ston cig/ dkyil 'khor chen po mtho
335b7(rgyud): ba tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyuraro// 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag las rnam par rgyal bar nus pa 'gyur ro// hUM zhes byas pas lha chen po la sogs pa lha thams cad dgug pa dang / 
335b8(rgyud): gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / mnan par nus par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes / 
336a1(rgyud): phyi bzhin 'brang zhing rang gi dngos grub sbyin par mdzad do// de nas de la rdo rje'i dbang bskuraro// rang gi mtshan ma rdo rje rnon po ji lta ba bzhin du sngags 'dis lag pa gnyis sbyin no// 
336a2(rgyud): badz+rapa tri badz+ra kar+m+ma ka rodA ba/ de nas sngags 'dis rdo rje ming gis dbang bskuraro// oM badz+ra kro d+ha a b+hiShiny+tsa mi/ badz+ra na ma a g+ni She ka ta he badz+ra na ma/ de nas gang la ming btags pa de la kye zhes bya ba'i sgra dang / 
336a3(rgyud): sbyar bar bya'o// de nas ye shes rnams bskyed de// rdo rje khro bo mnyam gzhag nas// 'bar ba mang po 'od can gyi// rdo rje dbyibs ni snying khar bsam// skye bo kun la 'bebs par byed// rdo rje khro bor mnyam
336a4(rgyud): gzhag nas// dpral bar rdo rje rin chen yang // de bzhin du ni bsams byas na// sems can thams cad dbang du byed/  rdo rje khro bar mnyam gzhag nas// 'bar ba'i phreng ba mang po'i
336a5(rgyud): 'od// rdo rje pad+mo mgul du bsam// sems can thams cad pa rlag par byed// rdo rje khro bo mnyam gzhag nas// 'barab/ 'i phreng ba mang po'i 'od// rdo rje thams cad spyi bor bzhag
336a6(rgyud): skye bo 'di dag thams cad bsrungs// de nas ye shes kyi phyag rgya 'di rnams kyi snying po ni 'di dag yin// hUM sar+b+ba badz+ra krod+ha a be sha ma/ ho rat+na badz+ra kro d+ha g+hA ra ma na ya tra hU/ badz+ra d+ha ma kro d+han sha yan+tu
336a7(rgyud): paphaT/ hUM karma badz+ra kro d+ha rak+Sha// de nas lha thams cad dgug pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya bsla'o// hUM zhes bya ba bcings nas ni// lag pa rdo rjer lcags kyur bsame// khris nas mdzub mo bskul nas ni/ 
336a8(rgyud): lha rnams 'gug pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// rang gi rkang mthil dbusu ni// rdo rje lcags kyi bris nasu// de nyid kyis ni rtags mnanan// lha rnams nges pa nyid du 'gug/ rdo rje'i sngags kyi nyid phyag rgya// legs par
336b1(rgyud): bye ste bzhag nas// bskul na um la sogs pa// bud med thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur// rdo rje lcags kyu bzhag pa ni// mjug de nyid du de bzhin te// des mnan lha yi gang yin pa// de ni 'gugs pa/ 
336b2(rgyud): dam pa'o// de dag gi snying po ni 'di yino// oM 'adz+ra kr-i d+hu a kAR+Sha ya hU phaT/ oM badz+ra karma a ku sha kro d+ha a kaR+Sha ma dzu phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+haSh+TA a gra A kaR+Sha ya hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+has gastas kaR+Sha mam
336b3(rgyud): badz+ra sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hUM phaT/ de nas phyag rgya rnam bzhi'i ye shes bsla'o// brkyang zhing bskum pas gnas nasu// rdo rje dbab pa'i tshul gyis ni// hUM tsam gyis kyang skad cig gis// skye bo thams cad 'bebs pa
336b4(rgyud): byed// rdo rje dag ni legs par smras// hUM zhes bya ba bzhi ldan pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po yis// thams cad kyang ni nges pa dar 'gug/ rdo rje khro bar mnyam gzhag nas// rdo rje khro bo lha mcho
336b5(rgyud): gis// skye bo kun gyi bdud byed de// rdo rje hUM gi rnal 'byor te/ yid kyis lus la go bgog// bdag gam pha rol rnams la ste// go cha chen po'i sbyor bas ni// skye bo 'di dag thams cad
336b6(rgyud): / srung // de nas de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di dag yino// oM badz+ra ko d+ha kA ya be shA ya hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra bid+yot+ta ma ma hA kro d+ha A na ya ho b+ha ga bA badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha tiSh+Tha ha na da ha pa tsa bi na shA ya hUM/ kA re Na pA tra ya
336b7(rgyud): badz+ra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ oM ma no dr-i D+ha badz+ra ka ba tsa kro d+ha rak+Sha hUM phaT/ de nas sems can thams cad rgyas gdab pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bsla'o// rdo rje khro bor mnyam gzhag nas// badz+ra hUM zhes bzlas pa yis/ 
336b8(rgyud): gang dang gang la kun zhugs pa// phyag rgyas btab par de 'gyuraro// sgra chen du ni brjod bya ba// Tak+ki hU~M phaT khros nasu// lan gcig gang la smras pa ni// rdo rje 'bar bas de mngon bkug/ rdo rje khro bo'i ting
337a1(rgyud): 'dzin cing // rdo rje lta bas bltas pa yi// sems can gang dang gang yin pa// de nas de ni dran nyams 'gyur// yid la bsad ces bsams nasu// snying kar rdo rje sgom par byed/ 
337a2(rgyud): hUM zhes bya ba nyid kyis kun// rang gi rgyas ni btab par dgongs// sems can gang dang gang dag la// yid kyi rgyas ni 'debs pa gang // phyag rgya 'dis ni shin tu yang // las rnams thams cad bsgrub par
337a3(rgyud): bya// de nas de dag gi snying po 'di dag go/ Tak+ki hUM phaT/ Tak+ki a/ Tak+ki dza/ Tak+ki haM/ phyag rgya re res kyang las bzhi rnams la phyag rgya'i snying po bzhis sbyar ro// de nas gsang ba khro bo ye shes kyi phyag rgya
337a4(rgyud): bslab bo// yan lag kun gyis 'khyud nas ni// hUM zhes gang la da sbyar bya ba// dbang po gnyis ni spang byas na// de yi srog da ni ma rungs 'gyur// hUM zhes bya bar ldan pa yis// mchu spang
337a5(rgyud): sos ni mchu bzung nas// dbang po gnyis ni rab sprad pa// ga nga yin de ni mngon sum 'gyur// hUM zhes sbyor ba gang ni/ na pa// de ni bde ba myong bar 'gyur// dbang po gnyis ni spang
337a6(rgyud): gyur na// gang yin de ni sdug bsngal 'thob// hUM zhes bya ba rab sbyor zhing // dbang po gnyis ni sprad nas kyang // yan lag kun gyis gtsir gyur na// de yi lus ni bsrungs par 'gyur// de nas de dag gi
337a7(rgyud): snying po ni 'di dag go/ hUM a/ hUM dzaHhU~M ho/ hUM haM/ hUM he/ de nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig gi de kho na nyid phyag rgya'i ye shes bsla'o// gang gis sems
337a8(rgyud): can la phan byerd// rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul gyis ni// sangs rgyas rjesu dran byas na// de ni sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur// dbang phyug dang ni u ma yang // sa la bris te de ltar mnan// ji ltar bris pa'i/ 
337b1(rgyud): go rims bzhin// u pal che song 'tsher ba'i mdog/ sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // de ni 'jig rten gsum rgyal ba// rdo rje hru dang 'dra ba yi// dngos
337b2(rgyud): grub rdzu 'phrul myur du 'grub// ji ltar ri mo bri ba bzhin// 'bar bas bskor ba'i dbus bzhugs pa// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yis// sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya// de nas de rnams lnga
337b3(rgyud): bshad de// rdo rje las ni bla na med// sangs rgyas rjesu dran grub pas// myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'thob bo// 'jig rten dag las rgyal bcings na// 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal 'gyur// rdo rje
337b4(rgyud): tshe dang kun tu 'gro/ rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba 'dra// rdo rje dbang gi rgyal po ra 'gyur// chos bzang ldan pas 'jig rten dbang / da las kyi rdo rje khro bo che// rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur// sems
337b5(rgyud): dpang khro bo rab tu brtan// khro bo lcags kyu yang dag 'gug/ khro bo chags pas chags par byed// khro bo legs pas dga' ba ster// khro gnyer gyis kun ma rung byed// khro ba
337b6(rgyud): mas gzi brjid mchog/ dpal gyi khro bo don rnams sdud// ha ha rgod pas bdud du byed// chos kyi khro bo chos rnams sdud// rdo rje ral gris gcod par byed// rgyu yi khro bo sdug bsngal 'phrog/ khro bo smra
337b7(rgyud): ba'i tshig 'brog go/ las kyi khro bo las rab ste// srung ba yis ni srung bar byed// khro bo gnod sbyin dgra yang za// khro bo khu tshur dngos grub ster// de nas rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do// 
337b8(rgyud): rdo rje gnyi su gyur pa ni// dam tshig mchog tu grags pa yin// de dag bcing ba bshad par bya// khro bo bcing ba bla na med// lag ngar rdo rjer byas na su// mthe'u chung lcags kyur bcing bar bya// mdzub/ 
338a1(rgyud): mo gnyis kyis bsdigs pa ni// 'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bya// de bzhin mdzub mongs sbyar te// nor bu 'dra bar rab tu dgug/ gung mo mnyam bsgreng pad+mor bya// gung mo mdzub mo/ 
338a2(rgyud): gnyis kas bsdigs// mdzub mo gnyis ka rdo rjer bya// g.yas pa lcags kyus dgug par bya// de nyid hUM zhes bya bas 'dud// legs pa sbyin pa de yin te// mdzub gnyis dpral ba'i gnyer mar bzhag/ 
338a3(rgyud): snying khar mdzub mo nyi mas bskor// lag pa brkyang ste spyi bor bzhag/ mdzub mo kha nas dgod ltar bya// mdzub mo sen mo sbyar ba ste// g.yas pa ral gri bcings pa'o// gung mdzub mnyam sgreng 'khor lo
338a4(rgyud): yi// kha yi nang nas dbyung ba dang // mdzub mo gung mo rdo rjer sbyar/ mdzub mo yis ni mgul bar bskor// mdzub mo ga/ sa ni mche ba che// mdzub mo bkug pas rdo rje bcings// rdo rje lnga ste
338a5(rgyud): la sogs pa// sems ma'i phyag rgya de nyid hUM// zhes bya chos kyi phyag rgya ste// hUM zhes bya bar lhan cig/ de nas rdo rje dam/ tshig gi chos kyi phyag rgya rnams bshad// hUM ni sangs rgyas rdo rje mi
338a6(rgyud): tra ni rdo rje snying po yi// hriHni rdo rje sA yi'o// a ni rdo rje thams cad kyi/ hUM \u0f7f/ traM tra~M mr-i he d+heH/ d+he ka d+hi hUM/ gr-i/ kri ba tri AH/ rdo rje khro bo mang po yi// chos kyi phyag rgya rab 'grub pa'o// de nas rdo rje dam tshig gi
338a7(rgyud): las kyi phyag rgya rnams bshad do// rdo rje rigs ni chen po yi// las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus na// rdo rje 'gying la sogs tshul gyis// khro bo khu tshur gnyisu bshad// gang dang gang gis phyag rgya rnams/ 
338a8(rgyud): las kyi phyogs ni gang du bya// de dang der ni bsgyur nas kyang // phyag rgya de ni sbyar bar bya// phyag rgya thams cad kyi cho ga'o// de nas 'dir 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po thun mos
338b1(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgyabacing ba bshad do// 'jig rten gsum rgyal phyag rgya ni// rdo rje mdzub mo dam tshig gi/ rdo rje chu zhes sngags kyi ste// dngos grub thams cad yud kyi 'thog/ mthe'u chung gnyis ga lcags
338b2(rgyud): bcing // rdo rje gnyis ka steng 'og tu// rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ni// skad cig gis ni thams cad 'gugs// rig pa dam pa thams cad kyi// 'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bshad// thams cad
338b3(rgyud): kyang ni gnod pa ste// de bzhin las rnams thams cad byed// rdo rje mdzub sor gnyis legs pa// rab mnyam gzhag pa ma nyams nas ni// shi ba thams cad slong ba ste// rdo rje slong ba zhes bya'o// 
338b4(rgyud): rdo rje mdzub gnyis legs par ni// rdo rje bcing bas bcings nas su// bsgyur te gtsug tu bzhag pa ni// tshe dang na med 'phel ba'o// rdo rje bcing bdam byas te// mthe bong mnyams
338b5(rgyud): nas nang du gzhug/ mdzub mo dam por bkug nasu// bcus pas zhabasu 'dug pa'o// 'jig rten gsum rgyal ba cings nas// gang gi gzugs la rkang g.yon pas// legs
338b6(rgyud): par gnan pa'i sems can de// zla ba phyed kyis 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te// gcig la gcig gis brdabs pas ni// sems can gang gi lus la ni// babs nas de
338b7(rgyud): yang rdob par byed// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te// bdag gam pha rol go char bya// mdzub mo gnyis kyis bcings byas na// nges pa nyid du srung bar 'gyur// rdo rje mthil du bcings na su// yid kyis
338b8(rgyud): khros nas dga' bya ba// mthe bong rdo rje dam pa ste// rdo rje rin chen 'grub par 'gyur// sems dpa'i rdo rje dam byas te// mthe bong gnyis kas gung mo mnan// mthe'u chung rdo rje rtse mo ni// rnon po dam tshig
339a1(rgyud): 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te// mdzub mo gnyis bkug bcings nasu// gtsu zhing phyir gcu byas pa ni// lnga 'gugs pa yi dam pa yin// rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te// 
339a2(rgyud): mdzub mo gnyis bkug rab tu mnan// mthe bong gnyis ka sbyar ba yis// dbusu btsir ba bar snang gi'o// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis ka las// mthe'u chung gnyis ka bcings nas kyang // rgyab sbyar mdzub/ 
339a3(rgyud): mo gnyis sbrel te// bsgyur ba mkha' la spyod pa'o// rdo rje bcings pa bsdams nasu// rdo rje srung ba bcing bar bya// 'di ni sa yi dam tshig ste// thams cad byed pas 'da' bar dka'// rdo rje'i phyag rgya
339a4(rgyud): gnyis bcings te// g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo la// mthe'u// chung mdud cing drag du gtog/ 'di ni sa 'og 'gug pa'o// // rdo rje bcing ba sbrel ba ni// mdzub mo gnyis ka dam bor ste/ 
339a5(rgyud): gung mo mthe bo rdo rje ni// gdug pa'i phyag rgya 'joms pa'o// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te// mnyam gzhag stan snyi kar bzhag/ khro bo khu chur gtsir ba ni// phyi rol dkyil 'khor
339a6(rgyud): 'jig pa'o// g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo la// g.yas pa'i mdzub mo bkug pas gzung // rab tu khros nas drag gtogs na// ri rab kyang ni lhung bar byed// g.yon pa'i mdzub mo rdo rje la// g.yas
339a7(rgyud): pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyus gzung // rab tu khro zhing bkug pa yis// gdon rnams kun la dbang du byed// rdo rje bcing ba byas nasu// lag ngar snying khar shin tu bsdam// rdo rje mdzub mo gnyis mtshan
339a8(rgyud): khung // brung ba yis ni snying 'byin to// mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo yis// mthe bong gnyis ka'i drung duni// yid kyis khros nas btsor bya ba// rims la sogs 'gugs dam pa'o// rdo rje bral mo ngas smra/ 
339b1(rgyud): te/ mdzub mo gnyis ka bkug nas su// mthe bo rab tu mnyam sbyar ba// mnan pa de ni sdig 'phrog pa'o// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis nang du// mdzub mo gnyis ni sbas nas kyang // legs par gyen du 'phangs pa/ 
339b2(rgyud): ni skyel ba slong ba'i dam pa'o// rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te// gung mo gnyi ga ngos sbyar nas// mtha' ma bzhi yi ngos spyad pa// skad cig tu ni sdig 'dral to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil
339b3(rgyud): 'khor chen po sgrub pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do// rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bzung nas ni// dkyil 'khor dang po srad bus bre// srad bus bres la phyi nas ni// srad bu ji bzhin bre bar bshad// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyi ga/ 
339b4(rgyud): yi mdzub mo rtse mo rab sbyar ba// byas nas tshon rnams thams cad la// 'bar ba'i lta bas dgug par bya// rdo rje mdzub mo / legs par ni// sbyar la bkan te bsdams nasu// rab tu khros
339b5(rgyud): nas dbye ba ni// sgo dbye ba yi mchog yino// de nas rdo rje rig sa thams cad kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa bshad do// brkyang bsku ma gyis ni tshul byas te// khro bo yi ni skad 'byin cing // khro zhing / 
339b6(rgyud): khro bo'i lta bas ni// las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i las 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen
339b7(rgyud): po'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzog so// / bam po lnga pa// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje bzungs kyi dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya
339b8(rgyud): ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso// oM sar+b+ba badz+ri Ni/ badz+ra mA te A na ya sar+b+ba badz+ra satwa na hUM dzaHde nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i
340a1(rgyud): thugs kha nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid phyag na rdo rje 'dra ba/ kun nas 'bar bas bskor nas/ rdo rje khro bo gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i lha mo rnamasu gyur nas b+hu
340a2(rgyud): ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don bsgrubs nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i btsun mo gsang ba'i phyir sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya
340a3(rgyud): gzugasu gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod
340a4(rgyud): do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i ye shes bla na me dra// de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i phyir// btsun mo ni dad du gyur pa yin// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje rang gi rigs kyi dam
340a5(rgyud): tshig gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba 'di gsu/ ngaso// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// rdo rje dkyil 'khro ra dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// khro bo ri gsang ba
340a6(rgyud): zhes bshad do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu bre// dkyil 'khor lnga yi gnas rnams// gsang ba'i phyag rgya bshad par bya// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbusu ni/ 
340a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas sku gzugs bzhag par bya// sangs rgyas khro ba'i dam tshig kyang // ji bzhin par ni mkhas pas bri// rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas kyang // phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor de'i// dbu su mdung
340a8(rgyud): shing bris la// rdo rje rab tu gnas bya zhing // 'od 'bar dbus bri ba ni// de yi go rims ji bzhin te// rdo rje rdo rje'i lcags kyu dang // mnga' dang dga' ba de bzhin// rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni// dkyil
340b1(rgyud): 'khor dam pa gnyis par yang // 'khor lo dbus na gnas pa yi// rdo rje rin chen bri bar bya// khro gnyer dbus rdo rje bri// de bzhin rdo rje gnyis rgyal mtshan// de bzhin so yi phreng bda'i// ngas su rdo rje
340b2(rgyud): bya// rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum par ni// pad+ma'i dbusu gnas pa yi// rdo rje pad+mo lha rdzas bri// 'bar ba'i dbus pad+mo bri// ral gri 'khor lo de bzhin// rdo rje lce yang tshul
340b3(rgyud): bzhin du// rtag tu de yi phyogasu bzhag/ rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor bzhi pa dam par yang // rdo rje bskal la rdo rje bri// rdo rje 'od ni chen por bskor// de yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ 
340b4(rgyud): 'bar ba kun gyis dkrigs pa'i 'od// rdo rje thams cad go cha'i/ mchog/ rdo rje mche ba khu tshur mchog/ grwa dang phyi yig nas rnamasu// tshul bzhin du ni bri bar bya// de nas rab tu bshad
340b5(rgyud): bya ba// phyag rgya'i rig pa mdor bsdus na// dza oM badz+ra ko d+ha sa ma ye dzaM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ro la saM ku sha A na ya sar+b+bany+dzi/ oM draR+Sha re She kA ma badz+ri Na ba shaM me A na~M ya hi dzi/ oM badz+ra dAsh+ma kro d+hi tau Sha ma
340b6(rgyud): sar+b+ba dzi/ rdo rje dzi zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor// dzi oM badz+ra b+h+r-i ku Ti kro d+ha ta ra sar+b+ba ar+thany+dzi/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la mA lA pra be sha ma he krod+ha a g+ni dz+wa la ya sad+d+hi ra bi ro She dzi/ oM badz+ra d+ha dzag+ma ke s+phu ra ma hA kro d+he hi me sar+b+ba stAny+dzi/ oM baH/ 
340b7(rgyud): an+d+ra hA sa ni hA satwa satwA Ta hA se na mA ra ya dzi/ rdo rje ji zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// di oM badz+ra shud+d+ha kro d+ha ha na ha na mA ra ya duSh+pA di/ oM badz+ra tIk+Sh+Na kro d+he ts+tshin+da/ kro d+ha sha na sar+b+ba ni d+ha/ oM badz+ra he tu ma hA kro d+ha pra be sha tsakra/ 
340b8(rgyud): pra be sha ya sar+b+ba nI/ oM badz+ra dzi tA ma hA kro d+he ba she btse mur+tha di ha~M/ rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// hi oM badz+ra sar+b+ba mu khe kar+m+ma badz+ri NI ma hA kr-i d+ha ku ru ku ru sar+b+ban ti/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi rak+Sha min+te/ oM badz+ra tsaN+Da kro d+he ma hA
341a1(rgyud): yak+Shi Ni badz+ra dadaMSh+Ta a kA la bi sha ne pa ya hi/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha muSh+Ti ba d+ha hi/ rdo rje hi zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi grwa rnamasu rdo rje gar la sogs pa'i gsang ba'i mchod pa'i
341a2(rgyud): rig pa'i snying po rnams gsungs pa/ oM badz+ra hUM khe/ badz+ra hUM g+h+raM/ badz+ra hUM te/ badz+ra hUM traM/ phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor mchod pa'i snying po rnams brjod par bya'o// oM badz+ra ti te/ badz+ra Tan+ta/ badz+ra d+hA tu/ badz+ra DoM ta/ de nas sgra
341a3(rgyud): bzhi'i mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po rnams gsungs pa/ badz+ra dza dza/ badz+ra hUM hUM/ badz+ra baM baM/ badz+ra a a/ de nas 'dir rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di bshad do// 
341a4(rgyud): de nas de la thog ma nyid du re shig 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'jug pa'i cho ga bzhin du bcu ga ste/ rdo rje thogs te rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang
341a5(rgyud): 'dra ba'i phyag rgya dang / lan gyi phyag rgya dang / nye ba'i phyag rgya dang / ye shes kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis rdo rje 'chang ba mchod pa'i phyir gar gyis mchod par bya'o// de la gar dang / lan gyi gar dang / 
341a6(rgyud): nye ba'i gar dang / ye shes kyi gar rnams kyis mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi gar rnams ni 'di yi no// de la dang po nyid du rdo rje dbyingasu bsdus pa'i snying pos rdo rje glu len cing // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
341a7(rgyud): la bstod pas mchod pa byas nas/ rdo rje slob dpon gyis sems dpa' rdo rje'i phyag rgya drag tu gtog par bya'o// de nas ji snyed zhugs pa rnams phyag rgya rnams kyis yang dag par dbab par bya'o// rdo rje gar gyi
341a8(rgyud): tshul gyis ni// rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub mo gnyis// rdorje nu mdzad phyag rgyar na// snyi gar shin tu bcing bar bya// de nas glar gyi tshig yi// rdo rje khro ba lcags kyu yis// sangs rgyas thams cad sun drang / 
341b1(rgyud): rdo rje mda' ni 'phang bar bya// rdo rje mda' ni 'phangs pas kyang // rdo rje dga' bas bsgrub par bya// phyag rgya'i cho ga bzhin bkrol te// thal mo brdab cing bcing bar bya// mchod pa'i cho ga 'di yis ni
341b2(rgyud): phyag rgya rdo rje mnyes par bya// mnyes nas dgos pa thams cad ni// 'dod bzhin skad cig nyid kyis 'grub// de la gar gyi phyag rgya'i snying po ni 'di rnams yino// sid+d+h+ya badz+ra/ A nA ya badz+ra rA gA ya badz+ra/ 
341b3(rgyud): sA d+hA badz+ra/ de'i 'og tu 'dra ba'i gar gyis mchod pa bya ste/ de bzhin gar gyi g.yon pa ni// khu tshur g.yas pas bzung nas ni// bsgyur zhing mdzub mo'i ngos kyis ni// dpral ba nyid la bzhag par bya// de bzhin/ 
341b4(rgyud): gar byed nyi ma yang // bskor nas yang dag dgug par bya// rdo rjeng rgyal mtshan bslang nas ni// rdo rje ha ha zhes dgod cing // mtsho dpa 'di yi cho ga yis// rgyal po la sogs mi kun kyang // dbang dang
341b5(rgyud): rab kyi gzi brjid dang // sbyin dang dgod pas mnyes par byed// de la 'di rnams ni 'dra ba'i phyag rgya'i snying po 'di rnams yi no// e hi badz+ra/ dz+wa lA ya badz+ra/ de hi badz+ra/ hA sa badz+ra/ de bzhin gar kyang
341b6(rgyud): bkrol nas ni// pad+ma kha dbus sbyar ba yi// mdzub mo'i rtse mo snying khar bzhag/ bsam pa g.yos par gdud par bya// de bzhin gar byed rdo rje yi// ral gris bgegs ni gcod ltar bya// mgal ma'i 'khor lo
341b7(rgyud): bskor ba yis// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor tshul du bskor// rdo rje'i tshig du glu len ltar// phyag na rdo rje mchod par bya// mchod pa 'di yi cho ga yis// thams cad mnyes pa nyid du 'gyur// de la 'di rnams ni/ 
341b8(rgyud): nye ba'i phyag rgya'i snying po rnams yin no// ga mA ya badz+ra/ ts+tshin+da ya badz+ra/ brah+ma ya badz+ra/ bru hi badz+ra/ rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub yang dag/ bkan nas rtse mo sbyar nas kyang // bsgyur te de nas gtsug tor tu// mdzub mo'i rtse
342a1(rgyud): mo banag par bya// rdo rje las kyi tshul gyis ni// lus kun mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// gar gyi tshogs brtan par bya// snying par rab tu bzhag par bya// de bzhin gar gyi cho ga yis// 
342a2(rgyud): rdo rje srung ba bcing bar bya// rdo rje mche ba bcings nas ni// rdo rje bcings pas mnan par bya// mchod pa 'di yi tshig yis// las rnams kun kyang nus par 'gyur// mchod pa rnam pa'i byas nas ni// cho ga bzhin
342a3(rgyud): du phyag rgya dgrol// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yino// nr-i t+ya badz+ra/ rak+Sha badz+ra/ khAd badz+ra/ ban+d+ha badz+ra/ de nas khro bo gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// rdo rje gsang ba'i lag gnyis kyis// khros pa'i yid
342a4(rgyud): kyis drag gtogs bya// skye bo gang gi ming smos pas// de yi snyi da ni 'gas par 'gyur// ma mchu so yis bzung nas ni// gang dgi ming smos gzer ba ni// de yi mgo sang myur 'gas te// gang gi
342a5(rgyud): bka' las 'da' ba'o// khro ba chen po 'di lta ba'i// mig kyang 'a/ dzums par byed pa ni// gang gi ming ni spros bltas pa// de yi mig ni rdol bar 'gyur// rdo rje khro bor mnyam gzhag la// 8
342a6(rgyud): rang gi ni snying khar yang // rdo rje bcings pas gcir nas ni// de yi sems ni 'jig par 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di yino// hUM badz+ra/ s+phoT tha/ hUM badz+ra mu ka badz+ra tha/ hUM badz+ra ni tAH/ hU badz+ra ma no tha/ de nas / 
342a7(rgyud): rje chen po'i rigs kyi gsang pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslob bo// de la dang por re shig phyag rgya chen po 'di bcing bar bshad do// mthe'u chung lcags kyur bcings nas ni// rdo rje khro bar bzhag par bya// g.yon pa
342a8(rgyud): gsum rgyab tu ni// 'jig rten gsum las rgyal gyis bshad// g.yon pa'i mdzub mo zad kar brkyang // de bzhin pakan pa bad+mo'o// de bzhin du yang bsgyur nas ni// g.yon pa'i rdo rjer bzhag par bya// dzaH/ 
342b1(rgyud): mthil du bcing byas te// khros pa'i yid kyis dgab pa ni// mthe bo rdo rje dam pas so// khro ba ta rin ti ri bshad// mdzub mo lcags kyus bkug pa nyid// mdzub mo ngas ni sbyar ba'o// de bzhin mdzub gnyis/ 
342b2(rgyud): legs sbyar ba// mdzub mo smad de dpral bar bzhag/ snying khar nyi ma rab tu bstan// mdzub mo bsnams nas spyi bor bzhag/ bsgyur nas dgod par bzhag par bya// mdzub bsnyams pad+mo kha 'bus bzhin/ 
342b3(rgyud): gnyis ka ral gri chang bar 'dzin// mdzub mo 'khor lor bcings pa'o// mdzub mo mnyams te kha nas 'byung // mdzub mo legs par brkyang ba dang // mdzub mos mgul tu bcing bar bya// de gnyis kha
342b4(rgyud): 'gram mche bar bzhag/ khu tshur dam du bcings pa ni// phyagargya chen po yin par bshad// de nas rdo rje rigs kyi gas dang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do// gsang ba'i khu
342b5(rgyud): tshur las byung ba// dam tshig mchog tu rab tu grags// de rnam sa bcing ba bshad par bya// rdo rje bcing ba bla na med/ snying khar bzhag nas rtsibs logs gcu// mda' drangs pa ni
342b6(rgyud): g.yon pa nas// snying kha nas ni dbyung bar bya// khro gnyer du ni bsgyur nas te// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ston pa dang // spyi bor lag pa brkyang ba dang // bsgyur nas dgod par bzhag par bya// kha yi dbu su rab
342b7(rgyud): bzhag pa// mdzub mo ral gris 'bebs par bya// 'khor lo bskor bar ston pa dang // kha nas rab tu 'byin pa ste// spyi bo lus mchog dkyil 'khor ro// dpung pa snying ka rtsibs logs rnams// rdo rje
342b8(rgyud): gsung ba de bzhin bya// mche ba'i gnasu bzhag pa dang // khu tshur dam du bsdams pa'o// phyi rol dkyil 'khor phyag rgya ni// mtshan ma'i go rims bzhin du bcings// dam tshig rdo rje bcings pa la// de bzhin rdo/ 
343a1(rgyud): rdo rje khu chur bzhag/ de nas rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i chos kyi phyag rgya rnams bshad do// phaT la/ sha ta Ta/ ma tata/ sa tata/ raTata/ ta Tata/ hri tata/ hatata/ ba tata/ tratata/ katata/ drA dang / kuta ta/ 
343a2(rgyud): ta/ kha ta ta/ ba tata/ de nas rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings babashad do// mdor na la las kyi phyag rgya ni// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis byas te// gnas gang yin par gzhag par bya// khro bo'i lta ba khro
343a3(rgyud): dang ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po rgyal po las khro bo gsang ba'i phyag rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzog so// // de nas yang bcom ldan
343a4(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rigs kyi ting 'dzidan gyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i tiHrang nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// 
343a5(rgyud): oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra kro d+ha hUM phaT/ de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgya/ la ba'i rdo rje phra mo'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso// oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra kro
343a6(rgyud): d+hakra ma hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rdo rje phra mo'i rig pa 'di gsung so// oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra rat+na kro d+ha kra ma hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje
343a7(rgyud): spyan gyis 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje phra mo'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso// oM badz+ra sUk+Sh+ma pad+ma kro b+ha ma hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs kyis 'jig rten gsum las rnam
343a8(rgyud): par rgyal ba'i rdo rje phra mo'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM s+'uk+Sh+ma badz+rag ma kro d+ha kram hUM phaT/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs bskyed pa'i phyir rdo rje dbyings kyi kyis
343b1(rgyud): 'khor chen po'i rdul du bkod de/ de rnams kyi rang gi snying po gsung so// oM su k+Shu badz+ras twasu dran kro d+ha trA baT/ oM su r+b+ba ba pram ku sha A kaR+Sha la ma hA kro d+ha ma rbu baT/ yo brdzas ng+kA rag kro d+ha ma nu dgas te kram
343b2(rgyud): hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra puSh+TiM krod+ha hU~M phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra b+h+r-i kuTi kro d+ha ha ra ha ra hU~M phaT/ oM s+'uk+Shu badz+ra dz+wa la maN+Da la kro d+ha sUr+ya dz+wa la hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra tsakra kro d+ha sar+b+ba ar+tha mA me pra yats+tshe shrI kra ma hU phaT/ oM badz+ra sAt+ma/ 
343b3(rgyud): bAs kro d+ha ma rdza Ta gas te sa han hU~M phaT/ oM suk+Sha badzin sa / oM su m+ba badzi na kro hU~M b+h+yaH hUM phaT/ oM s+'uSh+Ta badz+ra kr-i d+hI ma hrI \u0f7fkra hrin+da pa tis shrI pra be shas hr-ings byi nu phaT/ oM su Sh+Ta badz+ra d+ha kA han tu
343b4(rgyud): bAka twenu hUM phaT/ oM suk+Sh+ma badz+ra kar+m+ma kro d+ha/ sar+b+ba kar+m+ma ka rod+ha ba/ sar+b+ba kA ra ya sA d+ha ya hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra sUk+Sh+ma ka pa tsakro d+he rak+Sha rak+Shad hU~M phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra yak+Sha kr-id+ha ha na b+ha ya sar+b+ba duSh+Tany+tsit+ta mA tre badz+raH/ 
343b5(rgyud): hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra sUk+ShA muSh+Ti ko d+ha ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje rigs kyi ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi hUM la 'khor gsungs pa/ de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// chos kyi dkyil
343b6(rgyud): dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// khro bo'i ye shes kyang bshad// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srang bus bre// de yi dbus sangs rgyas bri// ye shes rdo rje'i dbus na'o// sangs// 
343b7(rgyud): rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun tu// phyag rgya de nyid kun ris shig/ rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor bzhi po rnamasu yang // 'jig rten gsum las rgyal la sogs// rim pa bzhin du dgod par bya// de rnams kyi
343b8(rgyud): ni phyogs kun tu// rdo rje khro ba'i cho ga bzhin// de nas 'dir rdo rje rigs kyi ye shes phra mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i rim pa rgyas par bshad do// de la dang po nyid du re shig bcu ga nas bsgo ba ni de ring khyod la de bzhin
344a1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khro bor bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur gyis de la legs par nan tan gyis shig/ sems can gyi khams ma lus pa lus pa med pa yongs su
344a2(rgyud): bskyab pa'i phyir nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phan pa dang / bde ba dang / grub pa dam pa thob pa'i 'bras bu'i bar gyi phyir rdo rje khro bos sems can thams can yang dag par sbyang ba'i phyir bdud byed nam/ 
344a3(rgyud): rungs pa thams cad lta zhig smos kyang ci dgos/ de skad sgro nas gdong g.yogs bkrol te de rnams dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad bstan nas rdo rje ji lta ba bzhin du lag pa gnyis sbyin// de nas rdo rje khri 'i ye
344a4(rgyud): shes phra mo rnams slobs shig/ rdo rje hUM gi rnal 'byor gyis/ rdo rje phra mo brtan byas la// hUM zhes bya bas gar sbyar bas/ de yi srog ni 'jig par 'gyur// rdo rje phra mo brtan byas te/ 
344a5(rgyud): cho ga bzhin du mchod pa ni// dgra 'di 'jog/ rdo rje hUM gi rnal 'byor gyis// rdo rje phra mo tshul sbyar byas// khro bor ldan pa ci srid mched// de skad sems can ma rungs byed// de ltar de bzhin
