344a6(rgyud): gsol ba yang // rnal 'byor can gyis 'dod na ni// ma lus pa ni thams cad kyang // de dag phyir zhing 'tsho bar 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yino// hUM hUM nA shA ya badz+ra/ hUM bi na sha ya sar+b+ba suk+Sh+ma badz+ra
344a7(rgyud): pra t+ya nA ya shI g+h+raM hUM// sems can gang gis dgra la ni// lhan cig gyur pa cher bstan pas// byams pa mched pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// rdo rje 'phro bas 'jig par 'gyur// rdo rje 'phro ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// snying/ 
344a8(rgyud): rje can gyi su gang la// snying rje rnal 'byor de yis ni// gdug pa thams cad de 'jig go/ chos sam yang na chos min pa// rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba// de ltar bsgoms nas sems can la// hUM zhes bya bas
344b1(rgyud): 'jigs par byed// gdul bar dka' ba'i sems can gang // sangs rgyas byang chub snod min pa// de rnams yang dag sbyang ba'i phyir// hUM zhes bya bas 'jigs par byed// de la de rnams kyi snying po ni 'ding
344b2(rgyud): yin no// b+he ra badz+ra kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ ga ru Na badz+ra kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ hUM baM shud+d+ha badz+ra kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM bi sho d+ha na badz+ra kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ rdo rje'i dbyibs ni bris nas kyang // yid kyis kyang ni gang su yi// khyim gyi dbu su lhung
344b3(rgyud): bsams nas// de yi rigs de 'jigs par 'gyur// de bzhin rdo rje 'phra tshul gyis// snying khar rdo rje bsgoms nas kyang // byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i gzugs// lhung na rigs ni 'jig par 'gyur// 
344b4(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs chen po// bsgoms nas gang du ltung ba de'i// / snang srid nyes pa sna tshogs kyis// btsun mor bcas pa 'jig par 'gyur// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i// 
344b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgoms nas ni// snang ba gang la lhung ba ni// de yi snang srid nges par 'jig/ de la de dag gi snying po rnams ni 'di dag yino// hUM badz+ra pra ba ta/ hUM bo d+hi satwa pra ba/ 
344b6(rgyud): hUM badz+ra d+ha ra pra ba ta/ hUM bud+d+ha pra ba ta/ rdo rje rtse mor rab sbyor bas// zla ba'i gzugs la bdag rang nyid// bsgoms na su ni bdag rang kyang // gang du lhung ba de lhung 'gyur// zla bar rdo rje bdag rang gis// bsgoms
344b7(rgyud): nasu ni bdag rang yang // rab tu khros nas gar lhung ba// de yi rigs ni modo la lhung // bdag rang phyag na rdo rje ni// bsgoms na su ni bdag rang yang // gang du lhung ba de yi yul// ring por mi thogs 'jigs
344b8(rgyud): par 'gyur// bdag rang sangs rgyas gzugs nyid du// bsgoms na su ni bdag nyid kyang // gang du ltung ba de yi ni// snang srid ring po mi thogs 'jig/ de la de dag gi snying po rnams ni 'di dag yi no// bo d+ha gri
345a1(rgyud): pra ba ta ya hUM/ satwa badz+ra pra ba ta ya hUM/ badz+ra satwa pra ba ta ya hUM/ bud+d+ha pra ba ta ya hUM/ de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// rdo rje khro bor snyoms zhugs la/ 
345a2(rgyud): rang gi lus kyis yongs bskor ba// rdo rje hUM byas 'khyud nas ni// gang gi ming smos de 'chi'o// rdo rje khro bor snyoms par zhug/ sna nas pra mo thang gcig tu// dbugs btang hUM zhes bya tshul gyis// 'jig
345a3(rgyud): rten gsum yang lhung bar 'gyur// rdo rje phra mo tshul sbyar la// khros nas rdo rje lta ba yin// bltas pa yis ni mun par 'gyur// yang na 'chi ba ru ni 'gyur// bu gu nas ni zhugs nas// yid kyis
345a4(rgyud): gang yang rung ba ni// snying nas drangs pa de yis ni// rang ngam de ni/ dbang du 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po rnams gsungs/ pa/ hUM badz+ra ba li ta kro d+ha mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra shA sa
345a5(rgyud): bi shra ba tA ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra dr-iSh+Ti bi sha bi nA sha ya hUM phaT/ hU hr-i da yak+Sha Na kro d+ha pra ti bi sha/ ye hr-i da ya ts+tshin+da b+hin+da ka ta ka ta phaT phaT/ de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes
345a6(rgyud): bsla'o// de la re shig phyag rgya bcing ba bshad// rdo rje ye shes sbyor ba yis// 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od// rdo rje khro bor bdag rang nyid// bsgoms nas de ma thag tu 'grub// de nas rdo rje rigs
345a7(rgyud): kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bsla'o// ting 'dzin ye shes dam tshig las// hUM zhes bya dang ldan gyur pa// ci rigs gnasu bzhag na ni// grub pa thams cad ster ba'i mchog/ de nas rdo rje rigs kyi/ 
345a8(rgyud): chos kyi dam tshig gi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// phaT/ sha gum Ta/ sa rba ra Ta/ taT/ dziTataT/ praT/ tra rbadas/ b+haT/ kriT/ riT/ khaT baT/ zhes bya ba ni chos kyi phyag rgya mdor bshad pa'o// den/ 
345b1(rgyud): rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi las kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// chos kyi khu tshur gnyis byas te// ji ltar rigs pa'i gnasu sbyar// las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus na// cho ga bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur/ 
345b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas par bshad pa rdzog s+ho// / de nas
345b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta
345b4(rgyud): kar+m+me shwa ra hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bya/ dag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga/ ta d+har+m+ma d+hA tu s+pha ra Na ma hA pU dza kar+m+ma bi d+hi bsti ra sa ma ye trai lo kya bi dza ya
345b5(rgyud): gi ra sar+b+ba duSh+Ta sa ma ya badz+ri Ni hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsu ngaso// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta kA ya sha dus ma ya s+pha ra Na ma hA pU dza kar+m+ma
345b6(rgyud): bi d+hi bsti ra sa ma ye hUM/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta d+har+m+ma d+hA tu s+pha ra Na ma hA pU dza kar+m+ma bi d+hi bsti ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas ya
345b7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dag 'di gsung so// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sar+b+ba a ba lo ka d+hA tu mi bi ma hA pU dza kar+m+ma bi d+hi bsti ra sa ma ye hUM phaT/ de nas yang byang chub sems
345b8(rgyud): dpa' phyag na rdo rjes rang gi pa chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa'i lha mo rnams rang gi snying kha nas bskyed de 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / mnyes par
346a1(rgyud): bya ba dang / las thams cad grub pa'i dgos pa byed pa nyid du yang dag pa'i sbyor ba la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul par byas te/ slang yang
346a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje las kyi dam tshig gi
346a3(rgyud): cho ga rgyas pa'i las kyis dkyil 'khor 'di gsung so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// las kyi rdo rje zhes bshad do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul
346a4(rgyud): du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srang bu bre// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi gnas na ni// sangs rgyas sku gzugs bzhag par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi phyogs kun tu// dam tshig mchog rnams ban/ 
346a5(rgyud): par bya// rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor ba zhi pa rnamasu ni// rdo rje gtso sogs bzhi po rnams// ji ltar rim sa bzhin bzhag par bya// de rnams kyi ni phyogs kun tu/ mchod
346a6(rgyud): pa chen po rnams banago/ de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya bshad do// oM badz+ra sa twa sid d+hi dz+nyAn kar+m+ma sa ma ye tsU dza/ oM badz+ra A kaR+Sha Na kar+m+ma dz+nyA na sa ma ya hU~M dza/ oM badz+rar ti rAg kar+m+ma dz+nyA nas
346a7(rgyud): ma ye hU~M dza/ oM badz+ra sang+ku kar+m+ma dz+nyA na sa ma ye hU~M dza/ oM badz+ra b+h+r-i ku TI ba shaM ku ru hUM/ oM badz+ra sUr+ya maN+Dal ba shA~M ku ru hUM/ oM badz+ra d+ha dzAgla ke s+phu ru re ba shi ku ru hU~M/ oM badz+rad te tA se ba sha~M ku ru hUM/ oM badz+ra pad+ma ra gle rA gas
346a8(rgyud): hUM oM badz+ra tIk+Sha ra ge rag ya hUM/ oM badz+ra maN+Da le dgre rA ga ya hU~M/ oM badz+ra bA ga ra ge ra ga ya hUM/ oM badz+ragarmAs ma ya tsa ya hU~M/ oM badz+ra ka btse ba d+hi ra k+Sha rak+Sha hU~M/ oM badz+ra lak+Shi Ni mA ra ya badz+ra Sh+Ta ya b+hir+thad+hi d+ha ya mu ga
346b1(rgyud): s+ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kar+m+ma muSh+Ti sid+d+ha hU~M phaT/ de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin byas te/ rdo rje rigs kyi las kyi ye shes rnams bskyed do// de la dang po nyid du zhi ba la sogs pa'i phyag rgya
346b2(rgyud): ye shes bslab po// yam shing mngar po rnams kyi me// rab sbyar rdo rje khro bo yis// mnyam par gzhag pas snyoms zhugs la// til bsregs par ni sdig bsregs shing // yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni// byin
346b3(rgyud): za rab tu sbar nas kyang // rtag tu 'bras ni sbyin bsregs na// gdon mi za bar khyim rgyas 'gyur// yam shing mngar po rnams kyis kyang // mkhas pas rab tu me sbar te// dur ba'i yal ga mar bcas pas// 
346b4(rgyud): sreg pa byas na tshe 'phe lo// yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni// byin za/ rab tu sbar byas la// ku sha'i yal ga 'bru mar gyis// sre dag par byas na nges par srung // de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams
346b5(rgyud): yin// oM sar+b+bA pA paM da ha na badz+ra ya swA hA// oM badz+ra puSh+Ta ye swAhA/ oM badz+ra A yu She swA hA// oM badz+ra pA ti hata badz+ra ma swA hA/ ya ma shing tshabs dang bor ni// rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis// me sbar
346b6(rgyud): nas kyang se ba yi// tsher ma can gyis 'gugs par 'gyur// yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni// khro dang ldan pas me spar na// me tog dmar ram 'bras bu'ang rung // sbyin sreg byas na skye bo rengs// rnal 'byor
346b7(rgyud): can gyis khros nas kyang // yam shing des de me sbar te// lcags kyi phye ma bsregs nas ni// rdo rje bcing ba nyid du 'gyur// yam shing de nyid kyi su ni// mnyam par gzhag ste ma bus la// 'bras bu kha ba khros bzhin
346b8(rgyud): bsreg/ skad cig tu ni 'chi bar 'gyur// ra te ba ru sa ma~M b+hi d+hu l+yag ni sa ma hri sa/ dzu he ta ti ga ta pa lAM ku to ma ri pUta pa ta ya ta/ de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yino// hUM badz+ra A kaR+Sha ya swA hA// tsU badz+ra rA ga ya/ 
347a1(rgyud): sahA// hU badz+ra ban+d+ha ya swAhA// sU badz+ra mA ra Na mas d+ha// mkhas pas yam shing sgur mo yis// khros nas byin za sbar nas ni// 'bras bu lo ma sgyur bsregs na// dbang du bya ba dbang sa
347a2(rgyud): yam shing de dag nyid kyis kyang // mnyam par gzhag ste me sbar la// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu khros bsregs na// 'dod pa bzhin gyi gzugs rnyed do// de 'dra ba yi yam shing gis// byin za rab tu sbar nas kyang // 
347a3(rgyud): mi snang me tog sdong bu yis// bsregs na 'dod bzhin mi snang 'gyur// yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni// mnyam par gzhag ste me spar la// na mkha'i lcug ma'i me tog gis// sbyin sreg byas na mkha' la 'gro/ 
347a4(rgyud): de la de dag gi snying na 'di dag go/ oM badz+ra ba shaM kA ra ya swA hA/ oM badz+ra kar+m+ma rU pa badz+ra ya swAhA// oM Ar+ya sh+ya badz+ra ya swA hA// oM badz+ra kha ba tsa ri Ni swA hA// khro bar mnyam gzhag yam shing ni
347a5(rgyud): shin tu khabs ma sbar la// badz+ra me tog bsregs byas na// rje rje bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur// yam shing de dag nyid kyi/ ni// khro dang ldan la me sbar la// lha yi phreng ba gang bsregs pa/ 
347a6(rgyud): de yang bka' bzhin nyan par 'gyur// khro bo nyid du mnyam bzhag ste// yam shing des ni me sbar te// phyag na rdo rje'i phreng ba sreg/ de yang bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur// yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni// rab tu khros
347a7(rgyud): te me spar la// chos gos bsregs pa sangs rgyas kyang // skad cig tu ni bka' bzhin mdzad// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yino// hUM badz+ra ba shaM ka rA ya swA hA// hUM so ra ba shaM kA ra badz+ra ya sA hA// hUM badz+ra pA Ni ba/ 
347a8(rgyud): shaM kA ra ya swAhA// hUM bud+d+ha ba she kA ra badz+ra ya swA hA// de nas gsang ba'i las kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bsla'o// yid 'ong bud med dang lhan cig/ gnas shing bu gar a dzan// bcug nas bskul ba byas nas kyang / 
347b1(rgyud): de yi mig bskus dbang du 'gyur// ldong ros bu gar bcug nas ni// rdo rje bsdams pas de g.yogs te// mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi yis ni// dngos grub rnam pa bzhir 'gyuraro// go ro can bu gar bcug/ rdo rje khu tshur
347b2(rgyud): gyis btsir nas// bzhag na de ni 'bar 'gyur na// rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra bar 'gyur// gur gum bu gar bcug nas ni// bu gar sems dpa' rdo rje yis// bkab nas 'bar bar gyur nas ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa 'dra bar
347b3(rgyud): 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag go// oM gu h+ya ra ti badz+ra ba shaM ka raM sid+d+h+ya hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya sid+d+ha hUM/ oM gu h+ya badz+ra sid+d+ha hUM/ oM badz+ra d+ha ra gu h+ya sid+d+ha hU~M/ de nas rdo rje rigs kyi las kyi phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes bslab
347b4(rgyud): bopo// rdo rje bgos pa'i tshul gyis ni// phyag rgya chen po mdor bsdus na// rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis ni// rdo rje khro bor mnyam par ba zhag/ hUM zhes mdzub mo'i tshul gyis ni// dam tshig mchog ni 'dir
347b5(rgyud): de bzhin/ oM zhes dang po yi ge as// chos kyi phyag rgya 'dir de zhin// las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus na// las kyi phyag rgya gnyis byas nas// thams cad grub byed dag pa ste// rdo rje las kyi
347b6(rgyud): tshul gyiso// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las rdo rje'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogaso// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de
347b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badz+ra sa ma ye hUM/ de nas
347b8(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsungaso// hUM badz+ra ma tha/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rin po che'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs/ 
348a1(rgyud): hU~M b+h+r-i ku Ti badz+ra ra ta/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsungaso// hUM ma hA pad+ma badz+ra dr-i DA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo
348a2(rgyud): rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi las kyis dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsung so// oM badz+ra kar+m+ma a gra kri ta/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal
348a3(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// rdo rje khro bo zhes bshad do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul
348a4(rgyud): du ni/ dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bre// sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun tu// 'jig rten gsum rgyal la sogs bri// // 'jig rten gsum las rgyal la sogs// sangs rgyas phyogs
348a5(rgyud): kun tu bri'o// de nas dkyil 'khor 'dir dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas te bcu gnas phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i
348a6(rgyud): ye shes bsla'o// rang gi phyag rgya bzhi dkyil 'khor// bris nas chos nyid dag brjod la// bud med lhan cig gnas nas ni// grub pa yang ni thob par 'gyur// rang gi phyag rgya bzhi dkyil 'khor// bris nas
348a7(rgyud): chos dag rab brjod la// chags pas bud med la bltas na// grub pa yang ni thob par 'gyur// rang gis phyag rgya bzhi dkyil 'khor// bris nas chos nyid dag brjod la// bud med mdzes la spras pas 'grub// 
348a8(rgyud): rang gi phyag rgya bzhi dkyil 'khor// bris nas chos nyid dag brjod la// lhan cig 'khyud na kun 'grub 'thob// de la chos nyid dag pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di dag yino// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta bi shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ho// oM badz+ra bi shud+d+ha/ 
348b1(rgyud): dr-iSh+Ti dza/ oM sar+b+ba bi shud+d+ha mu ka hU~M/ oM sar+b+ba bi shud+d+ha kA ya bA ma na kar+m+ma badz+ri nA/ de nas phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba sbas pa'i phyag rgya ba sla'o// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni zhugs nas kyang // 'dod pa
348b2(rgyud): yon+dan lnga yis ni// bud med mchog ni mgu byas nas// shin tu grub pa thob par 'gyur// de nas de'i snying po brjod do// ho badz+ra kA ma/ de nas ji lta ba bzhin du rdo rje mnan pa'i rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya la sogs
348b3(rgyud): pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi rnams cho ga dang bcas par rgyas par bslab par bya ste// phyag rgya bzhi pa'i tshul 'dis rdo rje sil snyan dang / rnga dang / brdung ba dang / brdabs nas rdo rje sems dpa' yang 'dus pa'i snying po'i glu/ 
348b4(rgyud): blangs te/ de phul nas phyag rgya dang 'dra ba'i phyag rgya dang / nye ba'i phyag rgya dang / ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang gar gyi mchod pas mchod par bya'o// de la gar gi mchod pas ni mchod pa 'di yin// rdo rje gar gyi
348b5(rgyud): sbyor ba yin// rdo rje khro bo'i sor mo yis// rdo rje hUM gis phyag rgya ni/ snying kha nyid du bcing bar bya// de bzhin gar byas g.yon pa ni/ g.yas pa'i chang pas bzung bar bya// bsgyur nas dpral ba nyid du ni/ mdzug
348b6(rgyud): mo'i ngos kyis bzhag par bya// de bzhin gar yang bskor nas ni// mnyam par pad+mo kha dbus sbyar// mdzub mo snying kar bzhag nas ni// bsam pa g.yos pas gdud par bya// rdo rje khro bo mdzub ma nyams te// bkan nas
348b7(rgyud): / rtse mo spang bya zhing // de nas bsgyur zhing gtsug tor du// mdzub mo'i rtse mo sbyar ba'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rdo rje dam tshig gi khro bo gsungs pa/ hUM de nas de'i dkyil
348b8(rgyud): 'khor bshad pa// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba ste// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya// 
349a1(rgyud): de yid dbu su legs bri ba// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje hUM ni phyag rgya che// lag par 'dzin pa rdo rjer bcas// brkyang bskum tshul du gnas pa dang // kha dog gzugs ni ji/ 
349a2(rgyud): bzhin bya// de nas 'dir gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa thams cad bya ste/ rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i gsang ba'i rgya tshu la shes pa // dkyil 'khor 'dir ni zhugs nas kyang // 'jig rten gsum rgyal mdzub mo/ 
349a3(rgyud): yis// bu gar bcug nas bsgrubs na ni// las kun rab tu 'grub par 'gyur// de nas sgrub pa'i snying po 'di bshad do// hUM badz+ra sa ma ya kr-i ta/ de nas rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// 
349a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor zhugs nas legs par ni// phyag rgya chen po mtsha dag gnas pa// gnas nas rdo rje hUM zhes bya// las rnams dkun ni byed par 'gyur// de la 'di sgrub pa'i snying po gsungs pa/ 
349a5(rgyud): badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ de nas phyag rgya bzhi bcing ba ji lta ba bzhin du bsla bas te/ de bzhin du dngos grub tu 'gyuraro// dkyil 'khor du ji lta ba de bzhin du ras la sogs pa la bri ba dang / lugs mal
349a6(rgyud): sogs pa gzugs thams cad kyi dngos grub ni thun mong ngo // phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces gsol// bcom ldan 'a
349a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag gi rigs 'di la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ ci nas kyang sems can thams cad ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du bgyis kyang dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur bar/ 
349a8(rgyud): bgyi ba'i srang du'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus te/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po la byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir 'i
349b1(rgyud): skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod leg so// rdo rje rin chen khyod kyang legs// rdo rje chos kyang khyod legs pa// rdo rje las khyod rab tu legs// mdo sde 'di ni legs bshad pa// rdo rje theg pa blan
349b2(rgyud): med 'a de bzhin gshegs kun gsang ba ste// theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las rdo rje chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzog so// 
349b3(rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus te mkhyen bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das de
349b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' nyon la dbang phyug chen dpe'i lus 'di khyod kyi rkang pa'i 'og nas btang bar byos// denas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa tham
349b5(rgyud): cad la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba'i khro bor dbang bskur nas de bdagagis bskum lags na/ ji ltar de bdag gis btang bar bgyi/ 
349b6(rgyud): nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gis bdag po dbang phyug chen po'i lus kyi srog gso ba'i phyir shi ba'i rnam par shes pa dgug pa'i snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs las
349b7(rgyud): phyung ngo // oM badz+ra sata hU~M dza/ de nas de'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do// gsang ba'i lcags kyu bsdam bya ste// tha ma mnyam du brkyang nas kyang // shi ba'i mgo bor bzhag na ni// srog ni phyir yang thob par
349b8(rgyud): 'gyur// de nas de thos ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thal ba'i dbang po'i dbyangs de/ thal bas khebs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de nas slar byin te dbang phyug gi lus der zhugs nas
350a1(rgyud): ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med// gang phyir shi ba'i lus 'di yang // 'tsho ba'i khamasu gyur pa yin// de nas
350a2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rkang pa 'degs pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra muHde nas de'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad // rdo rje khro bo mdzub legs par// zur
350a3(rgyud): spang bsdams te bzhag pa ni// rdo rje de dag bsgyur byas shing // 'og nas de dag 'byin par byed// de nas de dag gsungs ma thag tu rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po zhabs kyi 'og nas lha chen po thar pa rang gis shes par
350a4(rgyud): gyur to// de nas dbang phyug chen po'i lus de/ de bzhin gshe/ gas pa des sos par byin gyis brlabs te/ 'jig rten dgyi khams 'dir sems can thams cad kyi don dang / ma rungs
350a5(rgyud): pa thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir nyid kyi rgyal tshab tu bcug go// de nas phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyi mthil de nas zla ba'i zhabs zhes bya de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag/ 
350a6(rgyud): rgyu byung ngo // oM tsan+dot+te re sa man b+ha dra kir Ni ma hA badz+ri Ni hUM/ de nas de'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do// rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te// mthe'u chung mthe'u chung mnyam par ni// mnyams nas legs par brkyang na
350a7(rgyud): ni/ rdo rje'i ri mo zhes kyang grags// de nas de byung ma thag tu zhabs kyi mthil de las zla ba'i bla ma de bzhin gshegs pa de byung nas dbang phyug chen po de'i mgo la phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyis mnan pa'i rjesu zla ba/ 
350a8(rgyud): phyed pa gnas par gyur te g.yon logs na 'dug go// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag na rdo rje'i grogasu lag na rdo rje'i mdung rtse byin nas rdo rje'i rig pa dam pa rdo rje'i rig pa dam pa zhes rdo rje'i
350b1(rgyud): ming gis dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro// de nas rdo rje'i rig pa dam pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje mdung rtse nges 'gal me'i 'khor lo ltar bskor zhing gar gyi mchod pas mchod pa byas nas ched du
350b2(rgyud): brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// byang chub sems ni bla na med// zhabs mchog gis ni gar reg pa// sangs rgyas nyid du grub pa thob// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
350b3(rgyud): chen po phyag na rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin de las langs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag gi sug par rdo rje stsal te/ phyag na rdo rje nyid du
350b4(rgyud): dbang bskur bas lha la sogs te phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs de rnams/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor che/ na po 'di la gnas pa'i rim pa bgyis nas/ gang gis bla na med
350b5(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las sems can de rnams bya ra mi ldog par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
350b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor 'di gsungaso// oM badz+ra satwa uSh+NI Sha hUM phaT/ de nas 'di bshad ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnams las bcom
350b7(rgyud): ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i kha dog du ma'i 'od zer du gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang bar byas nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i gtsug gis mtshamasu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
350b8(rgyud): gtsug tor gyi tshul du 'phungs nas 'khod do// de nas gzi brjid kyi phung po de las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor 'di phyung ngo // oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha an a ba lo ki te mUr+d+ha ni te dze rA shi/ oM huM/ 
351a1(rgyud): dza la dz+wal/ d+ha ka d+ha ka d+ha ka/ nga ra dang / bing dbing ra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ hU~M hU phaT phaT swAhA// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa'ang
351a2(rgyud): gsung so// oM na su b+ha badz+ra hUM phaT/ de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de nyid kyi thugs las snying po 'di byung ngo // oM Tika dza/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso// oM badz+ra
351a3(rgyud): rat+na mut+ta ma dz+wa lA ya hU~M phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spun gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM sa b+hA ba shud+d+ha/ badz+ra padA sho d+ha ya sar+b+ba bi d+yo tam d+hu phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen
351a4(rgyud): po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso// oM badz+ra kar+m+ma ud+d+ha ma badz+ra d+hA ra sa ma ya ma nu sma ra sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha AHdam/ pra be sha ya/ A be sha ya/ ban+d+ha ya/ sa ma yaM/ gra ha ya/ sar+b+ba
351a5(rgyud): kar+m+ma Ni me ku ru ma hA sa twa hU~M phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rig pa'i dam pas rang gi snying po btsun ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba'i phyir phul ba/ 
351a6(rgyud): oM um+ba ni sum+ba badz+ra bi drot+ta ma hU~M phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje khro ba'i rig pa'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas rang gi snying po 'di gsung so// oM badz+ra shU la/ de nas rdo/ 
351a7(rgyud): rje sgyu ma'i rig pa'i rgyal pos rang gi rig pa'i snying po dam pa 'di gsung so// oM badz+ra sa ma sa d+hA ri Sha ma sar+b+ba hU phaT/ de nas rdo rje dril bu'i rig pa'i rgyal pos rang gi ril 'di gsung so// oM badz+ra ga twaM ra Shar
351a8(rgyud): baT/ de nas rdo rje thub pas rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM badz+ra mo nam hApradz+nyA hU phaT/ de nas rdo rje mtshon chas rang gi snying po 'di bul ba/ oM badz+ra sU d+ha da ma ka hU phaT/ rig pa'i rgyal po rnam so// de nas rdo rje 'khyi'i
351b1(rgyud): pa rdo rje khro bos bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la rang gi snying po 'di zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas phulo// oM badz+ra kut+pa li ma hA badz+ra kro d+ha gr-ih+Na/ ha na han/ dacang ha/ pa tsa bi d+ha na sa ya badz+re Na mya ngan ba la ya ti b+h+r-i ta sa hr-i
351b2(rgyud): ya badz+ra kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje 'od rdo rje khro bos rang gi snying po 'diphul ba/ oM badz+ra pra b+ha mA ra ya s+yo ma kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje dbyug pa rdo rje khro bos rang gi snying po 'di phu lo// oM badz+rad d+hA ya sar+b+ba duSh+TAM mahA traM/ 
351b3(rgyud): d+hahU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje khro ba rdo rje ser ngos rang gi snying po 'ad phul lo// oM badz+ra pit+pa la bi sha ya sa twA duSh+Ta mA~M ma hA kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ rdo rje khro bo rnam so// de nas rdo rje glang sna tshogs kyi bdag pos bcom ldan 'das
351b4(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje la snying po 'di bu lo// oM badz+ra sho d+ha ma hA ga Na pa tir k+Sha sar+b+ba duSh+pe b+h+yo/ badz+rang+ga ra Adz+nyA pa ya hU~M phaT/ de nas yang rdo rje phreng bas rang gi snying po 'di phulo// oM mA la ga Na pa ti mA la ya
351b5(rgyud): A kAR+Sha ya/ pra be sha ya ba sha ku ru mA ra ya ny+tsa/ de nas rdo rje dang dgis ring gi snying po phul ba/ oM 'dzab shi mahA ga Na ba t+ti shaM ku ru hU~M phaT/ de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje tshogs kyi bdag
351b6(rgyud): bos rang gi snying po 'di phul lo// oM badz+ra bi dza ya bi dza ya ma hA ga Na pa ti hU~M phaT/ tshogs kyi bdag po rnam so// de nas rdo rje thob rdo rje po nyas rang gi snying po 'di phyag na rdo rje la bu'o// oM badz+ra mus la ku ru sad+d+ha/ 
351b7(rgyud): duSh+Ta hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje rlung gi pho nyas rang gi snying po 'di phul ba/ oM badz+ra nI la ma hA be ga ga Na pa ti sar+b+ba duSh+Ta hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje me'i pho nyas rang gi snying po 'di phul ba/ oM badz+ra an la ma hA duSh+Ta dz+wa la ya sar+b+ba bAs+t+wa~M
351b8(rgyud): ku ru sar+b+ba duSh+Ta hU~M phaT/ rdo rje 'jigs pa'i pho nya chen pos rang gi snying po 'di phul ba/ oM badz+ra b+hai ra ba badz+re hu pa sha ya sar+b+ba duSh+Ta ma hA yak+Sha hU~M phaT/ pho nya rnams so// de nas rdo rje lcags kyu rdo rje bran gyi rang gi snying po'idi/ 
352a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phulo// oM badz+ra ang+ku sha A kaR+Sha ya/ sar+b+ba ma hA ts+tshet+ta hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje dus kyi rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM badz+ra kA la ma hA mr-i tu mud+d+ha nu baT/ de nas
352a2(rgyud): ngan khrid kyis rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM badz+ra bi nA ya ka s+ya bag+h+nAM ku ru hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje klu'i rdo rjes rang gi snying po 'di phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas phu lo// oM badz+ra nA ga badz+ra A na ya sar+b+ba nad ne hir+ya gar+b+ha
352a3(rgyud): ni muk+ka a la d+ha ra b+hi ni sarbo pa kA ra Na ni badz+ra d+ha ra sa ma ya ma nu smai ra ka ta/ b+hin+da b+hin+da ha ra ha ra pradz+nyA ma hA ts+tshe hU~M phaT/ bran rnamaso// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rigs thams
352a4(rgyud): cad 'gugs pa'i dam tshig 'di gsungaso// oM badz+ra ang+ku sha ya dza A kaR+Sha ya hU~M phaT/ de nas de gzhug pa'i dam tshig 'jigs dngas pa/ oM badz+ra pA shA kaD+D+h+ya hUM/ de nas thams cad bcing ba
352a5(rgyud): gsungs pa/ hUM badz+ra s+pho Ta baM/ de nas las kyi snying po gsungasa.oM badz+ra kar+m+ma sa ma kr-ita/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bsha// 
352a6(rgyud): de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra bar ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srad pus bre// de la 'di ni srang bu bre ba'i snying po yin no// oM sar+b+ba badz+ra sU traM A tra
352a7(rgyud): A kaR+Sha ya sar+b+ba maN+Dal hUM/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus su yang // seng ldeng pur bu btab nas ni// de nas srang bu nyis rim du// byas nas de yis sras bus bre// de la 'di ni pur bu'i snying po yin// oM badz+ra kI la
352a8(rgyud): ya kI la ya/ sar+b+ba bib+hA ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ srang bu bzhi dang ldan pa dang / dkyil 'khor zlum po srang bu bre// de yi phyi rol byung nas ni// gnyis 'gyur du ni de bzhin// de yi rim pa gsum du ni// phyi rol dkyil 'khor srang
352b1(rgyud): pus bre// phyogs mtshams 'khor lo'i rtsibs tshul du// grwa yi ri mo srang bu bre// srad pu bre ba'i cho ga'o// de nas srad bu bres pa der// dag pa'i tshon gyis dgang bar bya// g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur gyir// 
352b2(rgyud): cho ga bzhin du bzung bar bya// dang po bris nas phyis ci bdar// de la 'di ni tshon gyi snying po'o// oM badz+ra rang+ga sa ma ya hUM/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon yang // mnyam par gzhag la dbus 'dug nas// rdo rje yi ni
352b3(rgyud): sgo bzhi rnams// yid kyis kyang ni dbye bar bya// de la sgo na bye ba'i snying po ni 'di'o// oM badz+ra ung+ga ta sa ma ya pra be sha ya shI g+h+raM sma ra badz+ra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ gser ram yang na dngul yang rung // sa la
352b4(rgyud): rab tu bris pa 'am// ba gu gru bzhi'i steng du ni// sangs rgyas sku gzugs bzhag par bya// de la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po ni 'di'o// oM sar+b+ba bi / sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs
352b5(rgyud): kun du// sems dpa' chen po bzhi bzhago// mdun du phyag na rdo rje ni// 'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bya// de la se mas dpa' chen po snying po'i ni 'di rnams yin no// oM sum+b+ha ni
352b6(rgyud): sum+b+ha hU~M/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya~M ho/ b+ha ga bAM badz+ra hUM phaT/ a badz+ra b+h+r-i ku Ti kro d+ha A na ya sad+d+ha rat+na hriHhUM phaT/ oM badz+ra dr-iSh+Ti krod+ha dr-iSh+Ta mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra bi shwa kro d+ha ku ru sar+b+bA
352b7(rgyud): rU ta ya sid+d+ha ye hU~M phaT/ 'jug gam phyir ni byung ba na// srad bu'i 'og 'jug yid bsams nas// rdo rje shug su brjod pa ste// de yis ri mo brgal bar bya// de la rdo rje shugs kyi snying po ni 'di'o// oM badz+ra
352b8(rgyud): be grA kra ma hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor dang por de bzhin du// lha 'og go rims ji bzhin du// rdo rje sgyu ma la sogs bri// de la dam tshig gi snying po ni 'di rnams yi no// oM badz+ra tsakra hUM/ oM
353a1(rgyud): badz+ra bA d+d+hA hUM/ oM badz+rad tA ka sha hUM/ oM badz+ra a yud+ha hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor gnyis pa de bzhin te// rdo rje 'khyil pa la sogs pa// rdo rje khro bo bzhag par
353a2(rgyud): bya// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM pra dz+wa li ta di p+ta badz+ra hUM/ oM badz+ra so me hUM/ oM badz+radat+tA hUM/ oM badz+ra bi kr-i ta hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// sgo ni bzhi po rnamasu yang // rdo rje glang
353a3(rgyud): sna la sogs pa// thams cad rim pa bzhin du bri// de dag gi dam tshig gi snying po ni 'di rnams yino// oM badz+ra d+ha ma hUM/ oM badz+ra mA la hUM/ oM badz+ra ar+tha hUM/ oM badz+ra a si hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas
353a4(rgyud): nis dkyil 'khor gsum par bri ba ni// lta 'og rim pa ji ba bzhin du// rdo rje tho ba la sogs pa'o// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yino// oM badz+ra mu sa la hUM/ oM badz+ra pA tra hUM/ oM
353a5(rgyud): badz+ra dz+wa la hUM/ oM badz+ra gra ha hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal na sa ni// dkyil 'khor bzhi par bri ba ni// rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs bran// lta 'og rim pa bzhin du'o// de dag gi snying po ni
353a6(rgyud): 'di rnams yin no// oM badz+ra daSh+Ta hUM/ oM badz+ra mA ra NahUM/ oM badz+ra be ga hUM/ oM badz+ra ha ra Na hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// phyi rol dkyil 'khor bzhag pa ni// lha 'og rim pa ji bzhin du// ma mo
353a7(rgyud): thams cad bri bar bya// de nas rdo rje sgo bzhir yang // sgo ba rnams kyang de bzhin no// de nas rab tu bshad bya ni// cho ga rgyas pa ji bzhin pa'o// de nas 'jig rten gsum po'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen
353a8(rgyud): po 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i las kun byas te/ rdo rje slob dpon nyid rdo rje khro bo ti rin ti ri'i phyag rgya bcings te 'di skad sgo zhig/ ngas khyod la rdo rje dam tshig gi ye shes bskyed par byas/ de khyod kyi su la
353b1(rgyud): yang ma smra shig/ mi bde ba ma spangs pas khyod dus byas te dmyal bar lhung nga re zhes bsgo ste mna'i snying po 'di sbyin// rdo rje khro bo ta rin ti ri'i phyag rgya yang ston cig/ gal te dam tshig las 'das na/ 
353b2(rgyud): rdo rje khro bo chen po yis// dam tshig khyod kyi rigs bsregs pas// klad pa nas ni brtsams nas kyang // lus rnams ma rungs par yang byed// dam tshig bcing ba'o// de nas rdo rje 'chang ba'i las kyi
353b3(rgyud): phyag rgya'i snying po 'dis bcing // oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+hA ra/ grih+Na bi d+ha sa ma ya hUM/ de nas 'di'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad// lag gnyis zla za 'og tu btang // mthe bo mthe'u chung spel ba dang / 
353b4(rgyud): las kyi phyag rgya dam tshig 'di// rdo rje bcing ba zhes kyang bsha dad// de nas rdo rje'i chus dbang bskur te// snying po ni 'di yin// / oM badz+ra a b+hi She ka a b+hi Shiny+tsa badz+ra d+hA ra te sa ma gr-i gr-i/ de nas
353b5(rgyud): g.yogs pas gdong g.yogs te/ snying po 'dis gzhug/ oM badz+ra pra be sha ya/ badz+ra pra be sha ya/ badz+ra A bi sha a bi sha a d+hi tiSh+Tha badz+ra hUM/ de nas bcug nas snying po 'dis me
353b6(rgyud): tog gtor ro// oM pra tIts+tsha a d+hi tiSh+Tha badz+ra ho// de nas de dag lhung ba de 'dis 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas gdong g.yogs pa bkrol nas dkyil 'khor go rims bzhin du bstan te/ lha gang yin pa de ni de
353b7(rgyud): la mi bstan to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can log par lta ba dag yod de gang dag ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan rnams kyi ye shes gdon mi za ba ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rigasu phyag na rdo rjes
353b8(rgyud): dbang bskur ba de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dam zhes dad par mi 'gyuraro zhes pa ni dam tshig go/ gzhan du na lha gang la dad pa de dag la mna'i snying po 'di byin nas bstan par bya'o// de nas rdo rje'i rin po che'i mtshan
354a1(rgyud): ma'i phreng bas dbang bskur nas las kyi rdo rje lag pa gnyisu byin la/ rdo rje ming btags te ji ltar rdo rje dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po bzhin du bya'o// de nas phyag rgya chen po bcing ba
354a2(rgyud): bslab bo// rdo rje bcing bad ma byas te// mthe bong nang du sbyar nas ni// mdzub mo bkug nas gnyi gas bkab// sems dpa'i gtsug tor zhes bya'o// rdo rje bcing ba byas nas ni// mthe
354a3(rgyud): bo gung mo mthe'u chung sgreng // gzi brjid phung po zhes bya ste// gzi brjid chen po'i btsun pa'o// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te// mthe bo mthe'u chung sbrel ba ni// dam du lcags kyu bcings pa ste// rig pa
354a4(rgyud): chen po dam pa'o// rig pa chen po dam pa yi// phyag rgya bcings nus rab btsir ba// snying kar mthe bo'i ngos kyiso// sems dpa' sri ni snying por bshad// de nyid las gung mo srin lag/ sor mo rab
354a5(rgyud): tu bsdams nas ni// rdo rje rin chen tshul du ni// bsgyur nas gdo/ nga du bzhag par bya// de nyid bskyed de bzhag nas ni// snying // kar yang ni bsgyur bar bya// me tog bzhi pa zhes bya ste// pad+ma'i
354a6(rgyud): rig pa dam pa'o// de nyid spyi bo nas brtsams te// lus kyi dkyil 'khor bskor bar bya// sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'di// rdo rje las ni rab sgrub pa'o// sems ma'i rdo rje dam byas te// mthe'u chung rdo rje sbreng ba
354a7(rgyud): ni// thams cad rig pa'i snying po 'di// phyag rgya 'di ni thams cad sgrub// mthe bo mthe'u chung bcings na ni// g.yon pa'i sor mo dbus ma gsum// rtse gsum pa ni dbus ma'i rtse// rdo rje phyag rgya gzung ba ste// 
354a8(rgyud): rdorje rig pa dam pa 'di// rdo rje mdung zhes bya ba'o// de nas rab tu bshad pa ni// sgyu ma rdo rje la sogs brtags// rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te// g.yon pa'i rdo rje bcing bar bya// rdo rje khu tshur zhes bshad de/ rdo
354b1(rgyud): rje'i rigs ni kun gyi 'di'o// rdo rje de ni gnyis byas te// mtshan ma kun kyang nges pa zhag go// rdo rje'i rigs ni thams cad kyi// phyag rgya rnams kyang 'byung ba ste// sor brkyang steng du bzhag pa dang / 
354b2(rgyud): mdzub mos mtheb stan sbyang ba dang // oM zhes bya ba spyir bzhag nas// rdo rje steng du bzhag pa'o// rig pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs rnam so// rab tu brkyang nas lag gnas pa// lag pa'i
354b3(rgyud): rgyab du de bzhin te// khu tshur bcangs bzhag lag ngar bskum// kha yi phyogasu bskor bar bya// rdo rje khro bo phyag rgya'i tshogs// g.yon pa'i mthe bong steng du bzhag/ phreng ba'i bcing ba'i thabasu sbyar/ 
354b4(rgyud): nor sbyin par ni g.yas pa ste// ral gri'i phyag rgya khu tshur mchog/ 'dus pa'i dbang po'i phyag rgya chen po 'dus pa'o// g.yas pa mdun tu gtun rings 'dzin// lag pa brkyang ba'ang de bzhin/ 
354b5(rgyud): te/ g.yas pa'i 'od ni 'bar bar bstan// rdo rje khu tshur bsgo/  par bya// pho nya'i phyag rgya chen po'i tshogaso// bsgying / sa bcas mdzub mo'i khar mche ba// dbyug pa snun cing gnas/ 
354b6(rgyud): pa dang // dpung pa bskum zhing sbyang ba dang // g.yas pa g.yon gyis 'dren pa'o// bran gyi phyag rgya'i tshogs chen po'i// dkyil 'khor kun tu bya ba ni// g.yon pa'i rdo rje zur nas so// de nas rab tu
354b7(rgyud): bshad pa ni// sgrub pa dang ni las nyid do// sems dpa' gang gi phyag rgya gang // de ni bdag nyid nyid kyis kyang // bdag nyid goms par gyur na ni// phyag rgya dam par 'grub par 'gyur// gtsug tor chen
354b8(rgyud): po srung ba che// gzi brjid phung po rab grub ste// rdo rje sku zhes bya kun byed// snying kar bzhag pa thams cad 'gug/ sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya rnam so// thams cad rig pa thams cad 'grub// rdo rje rig pa
355a1(rgyud): dam pa'o// rdo rje mdung ni phyag rgya che// grub pa chen po sbyin par byed// sgyu ma'i rdo rje rab 'grub pa// dril bu yis ni yang dag 'bebs// dbyug pa'i shing gis mya ngan 'da'/ 
355a2(rgyud): rdorje'i rdo rje gsod par byed// rig pa'i rgyal po rnam so// 'bar ba'i mchog ni ma rung 'dul// zhi ba'i mchog ni thams cad gsod// dbyug pa'i mchog ni gsod pa ste// 'jigs pa'i mig ni
355a3(rgyud): skrag par byed// rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya rnamaso// myos pas rab tu myos par byed// phreng ba kun ni byed par bshad// 'dod byed dga' bar byed pa ste// gsod pa thams cad gsod pa'o// tshegs kyi phyag
355a4(rgyud): rgya rnamaso// tho ba gdug pa 'joms pa ste// ras kyi rgyu ras de bzhin te// 'bar ba'i mchog ni gdug pa sreg/ mnod sbyin ma ni gdon spong ngo do// po nyi'i phyag rgya rnamaso// rdo rje'i
355a5(rgyud): mche ba zab ste// gsod pa thams cad gsod ma'o// bge/ gas byed ma ni rab tu bgegs// 'phrog ma yang ni thams/ cad 'phrog/ bran gyi phyag rgya rnamaso// de bzhin gshegs
355a6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig chen po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po las 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de
355a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gzugs kyi dam tshig las byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso// oM badz+ra ba si tre swA hA/ 
355a8(rgyud): de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM badz+ra d+ha ri hUM/ oM badz+ra bi kra me hUM phaT/ yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig
355b1(rgyud): pangs pa 'di gsungs// oM badz+rad nA kro d+he swAhA// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen ba rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso// oM brda bdun tres hA// de nas yang byang chub sems
355b2(rgyud): dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra kar+m+ma ka re swA hA// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rig pa dam pas rang gi rig pa 'di gsungs// 
355b3(rgyud): oM badz+ra shU lA gre swA hA// de nas rdo rje myur ba'i rig pa'i rgyal pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso// oM badz+ra tsakre hUM/ rdo rje dril bus smras pa/ oM badz+ra gAr+b+ha ke hUM/ thub pa'i rdo rjes smras pa/ oM badz+ra dan+ta
355b4(rgyud): kASh+Te hUM/ rdo rje mtshon chas smras pa/ oM badz+re hUM/ rig pa'i rgyal dpo'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnamaso// de nas rdo/ rje 'khyil pa rdo rje khro bos rang gi snying po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya
355b5(rgyud): rgya 'di smras// oM badz+ra dz+wa le hUM/ de nas rdo rje'od kyis smras pa/ oM badz+ra so me hUM/ de nas rdo rje dbyig pas smras pa/ oM hra dz+radaN+Te hUM/ rdo rje ser smug gis smras pa/ oM badz+ra biSh+Ta Ni hUM/ 
355b6(rgyud): rje khro bo'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnam so// de nas rdo rje glang snas rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya smras pa/ oM badz+ra me de hUM/ rdo rje phreng bas smras pa/ oM badz+ra mA le hUM/ rdo rje dbang gis smras pa/ oM badz+ra a b+hi Shi hUM/ rnam
355b7(rgyud): par rgyal ba'i rdo rjes smras pa/ oM badz+ra a pa rA dzI ta hUM/ rdo rje tshogs kyis bdag po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnam so// de nas rdo rje gtun rings rang gi dam tshig phyag rgya rnams smras pa/ oM badz+ra mu sa la gra ha/ 
355b8(rgyud): hUM/ de nas rdo rje rlung gi smras pa/ oM badz+ra bA te hUM/ rdo rje mes smras pa/ oM badz+ra dz+wa le hUM/ rdo rje 'jigs pas spras pa/ oM badz+ra gra he hUM/ rdo rje po nya'i dam chog gi phyag rgya rnams so// de nas rdo rje lcags
356a1(rgyud): kyus smras pa/ oM badz+ra daMSh+Te hUM/ rdo rje dus kyis smras pa/ oM badz+ra ba she hUM/ rdo rje ngan khrid kyis smras pa/ oM badz+ra big+ha hUM/ rdo rje klus smras pa/ oM badz+ra ha ri Ni hUM/ rdo rje bran gyi dam tshig gi/ 
356a2(rgyud): phyag rgya rnamaso// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsung so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// grwa bzhi pa la byang phyogs sgo// phyi
356a3(rgyud): rol dkyil 'khor srad bus bre// de yi nang du der yang ni// de bzhin sgo ni shar phyogs gdod// de yi dbusu ci rigs par// sangs rgyas gzugs ni bzhag par bya// 'jig rten gsum rgyal la sogs pa// 
356a4(rgyud): bzhi po de yi phyogs kun bzhag/ dkyil 'khor de bzhin gtso dbor yang // rdo rje'i phyag rgya bri bar bya// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rigs kyi phyag rgya bri bar bya// rdo rje glang snal
356a5(rgyud): sogs pa// bzhi po rnams ni sgo srung so// 'jig ma dpal dang nga sgra dbang dang // dur ga g.yon pa'i grwa rnams nas// phyi yi/ grwa rnams phyag rgya ni// de rnams nyid ni bri bar bya// de nas tshe
356a6(rgyud): ga rgyas pa'i rnams// ji bzhin par ni bshad par bya// de nas rdo rje dkyil 'khor 'dir// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byas te rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas dam tshig gi las byas nas rdo rje 'chang ba'i phyag
356a7(rgyud): rgya'i cho ga bzhin du bcings la khyod kyis dam tshig ma mthong ba su'i mdun du yang dam tshig gi phyag rgya de rnams ma smra shig/ gsang ba 'phel bar ma byed cig ces bsgo shig/ de nas las kyi rdo rje de rdo rje 'chang
356a8(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya'i steng du bzhag ste cho ga bzhin du chug shig/ zhugs nas rdo rje de de bzhin du 'or cig/ gang la bab pa de de'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dbang du 'gyur te/ des las thams cad byed do// de nas gdod/ 
356b1(rgyud): g.yogs bkrol nas dkyil 'khor rim bzhin bstan te/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya gsang ba smros shig/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di khyod kyi// rtag tu las kun byed pa ste// ma dang sring mo rnams dang ni// chung ma bu/ 
356b2(rgyud): mo 'dra ba'o// de la de'i snying po ni 'di dag yin no// oM sarba ga ma ni sarba bak+She sA d+ha ya gu h+ya badz+ri ni hUM phaT/ 'di lan cig bzlas pas bud med thams cad dbang du byas te spyad na chos ma yin par mi 'gyur ro// ci/ 
356b3(rgyud): dga' bar thams cad spyad nas bsgrub par bya ste/ de nas sems can thams cad dag par phyag rgya thams cad yid kyis shes nas las dam pa thams cad kyang byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang bas gsungs
356b4(rgyud): so// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bslab par bya'o// dam tshig khro dbo mdzub bcug dang // snying kar yang ni bsdam par bya// ngos da kyi mdzod spu khu nas drang // spyi bor gzhag nas gnyi su bya/ 
356b5(rgyud): g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo yis// mdung rtse rtse gsum mnan par bya'o// 'di bcings pas ni yang dag par rig pa dam pa/ 'ang 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje'i rigs ni thams cad kyi/ 
356b6(rgyud): g.yon pa'i rdo rje gtso bor 'dus// dam tshig cho ga ji bzhin par// phyag rgya bcing ba bshad par bya// thams cad 'khor lo mdzub rtse bcum// dril bu phyag rgya'ang de bzhino// de bzhin oM gi phyag rgya dang // 
356b7(rgyud): seng ge'i rna bar bya ba ste// rig pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya rnamaso// 'bar ba kun tu 'dzin pa dang // 'od ni yang dag 'dus pa nyid// dbyug pa'i khu tshur 'dzin pa dang // kha 'gram phyag rgya bskor ba'o// khro
356b8(rgyud): bo'i dam tshig rnams so// gtum pa'i phyag rgya phreng ba dang // rdo rje mnan nas mdud pa yin// spyi bor bzhag pa tshogs kyi ste// dkyil 'khor gyi ni srung ba'o// tshogs rnams kyi dam tshig go/ lag pa/ 
357a1(rgyud): bskum pa khar bzhag ste// rgyab tu yang ni bskor bar bya// 'bar ba me stag gtong ba ste// phye nas khar yang gnas par bya// pho nya'i dam tshig rnamaso// mtha' ma gnyis ni khar
357a2(rgyud): bcug dang // btsir cing rab tu gnon pa'o// dpung pas stsol bas bsnol ba dang // myur du 'phrogs pa'i nga de bzhin no// bran mo rnams kyi dam tshig go/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje
357a3(rgyud): dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi rdo rje gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzog so// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ 
357a4(rgyud): chos kyi dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje dbyings kyi byin gyis brlab/ das zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rang gi ri dag pa 'di gsung so// oM badz+ra bid/ de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes
357a5(rgyud): rang gi chos kyi dam tshig 'di gsung so// oM ha na ha na badz+ra hUM pha Ta/ de nas yang rdo rje snying pos rang gi chos kyi dam tshig 'di gsung so// oM ha ra ha ra hUM phaT/ de nas yang rdo rje spyan gyis rab
357a6(rgyud): gi chos kyi dam tshig 'di gsungaso// oM mA ra mA ra hUM phaT/ de nas yang rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi chos kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so// oM ku ru ku ru hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje rig pa dam pas rang gi chos kyi
357a7(rgyud): dam tshig 'di gsungs so// oM hUM hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje sgyu mas smras pa/ oM ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/ oM A bi sha A bi sha hUM phaT/ oM b+hur b+hu ba sa hUM phaT/ oM b+hin+da b+hin+da hUM phaT/ rig pa'i rgyal po rnams kyi'o// 
357a8(rgyud): oM da ma da ma hUM phaT/ oM mA ra ya mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya hUM phaT/ oM b+ha ya b+ha ya hUM Takhro bo rnams kyi'o// oM d+ha ma d+ha ma hUM phaT/ oM b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha hUM phaT/ oM ba shi b+ha ba hUM phaT/ oM dza ya dza ya hUM phaT/ 
357b1(rgyud): tshogs rnams kyi'o// oM b+hu b+h+yo hU~M phaT/ oM g+hu g+hu hU~M phaT/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la hUM phaT/ oM khAd khAng hUM phaT/ pho nya rnams kyi'o// oM kha ma kha na hUM phaT/ oM ma ra ma ra hU~M phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM phaT/ oM bi b+ha bi b+ha hU
357b2(rgyud): phaT/ bran mo rnams kyi'o// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor de/ 
357b3(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo bzhin// dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs// thams cad snyoms par zhugs pa'o// chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul lta bu// snying kar
357b4(rgyud): mtshan ma yang dag bzhag/ de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'dir cho ga bzhin du las byas nas rdo rje 'chang ba'i phyag rgya rdo rje dril bu bcangs pa bcings te 'di skad smos shig/ khyod kyis dam/ 
357b5(rgyud): tshig ma mthong ba dang / lha'i rigs ma mthong ba su la yang ma smra shig ces bsgol dril bu dkrol du chug shig 'di skad/ bsgos nas kyang mna'i snying po byin la/ ji ltar dril bu 'di dkrol
357b6(rgyud): ba'i// de'i sgra ji ltar mi rtag pa// de bzhin las kyi rdo rje khyod// mi brtag par ni ma rungs byed// rdo rje slob dpon sti stang med// rdo rje gros dang mi mdza' dang // gdug la byams dang skye bar ni// gal te/ 
357b7(rgyud): khyod kyis byas na'o// de nas gdong g.yogs dkrol la// dkyil 'khor bstan te// chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes slob shig/ sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs// chos kyi dkyil 'khor
357b8(rgyud): ji bzhin// thams cad mnyam pa nyid bsam pa// rdo rje rig pa dam pa ste// 'gro ba 'di dag sgyu ma bzhin// de bzhin sdug bsngal dril bu 'dra// sdug bsngal thams cad mya ngan 'dar// rdo rje 'joms pas/ 
358a1(rgyud): na med// rig pa'i rgyal po ting 'dzin rnamaso// sems can gdul phyir khro bo mchog/ zhi ba yis ni nges par gsod// dbyug pa 'dra la 'tshogs pa med// log par lta ba/ 
358a2(rgyud): 'jigs par byed// khro bo'i ting 'dzin rnamaso// ra ro 'dra bar dpa' ba med// phreng ba 'dra bar 'ching ba med// bud med 'dod pas 'gro dbang byed// brtan pa tsam gyis gzhan pham mo// tshogs kyi ting
358a3(rgyud): 'dzin rnamaso// 'tshog pa'i chad pa'i mchog yin te// reg pa rnams ni rlung gi'o// gzi brjid can ni byin za mchog/ zas rnams kyi nang khrag dam pa// po nya'i ting 'dzin rnams so// mche
358a4(rgyud): ba dag par zhugs pa ste// 'chi bdag thams cad gnas na 'dug/ 'jigs las lhag pa'i bgegs gzhan me da// chu las lhag pa'i ro gzhan med// bran gyi tingange 'dzin
358a5(rgyud): rnamaso// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig/ gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las rdo rje'i rigs thams ca da kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs
358a6(rgyud): so// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig las 'byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi
358a7(rgyud): rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM badz+ra karma pra brta ni sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM badz+ra bi la se pU dzA ya hUM/ de nas
358a8(rgyud): rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso// oM a b+hi She ka a b+hiShiny+tsa hUM/ de nas rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso// oM badz+ra gI te ga hi hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sna
358b1(rgyud): tshogs kyis rang gi las kyi rig pa 'di gsungs pa/ oM badz+ra nr-i t+ye nr-i t+ye hUM/ de nas rdo rje rig pa dam pas rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di gsung so// oM badz+ra bi d+yo tata ma ne tra bi kur bahUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje grwa/ 
358b2(rgyud): bo rdo rje me'i lha mos rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha badz+ra ag+ne dz+wa la tri shU lan bi na hr-i da ya badz+ri Ni hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje gser lha chen mos rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smraso// oM
358b3(rgyud): badz+ra he ma ts+tshin+da tsakre Ne badz+ri Ni hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje gzhon nu mas rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smraso// oM badz+ra ku mA ra shI gAM A be sha ya gan+d+ha shab+de na badz+ra pA Ni pri ye badz+ra sa ma ye ma nu sma ra Na hU~M phaT/ 
358b4(rgyud): nas lha mo chen mo rdo rje zhi bas rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras// / oM badz+ra shA ti dza pa dza pa a g+ha ma la ya sad+d+h+ya na mA ra ya ta tri h+ye hUM phaT/ de nas lha mo chen mo rdo rje khu tshur gyis rang gi
358b5(rgyud): las kyi dam tshig 'di smraso// oM badz+ra muSh+Ti ha na ha na badz+ra b+hin+da/ b+hin+da pA Di ya/ pI Da ya/ sar+b+ba duSh+Ta hr-i da yA ni oM sum+b+ha ni/ sum+b+ha hUM phaT/ rig pa'i rgyal mo rnams kyi'o// de nas de rdo rje
358b6(rgyud): mi 'chi ba khro bos rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smraso// oM badz+ra a mr-i ti badz+ra duSh+TAM g+h+r-ih+Na ban+d+ha ha na sar+b+ba bi d+hi sa ya/ bi nA sha ya ts+tshin+da ba bo ku ru mut+ta ni/ ta ya badz+re na ye ke tsi ta ma ma mu ka ra bi na yA ka tan+ta ma
358b7(rgyud): dIp+ta kro d+ha badz+ri hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje mdangs can gyis rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras// oM badz+ra kAn+ti mA ra ya sau me rU pa pra ti ba ta rA ge na shI g+h+raM s+pho Ta ya badz+ra d+ha ra t+ye na ma hA dz+yo sna ka ra le shi ta rasmai badz+ra Ni hUM
358b8(rgyud): paphaT/ de nas rdo rje dbyug pa'i mchog mas rang gi las kyi snying po 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra dat+na kr-i g+hA ta ya hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje tsong tsong khro bo chen pos rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras// oM badz+ra mA la me
359a1(rgyud): kha le kha na Sha na gas ba de ni ba shI ku ru traM daMSh+Te mA ra ya bi sha ne hUM phaT/ khro bo'i rigs pa rnamaso// de nas rdo rje 'dzums rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa/ oM badz+ra ba la ye me ts+tshin+da
359a2(rgyud): si na b+hin+da pa badz+ri Ni mA ra ya u ma da ya bi ba pi ba hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje zas kyis rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa/ oM badz+ra a sha ne pa kr-I ya sar+b+ba duSh+TAM badz+rad sha ne sha ga ti d+ha ra Ni ma nu sha ma nu sha ma na se a ha/ 
359a3(rgyud): re Na ra ru ti sa shuta tsa pra ya ma dza ba sA nu le pa na bi le ba ta gra tre/ a na ya sar+b+ba dan+d+ha n+ya ya hi ru Na ya hi ru Na su bar+N+Na a di ni gra ma ya de ba rak+Sha Ni hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje bgo bas rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa
359a4(rgyud): oM badz+ra bA sa ni A na ya sar+b+ba sra an+d+ra pa Na din+yA ba ka ra Na ni shig+h+na/ dab shA~M ku ru dI pad me pra yats+tsha a bi sha sa t+yaM ka ta ya badz+ra koShadad+hA ra Ni hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje dbang gis rang gi las kyi dam tshig/ 
359a5(rgyud): smras so// oM badz+ra ba shi A na ya ba shi ku ru sar+b+bA pri ya sar+b+bA pu ru Sha na da sa~M ku ru kru nga pra se da ya sar+b+be b+h+yaHba ha re b+h+yo d+ha ra ya bi tsa ra ya ka ri badz+ra pa ta ka d+hA ra Ni hUM phaT/ rdo rje tshogs
359a6(rgyud): kyi'o// de nas rdo rje po nya mos rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras so// oM badz+ra duSh+Ti a na ya sar+b+ba maN+Da lam pra be sha ya/ A be sha ya ban+d+ha ya sar+b+ba kar+m+ma Ni me ku ru shI g+h+raM shI gA li gu la ta sa ye mA ra ya/ dpya
359a7(rgyud): ba re b+h+yo d+ha ra ya bi dza yaM ka ri badz+ra pa ta ka d+hA ra NI hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje shugs kyi rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa/ oM be ga badz+ri Ni g+ha g+hA g+hA g+hA sha ba de mA ra ya bi g+hi ra bi d+hi sa ya badz+ra pA sha d+hA ra NI hUM phaT/ 
359a8(rgyud): de nas rdo rje 'bar bas rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'ong smras pa/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la ya dz+wa la ya sar+b+ba badz+ra dz+wa la ya dz+wa la ya da ha da ha b+hismai ku ru hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje 'jigs mas rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa/ oM/ 
359b1(rgyud): badz+ra bi ga te pra be karaSh+Ta ka rA la kA rA lA bi sha na bA ka tre shig+h+na 'i rdzaswa be sha ya bak+Sha ya rud+hi ra pi pa ma hA yak+Shi Ni badz+ra pA sha d+hA ra Ni hU~M phaT/ rdo rje po nya mo rnams kyi'o// de nas rdo rje'i bzhin rdo rje bran mo'i rang gi
359b2(rgyud): las kyi dam tshig smras so// oM badz+ra muSh+Ti A na ya badz+ra daSh+Ti ba ya ni ka pa tA la ni ba si ni kha na kha na/ khA hi khA hi sar+b+ba mu khaM pra be sha ya s+pho Ta ya mA ra mA ra Ni sar+b+ba duSh+TA nA badz+ri Ni shi ta si d+ha ri NI hUM phaT/ de nas rba/ 
359b3(rgyud): rje dus mas rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa/ oM badz+ra kA li ma hA pre ta du bi ni ma nu Sha mA sa ru d+hi ra pri ye e h+ye hi gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ badz+ra DA ki ni badz+ra shAM kha le sar+b+ba de ba ga Na mA tr-i b+hU te/ ha ra ha ra pA NAM/ a mu ka
359b4(rgyud): s+ya ka pA la mA lA la kr-i ta sar+b+ba ka ye kany+tsi ra ya si badz+ra kha dzA gad+hA dari Ni pre ta ma nu Sha sha ri ra shI g+h+raM A be sha ya pra pe sha ya/ da ban+d+ha ya mA ra ya badz+ra rA k+Sha si hU hUM hUM hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje bskul
359b5(rgyud): mas rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smra so// oM badz+ra pu ta me ma nu/ ya ma na sa sar+b+ba ru d+hi ra mu tra pu ri sha shi li smA shI g+h+nA na rakato gar+b+ha hi ra NA ya hi shI gI ma ti ma mu ka sa ku ru badz+ra sho d+ha ni ka d+hA/ 
359b6(rgyud): riNI sar+b+ba kar+m+ma Ni me ku ru swAhA hUM/ de nas rdo rje ma ka ras rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa/ oM 'adz+ra ma ka re gra sa gras shai g+h+ra pra be sha ya pA tA laM b+hak+Sha ya badz+ra ma ker d+ha ra NI hU~M phaT/ rdo rje bran mo rnams
359b7(rgyud): kyi'o// de nas phyag na rdo rjes yang rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungaso// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis
359b8(rgyud): nis dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bre// dkyil 'khor mchog ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas dbus na bzhugs par bya// de dag phyogasu rim par yang // sems dpa' chen po rnams bzhag/ 
360a1(rgyud): de yi dbusu chung mar bcas// rdo rje rig pa dam pa nyid// rdo rje la s+ye la sogs gsang // gar gyi mchod la sogs pas mchod// de la lha mo'i go rims bzhin// 'khor lo/ 
360a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin du// rang gi phyag rgya phyag rgya 'dra// gar byed par yang bri bar bya// sangs rgyas rdo rje can mchod phyir// rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyiso// gra dang sgo yi phyogs rnamasu// bdug pa/ 
360a3(rgyud): la sogs rim pa bzhin// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i las byas nas rdo rje 'chang ba'i las kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin bcings te 'di skad smos shig
360a4(rgyud): khyod kyis lha'i rim pa ma mthong ba dang las mi shes pa su la ya dang gsang ba'i las 'di ma smra zhig/ khyod dam tshig nyams ra par gyur ta re zhes smros shig/ rdo rje slob dpon rang gi las kyi
360a5(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te khro bo'i lta ba sa blta zhing 'di skad brjod do// oM badz+ra satwa r+ya A be sha ya pra be sha ya nri te ba ya sar+b+ba kar+m+ma sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha hUM/ AH
360a6(rgyud): hUM a la la la la badz+ri de nas yang bdag la babs nas bdag nyid kyis 'jug ste phyag rgya dang 'dra ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyi gar gyi mchod pas mchod par bya'o// de phyin chad lus dang / ngag dang / 
360a7(rgyud): lta ba dang / yid dang / rdo rje'i phyag rgya rnams kyi las thams cad 'dod pa bzhin byed pa'o// de nas gdong g.yogs pa bkrol te/ gar gyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes slobs shig/ sangs rgyas
360a8(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin sogs kyi// dam tshig mchog ni gnyis byas te// rdo rje rig pa dam pa la// rdo rje la s+yai la sogs mchod// rig pa 'di rnams thams cad kyang // lha 'og go rims ji bzhin du// gar gyi/ 
360b1(rgyud): mchod pa byug rgyalas// las kya kyil 'khor mchod pa g+sa// rdo rdzog kyi tshul gyis saphyag tu chen po mdar bsdus so// das tshig mchog na gnyis byas nas/ 
360b2(rgyud): las kyi phyag rgya dgrol bar bya// gar gyi mchod pa 'di yis ni// gtso bo thams cad mchod na ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa che sogs kyi// las grub par yang nges par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa
360b3(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po las rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje
360b4(rgyud): rigs de dag thams cad sems can thams cad kyi don du bskos de nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu bzhag ste mkhyen bzhi dan du bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
360b5(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag gsang pa thams cad 'dzin par dbang bskur na de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa'i gsang ba de gang lags/ bka' stsol cig de nas
360b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba 'di gsung so// sems can
360b7(rgyud): rnams kyi rang bzhin ni// ji lta ji ltar 'dul 'gyur ba// de lta de ltar sems can don// 'dod chags la sogs gsang bas bya// de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rdo rje gsang ba 'di gsungaso// sems
360b8(rgyud): can thams cad pan phyir dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa'i phyir// sems can thams cad bsad kyang ni// sdig gis gos par mi 'gyuraro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying
361a1(rgyud): pos rang gi nor bu gsang ba 'di gsungaso// sems can thams cad phan phyir dang // sangs rgyas don du sbyor ba yis// pha rol nor rnams phrogs kyang ni// sdig pas
361a2(rgyud): gos par mi 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi gsang ba'i pad+mo 'di gsungaso// 'dod chags 'dra ba'i bde ba med// rgyal ba la ni de phul ba// gzhan gyi chung ma sems
361a3(rgyud): can phyir// bsten pas bsod nams thob par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi las kyi gsang ba 'di gsung so// sems can thams cad pan phyir dang // sangs
361a4(rgyud): rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa yi// las rnams thams cad byas pa// yis// bsod nams shin tu mang po rnyed// de nas pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pas
361a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gsang ba 'dzin pa'i rdo rje 'chang ba legaso zhe sa bstan pa/ leg so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod// rdo rje rin chen khyod leg so// rdo rje chos khyod legs pa ste// rdo
361a6(rgyud): rje las ni khyod lagaso// mdo 'di lags par smras pa ste// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
361a7(rgyud): cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// // bam po drug pa// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs
361a8(rgyud): pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi bdag po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab pa// pad+mo sems
361b1(rgyud): dpa' pad+mo che// 'jig rten dbang phyug dbang phyug che// spyan ras gzigs dbang bstan pa'i mchog/ rdo rje chos la phyag 'tshalo// chos kyi rgyal po dag pa che// sems dpa'i rgyal po blo gros che// pad+ma'i
361b2(rgyud): bdag nyid pad+ma che// pad+mo'i mgon khyod phyag 'tshalo// pad+ma las byung pad+mo'i 'od// pad+mo dag par rab dga' byed// rdo rje pad+mo pad+ma mchog lus// pad+mo pad+mo khyod phyag 'tshal// sna tshogs chen po snang ba che
361b3(rgyud): dgos pa chen po che dang mtshungs// brtan pa chen po dpa' ba che// dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshalo// sems can bsam pa theg pa che// rnal 'byor chen po mes po che// bde za bde byed dag pa'i don// sangs
361b4(rgyud): rgyas pad+mo khyod phyag 'tshal// chos de nyid don dam pa'i chos// dag dpa'i chos ni chos rab 'dzin// chos chen shin tu chos mtsho dag pa// chos kyi 'khor lo khyod phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas sems
361b5(rgyud): dpa' sems mchog gtso// chos kyi sems dpa' chos mchog/ 'dzin// sems dpa' dam pa sems mchog 'dzin// sems dpa' sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal// spyan ras
361b6(rgyud): gzigs dbang mtshon pa'i mchog/ mgon po chen po rnam gzigs gtso// 'jig rten snang ba 'jig rten don// 'jig rten mgon po khyod phyag 'tshal// 'jig rten yi ge yi ge che// yi ge mchog
361b7(rgyud): ni yi ge 'dra// yi ge yi ge thams cad gzigs// 'khor lo'i yig khyod phyag 'tshal// phyag na pad+mo pad chen po// dbugs 'byin pa ni sbyin pa po// sangs rgyas chos ni sangs rgyas che// sangs rgyas
361b8(rgyud): bdag nyid khyod phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas gzugs ni gzugs chen po// rdo rje'i gzugs ni gzugs bzang ldan// chos kyi snang ba gzi brjid mchog/ 'jig rten snang khyod phyag 'tshalo// pad+ma'i
362a1(rgyud): dpal ni mgon po gtso// chos dpal mgon po mgon ldan pa// tshangs pa'i mgon po tshangs chen po// tshangs sras khyod la phyag 'tshalo// snang ba snang mchog snang ba'i gtso/ 
362a2(rgyud): snang gsal shin tu snang ba'o// snang ba'i mgon po mgon po che// sangs rgyas sdang khyod phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas dbang bskur sangs rgyas mchog/ sangs rgyas sras po mkhas chen po// sangs rgyas dbang / 
362a3(rgyud): bskur gtsug gi mchog/ sangs rgyas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas spyan ni spyan chen po// chos spyan gzigs pa chen po yis// ting 'dzin ye shes thams cad pa// rdo rje spyan khyod phyag 'tsha
362a4(rgyud): lo'i bdag nyid kun gyi yon tan 'di// khyed ni mtshan brgya rtsa brgya dad rnams// bstod nas goms par byed pa ni// 'jig rten/ dbang po thob par 'gyur// dpa' bo khyod la gsol gad ba
362a5(rgyud): pa / rang gi rigs rnams bskyed nas kyang // chos kyi 'khor mo dam pa ni// thub pa chen pos bshad par gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs
362a6(rgyud): dbang pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsol ba btab pa'i tshig thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der mngon du phyogs te/ 'dug nas rdo rje pad+mo de rang gi
362a7(rgyud): thugs kar bzhag ste ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o rab tu dag pa ni// bdag gi rdo rje pad+mo 'di// pa yin 'di ni bdag gi bu// rigs 'di byin gyis brlab par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan
362a8(rgyud): 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi dam tshig las byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs pad+mo zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
362b1(rgyud): chos kyi dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ngo // hriHde nas de byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kha nas pad+mo lta bu'i/ 
362b2(rgyud): 'od zer kha dog dang / gzugs dang / rtags dang / spyod lam dang / 'od rnam pa du ma byung ste 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'dod chags la sogs pa rnam par dag pa dang / chos nyid kyi ye shes yang
362b3(rgyud): dag par sbyangs nas yang slar log ste 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i thugs kar zhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi/ 
362b4(rgyud): rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM badz+ra pad+moSh+Tha ma hrIHde nas byad chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa'i ngag sungs so// oM badz+ra bid+yA hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems
362b5(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa'ing gsung so// oM badz+ra rat+not+ta ma tra/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam
362b6(rgyud): pa 'di gsungaso// oM badz+ra bi d+yot+ta ma hrIHde nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso// oM badz+ra bid+yot+ta ma a/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan
362b7(rgyud): ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gzugs thams cad ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ dgra thams cad 'dul ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rang gi snying po 'di gsungaso// oM badz+ra hUM hrIHho// 
362b8(rgyud): de nas de smras ma thag tu 'phags pa spyan rang gzigs kyi dbang po'i thugs las bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i gzugs 'dzin pa pad+mol bzhugs te/ phyag
363a1(rgyud): rgya'i mtshan ma bad+mo 'dzin pa'i kha dog dang / gzugs dang / cha lugs dang / rgyan sna tshogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa sems dpa' thams cad kyi gzugs
363a2(rgyud): 'dzin pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lusu gyur nas byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad ji ltar 'dul bar so so'i gzugasu bstan nas ma lus pa lus med pa'i sems can
363a3(rgyud): gyi khams gdul bar byas te yang slar log nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i phyogs thams cad kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams la 'a'od
363a4(rgyud): nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas tha dmas cad kyi// thabs ni snying rje bdag nyid de// gang du thab das kyis 'dul mdzad na// lha rnamasu yang 'gyur ba yin/ 
363a5(rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang pos rang gi ga pa bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sa
363a6(rgyud): can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang / don dang / grub pa dam pa dang / rdo rje chos nyid dang / ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu rgyu rnyed pa'i phyir phul nas 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes
363a7(rgyud): bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bshad do// de nas rab tu bshad bya// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ste// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs/ 
363a8(rgyud): bzhis ni rgyan pa dang // srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa ste// dar dang phreng bas rgyan pa dang // dkyil 'khor grwa ni thams cad dang // sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams// rdo rje rin chen gyis brgyan par// phyi rol gyis
363b1(rgyud): 'khor srad bu bre// de yi nang du srad pu ni// gru bzhi par ni bre bar bya// gnyis pa'i grwa ni sgo gdod cing // pad+mo 'dra bar bya ba yin// ka ba brgyad kyi tshul du ni// pad+mo 'dab ma brgyad pa bri// de yi ge sar dbusu
363b2(rgyud): ni/ sangs rgyas kyi ni sku gzugs bzhag/ de la sangs rgyas bzhag pa'i snying po ni 'di yin no// bud+d+ha hUM/ sangs rgyas phyogs kun bri ba ni// pad+mo'i dbusu gnas pa yi// rdo rje rin chen pad+mo dang // sna tshogs
363b3(rgyud): pad+mo'ang de bzhin// de la da rnams kyi snying po ni 'di yin no// oM hUM hrIHkr-i/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// der ni spyan ras gzigs dbang bri// gzugs rnams
363b4(rgyud): thams cad 'byin pa ste// de yi phyogs ni thams cad du// rdo rje gying la sogs tshul du// sangs rgyas la sogs sems dpa' mtshan ma pad+mo 'chang ba bri// de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// 
363b5(rgyud): a o ta thA ga ta d+harma hUM/ oM badz+ra pad+ma a~M ku sha ko Sha d+hA ra badz+ra sar+b+baphaT/ oM mA ra ya mA ra ya/ pad+ma ku su ma a yung+ga d+ha ra a/ mo gA sha ho// oM pad+ma sa b+hA pad+ma has+t+ra sa d+hu n+tu/ rdo rje shugs
363b6(rgyud): kyis brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor gnyis pa de bzhin te// de yi dbu su bri ba ni// thor tshugs dbus na'ang de bzhin gshegs// de yi phyogs ni thams cad du// khro gnyer la sogs tshul du ni// mtshan
363b7(rgyud): mar pad+mo 'chang bri ba// lta 'og go rims ji bzhin bya de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// hUM/ oM pad+ma b+hi ku Ti Ti Ti tra/ oM pad+ma sUr+ya dz+wa la hUM/ oM pad+ma ma Ni ke tu d+ha ra tsan+da pra ha da la a ba lo ki ti shwa ra de
363b8(rgyud): hi me sar+b+ba ar+d+ha na shI g+haM sa ma ya hUM/ oM pad+ma an+d+ra ha sa e ka da sha mu ka ha ha ha ha hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor gsum pa'ang de bzhin te// sems dpa' chen po snyoms zhugs par
364a1(rgyud): pad+ma steng du bzhug par bri// de yi phyogs ni thams cad du// lha 'og go rams ji bzhin bya// pad+mo la sogs tshul du ni// sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang bzhag/ de la de dag gi snying / 
364a2(rgyud): ni 'di rnams yin no// hri oM ShA ra pad+ma a ba lo ka ya mA ma sa ma ya satwa d+hu/ oM pad+ma ku mA ra pad+ma shak+Shi d+ha ra kha ra ge na ts+tshin+dats+tshin+da hU~M phaT/ oM bidA ni la kar+N+Na sha ra ka tsakra ga ta ba dA pA N+Di bAg+na ha tsarma Ni bas ni kraSh+Tasarba/ 
364a3(rgyud): kr-i ta yadz+nyo bI ta a dzi narma ba tsatsa n+dod// d+ha ri ya nA rA yan ru bad re tre ni mu kha aT+TaT+Ta sa na pra be sha ya sa ma ya na/ he hi me sid+d+hi a ba lo ki te shwa ra hUM/ oM brah+ma pad+ma saM b+ha ba dza ba dza ba pad+ma b+hA sha hUM/ rdo rje shugs
364a4(rgyud): kyis brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor bzhi pa'ang de bzhin te/ dader ni pad+ma zhal bzhi pa// pad+mo mdung rtse thogs par bri/ dang yi phyogs ni thams cad du// rdo rje gar la sogs tshul du/ 
364a5(rgyud): mtshan ma pad+mo 'dzin brig// sems dpa' chen po'i cho ga bzhin// de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di rnams yino// hriHoM pad+mA na/ shwa ra na tha pU dza sa sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra karma sa ma ya/ A kaR+ShaH/ 
364a6(rgyud): pra be sha ya ban+d+ha ya A be sha sarba karma sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha a ba lo ki te shwa ra hUM/ oM ba yan d+ha tang a ba lo ki te shwa ra rak+Sha ban+d+ha ya ka btse sa ma ye hUM/ oM mahA pra tsaN+De bi shwa rU ba tsi ka/ pad+mad+maSh+Ta A ka ra la bi shwa na
364a7(rgyud): badz+ra hrid ya pad+ma yak+Sha khA dra khAd d+hig+nig+ni g+ni ka/ oM pad+ma muSh+Ti sa ma ya s+t+waM ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// grwa rnams kun tu bri ba ni// rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs tshul// pad+ma ma sgeg mo la sogs
364a8(rgyud): de dag gi ni phyag rgya 'di rnams/ oM pad+ma la s+ye rag ya ma sde rigam bu dzas ma ya hU/ oM pad+ma mA le a b+hi'i ny+tsa/ a b+hi re/ pU dzas ma ye hUM/ oM bad+ma gi t+yai gI te pU dzas ma ma d+hu/ oM pad+ma ma ni wi sa rba
364b1(rgyud): dza pra bar+d+ha na sa ma ya hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni// phyi rol dkyil 'khor grwa rnamasu// pad+ma'i mchod pa la sogs bzhi// mchod pa'i lha rnams bri'o// de la de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams yino// oM pad+ma
364b2(rgyud): d+hu pe pU dza sa ma ye pra hr-id ya pad+ma ku la da yi te ma hA ga Ni pad+ma ra ti hUM/ oM pad+ma pUSh+pe pU dza sa ma ye pad+ma ba si ma hA bIr+ya pad+ma ku la pra ri ha ri sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ya hUM/ oM pad+ma di baM pU dze sa ma ya pad+ma ku la sun+d+ha ri ma hA t+ya t+ya
364b3(rgyud): A lo ka badz+ra pa tsi na ya pad+ma sa ra swa ti hUM/ oM pad+ma gan+d+ha pU dza sa ma ye ma hA pad+ma ku la tsi raM ku ru karma Ni me pad+ma sid+d+ha hUM/ de nas pad+ma'i sgo bzhi po// kun tu tshegs sogs ji bzhin du// ji lta ba bzhin legs
364b4(rgyud): bri ba// de dag snying po'i don gyis ni// ji bzhin par ni bri bar bya// / oM ha ya grI ba ma hA pad+ma aM ku sha A kaR+Sha ya shI g+haM sarba pad+ma dku la sa ma yan pad+ma aM ku sha d+hA ra hU dzaHoM a mo g+ha pA sha kro d+ha
364b5(rgyud): A kaR+Sha ya pra be sha ya ma hA pa shu pa ti ya ma ba ru Na ku be ra pra de sha d+hA ra pad+ma ku la sa ma ye hUM hUM/ oM pad+ma s+pho Ta s+pho Ta ban+d+ha sar+b+ba pad+ma ku la sa ma yaM shI g+h+ra hUM baM/ oM Sha mu kha san ta ku ma ra be ShA
364b6(rgyud): d+ha ra pad+ma g+haN+De A be sha ya sarba pad+ma ku la sa ma yaM sarba mu dra ma ban+d+ha ya sarba sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha pad+ma a be sha a a a a/ de nas 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa bshad do// 
364b7(rgyud): de la dang por pad+mo'i slob dpon nyid rdo rje pad+mo'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs te/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du snying po 'dis las rnams bya'o// oM ma hA pad+ma s+pho Ta s+phoT
364b8(rgyud): a d+hi ShAs/ de nas de bzhin du bka' mnos nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bdag nyid dbang bskur te/ pad+mo'i dbyibs bslabs nas rang gi pad+mo'i ming brjod la pad+mo lcags kyug la sogs pas las rnams bya'o// 
365a1(rgyud): de nas chos kyi phyag rgya de dag gis sems dpa' chen po rnams bsgrub par bya'o// de nas dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin no// de nas pad+mo slob ma rnams gzhug par bya ste/ de nas dang
365a2(rgyud): / bo pad+mo'i slob ma rnams/ mna'i snying po byin la 'di skad du bsgo bar bya'o// deng ni khyod kyi snying kan// pad+mo sems dpa' nyid bzhugs te// ji ste tshul 'di smras na ni// de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ 
365a3(rgyud): de nas yang 'di skad du bsgo bar bya ste/ gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di su la yang ma smra shig/ khyod kyis mi bde ba ma spangs pas dus byas nas sems can dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re/ de nas snying
365a4(rgyud): po 'dis dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o// oM badz+ra bang+ga/ das ma ya s+t+waM/ de nas gos dkar po bgos la dar dkar po das gdong g.yogs nas gzhug par bya ste/ snying po 'di yin no/ 
365a5(rgyud): oM pad+ma sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de nas las rnams ji lta bzhin du byas na sa pad+mo'i dbyibs lag tu sbyin no// oM pad+ma ha sta d+harma han lA ya he ne/ de nas 'di skad du pad+mo'i chos nyid ji lta bu lags zhes
365a6(rgyud): dri bar bya'o// de la yang 'di skad du brjod par bya'o// ji ltar pad+mo dkar po 'di// 'dod pa'i nyes pas mi chags bzhin// thams cad dag par bsgoms na ni// de bzhin sdig pas chags mi 'gyur// de la chos
365a7(rgyud): nyid ni 'di yin no// de nas pad+mo'i rigs kyis phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ snying la pad+mo bris nas kyang // pad+mo bsgoms na snying ka yi// pad+mo pal yang dbang 'gyur na// bud med pa la la smos ci dgos/ 
365a8(rgyud): dpral bar sangs rgyas dbyibs bris te// rtag tu bsgoms pa byas na ni// sgom pa des ni myur du yang // dbang bskur ba yang thob par 'gyur// kha yi nang du lce steng du// sangs rgyas dbyibs ni rab bsgoms
365b1(rgyud): na sgra dbang lha mo bdag nyid kyis// rtag tu kha na gnas par 'gyur// gtsug tor dbusu pad+mo ni// snyoms par zhugs te bzhag nas kyang // gtsug tor pad+mo bsgoms nas ni// mkha' la 'gro ba'ang de/ 
365b2(rgyud): dbang 'gyur// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM pad+ma shre yaM b+ha Sha ya ho/ oM pad+ma a b+hi She ka pra yats+tsha baM/ oM pad+ma sa ra s+thi bi sho d+ha ya hUM/ oM pad+ma u d+ha gr-i ba shi ku ra dzaHrtsig pa 'am yang na mkha'
365b3(rgyud): la'ang rung // pad+mo dam pa bsgoms na ni// 'di ni sems can thams cad kyang // dbang du byed pa dam pa'o// mkha' 'am yang na phyogs bzhin du// pad+mo dam pa bsgoms nas kyang // gang tshe mthong ba de tshe
365b4(rgyud): blangs// ci dga' bar ni mi snang 'gyur// rtsig pa 'am yang na mkha' la// pad+ma rgya gram bris na ni// gang tshe mthong nas blangs pa yi// de tshe sna tshogs gzugs de 'gyur// mkha'
365b5(rgyud): 'am yang na phyogs gzhan du// rdo rje pad+mo bsgoms nas kyang // de blangs skad cig nyid kyis ni// pad+mo'i rigs pa 'dzin par 'gyur// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin// oM badz+ra dza
365b6(rgyud): gang ba shI ka dz+nyA na pad+ma a be sha ya oM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma tiSh+Tha a sha na ba ku ru baM/ oM sa mA d+hi bi shwa pad+ma tiSh+Tha rU ba ne d+ha ra sha ya b+ha ga dA dza~M/ oM sa mA d+hi badz+ra pad+moSh+Ta a d+hi tiSh+Tha shI gA hi/ dkyil 'khor la sogs thams
365b7(rgyud): cad du// spyan ras gzigs dbang bris nas ni// de yi mdun du rta mgrin gyi// phyag rgya mchog gis 'dren par bya// dkyil 'khor la sogs thams cad du// spyan ras gzigs dbang bri bar bya// nges pa'i
365b8(rgyud): zhags pa phyag rgya yis// 'gro ba thams cad des dbang byed// dkyil 'khor la sogs thams cad du// spyan ras gzigs dbang bri bar bya// de yi mdun du pad+mo yi// lcags sgrog mchog gi phyag rgya bcings
366a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la sogs thams cad du// spyan ras gzigs dbang bri de yi// mdun du pad+mo dril bu yis// thams cad 'bebs pa'i dam pa'o// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams
366a2(rgyud): yin// oM pad+mo A kaR+Sha ya sarba ma hA satwA na hUM dzaHoM a mo g+ha pA sha kro d+ha hUM ho hi/ oM pad+ma s+pho Ta baM/ oM pad+ma g+hat+tha a be sha ya sarba aHbdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid nyid// pad+mo zhal bzhi sems dpar yang // 
366a3(rgyud): bsgoms te de nas grub nas ni// skad cig gis ni gzugs ma 'gyur// de ltar bdag nyid bdag nyid kyis// rdo rje chos kyi ting 'dzin gnas// pad+mo pad+mo bsgoms na ni// zad mi shes pa'i go 'phang 'thob// 
366a4(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang gtsug tor dbus// bdag gis sangs rgyas gzugs ni// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms gyur na// da tshe dpag med pa'ang mnyam par 'gyur// sna tshogs gzugs
366a5(rgyud): kyis ting 'dzin gnas// sna tshogs gzugs kyi ting 'dzin du / bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms nas ni// spyan ras gzigs dbang mnyam par 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po rnams ni 'di
366a6(rgyud): yin no// pad+mo bi shwa/ d+harma kA ya pad+ma/ bud+d+ha a b+hi Sha ka a/ lo ke shwa ra/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// de la re shig dang por ni phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes yin te/ 
366a7(rgyud): ji ltar ri mo'i tshul du ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas shing // pad+mo la gnas sems dpar ni// bdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid sgom// de nas de dag gi las ni 'di dag yin no// sangs rgyas phyag rgya che
366a8(rgyud): bcings nas// tshe dpag med dang mnyam par 'gyur// rdo rje pad+mo bcings na ni// spyan ras gzigs dbang mnyam par 'gyur// sangs rgyas dbang gis bcings na ni// bde bar gshegs pas de dbang
