366b1(rgyud): bskur// pad+mo pad+mo'i ting 'dzin thob// sna tshogs kyis ni sna tshogs mchog/ sna tshogs gzugs kyis 'dul ba dang // sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur 'gyur// pad+mo sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ 
366b2(rgyud): pad+mo khro bo dbang phyug dpal// rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gis// pad+mo 'dod pa'i dngos grub mchog/ sangs rgyas dbang gis sangs rgyas nyid// rdo rje pad+mo grub mchog sbyin// 'dod pa'i pad+mo rab 'dod ldan
366b3(rgyud): dga' ba yis ni lags pa sbyin// khro gnyer gyis ni khro zhir 'gyur// pad+mo'i nyi ma gzi brjid mchog/ pad+mo zla bas mdzes pa che// bzhad pas rab bzhad grub pa 'thob// grol bas dngos grub mchog
366b4(rgyud): 'thob po// pad+mo ral gris longs spyod thob// mgrin sngon gyi ras ni 'gugs pa che// gos dkar gyis ni dngos grub thob// pad+mo gar dbang gis 'grub ste// mi 'jigs rtag tu 'jigs pa
366b5(rgyud): med// rab gtum gyis ni ma rungs 'dul// pad+mo khu tshur ra/ ba tu sgrub// sgeg mo dga' zhing phreng ba'i nor// glur blangs/ gar bde bdug pas tshim// me tog mdzes shing me tog ste/ dris ni
366b6(rgyud): mchog gis drir yang 'gyur// rta 'grin gyis ni yang dag 'gugs// gdon mi za bar dbang du byed// pad+mo lcags sgrog bcing ba che// dril bus kun nas 'bebs byed do// de nas pad+mo rigs kyi dam tshig gi
366b7(rgyud): phyag rgya'i ye shes 'di yin te// rdo rje bsdam pa bcings nas ni// mthe bo mthe'u chung mnyam par sgreng // phyag rgya 'di ni chos dam tshig/ sangs rgyas chos ni rab thob byed// rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas
366b8(rgyud): ni/ mdzub mo gung mo srin lag mnyam// sangs rgyas rigs mchog phyag rgya de// sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub par byed// rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni// gung mo rdo rje rab ma nyams pa// 'di ni rdo rje rig dam
367a1(rgyud): pa'i// phyag rgya yin te rdo rje 'grub// de las gung mo rin chen 'dra// rdo rje rin chen rab 'grub byed// gung mo pad+mo'i tshul du byas// pad+mo'i dngos grub thob par byed// rdo rje thal mo
367a2(rgyud): bsdams nas ni// rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur// chos kyi rdo rje bcings na ni// skad cig gi ni dam tshig 'grub// rdo rje bsdams las mdzub mnyam pas// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par byed// de nas rab tu
367a3(rgyud): bshad bya ba// sems dpa'i phyag rgya khyad par du// rdo rje thal mo bsdams nas kyang // gung mo mnyam par bsdams nas ni// mthe bo mthe'u chung bya ba ni// sna tshogs pad+mor bshad pa yin// de las
367a4(rgyud): mthe bo gnyis bsnol te// mdzub gnyis rtse mo sprad la 'gug/ dbus kyi rdo rje spyi gtsug pud// gtsug pud sangs rgyas yin par bshad// rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la// mthe bo
367a5(rgyud): mnyams nas btud nas ni// mdzub mo gnyis ni rtse sprad gug/ bkan nas ting 'dzin du bcug/ thal mo pad+mo mnyan sbyar la// mdzub mo rdo rjer mnyams nas ni// mthe bo ngos la spyar ba/ 
367a6(rgyud): 'di nges pa'i dbang phyug phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa bsdams nas ni// legs par bkan ta bcings nas kyang // mthe bo gnyis ni pad+mor sgreng // sangs rgyas pad+mo yin par bshad// mthe bo gnyis
367a7(rgyud): ni rdo rjer mnyam// mdzub mo lcags kyu ral gris bya// mthe'u chung gnyis ni so sor dbye// gung mo srin lag pad+mor bya// thal monyam par rab sbyar la// mthe bos mthe'u bzung dgug pas// g.yon
367a8(rgyud): pa'i mdzub mo gzung ba ni// pad+mo'i brdas ni 'gugs par byed// thal mo mnyam par sbyar nas ni// bkan legs phyag rgya bcings nas ni// legaso zhes bya sbyin par byed// pad+mo'i legs pa yin par grags
367b1(rgyud): thal mo mnyam par rab sgyur la// mdzub mo rtse mo mnyams te dgug/ mthe'u chung phye nas mdzod pur bzhag/ pad+mo khro gnyer zhes bya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la// sor mo thams cad dkyil 'khor du// 
367b2(rgyud): snying kar rab tu brkyang ba ni// pad+mo'i nyi ma yin par bshad// thal po rab tu dam sbyar la// mdzub gnyis rin chen 'dra bar bya// dpung pa'i spyi bor rab rgyan pa// pad+mo rin chen rgyal mtshan rtser// rdo rje
367b3(rgyud): bsdams pa spyi bor bzhag/ kha dang bcas par rab brkyang nas// nyid kyi kha nas dgod pa dang // kha ni bcu gcig nyid du 'gyur// ting 'dzin pad+mor bcings nas ni// mthe bo gnyis ni so sor 'gyed// 
367b4(rgyud): pad+mo sgrol ba'i phyag rgya las// mdzub gnyis pad+mo'i tshul du dgug/ pad+mo sgrol ba'i phyag rgya dang // dngos grub thams cad grub par byed// ral gri tshul du byas pa ni// pad+mo'i ral gri'i
367b5(rgyud): phyag rgya yin// mthe'u chung pad+mo chen por bya// mthe bo gnyi sa ni dbyug ltar sgreng // mdzub mo rtse mo dung chen bya// gung mo srin lag 'khor lor bya// rdo rje thal mor dam byas la// g.yas pa
367b6(rgyud): oM du nang du gzhug/ g.yon pa'i mdzub mtheb bzlas pa bya// sor kun chus skyes kha bye 'dra// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar la// g.yon dang g.yas nas de bzhin du// 'gying bcas gar byed bskor nas ni/ 
367b7(rgyud): spyi bor bzhag pa pad+mo can// rdo rje thal mo dam byas la// rtse mo thams cad kha bye ba// bskor te pad+mo'i snying kar ni// bzhag nas brtan par byed pa po// rdo rje thal mo dam byas la// gsang ba'i gnod sbyin
367b8(rgyud): tshul du ni// thal mo brkyang ste bskums nas ni// khar bzhag pad+ma'i gnod sbyin ma// rdo rje khu tshur bcings nas kyang // gung mo gnyis ni phyir bkug ste// rang gi mthe bo'i rgyab mnan pa// pad+mo'i khu tshur zhes
368a1(rgyud): kyang bshad// rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul gyis ni// rdo rje thal mo las byung ba/ mchod pa'i su ma thams cad kyi// dam tshig mchog rnams bcing ba'o// rdo rje bsdam pangs byas pa// ma ma
368a2(rgyud): gnyis ni mnyam sbyar nas// mdzub mo gnyis ni phyir bkug la// rnamagrin gyi ni yin par bshad// pad+mo'i thal mo mnyam sbyar la// mdzub gnyis mdud par 'dud pa ni// nges par zhugs pa'i phyag rgya yin// 
368a3(rgyud): mtheb mdzub lcags sgrog 'dra bar bya// rdo rje dbab pa'i tshul gyis ni// pad+mo thal mo mnyam sbyar la// srin lag mthe'u chung gnyis bar du// mthe bo gnyis bcug dam du bcir// de nas pad+mo rigs kyi
368a4(rgyud): chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/ hriHgri kri hi/ shri shi d+hi ha/ gri ti kr-i pi/ bi riSh+Ti a/ pad+mo khu tshur gnyis bya das la// las kyi phyag rgya bsgrub par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
368a5(rgyud): cad chos kyi dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las 'a gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
368a6(rgyud): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi gzungs kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta
368a7(rgyud): thA ga ta d+harma sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa 'byung ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM badz+ra sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
368a8(rgyud): chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso// oM ma Ni rat+na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso// oM pad+ma sa ma ye hUM/ de nas
368b1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM karma sa ma ye hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang
368b2(rgyud): pos rang gi rigs dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungaso// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la// pad+mo'i gsang ba zhes bshad// 
368b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srad pus bre// de dbus pad+mo'i steng du ni// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mo bri// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// dam tshig mchog rnams
368b4(rgyud): lhag ma bzhin// rang gi rig pa rnams ldan par/ chos kyi rdo rje la sogs bri// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnamadas yin no// oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harme shwa ri hUM/ oM d+harma sa ma ye baH
368b5(rgyud): pad+ma ni hUM/ oM bud+d+ha a b+hi She ka rat+na sa ma ye hUM/ oM tA sa ma ye hUM/ oM bi shwa mu khe hUM/ sna tshogs gzugs man+da ga dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni// de yi dbus
368b6(rgyud): pad+mo yis// bskor ba'i pad+mo bri bar bya// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// pad+mo'i phyag rgya gnyis gnas pa// pad+mo'i mtshan ma bri bar bya// bde gshegs nyid kyi nyid phyag rgya// de la de dag gi phyag
368b7(rgyud): rgya ni 'di rnams yino// hrIHoM pad+mo ta thA ga to// oM sa man+ta b+ha dri pad+ma badz+ra aM ku sha ko Sha d+ha ri NI hUM/ oM pad+mar ti/ oM pad+ma duSh+Ti/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor gnyis par yang // rdo rje shugs kyis brgal
368b8(rgyud): nas ni// gtsug pud chu skyes cha gnas pa'o// sangs rgyas dbang bskur bri bar bya// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// lha 'og rim pa ji bzhin du// pad+mo'i mtshan mar ldan pa yi// dam tshig mchog
369a1(rgyud): rnams bzhag par bya// de la de dag gi snying po na 'di rnams yin no// shriHoM thA krA rdi bi d+hA bi bdwe hA/ oM bad+me na le/ oM so min pa man nu/ ma bad+mAs d+has na me gang shal// rdzi ring/ 
369a2(rgyud): ri i aT+Te/ ban+de tsa le pra tsa le ku su ma d+he re i le pra be sha sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha hUM/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor gsum par yang // rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang // de yi dbus pad+mo mdzes// pad+ma'i phyag rgya bzhag par
369a3(rgyud): bya ba de bzhin phyogs rnams thams cad du// lha 'og go rims ji bzhin par// pad+mo'i mtshan mar ldan pa yi// pad+mo la ni gnas par bri// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// b+hi dz+nyi/ oM tA re tut+tA re hUM/ 
369a4(rgyud): oM d+hIHhUM/ oM pad+ma \u0f7fkra she kha d+hA ra Ni/ ni la kaN+De sid d+hu sid d+hu hUM/ oM pAN+Da ra bA sen pad+ma saM b+ha be bad+ma ba d+ha hUM/ de bzhin gyi/ ral 'khor bzhi par ni// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang // baing+ge
369a5(rgyud): dbusu pad+me bri// 'bar ba'i phreng bas bskor 'od bri// de ni/ phyogs rnams thams cad du// lha 'og go rims ji bzhin bar// pad+mo'i dbus na gnas pa yi// pad+mo'i mtshan ma ldan par bri// 
369a6(rgyud): de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yi no// sI/ oM pad+mo nerte shwa ri pU dza ya sarba ta thA ga tA nA na ta na ta hUM/ oM a be sha ya pad+ma ka ba tsa ban d+ha ra kra ma na hUM/ haM/ oM ma hA pra tsaN+De pad+ma yak+Sha Ni bi shwa rU pa d+hA ra Ni bi shwa pa ya sarba duSh+Ta
369a7(rgyud): khA da khA da hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma muSh+Ti a mu/ rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni// sangs rgyas mchod pa rnams bri ba// pad+ma lcags kyu la sogs rgyu// mdor na pad+mo'i mtshan ma can// de nas de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams// 
369a8(rgyud): oM pad+mad+ma ti pU dze ho/ oM pad+ma a b+hi She ga pU dzer ti/ oM pad+ma gI te pU dz+re gi/ oM pad+ma ne wi d+ye pU dze ho// oM d+hU bi pad+ma ni hU~M/ oM pad+ma puSh+pa hUM/ oM pad+ma ku la sun d+ha ri/ d+harma A lo ke pU dzA ya hUM/ oM pad+ma gan d+he hUM/ mchod pa
369b1(rgyud): rnamaso// oM pad+ma sa ku sha A kaR+Sha ya ma hA pang+ga ku la na/ ha ya gribs ma ye hUM dzaHoM a mo g+ha pA sha kro d+ha sa ma ye pra be sha ya sarba satwa sa ma ya hU/ oM pad+ma sha ka le dza/ oM pad+ma gan+d+ha d+ha ri shI g+h+ra a be sha ya/ sa ma ya/ 
369b2(rgyud): sha na mu ki a/ de nas phyag rgya 'di'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas/ pad+mo'i slob ma rnams ji lta ba bzhin bcud de// 'di skad du khyod kyis gsang ba 'di su la yang ma smra
369b3(rgyud): shig/ khyod sems can dmyal bar lhung nga re// tshe gcig tu sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re// de nas phab nas 'di skad du khyod kyi de mig lam du ci zhig snang zhes dris nas/ des ji skad du smras pa de bzhin du dngos
369b4(rgyud): grub tu 'gyuraro// des gal te na mkha'i dkar bar mthong na/ ni de'i tshe de'i dngos grub dam pa'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// yang na ser po mthong na ni de nor 'grub pa'i ye shes bslab bo// ci ste
369b5(rgyud): dmar po mthong na ni rje su dag par 'gyur ba'i ye shes bslab bo// ci ste nag po mthong na ni mngon spyod kyi ye shes bsla'o/ ji ste sna tshogs mthong na ni dngos grub thams cad kyi ye shes bslab par
369b6(rgyud): shes nas ji lta ba bzhin du gdong g.yogs pas bkrol nas snod ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes bskyed do// phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// de ltar rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du yang snod ji
369b7(rgyud): lta ba bzhin du phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab pa ni 'di bzhin du brtag par bya'o// de nas dngos grub dam pa sgrub pa'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/ spyan ras gzigs dbang sems dpa' che// sna tshogs gzugasu bdag
369b8(rgyud): nyid kyis// bsgoms na phyag rgya chen po yi// mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas dbang gis dam tshig ni// mnyam par gzhag pas brtan byas te// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms nas ni// mchog
370a1(rgyud): gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// pad+mo pad+mo sems dpa' che// bdag nyid mnyam par gzhag pas bsgoms// bdag nyid kyis ni dam pa yi// dngos grub thob pa nyid du 'gyur// rang byung / 
370a2(rgyud): gdon mi za ba yi// dbang phyug las kyi phyag rgya ni// cho ga bzhin bsgrubs myur bar yang // mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yi no// oM pad+ma satwa haM sid d+h+ya ho// oM bud+d+ha
370a3(rgyud): a b+hi She ka kro d+ho ha sid d+ha ho// oM d+harma sa mA d+hi ra haM sid d+h+ya ho// oM a mo g+he shwa ro te sid d+hu maM/ de nas nor sgrub pa'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/ kha yi nang du dbyig bcug ste// sna tshogs dbang phyug phyag rgya che// bdag
370a4(rgyud): nyid nyid kyis bsgoms na ni// gcig tu gyur las stong du 'gyur// gser srang brgyad cha blangs nas ni// dam tshig mchog ni rab brtan par// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms nas ni// gcig tu gyur/ 
370a5(rgyud): las stong du 'gyur// mu tig 'brum bu khar bcug la// bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug tu// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni// / gcig tu gyur las stong du 'gyur// las kyi phyag rgya lag
370a6(rgyud): gnyis kyis// rin chen thams cad blangs na ni// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na yang // gcig tu gyur las stong du 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM pad+ma ma hA rat+na pra d+ha hUM du dza/ oM
370a7(rgyud): pad+ma su bar+N+Na pra d+ha hUM dza/ oM pad+ma mu ku Ta pra d+ha hUM dza/ oM pad+ma sarba rat+na pra d+ha hUM dza/ de nas rjesu dga' ba'i ye shes ni 'di yin te// sna tshogs dbang phyug phyag rgya che// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni// pad+ma blangs te/ 
370a8(rgyud): mdun gnas pa// gang yin des ni de mgur byed// dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya yis// pad+mo dmar por dam bzung ste// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni// bud med thams cad dga' bar 'gyur// bdag nyid
370b1(rgyud): nyid kyis bsgoms nas kyang // pad+mo blangs te ji lta ba// rdo rje lta bas de ltar bltas// 'jig rten thams cad des mgur 'gyur// las kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis ni// cho ga bzhin du pad+mo gzung // lag pa gnyis/ 
370b2(rgyud): kyis bskor na ni// bud med thams cad der mgur 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnam so// oM bi shwe shwa ra ma hA pad+ma ho// oM pad+ma sa ma ya pad+ma to// oM yo ga pad+ma to// oM pad+ma karma ho// sna tshogs ye shes
370b3(rgyud): dbang phyug che// bdag nyid mdun du pad+mo bcad// phyag rgya pad+mo de nyid kyis// de yi mchi ba skad cig/ pad+mo bzung nas brtan bya ba// cho ga legs pa ji bzhin du// dam tshig dam pa de nyid kyis// nan tan kho nar
370b4(rgyud): bzhig par byed// gang gis ming smos 'jig pa ni// ting 'dzin phyag rgya sbyar nas su// ji ltar de ltar pad+mo thogs// las de nges pa ngar 'grub par 'gyur// gang gis gzhig par khros na ni// las
370b5(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya sbyar nas// bskor zhing brdab par byas nas ni// de yi ma/ tshe brdol bar 'gyur// oM ma hA pad+ma ts+tshe da mA ra ya ho phaT/ oM sa ma ya pad+ma s+pho Ta nA sha ya ra ta phaT/ oM d+harmA pad+ma ts+tshe da bi nA/ 
370b6(rgyud): sha ya pre ta ya phaT/ oM karma pad+ma s+pho Ta ya dzI bi ta ma s+ya kr-i ta phaT/ de nas chos kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i phyag rgya ye shes ni 'di yin// bud med du ni pad+mo bsam// de steng bdag nyid rdo rjer bsgyur// pad+mo/ 
370b7(rgyud): pad mchog rtse byed cing // mnyam par gzhag na dngos grub thob// bud med du ni pad+mo bsam// de steng bdag nyid sangs rgyas bsgyur// rtse zhing dbu rgyan sangs rgyas ni// bsgoms na des ni de 'grub bo// bud
370b8(rgyud): med du ni pad+mo bsam// de steng pad+mor bdag bsgyur te// rtse zhing pad+mo pad+mo mchog/ dag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// bud med du ni pad+mo bsam// de steng sna tshogs bdag bsgyur te// rtse zhing sna tshogs
371a1(rgyud): pad+mo mchog/ sna tshogs dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de dag gi snying po na 'di rnamaso// oM badz+ra pad+ma sa yogs dA ya tri/ oM bud+yA ma ku Ta sa sogs d+ha ya shrI/ oM pad+ma pad+mas yogs rba
371a2(rgyud): yad+hi/ oM bi shwa pad+mas log sA d+ha ya s+t+wa~M/ de nas pad+mo rigs kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes ji la ba bzhin du bslab bo// sor mo rtse spang pad+mor bya// rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub gnyis spang // rtse gnyis no chu
371a3(rgyud): pad+mo ltar// rdo rje bsdams pa'ang de bzhin te// rdo rje bcing ba bsdams nas kyang // gung mo gnyis ni myu gur sbreng // mdzub mo srin lag gnyis bkug pa'i// phyag rgya shAkya thub pa'i brtan// chos kyi rdo rje snying
371a4(rgyud): kar bzhag/ bsgyur te dpral bar bzhag pa dang // ting 'dzin tshul pang du bzhag/ bsgyur nas spyi bor bzhag par bya/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang bcings la// mchod rten pad+mo'i tshul du ni/ 
371a5(rgyud): gung mo'i gnyis ni bcing gyur na// sangs rgyas pad+mo yin par ba // de las mthe bo rdo rje dang // mdzub gnyis ral gri lcag sa kyur bya// pad+mo rdo rje 'dzin pa dang // gsang ba'i phyag rgya yin
371a6(rgyud): pabar bshad// de las mthe bo bsnol nas kyang // mdzub mos mdzub mo rab bzung la// drangs na rab dga' yin par bshad// legaso zhes pa'ang de bzhin te// rdo rje bsdam pa dam byas las// mthe bo
371a7(rgyud): gnyis mnyam bcu ga nas kyang // mdzub gnyis rtse bkug rtse mo ni// dpral bzhag gung mo pad+mor bya// de nyid las ni sring kar yang // nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ston pa dang // de nyid las ni rgyal mtshan bcing / 
371a8(rgyud): lhag par rab tu brkyang bar bya// rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la// mdzub gnyis rtse mo pad+mo dgug/ de bzhin pad+mo ra la gri ste// mdzub mo pad+mor byas pas sbyar// rdo rje bsdam padam byas la// mthe bo
371b1(rgyud): g.yon pa nang du bzhug/ dung ste mthe bo tho bar sgreng // sor mo bskum bskyang pad+ma mthe'u chung // de las thams cad bcum nas kyang // mthe'u chung pad+mo lta bur bya// mthe bo g.yas la sbyar ba yi// 
371b2(rgyud): mdzub mor nor bu bgrang bar bya// rdo rje bsdam pa dam byas la// mthe'u chung pad+mo lta bur bya// mdzub mo sgreng ste gar byed pa// pad+mo spyan gyi yin par bshad// rdo rje bsdam pa dam byas la// mthe'u chung / 
371b3(rgyud): pad+mo lta bur bya// dam du mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste// mthe bo gnyis ni go char bya// de las mtheb gnyis mche bar bya// mtheb gnyis nang du gzhug par bya// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dam tshig
371b4(rgyud): mchog ni bla med de// rdo rje nang du bsdams nas kyang // mdzub gnyis pad+mo 'dra byas la// mthe bo phan tshun bsnol ba ni/ gsang ba'i sna tshogs dbang du bshad// de bzhin rdo rje bsdams
371b5(rgyud): pa las// mthe'u chung gung mo mnyam sgreng la// mtheb mos rdo rje sbyar ba ni// gtsug pud dbus na de bzhin gshegs// de/ bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// mthe bo pad+mo 'drar byas la/ 
371b6(rgyud): kha nas dbyung ltar byas nas kyang // dpang tu ting 'dzin ltar bzhag/ de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// sor mo kun gyi ngos rnams ni// mnyam par dam du bsdams nas kyang // mdzub gnyis rdo rjer mnyam pa'o// 
371b7(rgyud): de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// mdzub gnyis pad+mo 'drar byas la// mthe bo gnyis kyang bsnol nas ni// klung bag ny-i ni rtse sbyar bkug/ de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// mtheb gnyis rdo rjer rab sbyar la/ 
371b8(rgyud): mdzub mo ral gri lcags kyur bya// mthe'u chung pad+mo 'drar byas la// de bzhin du ni bsgyur nas kyang // mdzub mo g.yon pa sgreng ba la// mdzub mo mthe bo rtse sbyar ba// dam du bzung ste dgug ltar bya// de la
372a1(rgyud): mdzub mo gnyis bkug le// mthe bong gnyis kyis bsnan pa ni// pad+mo dgyes pa bdag nyid che// legaso zhes bya sbyin byed kyi// de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// sor mo kun gyi ngos
372a2(rgyud): sbyar la// mthe bo gnyis kyis mnan nas ni// mdzub mo mnyam par sbyar ba'o// de nyid snying kar nyi mar bya// spyi bor pad+mo rgyal mtshan bya// pab ste kha yi 'gram bzhag pa// pad+ma cher dgod dgod pa yin// 
372a3(rgyud): rdo rje nang du bsdams byas la// chos kyi rdo rje tshul gyis ni// mthe'u chung mthe bo rab bsdams pa// 'di ni sgrol ma'i dam tshig yin// de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// mdzub gung pad+mo ral grir bya// de
372a4(rgyud): bzhin nang du 'khor lor bya// zlos pa sbyin pa de bzhin no// de ba bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// mtheb mdzub sprad de gnyi su bya// de nas snying dkar sbyar ba ni// gsang ba'i srung ba yin par
372a5(rgyud): bshad// de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// mthe'u chung pad+mo/ 'drar byas la// mdzub gnyis shin tu bkug nas kyang // mtheb gnyis phyir bskyed mche ba can// de las khu tshur tshul
372a6(rgyud): gyis ni// mtheb gnyis ngos kyis btsir ba yi// pad+mo gsang ba'i khu tshur che// dam tshig mchog tu rab brtag pa'o// pad+mo lA s+ye la sogs pa// de dag gzhan rnams kun gyi ni// rdo rje nang du bsdams byas
372a7(rgyud): la la de 'dra bar ni bcing bar bya// de nas pad+mo gsang ba'i chos kyi phyag rgya 'di yin te/ hA grA prA hA/ shrA sA d+ha hA/ gA da krA bA/ dAR+Sha ShA sA/ las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdu na khu tshur gnyisu bya'o// de bzhin
372a8(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po las chos gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin
372b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig 'byung bar byin gyis brlab pa'i pad+mo zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa 'di gsungaso// oM d+harma sa ma d+hi dz+nyAn tra thA/ 
372b2(rgyud): ga ta hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs kyi chos 'byung ba'i rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM badz+ra d+harmA hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo// 
372b3(rgyud): rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM rat+na d+harma hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso// oM d+harma d+harma hUM/ de nas byang
372b4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso// oM karma d+harmA hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa
372b5(rgyud): kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos nyid kyi chos kyi dkyil 'a khor 'di gsung so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// ye she/ sa dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bar ni// 
372b6(rgyud): chos kyi ye shes zhes brjod do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srang bus bre// de yi dbusu bri ba ni// ye shos rdo rje de bzhin gshegs// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad
372b7(rgyud): du/ sems dpa' che rnams cho ga bzhin// sna tshogs dbang phyug la sogs pa// ting 'dzin la snyoms zhugs bri// de la de dag gi snying po 'di rnam so// oM dz+nyA na bud+d+ha hUM/ oM dz+nyAn bi shre shwa re hUM/ oM dz+nyA na
372b8(rgyud): bud+d+ha mu ku Ta hUM/ oM dz+nyA na d+harme shwa re hUM/ oM dz+nyA ma a mo g+he shwa re hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma bud+d+ha hUM/ oM dz+nyAn pad+ma badz+ra d+ha ra hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+me mAr hUM/ oM dz+nyAn pad+ma dASh+Ti hU~M/ oM d+hu na pad+ma b+h+r-i ku Ti hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma sur+ya hUM/ a
373a1(rgyud): dz+nyA na pad+man+ya ra hUM/ oM dz+nyAn pad+ma trA sa hUM/ mo dz+nyAn pad+hA d+hAr d+hu/ oM dz+nyAn pang+gakrA mAr hUM/ oM dz+nyAn pad+ma na rA ma hU/ oM dz+nyA nA bad+yA trAs hA/ oM dz+nyAn bad+man shwar n+tu/ oM d+han pad+ma rak+Sha hU/ oM dz+nyAn
373a2(rgyud): pad+ma yak+Sha hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na peng+ga muSh+Ti hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pang+ga la s+yai hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma mA le hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma gI tI hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+mA nr-i ti hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma d+hu paM hUM/ oM dz+nyAn pad+ma puSh+pe hUM/ oM dz+nyAn pad+ma da pe hUM/ oM dz+nyAn pad+ma gan+d+he hUM/ 
373a3(rgyud): dz+nyAn pad+ma a~M ku sha hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma a mo g+ha pA sha hUM/ oM dz+nyAn pad+ma s+pho Ta hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma a be sha hUM/ de nas chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa cho ga rgyas par byas nas ji lta ba bzhin du bcug
373a4(rgyud): nas 'di skad du khyod kyis gzhan su la yang ma brjod cig khyod sems can dmyal bar lhung nas sdug bsngal bar gyur data re/ de nas de'i ye shes bskyed par bya ste/ 'jig rten dbang phyug
373a5(rgyud): snyoms zhugs la// snying kar pad+mo bsgoms nas kyang // pan+d+ha ting 'dzin thob na ni// de ma thag tu myur bar lding // 'jig nyin dbang por snyoms zhugs la// dpral bar pad+mo skam byas te// 
373a6(rgyud): goms nas shin tu brtan gyur na// de ma thag tu mkha' la lding // 'jig rten dbang gi ting 'dzin gyis// lce la pad+mo bsgoms nas kyang // grub par gyur na myur bar yang // namakha' la ni 'gro'o// 'jig
373a7(rgyud): rten dbang gi ting 'dzin gyis// gtsug tu pad+mo bsgoms nas kyang // grub par gyur na myur du ni// skad cig gis ni steng du lding // de dag gi snying po 'di rnam so// oM pad+ma dz+nyA na hr-id ya a be sha/ oM pad+ma dz+nyAms
373a8(rgyud): b+hi Sheg A be sha/ oM pad+ma tAn bi d+yod+ham A be sha/ oM pad+ma d+han uSh+NI khas be sha/ namakha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// pad+ma'i dbyibs shig bsgoms nas kyang // cho ga 'din grub 'gyur na// skad cig gis
373b1(rgyud): ni mi snang 'gyur// namakha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// pad+mo'i dbyibs shig bsgoms nas kyang // de yi steng du bdag 'dug par// bsgoms par gyur na mi snang 'gyur// namakha'i 'am ni phyogs gzhan/ 
373b2(rgyud): du/ pad+ma'i dbyibs shig bsgoms byas la// gang tshe mthong ba de tshe blangs// mi snang bar ni myur du 'gyur// nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// pad+mo'i dbyibs ni bsgoms byas la// mthong ba'i pad+mo de
373b3(rgyud): / zos na// de ma thag tu mi snang 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnamaso// oM pad+ma a kaR+Sha/ oM pad+ma ra thA/ oM pad+ma dz+nyA na gra hA na/ oM pad+ma ra sa ya hUM phaT/ phyag rgya che bcings pad+mo ni// kha dog dbyibs
373b4(rgyud): rnams sna tshogs pa'i// dbyibs de lag pas bzung na ni/ gzugs rnams thams cad 'chang bar 'gyur// pad+ma'i kha dadog dbyibs rnams ni// sna tshogs pad+mo'i dbyibs bris la// de ci
373b5(rgyud): bsgom pa byas na ni// gzungs mang 'chang bar de 'gyuraro// nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// pad+mo'i kha dog dbyib sa rnams ni// sna tshogs dbyibasu bsgoms na yang // sgra yi
373b6(rgyud): gzugasu de 'gyuraro// pad+mo'i kha dog dbyibs rnams ni// sna tshogs dbyibasu byas kyang ni// de la zhon nas mkha' 'gro zhing // ci dga' gzugs nges par 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// 
373b7(rgyud): oM pad+ma d+ha ri bi shwa rU pa pra brta ya A be sha/ oM bi shwa pad+ma pra brta ya mA oM sa mA d+hi bi shwa pad+ma A be sha/ oM bi shra pad+ma ma nodata k+Shi pa A kA sha bi shwa rU pa a d+hi tiSh+Tha mAM/ gang yang rung ba'i phyag rgya che// ting 'dzin
373b8(rgyud): gyis legs bcings la// pad+mo blangs te rab byin na// gdon mi za bar dbang du 'gyur ro// gang yang rung ba'i dam tshig gi/ phyag rgya zhes bya bcings na ni// de ni pad+mo blangs nas kyang // byin par gyur na dbang du
374a1(rgyud): 'gyur// ting 'dzin skyes dge ba yi// phyag rgya gang yang rung bcings la// ye shes pad+mog dbyin pa// de ni de yis myur dbang 'gyur// gang yang rung ba'i dam tshig ldan// las kyi phyag
374a2(rgyud): rgya bcings nas ni// pad+mo byin pa gang yin pa// de ma thag tu de dbang 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnamaso// oM ma hA dz+nyA na pad+ma ho// oM sa ma ya pad+ma ho// oM dz+nyA na pad+ma ho// oM karma pad+ma to// de nas ye shes/ 
374a3(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes bslab bo// chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni// phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par bya// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dam tshig mchog ni bsgrub bya ste// chos kyi dkyil
374a4(rgyud): 'khor tshul du ni// pad+ma'i pad+mo bzhag par bya// chos kyi khu tshur brtan byas la// las kyi phyag rgya gnyis bya// de bzhin gsheg/ ngas pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po
374a5(rgyud): las ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa thams cad kyi chos kyi las kyi dam tshig 'byung bar byin gyis
374a6(rgyud): brlabs pa'i pad+mo zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa dpa' 'di gsung so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta karma kr-i hUM/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs kyi las 'byung ba rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di
374a7(rgyud): gsung so// oM hU~Md+haM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM rat+na karma sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje can gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsung
374a8(rgyud): oM bad+ma ka rbe d+hA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' dzi sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa di gsung so// maH shwa ng+ge hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' phags pa spyang ras gzigs kyi dbang pos nyid kyilas kyi
374b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba ni// pad+ma'i las zhes bya ba ste// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor
374b2(rgyud): thams cad srad pus bre// sangs rgyas phyogs kun pasgom// mtshan ma 'dzin par thams cad bri// de la de dag gi rig pa'i snying po ni 'di rnams// oM bu ri Ni trA/ bi shwa ka rme shwa ri hUM/ oM ta thA ga te shwa ra a \u0f7f
374b3(rgyud): / She ka karma bid+yA hUM/ oM d+harma karme shwa ra dz+nyA na pU dza sa ma ye hUM/ oM a mo g+ha karme shwa ri hUM/ oM pad+ma karma bud+d+ha hUM/ oM pad+ma karma badz+ri Ni hU~M/ oM pad+ma ka mi Ni mA ra Na pU dza karma sa ma ye hUM/ oM pad+ma karma duSh+Te hUM/ oM pad+ma karma
374b4(rgyud): b+h+r-i ku Ti hU~M tra/ oM pad+ma karma sUr+ya hUM/ oM pad+ma karma d+h+wa dze hUM/ oM da deng+ga karma hA sa hU~M/ oM pad+ma karma tAr hUM/ oM pad+ma karma kumA ri hUM/ oM pad+ma karma nA rA ya ni hU~M/ oM pad+ma karma prah+ni hUM/ oM ped+ma karman te sh+tsa
374b5(rgyud): ri hUM/ oM pad+ma rak+Sha rak+Sha karma sa ma ye hUM/ oM ma hA pra tsaN+Da gI ti ni pad+ma daMSh+Ta karma ka ri hUM/ oM pad+ma karma muSh+Ti ga tA ya hUM/ oM ra ti pA dzi nU dzaHoM a b+hi She ka pU dze hUM dza/ oM gI ti pU dze hU d+ha/ oM nai wih+ye
374b6(rgyud): pU dzi hUM baM/ oM d+hu bi pu dze hU aHoM buSh+pa pU dze hU tra/ oM A la~M ka pU dze tsU d+hi/ oM gan+d+he pU dze hUM ba/ oM ha ya grI ba a na ya hU~M dza/ oM a mo g+ha pA sha kro d+hi pa~M DA ya hU~M phaT/ oM pad+ma shaM ka la ban d+he hU~M phaT/ oM pad+ma gan+d+he
374b7(rgyud): a be sha ye hUM phaT/ de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas ji lta ba bzhin du bcug ste/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod kyis tshul 'di su la yang ma smra shig/ sems
374b8(rgyud): can dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo shig/ de nas ye shes bskyed par bya'o// de nas sdig pa bshags pa'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ 'jig rten dbang phyug phyag rgya cher// shin tu mnyam gzhag/ 
375a1(rgyud): bsgoms nas kyang // sdig rnams bshags pas myur bar ni// sdig pa kun las de 'dag 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang gis ting 'dzin gyis// dam tshig gi ni mchog bcings te// sdig
375a2(rgyud): pa thams cad bshags na ni// mtshams med lnga las 'byang bar 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang phyug ting 'dzin du// shin tu mnyam par gzhag bsgoms la// sdig pa thams cad bshags na ni// sdig pa
375a3(rgyud): kun yang rab tu 'joms// mdor na gang yang rung ba yi// las kyi phyag rgya legs bcings la// las rnams thams cad bshags na ni// las rnams kun las rnam par 'dag/ de la de dag gi snying po ni// 
375a4(rgyud): 'di rnams yin no// oM sarba pA paM saM sho d+ha na ma hA pad+ma/ oM sa rba a nan ta t+ya shwa d+ha na sa ma ya pad+ma/ oM sarba pA pa pra Na sha Na/ d+harma pad+ma/ oM sarba pad+ma a ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ka karma pad+ma/ de nas sgrib
375a5(rgyud): pa thams cad yongasu zad par 'gyur ba'i ye shes bslab bo// 'jig rten dbang gi phyag rgya cher// shin tu mnyam gan ga bsgoms byas la/ kra shud d+hA zhes brjod na// las rnams kun
375a6(rgyud): las dag par 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang gi ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi dam tshig bcings na ni// bud d+h+ya bud d+h+ya zhes brjod na// las rnams kun las dag par 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang por snyoms
375a7(rgyud): zhugs la// chos kyi phyag rgyar bsgoms nas ni// d+hi d+hi d+hi d+hi zhes brjod na// las rnams kun las dag par 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang // hI hI hI hI
375a8(rgyud): zhes brjod na// las rnams kun las dag par 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnamaso// oM pA pa kA ya pad+ma oM A ba ra Na kA ya pad+ma/ oM karma k+Sha ya pad+ma/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
375b1(rgyud): mchod pa'i ye shes bslab bo// 'jig rten dbang gi phyag rgya cher// rab tu mnyam par gzhag bcings la// oM oM oM o zhes brjod na// mchod pa thams cad rab tu byed// 'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin
375b2(rgyud): gyis// dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang // b+hu b+hu b+hu b+hu zhes brjod na// sangs rgyas thams cad de mchod 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang pos snyoms zhugs la// chos kyi pad+mo bsgoms nas kyang // he he he he/ 
375b3(rgyud): zhes brjod na// sangs rgyas thams cad des mchod 'gyur// pad+mo'i las kyi phyag rgya ni// shin tu mnyam par gzhag bcings la// d+he d+he d+he d+he zhes brjod na// sangs rgyas thams cad des mchod 'gyur// 
375b4(rgyud): de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM kA ra pad+ma/ oM da b+hU kA ra pad+ma/ oM ha ka ra pad+ma/ oM d+he kA ra pad+ma/ de nas dngos grub kyi ye shes bslab bo// 'jig rten dbang po phyag rgya cher/ 
375b5(rgyud): mnyam par gzhag pas bcings nas kyang // hriM hri hriM hri zhes pa rjod na// 'jig rten dbang por grub par 'gyur// 'jigarten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis// dam tshig ces bya bcings nas
375b6(rgyud): kyang // shrI shrI shrI shri zhes brjod na// dngos grub dam pa 'thob par 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang po'i mnyam gzhag par// mnyam par gzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang // d+hi ga d+hi ga d+hig d+hig zhes brjod na// 
375b7(rgyud): pad+mo khro bor 'grub par 'gyur// pad+ma chen po dge ba yi// las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang // smi smi smi smi zhes brjod na// dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnamaso// oM
375b8(rgyud): hrIHsid d+h+ya/ oM shrI sid d+ha/ oM d+hig sing d+ha/ oM si sid d+ha/ de nas las gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/ 'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la// bud med kun dang rtse byed ci
376a1(rgyud): oM ho su kha zhes brjod na// sangs rgyas thams cad des mchod 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la// bud med kun dang rtse byed cing // pri ya pri ya zhes brjod na// sangs rgyas
376a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dgye so// 'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la// bud med kun dang rtse byed cing // a ho ra ti zhes brjod na// de ni rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la// bud
376a3(rgyud): med kun dang rtse byed cing // su kha su kha zhes brjod na// de yi bde ba nyams mi 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM sarba bud+d+ha pU dza pra brtan pad+ma/ oM pri ta kAr pad+ma/ oM ra ti pra brta na pad+ma/ a
376a4(rgyud): mahA su kha pad+ma dr-ir hUM/ de nas las kyi phyag rgya chen po ji lta ba bzhin du bslab par bya ste/ de nas pad+mo thal sbyar te// dam tshig bya/ ngag rgya rdo rje dgongs// las kyi dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// gnas
376a5(rgyud): rnams kun tu bzhag par bya// de nas pad+mo rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya ni bu zhes bya ba brjod par bya// las kyi phyag rgya des sgra/ ba bo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig
376a6(rgyud): brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po las las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
376a7(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs nas phyag rgya'i snying po 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra d+harma pad+ma hUM/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM badz+ra d+hI/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos rang gi/ 
376a8(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di gsung so// oM badz+ra rat+na hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying gyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsung so// oM d+harma pad+ma d+hi// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di
376b1(rgyud): gsung so// oM sarba mu khe hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungaso// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ 
376b2(rgyud): phyag rgya bzhi mchog dkyil 'khor ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba dang // dkyil 'khor chen por 'dra bar bya// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dbus ni// sangs rgyas gzugs ni bzhag par bya// de yi phyogs rnams
376b3(rgyud): thams cad du// rdo rje pad+mo la sogs bri// de nas dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas/ ji lta ba bzhin du bcug ste 'di skad du 'di khyod kyis su la yang ma brjod cig/ khyod
376b4(rgyud): rtag tu sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba dang / mi bde ba ma spangs pas dus nas sems can dmyal bar lhung nga re zhes bsgo shig/ de nas de yi ye she sra bskyed par bya ste/ lag pas pad+mo bzung nas kyang // bsgrims te
376b5(rgyud): legs par bsdams par bya// dri de sangs rgyas rnams mchod na// // myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur// mnyam par gzhag/ par gtsug pu dbus// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab gzhag la
376b6(rgyud): 'gro zhing rdo rje 'gying bstan na// 'jig rten thams cad dbang du byed// pad+ma'i pad+mo chen po'i gzugs// ting 'dzin 'dug ji lta bzhin// yid kyis su ni de bas // gang du phog par de rgyas pa'i// sa sogs pa
376b7(rgyud): yi las byed do// pad+mo pad+mo chen po'i gzugs// pad+mo rgya grangs nyid du ni// byas te lag pas bzung nas kyang // bskor nas dbab la sogs de byed// de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnamaso// oM badz+ra rat+na hUM/ 
376b8(rgyud): oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta A shA pa ri pU ra Na ma hA rat+na hU~M/ oM badz+ra tsU tra/ oM gan+d+ha pU dza sa d+ha ya hriHoM pad+ma mu ku Ta ta thA ga ta ba sha~M ku ru sa dran lo ke shwa ra a b+hi She ka sa ma ya ho/ oM pad+ma pad+ma mA ra ya sarba pra t+yar+thi ka nas ma
377a1(rgyud): d+hi dz+nyA na d+h+r-ika/ oM bi shwa pad+ma sarba karma kA ro b+hA ba la li lu la la li hUM phaT/ de nas phyag rgya gsang ba'i ye shes bslab bo// chags pa dgos pa thams cad ni// bsgrub par bya ste dam tshig/ 
377a2(rgyud): 'dis sgrub par dka' ba'i phyag rgya yang // rnal 'byor gyis ni myur du 'grub// de la 'di'i dam tshig gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM sA d+ha ya pad+ma ra ga sa ma ya a/ de nas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag
377a3(rgyud): rgya chen po thams cad bslab par bya'o phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang
377a4(rgyud): pos 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so// oM sarba dza gad bi nA ya ma hA satwa a/ A gats+tsha shI g+h+ra bi shwa da rU paM san d+ha ra ya ma me tsa sarba sid d+hA ya pra yats+tsha hrI/ de nas byang chub
377a5(rgyud): sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos 'gro ba thams cad 'a// dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsung so// de nas/ rab tu bshad bya ba// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor te// dkyil
377a6(rgyud): 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de yi nang du pad+mo yang // de bzhin du ni bri bar bya// der ni 'dab ma kun khyab pa'i// sna tshogs gzugs ni bri bar bya// de nas dkyil 'khor 'dir tshe
377a7(rgyud): ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du btsud nas/ de bzhin du bsgo te 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i ye shes bslab bo// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i// dkyil 'khor legs par bris nas kyang // phyag rgya chen po bsgoms
377a8(rgyud): na ni// sna tshogs 'chang dang 'dra bar 'gyur// de nas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab// sna tshogs gzugs kyi ting 'dzin du// mnyam par gzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang // dbang po
377b1(rgyud): gnyis snang bar bya// dkyil 'khor do da krug / de nas drug tu chen po la sogs pa/ phyag chub cing ba rnams bslab par bya'o// dngos gru rnams kyang de bzhin// de bden du sa la sogs pa la'ang drug
377b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gcig pa'i tshul du phyag rgya la sogs pa yang de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyuraro// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang
377b3(rgyud): bo la leg so zhes bya ba byin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // zag pa chen po mngon 'dus pa// rdo rje theg pa bla med kyi// mdo sde 'di ni legs bshad pa// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs pa// rdo rje rin
377b4(rgyud): chen khyod legs// rdo rje las ni khyod legs so// de bzhin gsheg das pa thams cad kyi kho na nyid bsdus pa las de bzhin pa shegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig las rtog pa'i rgyal po
377b5(rgyud): brdzog so// bam po bdun pa// de nas yang de zhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas dang na na gshegs pa thams cad dbang bsgyur ba'i rin po che rdo rje 'dzin pa/ 
377b6(rgyud): de nyid de/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nas pa'i snying po la ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba bta'o// na mkha'i snying po sems can don// sems dpa' chen po gzi chen po// rin chen che ba'i rin
377b7(rgyud): chen mchog/ rdo rje rin chen khyod phyag 'tshal// dbang bskur rin chen chen po ni// dag pa che zhing dge ba che// sangs rgyas rin chen rnam dag sku// rin chen rin chen khyod phyag 'tshal// na mkha' na mkha' las
377b8(rgyud): byung ba// namakha' kun gyi 'od che ba// namakha'i dbyings kyi phyogs kun gyi// re kun mchog ni khyod phyag 'tshal// rin chen mdzod spu rin chen 'byung // sangs rgyas mdzod rin chen 'byung // sangs rgyas mdzod
378a1(rgyud): spu de bzhin gshegs// rin chen thams cad rab kun mchog/ rin chen dgos pa khyod phyag 'tshal// rin chen rin chen gtsor na drag/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun rin chen// rin chen/ 
378a2(rgyud): pad+ma na mkha' che// mkha' mnyam khyod la phyag 'tshalo// rgyan yin pas ni mdzes pa che// mdzes par snang zhing rab mdzes mdzad// don kun dag cing dag pa'i don// sbyin mchog khyod la phyag 'tshalo// 
378a3(rgyud): chos rin chen ni rnam dag mchog/ dge 'dun rin chen de bzhin gshegs// dbang bskur chen po 'jig rten don// don sbyin khyod la phyag 'tshalo// sbyin pa rab sbyin sbyin pa'i mchog/ gtong zhing gtong
378a4(rgyud): mchog sbyin mdzad pa// sems can kun don de nyid don// don chen don ni khyod phyag 'tshal// bsam pa'i rgyal po gzi brjid che// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
378a5(rgyud): cad che// sangs rgyas kun te khyod phyag 'tshal// de bzhin gan gas pa rin chen che// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od che ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal chen po// bzhad chen khyod la phyag
378a6(rgyud): 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi mchog/ dbang chen khyab pa chen po ste// 'jig rten gtso bo 'jig rten mchog/ 'jig rten nyi ma khyod phyag 'tshal// rin chen phul bas rab kyi mchog/ rin
378a7(rgyud): chen rgyan te rin chen 'dzin// rin chen snang bas snang ba chen// rin chen grags pa khyod phyag 'tshal// rin chen phung po rin chen don// nor bu rdo rje nor bu yi// rin chen 'byung ba sku rab 'bar// rin chen sku ste khyod
378a8(rgyud): phyag 'tshal// tshe nyid shing ste rin chen dbang // raM ba thams cad skong mdzad pa// bsam pa thams cad legs par mnyes// rin chen phung po khyod phyag 'tshal// srid rtse khyab par bdag nyid kun// mchog par
378b1(rgyud): sbyin zhing mchog che ga// phun sum thams cad 'byor pa'o// rdo rje snying po bdag phyag 'tshal// ming brgya rtsa brgyad zhi ba 'di// su yang rung ba 'chang byed na// sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur ba// skad cig
378b2(rgyud): tu ni sdig med 'thob// rin chen khyod la gsol ba ni// nor 'dus pa ni bshad par mdzod// sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang gi mchog/ nges pa'i rigs ni bskyed par mdzod// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
378b3(rgyud): na mkha'i snying pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' 'di thos nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi snying po 'di gsungaso// oM badz+ra rat+na hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa
378b4(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso// oM sarba ta thA ga ta A sha pa ri pU ra Na ma hA rat+na hUM/ de nas byang
378b5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs 'byung ba/ 'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso// oM badz+ra hU tra/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam
378b6(rgyud): pa 'di gsung so// oM ma Ni hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rigs 'byung ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso// oM pad+ma hrI/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rjes
378b7(rgyud): tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM be shau ra rat+na hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa na mkha'i snying pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gi rin po che zhes
378b8(rgyud): bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas rdo rje nor bu rin po che lta bu 'od zer rnams byung nas de dag gis
379a1(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas te/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gis dbang bskur nas yang gcig tu gyur te bcom ldan 'das
379a2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po'i thugs kar zhugs so// de nas na mkha'i snying po'i thugs las bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid kun nas 'od zer 'bar ba'i snying po rdo rje dang nor bu dang / 
379a3(rgyud): rin po che sna tshogs kyi dbang la sogs pa bkod pa dang / rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i sku rdo rje'i nor bu'i rin po che'i phyag rgya'i mtshan ma phyag na bsnams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i sku rnamasu gyur te byung nas
379a4(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rin po che chen po'i char 'bab pa la sogs pa nor bskyed pa rnams kyis sems can rnams mgu bar byas nas yang slar byon nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par/ 
379a5(rgyud): snang mdzad kyi phyogs thams cad du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams
379a6(rgyud): cad kyi// rin chen thams cad bsdus pa ni// rdo rje rin chen rigs nyid du// 'gro ba'i don du 'di gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying pos rang gi rigs bskyed nas de bzhin
379a7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed pa 'di phul te don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsung so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam
379a8(rgyud): ba ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la// thams cad grub pa zhes bshad pa// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni rgyan pa ste// srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa la// dar dang phreng ba lnga ldis rgyan// dkyil
379b1(rgyud): 'khor chen po grwa rnams dang // sgo khyud kyi ni nang rnamasu// rdo rje rin chen smras par ni// phyi yid dkyil 'khor srang bus bre// de yi nang du rdo rje yi// rin chen las byung gnas bya zhing // ka ba brgyad kyi tshul dun/ 
379b2(rgyud): rin chen sna tshogs 'ongad 'bar ba'i// dkyil 'khor lngar ni rgyun gyur par// der ni srang bu bre bar bya// rang gi phyag rgyas bskor ba yi// der ni sangs rgyas bzhag par bya// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams
379b3(rgyud): oM bud+d+ha rat+nahUM/ oM badz+ra ma NI hU~M/ oM badz+ra rahAhUM/ oM ku ru ts+tsha/ oM badz+ra rat+na pad+ma hUM/ oM badz+ra rat+na baR+Sha hU~M/ re ba kun grub dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas kyang // rdo rje snying po der gnas shig/ rin
379b4(rgyud): chen mchog ni sbyin par bri// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// lha 'og go rims ji bzhin du// rin chen phyag rgyar ldan pa yi// sems dpa' chen po rnams bri'o// de la de dag gi
379b5(rgyud): sing po ni 'di rnamaso// oM sarba a r+tha sid+ha prang hU~M/ oM badz+ra ma N+Di hA A kA sha gar+b+ha b+ha ga bA na sing d+ha sid d+ha nA/ oM raSh+Ta mraku sha a kaR+Sha ya sarba mar+than sa ma ya shi g+has rba ta thAg ta sa twam/ 
379b6(rgyud): nusma ra hUM/ oM ta dag pa shaM ku rus rban k+Sha sha gar+b+ha hUM/ oM rat+na duSh+Ti hUM/ rin chen phreng ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni// rin chen phreng ba 'dzin pa'i mchog/ nges pa'i dbusu legs
379b7(rgyud): bar bri// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// lnga ga go rims rdo bzhin par// nor bu'i mtshan rnams lag thob pa'i// sems dpa' chen po rnams bri'o// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// 
379b8(rgyud): oM rAt+na tI ShA tra/ oM sa rbang thAg ta a b+hi She ka rat+na mA le hU~M/ oM rat+na ma Ni sUr+ye hU~M/ oM tsan+da ma Ni d+ha dza sa rbA sha pa ri pur A kA sha gar+b+ha hU/ oM ra T+Ta tAs hA sa hUM/ rin chen pad+ma dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs/ 
380a1(rgyud): kyis rgal nas ni// rin chen pad+ma 'dzin khyab pa// de dbus gnas par bri bar bya// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// lha 'og go rims ji bzhin par// nor bu mtshan/ 
380a2(rgyud): 'chang ba yi// sems dpa' chen po rnams bri'o// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnamaso// oM rat+na pad+ma hUM/ oM haM ga sa mA d+hi dz+nyA na gar+b+ha hUM/ oM rat+na ko Sha gra hUM/ oM ma Ni tsakra pra brta ya hUM/ oM rat+na ba shi hUM/ 
380a3(rgyud): rin chen char 'bebs dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni// rin chen char ni rab 'bebs pa'i// sems dpa' chen po der yang bri/ de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// mdor
380a4(rgyud): ni lag na phyag rgya yang // rin chen mtshan mar ldan pa yi// sems dpa' che rnams cho ga bzhin// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnamaso// oM rat+na briSh+Ti baR+Sha/ ya sarba brta saM b+ha d+ho b+ha ga bAn/ 
380a5(rgyud): Nita to hUM/ oM ma Ni pU dza sa ma ya hUM/ oM ma Ni ban d+ha ka ba tse hUM/ oM ma Ni daMSh+Ta ka rA la ma hA yak+Sha ha ra ha ra sarbA rbAn ti sha ya nAM/ oM ma Ni rat+na ban+d+ha sa ma ye hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni/ 
380a6(rgyud): grwa yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// lta 'og go rims ji bzhin por// rin chen lA s+yai la sogs bri// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnamaso// oM rat+na ra ti hUM/ oM rat+na mA la hUM/ oM rat+na gi t+ye hUM/ oM rat+na nI
380a7(rgyud): t+ye hUM/ phyi yi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni// phyi yi dkyil 'khor grwa rnamasu// bdug pa'i mchod pa la sogs bri// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnamaso// oM rat+na d+hU pe rat+na/ 
380a8(rgyud): oM puSh+pe ma Ni/ oM rat+na A lo ke/ oM ma Ni gan+d+he/ sgo rnams bzhi yi dbusu ni// sgo ba rnams ni bzhag par bya// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnamaso// oM sarba rat+na A kan+d+ha ru Na ma hA satwa b+ha ga bAn ta~M A ka
380b1(rgyud): dzeHoM sarba rat+na pra be shA ya/ sa ma ya pra be sha ya sa ma ya ma hA ma Ni rA dza ku la rat+na pA shu n+tu/ oM ma Ni ban d+ha hUM baM/ oM ma Ni raSh+Ta.a be sha ya a/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir nor bu rin po che'i slob
380b2(rgyud): dpon nyid ji lta ba bzhin zhugs te cho ga rgyas pa bdag nyid kyis byas la// de nas rin po ches byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa gang ba'i nor bu'i slob ma dbang bskur ste/ rdo rje nor bu'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya
380b3(rgyud): bcings la snying po 'di brjod do// oM badz+ra ma Ni sa ma ya baM/ de nas kha dog ji lta bu rnyed pa'i gos bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te de dang 'dra bas mig g.yogs la snying po 'di brjod du bcug ste gzhug par/ 
380b4(rgyud): bya'o// oM ma Ni dza ku lAn/ de nas de ltar bcug nas 'di skad du khyod kyis 'di su la yang ma brjod cig/ khyod tshe rabs tham/ ngas cad du dbul por gyur ta re/ sdug bsngal las mi thar bar gyur/ 
380b5(rgyud): ta re// sems can dmyal bar yun ring por gnas par gyur te/ re zhes bsgo la dam tshig gnyi su bya'o// theg pa chen po ma ngon par 'dus pa yang brjod par bya'o// de nas babs pa dang gten
380b6(rgyud): chen po gang na yod// ji ltar thob par 'gyur zhes rdo rje'i tshig gis dri bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying pos thams cad smangar srol cig ces smras ma thas
380b7(rgyud): tu gdong g.yogs pa bkrol te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gi dam tshig kyang bstan te// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la thug gi bar du dkyil 'khor chen po bstan par bya'o// de nas
380b8(rgyud): ci 'byung bas mchod pa byas nas dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par bya'o// de nas ye shes kyi phyag rgyani 'di yin te/ rdo rje snying pa'i phyag rgya che// shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas bcings// gter ba rkos
381a1(rgyud): nas ni gang dgan// gter yod pa ni de mthong 'gyur// dam tshig gis ni mchog bcings la// gang na gter rnams song gyu ga/ der ni phyag rgya bcir na ni// de tshe bdag nyid 'thung
381a2(rgyud): 'gyur// rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin du// shin tu mnyam gzhag bsgoms na ni// gang na gter rnams yod pa yang // yid kyis shes pa nyid du 'gyur// rdo rje'i snying po'i ting 'dzin gyi// las kyi phyag rgya
381a3(rgyud): bcings nas ni// gang du phyag rgya babs gyur na// de nas gter yod shes par bya// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnamaso// oM ma hA ma Ni rat+na A bi sha hUM/ oM ma Ni pa~M Da pa ri sha ya hUM/ oM rat+na sa mA d+hi bru hi/ 
381a4(rgyud): oM rat+na A bi sha dar sha ya hUM/ phyag rgya chen por bsgoms na ni// // gang du lus ni khor gyur pa// de na rin chen gter yod pa der// dam tshig nyid kyis shes par bya// dam tshig mchog ni
381a5(rgyud): bcings nas kyang // gang du babs nas gnyis gyur pa// de nas rin chen chen po yi// gter yod par ni shes par bya// ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas ni// gang la babs pa bdag nyid
381a6(rgyud): kyis// rin chen chen po bdag nyid kyis// gter ni gang na yod par smra// las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang // gang tshe lag gnyis phan tshun du// babs nas dam tshig bcings gyur pa// de nas gtem
381a7(rgyud): ni yod par bshad// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnamaso// oM ma hA rat+na kA ya dar sha ya rat+na/ oM A kA sha gar+b+ha ma Ni rat+na/ oM s+pho Ta s+pho Ta ya ni d+hi/ oM ma Ni rat+na dz+nyA na swa yaM bru ti/ oM pu na sa ma ya ban d+ha dar/ 
381a8(rgyud): sha ya swA hA// phyag rgya chen po bsgoms nas ni// de bzhin gang du dogs gyur pa// de nas rin chen 'byung ba yi// gter yod ye shes shes par bya// gang du dogs yod der yang ni// dam tshig mchog ni mchog
381b1(rgyud): bcings la// gang tshe nyid ni grol gyur pa// de na gter ni yod par bshad// ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas ni// gang du nges par dogs gyur pa// de na nges par gter yong par// ye shes bskyed de/ 
381b2(rgyud): shes par bya// gang na yang dang yang dogs par// las kyi phyag rgya cho ga bzhin// der bcings de ni gnyis gyur pa// gter yod par ni shes par bya// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnam so// oM ni d+hi dz+nyA na
381b3(rgyud): a bi sha/ oM rat+na na sa ma ya muny+tsa ni d+hi ban d+ha/ oM d+harma rat+na bru hi ni d+ha naM/ oM sarba karma Ni s+pho Ta yad ra sha ya d+hi ban+to dak+Shi pa/ phyag rgya chen por bsgoms nas ni// gter rnams kun tu btsal nas kyang // gang
381b4(rgyud): na gnas pa der babs na// de na yod par rnam par bshad// dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang // gter rnams ku/ dan tu btsal nas ni// gang na gnas pa brtag gyur pa// de na gter
381b5(rgyud): ni yod par bshad// ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas ni// gter rnams kun tu btsal nas kyang // gang na yod par rtag tu shes// de na gter ni yod par bshad// las kyi phyag
381b6(rgyud): rgya bcings nas ni// gter rnams kun tu btsal nas kyang // gang na yod par las phyag rgya// bskor ba de na yod par bshad// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnamaso// oM rat+na sa ma ya hr-i da dar sha ya/ 
381b7(rgyud): oM rat+na pa rik+Sha dz+nyA na A bi sha/ oM ma Ni karma brah+ma ya/ de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la// gter rnams kun tu tshol byed cing // phyag rgya chen
381b8(rgyud): po bsgoms na ni// babs par gyur na gter rnyed do// dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang // bud med dang ni rtse byed cing // gang du phyag rgya dam gyur tam// de na gter ni yod par bshad// dbang po
382a1(rgyud): gnyis ni mnyam sbyar na// gter rnams kun tu tshol byed cing // ye shes phyag rgya bsgoms nas ni// gter gyi ye shes 'jug par 'gyur// dbang po gnyis kyi ting 'dzin gyis// las
382a2(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni// gang du phyag rgya gnyis gyur pa// de nas gter ni yod par bshad// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnamaso// oM ma hA ma Ni saM yo gra be sha/ oM sa ma ya saM yo ga dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ oM da ni dz+nyA na
382a3(rgyud): A be sha saM yo ga/ oM sarba karma se s+pho Ta sa yo ga/ de nas nor bu'i rigs chen po'i phyag rgya'i ye shes thams cad bsla'o// de nas phyag rgya chen po 'di yin te// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ 
382a4(rgyud): ji lta ba yi ri mo bzhin// phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni// don gyi mtsho ngag kun 'grub par 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya chen po rnams kyi da las ni 'di rnams yi no// sangs rgyas phyag rgya sangs rgyas
382a5(rgyud): nyid// rdo rje snying pos gnyis rab 'grub// rin chen lcags kyus kun spyan 'dren// nor bu dga' bar rjes dgar byed/ nor bu mgu bas dgyes par byed// nor bu lta bas nor
382a6(rgyud): thob bo// nor bu phreng bas dbang bskur zhing // nor bu nyi mas gzi brjid mchog/ yid bzhin nor bus ji dgar sbyin// rin chen bzhad pas nor thob 'gyur// rin chen chos kyis chos kyang thob/ 
382a7(rgyud): gtong ba'i dpal gyis dam pa rnyed// rin chen ral gris mtshon chen po// rin chen 'khor los dbang por 'gyur// smra bas btsal ba'i dngos grub 'thob// rin chen char gyi nor chen po// nor bu'i
382a8(rgyud): mchod pas rab mchod nyid// rin chen chos kyis brtan par byed// rin chen mche bas nor thob bo// khu tshur nor bus dngos grub 'thob// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'di'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i
382b1(rgyud): ye shes ni 'di yin no// rdo rje rin chen phyag rgyas ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur 'brog/ rdo rje nor bu che bcings nas// rdo rje dzin chen grub par 'gyur// rdo rje gnyis las nor bur dbyas/ 
382b2(rgyud): 'dzin las nor 'thob bo// de nyid mthe bong rdo rje yis// nor bu sbyar te snying kar bzhag/ mdzub gnyis pad+mo'i nor bur bcings// 'jig rten dbang gis nor byin 'gyur// rdo rje las nor sna tshogs kyis// 
382b3(rgyud): nor bu chen po'i rgyal mtshan sbyin// rdo rje dbyings mdzub nor bu yis// sangs rgyas rin chen nyid 'thob bo// mdzub mo mnyam te phyir bkug la// mthe bo rdo rjer bcings pa yi// rdo rje snying po'i phyag las b+ha/ 
382b4(rgyud): 'di ni rdo rje'i nor bur gsungs// 'di ni bcings ma thag tu yang // rdo rje'i nor bu chen po 'thob// mdzub gnyis rin chen 'draradabacings la// gung mo myu gur sgreng ba ste// 'di ni bcings
382b5(rgyud): ma thag tu yang // rang gi dbang bskur thob par 'gyur// de nas gu nga mo srin lag dang // mthe'u chung rnams ni pad+mor bya// 'dis ni kun tu spyan ras gzigs// mtshan 'dzin pas ni nor
382b6(rgyud): sbyin 'gyur// mdzub mo mthe bo mthe'u chung rnams// rdo rje rin chen tshul du bya// gung mo gnyis kyi sen mo sbyar// srin lag myu gu 'dra bar sgreng // rdo rje bsdam pa dam byas la// mdzub gnyis nor bur
382b7(rgyud): byas nas kyang // mtheb gnyis brkyang ba'i ngos snying ka/ don kun grub pa sbyin par byed// rdo rje bsdam pa bsdams nas kyang // gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bya// nor bu mtshan gyi phyag rgya 'di// nor bu chen
382b8(rgyud): bo rab sbyin no// de nyid las ni mdzub mo gnyis// lcags kyu'i tshul du byas pa ni// don kun 'gug pa'i phyag rgya ste// nor bu rin chen lcags kyur bshad// de nyid las ni bsgyur nas kyang // mdzub mos
383a1(rgyud): mdzub mo gzung nas ni// mda' 'phangs pa yi tshul byas la// dras nas 'gro ba dga' bar byed// de nyid las ni mdzub mtheb gnyis// sbyar ba leg so zhes bya'o// de nas mtheg
383a2(rgyud): gnyis sbyar ba yis// mdzub gnyis rtse mo sbyar ba dang // mthe bo gnyis ni dbus sbyar la// mdzub gnyis ngos dang sbyar ba ni// nor bu lta bar bshad pa ste// lta ba'i don rnams 'phrog byed pa'o// 
383a3(rgyud): don kun grub pa'i phreng ba ni// rang gi dbang ni rab sbyin 'gyur// de nyid snying kar mthe bo gnyis// sgreng ste ngos kyi sbyar ba ni// nor bu nyi ma'i snying kar bzhag/ gzi brjid chen por rab sbyin 'gyur// srin lag/ 
383a4(rgyud): mnyams te sgreng nas ni// phye ste spyi bor bzhag par bya// rdo rje nor bu chen po gtso// re ba thams cad rdzogs pa'o// de nyid la sa ni 'gying byed cing // kha 'gram dgod pa bskor ba ste// rin
383a5(rgyud): chen cher dgod zhes bya ba// bzhad pas don rnams thams cada'agrub// ting 'dzin du sor mo sgom// nor bu pad+ma nor 'cha/ nga ba'i// de nas mtha' nas grol ba ni// sbyin pa chen po rab
383a6(rgyud): sbyin byed// mthe bo gnyis ni nang du dgug/ mdzub gnyis nor bur byas pa ni// nor bu ral gri yin te mthus// 'gro ba rnams kyi nor 'phrog pa'o// rdo rje bsdams las 'khor lor bya// mthe bo gnyis
383a7(rgyud): nang du bcug nas kyang // mdzub gnyis nor bur 'drar byas pa// 'khor los bsgyur ba thob par byed// de nyid thal mo'i tshul du byas// kha nas 'dren par byas pa ni// de bcings nas ni ngag gis
383a8(rgyud): kyang // rang gi bkas ni nor 'phrog 'gyur// rdo rje nor bu che bcings la// rin chen char ni rab 'bebs te// sor mo thams cad sgreng ba ni// phyogs bzhi nas ni nor char 'bebs// rdo rje nor bu che
383b1(rgyud): bcings la// gar byas gtsug pud dbus bzhag nas// kun la cho ga bzhin mchod na// rin chen kun gyis de mchod 'gyur// don kun grub pa'i phyag rgyas ni// mgrin pa'i phyogasu 'khyud par
383b2(rgyud): bya// nor bu bcings pa zhes bya ste// srung ba yi ni cho gar grags// don kun grub pa de nyid las// gnod sbyin tshul du khar bzhag pa// nor bu mche ba zhes bya ste// 'jigs byed don kun 'phrog pa
383b3(rgyud): yi/ rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la// mdzub bkug mthe bo gnyis kyis ni// legs par mnan te btsir ba ni// nor bu'i khu tshur dngos grub 'thob// dam tshig rnams kyi mchod mchog
383b4(rgyud): rnams// rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul du ni// ji bzhin nor bu ldan pa dal// 'di ni dam tshig mchog tu btags// gung mo nor dbu'i tshul du bya// de dag nyid la rnam par btags// lcags kyu/ 
383b5(rgyud): gcig sogs tshul gyi ni// las rnams thams cad rab 'gyu ba byed// de nas nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya ye shes ni 'di yin// tragra tI tri/ shrI i ri d+hi ngi gri bi ri
383b6(rgyud): ya sa/ rin chen phyag rgya gnyis byas la// las kyi phyag rgya tho bar bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig rtog pa'i rgyal po las don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen
383b7(rgyud): po'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i gzungs kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i rin po che'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba
383b8(rgyud): ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi phyag tu 'digasu so// oM brjod dru ba cu/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag ni rdo rjes rang gi rigs 'byung ba'i phyag rgya 'digasung so// me brdzes ni
384a1(rgyud): / kha/ mA le a b+hi'i chu sa ma ye ts+tsha/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi phyag rgya 'digasung so// oM rat+na a g+ni ga cu/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
384a2(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungaso// oM d+harma a b+hi She ka hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungaso// oM sarba ta thA ga/ 
384a3(rgyud): ta a b+hi She ka pU dza sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa na mkha'i snying pos rang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsung so// de nas rab tu bshad bya/ 
384a4(rgyud): ba/ phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la// rin chen gsang ba zhes bshad de// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bres// de yi
384a5(rgyud): dbusu tshul bzhin du// sangs rgyas phyag rgya bri ba ste// khri la ga na sa pa'i nor bu'i gtso// rdo rje dbyings kyi mdun du ni// nor bu'i phreng ba pad+mo'i nor// nor bus bskor ba'i nor bu'i rnams// de la
384a6(rgyud): de dag gi snying po ni 'od rnamaso// oM tra/ oM ma Ni sa ma ye hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na a b+hi She ka mA le hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na pad+ma hUM/ oM mai Ni rat+na br-i ti sa ma ye hUM/ thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis rgal
384a7(rgyud): nas ni// rdo rje rin chen dbusu ni// rdo rje nor bu chen po bri// de yi phyogs ni thams cad du// ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin par// rang gi phyag rgya nor bu ldan// rin chen slob dpon nyid kyis bri// de la de dag gi/ 
384a8(rgyud): phyag rgya ni 'di rnams so// oM sarba ar+tha sid+d+hi pra be ma hA badz+rI rat+na sa ma ye ma Ni sarba ar+than me sA d+ha ya d+ha ri NI hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na A kaR+Sha ya swA hA/ oM ma Ni rat+na sa ma ye aM ku sha ma Ni ku la dza/ oM ma Ni rA ga sa ma ye hUM/ 
384b1(rgyud): oM ma Ni sA d+hu hUM/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor gnyis par yang // rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni// spyan gnyis dang ni ldan pa yin// nor bu de yi dbu su bri// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// lhag 'og go/ 
384b2(rgyud): rims ji bzhin par// nor bu'i mtshan mar ldan pa yi// rang gi phyag rgya rnams bri'o// de la de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di dag go/ oM ma Ni rat+na ne tra A na ya ba shaM ku ru sarba ar+tha saM bA dA nA shi gI tiSh+Tha a ku shi hUM/ oM
384b3(rgyud): ma Ni rat+na rat+na mA le a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na sur+ya dz+wa la ya sarba ma hA rA dzi ni hUM/ oM ma Ni tsan+na d+ha dza gri hUM/ oM ma Ni hA se hA sa hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni// nor bu pad+mo bri bar bya// de yi phyogs rnams
384b4(rgyud): thams cad du// ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin bya// de la de dag gi nga snying po 'di rnamaso// oM ma Ni sa mA d+hi pad+me ni hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na d+ya gra sa ma ye hUM/ oM ma Ni sa ma ya ke Sho hUM/ oM ma Ni sa ma ya tsakra hUM/ 
384b5(rgyud): oM ma Ni pA shA gri hUM/ dkyil 'khor bzhi pa dam par ni// rdo rje shu gas kyis rgal nas kyang // rdo rje rin chen ldan pa yi// rin chen char 'bebs der gnas shing // las kyi phyag rgya ji bzhin
384b6(rgyud): bas// yongasu bskor bar bri bar bya'o// nor bu'i mtshan mar ldan pa rnams// lha 'og go rims ji bzhin bya// de nas de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnamaso// oM rat+na br-iSh+Ti sA d+ha ya ma hA ma Ni hUM/ oM ma hA pU dza sa ma
384b7(rgyud): ye ne tra A/ oM ma hA pU dza sa ma na sa ma ye rak+Sha/ oM badz+ra ma Ni rat+na daMSh+T+rA ka rA le ha ra ha ra hUM/ oM ma Ni sa ma ya muSh+Ti hUM/ de nas nor bu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir las rnams ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas rang gi
384b8(rgyud): slob ma rnams bcud de 'di skad du bsgo bar bya'o// khyod kyis tshul 'di su la yang ma smra zhig/ khyod rab tu dbul ba dang dus byas nas sems can dmyal bar lhung nga re zhes bsgo la rang gi nor bu'i dam tshig gi ye
385a1(rgyud): shes bskyed par bya'o// rdo chen chen ting 'dzin gyis// mkha' la rdo dzi na chen bri// bdag nyid kyini dpral bar yang // gnag na rtul ba shes par 'gyur// rin chen
385a2(rgyud): bcings nas ni// rdo rje rin chen mkha' la bri// rang gi gan su bzhag na ni// nges par rgyal po nyid du 'gyur// rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje rin chen mkha' la bri// ye shes rdo rje de bzhag na// nyid
385a3(rgyud): kyis grub pa'i rgyal por 'gyur// las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni// mkha' la rdo rje rin chen bri// rang gi gnasu de bzhag na// nyid kyi grub pa'i rgyal por 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnam so// 
385a4(rgyud): ma hA badz+ra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ sa ma ya rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ d+harma ra/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa ma/ karma rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ phyag rgya chen po'i steng kar ni// rdo rje rin chen bsgom par bya// bsgoms nas
385a5(rgyud): mngon par dbang du bskur// mchog tu rmad du 'byung ba 'thob// mnyam par gzhag pas rdo rje yi// rin chen dpral bar ba sgoms nas ni// rin chen rdo rje bcings gyur na// thams cad
385a6(rgyud): kyi ni rgyal por 'gyur// rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis// lce la rdo rje rin chen sgom// chos kyi rgyal po nyid du ni// dbang bskur ba ni thob par 'gyur// rab mnyam bzhag pas rdo rje yi// rin chen gtsug
385a7(rgyud): gtor bsgoms nas kyang // las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni// las legs byed pa'i rgyal por 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di 'di rnamaso// oM badz+ra rat+na hr-i da ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa ho// oM badz+ra rat+na a b+hi She ka dra/ 
385a8(rgyud): oM rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa baM/ oM badz+ra rat+na uSh+NI Sha a d+hiSh+Tha na sa man/ phyag rgya chen po bdag nyid kyis// bsgoms na rdo rje rin chen yang // ras la sogs pas bris nas ni// rgyal po chen por de 'gyur ro// rdo rje rin chen
385b1(rgyud): bla na med// ras la sogs pa bri nas kyang // sems dpa' rdo rje bsgoms na ni// dam tshig rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur// rin chen rdo rje bdag nyid kyis// ras la sogs la bris nas kyang // bsam gtan
385b2(rgyud): phyag rgya bsgoms nan// nges par chos kyi bdag por 'gyur// ras la sogs pa rdo rje yi// rin chen bris nas las rnams kyi// phyag rgya bsgoms par gyur na ni// bdag nyid las kyi bdag por 'gyur// 
385b3(rgyud): de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnamaso// badz+ra rat+na bin d+ha a d+hi tiSh+ThaHoM badz+ra rat+na bim ba a b+hi She ka/ badz+ra rat+na bi ma ba ku ru gser ram yang na dngul yang rung // rdo rje rin chen bcings gyur tam// yang na rin
385b4(rgyud): chen gzhan yang rung // snying kar bsgoms nas dbang bskur gyur// rdo rje rin chen bla na med// gser ram rin chen ga zhan las byas// rtag tu dpral bar bzhag na ni// nor che ba mi
385b5(rgyud): rgyal por 'gyur// gser ram rin chen gzhan dag gi/ rdorin chen bsgoms nas kyang // rang gi khar yang bcug na ni// tshig la dbang bar de 'gyuraro// gser ram rin chen gnan/ 
385b6(rgyud): dag gi/ rdo rje rin chen bsgoms na ni// gtsug tor du ni yang bsgoms na// las rnams kun gyi bdag por 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnam so// oM badz+ra rat+na hring ya A ba raNahUM/ oM badz+ra rat+na
385b7(rgyud): a b+hi She ka ma hA ar+tha pA / oM badz+ra raShA ba tsa pA de/ oM badz+ra rat+na ma hA karma bA / de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya gsang ba'i ye shes bsla'o// phyag rgya chen por bsgoms nas ni// rdo rje nor bu
385b8(rgyud): che bcings la// nor bu bud med bu gar bcug/ de ltar dngos grub thob par 'gyur// dam tshig mchog gi nor bu ni// bud med bu gar bcug nas kyang // dam tshig mchog bcings thams cad kyi// 
386a1(rgyud): dbang bskur ba yi dngos grub 'gyur// rdo rje nor bu che bcings la// chos kyi phyag rgya bsgoms nor bu// de ni bud med bu gar bcug/ bla med pa'i dngos grub 'gyur/ 
386a2(rgyud): las kyi phyag rgya nor bu bcings// bud med bu gar las phyag rgya// bcings par 'gyur na las kun gyi// dngos grub bla na med par 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnamaso// oM ma hA sid d+hi/ oM sam
386a3(rgyud): ya a b+hi She ka sid+d+hi/ oM d+harmA sid+hi/ oM karma sid+d+hi/ de nas dkyil 'khor 'di'i phyag rgya chen po bcings bshad de// rin chen rdo rje myu gur bcings// gung mo srin lag mthe'u chung rnams// sor mo brkyang ba
386a4(rgyud): byas nas ni// spyi bor bzhag pa grub mchog 'thob// rdo rje bsdam dpa byas nas kyang // mdzub mo gnyis mdud mtheb gnyis dang // srin lag rdo rje bsgyur nas ni// mdzer spur bzhag pa dbang
386a5(rgyud): thob bo// rdo rje rin chen tshul byas la// mdzub gnyis ngos dang / mtheb ngos spyad// de nyid bsgyur nas de dbang 'thob// de nyid mtheb gnyis mdzub gnyis ni// chos kyi rdo rje tshul du ni
386a6(rgyud): bcings nas dpral bar gzhag pa ni// chos chen gyi ni dbang bskur 'gyur// las kyi rdo rje bcings nas kyang // dbang rnams kun gyi phreng ba ste// bsgyur nas dpral ba nyid du yang // bzhag na dbang ni
386a7(rgyud): bskur bar 'gyur// rin chen 'byung ba'i phyag rgya ni// rdo rje dbyings skyes dam tshig kyang // bcings nas rin chen dpral bar ni// bzhag na dbang ni bskur bar 'gyur// mtheb gnyis phan tshun
386a8(rgyud): bsngal nas no// mdzub gnyis kyi rtse mo yang // nor bu 'dra bar bkug pa ni// rdo rje nor bu chen po 'thob// rdo rje bsdam pa byas nas kyang // rdo rje khu tshur gung mo gnyis// nor bu 'dra bar byas nas/ 
386b1(rgyud): nas ni// nor bu phreng ba'i dbang bskur 'gyur// rdo rje bsdam pa byas nas ni// gung mo nor bu 'drar byas la// mdzub mo srin lag gnyis pad+mo// kha bye 'dra bar byas pas 'grub// gung mo gnyis ni nor
386b2(rgyud): bur bcings// sor mo thams cad sgreng ba rnams// nor bu nyid du bsgoms na ni// 'khor rnams mchog dang ldan par 'gyur// gung mo mthe bo rdo rje yis// rin chen tshul du byas nas kyang // srin
386b3(rgyud): lag mthe'u chung mnyams pa yi// khar bzhag lce ste nor bu sbyin// de la mdzub gnyis rdo rjer bya// de ltar de gnyis lcags kyur bya// mdzub mos mdzub mo drang ba dang // de nyid dga' bar rab sbyin
386b4(rgyud): ba'o// gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bcing // mdzub gnyis ngos la dgug pa ste// srin lag ngos gnyis 'dud pa la/ dmathe bo gnyis kyis bkab pa ste// de nyid rdo rje nyi mar bskor// 
386b5(rgyud): dpung pa'i spyi bor brkyang bar bya// nor bu'i rgyal mtshan spyi bo'i rgya na// bzhad pa'i tshul du byas pa'o// rdo rje bsdam pa byas na ni// mdzub mo srin lag gyen du sgreng // de dag pad+mo 'dra bar
386b6(rgyud): bya// gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bya// de las mtha' mar rab sbyin bya// rdo rje ral gri sbyar ba dang // rdo rje 'khor lo tshul du bya// de nyid kha nas dbyung bar bya// mdzub gnyis rin chen myu gur bya// sor mo
386b7(rgyud): thams cad brkyang ba dang // de dag spyi bor bzhag pa ni// rin chen char gyis char 'beb so// de nyid go cha'i tshul du ni// snying kar rin chen gnyis byas pa// mdzub gnyis nor bu 'dzin mche ba// dbus
386b8(rgyud): mnyams pa khu tshu ro// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// phyag rgya chen po de dag nyid// snyim pa sbyar ba bcings na ni// mdor na gsang ba gsang ba yi// dngos grub bzhir 'gyur sbyin par
387a1(rgyud): byed// ji ltar rdo rje'i gsang pa'i stin// dus rnams kun tu bcings mi bya// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya'i mdo ba shad par bya'o// prewe/ tres grag rjems pa baM kra sa migs
387a2(rgyud): ba gsang ba'i khu tshur mchog/ gnyisu byas na las kun byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po las rin po che phyag rgya'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
387a3(rgyud): rgyas pa rdzogs so// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba mkhyen pa'i dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
387a4(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// / oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka dz+nyA no ta ta ma hUM/ de nas bya/ ngang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam
387a5(rgyud): pa 'di gsungaso// oM badz+ra dz+nyA na a b+hi She ka sa ma ya hUM/ de na sa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying / pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso// oM ma Ni rat+na a b+hi Sha
387a6(rgyud): ka dz+nyA na hUM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM d+harma a b+hi She ka dz+nyA na hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs
387a7(rgyud): kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM sarba a b+hi She ka dz+nyA na hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying pos rang gi rigs kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsung so// de nas
387a8(rgyud): rab tu bshang bya ba// ye shes dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la// rin chen ye shes zhes bshad de// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srad pus bre// chos kyi/ 
387b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor tshul du ni// snying ka'i mtshan ma bri bar bya// de nas dkyil 'khor 'di'i ye shes kyi snying po 'di rnams gsungaso// oM dz+nyA na sarba sid+d+ha dz+nyA na hUM/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na hUM/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na a~M ku sha dzaHoM ma Ni d+ha/ 
387b2(rgyud): na rA ga/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na duSh+Te/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na duSh+Ti ma Ni hUM/ oM dz+nyA na a b+hi She ka/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na sUr+ya/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na d+ha dza/ aT+TaTu hA sa/ ma Ni dz+nyA na pad+ma hUM/ oM ma Ni t+ya ga/ oM ma NaM dz+nyA na ko Sha/ oM dz+nyA na ma Ni tsakra/ oM dz+nyA na ma Ni b+ha
387b3(rgyud): Sha/ oM dz+nyA na ma Ni rat+na baR+Sha hUM/ oM ma Ne dz+nyA na nr-i t+ye pU dza sa ma ye hUM/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na rak+Sha/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na muSh+Ti/ de nas yang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas slob ma la 'di skad bsgo bar bya'o// khyod
387b4(rgyud): kyis chos ma mthong ba su la yang ma brjod cig/ khyod dngos grub ma thob par myur bar shi bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo la nor bu'i rig ras kyi chos kyi ye shes bskyed par bya'o// tingange 'dzin gyis ras sogs/ 
387b5(rgyud): la/ rdo rje snying po bris nas ni// bsgoms nas rin chen don 'byin tu/ sa// smra zhing gsol ba gdab par bya// ting 'dzin gyis ra/ sa sogs la// rdo rje snying po bris nas ni// bsgoms nas rin
387b6(rgyud): chen byin cig ces// tshig tu smra zhing gsol ba gdab// rdo rje snying po ras sogs la// bris te mnyam par bzhag nas kyang // rnam par bsgoms te ye shes la// dam chos sbyin zhes gsol ba gdab// rdo rje
387b7(rgyud): snying po ras sogs la// mnyam par gzhag pas bris nas kyang // bsgoms nas dam pa'i las byin zhes// las la gsol ba gdab par bya// de nas de dag gi sgrub pa'i snying po ni 'di rnamaso// oM de hi sarba ar+tha
387b8(rgyud): b+ha ga bAM badz+ra gar+b+ha/ oM de tsi sarba rat+na b+ha ga bA badz+ra gar+b+ha/ oM de hi sA d+ha d+harma na b+ha ga bAM badz+ra gar+b+ha satwa/ oM de hi sA d+ha karma b+ha ga bAM badz+ra gar+b+ha/ na mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du// na mkha'i snying po legs sems pa// 
388a1(rgyud): mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms nas su// phun sum tshogs don gsol bar bya// namakha'i snying po legs sems pa// mnyam par gzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang // nor
388a2(rgyud): bsags pa ni gsol bar bya// namakha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du// na mkha'i snying po legs sems pa'i// mnyam par gzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang // phun sum tshogs ni gsol ba gangag/ 
388a3(rgyud): nam mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du// na mkha'i snying po legs sems pa// mnyam par gzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang // las sogs pa ni gsol ba gdab// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnamaso// 
388a4(rgyud): oM dz+nyA na gar+b+ha de hi sarba ar+than/ oM dz+nyA na gar+b+ha de hi sarba rat+na/ oM dz+nyA na ga/ dar+d+ha de hi sarba d+harma/ oM dz+nyA na gar+b+ha de hi sarba karma mA/ rdo rje snying po dbris nas kyang // snying kar yongasu sgom byas la// gang gi tshe na
388a5(rgyud): snying 'phar ba// de tshe grub pas nor ster ro// rdo rje snying po dpral bar ni// bris te rnam par bsgoms nas kyang // gang chem go bo 'dar gyur pa// des ni mngon par dbang thob bo// rdo rje snying
388a6(rgyud): po khar bcug la// de nyid du ni bsgoms nas kyang // gang tshe de ni byed gyur pa// de tshe des ni ngag 'gru'o// rdo rje snying po bdag spyi bor// rab tu bzhag ste bsgoms nas kyang // gang tshe de ni 'bar gyur pa// de tshede
388a7(rgyud): ni 'phang du lding bar 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnamaso// oM hr-i da ya gar+b+he de hi d+ha naM/ oM rat+na a b+hi She ka gar+b+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ oM b+ha ga gar+b+ha sid+d+ha/ oM rat+na gar+b+hoSh+NI Sha A kA shA gats+tsha/ rdo rje snying po phyag rgya
388a8(rgyud): tshe// rab mnyam gzhag pas bsgoms na ni// bdag la grub stsol zhes gsol la// i li rat+na zhes brjod 'grub// na mkha'i snying po'i dam tshig ni// rab mnyam gzhag pas bcings nas kyang // dbang bskur
388b1(rgyud): ba ni gsol btab la// mi li rat+na zhes brjod 'thob// rdo rje snying po ting 'dzin du// rab mnyam gnag pas bsgoms nas ni// chos bdag stsol zhes gsol btab la// tsi li rat+na zhes brjod 'thob// nam
388b2(rgyud): mkha'i snying po las kyi mchog/ rab mnyam gzhag pas bcings nas ni// rin chen thams cad gsol btab la// ki li rat+na zhes brjod 'thob// de la de dag gi snying po na 'di rnamaso// oM i li/ oM mi
388b3(rgyud): li oM tsaM mi/ oM ka li/ de nas nor bu ye shes gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// na mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du// rdo rje snying po bsgoms nas ni// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam spang na// dngos/ 
388b4(rgyud): grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// gzhi la ri mo bris pa bzhin// rdo rje snying po bsgoms nas ni// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la// dbang bskur ba yang thob par 'gyur// rdo rje snying po
388b5(rgyud): bsgoms nas ni// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la// sdug pa de dang gar brtses pa// 'jig rten kun gyis de dgar byed// nam mkha' kun gyi rdul dbyibs kyis// rdo rje snying po bsgoms
388b6(rgyud): / nas ni// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor la// thams cad 'grub par nges par 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnam so// A kA sha gu h+ya dz+nyA na sa ma ya hUM/ tsit+ta gu t+ya dz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ pri yA nu smr-i ti dz+nyA na
388b7(rgyud): gu h+ya sarba lo ka rA gA ya hUM/ sarba gu h+ya dz+nyA na sarba sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha hUM/ de nas phyag rgya chen po 'di ji lta ba bzhin bcing bar bya'o// dngos grub kyang de dang 'dra'o// de nas chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes
388b8(rgyud): bslab bo// rdo rje nor bu ni rdo rje ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bzhag par bya'o// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya ni 'di yi no// sA bA ra sa ra ta ka ha daM ti he ba ka na ya a de nas mdor na las kyi phyag rgya ni gnas ci
389a1(rgyud): bzhin par bzhag par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kying mtshig gi brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po las ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi chog rgyas pa rdzogs// 
389a2(rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i las kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa 'di
389a3(rgyud): gsungaso// sarba tA thA ga ta karma a b+hi She ka hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi las 'byung ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM badz+ra hUM kA ra a b+hi She ka/ de nas byang
389a4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa man+ta a b+hi She kaM hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje
