389a5(rgyud): spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM sarba d+harma a b+hiShaka rat+na/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM
389a6(rgyud): bi shwa a b+hi She ka/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa na mkha' snying pos rang gi rig kyi dam tshig 'di gsung so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ 
389a7(rgyud): rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la// rin chen dgos pa zhes bshad do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srad pus bre// de yi dbus tshul bzhin du// sangs rgyas sku gzugs bzhag par
389a8(rgyud): bya// sems dpa' chen po tshul gyis ni// rin chen mchod pa rnams bri'o// de la de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnam so// oM maNi rat+na pu dzag/ oM sarba ar+tha sid+d+ha badz+ra ra k+Sha sa b+hi She gahUM/ oM ma Ni rahA hU~M/ oM ma
389b1(rgyud): rat+na A kaR+Sha karma sa ma ye hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na rA ga ra ti karma pU dze pra bar+d+ha/ oM ma Ni rat+ne sA d+hu ka ra pU dza sa ma ye hUM/ oM ma hA ma Ni rat+na tiSh+Tha ka ra She/ oM ma Ni rat+na mA la pU dze/ oM ma Ni rat+na sUr+ya lo ka pU dze/ oM ma Ni rat+na d+hA dza bang+ka pA
389b2(rgyud): dza/ oM ma Ni rat+na aT+Ta T+Ta hA sa pU dze/ oM pad+ma ma Ni sa mA d+ham sa sa \u0f7f/ oM sarba tA ga na smr-i te sa mA d+haM karma ka ri ts+tsha/ oM ma Ni rat+na tik+Sh+Na sa ma ye ts+tshin+da hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na tsakra sa ma ye hU~M/ oM ma Ni rat+na b+hA Sha b+had b+ha da hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na
389b3(rgyud): karmi Ni hUM/ oM ma Ni ret+ne ka ba tse rak+Sha mAM/ oM ma Ni rat+na daSh+Ta khAng khAd hUM/ oM ma Na karma muSh+Ti hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na lA s+ye pU dzA ya ho// oM ma Ni mA le a b+hi She ka pU dzA ya/ oM ma Ni rat+na gi te pU dzA ya/ oM ma Ni rat+na nr-i t+ye pU dzal/ 
389b4(rgyud): oM ma Ni rat+na d+hU pa pU dza ya/ oM ma Ni rat+na puSh+pe pU dza ya/ oM ma Ni rat+na a da lo ka pU dzA ya/ oM ma Ni rat+na gan+d+he pU dzA ya/ oM ma Ni rat+na aM ku/ sha A kaR+Sha ya dza/ oM ma Ni rat+na pA she hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na s+pho Ta ba/ 
389b5(rgyud): oM ma Ni rat+na oM be sha a/ de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir chog ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par byas bcug ste 'di skad du bsgo bar bya'o// 'di khyod kyis su la yang ma smra shig/ khyod las kyi
389b6(rgyud): sgrib pas non nas shi bar gyur ta re zhes bsgol/ las kyi ye shes bslab par bya'o// rdo rje snying po phyag rgya che// rab mnyam gzhag pa bsgoms nas kyang // mchod pa kun gyis mchod na ni// sangs rgyas
389b7(rgyud): thams cad dbang du 'gyur// ting 'dzin gyi dam tshig mchog/ phyag rgya gang yang rung bcings la// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod na ni// dbang bskur ba ni nges 'thob bo// rdo rje snying po ting 'dzin tu// rab
389b8(rgyud): mnyam gzhag pas bsgoms nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod na// 'gro ba'i dam pa 'dul bar 'gyur// rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni// sangs rgyas
390a1(rgyud): thams cad mchod gyur na// skad cig tu ni don kun 'thob// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnam so// oM rat+na pU dzab shi ku ru/ oM rat+na pU dza sa ma ya a b+hi'iny+tsa/ oM rat+na pU dzas rnarman
390a2(rgyud): ya bAdi/ oM rat+na pU dza karma sarba ar+tha me sA d+ha/ de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/ rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar nas// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod
390a3(rgyud): na ni// 'jig rten thams cad des mgur 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes kyis dngos grub dam pa 'grub par 'gyuraro// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// rdo rje rin chen
390a4(rgyud): bcings nas ni// gnas rnams kun tu bzhag par bya// rdo rje dgo ngas pa'i tshul du ni// ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin bya// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/ t+ya dz+nyA ga duN+Da dza sarba
390a5(rgyud): rak+Sha sharmak+Sha kr-i te/ rdo rje rin chen gnyis byas la// las kyi bya gargya de sgrub bo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig gi brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po las las kyi dkyil
390a6(rgyud): 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzog so// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rin po che'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang
390a7(rgyud): gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso// oM badz+ra rat+na dzA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungaso// oM badz+ra mA le/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
390a8(rgyud): dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsung so// oM ma Ni rat+ne/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungaso// oM badz+ra d+harma rat+ne/ de nas byang chub
390b1(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyi rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungaso// oM bai shwa dr-iSh+Ti/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying pos rang gi nor bu'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bzhi
390b2(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungaso// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// phyag rgya bzhi pa'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor yongasu brtag par bya// de nas ji lta ba bzhin du bcug nas
390b3(rgyud): bslab par bya ste// khyod kyis su la yang ma smra shig ces bsgo bar bya'o// de nas ye shes bskyed par bya ste// rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje rin chen bcings nas ni// dpral bar rab tu bzhag na ni/ 
390b4(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur// de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di yino// oM badz+ra rat+na ba sho ka/ sarba sid+d+ho pra yats+tsha hU tra/ de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya bslab par bya ste// khyod 'am yang na
390b5(rgyud): sdug pa 'am// bud med dang ni skyes pa'ang rung // dpral ba gnyis ni sprad nas kyang // gtugs na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de la de sgrub pa'i snying po ni 'di yin te/ oM badz+ra rat+na sa khi bing+ga/ 
390b6(rgyud): d+hA ra be/ pra yats+tsha shI g+h+raM a b+hi Sho ny+tsa ya hi ha ha ta tra/ de nas phyag rgya bzhi ji lta ba bzhin du bcing ba dang rnam pa bzhi de bzhin du bslab bo// dngos grub thams cad kyang de bzhin no// de nas byang chub sems
390b7(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying pos don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsung so// oM badz+ra maNi d+ha ra sarba ar+tha sid+hi m+bi pra yats+tsha to// b+hag bAn badz+raraHhUM/ de nas dkyil 'khor tsha/ 
390b8(rgyud): yin te/ de nas rab tu bshang bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// dngos grub kyi ni dkyil 'khor ni// ji bzhin par ni bri bar bya// de nas 'dir ye shes gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// 
391a1(rgyud): gzugs la sogs pa'i 'dod pa rnams// chags par gyur pa'i bde ba ni// sangs rgyas la yang phul gyur na// las kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya bzhi sa
391a2(rgyud): shes bslab par bya'o// ras la sogs pa la yang sems dpa' 'am phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bris te bsgrub par bya'o// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas byang chub sems
391a3(rgyud): dpa' na mkha'i snying po la legaso zhes bya ba byin pa 'dis bstod do// legaso rdo rje sems dpa' khyod// rdo rje rin chen khyod leg so// rdo rje chos khyod legs pa ste// rdo rje las ni khyod leg so// rdo rje
391a4(rgyud): theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // / theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa// mdo sde 'di ni legs par dbashad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid
391a5(rgyud): bsdus pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi da ma tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// / bam po brgyad pa// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
391a6(rgyud): dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi de kho na nyid kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud 'di gsungaso// de la re shig dang por ni phyag rgya chen po dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ 
391a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rgya che// bcings nas mkha' dbyings thams cad du// sangs rgyas sku gzugs byin rlabs la// rang gi snying du bcug nas ni// ci ste 'dod na tshe 'di la// zhi ba dam pa mchog gyur/ 
391a8(rgyud): pa// sangs rgyas nyid 'thob des 'di sgrub// ci ste mi 'dod dngos grub bzhin// phyag rgya chen po bcings nas kyang // de nyid chen po tshig re rer// brjod nas kun dang ldan par yang // thams cad bdag ni/ 
391b1(rgyud): yin bsgoms na// ci ste 'dod na bdag nyid des// de bya gzi can dge ba yi// go 'phang tshe 'di nyid la 'thob// mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin// de nas dam tshig phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud
391b2(rgyud): bshad de// ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin 'grub pa// de ltar bdag ces bsgoms na ni// sangs rgyas dang ni gzi chen 'thob// mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud
391b3(rgyud): bshad// chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis// dag ces brjod na nges par yang // sangs rgyas dang ni gzi can 'gyur// mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin// de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i
391b4(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de// thams cad kyi ni kun dag par// da las rnams thams cad sbyangs na ni// sangs rgyas gzi can thob ci ste// mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin// de bzhin gsheg/ 
391b5(rgyud): pa'i rigs dam pa'i dngos grub rnam so// de nas phyag na rdo rjes ra nga gi rig pa dam pa'i dngos grub kun gyi rgyud 'di gsungaso// dngos grub kun sbyor sangs rgyas kyi// bkas ni sems can kun
391b6(rgyud): don tu// phyag rgya chen por bsgrubs na ni// tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas 'grub// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad// phyag rgya chen po'i tshul du ni// ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin grub pa/ 
391b7(rgyud): de bzhin bdag ces bsgoms na ni// skad cig gis ni gzi chen thob// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de// yi ge med pa'i chos rnams la// rab tu spros pa yod min te/ 
391b8(rgyud): chos mchog 'di ni brjod byed cing // bsgoms na gzi can nyid du 'gyur// de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyung zhing / dge ba'am yang na mi dge ba'i// gang gis las rnams byas pa ni// 
392a1(rgyud): rgyal ba rnams la phul byas na// skad cig gis ni gzi can 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje pad+mo'i rigs dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsum
392a2(rgyud): so// de la dang por ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad// 'dod chags ngo bo nyid kyis dag/ mu stegs can gyi smad gyur la// de la chags pa'i chos 'di ni// theg pa che la 'grub par 'gyur/ 
392a3(rgyud): de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub ni 'di yin te// ting 'dzin brtan pa'i tshul gyis ni// byams pa chen po bsgoms nas kyang // cho ga bzhin ldan khyab byas nas// skad cig gcig gis
392a4(rgyud): gzi can 'thob// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub/  kyi rgyud bshad de/ 'dod chags ngo bo nyid dag ces// smra ba ra gyur pa'i tshul 'di ni// 'dod chags pha rol phyin rnyed de/ 
392a5(rgyud): skad cig gis ni gzi can 'thob// de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam/ pa'i dngos grub kyi brgyud bshad de/ bdag gi lha dang reg pa dang // mnyan pa dang ni dran pa'ang rung // sems can rnams ni
392a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi// sdug bsngal kun gyi mthar phyin 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes nor bu'i rigs kyi dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la phyag rgya chen
392a7(rgyud): po dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di yin te/ rdo rje snying po ji bzhin du// sangs rgyas kun dbang bdag gyur ces// bsgom par bya ba rnams bsgoms nas// skad cig gis ni gzi can 'thob// de nas dam tshig gi
392a8(rgyud): phyag rgyad dam pa'i ngom grub kyi rgyud bshad de// na mkha'i snying po 'dra bar ni// sems can kun gyi re ba kun// yongasu rdzogs par byed gyur cig/ skad cig gis ni gzi can 'thob// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos
392b1(rgyud): grub kyi rgyud bshad de// bdag nyid las ni phyung nas kyang // nor byin rab tu dga' byed cing // chos byung phyag rgya sman ni// gzi can tshe 'di nyid la 'thob// de nas las kyi phyag rgya'i dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ 
392b2(rgyud): dbul po rnams la phan pa'i phyir// nor sgrub pa la brtson ldan na// gzi can 'gyur ci ste yang // mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin// rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya rnams kyi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
392b3(rgyud): dpa' dam pa rnams kyi dngos grub thob pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di
392b4(rgyud): gsungaso// de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di yin te// gang gis 'dod la snyoms zhugs pa/ de la 'dod pas sbyong bar byed// sangs rgyas phyag rgya chen po yi/ 
392b5(rgyud): ye shes dam tshig yin par bshad// de nas de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa rnams kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ 'dod pa rnams la chags bral min// dam tshig mdzes pa chen po
392b6(rgyud): 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dag pa// rgyal bas kyang ni mda' mi mdzad// de nas rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/ sems can don du khro min yang // khro ba chen por rab tu
392b7(rgyud): ston// rdo rje'i rigs ni chen po yi// dam tshig 'di ni 'da' dka'o// de la pad+mo'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/ rang bzhin dag par shes nas kyang // de yi dgos pa de byed de// pad+mo'i
392b8(rgyud): rigs ni chen po yi// dam tshig 'dara' bar dka' ba'o// de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// nyung ngam yang na mang yang rung // ci tsam nus pa nyid du ni// sbyin pas nyi ma stongs
393a1(rgyud): par ni// bya mi nadam tshig 'di yin no// rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud // de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa tham
393a2(rgyud): cad kyi rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yi no// sangs rgyas chos zhes grag so nas// brjod na
393a3(rgyud): chos nyid yi ge ni// sangs rgyas chos kyi phyag rgya che// ye shes mchog gi tshul yino// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// 'dod chags las ni dag pa'i chos/ 
393a4(rgyud): bde ba thams cad rab sbyin byed// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigadas kyi ni// dngos grub byed pa'i mchog 'di'o// de la rdo rje ri rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// sangs rgyas bka' ni
393a5(rgyud): sbyang ba dang // sems can drang bar bya ba'i phyir// de la khro bar ma gyur yang // ma rungs bdud byas dngos grub 'thob// de la pad+mo rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// 
393a6(rgyud): pad+mo chu yis ma chags pa// de bzhin 'dod pas mi chags zhes// smra zhing dgos min byed kyang ni// sdig pas gos par mi 'gyuraro// de la nor bu rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// sbyin dang / 
393a7(rgyud): mnyam pa'i chos med do// sgrub par byed cing smra ba ni// nor bu'i rigs ni chen po'i chos// mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhi no// rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas
393a8(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungaso// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di
393b1(rgyud): yin te/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' nyid rnamasu// ji bzhin du ni btul nas su// las kyi phyag rgya'i mchog 'grub sbyin// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs/ 
393b2(rgyud): kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yi no// dus bzhi yi ni tshul dag tu// mchod pa rnam pa bzhi yis ni// rtag tu ldan pa rnam bzhir yang // byas nas las rnams bsgrub par bya// de la rdo rje rigs kyi las kyi/ 
393b3(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yino// ma rungs sems can gnod bya'i phyir// dgos pa gang dang gang byed de// las kyi rdo rje rigs kyis 'di// dngos grub thams cad rab sbyin byed// de la pad+mo rigs kyi las kyi/ 
393b4(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yino// 'jigs pas gzir la mi 'ji gras sbyin// ji bzhin par ni 'dul de bzhin// 'di ni pad+mo rig sa kyi las// sangs rgyas dngos grub sbyin pa'o// de la nor bu
393b5(rgyud): rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yino// sangs rgyas dbang bskur de bzhin du// lus can rnams la sbyin pa dang // re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'i// las kyi don du bsgrubs pa'o// 
393b6(rgyud): rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi
393b7(rgyud): rgyud 'di gsung so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yi no// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid dgongs// 'di ni
393b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas sangs rgyas nyid// gzhan las sangs rgyas 'gyur ba med// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud yin te/ phyag rgya chen por bsgoms na
394a1(rgyud): nisadangos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs rigs kyi// chos nyid dngos grub dam pa 'thob// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub
394a2(rgyud): kyi rgyud do// phyag rgya chen po'i tshul gyis ni// dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang // las rnams thams cad bsgrubs na ni// rdo rje dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi chos nyid kyi ye
394a3(rgyud): shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ chos kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyi ni// chos kyi phyag rgya brjod byed cing // rdo rje chos ni chos rnams kyi// chos nyid du ni 'dis bsgrubs pa'o// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos nyi
394a4(rgyud): ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// las kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis ni// / las kyi rdo rje snying kar bzhag/ chos nyid 'di dag bsgoms na da ni// las kyi chos nyid 'thob par 'gyur// rigs thams cad kyi/ 
394a5(rgyud): chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyudo// de nas byang chub sems dpa / 'a sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rigs kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dngos
394a6(rgyud): grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud yin te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// zla ba'i rdo rje tshul gyis ni// ji ltar de gnyis kha dog shes// de
394a7(rgyud): ltar 'jig rten kun shes te// dag la dag dang dkar 'od gsal// chags la dmar dang dmar ser khro// shes nas kha dog ji bzhin pa'i// de yi bdag nyid nyid du 'gyur// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
394a8(rgyud): rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od bcas pa'i// phyag rgya chen po bcings nas ni// rang gi lus la ji ltar shes// de ltar 'gro ba'i yid sheso// de la 'dini rdo rje'i rigs kyis shes kyi
394b1(rgyud): grub kyi rgyud de/ nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// khros par gyur nas dkyil 'khor ni// ji lta bur yang mthong 'gyur ba// de lta bur ni yid sheso// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ nam
394b2(rgyud): mkha' 'am sa phyogs phra mo 'am/ yi ge phreng ba ma thob 'gyur na// mdor na kha dog ci 'dra bar// shes pa de 'drar der sems shes// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'jig rten
394b3(rgyud): kun la bltas nas kyang // ji lta bur ni snang 'gyur cing // mthong bar gyur na de 'dra bar// 'gro ba'i sems ni shes par bya// de gnyis snyoms par zhugs nas ni// 'gro ba dang ni 'ong ba dang // byed pa dang ni
394b4(rgyud): 'chag pa'ang rung // ji ltar mthong ba de ltar rtogs// snyoms par zhugs nas bsams na ni// sems can gang dang gang yin pa'i// de dang de ni de bzhin du// sems can thams cad rtogs par 'gyur
394b5(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungaso// rigs tham/ sa cad kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyu de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa
394b6(rgyud): thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud 'di gsung so// sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs tshul gyis// sangs rgyas gzugasu bdag bsgoms na// ye shes kyi ni tshul de yis// sangs rgyas dngos
394b7(rgyud): grub thob par 'gyur// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud de/ nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// dkyil 'khor 'di ni ser skya mthong // sems dpa' nyid ni
394b8(rgyud): phyag rgya nyid// mngon sum du ni mthong 'gyur na'o// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud // de ltar bu yi dbyibs gyur pa'i// dbus na sngo sangs snang na ni// rdo rje rigs mchog
395a1(rgyud): dngos grub 'thog/ de la 'di ni pad+mo rigs kyi dngos grub ye shes yin te/ dag la ni mkha' 'dra ba'i// pad+mo sngon po rigs grub pa'i// dngos grubaden legs par 'gyur// de la nga/ 
395a2(rgyud): ni nor bu rigs kyi ye shes dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ namakha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// de nyid mkha' bzhin dri med las// 'od zer dkyil 'khor 'gro bar ni// mthong na dngos grub myur du 'thob// rdo rje sems
395a3(rgyud): sogs sems pa'i rnams// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od bcas par// dngos grub dus su rang bzhin du// bdag nyid kyi mdun mthong na'o// rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// 
395a4(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de ba bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi mngon par shes dpa'i dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud 'di gsungaso// de la
395a5(rgyud): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud de// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gan sa// lus kun de bzhin gshegs rnams dang // byang chub sems
395a6(rgyud): dpa' rnams bsgoms la// de bzhin lus las byung mthong na'o// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs mngon par shes pa rnams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya che// rab mnyam gzhag
395a7(rgyud): pas bcings na ni// sgrub pas cho ga 'di yis ni// mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur// de la 'di ni 'phrul gyi spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub yin// phyag rgya chen por zhugs nas ni// mig gi rnams shes bskyed
395a8(rgyud): nas kyang // gang yang rung ba des bsams na// shin tu ring ba'ang mthong 'gyur zhes// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// phyag rgya chen por zhugs nas ni// rna ba'i rnam shes bskyed nas kyang // des
395b1(rgyud): ni dgos pa gang bsams kyang // shin tu ring na gnas thos nas// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// phyag rgya chen por zhugs nas ni// yid kyi rnam shes bskyed nas kyang // sems can gang la ngas bdags
395b2(rgyud): na// de yi sems ni des shes 'gyur// phyag rgya chen por zhugs nas ni// bdag gam sems can gang yang rung // yid kyis bltas nas gar skyes pa// gzugs ni de yis shes par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das
395b3(rgyud): phyag na rdo rjes gsungaso// de nas rdzu 'phrul gyi cho ga shes pa'i dngos grub ni 'di yin no// phyag rgya chen po bcings nas kyang // rdzu 'phrul gang dang gang 'dod pa// de nas gang yang rung bar ni// ting 'dzin gyis ni 'thob
395b4(rgyud): par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems chen pos ga/ dasung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i da dngos grub kyi rgyud do// khams gsum rnam rgyal mchog tu ni/ 
395b5(rgyud): rab mnyam gzhag pas bcings nas kyang // cho ga 'dis ni sgrub pa pos// mngon par shes pa lnga 'thob bo// khros nas dge sa pa thams cad ni// lta 'og rim pa ji bzhin bya// rdzu 'phrul
395b6(rgyud): mig la sogs tshul gyis// mngon shes kun bdag nyid du 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i
395b7(rgyud): phyag rgya'i mchog/ rab mnyam gzhag pas bcings na ni// cho ga 'dis ni sgrub pa pos// mngon par shes pa lnga 'thob bo// lta 'og go rims ji bzhin du// cho ga bzhin du 'dod pas chags// 'phrul gyi mig la
395b8(rgyud): sogs tshul gyis// mngon shes thams cad thob 'gyur zhes// bcom ldan 'jig rten dbang pos gsungs// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// don kun grub pa'i phyag rgya
396a1(rgyud): ni/ rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings na ni// cho ga 'dis ni sgrub pa pos// mngon par shes pa lnga 'thob bo// lha 'og rim pa ji bzhin du// 'phrul gyi mig la sogs tshul gyis// sangs rgyas
396a2(rgyud): rnams la mchod byas la// mngon shes lnga ni des 'thob bo// zhes bcom ldan 'das na mkha'i snying pos gsungaso// rigs thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas bcom ldan
396a3(rgyud): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bden pa'i dngos
396a4(rgyud): grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// bden pa'i rje su 'jug pa yis/ tshig gis mna' ni 'dor byed cing // bden pa chen po bsrung das na ni// myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'thob bo zhes sangs rgyas bcom
396a5(rgyud): ldan 'das rnams kyis gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa'i rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de bzhin ga/ shegs pa'i rigs 'byung ba'i// dam tshig la ni mna' bor la// 
396a6(rgyud): rdo rje'i bden pa bsrungs na ni// dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// ci ste dngos grub mchog 'dod
396a7(rgyud): na/ shin tu 'di las 'da' bar dka'// rdo rje 'dzin la mna' dor cing // bden pa 'di la bsrung bar bya zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsung so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi bden pa'i
396a8(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud do// ci ste dngos grub mchog 'dod na// pad+mo chen po rigs mchog gi/ pad+mo'i chos la mna' 'dor zhing // bden pa'i dam tshig bsrung bar bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs
396b1(rgyud): so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'di las shin tu 'da' dka' bar// sangs rgyas chos mna' mdor zhing // bden pa mchog 'di gsungs na ni// dbang bskur ba ni 'thob par
396b2(rgyud): 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas mchod pas gsung so// rigs thams cad kyi mna'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin
396b3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// sa ma ya s+t+waM// 
396b4(rgyud): zhes brjod nas/ de yi 'og tu ma bsgrubs pas// rigs kun dgyi ni phyag rgya rnams// nyid kyis bcings nas dam par 'gyuradar zhes bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po de kho na nyid kyis gsung
396b5(rgyud): so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// su ra ta s+t+waM zhes brjod na/ de nyid bskul ba'i bdag nyid che// ma bsgrubs par yang phyag rgya
396b6(rgyud): kun nyid kyis bcings na 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid kyis gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// hUM zhes bya ba gcig tsam
396b7(rgyud): gyis// mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni// bdag gam yang na gzhan yang rung // nyid bcings 'ching du bcug kyang rung // de la 'di ni pad+ma rigs kyi dam tshig gi kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sarba shud+d+ha ne/ 
396b8(rgyud): brjod na// bdag gam yang na gzhan dag gis// bud med chags la sogs ldan na// thams cad du ni grol mi 'gyur// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// oM nas
397a1(rgyud): bya bas mdor bsdun// phyag rgya thams cad 'grub 'gyur te// 'jig rten kun gyi mchog nyid kyi// rang 'byung nyid la mchod par 'gyur// rigs thams cad kyi dam
397a2(rgyud): tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud 'di
397a3(rgyud): gsungaso// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dran byed cing // sangs rgyas phyag rgya bcings nas ni// sangs rgyas byang chub brtan par
397a4(rgyud): yang bsgrubs na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// de la 'di ni de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che// bcings nas de yi mdun du
397a5(rgyud): yang // rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms na ni// shin tu myur ba ra dngos grub 'gyur// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// 
397a6(rgyud): dam tshig gi ni mchog bcings na// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms na ni// nyid rim du ni dngos grub 'gyur// de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis// 
397a7(rgyud): chos kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang // 'jig rten mgon po bsgoms na ni// nyi rim du ni dngos grub thob// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis// las
397a8(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni// rdo rje snying po bsgoms na ni// nyi rim du ni dngos grub thob// rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
397b1(rgyud): chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i
397b2(rgyud): rgyud do// phyag rgya thams cad bcings nas ni// bdag nyid dang ni mdun du yang // sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa sgom// de nas de ma thag tu 'grub ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung so// de la 'di
397b3(rgyud): ning bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud do// rdo rje bzlas pa'i tshul gyis ni// 'dod pa bdag ces bsgoms nas kyang // phyag rgya thams cad bsgrubs nas/ 
397b4(rgyud): ni/ grub pa'i mchog ni kun bsgrubs pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'a/ dngas rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso// de la 'di ni rdo rje rig ngas kyi dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyudo// bdag nyid nyid
397b5(rgyud): kyis rdo rje dbyibs// rab mnyam gzhag pas sgom byed cing / phyag rgya thams cad bcings na ni// de ma thag tu 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
397b6(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdo rjes gsung so// de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// ye shes kun 'byung dngos grub kyi// pad+mo chen po'i rigs la gnas// bdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid nyid
397b7(rgyud): pad+ma'i dbyibasu bsgom par bya zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungaso// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi dngos grub thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i rgyud ngo // nor bu rin chen 'o/ 
397b8(rgyud): ber 'bar// bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgoms na ni// nor bu chen po'i rigs mchod pa// kun las 'byung ba'i dngos grub 'thob ces bcom ldan 'das namakha'i snying pos gsungs// rigs thams cad
398a1(rgyud): kyi dngos grub dam pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi
398a2(rgyud): phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje dbyings dbang phyag rgya ni// rab mnyam gzhag pas bcings nas kyang / 
398a3(rgyud): snying ka mdzod spu mgrin spyi bor// bzhag nas sangs rgyas byin rlob po zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungaso// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi rgyud yin no// rdo
398a4(rgyud): rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// sems dpa' rdo rje dam byas dal// snying ka mdzod spu mgrin pa dang // spyi bor bzhag na byin gyis rlob ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// 
398a5(rgyud): de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi byin gyis brlab pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyu da do// rdo rje hUM gi phyag rgya ni// rab mnyam gzhag pa/ sa bcings nas kyang // snying ka mdzod bu mgrin spyi bor/ 
398a6(rgyud): bzhag na nyid du byin gyis rlobs ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gtso bos gsung so// de la 'di ni pad+ma rigs kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ 
398a7(rgyud): rdo rje pad+mo ma byas la// snying ka mdzod pu mgrin spyi bor// byin gyis brlab phyir bzhag par bya zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs
398a8(rgyud): kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi rgyud do// rdo rje snying po ting 'dzin gyis// rdo nor bu che bcings la// stong ka mdzod bu mgrin spyi bor// byin gyis brlab phyir bzhag par bya zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos
398b1(rgyud): gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya
398b2(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rin chen rdo rje bcings nas ni// dpral bar rab tu bzhag byas na// rgyal ba rdo rje rin
398b3(rgyud): chen gyis// dbang bskur bar ni de 'gyu ro zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungaso// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje dbyings/ 
398b4(rgyud): dbang la sogs pa// sangs rgyas phyag rgya mdun nas ni// ba rtsam pa byas nas ngos gzhir yang // phreng ba nyid kyis dang rang bskur 'gyur// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i
398b5(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje dbang gi phreng ba ni// bcings nas dpral bar bzhag na yang // phreng ba'i dbang ni de yin no// rdo rje rnams ni de dbang 'gyur// de la 'di ni pad+mo rigs kyi dbang
398b6(rgyud): bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// chos kyi rdo rje bcings nas kyang // mgo bor bzhag te dbang bskur// sangs rgyas kyis ni 'jig rten gyi// dbang phyug gi ni dbang bsku ro zhes bcom ldan 'das
398b7(rgyud): kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungaso// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i rgyud de/ rdo rje rin chen myu gu bcings// dpral bar bzhag ste des dbang bskur// sangs rgyas
398b8(rgyud): kyis ni mchod pa yi// dbang phyug tu ni dbang bskur 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das na mkha'i snying pos gsungaso// rigs thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de nas byang chub
399a1(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams
399a2(rgyud): cad kyi ting 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rgyal ba kun gyi rnam par ni// phyag rgya mnyam par gzhag par bcings// zlos shis sngags kyi rig pa ni// myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes sangs
399a3(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sems dpa'i byin rlabs tshul gyis ni// ting 'dzin rdo rje chos kyis kyang / 
399a4(rgyud): snying po phyag rgya sngags rigs rnams// zlos pas myur du 'gru/ dab par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi ting 'ji dan gyis gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyi dngos/ 
399a5(rgyud): grub kyis rgyud do// 'dod chags las ni khyod phyung ste// bdag ni khro bo yin bsgoms nas// snying po phyag rgya sngags rigs rnams// myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan
399a6(rgyud): 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsung so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi tinge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'jig rten dbang po'i rig zlos pas// byams pas 'gengs pa'i tshul gyis ni// snying po la sogs
399a7(rgyud): bsgrubs na yang // dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang pos gsungaso// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// namakha' kun
399a8(rgyud): gyi ting 'dzin ni// rab mnyam gzhag par bsgoms na yang // snying po phyag rgya sngags rigs rnams// bsgrubs na kun tu 'gro bar 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das na mkha'i snying pos gsungaso// rigs tham/ 
399b1(rgyud): cad kyi ting 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud
399b2(rgyud): 'di gsungaso// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rab mnyam gzhag pas dang por ni// bdug pa la sogs mchod byas la// de nas dngos grub 'dod pa
399b3(rgyud): yis// bsgrubs na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungaso// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams
399b4(rgyud): bzhi yis// gsang ba'i mchod pa brjod byed cing // bdag dbul ba la sogs pa yi// mchod pa byas na 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// 
399b5(rgyud): de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// khro bo rdo rje mchod chen po// khro bo gsang ba brjod byed cing / khro de'i khu tshur rab sbyar na// myur du bdag gis rigs 'grub
399b6(rgyud): bo zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsung so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// mdo sde zab cing rgya che ba'i// tshul rnams legs par brjod nas kyang // yid dang
399b7(rgyud): ngag gis phul nas ni// dngos grub myur tu 'thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 
399b8(rgyud): gdugs dang 'phan dang rgyal mtshan gyis// rgyal po'i mchod pas mchod byed cing // sbyin pa thams cad byin na ni// nor bu'i rigs ni thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungaso// 
400a1(rgyud): nyid la byin gyis brlabs sogs ldan// rdo rje sems dang 'dra bar 'gyur// cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi yis ni// rdo rje sna tshogs ting 'dzin gyi// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par
400a2(rgyud): 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// rigs thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / ting 'dzin dang / mchod pa rnams kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang
400a3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par
400a4(rgyud): shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud yin no// lus la sangs rgyas ting 'dzin no// 'di ni bde gshegs nyid mngon shes// / de ni rab tu rtogs nas ni// sangs rgyas pa yi dngos grub
400a5(rgyud): 'thob// ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mngon par she sa pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'phrul gyi mig sogs
400a6(rgyud): mngon shes ni// rab mnyam gzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang // mngon shes lnga ni dag gyur na// dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso// de la 'di ni rdo
400a7(rgyud): rje rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// khro bo mngon shes bskyed nas ni// rab mnyam gzhag pas bsgoms na yang // mngon shes lnga ni bdag gyur nas// dngos grub mchog
400a8(rgyud): ni thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsung so// de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'dod chags mngon shes bskyed nas kyang // rab
400b1(rgyud): mnyam gzhag pas bsgoms na ni// mngon shes lnga ni bdag gyur nas// dag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje spyan gyi gsungaso// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i
400b2(rgyud): ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// mchod pa'i mngon shes bskyed nas kyang // rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms na ni// mngon shes lnga yang bdag gyur nas// dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu gyur zhes bcom
400b3(rgyud): ldan rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs
400b4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi byang chub kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungaso// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byang chub kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i
400b5(rgyud): ting 'dzin gnas// bdag gis sangs rgyas dran byed cing // sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes 'di// bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis
400b6(rgyud): gsungaso// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// phyag rgya chen por sgoms byed cing // byang chub chen po'i/ 
400b7(rgyud): ye shes 'di// bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen pos gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// khro
400b8(rgyud): bo'i rgyal po'i ting 'dzin gnas// lag pas dam tshig mchog bcings la// byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di// bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs// 
401a1(rgyud): de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'jig rten dbang phyug ting 'dzin gnas// de bzhin chos kyi phyag rgyas bzlas// byang chub chen po
401a2(rgyud): ye shes 'di// bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsung so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi
401a3(rgyud): rgyud do// rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gnas// las kyi phyag rgya las legs byed// byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di// bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das na mkha'i snying
401a4(rgyud): pos gsungaso// rigs thams cad kyi byang chub chen po'i ye she sa kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub se/ mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa
401a5(rgyud): thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mnyes par/ bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// nyid kyi sangs rgyas byang chub phyir/ 
401a6(rgyud): sems can don rnams rab 'byed cing // sangs rgyas rjes dran gyur nas nas// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chags pas gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
401a7(rgyud): rigs kyi mnyes par bya ba gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// ji ltar yul dang ldan gyur nas// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed ces// rdo rje sems dpa' sgoms byed cing // de nyid bskur na myur bar ni// mnyes par/ 
401a8(rgyud): 'gyur ba des 'grub bo zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi mnyes par byed pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sangs rgyas bka' ni srung ba dang // sems can don ni sbyang ba'i phyir/ 
401b1(rgyud): rngam pas mngon spyod byas na ni// rdo rje rnams ni mnyes par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas gsung so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud // 
401b2(rgyud): chags pas kun tu lta ba dang // byams dang snying rjes chos smra dang // mi 'jigs kun sbyin byed pa rnams// sangs rgyas kun gyis mnyes par byed ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje spyan gyis gsung so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i
401b3(rgyud): rigs mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// dbang bskur ba ni rab sbyin dang // nor bsags rab tu sbyin byed cing // de yang sangs rgyas don du sbyor// 'di ni sangs rgyas mnyes par byed ces bcom ldan 'das
401b4(rgyud): 'phags pa na mkha'i snying pos gsung so// rigs thams cad ma nyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs
401b5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de ltar rnam dag bde sbyin
401b6(rgyud): pa// 'dod chags la ni mnyes mi bya// sems can kun gyi don du brtson// 'di ni sangs rgyas dbang du byed ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dbang
401b7(rgyud): du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'dod sten bde ba'i bdag nyid kyis// su ra ta sto zhes smra zhing // rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrubs na ni// de nyid bskul na dbang du 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos
401b8(rgyud): gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sangs rgyas bka' ni sems can rnams// ngag bya lus can skyabs sbyin dang // sangs rgyas bstan pa srung ba'i phyir// bsad na
402a1(rgyud): yang na dbang du 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas gsung so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// pad+mo 'dab mkha 'byed cing // 'dod chags dag
402a2(rgyud): la kun rtog la// gdul ba'i phyir ni chags byed cing // 'dod par byed pa dbang du 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsung so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub
402a3(rgyud): kyi rgyud do// sangs rgyas thams cad dbang bskur phyir// rdo rje rin chen nyin re rer// spyi bor bzhag te dbang bskur na// sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das na mkha'i snying pos
402a4(rgyud): gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos gya/ rab kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
402a5(rgyud): bsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyu do// sems can kun don ma mthong zhing // sangs rgyas de nyid
402a6(rgyud): ma sbyangs la// yid dang ngag dang lus kyis ni// bsad na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi
402a7(rgyud): bsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// dngos grub thams cad ma thob la// rigs rnams kyang ni mi brtson zhing // rdo rje kun tu brtags nas ni// bsad na dngos grub myur du thob ces bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes/ 
402a8(rgyud): gsungaso// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi bsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// ma rungs mi brtul khro med cing // de bzhin sems can mi 'dul la// bdag nyid sdug bsngal 'thob byed na// hUM zhes bya bas bsad
402b1(rgyud): par bya zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsung so// de la 'di ni pad+mo rigs kyi bsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// snying rje med cing byams med la// sems can ma rungs mi sbyong zhing // bdag nyid kyi/ 
402b2(rgyud): ni bslus na yang // bsad na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsung so// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi bsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 
402b3(rgyud): mi gtong bdag la nor med cing // nor stor ba dang gnod byed la// dbul por gyur la sems can rnams// bsad na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das re ba thams cad yongasu skong bas gsung so// 
402b4(rgyud): kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas kyi// rnal 'byor ma thob gsod bcug na// de dag drang bar bya ba'i phyir// bdag gi dngos grub sbyin par bya zhes bcom ldan 'ad phags pa kun tu bzang pos gsung so// rigs thams
402b5(rgyud): cad kyi bsad pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas bya/ nga chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa thams cad kyi srung ba'i phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di
402b6(rgyud): gsungaso// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i srung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sems can thams cad mi gtong zhing // rtag tu sangs rgyas mchod bdag nyid// rtag par sangs rgyas yid la byed// 'di ni srung
402b7(rgyud): barmad kyi mchog ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi srung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan tsam zhig/ lan gcig tsam yang
402b8(rgyud): brjod gyur na// 'di ni srung ba brtag chen po// skad cig dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi srung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rigs dang rgya
403a1(rgyud): kyis chogs shes// 'jig rten gsum rgyal bdag nyid kyi// rdorje thul mos byed ga/ 'di na bdag dang gzhan la srung nas bcom ldan 'das rdo hU~M zhes bya bas gsung so// des dzang
403a2(rgyud): ni bad+mo'i rigs kyi srung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'dod chags dag cing byams pa che// thams cad la ni mi 'jigs sbyin// 'jig rten dbang gis mtshan bzlos pa// srung ba 'di ni rmad du che zhes bcom ldan
403a3(rgyud): 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsung so// de la 'do ni nor bu rigs kyi srung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud// sangs rgyas sems can gtong byed par// mi nus par ni sbyor byed cing // nyi ma stongs par mi bya bar// srung ba 'di/ 
403a4(rgyud): nirmad kyi mchog ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje srung bas gsungs// rigs thams cad kyi srung ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes
403a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'ad/ sa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi rgyud 'di ba zhes par gsol// gang gis sems can thams cad brtag pa
403a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi dbang phyug tu gyur nas rtogs par bgyi ste// myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i slad du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
403a7(rgyud): chen po phyag na rdo rje la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ phyag na rdo rje legs par bshad pas nged kyis blangs shing byin gyis brlabs kyis leg so leg so// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus
403a8(rgyud): nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i// mdo sde 'di ni legs bshad pa/ 
403b1(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' khyod leg so// rdo rje rin chen khyod leg so// rdo rje chos ni khyod leg so// rdo rje las ni khyod leg so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las rtag pa thams cad kyi thabs
403b2(rgyud): kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rdzog so// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin
403b3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sangs rgyas byang chub ting 'dzin// rab mnyam gzhag pas bsgoms na ni// byang chub bde bas thob par 'gyur// bsams
403b4(rgyud): nas de ni rtogs par bya zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg/ sa pas thams cad kyis gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin ga/ shegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dam pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi
403b5(rgyud): rgyud do// sems dpa' rdo rje snying kar bcings// nga yi chung ma khya da sdug pa// brtan par gyur cig ces smras nas// phyag rgya thams cad bsgrubs bya ste// cho ga 'di yi tshul gyis ni// rang
403b6(rgyud): gis las rnams ma grub kyang // gsang ba'i chung ma zhes smras na// shin tu dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' rdo rjes gsungaso// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs dam pa'i gsang ba'i
403b7(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud do// ji lta ba bzhin bsgrubs na yang // dngos grub thob par ma gyur na// hUM gis phyag rgyas bsad na ni// skrag ste dngos grub sbyin par byed ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
403b8(rgyud): thams cad kyis hUM zhes bya bas gsung so// de bzhin 'di ni pad+mo rigs kyi dngos grub dam pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud do// ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas kyang // rdo rje blta bas bltas nas kyang // bdag gis
404a1(rgyud): chung ma'am gzhan chung ma// sdug pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mo do pas gsung so// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs dam pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud // 
404a2(rgyud): dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la// bde ba'i mchog ces smra byed cing // sangs rgyas kun la nyid dbang po// phul na myur du dngos grub 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das nor bu bzhes pas gsung so// rigs dam pa thams
404a3(rgyud): cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la
404a4(rgyud): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub pa/ sang ba'i rgyud do// sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod cing // bud med ku/ na la chags byas la// sems can don gyis mi skyon// nges par/ 
404a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas des mnye so zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// 'dod chags la ni/ 
404a6(rgyud): brnyas mi bya// bud med kun dang rtse byed pa// rdo rje rnams kyi gsang dam tshig/ 'di ni bsrungs na 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi gsungaso// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi
404a7(rgyud): dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// gsod pa 'jig rten thams cad gsod// lus dang ngag la dam dgyes pa// 'jig rten rnam par sbyangs nas ni// dam pa'i dngos grub sbyin pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'jig
404a8(rgyud): rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas gsung so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// dag pa'i bdag nyid 'dod chags dag/ mu stegs rnal 'byor ma dag la// dag pa'i
404b1(rgyud): bdag nyid dam tshig ni// bsrungs na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsung so// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi dam tshigi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// 
404b2(rgyud): rdo rje snying po ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje nor bu sngar bcings la// ma rungs rnams kyi nor phrogs na// dam tshig dngos grub sbyin par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin po ches gsung so// rigs thams cad kyi
404b3(rgyud): dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin
404b4(rgyud): gshegs pa'i chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// chos rnams rang bzhin dag par ni// rab mnyam gzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang // dgos pa thams cad byas nas kyang // sangs rgyas pa yi
404b5(rgyud): dngos grub 'thob ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings kyis gsungs// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngo // sa grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// sems can kun la chags byed cing // 
404b6(rgyud): yul la skyo bar ma gyur la// bud med dga' ba'i dag pa ni// gsang chos dngos grub rab sbyin// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsang bas gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// 
404b7(rgyud): rna ba'i rnal 'byor hUM zhes pa// phra ba'i rdo rje ting 'dzin gnas// mi 'grungs rnal 'byor 'di bsad ces// rab tu 'bar ba'i rdo rjes dgyel// dam pa'i dngos grub sbyin pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das
404b8(rgyud): dam tshig dam pas gsung so// de la 'di ni pad+mo rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// rdo rje chos kyi ting 'dzin gyis// bud med kun dang rtse byed cing // chos kyi dngos
405a1(rgyud): grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsung so// de la 'di na nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam
405a2(rgyud): sbyar la// re ba thams cad yongs bsgyangs nas// bud med dam ni sdug pa yi// dngos grub bla med thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin po ches gsung so// rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dngos grub
405a3(rgyud): gsang ba'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi dngos
405a4(rgyud): grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// sad sa rgyas rjesu dran bsgoms la// bud med lus kyi bu gar b+hu dgas// bud med rnams ni dbang du 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam
405a5(rgyud): par snang mdzad kyis gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// bu ga nas ni de bzhin zhugs/ 
405a6(rgyud): bud med lus su legs khyab byas// sems med pa yang mgu bar 'gyur zhes bcom ldan rdo rje dgyes pas gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// rdo rje hUM gi phyag rgya ni/ 
405a7(rgyud): rab mnyam gzhag pas bcings nas kyang // khros nas bu gar zhugs na ni// yid kyis de ni dbab par bya zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis gsungaso// de la 'di ni pad+mo rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub
405a8(rgyud): gsang ba'i rgyud do// chos kyi las kyi phyag rgya ni// bcings nas pad+ma'i ting 'dzin gyis// bu gar bcug na bud med rnams// thams cad kyang ni bsrungs par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje pad+mos
405b1(rgyud): gsung so// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi rdo rje nor bur bcings// bu gar bcug na bud med rnams// nyid du phab nas gar
405b2(rgyud): byed 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin po ches gsungaso// rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin
405b3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dag pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo dag pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ chos
405b4(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo 'dra bar ni// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bya zhing // phyag rgya bud med rnams kyi bskor// der ni sangs rgyas bzhag par bya// gsang ba dar ni zhugs nas kyang // sangs
405b5(rgyud): rgyas la ni nyid du smra// b.rar+ya he ta baSh+Ta sa pa bi bo data swa mA ma sarba/ rigs rnams kun gyi phyag rgya ni// tshul rnams la yang de skad brjod// sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyam med pa'i// gsang
405b6(rgyud): ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ rdo rje
405b7(rgyud): dbyings dang 'dra bar ni// dkyil 'khor legs par bri bar bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnams ni// thams cad kyi ni mchog tshul te// dkyil 'khor du ni zhugs nas kyang // dngos grub 'ad
405b8(rgyud): pas myur bar ni// su ra ta sa ma ya sto ho// badz+ra satwa Ad+ya sid+d+hi mAM/ ces brjod snying po 'di bzlas te// bsgrubs na thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid bskul ba'i tshul gyis ni// mgu nas
406a1(rgyud): myur du 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud // khams
406a2(rgyud): gsum rnam rgyal 'dra bar ni// rdo rje rigs kun rnams kyi ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'jug par yang // mkhas pas legs par bri bar bya// der zhugs nas ni myur ba yang // dngos grub 'debs
406a3(rgyud): pab gsol byed cing // rA ga tra si saM b+ha ta/ 'dod chags las ni khyod gyur zhes smra na kun tu 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM gis gsung so// de la 'di ni pad+mo rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams
406a4(rgyud): cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de// pad+mo'i rigs ni thamasacad kyi// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i tshul du ni// mkhas pas nga dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// der zhugs nas ni brjod bya ba/ 
406a5(rgyud): rA ga d+harma ma hA pad+ma pra sid d+ha la ga ma bi bo// de skad smras nas dkyil 'khor ni// kun gyi des ni dngos grub bo// ces btso/ ma ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang pos gsungaso// de la 'di ni
406a6(rgyud): nor bu rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// nor bu chen po'i rigs rnams ni// don kun 'grub pa'i tshul du yang // dkyil 'khor legs par bris nas ni// 
406a7(rgyud): zhugs nas 'di skad smra bar bya// sarba pri ya sid+d+hi mAM/ rA ga shi sid+d+hi mAM/ sid+d+hi sid+d+hi ma hA satwa// de skad smras nas dkyil 'khor kun// zhugs nas mchod gsang bla med pa'i// dngos grub chen po
406a8(rgyud): thob par 'gyur// phyin chad dngos grub bdag nyid kyis// bsgrubs na dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur// gang tshe myur du mi 'grub na// de nyid bskul na 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas
406b1(rgyud): gsung so// rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
406b2(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya thams cad gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyu de/ ta thA ga ta ma hA de bi bya/ pri ya sarba su kha pra ta
406b3(rgyud): bden las byung ba'i tshig bden pas// bsgrubs kyang de ni ma grub na'o// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// lha 'og go rims ji bzhin du/ 
406b4(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po bcings nas ni// 'di ni de nyid gsang ba yi/  rdo rje tshul gyis 'di smos shig/ badz+ra satwa sa ma ya haM/ tA/ dme bar+ya ti tiSh+Tha/ sarba ka ya mA ma ri shwa ra dza// badz+ra gar+b+hes mutra
406b5(rgyud): k+Shi pa// rdo rje 'gying ba'i lha mo che// de nyid bskul bas chags 'a gyur pas// lus kun la ni brtan 'gyur nas// ji bzhin myur du dngos grub bo// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'gying ba'i
406b6(rgyud): bdag pos gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sid+d+ha sid+d+ha sa ma ye/ sa ma yo ha ta pri ya mAM// zhes bskul myur du chags gyur na// rab tu yang ni 'grub par
406b7(rgyud): 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis gsung so// de la 'di ni pad+mo rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// bud+d+ha bud+d+ha ma hA sa twa// bar+ya me a te pri ya// zhes ni bskul na myur ba
406b8(rgyud): yang / rje su chags nas 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsung so// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi las kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyung de/ sarbaka ma ma dbargyawa tha ma mi sid+d+haH
407a1(rgyud): badz+ri Ni// rdo rje can gyis bskul myur bar// rje su chags nas 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'as nam kha'i snying pos gas so// rig thams cad kyi phyag rgya rigs
407a2(rgyud): ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa
407a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ mu stegs can rnams phan gdags phyir// ri mo'i phyag rgya'i tshul du ni// sangs rgyas btsun mo rab sba bar// shes na rab tu 'grub par
407a4(rgyud): 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad da kyi dam tshig gis gsungaso// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs da pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sems
407a5(rgyud): can kun gyi yid la khyab// sems can kun la bde sbyin zhing // sem sa can kun gyi yab nyid ni// dam tshig mchog gi 'dod pa'i mchog ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
407a6(rgyud): kyis gsung so// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i mchog ste smad che ba// dad ldan shes nas dang byas nas// bsgrub dka' ba yang 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas
407a7(rgyud): gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ chags pa'i dag pa'i chags bral gyi// sems can don gyi yid phyung nas// mu stegs lta bar byas pa ste// lta ba ngan pa'i
407a8(rgyud): gcong ror ltung // theg pa che la dgod pa'i phyir// gsod pa'i tha tshogs mchog yin te// de ltar shes na 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs// de la 'di ni pad+mo rigs kyi dam tshig
407b1(rgyud): gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ mu stegs can rnams gzhom pa'i phyir// 'byung ba che las thams cad 'byung // mi gtsang zhes ni ci phyir brjod// nges par dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das
407b2(rgyud): rdo rje can gyis gsung so// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ bud med chags phyir rin chen rnams// rtag tu legs par bsags par bya// bud med bla med rin chen
407b3(rgyud): zhes// bsams nas de ni 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du mdzad pas gsung so// rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub
407b4(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshe/ gas pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi
407b5(rgyud): mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ bud med chags rnam sa yongs bskor la// kun nas rtses pa'i bde ba ni// sangs rgyas mchod phyir phul na yang // mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par
407b6(rgyud): 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungaso// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ rab dgas ngal te skyo ba na// rab dga' las byung
407b7(rgyud): bde ba de// phyag bzhis pos ni mchod pa'i phyir// phul na myur du grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ 
407b8(rgyud): hUM gis dam tshig bcings nas ni// skye bo bud med 'khyud nas ni// 'khyud par gyur pa'i bde ba de// phul na de ni 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM gis gsung so// de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi
408a1(rgyud): kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de// 'jig rten dbang por bdag bsgoms la// sdug pa'i gdong du bltas nas ni// bltas par gyur pa'i bde ba de// phul na de yi 'grub par
408a2(rgyud): 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mo spyan gyis gsungaso// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ las kyi phyag rgya bcings gyur la// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan nas kyang / 
408a3(rgyud): bud med 'khyud pa'i longs spyod ni// mchod phyir phul na 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin chen gyis gsungaso// rigs thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud
408a4(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gsheg/ das pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyu dad 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gas
408a5(rgyud): ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdzogs sangs rgyas su bdag bsgoms la// ci nas sus kyang mi tshor bar// gzha na gyi bud med rtse byed na// mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes
408a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungaso// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i rgyud de/ rdo rje 'jom byas nas kyang // rdo rje phreng ba 'ching byed cing // de nas rdo rje glu blangs
408a7(rgyud): la// rdo rje gar gyis mchod byas la// 'dod pa'i dga' bas dbang bskur mchog/ glu dang gar gyis bde ba las// bde ba gzhan gyis myong min te// de phyir gsang mchog 'di bla med// de la 'di ni rdo rje
408a8(rgyud): rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal sgom// cho ga ji bzhin tshul du yang // gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod na ni// mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes
408b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsang bas gsung so// de la 'di ni pad+mo rigs kyi mchod pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgyar gnas// gsang ba'i tshul ni ci bzhin par// las kyi phyag rgyas
408b2(rgyud): rab mchod na// mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzig skye dbang pos gsung so// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de
408b3(rgyud): don kun grub pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// gsang ba'i tshul ni ji bzhin par// las kyi phyag rgyas rab mchod na// mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungaso// rigs
408b4(rgyud): thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdorjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed pa'i gsang ba'i
408b5(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de kho na nyid bskyed pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ mdor na ting 'dzin ye shes las// sems can rnams la chags
408b6(rgyud): tshul gyis// sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub 'gyur na// myur du bla med thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi de kho na nyid chen
408b7(rgyud): po bskyed pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ sems can thog ma tha ma med// na mkha' 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid de// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// 'dod pa 'gro ba kun bdag po// sems can kun gyi
408b8(rgyud): sems gang ni// brtan phyir sems dpa' zhes bya'o// rdo rje mnyam par mnyam gzhag na// nges pa rdo rje nyid gyur pa// sems dpa'i byin rlabs tshul gyis ni// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// bcom
409a1(rgyud): ldan sems dpa' de nyid de// rdo rje bzhed pa de bzhin gshegs// nyin sems rab tu rtogs la sogs// sangs rgyas byang chub cho ga bzhin// de nyid bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs
409a2(rgyud): thams cad kyi ni rigasu 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i sems dpas gsung so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs nyid de// de nyid rdo rje'i rigs chen po// de nyid pad+mo'i rigs dag pa
409a3(rgyud): de nyid nor bu'i rigs kyi mchog ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los gsungaso// rigs thams cad bskyed pa'i gsang
409a4(rgyud): ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gsheg/ das pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya mngon par brjod pa'i dngos
409a5(rgyud): grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mtshan ma mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub gas nga ba'i rgyud de/ bcom ldan sems dpa' de nyid ni// rdo rje sems
409a6(rgyud): dpa' thugs la gnas// mnyam par gzhag las ting 'dzin te// sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu sgrub ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungaso// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi
409a7(rgyud): mtshan ma'i mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ rab tu rtogs phyir rdo rje ste// bzung ba'i tshul gyis lcags kyu yin// phra mo rtogs phyir mnga' yin la// mgu bar gyur phyir legs zhes
409a8(rgyud): byas spras pa'i phyir yang rin chen gsungs// gzi brjid tshul gyis nyi ma ste// rgyal mtshan lags par sgreng ba gsungs// 'dzum phyir bzhad par grags pa la// 'dod chags dag phyir pad+mo yin// 
409b1(rgyud): ral gris nyon mongs dgra gcod yin// dkyil 'khor tshul du 'khor lo ste// tshig gis brjod pas sgra zhes bya// rgya gram tshul du kun rdo rje// mi tshugs tshul gyis go cha yin// 'jigs byed tshul
409b2(rgyud): gyis mche ba ste// phyag rgya'i tshul gyis bsdams pa'o// ji ltar bcom ldan sems rtag pa// rdo rje sems dpa' kun 'gro ba// de bzhin rdo rje mtshan la sogs// bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur
409b3(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan mas gsung so// rigs thams cad kyi mtshan ma mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen
409b4(rgyud): po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya gci dra ba skye ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsung so// de la'adri ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i
409b5(rgyud): dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ rdo rje sems pa'i ting 'dzin gan/ sa// rdo rje skyil mo krung bcings la// lag gnyis rdo rjer bsdams pa las// myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'grub 'gyur zhes
409b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ ji ltar rgyal po nyid phyag rgya// rgyal po khrims
409b7(rgyud): la 'debs pa ltar// bdag nyid chen po skye bo rnams// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yi// gzugs brnyan gyi ni tshul du yang // nyid kyi phyag rgya btab pa ni// bdag nyid che ba'i phyag rgya cher// shes nas dngos// 
409b8(rgyud): grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya chen pos gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ ji ltar dam tshig dam pa ni// skye bo 'gas
410a1(rgyud): ni bcings gyur na// shin tu 'da' bar mi bya ba// de ltar de bzhin gshegs kun gyi// dam tshig phyag rgya bcings pa yis// rdo rje bcing ba'i mchog bcings na// ma shi bar du mi mnga' bar/ 
410a2(rgyud): shes nas dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis gsung so// de la 'di ni chos kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ mdor na rgyal bas
410a3(rgyud): rdo rje'i ngag/ 'da' bar bya ba ma yin te// 'di ni bcings par shes nas kyang // des ni chos kyi dngos grub 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje las kyi rigs kyi
410a4(rgyud): phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ pa/ rdo rje bka' dang las mang rnams// 'da' bar bya ba ma da yin zhing // bka' nyan pa yi las de ni// shes na myur du 'grub
410a5(rgyud): par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa gsang ba'i rgyud do// de nas bcom
410a6(rgyud): ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di yang bdag gis yongasu gzung zhing byin gyis brlabaso// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs
410a7(rgyud): pa thams cad gcig du 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po phyag na rdo rje la leg so zhes bya ba byin no// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa
410a8(rgyud): kun gyi gsang // theg pa chen po sngon 'dus pa'i// mdo 'di legs par bshad pas na// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legaso// rdo rje rin chen khyod leg so// rdo rje chos ni khyod leg so// rdo rje las ni khyod
410b1(rgyud): leg so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las rigs thams cad kyi brtag pa gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rdzog so// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
410b2(rgyud): dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungaso// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sangs
410b3(rgyud): rgyas rjesu dran tshul gyis// sangs rgyas chos kyi ting 'dzin ni// mnyam par gzhag pas bsgoms na yang // bla med dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs// 
410b4(rgyud): de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ chags pas rjesu dran tshul gyis/ sems dpa' thams cad ting 'dzin gnas// rab mnyam
410b5(rgyud): gzhag pas bsgoms na ni// dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting 'dzin gyis gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi chos
410b6(rgyud): dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ khams gsum rnam rgyal cha lugasu// bsgoms nas 'dun dang de bzhin te// phyag na rdo rje'i mthur gyur nas// khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur zhes bcom ldan
410b7(rgyud): 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i cho sa ni// bsgoms nas mdun du de bzhin te// rnam pa kun gyi mchog
410b8(rgyud): ldan par// 'dul bar de ni rab byed ces// bcom ldan rdo rje chos kyis gsungaso// de la 'od ni nor bu rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ don kun grub pa'i skur yang ni// bsgoms na
411a1(rgyud): mdun du de bzhin te// rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa yi// phun tshogs don ni nges 'thob bo zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nor bus gsungaso// rigs thams cad kyi chos dam
411a2(rgyud): dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin
411a3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran gyur la// rdo rje phra mo tshul gyis ni// badz+ra badz+ra zhes brjod na// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes
411a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung so// de la 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin du// rdo rje phra mo
411a5(rgyud): sgom byed cing // badz+ra satwa zhes brjod na// rdo rje sems dpa'/ nyid 'grubo zhes bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso// / de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 
411a6(rgyud): khams gsum rnam rgyal cha lugasu// dran byed mdun du de bzhin to// hUM hUM hUM hUM zhes brjod na/ dngos grub bla med thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM gis gsung so// de la 'di ni pad+mo rigs
411a7(rgyud): kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzugs kyis ni// rdo rje phra mo sgom byed cing // sid+d+h+ya sid+d+ha zhes brjod na// dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
411a8(rgyud): chos kyis gsung so// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ don kun grub pa'i gzugs kyis ni// rdo rje phra mo bsgoms nas kyang // sid+d+ha sid+d+ha zhes brjod na// don
411b1(rgyud): gyi dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das nor bu chos kyis gsungaso// rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
411b2(rgyud): phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungaso// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes
411b3(rgyud): kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ dam pa'i chos ni yi ge med// ting 'dzin ye shes 'byung ba ste// a zhes bya bas chos rnams ni// skye ba med par dgongs pa ste// phyag rgya 'di yi tshul gyis ni// 
411b4(rgyud): shes pas bsgoms te de nas kyang // yi ge kun gyi ye shes da ni// bde gshegs skad cig gis 'gyur zhes bcomad ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa
411b5(rgyud): thams cad kyis gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa'i rigs kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de bzhin gshegs kun de nyid kyi// mdo
411b6(rgyud): sde 'di ni dad pa yis// dad nas bcangs sam bklags gyur na// dngos grub bla med thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs
411b7(rgyud): kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sdig pa'i sems can phan don du// sdig can sdig spyod bzlog pa dang // sangs rgyas bka' ni srung ba'i phyir// bsad pa byas na/ 
411b8(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'dod chags rang bzhin dag par
412a1(rgyud): shes// dam pa'i don du dgongs nas kyang // thog ma tha mar 'di bsgoms na// chos kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi
412a2(rgyud): dbang pos gsungaso// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi chos mkhyen pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sems can don phyir sbyin byed cing // bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed cing // chos bsgoms 'di
412a3(rgyud): ni nor bu yi// rigs kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das chos rin chen gyis gsungaso// rigs thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas
412a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tingange 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di ga sung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting 'dzin
412a5(rgyud): gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sangs rgyas kyi ni ting 'dzin la/ sa// sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrubs pa// 'di ni sgom par byas nas kyang // dngos grub dam pa thob par
412a6(rgyud): 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings kyis gsungaso// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa' ting 'dzin gyis// bla
412a7(rgyud): med dang ni las mang rnams// sems dpa' kun 'gyur thams cad dang // shes na yang ni grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi ting
412a8(rgyud): 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sdig pa dag pa rgyu yi phyir// 'tshams med byed las mi zlogs na// gsod pa'i las la dad pa na// des ni 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
412b1(rgyud): sems dpas gsung so// de la 'di ni pad+mo rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sdig kun rnam par dag pa'i bdag/ kun dag pas na dgos pa kun// des byed las 'di yin
412b2(rgyud): pabapar// shes na yang ni grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mos gsungaso// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// srid ldan dbul po thams cad kyi// rtag tu/ 
412b3(rgyud): bsam pa kun bskang la// don kun grub pas kun bdag ni// grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// ces bcom ldan 'das rin po che rgyal mtshan gyis gsung so// rigs thams cad kyi ting 'dzin
412b4(rgyud): gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dang / da' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs rapa thams cad kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsu
412b5(rgyud): so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phra mo'i shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rtag tu rdo rje phra mo'i/ tshul// 'bad pa kun gyi sbyor na ni// rnam pa'i mchog kun
412b6(rgyud): ldan pa yi// mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ slo
