412b7(rgyud): dpon ma yin gzhan dang ni// slob ma yin bu min pa yi// mdun du phyag rgya mi brjod de// de dag gsang bas phyag rgya 'grub ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs
412b8(rgyud): kyi phra mo'i dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// sna nas cu byung ldan gyur la// rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis// dgos pa thams cad sgrub par byed ces bcom ldan 'das rdo
413a1(rgyud): gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ pad+mo chen po'i ting 'dzin gnas// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// rdo rje ltabs bltas
413a2(rgyud): na ni 'dod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mo bzhed pas gsung so// de la 'di ni rigs kyi phra mo'i rigs ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin
413a3(rgyud): gyis// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// shin tu phra ba'i lha 'bar bas// don ni thams cad 'dren par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nor bus gsungaso// rigs thams cad kyi phra mo'i dngos
413a4(rgyud): grub kyi rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / da' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams dad kyi mig gi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// 
413a5(rgyud): de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos gru ba kyi rgyud de/ gang tshe phyag rgya'am ting 'dzin/ sgrub phyir stsol bar gyur pa na// gang tshe mkha' la skar ma
413a6(rgyud): 'dra/ dkar po rgyug par des mthong na// de tshe blo ldan sangs rgyas kyi// spyan ni bdag gis thob 'gyur zhes// phyin cad sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni// rtog pa kun las bsgrub par bya
413a7(rgyud): zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungaso// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ gnas dang 'gro ba de bzhin te// ji snyed dngos po
413a8(rgyud): yod par 'gyur// de snyed kyi ni gzugs brnyan rnams// mkha' rgyug 'gro ba'am 'ong yang rung // mthong na rdo rje spyan dag par// shes pas mchod na dngos grub ni// bla na med pa thob par
413b1(rgyud): 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi mig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ gsas pa'am ni g.yon phyogs kyi// mkhar la namakha'i dbyings nyid ni// sId/ 
413b2(rgyud): 'drar myur du 'khor ba yang // mig gis mthong bar gyur pas kyang // rdo rje las byung phyag rgya de// mthong nas 'jigs par ma gyur la// phyag rgya de ni bzung na ni// rdo rje spyan ni 'grub par 'gyur
413b3(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes gsungaso// de la 'di ni pad+mo rigs kyi spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ gang che skya'am dmar ba dang // dkar ba 'am ser ba 'am sna tshogs kyi// dkyil
413b4(rgyud): 'khor mthong bar gyur pa'i tshe// dgongs 'gyur 'khor lo'i sgra ngan 'grub 'gyur zhes bcom ldan rdo rje pad+mos gsung so// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi spyan gyi ye shes dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 
413b5(rgyud): mkha' la rin chen 'dra ba dang // gser la sogs pa 'dra ba ni// gang che mkha' mthong mkha'i mig/ de ni 'grub par 'a/ gyu ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungaso// rigs
413b6(rgyud): thams cad kyi spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud/ 
413b7(rgyud): 'di gsungaso// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni// 'dod chags bde ba rnams smin phyir// gtso bo thams
413b8(rgyud): cad mchod byas pa// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 
414a1(rgyud): 'dod chags bdag ces sgom byed cing // gsang ba'i mchod pa byas na// rdo rje 'dang pa'i gzi can mnyam// dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das
414a2(rgyud): rdo rje bzhed pas gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ khro ba bdag ces sgom byed cing // gsang ba'i mchod pa rab byas pa// khams gsum rnam rgyal ba 'dra bas
414a3(rgyud): dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa phyag na rdo rjes gsung so// de la 'di ni chos kyi rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ nang du song ba'i yid kyi ni// 'dod pa dam
414a4(rgyud): par sgom byed cing // dbyangs dang ldan pa'i yi ge yis// sa dngas rgyas mngon par mchod na ni// dngos grub myur du thob pa dar 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras
414a5(rgyud): gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungaso// de la 'di ni nor bu rig sa kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje snying po/ ra mnyam gzhag la// bsam pa g.yos pas bdud na ni/ 
414a6(rgyud): phyag la rtag tu brtson byas la// dbang bskur ba ni thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbang rin po ches gsungaso// rigs thams cad kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// 
414a7(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig gi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
414a8(rgyud): kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'dod la sogs pa'i bde ba kun// rtag tu bdag gi snying la gnas// e ma'o sems can don rnams la// skyo bar gyur pa gang bshad rmad// 
414b1(rgyud): 'di ni las kyi dmatshig ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin du// bsgoms nas sangs rgyas mchod na ni// dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsu so// 
414b2(rgyud): de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// sems can kun la bde sbyin pa'i// kun bzang 'dod
414b3(rgyud): pa bdag yin te// mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das 'dod pas gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sems
414b4(rgyud): can kun la phan byed pa'i// kun bzang khro bo bdag yin te// rdo rje hUM gi rnal 'byor gyis// mchod na dngos dgrub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes
414b5(rgyud): gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo rigs kyi las kyi dam tshig gi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de bde ba tham sa cad rab sbyin pa'i// kun bzang 'dod pa bdag yin te/ 
414b6(rgyud): bdag nyid 'gro 'dul bskur gnas la// mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mo chags pas gsungaso// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi las dam tshig gsang
414b7(rgyud): ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sems can kun la don chen sbyin// kun bzang rgyal po bdag yin te// don kun grub pa'i gzugs kyis ni// mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes
414b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pas gsungaso// rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na/ 
415a1(rgyud): rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi
415a2(rgyud): rgyud de// rang gi ting nger 'dzin pa yis// g.yas pa'i mdzub mos mdud nas ni// go char bcings te spyi bor bzhag/ shin tu yang ni bsrungs par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom
415a3(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis gsungaso// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi rigs kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rtsig pa la ni ldan 'dra ba// ri mor bris nas mtshan bsring ste// mnyes
415a4(rgyud): na bud med gang bsams pa// de ni 'di yi dbang du 'gyur zhe/ das bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa phyag na rdo rjes gsungaso// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 
415a5(rgyud): sa la gnod sbyin gdong bris la// de yi mig gi phyogs su ni// mdzub mo'i sen mo btsugs na yang // bud med mchog ni 'dren par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan rdo rje
415a6(rgyud): sems dpas gsungaso// de la 'di ni pad+mo rigs kyi las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ lag pa gnyis su pad+mo blangs// 'dod chags dag pa lta byed cing // rdo rje lta bas bud
415a7(rgyud): med de// bltas na yang ni dga' bar 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mo 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje rin chen
415a8(rgyud): ting 'dzin gnas// lag pa gnyis kyi nor bu bzung // hUM zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis ni// bud med kun la 'dud byed do// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM gis gsungs// rigs thams
415b1(rgyud): cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la
415b2(rgyud): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ mchod pa'i las kyi cho gar sbyar// gang dang gang gi dgos bsams pa// de dang de ni gsol btab ste/ 
415b3(rgyud): mkhas pas phyag rgya bsgrub par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 
415b4(rgyud): rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// gsang ba'i mchod pa/ cho gar sbyar// dgos pa gang zhig smras pa de// myu rar du dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos/ 
415b5(rgyud): kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi la sa kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ khro ba'i ting / 'dzin zhugs nas kyang // rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod
415b6(rgyud): chen byas// mkhas pas cung zad gang bsams pa// de ni myur du dngos grub 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khro bos gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos
415b7(rgyud): pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis// yid kyi mchod pa byas nas kyang // mkhas pas dgos pa gang bsams pa// de yi dngos grub thams cad thob// 
415b8(rgyud): ces bcom ldan 'das pad+mo 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi las dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis// gdugs pa la sogs mchod/ 
416a1(rgyud): byas la// mkhas pas dgos pa gang bsams pa// de kun skad cig nyid 'grub 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad
416a2(rgyud): las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya sgom pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungaso// de la 'i
416a3(rgyud): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi rnal 'byor gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor tingange 'dzin gyis// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// sangs rgyas phyag rgya rab
416a4(rgyud): bsgrubs pas// dngos grub dam pa 'thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rje das gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
416a5(rgyud): kyi sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis rnal 'byor gyi dngos gru ba kyi rgyud do// kun gyi bdag nyid sems dpa' ni// bdag gi lus la gnas pa ste// sems dpa' bdag ces
416a6(rgyud): byin rlabs la// bdag ces bya ba'i nga rgyal gyis// bsgoms na 'grub par 'gyuraro zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par 'dus pa'i rdo rje
416a7(rgyud): sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi rdo rje'i byin gyi brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud de/ sems dpa' ji bzhin phyag rgya bzhin// phyag rgya ji bzhin bdag de
416a8(rgyud): bzhin// cho ga 'di yi tshul gyis ni// phyag rgya thams cad bsgrubs par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo rigs kyi chos kyi byin gyis
416b1(rgyud): brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud de/ chos kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis// rdo rje phra mo bsgoms byas la// ngag gi phyag rgyas de dag kun// sems dpa' chen po'i ting 'dzin// ces bcom
416b2(rgyud): ldan 'das 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi las kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud de/ sangs rgyas kun la dbang
416b3(rgyud): bskur dang // mchod dang dam tshig dngos grub rnams// bcom ldan 'das zhes bsgoms nas kyang // rdo rje las rnams bsgrub par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje las kyis gsungs// 
416b4(rgyud): rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya sgom pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do//  de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams/ tsang gcig tu 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
416b5(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khro/ ra los bsgyur ba phyag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang
416b6(rgyud): theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i// mdo 'di legs par bshad pas na// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so// rdo rje rin chen chen khyod lags so// rdo rje chos ni khyod legs so// rdorje
416b7(rgyud): las ni khyod legs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las brtag pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzog so// // de bzhin
416b8(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa// bam po dgu pa// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes tshig su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// lta ba ngan cing / 
417a1(rgyud): chags bral la// gsang ba 'di ni mi rigs te// sems can kun la phan don du// de bzhin cho ga bshad par bya// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa'
417a2(rgyud): chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi yo byad dang cho
417a3(rgyud): ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/ de la 'di ni snying po'i yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud yin te/ dkyil 'khor chen po mthong nas/ bdug pa dang / mar me dang / me tog dang / dri'i phyag rgya rnams
417a4(rgyud): kyis mchod pa byas te/ de nas rdo rje tshig gis bzlas pa da rnam par bya'o// de la 'di ni bzlas pa'i cho ga rgya nges pa'i rgyud de/ zla ba bzhir gnas ji bzhin par 'dug ste
417a5(rgyud): dus bzhir bdug pa la sogs pas cho ga bzhin du mchod nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po ma na par rtogs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas de bzhin gshes
417a6(rgyud): ba thams cad la bstod de/ phyag rgya bzhis phyag bya ba'i tshul gyis phyag byas la sngags 'di bzhis bdag gi lus dbul zhing mchod pa bya'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza pas+tha nA ya/ At+ma na
417a7(rgyud): nir+yA ta ya mi sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha sa mA~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU pa b+hi She kA ya At+ma na/ nir+yA ta ya mi sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza pra brta na ya At+ma nA
417a8(rgyud): nidrA ta yA me/ sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+harma pra brta ya mAM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza karma Ne At+man niR+Sha ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra karma ku ru mA~M/ de nas 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la chags pa dang ma
417b1(rgyud): bral la kha zas kun dang 'dod pa kun la nye bar spyod cing bdag nyid snying po'i don du sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan mdun du tshig tsam gyis kyang bsgoms la ci dga' bar byed cing rdo rje tshig gis lan brgya rtsa
417b2(rgyud): brgyad bzlas na myur bar dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems pas gsungs so// ci ste bla na med pa'i dngos grub 'dod na ni de nas ral la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
417b3(rgyud): gshegs pa ni dbus na bzhugs/ de'i sems dpa' chen po bzhi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du kha dog dang rgyan rnams ci dga' bar bri zhing sems dpa' chen po rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs
417b4(rgyud): la rigs kyi lha mo rnams grwa rnams su bri'o// de nas mo'i sku gzugs la mchod pa rgya cher byas la 'dzab bya/ dpa'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du zla ba bzhi'i bar du bzlas par bya'o// 
417b5(rgyud): de nas mthar mchod pa rgya cher byas la mtshan thog thag bzlas pa'i bya'o// de nas nam langs pa dang de bzhin gshig/ sa pa thams cad kyi de khon nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub ngas
417b6(rgyud): ba thob par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// yang na phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya
417b7(rgyud): bcings la// ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi phyag rgya'i spyan sngar ci dga' ba bzhin du ji lta ba bzhin bcings shing dkrol te rdo rje'i chog 'bum bzlas par bya'o// de nas mthar mtshan thog thag
417b8(rgyud): ngal mi gas pa cung bad tsam zhig phyag rgya 'akrol te/ ji lta ba bzhin bcings nas bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas phyag rgya 'bar zhing 'bab la 'phar zhing nyung bar smra bar 'gyur ro// dems
418a1(rgyud): phyag rtsubacings bzhin du rnam pa' la lding bar 'gyur ro// gzugs ci dga' ba dang / ma snang ba dang las thams cad kya byed par 'gyur ro// bsasas
418a2(rgyud): thag tu/ phyag rgya thams cad kyis kyang las thams cad ji lta ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// yang na ting nge 'dzin sgrub par
418a3(rgyud): 'dod na ni des rdo rje phra mo nas brtsams te/ ting nge 'dzin dgang la dga' ba'i snying po'i rnal 'byor gyi tshul du/ zla ba bzhi'i bar du bsgoms la/ de nas mthar mtshan thog thag skyil
418a4(rgyud): mo krung mi zhig par snyoms par zhugs te 'dug par bya'o// dade nas nam langs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa/ da la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro// 
418a5(rgyud): de nas ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu thob par ro// zhes bcom ldan rdo rje sems pas gsungs so// ci ste la/ sa sgrub par 'dod na yang // de bzhin du bzlas shing zla
418a6(rgyud): ba gcig gi bar du bsgrubs la de nas mthar mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// de na las thams cad kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin
418a7(rgyud): pas gsungs so// ci ste las shig bya bar 'dod na yang // lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis/ bdag dang gzhan dang / grong dang / grong khyer rnams go cha bcing ba la sogs
418a8(rgyud): pas bsrungs par 'gyur ro// dbab pa yang bya ste tsan dan dri zhim pos gdon gyis zin pa dang / gdon gyi ma zin pa rnams rdo rje dang lcags kyu dang / lag pa dang / mda' thogs pa
418b1(rgyud): dang / rin po che dang / nyim dang / rgyal mtshan dang / so'i phreng ba dang / bad+mo nga / ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / we dang / rdo rje tu gram dang / gocha dang / mche ba dang / 
418b2(rgyud): tshur dang / phyag rgya la sogs pa dngos po thams cad lan gcig brjod pas 'bebs par byed do// sgyu ma'i las kyang byed de/ rma bya'i mjug sgro'i nang du rdo rje bcug ste bcings la
418b3(rgyud): de nas rma bya'i mjug sgrod sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgyas mnan la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya babs kyi bar du bzlas par bya'o// de nas rma bya
418b4(rgyud): mjug sgra las gzugs sna tshogs la sogs par snang bar 'gyur/ te/ de phyin can rma bya'i mjug sgros rang gi lus la cho ga bzhin du gzugs thams cad kyang ston te/ mjug
418b5(rgyud): sgro de nyid la lan gcig bzlas te bskor bas kyang / bdag nyid las gzugs thams cad snang bar 'gyuraro// mjug sgro de nyid kyis 'jig rten pa'i sgyu ma rnams kyang ston/ 
418b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzugs brnyan yang ston phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa
418b7(rgyud): rnams kyis bdud sde dang bcas pa rnams 'dul ba la sogs pa rnams rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rol pa la sogs pa mdzad pa rnams kyang ston pa nas/ bdag nyid las rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan
418b8(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyang ston pa'i bar du'o// ci ste dbang du byed par 'dod na yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la phyag rgya de 'bar bar gyur
419a1(rgyud): gyi bar du bzlas par bya'o// de nas de phyin chad phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed cing dbang du byed na sems
419a2(rgyud): dpa' gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos ci ste/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub sgrub par 'dod na yang des dang po kho nar de bzhin du zlos zhing zla ba gcig tu brgyad stong bzlas la
419a3(rgyud): de nas mthar phyag rgya bcings te de bzhin du mtshan thog thag phya za 'bar gyi bar bzlas par bya'o// de phyin chad phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi dngos grub dang rig 'dzin gyi
419a4(rgyud): dngos grub gang yang rung ba gcig tu 'gyur ro// sa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa
419a5(rgyud): rdzogs so// / de nas rdo rje/ rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ de// dang por ni sngar brnyen pa bya ste/ de ltar ci 'dod pa bzhin
419a6(rgyud): du yi ge 'bru 'bum bzlas par bya'o// de'i mthar mtshan thog thag tu bzlas pa byas la de phyin chad sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa dang / chad pas bcad par nus par
419a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// 'on te sgrub par 'dod na yang / des ji lta ba bzhin du ri mo'i sku gzugs bris la/ des de bzhin du mchod
419a8(rgyud): pa byas nas zla ba gcig tu 'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing ci dga' ba bzhin du byas nas brgya stong du bzlas par dus bzhir rdo rje'i tshig gis zlos zhing zla ba'i mthar phyin pa dang / ri mo'i gzugs
419b1(rgyud): tshad kyi che ba sa nga zhes bya pa thug chen pa la byug bsas san nas ngas byang ga du nas sgyul/ sa spyan sa dag du ga nga
419b2(rgyud): dbang drug chen pa lachags pa khri dang bcas pa rnams mdun du gnas nas paka da par bya 'o// denas rig na gyis 'dinang du pa bya// gang gi chengs khyong
419b3(rgyud): ga'id byas shig ces pasgo pa de chen byed das la da/  bzhin gyis she/ dbyer chad 'jig rten gsum pa mtha dag gi bdag par 'gyur te/ sras ma
419b4(rgyud): kyangs gsum pa thams cad la ci dgar bka' stsol cing dbaskor te slar 'ongs nas kyang phan gdags pa dang / chad pas bcad pa rnams byed cing lnga rdzas kyi 'jig rten gsu
419b5(rgyud): gyi longs spyod la nye bar spyad nas/ ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du byed cing lha thams cad kyi dbang po'i bud med/ sogs pabud med thams cad mgu bar byas nas nye bar spyong
419b6(rgyud): de la su gang gis byas kyang gnod par byed nus pa med de hUM zhes bya bas lha la sogs pa ma rungs pa thams cad gnon cing / de nas bskal pa chung ngu'i stong gi bar du 'tshe bar 'gyur ro// zhes
419b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs// ci ste phyag rgya sgrub par 'dod na yang ji lta ba bzhin du 'dzab byas la zla ba'i mthar rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la/ mtshan
419b8(rgyud): thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// de nas nam langs pa dang phyag rgya 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas cu zhes bya ba dang ldan par ji lta ba'i cho ga bzhin du phyag rgyabacing na na mkha' 'al 'gro/ 
420a1(rgyud): ba dang / gzugs rnams ston pa dang / mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang / sgyum rnams ston pa dang / thams cad la dbab pa dang / dgug pa dang / dbang du bya ba
420a2(rgyud): dang / thams cad kyi dgag pa skyed par bya ba dang / rin po che thams cad bsdu ba dang 'od zer 'bar ba chen po bstan pa dang / rin po che'i char 'bebs par bstan pa dang / gang mo cher ba gang
420a3(rgyud): pa dang / sems can thams cad sbyang ba dang / bcad pa dang / dbye ba dang / dus kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba dang / ji lta bzhin pa'i de kho na nyid brjod pa dang / las thams cad la 'jug pa
420a4(rgyud): dang / dgog pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / bsad pa dang // sems can thams cad phyag rgyas gdab pa dang / da 'dod pa'i dga' ba la 'jug pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / 
420a5(rgyud): dngos po thams cad glu len du gzhug pa dang / gar byed du gzhug pa dang / dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbab pa la sogs pa las thams cad byed
420a6(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// ci ste rdo rje phra mo sgrub par 'dod na yang des rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin du sgom zhing de bzhin du bzlas pa'i tshul gyis zla ba
420a7(rgyud): gcig tu bsgrub par bya ste de nas mthar ting 'dzin de nyid kyis mtshan thog thag bzlas par bya'o// de nas nam langs pa dang mngon par shes pa lngar gyur nas sems can thams cad la phan gdags
420a8(rgyud): pa dang / tshar bcad pa nus par 'gyuraro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsung so// ci ste las sgrub par 'dod na de bzhin du zlos zhing zla ba gcig tu bsgrubs la de nas mthar mtshan gcig
420b1(rgyud): thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// de nas las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsung so// de nas las rnams byed par 'dod na yang lan cig brjod/ 
420b2(rgyud): yid kyis bsams pas snang ba la sogs pa las thams cad byed par 'gyur// rdo rje rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// / de nas pad+mo rigs kyi yo byad
420b3(rgyud): dang cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ de la dang por 'bum bzlas pa byas na bsnyen pa byas par 'gyuraro// de nas bsgrub par bya ste ras la bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba la
420b4(rgyud): sogs pa bris pa de'i phyogs thams cad du dkyil 'khor zhi'i tshul du sems dpa' bzhi bris la grwa rnams lha mo rnam des bri'o// de nas bzlas pa'i cho ga de bzhin du rgyas par byas
420b5(rgyud): la zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba thams cad 'dul b.rabyon te dus ji bzhin par dam pa'i skabs 'byed par 'gyuraro// 
420b6(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsung so// ci ste phyag rgya sgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin du pad+mo rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la stong phrag brgyad tshang bar brjod pa'i bar du dus bzhir bzlas par bya'o// 
420b7(rgyud): de nas mthar mtshan gcig tho/ aHphyag rgya bcings te bzlas pa byas la nam nangs pa dang dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgya bcings pas ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba thams cad 'dul bar byedo zhes
420b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungaso// ci ste ting 'dzin gyi tshul sgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin du zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu ji ltar dga' ba'i ting 'dzin
421a1(rgyud): gyis bzlas pa bya'o// de nas nam langs pa dang tingange 'dzin thams cad mngon sum du 'gyuraro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsung so// tsi ste las sgrub par 'don
421a2(rgyud): yang de bzhin du bzlas la zla ba'i mthar mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// de nas las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungaso// pad+ma'i rigs kyi yo byad
421a3(rgyud): dang cho ga rgyas pa rdzog so// de nas nor bu rigs kyi nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te// de la dang po kho nar ngade bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag rnam bzhi byas la 'bum bzlas par bya'o// 
421a4(rgyud): de nas de bzhin du ras la bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi'i tshul du bris la/ de nas de bzhin du ma chod pa byas te de bzhin du bsgrubs la zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig
421a5(rgyud): thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// de nas nam langs pa dang btso/ ma ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bsku ra ba'i rin po che byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po byon nas
421a6(rgyud): dbang bskur ba sbyin pa mdzad do// dbang bskur ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams der rig 'dzin gyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyuraro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas
421a7(rgyud): gsungaso// ci ste phyag rgya sgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin tu chos kyi rdo rje ma'i tshul rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrubs na bsam pa thams cad kyi las byed par 'gyuraro// zhes bcom ldan
421a8(rgyud): 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungaso// ci ste nor bu ye shes sgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin tu rin po che 'byung ba'i ting 'dzin rim po bzhin tu sgom par byas te dngos po med pa'i na mkha' las rin po che ji ltar
421b1(rgyud): 'byung ba rin po che las byang chub sems dpa'i sku ji ltar 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin 'di dus bzhir bsgoms la ji ltar gong du smos pa bzhin tu bzlas par bya'o// de nas zla ba'i mthar ting 'dzin de nyid kyis
421b2(rgyud): mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas pa bya'o// de nas nam langs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byon nas ci dga' ba bzhin du dbang bskur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam pa'i snying pos
421b3(rgyud): gsung so// de nas las sgrub pa bshad de// de bzhin du bzlas pa zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag bzlas par bya'o// de nas nam longs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das nam pa'i snying pos don
421b4(rgyud): thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas las thams cad byed dpar 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas/ gsung so// nor bu rigs kyi nye bar spang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzog
421b5(rgyud): so// de nas rigs thams cad kyi thun mong du sgrub pa'i yo byad dang cho ga rgyus pa ni 'di yin te/ de la dang ra snying po thams cad kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa bshad do// 
421b6(rgyud): snying po sgrub par 'dod na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub par gyur cig ces brjod la snying po ci dga' bar bzlas shing bsgrub pa'i cho ga bya'o// de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i yo byad dang cho ga ste
421b7(rgyud): phyag rgya thams cad bdag la dga' bar gyur cig ces smras la dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te ci dga' bar ci nus kyis bzlas par bya'o// de nas ci lta ba bzhin du dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// de la 'di ni
421b8(rgyud): sngags thams cad kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa ste/ spros pa med pa'i tshig grub par gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting 'dzin bdag la skye bar gyur cig ces smras la sngags ci dga'
422a1(rgyud): bar bzlas pa byas te 'di ni dngos grub bo// de la 'di ni rig pa'i yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa ste/ kye ma sems can 'di dag thams cad ni ma rig pas mdongs par gyur/ de bzhin/ 
422a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad ni rig pa rtogs shing sdom par gyur to// zhes smras la rig pa ci dga' bar bzlas shing bsgrub par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungaso// 
422a3(rgyud): de nas snying po dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / rig pa thams cad ci ltar sgom pa nyid du rdo rje bzlas pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ sems dpa' gang gi snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags
422a4(rgyud): dang / rig pa rnams bzlas pa'i don du bsgrub par bya ba de ni bdag gam sems dpar bsgoms na bsgrub par bya ba 'grub par 'gyu ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso// 
422a5(rgyud): rigs thams cad kyi thun mongs du bzlas pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// / de nas rigs thams cad kyi thun mo ngadu sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di lta ste/ de la dang po kho nar
422a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs kyi dngos grub ni 'di lta ste/ nor 'grub pa'i dngos grub dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub dang / rig 'dzin nyid du 'grub pa dang / dngos grub chen po rnamaso// de la
422a7(rgyud): nor 'grub pa ni 'di yin te/ gang na gter yod par dogs pa der phyag rgya bcings la rang gi ting 'dzin gyis gter gyi gnas der rdo rje blta bas lta ba na ci ste rdo rje lta bu yar bar mthong na de na gter yod par
422a8(rgyud): shes par bya'o// de nas rdo rje lcags sgrog gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te sa bskos la ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du blangs na rtsod pa med par thob par 'gyuraro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas
422b1(rgyud): gsung so// de la 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub 'grub pa yin te/ phyag rgya gang sgrub par byed na badz+ra sa d+hi zhes brjod par bya'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub ni rnam pa bzhi yod de/ de ni 'di ltar chu'i steng / 
422b2(rgyud): nas par 'gro zhing 'dug pa la sogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa thams cad kyi gzugs ston pa dang / ji srid du dga' ba de srid du mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang / na mkha' la 'gro ba
422b3(rgyud): dang / dpag tshad stong gi steng du lding ba dang / 'og tu 'gro zhing 'ong ba dang / phyogs thams cad du dpag tshad stong du ci dga' bar song la bskor ste slar 'ong ba dang / dpag tshad stong khor yug gi sems
422b4(rgyud): can thams cad kyi bsam pa shes pa dang / dngos po thams cad mi dag gis mthong zhing rna bas thos pa dang / phyogs thams cad du dpag stong khor yug na gnas pa'i bud med thams cad
422b5(rgyud): dga' bar pang du blangs te 'dug pa dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig la sogs pa'i dbyig thams cad dang / nor tham sa cad phrogs nas kyang sus kyang cung zad kyang rgal mi nus te
422b6(rgyud): bdag gi rdo rjes kyang mi thub par 'gyur na gzhan gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ skyes bu stong phrag bcu bsdoms pa'i stobs dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu nad med pa dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu 'dod pa thams/ 
422b7(rgyud): cad la longs spyod pa dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu dar la bab cing lha'i gzugs dang ldan pa dang / rdo rje sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing rdo rje'i dngos grub bla na med
422b8(rgyud): pas mchod pa byed cing lo steng phrag bcu bzhi'i bar 'tsho bar 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rigs 'dzin gyis dngos grub kyis gsung so// de la 'dzin rje / 
423a1(rgyud): rigs 'dzin gyi dngos grub 'grub pa yin te/ phyag rgya sgrub pa na rdo rje rig 'dzin ces brjod la 'grub pa dang rdo rje rig 'dzin gyis 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur te/ 'dod pa
423a2(rgyud): thams cad la longs spyod pa dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skad cig gis bskor te/ slar 'o shing bde ba thams cad la yongasu spyod pa dang / lo bco brgyad pa'i na tshod dang ldan pa dang / sku
423a3(rgyud): 'khyil ba dang ldan pa dang / rdo rje chen po'i rig 'dzin du gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rdo rje sems dpa' thams cad mthong zhing bskal pa chen po'i bar du gnas par 'gyuraro// zhes bcom
423a4(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs 'dzi dan gyis gsung so// de la 'di ni dngos grub chen po 'grub/  pa yin te/ bdag nyid phyag rgya'i snying po don du bdag nyid kyis phyag
423a5(rgyud): rgya bsgrubs na sems dpa'i gzugasu gyur nas skad cig gci ga gis kyang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tham sa cad du gzugs sna tshogs kyis bya ba sna tshogs byed pa dang / 
423a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpar bcas pa thams cad mthong nas rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pas yang dag par mchod nas sems can ma lus zhing lus
423a7(rgyud): pa med pa rnams kyi don byas nas slar 'ongs te 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyis rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'dod pa thams cad dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad la spyod cing rdo rje
423a8(rgyud): sems dpa' dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen por gyur nas tshe'i tshad ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i bskal pa chen po'i tshad du 'gyuraro// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i thadas/ 
423b1(rgyud): kyi dngos grub chen pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs 'dzin gyi dngos grub ste/ de yang 'di ltar khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dngos grub dang / dbang thams cad kyi dngos grub dang / 
423b2(rgyud): bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub dang / dngos grub dam pa rnams so// de la 'di ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dngos grub yin te/ khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i
423b3(rgyud): phyag rgya bcings la dbang phyug chen po'i rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te bsgrub par bya'o// de nas gzugs de skad 'byin pa dang hUM zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o// hUM zhes brjod pa tsam gyis dbang phyug chen
423b4(rgyud): po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams sgrub pa'i mdun du bka' nyan da cing dbang du 'gyuraro// de phyin chad 'jig rten gsum po thams
423b5(rgyud): cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur te na mkha' la 'grozhing 'jig rten gsum po 'khor lo thams cad kun tu bskor te slar 'ongs nas lha ma rungs pa la sogs pa sems can
423b6(rgyud): thams cad hUM zhes byas pas 'dul bar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i gzugs dang ldan pas 'jig rten gsum po thams cad la bka' stsol cing rdo rje sems
423b7(rgyud): dpar bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong nas mnyes par byed cing lo stong du 'tsho bar byed par 'gyur bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes byed pas gsungaso// de la 'di ni dbang skur bar
423b8(rgyud): zad kyi dngos grub ste/ phyag rgya sgrub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba ni rin po che'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas dang por bdag nyid dbang bskur la bsgrub par bya ste/ de nas
424a1(rgyud): grub pa dang dbang rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te/ rdo rje'i dbang dang / rin po che'i dbang dang / chos kyi dbang dang / las kyi dbang rnam so// de la rdo rje'i dbang thob na de bzhin gsheg
424a2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur ro// rin po che'i dbang thob na rin po che thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro// chos kyi dbang gis ni chos thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro// las kyi dbang gis
424a3(rgyud): ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyuraro// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gis gsung so// de la 'di ni bde ba dang yid bde ba
424a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi dngos grub ste/ de yang 'di ltar rtag tu gsang ba/ de'i mchod pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba
424a5(rgyud): dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyu ro zhes pa com ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brda ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyis gsungaso// de la 'di ni/ 
424a6(rgyud): dngos grub dam pa ste/ de yang ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bdag mnya mo zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungaso// de la 'di dag ni pad+mo rigs kyi dngos grub rnams te/ de ni 'di ltar mnyes
424a7(rgyud): par bya ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / srung ba dang / pad+mo'i dngos grub rnam so// de la mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub ni 'di yin te/ ji ltar pad+mo 'dod pa bsgoms na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
424a8(rgyud): sogs pa sems dpa' thams cad mnyes par byed nus par 'gyuraro// bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug rje su dran par byas na sems can thams cad dbang du byed nus par 'gyuraro// byams pas 'gengs
424b1(rgyud): pa'i ting 'dzin gyis 'gro ba thams cad srung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab nus par 'gyuraro// bdag nyid pad+mo'i ting 'dzin du zhugs la pad+mo lag par blangs te bsgrubs na 'jig rten dbang phyug gi
424b2(rgyud): gzugs dang ldan pa dang / rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan zhing lo stong phrag bzhir 'tsho bar 'gyuraro zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pad+mos gsungaso// de la 'di dag ni
424b3(rgyud): nor bu rigs kyi dngos grub rnams te/ de yang 'di ltar rigs thams cad kyi dbang gi dngos grub dang / gzi brjid chen po dang / bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa dang rin po che'i dngos grub rnams
424b4(rgyud): de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gi dngos grub ni/ 'di lta ste/ nyid kyis dbang dbul ba dang / mar me dbul da ba dang / ci nus kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs
424b5(rgyud): par bya ba dang / rin po che sgrub pa'i dngos grub 'di dag gis de ba zhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod na ring po mi thogs par 'grub par 'gyuraro// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
424b6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po ches gsung so// rigs thams cad kyi thun mong ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzog so// / de nas brtog pa thams cad kyi thabs kyi dngos
424b7(rgyud): grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i sems dpas gsungaso// de la dang po kho nar ni snying po thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'jig rten 'dul ba
424b8(rgyud): ji lta bar// de 'dra bar ni dngos grub 'dod// de yi thabs ni phyag rgya ste// dngos grub chen po kun sbyin no// de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'jig rten 'dul ba
425a1(rgyud): chags bral min// phyag rgya'i dngos grub chags las skyes// de yi thabs ni sgom pa ste// dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur/ de la 'di'i sngags kyi thabs kyi dngos grub
425a2(rgyud): rgyud de/ bden las 'jig rten 'di nyams pas// sngags kyi dngos grub thob mi 'gyur// spros pa med pa'i thabs kyis ni// dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur// de la 'di ni rig pa thams cad dngos
425a3(rgyud): grub kyi rgyud de/ ma rig mun chags 'di la ni// rig pa'i dngos grub yod min te// de yi thabs ni rgya che bas// dngos grub kun gyi mchog thob bo// brtag pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 
425a4(rgyud): de nas brtag pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshe gus pa thams cad kyis gsungaso// de la dang po kho nar ni snying po
425a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ mchod pa rnam bzhi byas nas ni// bsod nams chen po thob 'gyurar te// bsod nams med kyang sangs rgyas mchod// 'grub
425a6(rgyud): 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ dam tshig gsang ba bsrungs na ni// bsod nams chen po thob 'gyur te// bsod nams med kyang myur bar ni/ 
425a7(rgyud): dam tshig bsrungs na myur du 'grub// de la 'di ni sngags kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de sangs rgyas mtshan la sogs brjod na// bsod nams chen po thob 'gyur te// bsod nams med kyang myur// 
425a8(rgyud): bar ni// chos sbyin pas ni dngos grub 'thob// de la 'di ni rig pa'i bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ bsod nams nang na sbyin pa mchog/ byin na bsod nams thob 'gyur te// sbyin pa
425b1(rgyud): pha rol phyin rdzogs na// myur du sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub// brtag pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de nas brtag pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par
425b2(rgyud): bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsungaso// de la dang po kho nar snying po shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ yi ge a la 'jug byed cing // yi ge thams cad
425b3(rgyud): rnam bsgoms la// rang gi kha nas gzhan zhal du// bsgoms na bsod nams thob par 'grub zhes bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam pa'i dpal gyis gsung so// de la 'di
425b4(rgyud): ni phyag rgya'i shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ shes rab de das 'bigs zhes bya ba// ting 'dzin ces grags pa ste// des ni phyag rgya myur 'grub par// bsgoms na myur du 'grub
425b5(rgyud): par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das shes rab mchog gis gsu ngaso// de la 'di ni sngags kyi shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ shes rab sgra yi rjes 'brang ba// ting 'dzin tshig
425b6(rgyud): ni rab spros pa// de bsgoms na ni myur ba yang // sngags kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje blos gsungaso// de la 'di ni rig pa'i shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 
425b7(rgyud): rig dang sngags dang khyad par du// khyad par yod pa ma yin te// shes rab bsgoms na myur bar ni// nges par dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
425b8(rgyud): kyi shes rab ye shes kyis gsungaso// brtag pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas brtag pa thams cad kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o// 
426a1(rgyud): dge ba yi ni chos rnams kyi// tshogs ni rnam par 'phel 'gyur te// de nas tshogs ni 'grub par 'gyur// de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'khor la
426a2(rgyud): mang por zhugs pa dang // dkyil 'khor mang po bris pa'i phyir// tshogs rdzogs pas na phyag rgya rnams// dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur// de la 'di ni sngags kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 
426a3(rgyud): rjesu yi rang la sogs tshul// de bzhin dam pa'i chos bklags dang // bzlas pa mang po byas na ni// nges par sngags ni dngos grub 'gyur// de la 'di ni rig pa'i tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de
426a4(rgyud): ma rig rab tu spangs pa dang // sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin chu la las// tshogs na yongasu rdzogs nas kyang // myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rtog pa thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i/ 
426a5(rgyud): rgyud rdzogs so// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rigs thams cad kyi mtshan ma byung ba'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi
426a6(rgyud): rgyud 'di gsungaso// de la ji ltar rdo rje 'byung zhe na// de nyid bcom ldan sems dpa' ste// thams cad sems de nyid bdag po// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje ni// sems dpa' brtan pa rang byung gi
426a7(rgyud): sems dpa' kun gyi mchog sems dpa'// rdo rje snying khar rab bsgoms na// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes grags te// 'di la rdo rje rab tu gnas// de nyid sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni// ye shes
426a8(rgyud): tshul te mnyam med 'od// snying las sna tshogs byung nas ni// sna tshogs pa yi gzugs gyur te// khams gsum kun gyi rdul snyed du// de dag nyid ni rgyal ba yin// rdo rje sku ni de rnams la// 
426b1(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpar yang dag 'gyur// sems dpa' dang po de nyid las// mtshan ma thams cad yang dag 'byung // mtshan ma las ni sems dpa' che// de las tshul 'di thams cad 'byung // 
426b2(rgyud): gang gis 'di ni thos gyur la// dad cing 'dzin byed snying khar yang // rtag tu dga' bas bsgoms na ni// de ni myur du grub pa thob ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// de bzhin gshegs
426b3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rtog pa thams cad 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs / 
426b4(rgyud): de la dang po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog dpa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud te/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi rtog med pa'i// ye shes rtag pa nyid gyur pa'i// mi rtog pa
426b5(rgyud): yi ye shes las// brtags pas rtog pa zhes brjo da do// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi brtag pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ mi rtog gang la rtog
426b6(rgyud): bdag nyid// brtags pa rtog pa byung ba ni// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// de phyir rtog pa zhes brjod do// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ cho ga
426b7(rgyud): bzhin du ri mo bris// rtog pa grub sbyin zhes rtog las// rtog las bral ba'i bdag nyid kyis// de phyir rtog pa zhes gsungaso// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi/ 
426b8(rgyud): rgyud do// rtog pa las ni 'dod chags 'byung // pad+mo la ni de gnas te// de phyir rtog la gnas pa ni// grub pa nyid du de 'gyuraro// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi
427a1(rgyud): d+hud de/ rtog pa med pa'i nor bu ni// mthu yis shin tu mchog tu 'gyur// de ltar rnam par mi rtog pas// lha rdzas dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur// zhes bcom
427a2(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// rigs thams cad kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i rgyud do// de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi snying po 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud dang/ yid kyis 'dod pa'i cho ga yis/ 
427a3(rgyud): yid kyis 'dod pa grub 'gyur te// ting 'dzin sgrub pa snying la gnas// dbyer snying po zhes brjod do// de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ ji ltar rgyal po'i phyag rgya
427a4(rgyud): mchog/ khrims ni 'da' ka mi phyed bzhin// bdag nyi dang chen po gzugs brnyan gyis// mtshan ma phyag rgya zhes par grags// de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi sngags 'byung / 
427a5(rgyud): ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ 'da' bar bya ba ma yin zhing // dbye ba dka' las gsang ba nyid// gsang ba grub phyi ra brjod pas na// de yi phyir na sngags zhes brjod// de nas
427a6(rgyud): rig pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ ma rig pa ni gzhom pa dang // ngag gi rig mchog 'grub pa'i phyir// rtogs shing rig pa'i dngos grub ste// de phyir rtog pa zhes brjod do// zhes
427a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsung so// rtog pa thams cad kyi snying po la sogs pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud do// de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyud de/ de la dang / 
427a8(rgyud): po kho nar snying po'i ye shes skye ba'i rgyud yin te/ snying po bzlas te bdag gam ni// gzhan yang rung ste byung ba na// 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur gang gis ni// mthong zhing thos 'gyur shes par bya// 
427b1(rgyud): del 'angan phyug rgya'is shes 'byung ba'i rgyud yin te/ bdag gis cho ga ji bzhin du// gang yang rung ba'i phyag rgyabacis// 'jig rten pa la bzlas nan// gong ma bzhin du kun shes 'gyur// dam
427b2(rgyud): 'di sngags kyi ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyud yin te// lan cig tsam yang sngags brjod na// 'das dang 'thung dang byung gang yin// rang gi lcel smras 'gyur ba// de dag thams cad bden par 'gyur zhes
427b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni rig pa'i ye shes skye ba'i rgyud de/ rig pa lan gcig brjod na ni// byung dang 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur rnams/ 
427b4(rgyud): ltar rdo rje'i bka' bzhin du// yid kyi de ni shes par 'gyudar// rtog pa thams cad kyi ye shes smra ba'i tshig rgyas dpa'i rgyud rdzogs// / de nas rigs thams cad
427b5(rgyud): thun mong gi gsang ba'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud yin no// de la 'di ni de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa'i rigs kyi sku'i phyag rgya sgrub pa yin te/ ji ltar 'dug nas
427b6(rgyud): kyang // skyil mo dkrung bcas bsgrub bya ste// ji ltar ri mo'i tshul byas nas// sems dpa' chen po grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs
427b7(rgyud): kyi gsang ba'i sku'i phyag rgya sgrub pa yin te/ ji ltar ri mo'i tshul du ni// brkyang bskum tshul tu gnas byas te// shin tu khros nas sgrub byas na// the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur/ zhes bcom
427b8(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas gsungaso// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sku'i phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud yin te/ rdo rje skyil mo dkrung bcas la// lag gnyis rdo rje bcings nas kyang // ting 'dzin
428a1(rgyud): kyi skur gyur la// bad+mo byung ba bsgrub par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mo sems dpas gsung so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sku'i phyag rgya sgrub pa
428a2(rgyud): yin te/ ji ltar 'dug gamanya ba'am// 'chag kyang rung steng de ltar ni// rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur na// the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsus
428a3(rgyud): so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud de/ lce rtse shin tu mi bskul zhing // so dang mchu gnyis sbyar nas ni// rtog pa thams cad bsgrub
428a4(rgyud): bya zhing // sgra bral rdo rje'i tshig yin no// zhes bcom ldan 'ad/ sa rdo rje gsung gis gsung so// de la 'din rdo rjenas kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud / 
428a5(rgyud): hUM zhes bya ba 'brug sgrar bsgrags// khro ba'i ngag ni zab cebastan// rdo rje chen po khro bo'i gsal// rdo rje khro ba'i gsung 'gru'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes bya/ 
428a6(rgyud): bas gsung so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud de/ dbugs mi 'byin ltar dbugs 'byin cing // phra ba'i tshig ni shin tu gsal// ting 'dzin ye/ 
428a7(rgyud): shes snying po yis// zlos pa po rnams grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi snying pos gsung so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i
428a8(rgyud): rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud de/ shin tu yongasu gsal tshig gis// rtag tu 'dud la brtson byed cing // tshul 'di bzlas par gyur na ni// myur du thams cad 'grub
428b1(rgyud): par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes gsungaso// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyu de/ 
428b2(rgyud): rtag tu 'dod pa bcom ldan 'das// sems can thams cad bde sbyin pas// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid du// bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'dod
428b3(rgyud): pas gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud de/ sems can kun la phan pa dang // ma rungs pa rnams gdul ba dang // sangs rgyas bstan pa srung
428b4(rgyud): ba'i phyir// khro bo dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bco dam ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba gsung so// de la 'di ni pad+mo rigs kyi
428b5(rgyud): gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud de/ ji ltar d+mo'i rab chags la// dgos pa'i skyon gyis mi gos pa// de ltar bdag gis chags skyon yang // srid na
428b6(rgyud): chags pa de 'grub 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mo bzhed pas gsungaso// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud de/ nam zhig sems can
428b7(rgyud): thams cad kyi// dgos pa'i don ni kun sgrub cing // rin chen char ni 'bebs 'gyur zhes// grub na myur bar de 'grub bo// zhes bcom ldan 'das na mkha'i snying pos gsungaso// 
428b8(rgyud): de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyu dang / ji ltar langs sam 'dug pa'am// 'chag kyang rung ste de ltar ni// lag pa g.yon pas phyag
429a1(rgyud): rgya mchog/ thams cad byed na 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba phyags rdo rjes gsung so// de la 'di ni rje/ 
429a2(rgyud): rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud de/ de lta de ltar gnas nas kyang // ji lta ji ltar byed kyang rung // rdo rje khro bo mdzub mo bcings// gos kyis g.yogs na 'grub
429a3(rgyud): par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i rgyal pos gsungaso// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud de/ lag pa g.yon
429a4(rgyud): pas pad+mo yis// khu tshur bcings te sbas nas ni// ji dag dar myur du pad+mo yi// dngos grub kyang ni thob par 'gyur// // zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos
429a5(rgyud): gsung so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i rje rje phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud de/ g.yon pa'i rin chen khu tshu ra ni// bcings te dam pa'i lag g.yogs la// ci dga' bar
429a6(rgyud): ni rim gror byed// rin chen dngos grub thob par 'gyuraro// zhes bcom ldan 'das na mkha'i snying pos gsung so// de la 'di ni rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba'i thun mong gi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i
429a7(rgyud): rgyud de/ rang gi sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// phyag rgya chen po'i tshul du ni// rdo rje ngag dang rdo rje'i lta// ring por mi thogs mchog 'grubo// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
429a8(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso// rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud rdzog so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das
429b1(rgyud): phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces gsung so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rtog pa 'di byin gyis brlab par mkhyen par mdzad du
429b2(rgyud): gsol/ de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas yang leg so zhes bya ba 'di byin no// rdo rje'i theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsang / 
429b3(rgyud): theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i// mdo 'di legs par bshad pas na// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod leg so// rdo rje rin chen khyod leg so// rdo rje chos ni khyod leg so// rdo rje las ni khyod leg so// 
429b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa la das rgyud thams cad kyi phyi ma'i rgyud rdzogaso// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje stan las langs te/ bcom
429b5(rgyud): ldan 'das la mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad po 'dis gsol ba btab bo// rdo rje dbyings kyi sems dpa' che// sems can don mcho ga bdag nyid can// shAkya'i rgyal po ye shes che// rdo rje bdag
429b6(rgyud): nyid khyod phyag 'tshal// sems dpa' 'byung ba de nyid don// sems can rgyu ste tshul chen po// sems can don chen dgos pa'i don// sems dpa' sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal// sangs
429b7(rgyud): rgyas chos ni chos chen po// chos kyi 'khor lo rab skor ba// smra ba chen po rab rig mchog/ sems dpa' chen po khyod phyag 'tshal// las chen srung ba chen po ste// las rnams thams
429b8(rgyud): cad rab bsgrubs pa// bdag nyid chen po 'gro spyod mchog/ sems dpa' rgyu khyod phyag 'tshalo// pha rol phyin pa kun brnyes pa// kun mkhyen ye shes mkhyen pa po// sems dpa' kun
430a1(rgyud): te thabs chen po// shes rab chen po khyod phyag 'tshal// thugs rdo rje chen po mchog gi mchog/ thugs rje thugs rje'i bdag nyid can// thams cad gtong
430a2(rgyud): byams pa che// kun mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshalo// shAk+Sha seng ge shAkya che// shAkyi shAkya thub pa che// 'dul ba chen po khyab pa po// 'gro don 'dul mchog khyod phyag 'tshal// chos kyi
430a3(rgyud): dbyings dang mnyam brnyes pa// chos dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa ste// rdo rje mgon po mgon chen po// sems can tshogs ni khyod phyag 'tshal// 'od chen snang ba chen po ste// brtson
430a4(rgyud): 'grus chen po stobs chen po// dpa' bo chen po rab dpa' ma/ chog/ bde spyod dpa' bo khyod phyag 'tshal// tshangs dpa rang 'byung bcom ldan 'das// shAkya dpa' bo thub pa che/ 
430a5(rgyud): kun bdag thub pa dag pa yi// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tsha la lo// na mkha'i sku ste sku yi mchog/ sku gsum sku min sgom pa po// kun gyi sku ste sku che ba// rdo rje'i sku
430a6(rgyud): khyed phyag 'tshalo// gsung min gsung ste gsung gi mchog/ gsung gsung gsung min ston pa po// gsung kun shin tu gsung che ba// rdo rje'i gsung khyod phyag 'tshalo// sems min
430a7(rgyud): sems te sems kyi mchog/ sems gsum sems min ston pa po// thams cad sems te sems che ba// rdo rje sems khyod phyag 'tshalo// rngo min rdo rje rdo rje'i mchog/ rdo rje gsum parjor/ 
430a8(rgyud): min sbyong // rdo rje thams cad rdo rje che// rdo rje rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal// kun khyab srid pa'i rtse mo mchog/ bde gshegs bdag po rgyal ba ni// khams gsum pa yi rgyal po che// snang mdzad/ 
430b1(rgyud): khyod la phyag 'tsha'o// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag ni// gang gis skad cig nyan byed dam// klog gam yang na sgom pa'ang rung // kun gyis sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// mgon po khyod
430b2(rgyud): gsol ba ni// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// thugs rje chen po bskyed nas kyang // chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin
430b3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bka' stsal pa'i tshig gsan nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces gsung so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
430b4(rgyud): rnams yang gcig tu 'du bar mdzad par gsol/ de nas ya dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus na das tshig su bcad pa 'di gsung so// rtag par 'jig rten
430b5(rgyud): thams cad du// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor// de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi
430b6(rgyud): zhing thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi mdun du rdul phra mo thams cad ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor kun tu khyad par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
430b7(rgyud): gshegs pa shAkya thub pas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes tshig su bcad pa 'di gsungaso// rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du/ 
430b8(rgyud): sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i// rdo rje'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor// de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra mo thams/ 
431a1(rgyud): cad ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor rnamasu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings kyis rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i 'khor lo thams cad rab tu bskor bar
431a2(rgyud): gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di gsungaso// rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du// sems can kun la
431a3(rgyud): phan pa'i phyir// ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i// khro ba'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor// de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra mo ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams
431a4(rgyud): su bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten ga/ sum las rnam par rgyal bas de bzhin gshegs pa/ thams cad kyi khro bo'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gyur to// 
431a5(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos tshig su bcad pa 'di ga sungaso// rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du// sems
431a6(rgyud): can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji ltar 'dul bar sna tshogs pa'i// pad+mo'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor// de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu
431a7(rgyud): phra mo'i ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor rnamasu// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi rgyal pos pad+mo'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags
431a8(rgyud): pa na mkha'i snying pos tshig su bcad pa 'di gsungaso// rtag par 'jig rten thams cad tu// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i// nor bu'i 'khor lo rab tu
431b1(rgyud): bskor// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi khongasu gtogs pa'i sems can phra ba'am sbom pa yang rung // de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ri rab ri'i rgyal po
431b2(rgyud): mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i khang bu brtsegs par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdan la bzhugs nas rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i 'khor lo thams cad rab tu bskor bar
431b3(rgyud): phyogs kun nas mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di gsungaso// mi yi nang du babs nas kyang // dgos phyir sems can kun gyi don// rdo// 
431b4(rgyud): rje'i 'khor lo mchog bskor zhing // mgon po rab tu sgrub dpar mdzod// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bos nas 'di skad ces gsung so// de nas
431b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yadza/ gcig tu 'du bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas yang bcu ma ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu
431b6(rgyud): 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thug su zhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
431b7(rgyud): sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjer bdag nyid gyur par mkhyen nas phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsungaso// rigs kyi bu khyod kyang nga'i thugs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rigs
431b8(rgyud): thams cad dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugasu zhugs shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams
432a1(rgyud): cad kyis gnang nas tshig su bcad pa 'di gsung so// mdor na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni// zhugs nas sems can thams cad la// phan
432a2(rgyud): pa'i phyir ni bsgrub par bya// de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed
432a3(rgyud): bzhugs pa rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa re res kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i sku 'phro ba mdzad pa rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi
432a4(rgyud): thug su zhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku thams cad dang / gsung
432a5(rgyud): thams cad 'jug pa'i gnas dang / sems kyi rgyud 'byung pa thams cad dang / rdo rje'i tshul thams cad dang / yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad dang / gnas thams cad
432a6(rgyud): dang / mtshan thams cad dang / dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i khung bu thams cad dang / rdul shin tu phra mo snyed kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / thugs rnam su zhugs nas
432a7(rgyud): bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring por ma lon pa zhig na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjer de bzhin gshegs
432a8(rgyud): ba thams cad du bdag nyid gyur par mkhyen nas ri rab ri'i rtse mo nas snying po byang chub gang na ba der gshegs nas ched du bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub kyi shing drung du 'jig rten pa dang 'thun par bya
432b1(rgyud): ba'i phyir rtswa blangs nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sems can brtan pa yi// sems can don ni bdag don mchog/ gang pyir gdul dbang brtan pa rnams// mu stegs// 
432b2(rgyud): la gnas par mdzad// mdor na mi 'dul 'jig rten pa// lta ba ngan pas mdongs pa rnams// ye shes snang bas dag bya'i phyir// sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur// de nas 'dod pa/ 
432b3(rgyud): na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi de kho na nyid mi shes pas 'di skad du kye dge sbyong ji byang chub kyi phyir 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal drag cing mi bzod pa la bzod par mdzad pa zhes gsol to/ de nas
432b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa de bting ste steng du bzhugs nas lharna dmas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po rnam sa kho bos byang chub thob par bsgrubs shig/ de nas 'dod pa
432b5(rgyud): na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ 'i don ma rtogs nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gang na ba der dong nas ched du lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la de ltar
432b6(rgyud): gyur pa 'di brjod do// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi tshogs kyis bskor te gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po la de dag brjod do// 
432b7(rgyud): de nas tshangs pa chen po 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha thams cad dang / lhan cig tu 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag po dbang phyug chen po la de ltar gyur
432b8(rgyud): pa rnams brjod do// de nas 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi bdag po dbang phyug chen pos lha rnams kyi bdag po mthu bo che la sogs pa la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po rnams
433a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten dang 'thun par mdzad cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
433a2(rgyud): byang chub ston gyis 'di ltar 'jig rten na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin no snyam du shes par ma byed cing / lha nyid las de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur gyis/ lha de dag
433a3(rgyud): nyid du bsgrub par bya'i// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du ma yin no// de legs kyi der mchod pa la 'dong bar sgrub bo// de nas lha thams cad kyi bdag por dbang phyug chen
433a4(rgyud): po la sogs pa snying po byang chub gang na ba dang / bco ma ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying por byang chub par bzhugs pa gang na ba der dong nas ched du bcom ldan
433a5(rgyud): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btso ma ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te rang
433a6(rgyud): gyi gdan 'di las bzhengs la lha rdzas kyi gdan la bzhugs te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mdzad du gsol/ 
433a7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bdag po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po rnams kho bo la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sbyin par
433a8(rgyud): bsgrubs shig/ de nas 'di dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis byang chub rtsol bar ci nus ci ste bdag cag gis nus par gyur na
433b1(rgyud): bdag cag nyid yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid gsal bar mdzad cing yang tshig su bcad pa 'di gsungaso// de ni gzugs
433b2(rgyud): min gzugs min min// bden min brdzun mi gtsang ba yi// sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes 'di// rtogs na rgyal ba nyid du 'gyur// de nas lha'i dbang po de dag gis cung zad cig ca
433b3(rgyud): mi smra bar gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rtswa'i gdan las bzhengs te lnga de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po rnams sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'di lta bu
433b4(rgyud): rtogs par bya ba sgrubs shig/ de dag gis gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das rngo mi thog go// de nas bcom da ldan 'das gdan de nyid la bzhugs bzhin du tshigasu bcad
433b5(rgyud): pa 'di gsungaso// yid kyis rab tu rtogs pas na/ byang chub sems ni brtan par byos// sems dpa' rdo rje brtan byas la// sangs rgya su ni bdag sgoms shig
433b6(rgyud): de dag gis 'di skad du de lta bu leg so// zhes bya ba thams cad kyis smras nas dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan mo de'i tho rangs 'jig rten dang / 'thun par bya ba'i phyir
433b7(rgyud): bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya su mngon par sangs rgyas nas sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad la
433b8(rgyud): phan par mdzad pa 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje rang gi thugs la zhugs pa la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis mngon par bstod do// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// theg pa chen
434a1(rgyud): pa'i bdag nyid // snang ba chen zhing dag pa che// mgon chum khyod la phyag 'cha'o// ji rgyal ba ba ni// wi
434a2(rgyud): gshegs pa kun// sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus che// thabs chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje 'dod pa dag pa che// kun gyi bde ba bde ba che// bde mchog
434a3(rgyud): thog ma tha ma med// bzhed chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje legs pa dgyes pa che// legs zhes bya ba rab mnyes pa// mnyes pa che zhing dgyes pa che// rab dgyes khyod
434a4(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rin chen rgyal po che// dbang bskur bzang po bdag po che// rin chen tha/ mas cad mdzes pa che// rnam rgyan khyod la phyag 'tshal
434a5(rgyud): lo// rdo rje gzi brjid gzi brjid che// 'od chen lham pa chen po ste// rgyal ba'i 'od de 'bar ba che// sangs rgyas 'od khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rgyal
434a6(rgyud): mtshan dpal che ba// rgyal mtshan che bas nor rab gtong // na mkha'i rgyal mtshan yu ba che// gtong ba'i mtshan khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje bzhad pa bzhad pa che// dgyes
434a7(rgyud): pa che zhing rab dgyes pa// dgyes pa'i shugs kyis rol cing dgyes// chos dgyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje chos ni chos che ba// sems dpa'i chos ni rab sbyor
434a8(rgyud): ga sangs rgyas chos te chos rab mchog/ 'dod chos khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rnon po ral gri che// shes rab ye shes blo gros che// sdig gcod ral gri chen po ste/ 
434b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas mtshon khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rgyu ste 'khor lo che// sangs rgyas 'khor lo gter chen po// dkyil 'khor kun te chos kyi mchog/ chos kyi dkyil
434b2(rgyud): 'khor khyod phyag 'tshal// rdo rje gsung ba gsung ba che// spros med yi ge chen po ste// yi ge med pa bzlas pa che// sangs rgyas gsung khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdorje
434b3(rgyud): las te las rab mchog/ las chen las rab byed pa ste// gsang ba'i mchod pa mchod pa che// sangs rgyas mchod khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje srung bgo cha che/ 
434b4(rgyud): go cha'i mchog ste bstan pa che// srung ba che zhing snying po che// sangs rgyas brtson 'grus phyag 'tshal/ lo// rdo rje gnod sbyin khro bo che// ma rungs thams
434b5(rgyud): cad skrag byed pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs chen te// srung ba mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje bsdams pa phyag rgya che// dam tshig chen po bcing ba che// 
434b6(rgyud): khu tshur chen po phyag rgya che// rdo rje khu tshur khyod phyag 'tshal// de bzhin gshegs pa phyag bya zhing // brjod de mchod de sti stang bya// gang phyir thog ma tha ma med/ 
434b7(rgyud): byang chub sems ni khyod yin te// khyod la brten nas rgyal ba dang // dpa' bo byang chub sems dpa' kun// byung zhing yang dag 'byung 'gyur bas// sangs rgyas byang chub mchog
434b8(rgyud): gi rgyu// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal// rdo rje rin chen khyod phyag 'tshal// rdo rje chos khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje las ni khyod phyag 'tshal// yang dag par ni phyag 'tshal zhing //
